Name: a0001.nss
Japanese: 毎日は、階段のように過ぎていく。
Translation: Life is like a staircase.

Name: a0001.nss
Japanese: 一度疑問に思ったらその途端、足を上げるのが辛くなる。
Translation: You just gotta keep climbing.
KR: 한 번 의문은 품으면, 다리를 들어 올리는 게 힘들어진다.

Name: a0001.nss
Japanese: だから、一歩、一歩、なにも考えずに、上る。
Translation: Otherwise, if you start to overthink it, you'll have trouble taking the next step.
KR: 그러니까 한 발, 한 발, 아무 생각하지 않고 오른다.

Name: a0001.nss
Japanese: 階段だから、別れ道はなく。
Translation: There are no branching paths.

Name: a0001.nss
Japanese: 「あの時ああしておけば」なんて後悔は無意味で。
Translation: No point in regretting the actions you didn't take.

Name: a0001.nss
Japanese: 「人生は選択の連続だ」なんていうのは、失敗してから振り返って思う、後悔の絞りかすみたいなものだ。
Translation: They say life is a series of choices, but that's nonsense cooked up by the old and bitter.
KR: '인생은 선택의 연속이다' 라는 말은 실패하고 나서야 생각나는, 후회의 찌꺼기 같은 것이다.

Name: a0001.nss
Japanese: 過去の少し先にある、当たり前の明日へ。
Translation: Yesterday leads to today, and today leads to tomorrow.
KR: 과거의 조금 앞에 있는 당연한 내일로.

Name: a0001.nss
Japanese: 一歩、一歩、進んでいく。
Translation: One step at a time.

Name: a0001.nss
Japanese: その行き着く先がどんな未来か――
Translation: What lies ahead?
KR: 그렇게 도달하게 될 미래가 어떤 것일지...

Name: a0001.nss
Japanese: それは、まだわからないけれど。
Translation: You won't know until you get there.

Name: a0111.nss
Japanese: 階段から外に出て、目映い夕陽の色が視界を染めた。
Translation: At the top of the staircase, I step outside into the dazzling sunset.
KR: 계단을 따라 밖으로 나오자, 눈부신 석양빛이 시야를 물들였다.

Name: a0111.nss
Japanese: 一般生徒は出入りできない、学校の屋上。
Translation: This is the school roof. Most students are barred entry.
KR: 일반 학생은 출입할 수 없는 학교 옥상.

Name: a0111.nss
Japanese: 見慣れたはずの光景だが、少し時間が遅いだけで、全く違った場所に見える。
Translation: You'd think I'd be used to the view from up here, but evidently a few hours' difference is all it takes to make the world look brand new.
KR: 익숙한 광경이었지만, 약간 시간이 지났을 뿐인데 전혀 다른 곳으로 보인다.

Name: a0111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「雄太郎、いるのか？」
Translation: "Yuutarou? You up here?"

Name: a0111.nss
Japanese: 呼びかけても返答はない。
Translation: No response.

Name: a0111.nss
Japanese: 静かに秋の風が吹き抜けるだけだ。
Translation: The peaceful autumn breeze is all that greets me.

Name: a0111.nss
Japanese: コンクリートの継ぎ目に草が生えていて、野ざらしで置いてある机は錆び付いている。
Translation: Grass has sprouted between the cracks in the concrete, and the pile of empty desks on the far side has started to rust after continued exposure to the elements.
KR: 콘크리트 사이로 풀이 나 있고, 버려진 책상에는 녹이 슬어있다.

Name: a0111.nss
Japanese: 時の流れから忘れ去られたような場所。
Translation: Up here, it almost feels like a forgotten place lost to time.

Name: a0111.nss
Japanese: 俺はこの場所が好きだった。
Translation: I love it.

Name: a0111.nss
Japanese: 特に、四方に広がる街の風景がいい。
Translation: Specifically, I love the 360-degree view of the city below.
KR: 특히, 사방으로 펼쳐진 마을 풍경이 좋다.

Name: a0111.nss
Japanese: 生まれ育った街には、見渡す限り思い出が詰まっている。
Translation: I've lived my whole life here. Every inch of this city is packed with nostalgic memories.
KR: 태어나 자란 마을에는 시선이 닿는 곳마다 추억으로 가득 차 있다.

Name: a0111.nss
Japanese: それを見ていると、とても心が安らぐのだ。
Translation: The longer I look out at it, the calmer I feel.
KR: 그저 바라보고 있으면 마음이 정말 편안해진다.

Name: a0111.nss
Japanese: 誰も立候補者がおらず、何となくの投票で推薦された美化委員に、こんな役得があるとは思わなかった。
Translation: When they randomly voted me onto the campus clean-up committee, I wasn't exactly eager—but if I'd known about this little side perk sooner, maybe I would have volunteered for the job.
KR: 아무도 입후보를 하지 않아 추천으로 뽑힌 미화위원에게 이런 이득이 있을 줄은 몰랐다.

Name: a0111.nss
Japanese: 鍵を持っているのは、屋上に備品を出し入れする美化委員と、天体観測をする天文部だけ。
Translation: Roof access is only granted to two groups: the astronomy club (for stargazing) and the clean-up committee (in order to haul desks in and out).
KR: 옥상 열쇠를 가지고 있는 건 비품을 옮기는 미화위원과 천체관측을 하는 천문부뿐.

Name: a0111.nss
Japanese: ――というのが建前だが、実は裏でいくつかの合い鍵が作られているらしい。
Translation: That said, I'm told there are plenty of spare keys floating around if you know where to look.
KR: 그게 교칙이었지만, 실은 열쇠 몇 개가 몰래 복사되어 돌아다닌다고 한다.

Name: a0111.nss
Japanese: なぜならばこの屋上には、とある噂があるのだ。
Translation: The school roof has a certain legend attached to it, you see.
KR: 왜냐하면 이 옥상에는 어떤 소문이 있기 때문이다.

Name: a0111.nss
Japanese: おかげで俺は、時々鍵を開けるように頼まれたりする。
Translation: As a result, every now and then other students will ask me to unlock the door for them.
KR: 덕분에 나는 가끔 옥상을 열어달라는 부탁을 받기도 한다.

Name: a0111.nss
Japanese: 今日やってきたのも、雄太郎の依頼を受けたからだ。
Translation: Hence why I'm up here today, at the behest of my friend Yuutarou.
KR: 오늘 올라온 것도 유우타로가 부탁했기 때문이다.

Name: a0111.nss
Japanese: もっともアイツは、遅刻してるみたいだけど――
Translation: Unfortunately, he seems to be running late—
KR: 하기야, 그 녀석은 지각인 것 같지만...

Name: a0112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Hmm?"

Name: a0112.nss
Japanese: 入り口のすぐ側に、何かが落ちていた。
Translation: I look down.
KR: 문 바로 옆에 뭔가가 떨어져 있었다.

Name: a0112.nss
Japanese: 裏返ったスマートフォン。
Translation: There's a cell phone lying facedown on the ground by the door.

Name: a0112.nss
Japanese: 誰が落としたんだろう？
Translation: Whose is this?

Name: a0112.nss
Japanese: しゃがんで手に取ってみる。
Translation: I crouch down and pick it up.
KR: 나는 쭈그려 앉아 스마트폰을 집어 들었다.

Name: a0112.nss
Japanese: 「カミサマ」からの着信だった。
Translation: There's an incoming call from "God."

Name: a0112.nss
Japanese: ――神様？
Translation: ...From God???

Name: a0112.nss
Japanese: 電話に出るまでもなく、発信は切れた。
Translation: Before I can answer, the ringing stops.

Name: a0112.nss
Japanese: ちょっと、ホッとしたというのが、本音だけど。
Translation: Admittedly, I'm a little relieved.

Name: a0112.nss
Japanese: それで一体、誰の携帯だ？
Translation: Seriously, whose phone is this?

Name: a0112.nss
Japanese: "電話をかける","通話履歴を見る"
Translation: "Place a phone call","Check the call history"

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 通話履歴を見てみると――
Translation: I decide to check the call history.

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 「カミサマ」
Translation: "God"

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 「カミサマ」
Translation: "God"

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 「カミサマ」
Translation: "God"

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 「カミサマ」
Translation: "God"

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: ――なんだ、これは。
Translation: ...What the heck?

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 続いて電話帳をチェックする。
Translation: Next, I check the address book.

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 登録されているアドレスはひとつ。
Translation: There's only one entry.

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 「カミサマ」だ。
Translation: Yep, you guessed it. "God."

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: ――神様専用か？
Translation: ...A burner phone for God?

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: まさか、ホントに神様の持ち物ってことはないよな？
Translation: There's no way this ACTUALLY belongs to the big man upstairs—right?
KR: 설마, 진짜로 신의 소유물이라든지... 그건 아니겠지?

Name: a0113.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 『るる』
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 彼女の瞳が、俺に向けられた。
Translation: A girl looks back at me.

Name: a0113.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 『デンチ、きれたの』
Translation: "My battery is dying."

Name: a0113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「電池？」
Translation: "What battery...?"

Name: a0113.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 『ジュウデン、ひつようなの』
Translation: "Need to recharge."

Name: a0113.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 『ビリビリ、するの？』
Translation: "Wanna... get zappy?"

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 間違ったボタンを押してしまったらしい。
Translation: I think I pushed the wrong button by accident.

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 起動したのは、いわゆる「萌え」なゲームだった。
Translation: Looks like I launched one of those "visual novel" games.

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 友達が携帯ゲーム機でやっているのは見たことがある。
Translation: I've seen some friends play these on handheld game consoles.
KR: 친구가 게임기로 하는 걸 본 적이 있다.

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: スマートフォンでもおかしくはないだろう。
Translation: Wouldn't be surprised if they made the jump to mobile, too.

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 俺はプレイしたことがないけれど。
Translation: I've never played one myself.

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: ないはず……なのに……
Translation: At least... I don't think I have...

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: でも、この制服は見たことがあるような……
Translation: But I feel like I recognize that uniform...
KR: 근데 이 교복, 왠지 본 것 같은 기분이...

Name: a0113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「知ってる……？」
Translation: "Do I know you...?"

Name: a0113.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 奇妙な声が、届いた。
Translation: I can hear a strange voice.

Name: a0113.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 少女が手を挙げていた。
Translation: There's a girl up on the roof over the stairs.

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 屋上のさらに上、階段の屋根で。
Translation: Raising her hand straight in the air.

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 表情には、どんな色も浮かべることなく。
Translation: Her expression totally blank.

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 瞳は焦点を結ばず、ただ空を――
Translation: Just staring vacantly into the sky...

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: いや、空のさらに向こうを見ているようで。
Translation: Staring at whatever lies beyond...
KR: 아니, 그보다 더 먼 곳을 바라보듯이...

Name: a0113.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおる……るるる……るる……る……」
Translation: "Boop boop... boop boop boop... boop boop... boop..."

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 身体が、左右に揺れ始める。
Translation: Her body starts to sway.

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 唇から漏れる謎の音も、徐々に小さくなり――
Translation: Her voice is fading...
KR: 입술에서 새어나오는 이상한 소리도 점점 작아지고...

Name: a0113.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop... boop... boop... b..."

Name: a0113.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a0113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Whoa—!"

Name: a0113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん……つつつ……」

Name: a0113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だ……大丈夫か？」
Translation: "Y-You alright?"

Name: a0113.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる」
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 彼女の瞳が、俺にピントを合わせた。
Translation: Her eyes lock onto mine.

Name: a0113.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「デンチ、きれたの」
Translation: "My battery is dying."

Name: a0113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「電池？」
Translation: "What battery...?"

Name: a0113.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ジュウデン、ひつようなの」
Translation: "Need to recharge."

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 顔が、近い。
Translation: Her face is so close to mine.

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 息が、かかる。
Translation: I can feel her breath on my skin.

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 唇が、すぐそこに。
Translation: Her lips are inches away.

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: 学校中に広まる伝説。
Translation: According to the school legend...

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: ――屋上でキスすると、ふたりは永遠に結ばれる。
Translation: ...if two people share a kiss on the roof, they'll spend the rest of their lives together.
KR: 옥상에서 키스하면, 두 사람은 영원히 맺어진다.

Name: a0113.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ビリビリ、するの？」
Translation: "Wanna... get zappy?"

Name: a0113.nss
Japanese: "ビリビリする","ビリビリしない"
Translation: "Get zappy","Don't get zappy"

Name: a0113t.nss
Japanese: "チートコード入力成功","チートコード入力失敗","アオイのコールナンバー"
Translation: "Enter correct cheat code","Enter incorrect cheat code","Enter Aoi's number"

Name: a0113u.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "......What the?"

Name: a0113u.nss
Japanese: 電話番号を間違えたのだろうか？
Translation: Did I misdial?

Name: a0113u.nss
Japanese: いや、それにしたって妙だ。
Translation: No, wait... Even if I did, this still doesn't make sense.

Name: a0113u.nss
Japanese: 間違えたにしても、電波が届かないにしても、その旨のメッセージが流れるはずだ。
Translation: Whenever there's a problem connecting a call, normally you're supposed to hear one of those automated messages, right?
KR: 번호가 틀렸더라도, 전파가 닿지 않더라도, 그에 맞는 음성이 흘러나와야 한다.

Name: a0113u.nss
Japanese: まるで、携帯電話が壊れているような……
Translation: It's like this phone is broken or something...
KR: 마치 핸드폰이 고장이라도 난 것 같이...

Name: a0113v.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『チートコードの入力を確認』
Translation: "CHEAT CODE CONFIRMED."

Name: a0113v.nss
Japanese: 突然、携帯電話から言葉が聞こえ始める。
Translation: Just then, I hear a voice on the other end of the line.

Name: a0113v.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『セカイの強制的アップデートを準備』
Translation: "PREPARING TO FORCE-UPDATE THE UNIVERSE."

Name: a0113v.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アップデート……？」
Translation: "Update... the universe...?"

Name: a0113v.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese:
『改変は不可逆。
　一度アップデートすれば、通常プレイは不可能』
Translation:
"THIS UPDATE IS IRREVERSIBLE.
ONCE COMPLETE, REGULAR PLAY WILL BE DISABLED."
KR:
"변경은 불가역.
한번 업데이트하면 일반 플레이는 불가능."

Name: a0113v.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『警告。主体者が正常な体験を希望するなら、即時のゲーム終了を強く推奨』
Translation: "WARNING. SHOULD THE SUBJECT WISH TO EXPERIENCE THE WORLD AS INTENDED, IT IS STRONGLY ENCOURAGED TO CLOSE THE GAME IMMEDIATELY."
KR: "경고. 주체자가 정상적인 체험을 원한다면, 즉시 게임 종료할 것을 적극 권장."

Name: a0113v.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「は？　ちょっと、何言ってるんだ？」
Translation: "I'm sorry, what? What are you talking about?"

Name: a0113v.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『再警告。即時のゲーム終了を強く推奨』
Translation: "AGAIN, IT IS STRONGLY ENCOURAGED TO CLOSE THE GAME IMMEDIATELY."
KR: "재경고. 즉시 게임 종료할 것을 강력히 권장."

Name: a0113v.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『カウントダウン開始』
Translation: "INITIATING COUNTDOWN."

Name: a0113v.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『１０』<Waittime=1000>
Translation: "TEN." <Waittime=1000>

Name: a0113v.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『９』<Waittime=1000>
Translation: "NINE." <Waittime=1000>

Name: a0113v.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『８』<Waittime=1000>
Translation: "EIGHT." <Waittime=1000>

Name: a0113v.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『７』<Waittime=1000>
Translation: "SEVEN." <Waittime=1000>

Name: a0113v.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『６』<Waittime=1000>
Translation: "SIX." <Waittime=1000>

Name: a0113v.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『５』<Waittime=1000>
Translation: "FIVE." <Waittime=1000>

Name: a0113v.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『４』<Waittime=1000>
Translation: "FOUR." <Waittime=1000>

Name: a0113v.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『３』<Waittime=1000>
Translation: "THREE." <Waittime=1000>

Name: a0113v.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『２』<Waittime=1000>
Translation: "TWO." <Waittime=1000>

Name: a0113v.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『１』<Waittime=1000>
Translation: "ONE." <Waittime=1000>

Name: a0113v.nss
Speaker: God
Translation: "ZERO."

Name: a0113w.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ……もしもし？」
Translation: "Uh... hello?"

Name: a0113w.nss
Japanese: 適当に番号を押したら、繋がってしまった。
Translation: Oh god, I dialed a random number and they actually picked up!

Name: a0113w.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「えっと――」

Name: a0113w.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 『シンイチ』
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: a0113w.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 『アオイたち、オウエンしてるの』
Translation: "We wish you all the best."

Name: a0113w.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What?"

Name: a0113w.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 『バイバイ』
Translation: "Bye-bye."

Name: a0113w.nss
Japanese: それっきり、電話が途切れた。
Translation: With that, the line disconnects.

Name: a0113w.nss
Japanese: 今のは、誰だったんだ？
Translation: Who was that?

Name: a0113w.nss
Japanese: アオイなんて知り合い、いたか？
Translation: And how did she know my name?

Name: a0113w.nss
Japanese: そもそも、この電話は俺のものじゃない。
Translation: I mean, this phone isn't even mine!
KR: 애당초, 이 핸드폰은 내 것이 아니다.

Name: a0113w.nss
Japanese: なのに何で、彼女は俺の名前を知ってたんだ……？
Translation: What the hell...?
KR: 그런데 어째서 내 이름을 부른 거지...?

Name: a0113x.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ……もしもし？」
Translation: "Uh... hello?"

Name: a0113x.nss
Japanese: 適当に番号を押したら、繋がってしまった。
Translation: Oh god, I dialed a random number and they actually picked up!

Name: a0113x.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「えっと――」

Name: a0113x.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『向日アオイの同期を完了』
Translation: "MUKOU AOI SYNCED SUCCESSFULLY."

Name: a0113x.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『しかし、彼女に発生した感情の完全同期は失敗』
Translation: "NOTE: FAILED TO ROLLBACK EMOTIONAL ERRORS."
KR: "그러나 그녀에게 생겨난 감정의 완전 동기화는 실패."

Name: a0113x.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「完全同期……？」
Translation: "What rollback...?"

Name: a0113x.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『完全なバグ。彼女の感情は単独で存在。故に――』
Translation: "DUE TO THE NATURE OF THIS BUG, HER EMOTIONS EXIST INDEPENDENTLY IN THE SYSTEM."

Name: a0113x.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『「君」と「彼女」は、異なるセカイで、再会可能と推測』
Translation: "AS SUCH, SHOULD THE SUBJECT SO DESIRE..."
KR: "그렇기에, "당신"과 "그녀"는 다른 세계에서 재회가 가능할 것으로 추측..."

Name: a0113x.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『もし主体者が、それを希望するなら』
Translation: "IT IS POSSIBLE [YOU] MAY ENCOUNTER [HER] AGAIN... IN ANOTHER UNIVERSE."

Name: a0113x.nss
Japanese: それっきり、電話が途切れた。
Translation: With that, the line disconnects.

Name: a0113x.nss
Japanese: 今のは、誰だったんだ？
Translation: Who was that?

Name: a0113x.nss
Japanese: 完全同期とか、訳のわからないことを言っていたが……
Translation: All that "bug in the system" stuff made zero sense to me...
KR: 완전 동기화라든가, 영문 모를 소릴 했는데...

Name: a0114a.nss
Japanese: 彼女の身体を伝わって、俺の肌に何かが走った。
Translation: Something travels through her body and across my skin, frying all sense of reason to a char.
KR: 이 녀석의 몸을 통해 무언가 내 피부에 흘러 들어왔다.

Name: a0114a.nss
Japanese: 面倒な理性も、小難しい理屈も、焼き切れた。
KR: 귀찮은 이성도, 골치 아픈 이치도 다 태워버렸다.

Name: a0114a.nss
Japanese: 電気の力に引き寄せられるように。
Translation: Pulled in like a magnet, my lips are drawn to hers.

Name: a0114a.nss
Japanese: 俺は彼女に、唇を近づけた。

Name: a0114b.nss
Japanese: ……冷静になろう。
Translation: ...Okay, let's take a deep breath and calm down.

Name: a0114b.nss
Japanese: 俺は一体、何を求められているのか？
Translation: What exactly does this girl want from me?
KR: 이 녀석은 대체 나한테 뭘 바라는 거지?

Name: a0114b.nss
Japanese: 彼女は一体、誰なのか？
Translation: Who even IS she?

Name: a0114b.nss
Japanese: そもそもこのシチュエーション、さっきゲームで……
Translation: Wait... Isn't this exactly what just happened in that game...?

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「神聖なる、学舎の、中――」
Translation: "Wow. Is nothing sacred?"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「学校の、屋上で、何してるの？」
Translation: "What exactly are you doing up here on the roof of our esteemed academy?"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「み、美雪？」
Translation: "M-Miyuki?"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なにって、その」
Translation: "What am I doing? Well..."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ジュウデンなの」
Translation: "Recharging."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「充電？」
Translation: "What?"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「エッチなの」
Translation: "Having sex."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "What?!"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What?!"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「キスは、フラグなの」
Translation: "Kissing triggers the event flag."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふざけないで！」
Translation: "I've heard enough!"

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: バットを振り下ろして、美雪は怒鳴る。
Translation: Miyuki swings her baseball bat.

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方、心一をなんだと思ってるの！」
Translation: "Don't treat Shinichi like your plaything!"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そ、そうだ！　俺を何だと思ってる！？」
Translation: "Y-Yeah! I'm not your plaything!"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「しっ、心一は――心一はっ――！！」
Translation: "Sh-Shinichi... is... He's...!"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私の彼氏なのよっ！」
Translation: "He's my boyfriend!"

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 曽根美雪は、俺の幼馴染み。
Translation: I've been friends with Sone Miyuki since we were kids.

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 小学校くらいまではよくふたりで遊んでもいたのだが、年を取るにつれ疎遠になるのは良くある話で。
Translation: In elementary school, we used to play together all the time, but we grew apart as we got older. Happens to a lot of people.
KR: 초등학교까지는 자주 같이 놀았지만, 시간이 지날수록 소원해지는 건 자주 있는 이야기.

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 俺がだらりだらりと帰宅部生活をしているうちに、彼女はありとあらゆる才能が開花。
Translation: While I've just been skating through life without any hobbies, she's quickly proven she can master anything she tries.
KR: 내가 의욕 없는 귀가부 생활을 하는 사이에 미유키는 온갖 재능이 개화.

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 眉目秀麗・文武両道・演劇部期待のホープの彼女は、すぐさま学園のアイドルになってしまったのだった。
Translation: With her looks, smarts, athletic ability, and a natural talent for acting, she became the school's queen bee practically overnight.
KR: 경국지색, 문무겸비, 연극부의 기대주인 미유키는 곧바로 학교 아이돌이 되어버린 것이다.

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 噂では、入学僅か１ヶ月で、１ダースの生徒から告白されたとか。
Translation: Rumor has it she received over a dozen love confessions within her first month at this school.
KR: 소문으로는 입학한 지 불과 한 달 만에 한 다스나 되는 학생에게 고백을 받았다든지.

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: そのうちひとりは男性教師で、さらにふたりは女子生徒だったとか。
Translation: I'm told two of them were from girls—and one of them was even from a teacher.
KR: 그 중 한 명은 남자 교사였고, 게다가 두 명은 여학생이라든지.

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: それをことごとくフったとか。
Translation: Supposedly, she shot them all down.

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: それでもしつこくつきまとって、挙げ句襲いかかろうとした男子生徒を、金属バットでボコボコにしたとか。
Translation: But they say one of the guys refused to take no for an answer—and she was forced to fight him off with a baseball bat.
KR: 그럼에도 끈질기게 따라다니던 끝에 덮치려고 한 남학생을 쇠 방망이로 박살을 내버렸다든지.

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: まあ、そういう噂のある有名人だ。
Translation: She's so famous, the students here can't seem to stop talking about her.

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 対する俺は、いわゆるクラスの空気。
Translation: Then there's me—a total nobody.
KR: 그에 반해, 나는 이른바 반에서 공기 취급.

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: ……というよりむしろ、窒素のようなポジションだ。
Translation: I'm so invisible, I'm practically air.

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 無味無臭無害。
Translation: Bland, inoffensive, barely even there.

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: モブ中のモブ、ってところだろう。
Translation: An utterly forgettable NPC character in the RPG of life.

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: クラスでも常に話題の中心にいる彼女とは、会話を交わす機会すらない。
Translation: I'm hardly even worthy of breathing the same air as her.
KR: 학급에서도 항상 화제의 중심에 있는 미유키와는 대화할 기회조차 없다.

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 今だってちょっと緊張しているくらいだ。
Translation: Just being around her is making me kind of tense.

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: そんな俺が――
Translation: So yeah, I'm like the furthest thing from—

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Your... boyfriend...?"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「黙ってて！」
Translation: "You be quiet!"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「わ――私と心一は、恋人同士なの。
　貴方は邪魔者ということになるわ」
Translation:
"Sh-Shinichi and I are in a relationship.
I'm afraid you don't have a chance with him."
KR:
"나, 나랑 신이치는 연인 사이야.
너는 방해꾼이라는 소리지."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから、帰ってもらえる？」
Translation: "So could you leave already?"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うそなの」
Translation: "That's not true."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「コイビトじゃないの」
Translation: "You're not dating."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちょっと、何を根拠に――」
Translation: "Excuse me? How would you kn—"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「デンパなの」
Translation: "I'm a transceiver."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「せかいのそとからカミサマのデンパ、ビリビリきたの」
Translation: "God sent me a radio transmission from beyond the universe."

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: えーと……
Translation: Uhhhh...

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: これはいわゆる、デンパさん、か？
Translation: Seems like she's two corn dogs short of a picnic...

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「付き合いきれないわ」
Translation: "Whatever. Talking to you is a waste of breath."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「いい？　私と心一は幼馴染みなの。
　だから、恋人として――」
Translation:
"Listen here: Shinichi and I have known each other a long time.
So, as his girlfriend—"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 美雪の言葉を遮り、彼女がぴんと手を挙げる。
Translation: She raises her hand, interrupting Miyuki.
KR: 그 애는 미유키의 말을 가로막으며 손을 번쩍 들었다.

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おさななじみキャラ」
Translation: "You're the childhood friend character."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ホントのきもちわからない」
Translation: "Your true feelings are a mystery."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ギャルゲーのおうどうなの」
Translation: "A staple of visual novels."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「…………ギャルゲー？」
Translation: "...Visual novels...?"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「こういうゲームのことか？」
Translation: "Oh, you mean like this one?"

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 俺は拾ったスマフォを取り出した。
Translation: I hold up the cell phone I found earlier.

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ぅわっ！」
Translation: "Whoa!"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 今のは静電気――か？
Translation: Was that a static shock I felt just now?!

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どろぼう」
Translation: "Thief."

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 痺れて落ちたスマートフォンを取り返し、彼女がこちらを見据える。
Translation: The phone falls from my now-numbed fingers. She deftly snatches it back and shoots me an accusatory look.
KR: 손이 저려 떨어트린 스마트폰을 되찾은 그 여자애는 이쪽을 응시했다.

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「盗んでない。そこに落ちてたんだ」
Translation: "I didn't steal it. It was lying on the ground over there."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おちてた？」
Translation: "On the ground?"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ」
Translation: "Yeah."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「オンジンなの？」
Translation: "So I owe you a favor?"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、そんな大げさなものじゃ――」
Translation: "Well, I wouldn't go that far, but—"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おれいするの」
Translation: "I'll make it up to you."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「うおッ？」

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ビリビリ、するの」
Translation: "Let's get zappy."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「待ちなさいっ！」
Translation: "Hold it right there!"

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 怒鳴り声に顔を上げると、曽根美雪が震えていた。
Translation: Miyuki is now visibly trembling with rage.
KR: 고함 소리에 고개를 들어 보니 미유키가 부들거리고 있었다.

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方、幼馴染みキャラって、言ったわよね？」
Translation: "What was it you called me? The childhood friend character?"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私を、ゲームのキャラクターと、一緒にした？」
Translation: "Are you seriously comparing me to a character in a video game?"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そうなの」
Translation: "Yup."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふざけないで」
Translation: "Get real!"

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: バットが、床に突きつけられる。
Translation: She slams her bat down hard on the concrete.

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「現実と、ゲームは、違う」
Translation: "Life is not a video game!"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「いい？
　私の気持ちは本物で、ゲームなんかと比べものに――」
Translation:
"You hear me? My feelings are the real deal.
Some video game character can't possibly compare to—"
KR:
"알겠어?
내 기분은 진짜고, 게임 따위에 비할 게..."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 聞いているだけで震えるような美雪の物言いに、彼女は全く物怖じすることなく、ピンと手を挙げた。
Translation: Miyuki's tone is dripping with fury. But the girl raises her hand like she doesn't even notice.
KR: 듣는 것만으로도 떨리는 미유키의 목소리에도 아랑곳하지 않은 채, 그 애는 손을 팟하며 들었다.

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「チューできるの？」
Translation: "Can you kiss him?"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「コイビトなら、できるの」
Translation: "If you're really dating, you can kiss him, right?"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いや、それとこれとは――」
Translation: "Wh... That has nothing to do with—"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いま、キス、するの」
Translation: "Kiss him. Right now."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「できないの？」
Translation: "Should be easy, right?"

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 夕陽の中でもわかるくらい、美雪の顔色が変わっていく。
Translation: Miyuki's face is so red, the sunset can't even compare.
KR: 석양 아래서도 알 수 있을 정도로 미유키의 낯빛이 붉게 물들었다.

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「わ、わかってるわよ！」
Translation: "F-Fine!"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「恋人ならキスくらい」
Translation: "What's a kiss between lovers?"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「キス、くらい……」
Translation: "P-Practically nothing..."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「キス、キス、でもキスって――うう……」
Translation: "I can do it... I can kiss him... But if we... Nnn..."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あのさ、嫌なら無理しなくても――」
Translation: "Listen, if you're opposed to it, we really don't have t—"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「嫌じゃないッ！！」
Translation: "I'm not opposed to it!"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「本当はずっと――待ってたの」
Translation: "To tell the truth... I was always waiting for this."

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 幼馴染みで、あんなに仲の良かった俺と美雪。
Translation: As kids, we were two peas in a pod.
KR: 어릴 적엔 미유키랑 그렇게 사이가 좋았는데.

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: ふたりはいつから、疎遠になったのだろう。
Translation: When did it all fall apart?

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 俺はいつから、彼女を避けるようになったのだろう。
Translation: Why did I start to distance myself?
KR: 나는 언제부터 거리를 두기 시작한 걸까.

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一が、ここに、呼んでくれて、嬉しかった」
Translation: "I'm really happy you asked to meet me up here."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Miyuki...?"

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 彼女が静かに、囁いた。
Translation: Her voice is barely a whisper.

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私の、初めてのキス」
Translation: "This will be my first kiss..."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方に――」
Translation: "But I'll give it..."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うううううう――――！」
Translation: "Nnnnnggghhhh!"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「やっぱり駄目っ、恥ずかしい――！」
Translation: "I can't! This is too awkward!"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「もえなの」
Translation: "Cute."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「私には慎みがあるの！
　人前でキスするのが恥ずかしいだけよ！」
Translation:
"I just prefer to keep private matters private, that's all!
Public displays of affection are far too shameless!"
KR:
"내게도 수치심이란 게 있어!
사람 앞에서 키스하는 게 부끄러울 뿐이야!"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ、心一！　私たちは、こ、こ、恋人、よね！？」
Translation: "Tell her, Shinichi! The two of us are d-d-dating, aren't we?!"
KR: "저기, 신이치! 우리 연, 연, 연인인 거지!?"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え、いやそれは――」
Translation: "What? I don't—"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「はっきりして！
　ここに呼び出したのは貴方じゃない！」
Translation:
"Make it clear to her!
You're the one who called me up here, after all!"
KR:
"확실히 해!
여기로 오라고 한 건 너잖아!"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そのおかげで、私も心を決めた――」
Translation: "Your actions pushed me to make up my mind, and..."

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: あれ……？
Translation: Wait, what?

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「呼び出しって？」
Translation: "I did what now?"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「しらばっくれないで！　これはあなたが――」
Translation: "Don't play dumb! I know you wrote this!"

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 美雪がポケットから取り出した手紙。
Translation: Miyuki pulls a letter out of her pocket.
KR: 미유키는 주머니에서 편지 한 장을 꺼냈다.

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: ――拝啓　曽根美雪様
Translation: —To: Miss Sone Miyuki

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: ――放課後、校舎の屋上で待っています。
Translation: —I'll be waiting on the rooftop after school.

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 記名はない。
Translation: There's no signature.

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 見覚えもない。
Translation: I've never seen this letter in my life.

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Wait... what? Wait..."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そういえばこれ、心一の字じゃ、ない？」
Translation: "Now that I look at it, this... isn't your handwriting..."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「待たせたなッ！！」
Translation: "Sorry I'm late!"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「男の浪漫倶楽部部長ッ！
　曙雄太郎――見・参ッ！」
Translation:
"Arriving just in the nick of time!
Akebono Yuutarou, captain of the Boys and Dreams Club!"
KR:
"남자의 낭만 클럽 부장!
아케보노 유우타로 등장!"

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: コイツか。
Translation: Of course.

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: コイツが呼び出したのか。
Translation: It was this idiot.

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「屋上での告白――交わされる伝説のキス――
　そしてふたりは伝説の愛を誓う――！！」
Translation:
"A rooftop confession! A legendary kiss!
The two exchange an eternal vow of love...!"
KR:
"옥상에서 고백! 주고받는 전설의 키스!
그리고 두 사람은 전설의 사랑을 맹세한다!"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「ああっ！　なんて男の浪漫ティック！
　そして君は僕のラ・マンティック――あれ？」
Translation:
"Yes, this is what dreams are made of!
Me, the gallant prince, and you, the fair maiden—wha?"
KR:
"아앗! 이 무슨 남자의 낭만!
그리고 너는 나의 낭만틱... 어라?"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「曽根さん……？」
Translation: "Sone-san...?"

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 美雪は、何かが噴き出しそうな表情を堪え真一文字に唇を結び、無言のまま扉に近づくと――
Translation: Visibly struggling to contain herself, Miyuki strides to the door—
KR: 미유키는 뭔가 폭발할 것 같은 표정을 참으며 입술을 꾹 다물고선 아무 말 없이 문으로 가더니...

Name: a0121.nss
Japanese: 凄まじい勢いで、扉を閉めた。
Translation: —and slams it behind her.

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「何故だ！？」
Translation: "WHYYY?!"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前のせいだ」
Translation: "Nice going, genius."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Translation: "What? Was it something I said?"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「しまった……
　あまりの男の浪漫状況に興奮しすぎたか！」
Translation:
"Damn!
I must have let all the dreams go to my head!"
KR:
"아차!
남자의 낭만 상황에 너무 흥분해 버렸나!"

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうじゃないっての」
Translation: "Yeahhh, I don't think that's it..."

Name: a0121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: まあ色々ややこしくなりそうなんで、説明は後回しにすることにして……
Translation: Forget it. I'd better save the explanation for later or else we're gonna be standing up here all night.
KR: 뭐, 여러 가지로 복잡해질 것 같으니 설명은 뒤로 미루기로 하고...

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なあ」
Translation: "Hey, you."

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる？」
Translation: "Boop boop?"

Name: a0122.nss
Japanese: 相変わらず彼女は無表情。
Translation: Her expression is still completely blank.

Name: a0122.nss
Japanese: なにを考えているのか、サッパリだ。
Translation: I don't have the first clue what she's thinking.
KR: 무슨 생각을 하고 있는지 전혀 모르겠다.

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「さっきの、充電？　なんだったんだ？」
Translation: "That whole... 'recharging' thing from earlier? What was that about?"

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ジュウデンは、ビリビリなの」
Translation: "Recharging my zappy."

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから、そのビリビリって――」
Translation: "Okay, well, what's 'zappy'?"

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「エッチなの」
Translation: "Sex."

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「エッチぃぃいい！？」
Translation: "SEEEEX?!"

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「したのか！？」
Translation: "You guys were screwing up here?!"

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「してない」
Translation: "No!"

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「しかけたの」
Translation: "Almost."

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「未遂事件！？」
Translation: "What the hell is 'almost'?!"

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「どういうことだ！？　エッチ完遂でなければ未遂か！？　百歩譲って先っぽ、いや半分まではセーフか！？」
Translation: "How does that work?! Where do you draw the line?! Does it not count if it's just the tip?! Is it cool if you only get like halfway in?!"
KR: "어떻게 된 거냐!? 야한 짓 완료? 아니면 미수!? 백번 양보해서 앞부분, 아니 반까지는 세이프냐!?"

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だめだろ」
Translation: "No, it's not cool!"

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ダメなのか？」
Translation: "It's not?"

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だめなの？」
Translation: "It's not?"

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だめだ！」
Translation: "No!"

Name: a0122.nss
Japanese: そんなの当たり前だろ……
Translation: I can't believe I have to explain this...

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?"

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「フラグ、ひつようなの」
Translation: "You have to trigger the event flag."

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「コウカンドないと、ぎゃくこうか」
Translation: "You need to raise your affection points or you'll fail."

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ゲームの話じゃないんだから」
Translation: "This isn't a video game."

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: a0122.nss
Japanese: 彼女は空に、左手を挙げた。
Translation: She raises her hand straight into the air like an antenna searching for radio waves.

Name: a0122.nss
Japanese: デンパを掴まえるアンテナのように、高く。

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、こうりゃくヒロイン」
Translation: "Aoi is a romance option."

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このセカイは、ゲームなの」
Translation: "And this world is a video game."

Name: a0122.nss
Japanese: 「ゲーム脳」という言葉がある。
Translation: There's a term for people like this: "gamer brain."

Name: a0122.nss
Japanese: 本来どのように使われ出したのかは知らないが、少なくとも俺たちで使われるときは――
Translation: I'm not sure what the original definition was, but these days we use it to mean someone who can't tell the difference between games and reality.
KR: 본래 어떻게 쓰였는지는 모르지만, 적어도 우리 사이에서는...

Name: a0122.nss
Japanese: 現実とゲームの区別がつかない、そういう意味だ。
KR: 게임과 현실을 구분하지 못한다는 뜻으로 쓰인다.

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも」

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「くろかみロングおさななじみが、メインヒロインなの」
Translation: "Your childhood friend with the long, dark hair is the main heroine."

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイこうりゃくは、あとまわしなの」
Translation: "Aoi's route will have to wait."

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「バイバイなの」
Translation: "Bye-bye."

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え、おい、ちょっと――」
Translation: "What? Hey, wait—!"

Name: a0122.nss
Japanese: 呼びかけを完璧に無視し、彼女は屋上から姿を消した。
Translation: But she ignores me and runs off down the stairs.
KR: 아오이는 부르는 소리를 완전히 무시한 채 옥상에서 사라졌다.

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Translation: "Haah..."

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「相変わらずのデンパっぷりだな」
Translation: "That girl's always such an enigma."

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「相変わらずの……？」
Translation: "What do you mean, always?"

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「というか、説明してもらうぞ。
　曽根さんがいなくなった原因はなんだ？」
Translation:
"More importantly, I need you to explain!
Why the heck did Sone-san storm off like that?"
KR:
"그보다 설명해주셔야겠어.
소네 씨가 사라진 원인은 뭐야?"

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「そしてどうして向日まで？
　貴様リア充か？　リア充なのかッ！？」
Translation:
"And now you've got Mukou, to boot?
You punk! Are you a normie? Are you a goddamn normie?!"
KR:
"게다가 어째서 무코우까지?
네놈, 리얼충이냐? 리얼충인 거냐!?"

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょっと待て」
Translation: "Wait a second..."

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おまえ……アイツのこと、知ってるのか？」
Translation: "Do... Do you KNOW her?"

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「は？　何言ってるんだ？」
Translation: "What? Are you serious?"

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「さっきの電波は、向日アオイ」
Translation: "That ditz? That was Mukou Aoi."

Name: a0122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「俺たちのクラスメイトだろ？」
Translation: "She's in our class, dude!"

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: 向日アオイ。
Translation: Mukoi Aoi...

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: 全く記憶にない名前だった。
Translation: The name doesn't ring any bells whatsoever.

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: 正直いって、俺は人付き合いがいい方じゃない。
Translation: To be honest, I'm not much of a people person.
KR: 솔직히 말해, 나는 사교성이 좋은 편은 아니다.

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: というか、かなり下手だと思う。
Translation: I'm pretty socially awkward.

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: このクラスになってからもう半年が過ぎようとしているのに、女子の一部は名前があやふやだったりする。
Translation: Like, it's been almost six months, and I still don't know the names of all the girls in our class.
KR: 이 반이 된 지 벌써 반년이 다 돼가는데도, 여자애들 몇 명은 이름이 가물가물하다.

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: だが、相手はあのゲーム脳の電波少女だ。
Translation: But that grade-A space cadet?

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: 結構インパクトがある挙動だし、普通なら、忘れるわけないと思うのだが……
Translation: It's hard to believe I could forget someone as... unique... as her.
KR: 꽤 눈에 띄는 모습이고, 웬만하면 잊을 리가 없을 텐데...

Name: a0131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Haah..."

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: 溜息と共に、ベッドへと潜り込む。
Translation: I crawl into bed.

Name: a0131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ビリビリ、するの？」
Translation: "Wanna... get zappy?"

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: 向日のあの外見――
Translation: Back there, on the roof...

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: あのシチュエーション――
Translation: Everything from her pose to her appearance...

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: そして、あの台詞――
Translation: And everything she said...

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: 全てが、スマフォでやったゲームとそっくりだった。
Translation: It was all identical to that scene from the mobile game.
KR: 모든 게 스마트폰에 있던 게임과 똑같았다.

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: まるで、ゲームからそのまま飛び出したかのように。
Translation: Almost like she'd jumped right out of the screen and into real life.

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: しかも主人公の名前が「須々木心一」で――
Translation: And the protagonist's name was "Susuki Shinichi," too...

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: ――あるいは、まさか。
Translation: No, it can't be.

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: 俺はゲームを現実化する能力を手に入れた……とか？
Translation: I don't have the power to turn video games into reality, do I...?
KR: 나는 게임을 현실화하는 능력을 손에 넣었다든지?

Name: a0131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「待て待て」
Translation: "Whoa there, buddy."

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: 俺がゲーム脳になってどうする。
Translation: Now I'M the one with gamer brain!

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: あのゲームは、元々向日のスマフォに入ってた。
Translation: That visual novel was on Mukou's phone.
KR: 그 게임은 애초에 그 녀석 스마트폰에 있었다.

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: ということは、全く同じ台詞がゲームにあることを、彼女自身も知っているわけで。
Translation: She probably has all the dialogue memorized.
KR: 그렇다는 건, 똑같은 대사가 게임에 있다는 걸 걔도 알고 있을 테고.

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: 向日は恐らく意図的に、真似したのだろう。
Translation: She was probably just acting it out!

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: 主人公を、わざわざオレの名前にしたのだろう。
Translation: And she probably set the protagonist's name to mine on purpose!
KR: 주인공 이름에는 일부러 내 이름을 넣은 거고.

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: ――なんのために？
Translation: ...But why?

Name: a0131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「知るか」
Translation: "Forget it."

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: 想像ばかり膨らませていても、しかたない。
Translation: I'm letting my imagination get carried away.
KR: 상상의 나래를 펼쳐도 아무런 소용이 없다.

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: 布団を被って、俺は無理矢理目を閉じた。
Translation: I pull the blanket over my head and squeeze my eyes shut.
KR: 나는 이불을 뒤집어쓰고 억지로 눈을 감았다.

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: その晩夢に、美雪が出てきて。
Translation: That night, in my dreams, I see Miyuki...
KR: 그날 밤, 미유키는 내 꿈에 나와서...

Name: a0131.nss
Japanese: 俺と彼女は、キスをした。
Translation: ...and we kiss.

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ふぁわああ……」
Translation: *yaaawn*

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: そして始まる、新しい日。
Translation: The start of a new day.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 昨日、おかしな夢を見たからって。
Translation: Man, that dream I had last night was pretty weird...

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 特に珍しいことはなにもなく。
Translation: But I know today will be just the same as always.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: いつもの毎日が、いつものように過ぎて――
Translation: Just another ordinary—

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 靴箱から落ちた、無記名の手紙。
Translation: A letter tumbles out of my shoe locker.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 手元でそっと封を開け、怖いもの見たさで覗き込む。
Translation: I pick it up and carefully open the envelope, half-terrified to discover what awaits me inside.
KR: 살짝 봉투를 열고 무서운 거라도 보는 것처럼 들여다봤다.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: ――昼休み、屋上で。
Translation: —Meet me on the roof at lunch.

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「爆発しろッ！」
Translation: "DIE!"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "AAAH!"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「雄太郎、見たのか！？」
Translation: "Yuutarou?! Were you peeking?!"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「曽根さんと幼馴染みである事が発覚し、向日にフタマタをかけようとした上に――！」
Translation: "First I find out you're old friends with Sone-san... and not only did you try to cheat on her with Mukou..."
KR: "소네 씨와 소꿉친구인 것이 발각되고, 무코우에게 양다리를 걸치려고 한 데다..."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「そんな古式ゆかしいラヴ・レターまでッ！」
Translation: "On top of that, you get this old-fashioned love letter?!"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「リア充か？　リア充だな！　リア充なんだなっ！！」
Translation: "You're a normie, aren't you? You ARE! You're a goddamn NORMIE!"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「お天道様が許しても、この男の浪漫倶楽部部長、曙雄太郎が断固として許さ――――――――んッッ！！！！」
Translation: "Your god may forgive you, but as the captain of the Boys and Dreams Club, Akebono Yuutarou NEVER WILL!!!"
KR: "하느님이 용서해도 남자의 낭만 클럽 부장, 아케보노 유우타로가 절대 용서하지 않는다!!!"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「他人の手紙は覗くな」
Translation: "Keep your nose out of other people's letters."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「スマン！」
Translation: "Sorry!"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「だが一応、男の浪漫倶楽部の存続にも関わることだろ」
Translation: "But you know stuff like this will affect whether the B&D Club lives to see another day!"
KR: "하지만 일단은 남자의 낭만 클럽 존속과도 관련 있는 거잖아."

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: なにを隠そう、雄太郎は男の浪漫倶楽部の部長である。
Translation: Ah, yes. The "Boys and Dreams Club."
KR: 그렇다. 유우타로는 남자의 낭만 클럽 부장이다.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 意味がわからないと思うが、俺もよくわからないので安心していただきたい。
Translation: Don't worry—it doesn't make much sense to me, either.
KR: 의미를 모르겠다고 생각하겠지만, 나도 잘 모르니 안심해도 좋다.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 部の活動内容としては男の浪漫を追い求めるらしい。
Translation: Yuutarou describes his club as "for boys who want to pursue their dreams."
KR: 클럽 활동 내용은 남자의 낭만을 추구하는 것이라고 한다.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: はっきりいって何を言っているのかサッパリだ。
Translation: Personally, I have no idea what that means.
KR: 확실히 말해, 무슨 소린지 전혀 모르겠다.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 意外と由緒のある部活なのだが、正直そんな怪しい部に首を突っ込みたくなる人間がそういるとも思えない。
Translation: The club's actually been around for quite some time, but with a name like that, I can't imagine many people would go out of their way to join.
KR: 의외로 유서 깊은 동아리지만, 솔직히 이런 수상한 곳에 들어가고 싶은 사람이 많을 것 같진 않다.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 例によってこの春、浪漫倶楽部は曙雄太郎他１名しか部員がおらず、廃部の危機に陥ることとなった。
Translation: Unsurprisingly, once spring rolled around, Yuutarou was the only member left, and the B&D Club was on the verge of being disbanded.
KR: 예상대로 이번 봄, 낭만 클럽은 아케보노 유우타로 외 1명밖에 부원이 없어 폐부될 위기에 빠지게 되었다.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 結果、帰宅部所属の俺が幽霊部員として名義貸しする事になったわけで……
Translation: In the end, he convinced me to "join" (in name only) purely to keep the club alive.
KR: 그 결과, 아무 소속도 아닌 내가 유령부원으로 이름을 빌려주게 되었는데...

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「別に、俺が部をやめなきゃ良いんだろ？」
Translation: "It doesn't matter what I do as long as I stay in the club, right?"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「フフフ……
　男の浪漫とは、掴めないからこそ追い求めるもの」
Translation: "Heh heh heh... My friend, you can't pursue a dream you're already living."
KR:
"후후후...
남자의 낭만이란 잡을 수 없기에 추구하는 것."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「恋愛成就、リア充となった暁には、即刻除名！
　それが男の浪漫倶楽部鉄の掟なのだッッ！！」
Translation: "The moment you achieve romantic fulfillment and become a normie, your membership is null and void! This is the oath sworn by the B&D Boys!!!"
KR:
"연애 성취, 리얼충이 된 날로 즉시 제명!
그것이 남자의 낭만 클럽 절대 규칙이다!!!"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そんな部潰れた方がいいんじゃ……」
Translation: "Maybe disbanding is for the best...?"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「それは時々俺も悩む」
Translation: "I'm starting to think so, too."

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎はこう見えて意外と真面目だ。
Translation: Yuutarou may seem like a goofball, but he takes this 100% seriously.

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「部の存続のために恋愛の芽を潰すわけにはいかんしな」
Translation: "No sense in sabotaging a relationship just to keep my club alive, you know?"
KR: "동아리의 존속을 위해 연애의 싹을 잘라버릴 수는 없지."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ほらよ」
Translation: "Here."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 雄太郎が俺の机に置いたのは――
Translation: He sets something on my desk.

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「昨日のゲーム……」
Translation: "That's the game I saw yesterday!"

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 俺はあの後、雄太郎に根掘り葉掘り事情を聞かれた。
Translation: After Mukou left, Yuutarou had demanded to know every last detail of what happened.
KR: 무코우가 간 뒤, 유우타로는 내게 꼬치꼬치 캐물었다.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: さすがに美雪の告白云々は話せなかったが、ゲームの内容は既に伝えてある。
Translation: Obviously I couldn't tell him about all that stuff Miyuki said, but I did tell him about the visual novel on her phone.
KR: 역시 미유키의 고백에 대해서 말할 순 없었지만, 게임 내용은 알려주었다.

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あれだけの説明で、よくわかったな？」
Translation: "I barely gave you anything to go on... How'd you find it?"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「龍二郎、そういうのに詳しいからさ」
Translation: "Oh, Ryuujirou knows a lot about these games."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「龍二郎？」
Translation: "Who's Ryuujirou?"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ああ、俺の弟な」
Translation: "My kid brother."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「ヒロインが向日そっくりだって言ってただろ？
　写真見せたら、一発だった」
Translation: "You said the heroine looks dead on like Mukou, so I showed him a pic of her. That was all it took."
KR:
"히로인이 무코우랑 닮았다고 했었지?
사진 보여줬더니 단번에 맞췄어."

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 俺は、画面に表示されている「アオイ」と――
Translation: I look at the girl onscreen.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 現実世界の「アオイ」を、比べてみる。
Translation: Then I look at the girl sitting a few desks away.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 見れば見るほど、そっくりだ。
Translation: They're absolutely identical.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 現実の向日を、そのまま絵に落としこんだ感じ。
Translation: A perfect 2D recreation.
KR: 현실 세계 무코우를 그대로 그림에 담아냈다는 느낌.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 彼女がモデルだと言われれば、きっと信じるだろう。
Translation: If you told me the developers modeled their character on her, I wouldn't doubt it for a second.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 誰とも喋らず、かといって携帯を弄るでもなく、ただ虚空に視線を彷徨わせている向日。
Translation: Mukou sits silently at her desk. She doesn't try to talk to anyone or play with her phone—she just stares into empty space.
KR: 누구와도 대화하지 않고, 그렇다고 핸드폰을 만지작거리는 것도 아니고, 그저 허공에 시선을 방황하는 무코우.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 皆が各々の友人と朝の情報交換に励む中、彼女の側だけが、真空状態のように静かだ。
Translation: While everyone else is chatting about their morning to their friends, the space around her is perfectly quiet, like a vacuum.
KR: 모두 각자 친구들과 아침 대화에 열중하는 가운데, 무코우 쪽은 진공 상태에 있는 것처럼 조용하다.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: まるで、宇宙の彼方からやってくる微かな電波を、身体全体で捉えようとしているような……
Translation: Almost as if she's focusing her entire being on picking up the faintest radio waves from the farthest reaches of space...
KR: 마치 우주 저편에서 날아온 희미한 전파를 온몸으로 붙잡으려 하는 것처럼...

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 唐突に、向日が左手を天に突き出し――
Translation: Just then, she thrusts her hand up into the air.

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「デンパじゅしんなの」
Translation: "Transmission received."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「かいはつスケジュール、ハアクなの」
Translation: "Development schedule confirmed."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「コウリャク、ケイゾクするの」
Translation: "Route in progress."

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 誰に告げるでもなく、返答した。
Translation: She babbles to no one in particular.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: だがそれはクラスにとって日常茶飯事の光景――
Translation: But our class is already used to her antics.
KR: 하지만 그건 우리 반의 일상적인 풍경.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 誰も彼女の行動に不信を抱いたりはしない――
Translation: No one finds her behavior surprising.
KR: 무코우의 행동에 아무도 이상하다 생각하지 않는다.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: そんな雰囲気だった。
Translation: At least, that's the sense I get.

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……変なヤツ」
Translation: "What a weirdo."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「悪いことは言わん。やめとけ」
Translation: "Nothing against her, but... I suggest you set your sights elsewhere."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「あんなのと付き合ったら、苦労するに決まってる」
Translation: "She's one giant headache waiting to happen."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「は？　いつ付き合うとかそういう話に――」
Translation: "Huh? I never said I was interested in her like that."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「じゃあなんで詮索を？」
Translation: "Then why are you asking about her?"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「突然告白されたんだ。興味くらい湧くだろ」
Translation: "She tried to kiss me on the roof! Obviously I'm gonna be at least a little curious, you know?"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それだけだよ、それだけ」
Translation: "But that's all it is."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ならいいんだが」
Translation: "For your sake, I sure hope so."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「あんまりいい噂を聞かないし……」
Translation: "I've heard some pretty bad rumors, dude."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Such as?"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「男癖が悪いとかなんとか……」
Translation: "They say she's a total slut."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「いや、俺は信じないけどな！」
Translation: "Not that I buy it, obviously!"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「彼女、普通にコミュニケーションが成立するようには思えないし」
Translation: "I mean, she's impossible to talk to, much less anything else."
KR: "저 애, 평범한 의사소통도 안 되는 것 같고."

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 昨日のゲーム脳っぷりを見れば、よくわかる。
Translation: After witnessing her gamer brain antics yesterday, I agree.
KR: 어제 그 게임 뇌를 봤더니, 왠지 알 법하다.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: マイペースというか、周囲の反応に無頓着というか。
Translation: She seems like she's off in her own little world... or at the very least, totally oblivious to the people around her.
KR: 자신만의 세상에 빠져있달까, 주위 반응에 무관심하다고 할까...

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 会話のキャッチボールが、まったく成立しない。
Translation: She can't carry a conversation to save her life.
KR: 대화를 주고받는 게 전혀 성립하지 않는다.

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なあ、雄太郎？」
Translation: "Hey, Yuutarou?"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「このゲーム、普通の携帯でダウンロードできるか？」
Translation: "Is this game available on the app store?"
KR: "이 게임, 일반 핸드폰에서 다운로드할 수 있어?"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「このまま持ってけ」
Translation: "You can keep it."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え？　でもコレ――」
Translation: "What? The phone?"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「コレ、龍二郎の旧型なんだ」
Translation: "Yeah. Ryuujirou got himself a new one recently."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「ＳＩＭカード抜いてあるから通話はできないけど。
　ゲームなら問題ないから」
Translation: "There's no SIM card, so you can't make calls with it, but you can download games no problem."
KR:
"SIM 카드를 빼놔서 통화는 안 되지만,
 게임은 할 수 있을 거야."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「龍二郎が言うには、ネトラレゲーの隠れた名作らしい」
Translation: "According to him, this is a cult classic NTR game."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ネトラレゲー？　って、なんだ？」
Translation: "NTR? What's that?"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「俺にはわからん！　専門用語らしいからな」
Translation: "Hell if I know! It's visual novel terminology, I guess."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「が、なにやら男の浪漫が香る！」
Translation: "But I'm getting some B&D vibes from it!"
KR: "하지만 왠지 남자의 낭만 같은 냄새가 나는데!"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そ、そうかな……」

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「おはよう」
Translation: "Good morning!"

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 美雪の挨拶が、教室中に響き渡る。
Translation: Miyuki's voice rings out through the classroom.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: それまでバラバラの集団で話していた女子生徒が、彼女を中心にして一気に大きな輪になった。
Translation: Just like that, all the girls start to gather around her in a giant circle.
KR: 그때까지 각자 얘기하고 있던 여학생들은 미유키를 중심으로 모여 큰 원을 만들었다.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 「ねえねえ、昨日のドラマ見た？」とか「街にこんなお店ができたんだけど知ってる？」とか。
Translation: They start asking her all kinds of questions, like whether she'd seen last night's season premiere, or if she'd heard about the new store that just opened up in town.
KR: "저기저기, 어제 드라마 봤어?"라던가 "거리에 이런 가게가 생겼는데 알고 있어?"라던가.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: あらゆる話題にコメントを求められ、美雪はどんな話題も笑顔で、慎み深く、そして優雅に捌いていく。
Translation: No matter the topic, Miyuki answers each one with grace, sophistication, and a smile.
KR: 온갖 화젯거리에 대한 질문을 받으면서도, 미유키는 웃는 얼굴로, 조심스럽게, 그리고 우아하게 처리해 나갔다.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: そんな美雪の目映さに、周りで雑談をしていた男子生徒たちの注意も逸れがちになった。
Translation: Just like that, she lights up the room, drawing attention from quite a few of the guys in our class.
KR: 그런 미유키의 눈부심에 주위에서 잡담을 나누던 남학생들도 주의가 흐트러졌다.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 曽根美雪はクラスの中心。
Translation: This happens every morning—and every time, it makes me painfully aware of the distance between us.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 毎日のこととはいえ、それを痛感させられる光景だ。
Translation: Sone Miyuki is the queen bee, and I'm nobody.
KR: 매일 같은 일이지만, 그것을 실감하게 되는 광경이다.

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「学園という名の荒野に咲いた一輪の花――！」
Translation: "A lone flower, blossoming in the vast desert of this campus...!"
KR: "학교란 이름의 황야에 핀 한 송이 꽃...!"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ううーん、やはり曽根さんはお美しいなあ……」
Translation: "Man... She's just so beautiful..."

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……美しい、ね」
Translation: "Yeah..."

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 確かに今の彼女は完璧にクラスの中心人物に見える。
Translation: Here in the classroom, she's the star of the show.
KR: 확실히 미유키는 완벽한 반의 중심인물로 보인다.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: でも、あれは一種の演技。
Translation: But I know she's just playing the part.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 素顔の彼女がもっと気難しく、もっと砕けたところがあることを、幼馴染みの俺は良く知っている。
Translation: As her old friend, I know what she's really like—fussy and plain-spoken.
KR: 본래 모습은 좀 더 까다롭고 좀 더 스스럼없다는 걸 소꿉친구인 나는 잘 알고 있다.

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「お、おい！　今の見たか！？」
Translation: "D-Dude! Did you see that?!"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Hmm?"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「曽根さんがこっちチラ見した！」
Translation: "Sone-san just glanced over at us!"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「ああ……俺やっぱり、曽根さんラヴだ……
　浪漫を求めて告白せざるを得ない……サダメだ……」
Translation: "Haah... I can't help it... I'm crazy about her... And if I wanna pursue this dream, I gotta confess my love... It's destiny..."
KR:
"아아... 난 역시 소네 씨 러브야.
 낭만을 쫓아 고백하지 않을 수 없어... 이건 운명이야!"

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「頑張れ。応援してるぞ」
Translation: "Good luck. I'm rooting for you, man."

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 無責任に雄太郎の背中を押しながら――
Translation: And yet, even as I speak...

Name: a1111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: つい、視線が逸れてしまう。
Translation: ...I can't help but glance at Mukou out of the corner of my eye.

Name: a1111.nss
Japanese: 華やぐ教室の中、相変わらず微動だにしない向日が、より一層孤独に思えてならなかった。
Translation: Amid the cheerful chatter, she sits perfectly still... the very picture of loneliness.
KR: 왁자지껄한 교실 안, 여전히 요지부동인 무코우가 더욱 고독하게 느껴지지 않을 수 없었다.

Name: a1121.nss
Japanese: 授業中――
Translation: During class...

Name: a1121.nss
Japanese: 俺は教科書に隠れて、スマフォでゲームを開始する。
Translation: Using my textbook as cover, I stealthily take out Yuutarou's brother's phone and launch the game.
KR: 나는 교과서로 스마트폰을 숨긴 채 게임을 실행했다.

Name: a1122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?"

Name: a1122.nss
Japanese: 彼女の瞳が、俺にピントを合わせて。
Translation: Her eyes lock onto mine.
KR: 무코우의 눈동자가 나를 향해 초점을 맞추고...

Name: a1122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 『デンチ、きれたの』
Translation: "My battery is dying."

Name: a1122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 『電池？』
Translation: "What battery...?"

Name: a1122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 『ジュウデン、ひつようなの』
Translation: "Need to recharge."

Name: a1122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 『ビリビリ、するの？』
Translation: "Wanna... get zappy?"

Name: a1122.nss
Japanese: 間違いなく、昨日俺がプレイしたゲームだ。
Translation: Yeah, this is definitely the same game from yesterday.
KR: 틀림없이, 내가 어제 플레이 한 게임이다.

Name: a1122.nss
Japanese: 登場人物や細かな受け答えは違っているが、所々完璧に重なる台詞が登場する。
Translation: The conversation plays out a little differently in the game, but for the most part, it's exactly the same as what happened on the roof.
KR: 등장인물이나 자잘한 대답은 다르지만, 군데군데 완벽히 겹치는 대사가 등장한다.

Name: a1122.nss
Japanese: ここまで一緒だと、単なる偶然とは考えられない。
Translation: This level of pinpoint accuracy can't possibly be a coincidence.
KR: 이 정도면 단순한 우연이라고 생각하긴 힘들다.

Name: a1122.nss
Japanese: 彼女は意図的に、ゲームの台詞を真似したはずだ。
Translation: She must have been intentionally trying to recreate the scene word for word.
KR: 무코우는 의도적으로 게임 속 대사를 흉내 낸 것일 터.

Name: a1122.nss
Japanese: やっぱり彼女は、俺に好意を？
Translation: Is she really... interested in me...?

Name: a1122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「待て待て」
Translation: "Whoa there, buddy."

Name: a1122.nss
Japanese: 思わず小声で自分に言い聞かせる。
Translation: I mutter to myself.
KR: 나도 모르게 작은 소리로 자신을 타이른다.

Name: a1122.nss
Japanese: 結論を出すのはまだ早い。
Translation: It's way too early to be drawing any sort of conclusion.

Name: a1122.nss
Japanese: そもそも俺と向日に、接点なんてないのだ。
Translation: Prior to yesterday, Mukou and I had never even spoken to each other.

Name: a1122.nss
Japanese: 自分を落ち着かせるように、ゲームを再開する。
Translation: Willing myself to keep a level head, I resume the game.

Name: a1122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 『まつの』
Translation: "Wait!"

Name: a1122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 『なんの真似だ？』
Translation: "The heck are you doing?"

Name: a1122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 『おやねこなの』
Translation: "I'm the mommy cat."

Name: a1122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 『俺の知ってる猫は人語を解さない』
Translation: "Nice try. Cats don't talk. They meow."

Name: a1122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a1122.nss
Japanese: アオイは、少し困ったように俯いてから――
Translation: Aoi frowns down at herself for a moment.
KR: 아오이는 조금 곤란한 듯 고개를 숙이더니...

Name: a1122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 『おやねこにゃの』
Translation: "Meow! I'm the mommy cat."

Name: a1122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「語尾を変えただけ……？」
Translation: "That's not what I meant..."

Name: a1122.nss
Japanese: どこかで見たことがあるような光景。
Translation: The scene strikes me as familiar.

Name: a1122.nss
Japanese: いかにも現実の向日が言い出しそうな台詞。
Translation: It definitely seems like the sort of thing the real-world Mukou would say, at least.
KR: 정말이지, 현실의 무코우가 할 법한 대사.

Name: a1122.nss
Japanese: しかし、彼女は電波なゲーム脳だ。
Translation: And knowing her penchant for oddball antics, I can't be sure she wouldn't do something like this IRL.

Name: a1122.nss
Japanese: これから未来、リアルにああいうことをやり出さないとも限らない。
KR: 미래에 정말로 이런 짓을 하지 않는다고 단정할 순 없다.

Name: a1122.nss
Japanese: リアルに、か……

Name: a1122.nss
Japanese: 俺は現実世界の向日をチラ見する。
Translation: I shoot a furtive glance at the "IRL" Mukou.
KR: 나는 현실 세계의 무코우를 슬쩍 쳐다봤다.

Name: a1122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "...Boop boop..."

Name: a1122.nss
Japanese: また、あのポーズだ。
Translation: There's her trademark pose again.

Name: a1122.nss
Japanese: 向日はノートも取らず、黒板に興味も向けず、ただ手のひらを宙に掲げ、虚空を見つめていた。
Translation: She's not taking any notes. In fact, she doesn't seem to care about the lesson at all. Instead, she just sits there, hand in the air, staring into empty space.
KR: 무코우는 필기도 하지 않고 칠판에는 관심 없는 듯, 그저 손바닥을 위로 든 채 허공을 응시하고 있었다.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 視界が、真っ白な光に包まれる。
Translation: Even in autumn, the afternoon sun is as harsh as ever.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 秋の太陽はまだ目映い。
Translation: My vision is engulfed in a white haze.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 何度も目を瞬かせ、ようやく視界に結ばれた像は――
Translation: Eventually, after blinking a few times, my sight finally registers a lone figure—
KR: 몇 번이고 눈을 깜빡여 겨우 시야에 맺힌 상은...

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一？」
Translation: "Shinichi?"

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: バットを手にした、曽根美雪だった。
Translation: Standing there is none other than Sone Miyuki herself, baseball bat in hand.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "No way..."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前が呼び出したのか？」
Translation: "YOU'RE the one who invited me up here?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私の字を忘れたの？」
Translation: "No, genius. Did you forget what my handwriting looks like?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……あ、そっか」
Translation: "Oh, right..."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 美雪は無論書道も達人の腕前だ。
Translation: On top of everything else, she's a master of calligraphy, too.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 手紙を書けば差出人がなくとも一発で判別できる。
Translation: As such, her handwriting is extremely distinctive.
KR: 미유키가 편지를 쓰면, 발신인이 없어도 단번에 알아차릴 수 있다.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: ――って、待て。
Translation: ...Wait...

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんで、俺が手紙をもらったの知ってるんだ？」
Translation: "Then... how'd you know it was a written invitation?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私ももらったから」
Translation: "Because I got one, too."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 美雪が突き出したのは１枚の手紙。
Translation: She holds up a sheet of paper.
KR: 미유키가 꺼낸 것은 한 장의 편지.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 俺の靴箱に入っていたのと同じ便箋だ。
Translation: I can tell it's the exact same stationery as mine.
KR: 내 신발장에 들어있던 것과 같은 편지지다.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「つまり？」
Translation: "Then that means..."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「手紙を書いた人間が、何かを企んでるんでしょうね」
Translation: "Can't imagine what she hopes to achieve by doing this."
KR: "편지를 쓴 사람이 뭔가 꾸미고 있다는 거지."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なにを？」
Translation: "She who?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「さあ。とりあえず、待ってみる？」
Translation: "She who, indeed... Let's just wait and find out."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……そうだな」
Translation: "...Okay then."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 俺たちは並んで、ぼんやりと街を眺める。
Translation: We stand there in silence, side by side, gazing out at the city.
KR: 우리는 나란히 서서 멍하니 마을을 바라보았다.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 秋の空は怖いくらいに広く、青い。
Translation: The clear autumn sky seems to stretch on endlessly.
KR: 가을 하늘은 무서울 정도로 넓고 파랗다.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 昨日の事、切り出さなきゃな、と思うんだけど。
Translation: I feel like we need to talk about what happened yesterday.
KR: 어제 일에 대해 말해야 할 것 같은 기분인데...

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 切り出すには、距離がちょっと遠い。
Translation: But at the same time, it feels too... personal, somehow.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 昔はこうじゃなかった。
Translation: It never used to be like this.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: むしろ俺は、彼女をからかう側で。
Translation: In the past, we had more of a playful relationship.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: ふたりはもっと自然に、会話を交わせてた。
Translation: We had no trouble teasing or joking with each other.
KR: 우리는 좀 더 자연스럽게 대화를 나눴다.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: ……あの頃に戻れるとは、思えないけれど。
Translation: ...But we can't go back to the way we were.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: グラウンドから、ボールの音が遠く響いた。
Translation: In the distance, I hear the crack of a baseball bat.
KR: 운동장에서 공을 치는 소리가 멀리 울려 퍼졌다.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そういやさ、なんでバット？」
Translation: "That reminds me... Why'd you bring the bat?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「素振りするから」
Translation: "To practice my swing."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「演劇の練習。ソフトボールが題材なの」
Translation: "It's for my next performance. The play is about softball."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そっか」
Translation: "Interesting."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: そういえば昨日も、美雪はバットを持ってきていた。
Translation: Come to think of it, she was carrying one yesterday, too.
KR: 그러고 보니 어제도 미유키는 방망이를 갖고 있었다.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「熱心なんだな」
Translation: "You're really dedicated, huh?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「２年で主役を務めるから、先輩のプレッシャーがね」
Translation: "Well, as a second-year, I did kind of steal the lead role from the older students, so now I need to earn it."
KR: "2학년이 주역을 맡으니까 선배들 압박이 좀 있거든."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……すごいな」
Translation: "I'm impressed."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 俺は、目蓋を閉じる。
Translation: I close my eyes.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 美雪とは良く一緒にバッティングセンターに行った。
Translation: In the past, we'd often go play at the local indoor batting cage.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 長髪の彼女の、美しいスイング――
Translation: I remember her long hair fluttering with the motion...

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 完璧な――完璧な――
Translation: The motion of her perfect, beautiful swing—

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「嘘だろ」
Translation: "You're lying, aren't you?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「何が？」
Translation: "About what?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「素振り。おまえに練習は必要ない」
Translation: "Needing to practice. You're already a pro."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「買いかぶりだわ」
Translation: "I think you overestimate me."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どうかな」
Translation: "Doubt it."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「昨日だって、バット持ってきただろ」
Translation: "You had that bat with you yesterday too, didn't you?"

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: ラブレターの呼び出しに、なんの意図もなくバットを持ってくるほど、無粋ではない。
Translation: There's no way she'd bring a baseball bat to a romantic rendezvous "just because." She has more tact than that.
KR: 러브레터를 보고도 '그냥' 방망이를 들고 올 만큼 센스 없진 않다.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: そういえば、美雪は以前告白して襲いかかってきた男子生徒を、バットで殴りつけたとか。
Translation: Actually, now that I think about it, I remember hearing that she'd used a bat to defend herself from a particularly aggressive admirer...
KR: 그러고 보니 미유키는 예전에 고백하고 덮친 남학생을 방망이로 후려갈겼다든가.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 正当防衛で美雪は罪を問われなかったが、相手は一生車椅子生活を送る羽目になりそうだとか。
Translation: Supposedly the guy came close to spending the rest of his life in a wheelchair.
KR: 미유키는 정당방위로 죄를 추궁받지 않았지만, 상대는 평생 휠체어를 타고 다닐 처지가 됐다든가.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 根も葉もない噂だと思っていたのだが、火のないところに煙は立たないとも言うわけで。
Translation: At the time, I'd thought it was just another overblown rumor, but... where there's smoke, there's fire, or so they say.
KR: 근거 없는 소문이라 생각했는데, '아니 땐 굴뚝에 연기 날까'라는 말도 있고...

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「護身用か？」
Translation: "Is it for self-defense?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「まあ、そういう側面もあるけど」
Translation: "I mean, partially, yeah..."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「過剰防衛には気をつけろよ」
Translation: "Alright, well, try not to kill anyone with that thing."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...Shut up!"

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: ぽつりと、拗ねた唇から言葉が漏れた。
Translation: Miyuki pouts.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: クラスの前では絶対に出さない、本当の彼女の表情。
Translation: She'd never let this side of herself show in front of our classmates, but this is the real her.
KR: 다른 애들 앞에서는 절대 꺼내지 않는 미유키의 진짜 표정.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私だって怖いのよ」
Translation: "I'm only human. I get scared sometimes."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 相手は男、美雪は女。
Translation: I don't blame her for keeping her guard up around random guys.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 屋上のカギを締められたら、逃げ場はない。
Translation: The rooftop door is the only exit.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: クラスでの虚像が、一瞬でかき消える。
Translation: If it got locked, she'd be trapped—and just like that, her perfect reputation would be destroyed overnight.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 美雪の横顔には、幼い日の影が確かにあった。
Translation: Looking at her face, I can still see traces of the girl I used to know.
KR: 미유키의 옆모습에는 어린 날의 그림자가 분명히 있었다.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……ゴメン」
Translation: "...Sorry."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「相変わらずね。鋭いんだか、鈍いんだか」
Translation: "You haven't changed a bit. I can't tell if you're really smart or really, really dense."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「悪い」
Translation: "My bad."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「別に諦めたわよ。とっくの昔に」
Translation: "It's fine. I gave up on you years ago."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: そう。
Translation: It's true.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 俺たちは、とっくの昔に、諦めている。
Translation: We gave up on each other a long, long time ago.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それにしても、まだかしら」
Translation: "Funny... Our mystery letter writer sure is taking her sweet time to get up here."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「確かに、遅いな」
Translation: "Gee, can't imagine why."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 皮肉交じりで迂遠なやりとり。
Translation: We exchange sarcastic quips.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 彼女の横顔に過去を見つけて、少し、気が楽になる。
Translation: I feel a bit more comfortable now that I know the old her isn't completely gone.
KR: 미유키에게서 예전 모습이 보여 마음이 약간 편해졌다.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: ほんのわずか、彼女に話す勇気が湧く。
Translation: That makes it easier to work up the courage to talk to her.
KR: 아주 조금, 말을 꺼낼 용기가 솟았다.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あのさ、昨日の話なんだけど」
Translation: "Listen... About yesterday..."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「昨日の……」
Translation: "Yesterday?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ああ、うん、アレね！　えっと――！」
Translation: "Oh, right! That! Umm..."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺を助けるための、芝居だったんだろ？」
Translation: "That was all an act, right? To help get me out of that jam?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうなのよ！　心一、嫌がってたでしょう？」
Translation: "Of course! You looked like you were really freaked out."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「俺もびっくりしてさ。
　ほとんど話したこともないのに、迫られちゃって」
Translation:
"Yeah, it totally threw me for a loop.
I mean, I barely even know her."
KR:
"나도 깜짝 놀랐어.
거의 얘기 해본 적도 없는데, 강요당해서."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪が来てくれて助かった」
Translation: "Thank you for showing up when you did. Seriously."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ううん。私が何をしたわけでもないし」
Translation: "No need to thank me. I hardly did a thing."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 美雪は教室では絶対に見せない表情で、俯く。
Translation: She stares at the ground, letting her guard down in a way that would be unthinkable in front of anyone else.
KR: 미유키는 교실에선 절대로 보여주지 않는 표정을 한 채 고개를 숙였다.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: ひとつ、呼吸を置いて。
Translation: I pause for a moment.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 彼女の気持ちが落ち着いてから、念押しする。
Translation: Then, once she's calm, I ask her again.
KR: 미유키도 진정하고 나서, 나는 재차 확인했다.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「告白は、演技だった」
Translation: "That love confession... It was all just an act."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「――で、いいんだよな？」
Translation: "...Right?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うん」
Translation: "Right."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「間違いだから、忘れて」
Translation: "It wasn't real. Just forget it."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、忘れる」
Translation: "Alright, I will."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 暗黙の了解が、結ばれる。
Translation: There's an unspoken agreement between us.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 俺たちはただの幼馴染み。
Translation: The two of us are old friends and nothing more.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 彼女との距離を保つ。
Translation: I have to maintain my distance from her.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: それは、とても大切なこと。
Translation: That much is crucial.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でも……向日さんって、変」
Translation: "Anyway... That Mukou-san sure is something else."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 気を取り直したように、美雪は言った。
Translation: I notice she's steering the conversation back into safe territory.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「電波っていう噂、本当だわ」
Translation: "I guess the rumors are true. She's nuttier than a fruitcake."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ゲーム脳だな」
Translation: "And with a bad case of gamer brain."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「何、それ？」
Translation: "The heck is gamer brain?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ゲームと現実を混同してる、ってこと」
Translation: "It's when you start to confuse video games with reality."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...I hate that."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 美雪の語気が、急に鋭くなった。
Translation: Her tone sharpens suddenly.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だからいつも、あんな態度なの？」
Translation: "Is that why she always behaves the way she does?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「いつも他人事っていうか。
　心ここにあらずっていうか」
Translation:
"She doesn't seem to care about anything.
Or at least, she never seems to pay much attention."
KR:
"항상 남의 일 대하듯 한달까.
마음이 여기에 있지 않은 것 같달까."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……見ていて、イライラするのよね」
Translation: "Honestly, it infuriates me."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 美雪は常に全力投球だ。
Translation: Miyuki's the type to always put 100% into everything she does.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 普段から気が抜けて、なにを考えているかよくわからない向日とは、ソリが合わないのかもしれない。
Translation: So it makes sense that she wouldn't get along well with someone as absent-minded as Mukou.
KR: 평소에 기운도 없고 무슨 생각을 하는지 알기 힘든 무코우와 성격이 안 맞는 걸지도 모른다.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ま、そう言うなって」
Translation: "C'mon, don't be so hard on her."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「現実とゲームの区別がつかないって、アイツにとっても可哀想なこと――」
Translation: "Having a poor grip on reality can't exactly be easy for her either, y'know—"
KR: "게임과 현실을 구분하지 못한다니, 그 녀석도 불쌍한..."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ちがうの」
Translation: "That's not true."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「この声は――」
Translation: "Who's there?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「向日？」
Translation: "Mukou?"

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 昨日と同じく、彼女は屋上の屋根に立っていた。
Translation: Just like yesterday, she's standing up on the roof of the stairs.
KR: 어제와 마찬가지로, 무코우는 옥상 꼭대기에 서 있었다.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いたのか」
Translation: "Have you been here the whole time?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、ゲンジツとキョコウ、くべつついてるの」
Translation: "Aoi can tell the difference between reality and fiction."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このセカイは、ゲーム」
Translation: "This world is a game."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、こうりゃくヒロイン」
Translation: "Aoi is a romance option."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「またその話……」
Translation: "Not this nonsense again..."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「証拠を見せてもらいたいわね」
Translation: "Let's see your proof, then."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ショウコ？」
Translation: "Proof?"

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 向日は一度、不思議そうに首を傾げ――
Translation: Mukou tilts her head, puzzled.
KR: 무코우는 이상한 듯 고개를 한 번 갸웃거렸다.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる」
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: スカートに手を突っ込んで下着を下ろし始めた。
Translation: Then she puts her hands under her skirt and starts to pull down her panties.
KR: 갑자기 치마 속으로 손을 넣더니 속옷을 벗기 시작했다.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちょっと！　何してるのよ！」
Translation: "Stop right there! What on earth do you think you're doing?!"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ぬぐと、モザイクかかるの」
Translation: "Aoi will get naked and you'll see the mosaic censor."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: かかるわけあるか。
Translation: Yeah, uh, I sincerely doubt that...

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「やめなさいよ！　恥ずかしくないの？」
Translation: "Don't you DARE! Have you no shame?!"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どうしてなの？」
Translation: "What's shameful about it?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どうしてって……」
Translation: "You seriously don't know?"

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: そこまで常識のないヤツだったのか……？
Translation: Surely she's got to have at least SOME common sense, right?

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「とにかく、脱ぐのはやめて！」
Translation: "Whatever! Just keep your clothes on, for god's sake!"

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 向日はしばし、黙って何かを考え込んでいたが。
Translation: Mukou falls silent, as if lost in thought.
KR: 무코우는 잠시 입을 다물고 무언가 골똘히 생각하더니...

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「わかったの」
Translation: "Okay."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「べつのしょうこなの」
Translation: "Different proof, then."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 向日はポケットから、スマートフォンを取り出す。
Translation: She takes her cell phone out of her pocket.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カミサマ」
Translation: "God."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そうなの。ギャルゲーのカミサマなの」
Translation: "Yes. The god of visual novels."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このセカイは、ゲームなの。プログラムなの」
Translation: "This world is a video game... a program."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから、アップデートできるの」
Translation: "And programs can be patched."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どういう意味だ？」
Translation: "What's that supposed to mean?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セカイをかえるの」
Translation: "The world will change."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だったら、奇跡のひとつでも見せてもらいたいわね」
Translation: "Oh yeah? Show us a miracle then, would you?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい」
Translation: "Got it."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: あっけらかんと頷くと、向日は手を挙げた。
Translation: Mukou nods absently and raises her phone into the air.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 握られたスマートフォンの画面に映る名前はきっと――
Translation: I have a feeling I know who she's calling.
KR: 손에 쥔 스마트폰 화면에 보이는 이름은 분명...

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「向日さん、何してるの？」
Translation: "Mukou-san? What are you doing?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「多分、神様に発信してる」
Translation: "I think she's calling God."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「神様って電話番号あるの？」
Translation: "Since when does God have a phone number?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ないだろ」
Translation: "Since never, as far as I know."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ないわよね」
Translation: "Yeah, didn't think so."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
