Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 相変わらず通話が繋がる気配はない。
Translation: As usual, "God" shows no signs of picking up.
KR: 통화가 연결될 기미는 여전히 보이지 않는다.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: だが、向日は構わず発信を続けている。
Translation: Nevertheless, Mukou keeps calling.
KR: 그렇지만, 무코우는 상관하지 않고 계속 전화를 건다.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だんだんシンドクなってきたわ……」
Translation: "At this point it just hurts to watch..."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いつまでやるの？」
Translation: "Are you done yet?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「繋がるまでだろ」
Translation: "Not until He answers, probably."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: なんとなく、向日ならやりそうな気がした。
Translation: Knowing Mukou, it seems like the obvious conclusion.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 昨日もあの発信のやり過ぎて倒れたんじゃ……
Translation: That would explain why she suddenly collapsed yesterday...
KR: 어제도 전화 걸다 지쳐 쓰러진 게 아닐까...

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……彼女、家族と仲が悪いんだっけ」
Translation: "...I heard she has a complicated family situation."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうなのか？」
Translation: "She does?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「家に帰らないで、外で泊まり歩いてるとか」
Translation: "Supposedly she never goes home. Sleeps in a different bed every night."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「誰の所に泊まってるのかは知らないけど」
Translation: "Whose beds, though, I'm not sure."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 男癖が悪い――そんな雄太郎の言葉が頭を掠める。
Translation: In the back of my mind, I remember what Yuutarou told me earlier... The rumors of her sleeping around.
KR: 남자 버릇이 나쁘다... 그런 유우타로의 말이 머리를 스쳤다.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるる――」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop—"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あのさ、向日？」
Translation: "Hey, Mukou?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる？」
Translation: "Boop boop?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「圏外なんじゃないかな？」
Translation: "Maybe your phone doesn't get service up here?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ほら、神様にだって色々都合があるだろうし」
Translation: "Or, I dunno... maybe God's a little busy right now."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「……るる？　そうなの？」
Translation: "...Boop boop? You think so?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、でんちがたりないきが――」
Translation: "Maybe Aoi doesn't have enough battery pow—"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いいから、降りてきなさいよ」
Translation: "Just get down from there, would you?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「何か用事があるんでしょう」
Translation: "You wanted to talk to us, right?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「せーの――」
Translation: "Three, two, one..."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょ！　ジャンプはダメ！」
Translation: "Hey! Do NOT jump from there!"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "...Boop boop?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どうしてなの？」
Translation: "Why not?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どうしてって……ハァ」
Translation: "Oh my god... Haah..."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: この高さからの飛び降りは危ない。
Translation: Because it's not SAFE, genius.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: ホントに彼女、今までどうやって生活してきたんだ？
Translation: How has she survived this long not knowing these things?
KR: 저 녀석은 정말 어떤 삶을 살아온 걸까?

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いいからハシゴからおりなさい」
Translation: "Just use the ladder, please."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい」
Translation: "Got it."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: とととと――と、危なっかしい足取りで、向日はハシゴを下りてくる。
Translation: She proceeds to climb down a little more recklessly than I would have liked.
KR: 타다닷하며 위태로운 걸음으로 무코우는 사다리를 내려왔다.

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 俺たち３人は、やっと正面から向かい合うことが出来た。
Translation: Finally, the three of us are standing on even ground.
KR: 마침내 우리 세 사람은 서로 정면을 보고 마주할 수 있게 되었다.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それで、どうして私たちを呼び出したの？」
Translation: "So, why did you ask to meet us up here?"

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: 呼び出した……？
Translation: What?

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ってことは、あの手紙――」
Translation: "Wait... Then that means..."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方の字よね」
Translation: "You wrote those letters, didn't you?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そうなの」
Translation: "Uh huh."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「先に言っておくわ。聞いてたかもしれないけど――」
Translation: "Well then. First things first, let me make this clear. As you may or may not have already heard..."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「昨日の告白は、勘違いから生じた行き違いよ」
Translation: "Everything that happened yesterday was a total misunderstanding."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私と心一は、ただの幼馴染み」
Translation: "Shinichi and I are old friends, that's all."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それ以上でもそれ以下でもない」
Translation: "Nothing more, nothing less."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「特別な恋愛感情なんてないから」
Translation: "There's nothing romantic between us."

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: うん、それでいい。
Translation: Yeah...

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: ……いいんだ。
Translation: It's for the best.

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...What is it?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「センタクシえー」
Translation: "Plan A."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ともだちさくせん」
Translation: "Friendship mission."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "What?"

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイと、ミユキと、シンイチ」
Translation: "Aoi and Miyuki and Shinichi..."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ともだち、なるの」
Translation: "We'll all be friends."

Name: a1131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だめ？」
Translation: "Okay?"

Name: a1131.nss
Japanese: "友達になる","友達にならない"
Translation: "Be friends","Don't be friends"

Name: a1132a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「友達だったら、いいんじゃないか？」
Translation: "Sure, that sounds nice."

Name: a1132a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ほんとう？」
Translation: "Really?"

Name: a1132a.nss
Japanese: きちんとした友達ができれば、向日も今のような電波発言が減るかもしれない。
Translation: Maybe if she had a couple of decent friends to hang out with, she wouldn't act out like this.
KR: 제대로 된 친구가 생기면 무코우도 지금 같은 4차원 발언이 줄어들지도 모른다.

Name: a1132a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ、ただし、俺は抜いてな」
Translation: "You'll have to count me out, though."

Name: a1132a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「男女の友情は成立しないって言うし」
Translation: "They say men and women can't be friends."

Name: a1132a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「向日と美雪なら、きっといい友達に――」
Translation: "But maybe you and Miyuki could—"

Name: a1132b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「うーん、難しいかな」
Translation: "Hmmm... I don't think it works like that."

Name: a1132b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「友達って、なろうと思ってなれるものじゃないし」
Translation: "You can't just DECIDE to be friends, you know?"

Name: a1132b.nss
Japanese: という理屈で、断っているが。
Translation: Truth be told, it's just an excuse.

Name: a1132b.nss
Japanese: 何より、美雪と一緒というのが気になった。
Translation: My real reason lies with Miyuki.
KR: 무엇보다 미유키와 함께라는 게 마음에 걸렸다.

Name: a1132b.nss
Japanese: これ以上、彼女に近づきたくない。
Translation: I don't want to be around her more than I can help it.
KR: 더 이상 미유키와 거리를 좁히고 싶지 않았다.

Name: a1132b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「約束は、できないかな」
Translation: "I can't make any promises."

Name: a1132b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そうなの？」
Translation: "You can't?"

Name: a1132b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキは？」
Translation: "What about Miyuki?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「気が進まないわ」
Translation: "I refuse."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私、根本的に貴方と性格が合わない気がする」
Translation: "I feel that you and I are fundamentally incompatible."
KR: "나, 근본적으로 너랑 성격이 안 맞을 것 같아."

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 一刀両断だ。
Translation: Looks like that's a hard no.

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 確かに相性は良くなさそうだけど……
Translation: Still, she's right. I can't imagine the two of them getting along very well.

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい。センタクシＢ」
Translation: "Got it! Plan B."

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 向日は手にしたスマートフォンを、目一杯空に掲げ――
Translation: Mukou holds her cell phone in the air.
KR: 무코우는 손에 쥔 스마트폰을 힘껏 하늘로 들어 올렸다.

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What the...?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今、何を、したのかしら？」
Translation: "What exactly did you just do?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シャシンさくせんなの」
Translation: "Photo mission."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「クラスにばらまくの」
Translation: "I'll send this to the whole class."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「――脅迫するのか？」
Translation: "...Are you blackmailing us?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる？」
Translation: "Boop boop?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だめ？」
Translation: "Is that bad?"

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 全く悪びれない顔で、聞き返す向日。
Translation: The look on her face is perfectly innocent.
KR: 무엇이 문제인지 모르겠다는 얼굴로 되묻는 무코우.

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、美雪。なんとか言って――」
Translation: "Come on, Miyuki, explain to her—"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ご自由に」
Translation: "Knock yourself out, Mukou-san."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...Are you serious?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私が心一とここにいたのは事実だもの」
Translation: "I mean, it's true Shinichi and I were up here together."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あらぬ誤解は受けるでしょうけど、そのくらい、簡単に解いてみせるわ」
Translation: "Maybe it'll give some people the wrong idea, but I can clear it up for them, no problem."
KR: "이상한 오해는 받겠지만, 그 정도야 간단히 해결할 수 있어."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私は、貴方みたいな人間の仲間として見られる方が、ずっと恥ずかしい」
Translation: "If anything, being friends with someone like YOU would be way more embarrassing."
KR: "나는 너 같은 인간의 친구로 보이는 게 훨씬 부끄러워."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でも、ふたつだけ言わせてもらえる？」
Translation: "You know what? Let me say two things."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ひとつめ」

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「賭けてもいいわ。
　今の貴方には一生、友達なんてできっこない」
Translation: "You're free to try all you like, but unless you make some serious changes, you'll never stand a chance at making any friends."
KR:
"내기해도 좋아.
지금 너에겐 평생 친구 같은 건 생기지 않아."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふたつめ」

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私を呼び捨てにしないで」
Translation: "Don't call me Miyuki."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「以上！」
Translation: "That's final."

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 毅然とした態度で、階段へと戻っていく美雪。
Translation: With that, Miyuki strides off to the door and down the stairs.

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 自分が怒鳴られたわけでもないのに、思わず俺の背筋が伸びる――
Translation: Meanwhile, I feel myself unclench. I know she wasn't shouting at me, but still.
KR: 자신이 혼난 것도 아닌데 나도 모르게 긴장하고 말았다.

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「かっこいいの」
Translation: "She's so cool."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前、マイペースだな」
Translation: "You, uh... really march to the beat of your own drum, huh?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる？」
Translation: "Boop boop?"

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 俺の問いかけに、向日は不思議そうな顔をする。
Translation: Mukou tilts her head.

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: その仕草もまた、普段通りだ。
Translation: She looks confused—a regular occurrence for her.

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「バイバイ」
Translation: "Bye-bye."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どこに行く？」
Translation: "Where are you going?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きょうしつ」
Translation: "The classroom."

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 写真をばらまきに行くのか……
Translation: Is she seriously intent on showing everyone that photo...?

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪、怒るぞ」
Translation: "Miyuki's gonna get mad, you know."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どうしてなの？」
Translation: "Why?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「キョカ、あるの」
Translation: "She gave permission."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Haah..."

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: やっぱり、わかってない。
Translation: She seriously has no clue, does she?

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「大体、なんで俺と美雪をくっつけようとするんだよ？」
Translation: "Why are you trying to get me and Miyuki together in the first place?"
KR: "애초에, 왜 나랑 미유키를 이어주려고 하는 거야?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シュジンコウ、メインヒロインと、むすばれるの」
Translation: "The protagonist needs to end up with the main heroine."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「むすばれないのは、へんなの」
Translation: "Wouldn't make sense otherwise."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アップデートするの」
Translation: "So Aoi will request an update patch."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「またゲームの話か……」
Translation: "There you go with your dating sim nonsense again..."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それじゃ――」
Translation: "I'm gonna go now—"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「待てって！」
Translation: "Hold it!"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?"

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 向日の表情が、ほんのわずか変化する。
Translation: Mukou's expression changes slightly, almost imperceptibly.

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: そして俺もまた、大声を上げてまで彼女を呼び止めた自分に驚いていた。
Translation: Meanwhile, I'm a little shocked that I yelled after her just now.
KR: 그리고 나도, 그렇게까지 큰 소리 내면서 멈춰 세운 자기 자신에게 놀랐다.

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: もちろん、写真をばらまかれては困る。
Translation: Obviously I don't want her to show that photo to anyone.

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 俺はせっかく、クラスの平々凡々なモブとして、学生生活を謳歌しているのだ。
Translation: Not when I'm finally starting to enjoy my life as the class wallflower.
KR: 나는 모처럼 학교의 지극히 평범한 학생으로서 학창시절을 영위하고 있다.

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: スポットライトの下で注目を浴び続ける美雪に、身の程もわきまえず告白したなんて噂が流れたとしたら――
Translation: If rumors start to spread that a pathetic nobody like me tried to confess my love to queen bee Miyuki...
KR: 항상 스포트라이트 아래서 주목받고 있는 미유키에게, 분수도 모르고 고백했다는 소문이라도 퍼지면...

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 想像するだに恐ろしい。
Translation: The mere thought has me on edge already.

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: そんな展開が嫌で、向日を呼び止めた。
Translation: That must be why I yelled after Mukou—to stop that from happening.
KR: 그런 전개가 싫어서 무코우를 멈춰 세웠다.

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: ――それだけのはずだ。
Translation: ...Right?

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「さっき、誘っただろ？」
Translation: "Look... Didn't you JUST ask her to be your friend?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前は、美雪と、友達になりたいんじゃないのか？」
Translation: "Isn't that what you want?"
KR: "너, 미유키랑 친구 되고 싶은 거 아니야?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ともだち……？」
Translation: "Friend...?"

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 俺の問いかけに、彼女は、初めてその単語を聞いたように首を傾げて――
Translation: She tilts her head again, as if to consider the merits of the word.
KR: 내 말에 무코우는 처음으로 그 단어를 들었다는 듯이 고개를 갸웃거리고...

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、ほんとはともだち、よくわからないの」
Translation: "Aoi doesn't really understand... friends."

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: ――向日のスマフォには、アドレスが１件。
Translation: I think back to her address book with its single entry.

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「よし、わかった！」
Translation: "Alright, tell you what."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 俺はポケットから自分の携帯を取り出す。
Translation: I take my phone out of my pocket.

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「携帯アドレス教えるから、向日のも教えてくれ」
Translation: "Let's trade email addresses."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「友達づくりの、第一歩。な？」
Translation: "It's the first step to making friends. Cool?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アドレス……こうかん？」
Translation: "Trade... email addresses...?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ほら、準備して――」
Translation: "You ready?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どうやるの？」
Translation: "How do you do it?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……えっと、だな」
Translation: "...Oh, right."

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 案の定、連絡先を交換したことがないらしい。
Translation: Obviously she's never done this before.
KR: 아니나 다를까, 연락처를 교환한 적이 없는 것 같다.

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「多分、ここら辺に……」
Translation: "First you open this menu..."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「これでオッケー。じゃ、メールを俺に――」
Translation: "Okay, now to send me an email."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あれ？」
Translation: "...What the?"

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 向日のスマフォから、メールを送信しようとするのだが、届かない。
Translation: I try to send myself an email using her phone, but it won't send.
KR: 무코우의 스마트폰으로 문자를 보냈는데 오질 않는다.

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「圏外？　おかしいな。
　俺には電波届いてるんだけど……」
Translation:
"Do you not have service up here? That's so weird...
My phone's getting full bars..."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「コウカン、できないの？」
Translation: "Does this mean... we can't trade?"

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: いつもなにを考えているかわからない向日の表情が、突然寂しそうに見えて、俺はすぐに微笑み返す。
Translation: For some reason, I sense sadness in her blank expression. Thinking quickly, I shoot her a reassuring smile.
KR: 언제나 무슨 생각을 하는지 알 수 없는 무코우의 표정이 갑자기 쓸쓸해 보여 나는 미소를 띄웠다.

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「大丈夫。手動で登録してやれば――ほら！」
Translation: "Don't worry. We can just do it manually. Here."

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 自分の携帯に直接、向日の電話番号とメアドを登録。
Translation: I enter her phone number and email address into my contacts list.
KR: 내 핸드폰에 직접 무코우의 전화번호와 메일 주소를 등록.

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 一応、向日自身にも確認してもらう。
Translation: Then I show it to her, just in case.

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「これでいいな？」
Translation: "Is this correct?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「まちがいないの」
Translation: "Uh huh."

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 向日はしばらく、携帯と自分のスマフォを見比べたまま、黙り込んでいる。
Translation: A moment of silence passes as she stares back and forth between our phones.
KR: 무코우는 잠시 두 핸드폰을 비교하며 입을 다물고 있었다.

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……どうした？」
Translation: "...What's wrong?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 向日がピンと手を挙げる。
Translation: She raises her hand.

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「これで、ともだちなの？」
Translation: "Does this make us friends?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ。そうだな」
Translation: "Yeah, I'd say so."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「連絡先を交換したら、友達だ」
Translation: "Once you're in each other's phones, you're pretty much friends."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチと、アオイ、ともだち？」
Translation: "Shinichi... and Aoi... are friends?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ。俺と向日は、友達」
Translation: "Yep. You and I are officially friends now."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ともだち……」
Translation: "Friends..."

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 向日は不思議そうな表情で、登録の増えたアドレス帳を、じっと見つめていた。
Translation: Mukou stares, puzzled, at the new addition to her address book.
KR: 무코우는 신기한듯한 표정으로 늘어난 주소록을 계속 바라보고 있었다.

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: ずっと、ずっと。
Translation: A long moment passes.

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: まるで時が止まってしまったかのように。
Translation: It starts to feel like time has stopped around us.

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そろそろ午後の授業――」
Translation: "We should probably head to class..."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……向日、聞いてるか？」
Translation: "...Uhh, earth to Mukou? You listening?"

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい！」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: ピン、と向日は天高く手を挙げる。
Translation: Once again, her hand shoots straight up into the air.
KR: 무코우는 팟하며 하늘 높이 손을 들었다.

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ともだちなら、アオイは、アオイってよぶの」
Translation: "Now that we're friends, you should call me Aoi."

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: いきなり名前を……？
Translation: Whoa, whoa... I'm not sure about that...

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: さすがにそれはどうかとも思うけど……
Translation: It feels a little too personal, too soon...
KR: 아무리 그래도 너무 빠르지 않을까 싶지만...

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だめなの？」
Translation: "Is that bad?"

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: そんな表情で訴えられると、断ることができなかった。
Translation: Gah... I can't say no to that face...
KR: 저 표정을 보고서 거절할 수 있는 사람은 없을 거다.

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「わかったよ」
Translation: "Alright."

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 照れ隠しにひとつ、咳払いをして。
Translation: Feeling a little awkward, I clear my throat.

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ、行こう」
Translation: "Let's go, Aoi."

Name: a1133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「わかったの、シンイチ」
Translation: "Sure thing, Shinichi."

Name: a1133.nss
Japanese: 結局その日、アオイがその写真を広めることはなかった。
Translation: In the end, Aoi didn't show the photo to anyone that day.
KR: 결국, 그날 아오이가 사진을 뿌리는 일은 없었다.

Name: a1141.nss
Japanese: ベッドの上で、携帯電話を眺める。
Translation: Lying in bed, I stare at my phone.

Name: a1141.nss
Japanese: 友達がいない、アオイ。
Translation: Lonely little Aoi with nary a friend to her name...

Name: a1141.nss
Japanese: 彼女はそもそも、友達が何かさえわかっていない。
Translation: She doesn't even know what friends are.

Name: a1141.nss
Japanese: こうなったのも、何かの縁だ。
Translation: Maybe this is fate.

Name: a1141.nss
Japanese: せめて彼女が朝、クラスの友人と会話を交わせるくらいにはしてやりたい。
Translation: I'd at least like her to have someone she can chat with at school in the morning...
KR: 적어도 아오이가 아침에 반 친구들과 대화할 수 있을 정도는 만들어 주고 싶다.

Name: a1141.nss
Japanese: お節介と言われるかもしれないが、俺はそういう性格だ。
Translation: Admittedly, maybe I should just mind my own business, but I can't help myself.
KR: 쓸데없는 참견이라고 할지도 모르지만, 나는 애초에 그런 성격이다.

Name: a1141.nss
Japanese: そういえば、あの時送信に失敗したメールは、まだ俺の所に届いていない。
Translation: Come to think of it, I still haven't received that email I tried to send myself from her phone.
KR: 그러고 보니, 그때 보낸 메일은 아직도 도착하지 않았다.

Name: a1141.nss
Japanese: あの後、俺からも何通かメールを送っているのだが……
Translation: And I sent a few her way after school, but no dice...
KR: 그 뒤로 나도 몇 번인가 메일을 보냈는데...

Name: a1141.nss
Japanese: 俺は試しに、通話キーに指を滑らせた。
Translation: As an experiment, I press the Call button.
KR: 나는 시험 삼아 통화 버튼에 손가락을 갖다 댔다.

Name: a1141.nss
Japanese: ……繋がらない。
Translation: ...She's not picking up.

Name: a1141.nss
Japanese: やっぱり圏外なのだろうか？
Translation: Does her phone really not get any service at all?

Name: a1141.nss
Japanese: 屋上の屋根に立つアオイの姿が、目蓋に浮かぶ。
Translation: I can picture her standing up there on the roof over the stairs...
KR: 옥상 꼭대기에 서 있는 아오이의 모습이 눈에 선하다.

Name: a1141.nss
Japanese: デンパ少女の携帯が圏外なんて、笑えない冗談だった。
Translation: It's painfully ironic that the self-styled "transceiver girl" is the only one not picking up any signal.
KR: 전파녀의 핸드폰이 권외라니, 웃기지도 않은 농담이었다.

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: いつもの教室。
Translation: The same old classroom...

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: いつもの喧噪。
Translation: The same old chatter...

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: その中で、アオイは――
Translation: And there sits Aoi...

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: 相変わらず、座席でボーッとしていた。
Translation: ...staring into space at her desk, as per usual.

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: 決して忙しそうには見えない。
Translation: She looks pretty bored.

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: となるとやっぱり、電波が届かないままなのか？
Translation: Does she STILL not have service?
KR: 그렇다는 건 아직도 전파가 닿지 않는 건가?

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: ここまで来ると、スマフォの故障が疑われるけど……
Translation: At this point, I'm starting to think maybe her phone is broken.
KR: 이쯤 되면, 스마트폰이 고장 난 게 아닐까 의심되는데...

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「心一、心一！　ちょっと――」
Translation: "Shinichi! Shinichi! Come here!"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんだよ？　俺、用事が――」
Translation: "What do you want? I'm in the middle of—"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「頼む！　大事な話なんだ！」
Translation: "I'm begging you! It's important!"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「わかったよ」
Translation: "Fine, fine."

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: 俺は渋々、自分の席へとつく。
Translation: Reluctantly, I head to my seat.

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……で、なんだ？」
Translation: "...So what is it?"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「人生相談があるんだッ！」
Translation: "I need some advice!"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前が人生に悩む？　ははっ、んなバカな――」
Translation: "Pfft! Please! What do you have to be worried about?"
KR: "네가 인생 고민을 한다고? 하핫, 그런 말도 안 되는..."

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「しッ！！　バカッ！　声が大きい！」
Translation: "Shhh! Keep your voice down, bigmouth!"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ヤバいことなのか？」
Translation: "Is it that serious?"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ああ、危険だ。人類の危機だ」
Translation: "Dude, it's critical. Lives are at stake here."

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「実は……コレなんだが」
Translation: "Okay... It's... It's this."

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎のカバンから覗くのは……シマシマの……
Translation: Yuutarou opens his bag to show me... a pair of...
KR: 유우타로의 가방 속에 있는 건... 줄무늬...

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「パンツ？」
Translation: "...Women's panties?"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「という名の――男の浪漫だ！」
Translation: "Yes, indeed—the very essence of a man's dreams!"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「浪漫物件だ！！」
Translation: "An artifact of male ambition!"

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: なんで言い直した。
Translation: Yes, I get it, thank you.

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「盗んだのか？」
Translation: "Did you steal these?"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「見損なうなッ！」
Translation: "How dare you!"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「拾ったんだ」
Translation: "I FOUND them."

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「拾ったのか」
Translation: "You... found them..."

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「拾った」
Translation: "I did."

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ウチの玄関に落ちてた」
Translation: "Right outside our front door."

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...What?"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「男の浪漫は、ウチの玄関に落ちてた……」
Translation: "I found a dream lying right outside our front door..."
KR: "남자의 낭만은 우리 집 현관에 떨어져 있었어..."

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おまえの家、４人家族だったよな」
Translation: "You said there's only four people in your family, right?"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お姉ちゃん、いたっけ？」
Translation: "I forget... Did you have an older sister?"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「いない」
Translation: "Nope."

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「妹も？」
Translation: "A younger sister, maybe?"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ＮＯＴＨＩＮＧ！」
Translation: "Nada de eso, compadre!"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「家族構成は？」
Translation: "Okay, then what DO you have?"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「父・母・俺・弟」
Translation: "A dad, a mom, a little brother, and me."

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「なあ、心一。浪漫倶楽部の同志よ！」
Translation: "Tell me, Shinichi, my brother in dreams..."

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「俺はこの浪漫をどうすればッ！？」
Translation: "What do I do with this artifact?!"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「好きにしろ」
Translation: "Whatever you want, I guess?"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「使っていいのか？　使う？　使っちゃうか？」
Translation: "Can I fap with it? Should I? Should I just go for it?"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「でも万が一かーちゃんのとっておきだったら――」
Translation: "But... on the off-chance these are my mom's..."

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ロマンハザ――――――ドッ！！」
Translation: "MY DREAMS ARE DEAD!!!"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「知るか」
Translation: "Sucks to be you."

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「おはよう」
Translation: "Good morning!"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「お、おはようございますッ！！」
Translation: "G-Good morning!!!"

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: 美雪の登場で華やぐ教室。
Translation: With Miyuki's arrival, the classroom roars to life.

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: 相変わらず曽根美雪は、クラスの中心人物だ。
Translation: She really is the star of the show...

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ああ……曽根さん、今日もお美しい……」
Translation: "Haah... Sone-san's looking lovely as ever this morning..."

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎が、うっとりとした目つきで美雪を見つめる。
Translation: Yuutarou gazes at her, enraptured.
KR: 유우타로는 넋을 잃고 미유키를 쳐다보고 있다.

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: それは毎朝目にするいつもの光景――
Translation: Here we go again. The same scene that plays out every morning.
KR: 그것은 매일 아침 보는 여느 때와 다름없는 광경...

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: の、はずだった。
Translation: Or so I thought—

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「向日さん……？」
Translation: "Mukou-san...?"

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: 席から立ち上がり左手を高々と挙げ、美雪と向かい合うアオイを除けば。
Translation: This time Aoi jumps to her feet, hand in the air, her eyes on Miyuki.
KR: 자리에서 일어나 왼손을 높이 들고 미유키와 마주 보는 무코우를 보자...

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「どうしたんだ、珍しい――」
Translation: "That's weird. What's going on with her today?"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もしかして……」
Translation: "Oh god."

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: 最悪の予感が脳裏を掠めた。
Translation: I have a really, REALLY bad feeling about this.

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: 多分あのスマフォには、まだ昨日の写真がある――
Translation: That photo's probably still on Aoi's phone—
KR: 아마 그 스마트폰에는 어제 사진이 남아 있다...

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私に用事かしら？」
Translation: "Do you need me for something?"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ごめんなさい」
Translation: "Aoi is really sorry."

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: アオイはペコリと、頭を下げた。
Translation: She hangs her head.

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きのうは、アオイがわるいの」
Translation: "Yesterday was all my fault."

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ああ……あのこと、ね」
Translation: "Oh... Right. That."

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: クラスメイトたちは、何が何だかわからないまま、ふたりの動向をじっと見つめている。
Translation: Our classmates are watching this interaction with mild puzzlement.
KR: 반 애들은 뭐가 뭔지 모른 채로 두 사람의 동향을 살피고 있다.

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: そんな皆を安心させるように、美雪は微笑んだ。
Translation: Sensing their confusion, Miyuki smiles.

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「気にしなくて良いわよ。
　結局あなたは、何もしなかったんだし」
Translation:
"Don't worry about it.
You haven't done anything wrong."
KR:
"신경 쓰지 않아도 돼.
결국, 넌 아무 짓도 안 했으니까."

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ゆるしてくれるの？」
Translation: "Will you forgive me?"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから、許す以前にあなたはなにもしてないでしょう」
Translation: "You don't need to ask forgiveness for something you haven't done, silly."
KR: "그러니까 용서고 뭐고, 너는 아무 짓도 안 했잖아?"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「なら、おねがいがあるの」
Translation: "Then... Aoi has a favor to ask."

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「お願い？」
Translation: "A favor?"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイと、ミユキ、ともだちになるの」
Translation: "Aoi wants to be friends with Miyuki."

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だめなの？」
Translation: "Can we?"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「何言ってるの？」
Translation: "Don't be silly."

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: 美雪は、完全無欠のスマイルを浮かべる。
Translation: Miyuki puts on her most dazzling smile.

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「私たち、クラスメイトでしょう？
　最初から、立派な友達よ」
Translation:
"We're in the same class, aren't we?
Then we're already the best of friends!"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ともだち……」
Translation: "Friends..."

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「話はそれだけね」
Translation: "Is that all you needed?"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あの、アドレスこうかん――」
Translation: "Umm... Can we trade email add—"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ごめんなさい。今、時間がないから」
Translation: "Sorry, I don't have time right now."

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「後でね」
Translation: "Maybe later."

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる」
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: 笑顔のまま、一方的に話を打ち切る美雪。
Translation: Miyuki quickly ends the conversation, her smile unflinching.
KR: 미소를 지은 채, 일방적으로 얘기를 끝내는 미유키.

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: 教室は何事もなかったかのように、日常の喧噪へと戻っていく。
Translation: Moments later, the classroom is back to normal.
KR: 교실은 아무 일도 없었다는 듯이 평소처럼 떠들썩해진다.

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「なんか、びっくりしたな！」
Translation: "Man, I wasn't expecting that at all!"

Name: a1151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ」
Translation: "Me either."

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: 自分の席へと戻り、再びイスに座るアオイ。
Translation: Aoi returns to her desk and takes a seat.
KR: 자기 자리로 돌아가 다시 자리에 앉는 아오이.

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: その表情はいつもと変わらないが、視線はジッと手元のスマートフォンに向けられていた。
Translation: Her expression is as blank as ever... but her eyes are carefully fixed on the phone in her hands.
KR: 표정은 평소와 같았지만, 시선은 계속 손에 쥔 스마트폰을 향하고 있었다.

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: 美雪と付き合いの長い俺は、知っている。
Translation: Thing is, I've known Miyuki for a long time.
KR: 미유키를 안 지 오래된 나는 알고 있다.

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: さっき彼女が見せた完璧な微笑みは――
Translation: That dazzling smile of hers?

Name: a1151.nss
Japanese: 演技にしか過ぎない。
Translation: It's completely fake.

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ」
Translation: "Miyuki!"

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ごはん、いっしょ――」
Translation: "Let's have lunch tog—"

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ごめんなさい、他の友達と約束があるの」
Translation: "Sorry, I already have plans with some other friends."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そうなの」

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あと、呼び捨てにしないでくれると嬉しいんだけれど」
Translation: "Also, I'd prefer if you didn't refer to me in that way."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい」
Translation: "Got it."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、スウガク、しゅくだい――」
Translation: "Miyuki! About the math homework—"

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「自分の力で解くからこそ、意味がある。
　見せたら貴方のためにならないでしょう？」
Translation:
"There's no point in doing it if you don't figure it out yourself.
Letting you see mine won't do you any favors in the long run."
KR:
"자기 힘으로 풀어야 의미가 있는 거야.
보여주면 널 위한 게 아니게 되지?"

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うん」
Translation: "Okay."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、やさしいの」
Translation: "Miyuki, you're so nice."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「優しいのは最初のうちだけよ」
Translation: "Just don't expect me to coddle you."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あと、呼び捨てにしないでくれる？」
Translation: "Also, could you please stop calling me that?"

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ごめんなさいなの」
Translation: "Sorry."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、びじゅつのペア――」
Translation: "Miyuki, do you wanna team up for the art proj—"

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「呼び捨てはやめて」
Translation: "Stop calling me that."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ごめんなさいなの」
Translation: "Sorry."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それに私、いつもの友達がいるから」
Translation: "Anyway, I have a specific friend I always team up with."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それなら、あした――」
Translation: "Then what about tomorr—"

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いつも同じよ。諦めて、別の人を探して」
Translation: "Not tomorrow, not ever. Now go ask someone else."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、いっしょ、かえるの」
Translation: "Miyuki! Let's hang out after school."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「名前」
Translation: "You're doing it again."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ごめんなさいなの」
Translation: "Sorry."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私、部活があるから、貴方と一緒は難しいわね」
Translation: "I have rehearsal today, so I don't think I'll have time."
KR: "나 동아리가 있어서 같이 있긴 힘들 것 같아."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「まつの」
Translation: "Aoi can wait."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「遅くなるわ」
Translation: "Rehearsal gets out pretty late."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも、まつの」
Translation: "Aoi can still wait."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「きっと、部活仲間と一緒に帰ることになる」
Translation: "I'm probably going to hang out with the rest of the theatre club afterwards."
KR: "분명 동아리 사람들이랑 같이 돌아가게 될 거야."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ともだち」
Translation: "We're friends."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから、まつの」
Translation: "So Aoi will wait."

Name: a1161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「――はぁ。勝手にしなさい」
Translation: "...Haah... Suit yourself, then."

Name: a1161.nss
Japanese: 美雪はバットを背負い、振り返ることもなく教室を出た。
Translation: With her baseball bat slung over her shoulder, Miyuki leaves the classroom without a second glance.
KR: 미유키는 방망이를 짊어진 채 뒤도 돌아보지 않고 교실을 나섰다.

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Aw, man, it's raining?"

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: 珍しく図書館で宿題をやっていたら、これだ。
Translation: I was busy actually doing my homework in the library for a change, so I hadn't noticed until just now.

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: 既に演劇部が使う旧体育館は真っ暗だった。
Translation: There are no lights on in the old gymnasium building where the theatre club rehearsals are held.
KR: 연극부가 사용하는 옛 체육관은 벌써 깜깜했다.

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: もう練習は、終わっているはず。
Translation: They must have all gone home for the day.

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: 冷たい秋の雨を傘で受けながら、足早に校門を通り抜けようとすると――
Translation: Beneath my trusty umbrella, I head out into the chilly autumn rain and make my way to the school gates.
KR: 차가운 가을비를 우산으로 막은 채, 재빨리 교문을 빠져나오려고 하는데...

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: 傘もささずに校門に佇む人影がひとつ、あった。
Translation: Just then, I spot a lone figure near the campus gate, no umbrella to be seen.
KR: 우산도 쓰지 않고 교문 앞에 서 있는 사람이 있었다.

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: アオイはびしょ濡れになりながら、身じろぎもしない。
Translation: Aoi stands perfectly still as the rain drenches her from head to toe.
KR: 아오이는 흠뻑 젖은 채 미동조차 없다.

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: 教室の椅子に座っていたときと同じあの瞳で、虚空を見つめている。
Translation: She stares out into empty space, just like she always does in class.
KR: 교실에 앉아 있을 때와 똑같은 눈으로 허공을 쳐다보고 있다.

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: 瞬きすらしない。
Translation: She doesn't even blink.

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、アオイ！　アオイってば！」
Translation: "Aoi! HEY! AOI!"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ？」
Translation: "Shinichi?"

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: こちらに気付いたアオイに、そっと傘をさしだす。
Translation: Aoi turns to look at me as I hold my umbrella over her head.
KR: 겨우 정신이 든 아오이에게 살짝 우산을 씌운다.

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「風邪引くぞ」
Translation: "You're gonna catch a cold out here!"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「かぜ？」
Translation: "A cold?"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だって、雨でそんなに――」
Translation: "You can't just stand out in the rain like th—"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Oh!"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ほんとう。あめ、ふってるの」
Translation: "You're right. It's raining."

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: アオイはそもそも雨に気付いていなかったらしい。
Translation: Apparently she hadn't noticed.
KR: 아오이는 비가 오는 것조차 알아차리지 못한 것 같다.

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「とにかく、風邪引かないように――」
Translation: "Anyway, we need to get you inside before—"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だいじょうぶなの」
Translation: "Don't worry."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「かぜのイベントＣＧ、ないの」
Translation: "There's no event CG for Aoi getting sick."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Uh... Right..."

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: また、ゲーム脳だ。
Translation: There's that gamer brain again.

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「とにかく傘、ほら」
Translation: "Here. Just take the umbrella."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイルートのイベントかいしゅうなの？」
Translation: "Are you trying to play Aoi's route?"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そういうのじゃないって」
Translation: "No, okay? Just take it!"

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: クラスメイトと相合い傘で帰る勇気はない。
Translation: I'm way too chickenshit to share an umbrella with a girl.
KR: 반 친구와 우산을 함께 쓸 용기는 없다.

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: 俺はカバンから、折りたたみ傘を取り出した。
Translation: Instead, I take a folding umbrella out of my bookbag.

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「こっちがあるから」
Translation: "See? I have a backup."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイのコウカンドをあげてるばあいじゃ――」
Translation: "You shouldn't waste time raising my affection points—"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから違うって」
Translation: "I said I'm not!"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「助けるのは、友達だからだろ」
Translation: "I'm helping you because you're my FRIEND."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ともだち」
Translation: "Friend..."

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: アオイは、不思議そうに反芻しながら――
Translation: Aoi ponders the word for a moment.

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: 俺の手から、傘を受け取った。
Translation: Then, finally, she takes the umbrella.

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ぬれないの」
Translation: "It's dry under here."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そりゃそうだろ」
Translation: "That's how umbrellas work, genius."

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: 今まで傘を差したことがないわけじゃあるまいし――
Translation: C'mon, it's not like you've NEVER used an umbrella bef—
KR: 지금까지 우산 써본 적이 없는 것도 아니고...

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: いや、アオイならあり得るか……？
Translation: Oh god, she totally hasn't, has she.

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる……るるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop... boop boop boop..."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あ、はい」
Translation: "Oh! Got it!"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん？　どうした？」
Translation: "Hmm? What's up?"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ええと、こういうときは――」
Translation: "In times like these, you say..."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ありがとう」
Translation: "Thank you!"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、まちがったの？」
Translation: "Did Aoi get it wrong?"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、いい。合ってる」
Translation: "No, no, you're right."

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: アオイが傘のお礼を言ったりするのが、意外で――
Translation: I wasn't expecting her to actually thank me.

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: いや、美雪にも昨日の事を謝ってたし、驚くようなことでもないか。
Translation: Then again, she apologized to Miyuki for what happened yesterday, so maybe I'm underestimating her.
KR: 아니, 미유키한테도 어제 일을 사과했으니까 놀랄 일도 아닌가.

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: 俺は気を取り直して、アオイに向き合った。
Translation: I turn back to face her.
KR: 나는 정신을 가다듬고 아오이 쪽을 바라보았다.

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いえいえ、どういたしまして」
Translation: "You're very welcome."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ、ともだちなの」
Translation: "Shinichi, if you're my friend..."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ともだち、いっしょ、かえるの」
Translation: "Then friends should walk home together."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だめ？」
Translation: "Can we?"

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: クラスメイトの女子――しかも、変人で通っているアオイと一緒に帰るなんて、普段の俺からは考えられない。
Translation: If you'd told me a week ago that I'd be walking home with a girl in my class—the infamous oddball Aoi, to be exact—I'd have laughed in your face.
KR: 같은 반 여자애, 게다가 괴짜라고 불리는 아오이와 함께 돌아간다니, 평소의 나라면 상상하기 힘든 일이다.

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: でも俺は、なぜかアオイの隣を並んで歩いていた。
Translation: And yet here I am, doing exactly that.
KR: 그런데 어째선지 아오이 옆에서 나란히 걷고 있다.

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あのさ、友達だったらメールは返せよな」
Translation: "Y'know, friends ought to reply to their emails, too. Just saying."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「メール？」
Translation: "You wrote me?"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「電話もした」
Translation: "Called you, too."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: アオイは無言で、ポケットからスマフォを取り出す。
Translation: Aoi quietly takes her phone out of her pocket.

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ケンガイなの」
Translation: "No service."

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: 隣にある俺の携帯は、３本立っているのに……
Translation: How is that possible when mine has three full bars? I'm standing right next to you!
KR: 바로 옆에 있는 내 핸드폰은 안테나가 3개인데...

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「壊れてるのか？」
Translation: "Maybe your phone's broken?"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カミサマからのデンパはとくべつなの」
Translation: "God's signal doesn't work like the others."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「デンチがたりないと、とどかないの」
Translation: "It won't pick up without enough battery."

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: 彼女にとって、普段カミサマに電話が通じないのは、そういう理屈になっているらしい。
Translation: Apparently that's her explanation for why "God" won't answer her calls.
KR: 아오이가 평소에 신님과 연락되지 않는 건 그런 논리인 것 같다.

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「故障だろ？　買い換えた方が――」
Translation: "It's gotta be broken. You should just buy a new—"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だめなの！」
Translation: "No!"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「大切ものなのか？」
Translation: "Why not? Does this one have sentimental value or something?"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そうなの」
Translation: "Yes."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カミサマとれんらくする、たったひとつのほうほう」
Translation: "This is my only way of contacting God."
KR: "신님과 연락할 수 있는 단 하나뿐인 방법..."

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: また、神様か……
Translation: There she goes about "God" again...

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あのさ。神様って友達？」
Translation: "So, who is this 'God,' anyway? A friend of yours?"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カミサマは、カミサマなの」
Translation: "God is just... God."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とってもえらいの」
Translation: "Very powerful."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイをつくったひとなの」
Translation: "God's the person who made Aoi."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん……そうなのか」
Translation: "Oh, I see."

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: アオイをつくった人って。
Translation: Hmmm...

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: 両親を神様と呼んでる、とか？
Translation: Could she be referring to one of her parents...?

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: まさか、な……
Translation: Somehow I doubt it...

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも……アドレス、こうかんしてある」
Translation: "But... we did trade email addresses."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから、トモダチ、なの？」
Translation: "Does that... make us friends?"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、そうだな」
Translation: "Yeah, I'd say so."

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: 俺はこの前、そんなことをアオイに言った。
Translation: I remember us having this same conversation the other day.
KR: 얼마 전에 연락처를 교환하면 친구가 된다는 말을 했다.

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それじゃ、ミユキは？」
Translation: "What about Miyuki?"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アドレスのトウロク、まだなの」
Translation: "We haven't traded yet."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ともだちじゃないの？」
Translation: "So we're... not friends?"

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: 雨に濡れながら、ぼんやりと虚空を見続けたアオイ。
Translation: Aoi continues to stare blankly out at nothing as the rain pours down.
KR: 비를 맞으면서 멍하니 허공을 응시하던 아오이.

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: 帰りを待っているという話は、美雪も聞いていたはず。
Translation: Miyuki knew Aoi would be waiting for her after rehearsal.
KR: 돌아오길 기다린다는 말을 미유키도 들었을 거다.

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: 美雪は偶然、アオイを見かけなかったのか？
Translation: Did they inadvertently miss each other?

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: それとも……
Translation: Or... did Miyuki...

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アドレス、コウカンしたいの」
Translation: "Aoi wants to trade with her."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキと、ともだち、なりたいの」
Translation: "Aoi wants to be friends with her."

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: 俺が美雪のアドレスを知っていたなら、彼女にそれを、教えてやることもできたかもしれない。
Translation: If only I knew Miyuki's email address... Then I could just give it to Aoi myself.
KR: 내가 미유키 번호를 알고 있었으면 대신 알려줄 수 있었을지도 모른다.

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: でも、俺が美雪と仲良かったのは、遥か昔の話。
Translation: But I haven't been that close with Miyuki in a long, long time.
KR: 하지만 내가 미유키와 사이가 좋았던 건 한참 전 이야기.

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: そんなのは虚しい想像で。
Translation: And at this point, I can never hope to be again.

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: いっそ、カミサマにでも祈るしかない……か？
Translation: All we can do now is pray. To "God," I guess.

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「家、この近くなのか？」
Translation: "Do you live around here?"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、いえ、ないの」
Translation: "Aoi doesn't live anywhere."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What?"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あそこにねとまりなの」
Translation: "Aoi sleeps in there."

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: アオイが指さしたのは、商店街の隅にある、この街唯一のマンガ喫茶だった。
Translation: She points to a building on the outskirts of the shopping district—the city's sole manga cafe.
KR: 아오이가 가리킨 곳은 상가 구석에 있는 이 마을에 유일한 만화방이었다.

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「家族と仲、悪いのか？」
Translation: "Do you not get along with your family?"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そうなの」
Translation: "Nope."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ひとりで、危ないだろ」
Translation: "It's not safe to roam the streets alone, you know."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「なれたの」
Translation: "Aoi is used to it."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「慣れたって、でも――」
Translation: "So what? That still doesn't—"

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「パソコンもゲームもあるの」
Translation: "Besides, they have computers and games in there."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おかしもたべられるの」
Translation: "And yummy snacks."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ジュース、のみほうだいなの」
Translation: "And as much soda as Aoi wants."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「よるも、あそべるの」
Translation: "And no curfew."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「てんごくなの」
Translation: "It's heaven."

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: こんな時、咄嗟になんて言えばいいのかわからない。
Translation: I'm at a total loss for words.
KR: 순간, 뭐라고 말해야 할지 알 수 없었다.

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カサ、ありがとうなの」
Translation: "Thank you for the umbrella."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「バイバイなの」
Translation: "Bye-bye."

Name: a1171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ……ああ。気をつけてな！」
Translation: "N-No problem... Take care of yourself, alright?"

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: 危なっかしい足取りで、アオイがマンガ喫茶に消える。
Translation: Aoi totters into the manga cafe and vanishes from sight.

Name: a1171.nss
Japanese: 雨音が辺りを覆うまで、俺はぼんやり、彼女のいなくなった方向を見つめている。
Translation: As for me, I stare absently after her until the patter of the rain drowns out everything around me.
KR: 빗소리가 주위를 덮을 때까지, 나는 멍하니 아오이가 없어진 방향을 바라보고 있었다.

Name: a1181.nss
Japanese: 家族と別れてひとりで暮らすマンガ喫茶での生活。
Translation: After running away from home, Aoi now lives alone in a manga cafe.
KR: 가족과 떨어져서 혼자 만화방에서 사는 생활.

Name: a1181.nss
Japanese: もしも本当に神様がいるとしても、そこが天国なわけがない。
Translation: God might be real, but there's no way that's heaven.
KR: 만약 정말로 신님이 있다고 해도 그곳이 천국일 리가 없다.

Name: a1181.nss
Japanese: 本当は、彼女にもっとふさわしい幸せがあるはずで。
Translation: There's just gotta be a happier ending out there for her.
KR: 실은, 아오이에게 더 어울리는 행복이 있을 테니까.

Name: a1181.nss
Japanese: 神様なんかよりも、もっと必要な人がいるはずで。
Translation: Surely "God" isn't the end-all, be-all.
KR: 신님 따위보다 더 필요한 사람이 있을 테니까.

Name: a1181.nss
Japanese: ……俺は、彼女に何ができるんだろう？
Translation: Is there any way I can help her?
KR: 나는 아오이에게 무엇이 되어줄 수 있지?

Name: a1191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、おはようなの」
Translation: "Morning, Miyuki."

Name: a1191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きょうは、カゼ、つよいの」
Translation: "It's another windy day today."

Name: a1191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、アオイのごはん、みる？」
Translation: "Miyuki, wanna see my lunch?"

Name: a1191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「キャンディで、したのいろ、かわるの」
Translation: "This candy makes your tongue turn funny colors."

Name: a1191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、このゲーム、やる？」
Translation: "Miyuki, wanna play this game with me?"

Name: a1191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、いっしょにそうじ――」
Translation: "Miyuki, wanna clean up togeth—"

Name: a1191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、いっしょにかえる――」
Translation: "Miyuki, wanna walk home to—"

Name: a1191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、まって――」
Translation: "Miyuki, wait—!"

Name: a1191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ――」
Translation: "Miyuki—!"

Name: a1191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ……」
Translation: "Miyuki..."

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい雄太郎、メシでも――」
Translation: "Hey Yuutarou! Let's grab some lun—"

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ぅぅぅぅぅぅぅぅ…………」
Translation: "Nnnnngggghhhhhh..."

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「食欲、ない……」
Translation: "I'm not hungry..."

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「腹でも壊したか？」
Translation: "What's up? Feeling sick?"

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ぱんつのせいだ……」
Translation: "It's the panties..."

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おまえ……食ったのか？」
Translation: "You... ate them...?"

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「食わん！」
Translation: "No!"

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「持ち主がわかったんだ」
Translation: "I found out who they belong to."

Name: a1201.nss
Japanese: なんだか聞いてはいけないような気もするが……
Translation: I'm not sure I want to know the answer, but...
KR: 왠지 들어선 안 될 것 같은 느낌이 드는데...

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「誰のだったんだ？」
Translation: "Whose were they?"

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「龍二郎のだった」
Translation: "Ryuujirou's."

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「弟くんの？」
Translation: "Your... brother's...?"

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ああ」
Translation: "Yeah."

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「自分用に、ネット通販で、買ったらしい」
Translation: "Apparently he bought them online. To wear."

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「女装が、趣味なんだと」
Translation: "He said he... likes to crossdress."

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そ……そうか」
Translation: "Well then... That's... something."

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「心一、俺……あの、しましまぱんつで……」
Translation: "Shinichi... I, uh... might have fa—"

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、いい。皆まで言うな」
Translation: "Stop. Don't... Don't finish that sentence."

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「あは、あははははは……」
Translation: "Haha... Hahahahahaha..."

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「俺……浪漫、無くしちまったよ……」
Translation: "My dreams... My dreams are dead..."

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「大丈夫だ、浪漫倶楽部部長。
　おまえならきっと、次の浪漫が見つかる」
Translation:
"It's going to be okay, Captain.
I know you'll find a new dream soon enough."
KR: "괜찮아, 낭만 클럽 부장인 너라면 분명 다음 낭만을 찾을 수 있을 거야!"

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから今は……ゆっくり休め」
Translation: "For now... just give yourself some time to grieve."

Name: a1201.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ありがとう、心一、ありがとう……！」
Translation: "Thank you, Shinichi... Thank you...!"

Name: a1201.nss
Japanese: 涙ながらに、何度も頷く雄太郎。
Translation: Yuutarou nods tearfully.
KR: 눈물을 흘리면서 몇 번이고 고개를 끄덕이는 유우타로.

Name: a1201.nss
Japanese: 俺は彼の肩をそっとたたいてやることしかできなかった。
Translation: I have no idea what to do about this. Guess I'll just give him a little pat on the shoulder.
KR: 내가 할 수 있는 건 유우타로의 어깨를 다독여 주는 것뿐이었다.

Name: a1201.nss
Japanese: 購買でパンを買い、教室へと戻りかけるが、さすがに今の雄太郎の隣では食欲が湧かない。
Translation: As I'm heading back from the cafeteria with my sandwich, I contemplate returning to the classroom, but I can't imagine either of us will enjoy sitting there in silence together.
KR: 매점에서 빵을 사서 교실로 돌아가려 했는데, 아무래도 지금 유우타로 옆에선 식욕이 생기지 않을 것 같았다.

Name: a1201.nss
Japanese: いつもの場所へと足を向けた。
Translation: Instead, I head to my favorite spot.
KR: 나는 항상 가던 곳으로 발길을 돌렸다.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 鍵が開いていた。
Translation: The door's already unlocked.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 静かな屋上。
Translation: It's perfectly quiet up here on the roof.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: ここに普通の生徒の姿は見えなくて。
Translation: Not a soul to be seen.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: きっと、彼女はひとりなのだろう。
Translation: And she's probably all by herself.
KR: 분명 그 녀석 혼자 있는 거겠지.

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「やっぱり」
Translation: "Just as I thought."

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 振り返ると無言で立ち尽くすアオイがいる。
Translation: I turn around to find Aoi standing quietly up on the roof over the stairs.
KR: 뒤돌아 보자 말없이 서 있는 아오이가 있었다.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: その瞳は空の遙か向こうを見つめている。
Translation: Her eyes are fixed on something beyond the farthest reaches of the sky.
KR: 그 눈동자는 하늘의 아득한 저편을 바라보고 있었다.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 焦点は、形のあるものを捉えていない。
Translation: Something formless and imperceptible.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: きっとどこでもない、なんでもないものを見ている。
Translation: Or maybe she's not looking at anything at all.
KR: 분명 어디에도 없는, 아무것도 아닌 것을 보고 있다.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 天気は快晴。
Translation: It's a bright and sunny day.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 晴れ渡った秋の空を眺めていると、神様から電波が降ってきてもいいのかな、なんて思ったりする。
Translation: As I look out at the clear blue autumn sky, I find myself wondering if God might actually answer the phone this time.
KR: 맑게 갠 가을 하늘을 보고 있자니, 신님의 전파가 내려와도 좋지 않을까 하는 생각이 든다.

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「――上がるぞ」
Translation: "I'm coming up there, okay?"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Whoa..."

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Ha... haha..."

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「こりゃ、すごい……」
Translation: "Holy crap...!"

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: いつもより少し上っただけなのに、まるで別世界だ。
Translation: It's crazy the difference a few extra meters can make.
KR: 평소보다 조금 올라갔을 뿐인데, 마치 다른 세상 같았다.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: ここからは文字通り３６０度、街並みが見渡せる。
Translation: Up here I'm greeted with a perfectly unobstructed, 360-degree view of the entire city.
KR: 여기서는 말 그대로 마을이 360도 전부 보인다.

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「こんな景色、見えるんだ……」
Translation: "Talk about one hell of a view!"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そうなの」
Translation: "Of course."

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 俺と同じ、青空を見上げてアオイがいう。
Translation: Aoi doesn't take her eyes off the sky for a single moment.
KR: 나와 똑같이 푸른 하늘을 올려다보는 아오이가 말했다.

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ここは、トクベツなの」
Translation: "This is a special place."

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 誰も足を踏み入れられない屋上の、秘密の場所。
Translation: A secret spot at the apex of a forbidden land...
KR: 아무나 들어올 수 없는 옥상의 특별한 장소.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: アオイが特別視する気持ちも、なんとなくわかる。
Translation: Yeah, I can see why Aoi might feel that way.
KR: 아오이가 그렇게 생각하는 기분도 어쩐지 알 것 같았다.

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「メシ、食ったか？」
Translation: "Did you eat lunch?"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うん」
Translation: "Yeah."

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: アオイの隣には、ゴミが詰まったコンビニ袋。
Translation: Next to her is a plastic to-go bag filled with trash.
KR: 아오이 옆에는 쓰레기가 든 편의점 봉투가 있었다.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 袋の口から、ケーキだのゼリーだのを食べた後の、甘ったるい匂いが漂っている。
Translation: I can smell the faint traces of something cloyingly sweet, like cake or jam.
KR: 봉투에선 케이크나 젤리를 먹은듯한 단내가 풍겨왔다.

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もっとまともなもの食べろよ」
Translation: "You should try to eat better."

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「まとも？」
Translation: "Better?"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから、栄養バランスに気を遣った――」
Translation: "You know, something with a balance of nutrients—"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「バランスなの？」
Translation: "Is THAT balanced?"

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: アオイが指さす俺の昼飯。
Translation: Aoi points to the bag containing my lunch.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 袋に入っているのは焼きそばパン・コロッケパン・カレーパンという、カロリーだけを考えたラインナップだ。
Translation: Everything inside screams calorie-laden carbohydrates, from the yakisoba sub to the croquettes to the curry buns.
KR: 봉투에 들어있는 건 야키소바 빵, 고로케 빵, 카레 빵 등 칼로리만 생각한 라인업이다.

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だが俺にはコレがある」
Translation: "The thing about my lunch is, I've got one of THESE bad boys."

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる？」
Translation: "Boop boop?"

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 俺がアオイの前に置いてみせたのは――
Translation: I set a small metal can down in front of her.

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ヤバトマ」
Translation: "Yabaley's."

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ヤバリース……オレンジじゃなく、トマト！」
Translation: "Yabaley's Orange—no, Tomato Juice?"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「野菜も摂れる。完璧」
Translation: "This way I get a serving of veggies too. Problem solved."

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 異世界の物体を目にするような表情のアオイ。
Translation: She stares at it like it's a relic from Area 51.
KR: 이세계 물건이라도 본 듯한 표정을 짓는 아오이.

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「んく……んく……んく……」
Translation: "Ggllpp... ggllpp... ggllpp..."

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ぷはぁっ！」
Translation: "Whew!"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おいしいの？」
Translation: "Is it yummy?"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Yep."

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: あんまり美味しくない。
Translation: ...It's not actually that great.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 実は俺、トマトジュースがあまり好きじゃない。
Translation: Truth be told, I'm not a big fan of tomato juice.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 自販機でも、隣のオレンジとボタンを間違っただけだったりするのである。
Translation: I just... maybe accidentally hit the wrong button on the vending machine.
KR: 자판기 버튼을 오렌지 옆에 있는 토마토로 잘못 눌렀을 뿐이다.

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「飲んでみるか？」
Translation: "Wanna try it?"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いいの？」
Translation: "Is that okay?"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ」
Translation: "Sure."

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: いっそ全部飲んでもらっても構わない。
Translation: Hell, she can have the rest for all I care.

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「んく……んく……んく……」
Translation: "Ggllpp... ggllpp... ggllpp..."

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: アオイはヤバトマを飲み始め――
Translation: She starts to drink—

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「んく……？　んく……！
　んく……んく……んく……んく……んく……」
Translation:
"Ggllpp...? Ggllpp...!
Ggllpp... ggllpp... ggllpp... ggllpp... ggllpp..."

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 飲み続け――飲み続け――飲み――
Translation: —and drink, and drink, and drink.

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Whew...!"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「飲み干した……」
Translation: "You downed it all in one go?"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「……だめなの？」
Translation: "...Is that bad?"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、責めてない」
Translation: "No, no, I'm not mad or anything."

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美味しかったのか？」
Translation: "Did you like it?"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「すきなの！」
Translation: "Yup!"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「カレー、タイやき、メロンパン！
　そういうレベルなの！」
Translation:
"It's like curry, or taiyaki, or melon buns!
Somewhere around there!"

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: あんまり意味がよくわからないが……
Translation: I don't really get the comparison, but okay...

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ま、美味かったのならよかった」
Translation: "Glad you liked it."

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Hmm?"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カンセツキスなの？」
Translation: "Was that an indirect kiss?"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイルート、フラグたつの？」
Translation: "Are you trying to trigger Aoi's route flag?"

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: そう言われると、百年の恋も冷める。
Translation: Okay, now you ruined it.
KR: 그 말을 들으니, 마음이 차갑게 식었다.

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前、ホントにゲームが好きなんだな」
Translation: "You really love video games, huh?"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このセカイは、ゲームなの」
Translation: "This whole world is a game."

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから、すききらいじゃないの」
Translation: "Aoi's opinion has nothing to do with it."

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そっか……」
Translation: "Right..."

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 現実とゲームを混同されることを嫌う、美雪。
Translation: Miyuki hates the idea of anyone treating reality like a game.
KR: 현실과 게임을 혼동하는 걸 싫어하는 미유키.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 現実とゲームが同じだと信じる、アオイ。
Translation: But Aoi thinks they're one and the same.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: ふたりのウマが合わないのは当然のことなのに。
Translation: It's only natural they'd never get along...
KR: 마음이 맞지 않는 게 당연한 건데.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 俺は、友達になるようにけしかけた。
Translation: And yet here I am, trying to make it happen anyway.

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ、ゴメンな」
Translation: "I'm sorry, Aoi."

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「友達になれとか言って、辛い思いさせちゃって」
Translation: "I'm the one who told you to make friends with her, and now it's my fault you got hurt."

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「つらいおもい？」
Translation: "Aoi got hurt?"

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: アオイは、ふと、首を傾げた。
Translation: Aoi tilts her head.

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「つらいって、なんなの？」
Translation: "What's... hurt?"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「だってあんなの嫌だろ？
　毎日、美雪に素っ気なくされてさ」
Translation: "Well, it doesn't feel good when Miyuki blows you off every day, right?"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「わかんないの」
Translation: "Dunno..."

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、セーブデータ、あるの」
Translation: "Aoi has a save file."

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「シッパイは、リセット。
　コウリャクまで、リロード」
Translation:
"Any mistakes can be reset.
Aoi can just reload as many times as it takes."

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それだけなの」
Translation: "That's all there is to it."

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ちがうの？」
Translation: "Right?"

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 言葉がすぐに、出てこない。
Translation: I'm not sure what to tell her.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: アオイは、辛さを我慢していたわけではない。
Translation: Turns out, she hasn't been enduring the pain.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: そもそも、辛さを感じていなかった。
Translation: She didn't feel it to begin with.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 失敗はリセットすれば良い――そう自分に言い聞かせ、事実から目を逸らし、辛いことすら忘れてしまう。
Translation: She tells herself she can fix her mistakes by starting over—enabling herself to run away from the harsh reality of her actions. Letting herself forget.
KR: 실패하면 리셋하면 된다... 그렇게 자신을 타이르고, 진실에서 눈을 돌리고, 괴로운 것조차 잊어버린다.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 彼女は多分疑問もなく、そう生きてきただけで。
Translation: I'm guessing she's never once thought critically about it, either.
KR: 아오이는 아마 의문도 없이 그렇게 살아왔겠지...

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...Wrong."

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: そんなのは、間違ってる。
Translation: That's no way to live.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 彼女には、普通の生活が――
Translation: She needs stability in her life.

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: 普通の友達が、必要だ。
Translation: And she needs friends.

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ？」
Translation: "Shinichi?"

Name: a1202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、メシ、食おうぜ！　――あむ」
Translation: "Anyway, time to eat! Om nom..."

Name: a1202.nss
Japanese: コロッケパンをくわえながら、俺は覚悟を決めた。
Translation: As I take a bite of my croquette, I make my decision.
KR: 고로케 빵을 입에 물며 나는 결심했다.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 夜、日が完全に沈んでから、家を出る。
Translation: That night, after the sun sets, I leave the house.
KR: 그날 밤. 해가 완전히 지고서 집을 나섰다.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 風に吹かれながら、ゆっくりと川縁を歩き――
Translation: The wind ruffles my hair as I walk down by the riverside.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 古ぼけたバッティングセンターに辿り着く。
Translation: Eventually, I arrive at an old, dilapidated indoor batting cage.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 店から響く鋭い快音。
Translation: I can hear the sharp crack of a bat echoing from inside.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: その数は多くない。
Translation: The sound is infrequent at best.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 案の定、客はひとりだけ。
Translation: As expected, there's only one customer inside.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 見る者を魅了させる、美しいフォーム。
Translation: Her form is so beautiful, it captivates anyone who sees it.
KR: 보는 이의 마음을 사로잡는 아름다운 자세.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: ……見えそうだけれども。
Translation: ...Assuming they aren't distracted by the flutter of her skirt.

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「着替えろよ」
Translation: "At least change out of your uniform first."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「演劇の練習」
Translation: "I'm practicing for rehearsal."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What?"

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「制服着たまま、ソフトボールするの」
Translation: "I'm supposed to play softball in a school uniform."

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: どんな演劇だよ。
Translation: Uhhh... What kind of play is this supposed to be, again?

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: という感想は、彼女のスイングの美しさの前では全くの無力で、言葉にならない。
Translation: I would make a retort, but the aesthetic of her swing renders me speechless.
KR: 그런 감상은 미유키의 아름다운 스윙 앞에 무력하게 무너져 내렸다.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 確かにこれは、見とれてしまう。
Translation: It's just... bewitching.
KR: 이건... 넋을 잃고 볼 수밖에 없다.

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Whew..."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「代わる？」
Translation: "Want a turn?"

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いいよ」
Translation: "I'll pass."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「好きだったじゃない」
Translation: "You used to love it, you know."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「昔の話だろ」
Translation: "Yeah, like, a million years ago."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんなに前の話でもないでしょ」
Translation: "Hardly."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「遊びに来たわけじゃない。
　話があって来たんだ」
Translation:
"Whatever. I'm not here to play.
I need to talk to you."
KR: "놀러 온 거 아니야. 할 얘기가 있어."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「向日さんのことね」
Translation: "About Mukou-san, right?"

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「な、なんでわかった！？」
Translation: "H-How did you know?!"

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「顔に書いてあるわ」
Translation: "It's written all over your face."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「彼女の友達になれ、って」
Translation: "You're going to tell me to make friends with her."

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: やっぱり美雪には、お見通しだった。
Translation: As usual, she sees straight through me.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: だったらもう、下手な小細工はなしだ。
Translation: Welp. No sense trying to beat around the bush now.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 自分の気持ちを、正直に伝えよう。
Translation: I should just be honest with her about how I feel.

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「頼む、美雪」
Translation: "Please, Miyuki..."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイの友達になってやってくれ！」
Translation: "Aoi needs a friend... Please just spend some time with her!"

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いつの間に、名前で呼ぶようになったわけ？」
Translation: "Since when did you start calling her Aoi?"

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え……あの、それは――」
Translation: "Huh? Oh, uh... well..."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私はお断りよ。友達になんてなれない」
Translation: "I'm afraid I have to decline. I can't possibly be friends with her."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……カメラの件、まだ怒ってるのか？」
Translation: "...Are you still upset about the blackmail thing?"
KR: "사진 찍은 거... 아직도 화 안 풀렸어?"

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「別に」
Translation: "No."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あの日から、アイツが何度お前に話しかけた？」
Translation: "She's been talking to you a lot since then, right?"
KR: "그 이후로 아오이가 몇 번이나 말 걸었지?"

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「鬱陶しいわ」
Translation: "It's extremely annoying."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でも、努力してる」
Translation: "But she's making an effort."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私の気持ちも考えずにね」
Translation: "Yeah, but she doesn't stop to think about how it makes ME feel."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そう言うけど、友達がいれば――」
Translation: "Maybe if you were her friend, you could teach her—"

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いい加減にして！」
Translation: "Just STOP!"

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 美雪の怒鳴り声が、バッティングセンターに響く。
Translation: Her voice echoes through the building.
KR: 미유키의 고함 소리가 야구연습장에 울려 퍼졌다.

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私がなんにもせずに、今の場所にいると思う？」
Translation: "Do you think it's easy being me?"
KR: "내가 아무것도 안 하고 이 자리에 있다고 생각해?"

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「目立てば目立つだけ、裏で何か言われるのよ？
　どれだけ理不尽に妬まれたと思う？」
Translation:
"The thing about being popular is that people love to talk.
Do you know how many people hate my guts?"
KR:
"눈에 띄면 띄는 대로 뒤에서 쑥덕거린다고?
얼마나 말도 안 되는 질투를 받아왔다고 생각해?"

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私が元々人付き合い苦手なのも、クラスに馴染むために努力してるのも、貴方だったらわかるでしょ！？」
Translation: "I've never been a social butterfly. I have to work HARD to fit in at school. Surely you of all people understand that!"
KR: "내가 원래 친구를 잘 못 사귀는 것도, 반에 적응하려고 노력한 것도, 너라면 알잖아!"

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: かつての彼女も、才能に満ちあふれていて――
Translation: I remember when we were younger...

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: でも、だからこそ、クラスに馴染めなかった。
Translation: Back then, her natural talents alienated her from everyone else.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 才能があるからこそ、ポツンと浮いていた。
Translation: She stuck out like a sore thumb.
KR: 재능이 있기 때문에 오히려 붕 떠 있었다.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: そんな彼女が、漫然と、クラスの中心にはなれない。
Translation: So yeah, she didn't turn into a queen bee by chance.
KR: 그런 미유키가 반의 중심이 된 건 저절로 이루어진 게 아니다.

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「それなのに向日さんは、現実がゲームだとか。
　現実から逃げてるだけじゃない！」
Translation:
"But then there's Mukou-san, claiming the world's just a game.
Having the time of her life in her little escapist fantasy!"
KR:
"그런데도 무코우는 현실이 게임이라니.
 현실에서 도망치고 있을 뿐이잖아!"

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「友達ができないのだって……本気でそうしたいと思わないからよ」
Translation: "The only reason she can't make friends is because she doesn't actually WANT friends."
KR: "친구가 생기지 않는다니... 진심으로 그걸 바라지 않으니까 그런 거야."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……ごめん」
Translation: "...I'm sorry."

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 俺は素直に、頭を下げる。

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、お前のこと、誤解してた」
Translation: "I shouldn't have jumped to conclusions about you."

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 美雪は自分を落ち着けるように、息をつく。
Translation: Miyuki takes a deep breath like she's trying to calm herself down.
KR: 미유키는 스스로 진정하려는 듯 숨을 내쉬었다.

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私こそ……急に怒鳴ったりして、ごめんなさい」
Translation: "Likewise... I'm sorry for shouting at you like that."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、俺が悪いんだ」
Translation: "Nah, I mean, it was my fault."

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 美雪がなぜ、ゲームと現実を混同するアオイに怒るのか、俺はイマイチ理解できないでいた。
Translation: I hadn't realized exactly why Miyuki resented Aoi for conflating reality with video games.
KR: 게임과 현실을 혼동하는 아오이에게 미유키가 왜 화를 내는지 나는 전혀 이해하지 못했다.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: けど、美雪は現実と向き合うために、努力している。
Translation: But Miyuki's been working hard to change herself.
KR: 하지만 미유키는 현실을 마주 보기 위해 노력하고 있다.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 友達の前で、好きでもない演技を続けている。
Translation: She's miserable, forced to put on an act in front of all her friends.
KR: 친구들 앞에서 좋아하지도 않는 연기를 계속하고 있다.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 失敗すればリセットすればいいと、ハナから現実に向き合おうとしないアオイが、腹立たしいのは当然だ。
Translation: So it's only natural she'd find Aoi infuriating when she dodges any personal responsibility by downplaying her mistakes.
KR: 실패하면 리셋하면 된다며, 처음부터 현실과 마주하려 하지 않는 아오이가 짜증 나는 건 당연하다.

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あのさ、でも――」
Translation: "It's just... The thing is..."

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 俺は、なけなしの勇気を掻き集めて、言う。
Translation: Summoning the last dregs of my courage, I look Miyuki in the eye.
KR: 나는 있는 듯 없는 듯한 용기를 쥐어짜내 말했다.

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だからこそ、アイツの友達になってやりたいんだ」
Translation: "That's exactly why I think she needs us around, you know?"

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「上手くいかなかったらリセットすればいいなんて、やっぱりアイツは間違ってる」
Translation: "She's gonna mess her life up if she stays convinced that she can just sweep all her mistakes under the rug."
KR: "잘 안되면 리셋하면 된다니, 역시 그 녀석 어긋나있어."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もし友達になれば、本気で、物事を考えるようになるかもしれない。きっかけが掴めないだけかもしれない」
Translation: "But maybe if we're there for her, we can get her to start taking life more seriously. Maybe she just needs a little push."
KR: "친구가 생기면, 진심으로 현실을 바라보게 될지도 몰라. 계기가 생기지 않는 것뿐일지도 몰라."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから、ちゃんと、最初の一歩を、踏み出せるようにしてやりたい」
Translation: "That's why I want to help her take the first step."
KR: "그러니까 제대로 첫걸음을 내디딜 수 있게 해주고 싶어."

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 俺は、美雪を真っ直ぐに見つめて、言った。
KR: 나는 똑바로 미유키를 바라본 채 말했다.

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方は昔からそうだった」
Translation: "You really haven't changed a bit."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh? Where did that come from?"

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……わかったわ」
Translation: "...Fine, I give up."

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、何かをのみ込むように、頷いた。
Translation: Miyuki's expression tells me she's resigned herself to her fate.
KR: 미유키가 뭔가 이해했다는 듯 고개를 끄덕였다.

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「貴方の言うことにも、一理ある。
　手伝ってあげても、いいわ」
Translation:
"You have a reasonable point.
So... I GUESS I'll help you out."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ありがとう！」
Translation: "Really? Awesome! Thank you!"

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ただし、これだけ言わせて」
Translation: "But let me say this."

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 美雪の視線が、ほんの少しだけ、逸れた。
Translation: For a fraction of a second, Miyuki looks away.

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「彼女、下心があるわよ」
Translation: "She's got an ulterior motive."

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: アオイはただ単に、友達をつくりたいわけではない。
Translation: Yeah... Aoi doesn't just want to make friends with us.
KR: 아오이는 단순히 친구를 사귀고 싶은 게 아니다.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 間に挟まり３人のグループを作ることで、美雪と俺の関係を進展させたい――そんな、見え見えの魂胆。
Translation: Her real goal is blatantly obvious—to be the third wheel that brings me and Miyuki together.
KR: 셋이 같이 다니면서 나와 미유키의 관계를 진전시킨다... 그런 뻔한 속셈.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 俺だって、美雪には必要以上に近づきたくない。
Translation: Personally, I don't want to let myself get any closer to Miyuki.
KR: 나도 미유키에게 필요 이상으로 접근하고 싶지 않아.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: ふたりとも傷つくのはわかってる。
Translation: We'll both just get hurt. I know that.
KR: 둘 다 상처받을 걸 알고 있으니까.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: でも――
Translation: But...

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「最後にあいつが、友達の意味を知って、良かったと思えるなら、それでいい」
Translation: "All I want is for her to have a taste of what it's like to have real friends for once."
KR: "나중에 그 녀석이 친구의 의미를 알고 잘 됐다고 생각한다면 그걸로 됐어."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイのため――ね」
Translation: "And this is all for HER sake, is it?"

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 美雪の表情が、少しだけ、悲しそうに思えるけど。
Translation: For some reason, Miyuki seems a little sad.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 多分きっと、気のせいだ。
Translation: ...I'm probably just imagining it.

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……協力しましょう」
Translation: "...I'll give it my best shot."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ありがとう！」
Translation: "I really appreciate it!"

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「その代わり――私のお願いも、聞いてくれる？」
Translation: "In exchange—will you help me with something, too?"

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 美雪は、立てかけてあった金属バットを手に取った。
Translation: Miyuki grabs the baseball bat leaning against the wall.
KR: 미유키는 세워 놓은 쇠 방망이를 집어 들었다.

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「私、次の劇で主役をするの。
　このフォームを認められてね」
Translation: "These baseball skills landed me the leading role in the upcoming performance..."
KR:
"나, 다음 연극에서 주역을 맡았어.
이 자세를 인정받았거든."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「ＯＢの役者さんも見に来てくれるから。
　もしかしたら、将来にも繋がるかもしれなくて」
Translation: "And there's going to be former graduates coming to see it and everything... This might be my big break."
KR:
"선배 배우분들도 보러 와주시니까...
어쩌면 장래로 연결될지도 몰라."

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうか……」

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「嬉しくないの？」
Translation: "Aren't you even a little happy for me?"

Name: a1211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、成功を祈ってるよ」
Translation: "I am! Fingers crossed that everything works out."

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 彼女が明るいスポットライトを浴びて、もっと距離が離れることはきっと良いことのはずだから。
Translation: After all, the more distance between us, the better.
KR: 미유키가 밝은 스포트라이트를 받으며 좀 더 멀리 떨어지는 건 분명 좋은 일일 테니까.

Name: a1211.nss
Japanese: 俺は上手く笑えたと思う。
