Translation: "Sorry to bother you. We're looking for—"

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「きゃあああああっ！！」
Translation: "AAAAAAAAHHHHHH!!!"

Name: a2161.nss
Japanese: 扉が閉まる。
Translation: She immediately jumps back inside and shuts the door.

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「にげたの」
Translation: "She ran away."

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺……何かしたか？」
Translation: "Was it something I said...?"

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ショックなの？」
Translation: "Are you upset?"

Name: a2161.nss
Japanese: あんな可愛いコに出会い頭に悲鳴を上げて逃げ出されたら、普通は誰だってショックを受けると思う。
Translation: Who wouldn't be upset right now? A cute girl just took one look at me and ran away screaming!
KR: 저런 귀여운 아이가 비명 지르며 도망가면, 보통 누구라도 쇼크겠지.

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Oh. Hi again."

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でた！」
Translation: "She's back!"

Name: a2161.nss
Japanese: 微かに開かれた扉のスリットから、恐る恐る目玉が覗く。
Translation: A single eye peeks out from the crack in the door.
KR: 살짝 열린 문틈 사이로 흠칫흠칫 눈이 엿본다.

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese:
「ご、ごめんなさい！　私、人見知りで。
　急に知ってる人がいて、びっくりしたので……」
Translation: "I... I'm really sorry! I'm just kinda shy, so the second I saw a familiar face, I freaked out..."
KR:
"죄, 죄송합니다! 저 낯을 가려서...
갑자기 아는 얼굴이 보여서 놀랐어요..."

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese:
「曽根先輩に用事ですよね？
　い、今、呼びますから」
Translation:
"You're looking for Sone-senpai, right?
I... I'll go get her."
KR:
"소네 선배한테 볼 일 있으시죠?
지, 지금 불러올게요."

Name: a2161.nss
Japanese: 律儀にも扉を閉めて、彼女は用具室へと消える。
Translation: With that, she disappears into the prop closet, shutting the door carefully behind her.
KR: 성실하게 문을 닫고 준비실 안으로 사라졌다.

Name: a2161.nss
Japanese: ずいぶん気弱そうなコだったが……あれ？
Translation: What a timid girl... Wait, what?

Name: a2161.nss
Japanese: 俺にあんな知り合い、いたっけ？
Translation: She recognized my face?

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「しんヒロインなの。うわきのききなの」
Translation: "A new romance option. You better not cheat."

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「は？　そんなじゃ――」
Translation: "What? I wouldn—"

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちょっと心一！」
Translation: "How dare you, Shinichi!"

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「ハルちゃんに悲鳴上げさせて！
　何かしたんでしょう？」
Translation:
"What on earth did you do to poor Haru-chan?!
I heard her screaming out here!"
KR:
"하루가 비명 지르게 하고!
무슨 짓 한 거지?"

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「別になんにも――」
Translation: "I didn't do anyth—"

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うわきなの！」
Translation: "He's two-timing!"

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「浮気ですって！？」
Translation: "Two-timing?!"

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「違う！」
Translation: "No!"

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そもそも誰とも付き合ってないから浮気は無理」
Translation: "How can I cheat on a girlfriend I don't have?!"

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それは、そうだけど……」
Translation: "Well, I guess you've got a point there..."

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「で、練習は終わったのか？」
Translation: "Anyway, did rehearsal end already?"

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ええ、さっき終わったところ」
Translation: "Mmhmm. Just finished a few minutes ago."

Name: a2161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「みたかったの」

Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「こちらこそ、ありがとう」
Translation: "No, thank YOU, Aoi."

Name: a2171.nss
Japanese: ふたりはアイスを口に頬張りながら、一片の曇りもない笑顔を浮かべてみせた。
Translation: The two smile at each other, mouths full of ice cream, not a trace of misery to be seen.
KR: 두 사람은 아이스크림을 입안 가득 물고, 한 점의 어둠도 없는 미소를 띄웠다.

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: アオイに先導されて、１０分ほど――
Translation: At Aoi's request, we follow her through town, and after about 10 minutes—

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうちゃくなの」
Translation: "We're here."

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: 駅裏に延びる商店街の一角に、その店はあった。
Translation: —she stops at a store on the outskirts of the shopping district behind the train station.
KR: 그 가게는 역 뒤편에 늘어선 상점가 한쪽에 있었다.

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: 猫雑貨「ねこまんま」。
Translation: "Catnip," the gift shop for cat lovers.

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: ショーウィンドウに並ぶのは、猫の置物、猫のヌイグルミ、猫の時計、猫柄のカーテン……ｅｔｃ、ｅｔｃ。
Translation: In the window display I can see cat figurines, cat plushies, cat-shaped clocks, cat-print curtains... and so on, and so forth.
KR: 가게에 진열된 건 고양이 장식, 고양이 인형, 고양이 시계, 고양이 커튼... 그리고 기타 등등.

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: 猫系のグッズだけでなく、実際に猫の飼育に必要な食料や、ねこじゃらしなどの玩具なども売っているようだ。
Translation: In addition to cat-themed merchandise, it appears they also sell supplies for cat owners. Toys and kibble and such.
KR: 고양이 관련 상품뿐만 아니라 실제로 고양이 사육에 필요한 사료나 장난감 등도 팔고 있는 것 같다.

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「本当にネコだらけだな」
Translation: "Cats galore, eh?"

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: 見た目でこうならば、中身はどうなっているのか？
Translation: I wonder what it looks like inside...
KR: 밖에도 이러면 내부는 어떻게 되어있는 걸까...

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: 猫の尻尾をモチーフにしたノブに手をかけて――
Translation: Just as I reach for the tail-shaped door handle—
KR: 고양이 꼬리 모양처럼 생긴 손잡이를 잡고...

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる……ミユキ？」
Translation: "Boop boop... Miyuki?"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、こないの？」
Translation: "Miyuki, aren't you coming?"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きづかないの」
Translation: "She's not listening..."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「なにかあったの？」
Translation: "Is something wrong?"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「わ、わかんないけど」
Translation: "D-Don't ask me..."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「今、部活に集中したい時期なの。
　悪いけれど、私は行けないわ」
Translation:
"I need to stay focused on the performance right now.
Sorry, but I'm not coming."
KR:
"지금은 동아리에 집중하고 싶은 시기야.
미안하지만 난 못 가겠어."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "...Boop boop..."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「じゃ、俺とアオイとふたりで行くか？」
Translation: "So you want me and Aoi to go by ourselves?"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「か、勝手にすればいいじゃない！」
Translation: "D-Do whatever you like! I don't care!"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だめなの。みんなでいくの」
Translation: "That's no good. We all have to go together."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちなみに、どこに行く気だったんだ？」
Translation: "Where exactly are we going, by the way?"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「『ねこまんま』ってみせなの」
Translation: "A store called Catnip."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「聞いたことないな」
Translation: "Never heard of it."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「センシュウ、オープン。
　ねこグッズ、せんもんてんなの」
Translation:
"It just opened last week.
They sell lots of cat stuff."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「行きましょう」
Translation: "Let's go."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え？　でも部活は――」
Translation: "Wait, what? What happened to staying focused on—"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「行きましょう！」
Translation: "Let's GO!"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「やっぱり、好きなんじゃないか？　猫」
Translation: "She must really like cats, huh?"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そうかもなの」
Translation: "Seems that way."

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: ショーウィンドウから店を望む美雪の表情は、普段の彼女からは想像できない、恋する乙女のそれだった。
Translation: Miyuki gazes, enraptured, at the window display—a strikingly feminine side of her she would ordinarily never let show.
KR: 진열장 너머로 가게를 바라보는 미유키의 얼굴은 평상시엔 상상도 할 수 없는, 사랑에 빠진 표정이었다.

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい美雪っ！」
Translation: "Earth to Miyuki!"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「わっ！」
Translation: "Aah!"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「び、びっくりした」
Translation: "Y-You scared me!"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「店、入るぞ！」
Translation: "We're going inside!"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「待って！　まだ心の準備が――」
Translation: "Wait! I'm not emotionally prepared!"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いいから」
Translation: "Too bad. Now come on!"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「わ、と、と、ちょっと！」
Translation: "Ack! Hey! Slow down!"

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: 尻込みする美雪の袖を引き、俺とアオイは店内へ。
Translation: I grab Miyuki by the sleeve and drag her inside after Aoi.
KR: 아오이는 뒷걸음질치는 미유키의 소매를 잡아당겨 가게 안으로 들어갔다.

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる……すごいの……」
Translation: "Boop boop... Amazing..."

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: 店に入るや否や、アオイは商品棚に飛びついてしまう。
Translation: As soon as we step inside, Aoi makes a beeline to the shelves.
KR: 가게에 들어서자마자, 아오이는 상품 진열대로 달려들었다.

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: それもそのはず、「ねこまんま」の店内は、ありとあらゆるものが猫のモチーフに彩られていた。
Translation: Sure enough, it turns out Catnip is stocked to the gills with all sorts of cat-themed items.
KR: 그도 그럴 것이, "냥이간식" 가게 안은 온갖 고양이 상품으로 꾸며져 있었다.

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: 壁中を飾る時計も、ヌイグルミも、置物も、天井の照明や足元のタイルに到るまで、全てが猫づくし。
Translation: The plushies, the figurines, the clock on the wall, the lights on the ceiling, even the tile floor—nothing but cats as far as the eye can see.
KR: 벽에 걸린 시계도, 인형도, 장식품도 천장 조명이나 발밑 타일에 이르기까지, 눈에 보이는 모든 것이 고양이다.

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: 扉を開けて鳴り響いたのは、きっと猫の鈴の音だろう。
Translation: The bell that jingled over our heads as we walked in probably came from a cat collar or something.
KR: 문을 열 때 울리는 종소리도 고양이 방울 소리겠지.

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「徹底的だな……」
Translation: "They really went all-out in here..."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...I'm so happy..."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい美雪、大丈夫か？」
Translation: "Hey Miyuki, you doing okay?"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「頭がクラクラしてきたわ……」
Translation: "I think I'm a little lightheaded..."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう……ダメかも……」
Translation: "I'm... not sure I can take it..."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「いやいや、落ち着け！
　ってかおまえ、そんなに猫が好きだったか？」
Translation:
"Whoa there, calm down!
Since when have you been this cat-crazy?"
KR:
"아니, 좀 침착해 봐!
근데 너, 그렇게나 고양이를 좋아했나?"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だって……」
Translation: "I can't help it..."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……可愛いじゃない」
Translation: "...They're just adorable..."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキもかわいいの」
Translation: "Miyuki's adorable, too."

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: 同感だ。
Translation: Agreed.

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: 最近はなんでもこなす美雪のイメージばかりが先行していたが、昔はこんな表情もよく見せたっけ。
Translation: These days I'm used to seeing her in queen bee mode all the time, but this is closer to the Miyuki I used to know.
KR: 최근에는 뭐든지 알아서 해내는 이미지만 있었는데, 옛날엔 이런 표정도 자주 지었지.

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい！」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんだ？」
Translation: "What's up?"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「にあうの？」
Translation: "How's this?"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「うおっ！」
Translation: "Whoa!"

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: 試着室のカーテンを開けて飛び出したのは、猫の着ぐるみ（？）を身に纏ったアオイだった。
Translation: Aoi pops out from behind the dressing room curtain, wearing... a kitty onesie...?
KR: 탈의실 커튼을 열고 뛰쳐나온 건 고양이 옷을 입은 아오이였다.

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、すごく、合ってると思う」
Translation: "Dang, girl. That looks PERFECT on you."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキは？」
Translation: "What do you think, Miyuki?"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ？」
Translation: "Miyuki?"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「ご……ごめんなさい！
　私には刺激が強すぎ――」
Translation:
"S-Sorry!
You're overloading my brain right now!"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シゲキ？」
Translation: "With what?"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「ちょ、やめて！
　そんな角度で見上げると――」
Translation:
"Hey! Cut it out!
Don't look at me like that!"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる？」
Translation: "Boop boop?"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「きゃっ！」
Translation: "Aaah!"

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: 猫アオイが、ノーガードの美雪の懐に入り込む。
Translation: Just like that, Cat!Aoi lands the finishing blow.

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「くるしい？　アオイがたすけるの」
Translation: "Does it hurt? Aoi will help you."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Oh god... I'm dying..."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「行くな！　美雪、しっかりしろッ！」
Translation: "No dying allowed! Pull yourself together, Miyuki!"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "I'm... dead..."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: グラリ――美雪の身体が傾ぎ――
Translation: Miyuki's body pitches sideways—

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ？」
Translation: "Miyuki?"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「うわああああああっ！！」
Translation: "Oh shit!"

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: 美雪は、棚ごと倒れ、猫グッズに埋もれた。
Translation: —and she collapses, taking a shelf out with her.
KR: 미유키는 선반과 함께 쓰러져 고양이 상품에 파묻혔다.

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: とても幸せそうな死に顔だった……
Translation: At least she went out with a smile, I guess...

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ご……ごめんなさい。私ったら――」
Translation: "I... I'm so sorry... I don't know what I was thinking..."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイも、ごめんなさいなの」
Translation: "Aoi is sorry too..."

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: と、謝るアオイはまだ猫の着ぐるみを着たままで――
Translation: Note: She's still wearing the kitty onesie.
KR: 사과하는 아오이는 아직 고양이 옷을 입고 있었다.

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だ、だからその格好は！」
Translation: "I... I told you, that outfit is dangerous!"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「かうの、やめるの」
Translation: "Then Aoi won't buy it."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「やめないで」
Translation: "You have to."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Huh? But—"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私なんか気にしないで、買いなさいって！」
Translation: "Don't worry about me. Just buy it!"
KR: "나 같은 건 신경 쓰지 말고 사라니까!"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪、おまえのそのカッコ、気に入ったみたいだぞ」
Translation: "Looks like Miyuki digs the onesie after all."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ほんとなの？」
Translation: "Really?"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ホントホント」
Translation: "Totally."

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「なら――かってくるの！」
Translation: "Okay then. Aoi WILL buy it!"

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: アオイは軽い足取りで、レジへと向かう。
Translation: With that, she speeds over to the register.

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おまえ、心底ネコが好きなんだな」
Translation: "Good grief. You're a total cat fanatic, aren't you?"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん？　美雪、どうした？」
Translation: "Hmm? What's the matter, Miyuki?"

Name: a2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Look."

Name: a2181.nss
Japanese: 美雪が指さすのは、猫のヘアピン。
Translation: Miyuki points to a cat-shaped hairpin on display near the window.

Name: a2182.nss
Japanese: ワンオフらしく、表情が微妙に異なったものが２匹、窓際に並んでいた。
Translation: Apparently it's a one-of-a-kind handmade item. Next to it is a second, slightly different pin in the same style.
KR: 직접 만든 것인지, 표정이 미묘하게 다른 고양이 두 마리가 창가에 진열되어 있었다.

Name: a2183.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「可愛い……」
Translation: "It's so cute..."

Name: a2183.nss
Japanese: 美雪はまるで恋でもしたかのように、そのヘアピンをうっとりとした瞳で見つめている。
Translation: Miyuki gazes at it, completely besotted.
KR: 미유키는 마치 사랑에 빠지기라도 한 듯, 그 헤어핀을 멍하니 바라보고 있었다.

Name: a2183.nss
Japanese: 決して洗練されてはいないが、手作りの質感がよく出ていて、表情に非常に味がある。
Translation: I can see why, too. It's definitely got that classic handmade look to it, and the artist really nailed its expression.
KR: 결코 세련된 건 아니지만, 손수 만든 느낌이 잘 살아있다.

Name: a2183.nss
Japanese: 値段は――今月の食費に手をつければ、届く額だ。
Translation: As for the price—it's doable if I dip into my monthly food budget...
KR: 가격은... 이번 달 점심값을 건드리면 살 수 있는 금액이다.

Name: a2183.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「買うか」
Translation: "Why don't I buy it for you?"

Name: a2183.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...What?"

Name: a2183.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺からのお礼。アオイ関係で世話になったし」
Translation: "Consider it a token of my thanks. You know, for helping me with Aoi and stuff."
KR: "내가 주는 답례로. 아오이 일로 신세도 졌고."

Name: a2183.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いや、でも、そんな。ダメよ、そんなの。だって――」
Translation: "Wh... But... No, no, I can't! I can't accept that! I mean—"
KR: "아니, 그래도, 그건... 안 돼, 그런 건. 그게..."

Name: a2183.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「バッティングセンターで、結局条件、出さなかった。
　だから、借りがある」
Translation: "You were going to have me make it up to you back at the batting cages before you changed your mind, remember? So technically I owe you."
KR:
"야구연습장에서 결국 조건 안 걸었잖아.
그러니까 빚이 있는 거야."

Name: a2183.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「で、でも……せっかくもらっても私には似合わないし」
Translation: "B-But... I mean, I appreciate the thought, but it wouldn't even look that good on me."
KR: "그, 그렇지만... 애써 받아봤자 나한테 안 어울릴 거야."

Name: a2183.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうか？」
Translation: "You sure about that?"

Name: a2183.nss
Japanese: 美雪はクラスでもクールなイメージで通ってて、ああいうかわいい系のアクセサリーをつけているイメージはない。
Translation: At school, Miyuki is the picture of sophistication. This cutesy cat pin would almost certainly clash with that.
KR: 미유키는 학교에서 쿨한 이미지라, 저런 귀여운 액세서리를 다는 느낌은 없다.

Name: a2183.nss
Japanese: が、今日の美雪の行動を見ている限りでは――
Translation: Still, her actions speak volumes.

Name: a2183.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「こういうの、好きだろ？」
Translation: "If you like it, then what's the harm?"

Name: a2183.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私よりもアオイの方が――」
Translation: "This sort of thing would look better on Aoi, so—"

Name: a2183.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ツンデレなの？」
Translation: "Are you being tsundere?"

Name: a2183.nss
Japanese: いつの間にか買い物を終えたアオイが、応援に入る。
Translation: Aoi returns from the register just in time to back me up.

Name: a2183.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……それじゃあ、こうしましょう？」
Translation: "...In that case, how about this?"

Name: a2183.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私が心一に買ってもらって、それをアオイに――」
Translation: "I'll have Shinichi buy it, and then I'll give it to y—"
KR: "내가 신이치한테 선물 받고, 그걸 다시 아오이한테..."

Name: a2183.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だめなの。いみないの」
Translation: "No way. That makes no sense."

Name: a2183.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私の希望なんだからいいでしょ？」
Translation: "So? It's what I want to do."

Name: a2183.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「わかった、わかったから」
Translation: "Fine, fine!"

Name: a2183.nss
Japanese: 押し問答していては、お店にも迷惑だ。
Translation: I doubt the sales clerk appreciates us standing here bickering.

Name: a2183.nss
Japanese: そもそも既に一度大迷惑をかけてるわけで。
Translation: We've already caused enough trouble by knocking that shelf over.
KR: 애초에 조금 전에도 큰 폐를 끼치기도 했고...

Name: a2183.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ふたりとも、先に店の外に行っててくれ」
Translation: "You two wait outside for me, alright?"
KR: "둘 다 먼저 가게 밖으로 나가 있어."

Name: a2183.nss
Japanese: 俺は棚に手を伸ばし、ヘアピンを鷲掴みにすると、速やかにレジへと向かった。
Translation: I swing by the shelf, then make a beeline straight to the register.
KR: 나는 선반에 손을 뻗어 헤어핀을 움켜쥐고 재빨리 계산대로 향했다.

Name: a2191.nss
Japanese: ラッピングを済ませてもらい、店の外へと出る。
Translation: After the clerk wraps up my purchase for me, I leave the store.

Name: a2191.nss
Japanese: 夕陽に、長い影がふたつ。
Translation: Two long shadows glide over the pavement as Miyuki and Aoi walk up to me.

Name: a2191.nss
Japanese: 美雪とアオイが、俺の前に立ちはだかっていた。
KR: 미유키와 아오이가 내 앞에 서 있었다.

Name: a2191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一、わかってるでしょうね？」
Translation: "Shinichi, you know what to do, yes?"

Name: a2191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ、おねがいなの」
Translation: "Shinichi, please..."

Name: a2191.nss
Japanese: ふたりの視線が、痛いほど向けられる。
Translation: Their eyes sear into mine.

Name: a2191.nss
Japanese: 俺は微笑みを浮かべ、ポケットからラッピングされた小包を取り出すと――
Translation: Smiling, I pull a neatly wrapped parcel out of my pocket.
KR: 나는 미소 지으며, 포장된 선물을 꺼내...

Name: a2191.nss
Japanese: "美雪に渡す","アオイに渡す"
Translation: "Give it to Miyuki","Give it to Aoi"

Name: a2192a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はい、これおまえに」
Translation: "Here, this is for you."

Name: a2192a.nss
Japanese: 美雪へと、ヘアピンの入った小包を手渡す。
Translation: I hand Miyuki her gift.

Name: a2192a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「するとこれは、私からアオイへのプレゼントに」
Translation: "And now this is for you."

Name: a2192a.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、アオイに小包をリレーする。
Translation: She immediately hands it off to Aoi.

Name: a2192b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はい、これおまえに」
Translation: "Here, this is for you."

Name: a2192b.nss
Japanese: アオイへと、ヘアピンの入った小包を手渡す。
Translation: I hand Aoi her gift.

Name: a2192b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイがもらうの、だめなの」
Translation: "Aoi can't accept this."

Name: a2192b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「大丈夫。貴方がもらっておきなさい」
Translation: "It's okay. I want you to have it."

Name: a2193.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「するとさらにここからもうひとつ新しい小包が」
Translation: "And now it's time for the second gift."

Name: a2193.nss
Japanese: 俺のポケットの中から、ふたつ目のヘアピンが現れた。
Translation: I pull out a second package containing the other hairpin.
KR: 내 주머니에서 두 번째 헤어핀이 나타났다.

Name: a2193.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Oh my god, you didn't..."

Name: a2193.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「バグわざなの？」
Translation: "Did you glitch your moveset?"

Name: a2193.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふたつ、買ったのね？」
Translation: "You bought BOTH of them?"

Name: a2193.nss
Japanese: 棚には運良く、ヘアピンがふたつ並んでいたのである。
Translation: I'm so lucky they had two...
KR: 선반에는 운 좋게도 헤어핀이 두 개 놓여 있었다.

Name: a2193.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「友情の証、ペアのヘアピンだ」
Translation: "Matching hairpins for you and your bestie."

Name: a2193.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もらってくれるな？」
Translation: "You'll take it, won't you?"

Name: a2193.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、おねがいなの」
Translation: "Please, Miyuki..."

Name: a2193.nss
Japanese: 根負けしたように、美雪は深く息をついた。
Translation: Miyuki sighs in defeat.
KR: 미유키는 내가 졌다는 듯 깊은 한숨을 내쉬었다.

Name: a2193.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一、貴方、食費を削る気よね？」
Translation: "Shinichi, you just spent your entire food budget, didn't you?"

Name: a2193.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ――バレてる？」
Translation: "...Was it that obvious?"

Name: a2193.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「明日から毎日、お弁当作ってきてあげるから。
　食費の足しにしなさい」
Translation:
"Starting tomorrow, I'll make lunches for the both of us.
That should tide you over for a while."
KR:
"내일부터 매일 도시락 만들어 줄 테니까
식비에 보태."

Name: a2193.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お、マジで！？　助かる！」
Translation: "For real?! You're a lifesaver!"

Name: a2193.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アイサイベントウなの」
Translation: "Made with Miyuki's love."

Name: a2193.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうじゃないわよ！　もう！」
Translation: "Ugh, shut up! God!"

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ」
Translation: "Shinichi!"

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Hm?"

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "What do you think...?"

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?"

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ？」
Translation: "Shinichi?"

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ、ああ！　もちろん！　似合ってるよ」
Translation: "O-Oh, uh, yeah, looks great! Totally!"

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ほめられたの……ありがとなの」
Translation: "You're so nice... Thank you."

Name: a2194.nss
Japanese: はにかむアオイの笑顔が、あまりにも可愛らしくて。
Translation: Aoi's shy smile is unbelievably adorable...
KR: 수줍어하는 아오이의 웃는 얼굴이 너무 귀여워서...

Name: a2194.nss
Japanese: つい、視線を逸らして助けを求めてしまう。
Translation: I quickly avert my gaze and seek backup.

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なあ、美雪？」
Translation: "Right, Miyuki?"

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪！」
Translation: "Miyuki!"

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「え、ええ……なんの話だっけ？」
Translation: "R-Right... What was the question?"

Name: a2194.nss
Japanese: おまえも見とれてるのか。
Translation: Aoi's captivated you too, I take it.

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「暗くなってきたな」
Translation: "Anyway, it's getting pretty dark out."

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうね。そろそろ帰らないと」
Translation: "Yeah... We'd better head home."

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おわかれなの」
Translation: "This is goodbye, then."

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ、そっか」
Translation: "Oh, right."

Name: a2194.nss
Japanese: アオイが寝泊まりするのは、すぐ側のマンガ喫茶だ。
Translation: Come to think of it, the manga cafe's right over there.
KR: 아오이가 숙박하고 있는 곳은 바로 앞 만화방이다.

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あれ……？　ヘアピンは？」
Translation: "Wait, why'd you take off your hairpin?"

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「たいせつなときに、つけるの」
Translation: "Saving it for special moments."

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「大切なとき？」
Translation: "Special in what way?"

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「たいせつなとき」
Translation: "Moments that mean a lot to me."

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それまでは、はだみはなさずたいせつにするの」
Translation: "Until then, it'll stay in my pocket for safekeeping."

Name: a2194.nss
Japanese: 確かに、そうやって大切にされるのも嬉しいな。
Translation: I'm honestly flattered she would want to take such good care of my gift.

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「バイバイなの」
Translation: "Bye-bye."

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「こっちこそ、ありがとう」
Translation: "Thanks for today."

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「じゃ、また明日」
Translation: "See you tomorrow!"

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい！」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんだ？」
Translation: "What's up?"

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「コクハク、チャンスなの」
Translation: "This is your big chance to confess your love."

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「――――ッ！？」{WaitAddText();}

Name: a2194.nss
Japanese: 唐突に飛び出した言葉に、俺と美雪は同時に吹き出す。
Translation: All at once, she catches both of us completely off-guard.
KR: 느닷없이 튀어나온 말에 나랑 미유키는 동시에 놀랐다.

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「――あれ？　いない？」
Translation: "—Wait, what the? Where'd she go?"

Name: a2194.nss
Japanese: 見回すが、もう既にアオイの姿はなかった。
Translation: I look around, but it's like she vanished into thin air.

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はぁ……全く、変なヤツだよな」
Translation: "Haah... What an oddball..."

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪？」
Translation: "Miyuki?"

Name: a2194.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「え？　あ、ああ、うん。なんだっけ？」
Translation: "Huh? O-Oh, right. Sorry, what?"

Name: a2194.nss
Japanese: 珍しく、美雪は俺の問いかけを聞き逃したようだった。
Translation: Apparently Miyuki wasn't listening.
KR: 미유키답지 않게, 내 말을 듣지 못한 것 같다.

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 秋の虫が盛んに鳴く川縁を、並んで行く。
Translation: Side by side, we walk down by the river, crickets chirping in the distance.
KR: 가을벌레가 한창 우는 강변을 나란히 걷는다.

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: ふたりきりで歩くなんて、どのくらいぶりだろう？
Translation: I can't even remember the last time we walked home together.
KR: 둘이서 같이 걷는 게 얼마 만일까.

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 意識するななんていうのは、到底無理な話だ。
Translation: I know I should just play it cool, but I can't help feeling a little self-conscious.
KR: 의식하지 말라는 건 도저히 불가능한 얘기다.

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 何か話題を切り出さなきゃ。
Translation: Say something. Anything!

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 焦れば焦るほど話題は遠のく。
Translation: In my panic, my mind goes utterly blank.
KR: 그러나 조급해할수록 할 말이 떠오르질 않았다.

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 代わりに頭を満たすのは、アオイの最後の一言。
Translation: My head is swimming with Aoi's parting words.
KR: 대신 머릿속을 채운 건 아오이의 마지막 한마디.

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「コクハク、チャンスなの」
Translation: "This is your big chance to confess your love."

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 沈黙を埋めるように、遠くから星空に響く高音。
Translation: Then the distant crack of a baseball bat breaks the silence.
KR: 침묵을 채우듯 멀리서 밤하늘을 울리는 고음.

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: バッティングセンターの帰り道が蘇る。
Translation: I remember all those nights we shared, walking home from the batting cages.

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: それはずいぶん、懐かしい感覚で――
Translation: Feels like an eternity ago.

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どのくらいぶり、かな」
Translation: "It's been a long time, hasn't it?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「４年と３ヶ月と１１日ぶり」
Translation: "Four years, three months, and eleven days, to be exact."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「日記につけてるの。だから覚えてた」
Translation: "It's written in my diary. That's how I know."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ……そうか」
Translation: "Oh... Gotcha."

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 美雪は幼い頃から、そういう細かいところがあった。
Translation: Miyuki's always had an eye for little details like that, ever since we were kids.
KR: 미유키는 어려서부터 그런 세세한 것도 잘 기억했다.

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 小さい頃の記憶が、ぼんやりと蘇る。
Translation: Fuzzy childhood memories float through my mind.

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「友達に戻れて、良かった」
Translation: "I'm glad we're friends again."

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 美雪は、噛み締めるように、呟く。
Translation: Miyuki mutters like she's trying on the concept for the first time.

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「アオイに感謝……だな。
　あ、もちろんお前にも」
Translation:
"All thanks to Aoi...
Oh, and you too, obviously."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「後悔はしてないわよ。色々発見もあったし」
Translation: "I'm glad we did this, actually. Made a lot of new discoveries."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「発見？」
Translation: "Like what?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「えっと……屋上の屋根とか」
Translation: "Like, umm... the top of the roof."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「確かに」
Translation: "Oh, right. Yeah, for sure."

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 俺もまさか、あんな身近に、見たことのない光景があるとは思わなかった。
Translation: I still can't believe something like that was right under my nose all this time...
KR: 설마 그렇게 가까이에 새로운 경치가 보일 줄은 몰랐다.

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: ……すごく、身近に。
Translation: Something... so very beautiful...

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なに？」
Translation: "What?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 俺はいつの間にか、美雪の顔を見つめていて。
Translation: I suddenly find myself looking at Miyuki.
KR: 나는 어느샌가 미유키의 얼굴을 바라보고 있었다.

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、なんでもない」
Translation: "Oh, uh, it's nothing."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……ふうん」
Translation: "...Ha. Okay."

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 美雪が急に、仏頂面に変わる。
Translation: Miyuki's expression sours all of a sudden.

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あのさ、心一」
Translation: "Listen, Shinichi..."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方にとって、アオイって、何なの？」
Translation: "How do you feel about Aoi?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 唐突な問いかけだった。
Translation: Where did that come from?

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方が他人に肩入れするなんて、珍しいなって」
Translation: "I find it a little strange that you'd try so hard to help someone else."
KR: "네가 다른 사람을 도우려 하는 게 신기해서."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから、もしかして……さ」
Translation: "So I started thinking maybe... you know..."

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 美雪はわざと、何でもないことのように聞く。
Translation: Miyuki's tone is perfectly casual.

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「付き合いたいとか、思ってる？」
Translation: "Are you... interested in her?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、付き合うとかそんな……」
Translation: "What? No, no..."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でも、さっきだって泣かせて――」
Translation: "But you obviously did something to make her cry—"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だからあれは誤解だって！」
Translation: "I told you, that was all a misunderstanding!"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺はただ、友人として……というよりもなんだろう？」
Translation: "It's hard to explain... I want to be friends with her, but more than that..."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「保護者？」
Translation: "Protect her?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そ、そう！　それ！」
Translation: "Yeah, that! Exactly!"

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 美雪の言葉は、まさに俺の感情を言い表していた。
Translation: Somehow she knows exactly what I was trying to say.
KR: 미유키의 말은 내 심정을 정확히 표현했다.

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いつもひとりでボーッとしながらカミサマからの電波を待ってて、まともな友達なんてひとりもいない」
Translation: "She's always sitting by herself, staring into space, waiting for a call from 'God' or whoever... Not a single friend to her name..."
KR: "언제나 혼자서 멍하게 있으면서 신님의 전파를 기다리기나 하고, 제대로 된 친구라곤 한 명도 없잖아."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「家庭事情も謎で、マンガ喫茶に泊まってる。
　ちゃんと見てないと、どうなるか心配でたまらない」
Translation: "Her family situation is a total mystery, and she's living in a manga cafe... If I don't keep an eye on her, I just know I'll give myself an ulcer worrying about her."
KR:
"가정 사정도 불분명하고, 만화방에서 지내고 있어.
잠깐 안 보면 어떻게 될까 봐 걱정돼서 견딜 수가 없다고 할까."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でも……私、考えたの」
Translation: "About that... I've been thinking."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「ここはゲームじゃないの。
　彼女は現実世界に生きる人間なのよ」
Translation:
"This isn't some video game.
This is real, and she's a real person."
KR:
"이곳은 게임이 아니야.
아오이는 현실세계에 사는 인간이고."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「彼女がちゃんと現実に向き合えるようにする」
Translation: "I want to help her come to terms with her reality."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それが、私たちがしてあげるべきことなのかなって」
Translation: "And I think that's the best thing we can do for her."

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 幼い頃の美雪も、クラスでポツンと浮いていた。
Translation: When Miyuki was a kid, she was a loner, too.

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 今と同じく、才能があって、見た目も可愛くて、でも世の中との距離が掴めないでいた。
Translation: She was every bit as pretty and talented as she is now—but she didn't have a solid grasp of social etiquette.
KR: 지금처럼 재능있고 외모도 예뻤지만, 세상 이치는 모르고 있었다.

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 例えば誰かに欠点を指摘されると、努力でそれをすぐに克服してしまう。
Translation: For example: Anytime someone would point out one of her flaws, she would work hard to correct it.
KR: 예를 들어, 누군가에게 단점을 지적받으면 노력으로 금방 극복해버린다.

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: そこでやめておけばいいのに、わざわざ克服したことをひけらかして、欠点を指摘した人をやり込める。
Translation: But instead of stopping there, she would go out of her way to show off the fruit of her efforts and humiliate the person who pointed it out in the first place.
KR: 거기서 멈추면 좋았겠지만, 일부러 극복한 것을 과시해서 지적한 사람을 찍소리도 못하게 한다.

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 一言で言えば、困った天才肌の少女だった。
Translation: A precocious little brat, in other words.

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 美雪が友達になろうとしたのも、もしかしたら、アオイにかつての自分の姿を見たからかもしれない。
Translation: But I think maybe Miyuki agreed to help because she sees her old self in Aoi.
KR: 미유키가 친구가 되어준 것도, 어쩌면 아오이에게서 예전 자기 모습을 봤기 때문일지도 모른다.

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「きっかけとか、あったのか？」
Translation: "What was it that helped you back then?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「きっかけ？」
Translation: "What do you mean?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「いつ頃だっけ？
　お前、突然クラスに馴染めるようになったよな」
Translation: "I mean, at some point you started fitting in with the rest of the class, right?"
KR:
"언제쯤이었지?
너, 반 애들이랑 갑자기 잘 어울리게 됐잖아."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方だし」
Translation: "That was all you, duh."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...What?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから、貴方のおかげだって！」
Translation: "You're the one who helped me, genius!"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「演劇で、主役に推してくれたでしょう？」
Translation: "You nominated me for the lead role in that play, remember?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん……ああ、あったなそんなこと」
Translation: "I did...? Ohhh! That's right! I remember now!"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「やっぱり……忘れてたんだ」
Translation: "I knew it... You totally forgot..."

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: かつて学芸会で、クラスの出し物が演劇をやることになったのだが、なかなか主役が決まらないことがあった。
Translation: Back then, our class decided to put on a play for the school arts festival, but no one wanted to take the lead role.
KR: 예전 학예회 때, 우리 반은 연극을 하게 됐는데 좀처럼 주역이 정해지지 않았다.

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: きっと美雪なら、最初はどれだけ下手でも、最後には目を見張るような演技を仕上げるに違いない――
Translation: So I randomly nominated Miyuki for it.
KR: 분명 미유키라면 처음에는 얼마나 서툴던지, 결국에 놀랄만한 연기를 보여줄 게 틀림없다.

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 軽々しい気持ちで、主役に美雪を推薦したのだ。
Translation: At the time, I figured even if she sucked at first, she'd just work ten times as hard to knock all of our socks off in the end.
KR: 그런 가벼운 생각으로 미유키를 주역으로 추천한 것이다.

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私ね、舞台に立ってわかったの」
Translation: "The moment I got up on that stage, I knew."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「舞台が本物で、日常がニセモノだって」
Translation: "The play was my reality, and real life was my fiction."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そう思ったら、些細なことに腹が立たなくなった」
Translation: "Putting myself in that frame of mind helped me to stop getting so worked up over the small details."
KR: "그렇게 생각했더니, 사소한 일에 화가 나지 않게 됐어."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それで、クラスと折り合いがついた？」
Translation: "And that's what helped you get along with the rest of the class?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「結構、上手く演じてるでしょう？」
Translation: "I really know how to play the part, don't you think?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「まあ、な」
Translation: "I suppose so, yeah."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「バレてるのは、貴方にだけだし」
Translation: "You're the only one who sees through it, anyway."

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 拗ねたように、美雪が言った。
Translation: She mutters sulkily.

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それじゃあな」
Translation: "Well... See ya."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……あ、あのね」
Translation: "H-Hey, uh..."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん？　なんだ？」
Translation: "Hmm? What's up?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あの、ええと……」
Translation: "Listen... Um..."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「この前、相談しようとしたこと」
Translation: "About the... thing I was gonna ask you to help me with..."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「バッティングセンターの？」
Translation: "The thing you mentioned back at the batting cages?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そう。アレ」
Translation: "Yeah, that."

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 引っ張るだけ引っ張って、結局相談をやめたアレか。
Translation: I seem to recall she was REALLY hesitant to talk about it...

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「誰にも……話さないでくれる？」
Translation: "Can you... promise not to tell anyone?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「わかってるよ」
Translation: "Sure."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今度、さ。私が演劇で主役するでしょ」
Translation: "So, uh... You know how I'm playing the lead..."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ。それで？」
Translation: "Yeah, and?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それで、あの……私……」
Translation: "Well... umm... you see..."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「キス、するの」
Translation: "There's going to be... a kiss."

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 一瞬で、頭の中が真っ白になる。
Translation: Instantly, my mind goes blank.

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「劇の中で、キスシーンがあって、それで……」
Translation: "In the play, I mean. There's a kissing scene, and..."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……心一、聞いてる？」
Translation: "...Shinichi, are you listening?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ、ああ。大変だな。がんばれよ」
Translation: "Y-Yeah, I'm listening. Sounds intense! Good luck with that."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「初めてなの」
Translation: "It's my first time."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...What?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だ、だから……」
Translation: "L-Like I said..."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「…………私、ファーストキス、まだなの」
Translation: "...I haven't had my first kiss yet."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そ……そうなのか」

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うん……そうなの……」
Translation: "Mmhmm... So yeah..."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ま、そう、そうだよな！」
Translation: "Well, uh, no surprise there!"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「美雪ってさ、綺麗だけど、綺麗すぎるって言うか。
　恋人と付き合ってる雰囲気もなかったし」
Translation:
"I mean, you're pretty, but like, almost TOO pretty, you know?
And, as far as I know, you've never really had a boyfriend."
KR:
"너는 예쁜데, 너무 예쁘다고 할까.
연애하고 있는 것 같지도 않았고..."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「だから、えっと、それはそういうことで。
　俺も納得したっていうか……」
Translation:
"So yeah, uh... That explains that, or whatever, haha...
Yep, I can see how that would be the case... Yeah."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……大丈夫、なのか？」
Translation: "Are you... cool with it, or...?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「わからない」
Translation: "I don't know."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でも……クライマックスのシーンだから」
Translation: "But... it's the climax of the play, so..."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちゃんとできるか、心配で」
Translation: "I'm worried I might screw it up."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「相手役と、練習は？」
Translation: "Why not ask the other person to help you practice?"

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……気が進まなくて」
Translation: "...I can't bring myself to do it."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ぶっつけ本番で、お願いしてる」
Translation: "I told him I'm just gonna wing it during the performance."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Ah."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから、さ。あの……その……」
Translation: "So, um... well... uh..."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……がんばる」
Translation: "...I'll just have to do my best."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...Well, uh..."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「応援、してる」
Translation: "I'm... rooting for you, I guess."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ありがとう」
Translation: "Thanks."

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 絞り出すように、美雪は言って。
Translation: Her voice is little more than a whisper.

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「じゃあ、ね」
Translation: "Well... see you."

Name: a2201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、お休み」
Translation: "Have a good night."

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 美雪の早い足音が、夜の向こうに消えていく。
Translation: Miyuki's speedy footsteps fade into the dusk.
KR: 미유키의 재빠른 발소리가 밤의 저편으로 사라져간다.

Name: a2201.nss
Japanese: 逃げるような後ろ姿が見えなくなっても、俺はしばらく、そこに立ち続ける。
Translation: As for me, I stand rooted to the spot until long after she's gone.
KR: 도망치는 듯한 그 뒷모습이 보이지 않게 될 때까지, 나는 잠시 그 자리에 서 있었다.

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: まだ俺たちが小学生だった頃。
Translation: Back in elementary school...

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: 美雪の人生を変えた、演劇。
Translation: That play changed Miyuki's whole life.

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: 彼女を主役に推薦したのは俺だった。
Translation: And I was the one who nominated her for the role.

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: なぜかそのついでに、俺が美雪の彼氏役に推薦された。
Translation: For some reason, they decided I should play the role of her boyfriend.
KR: 그 때문인지, 나는 미유키의 남자친구 역할을 맡게 되었다.

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: 最初こそぎこちなかったが、みるみるうちに上達し、演技にのめり込んでいく美雪。
Translation: Miyuki was a little stiff at first, but sure enough, she improved dramatically over time.
KR: 처음에는 어색했지만, 금세 능숙해져 연기에 빠져드는 미유키.

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: 舞台の上で彼女は輝いて、目映さに目が潰された。
Translation: Onstage she had so much sparkle, she was practically blinding.
KR: 무대 위의 미유키는 눈이 부셔 눈이 멀 정도였다.

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: 俺たちは間違いなく恋人だった。
Translation: Somehow it really felt like we were together.

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: この世界には、俺と彼女のふたりだけなのではないかという錯覚さえ起こった。
Translation: Hell, it felt like we were the only two people in the whole world.
KR: 이 세계에 나와 미유키 둘만 있는 게 아닐까 하는 착각마저 들었다.

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: けど、舞台を下りれば魔法は解ける。
Translation: But once the curtain closed, the magic would fade.

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: 俺はただ、彼氏の役割を演じていただけ。
Translation: It was just a role in a play.
KR: 나는 그냥 남자친구 역할을 연기한 것뿐.

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: 彼女の桁外れの演技に感化され、勘違いをしてしまっただけなのだ。
Translation: She was just... extremely convincing, that's all.
KR: 미유키의 엄청난 연기력에 속아 착각했을 뿐이다.

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: のぼせ上がった俺の演技は、拙く、冷静さを欠いていて、美雪の相手役を務められるようなものではなかった。
Translation: Me, though? I completely lost my composure. My "acting" was a trainwreck, nowhere near on par with hers.
KR: 얼어붙은 내 연기는 서투르고 침착하지 못해서, 미유키의 상대역을 맡을만한 게 못 되었다.

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: 本番で台詞を思いっきり飛ばして、会場中から笑われて、美雪のフォローでなんとか舞台を終わらせて。
Translation: Then, during the performance, I flubbed my lines. Everyone laughed. It was only thanks to Miyuki's ad-libbing that we made it to the curtain call without further incident.
KR: 실전에서 대사를 마구 날려버리고, 비웃음당한 채, 미유키의 도움으로 어떻게든 연극을 마치고...

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: ようやく、俺にかかった魔法が解けた。
Translation: At last, the spell was broken.

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: 気付けば美雪はクラスの中心。
Translation: The next thing I knew, Miyuki was the star of the class.

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: 対する俺は今まで通り、端の端。
Translation: And I'm still just a nobody.
KR: 그에 반해 나는 여전히 밑바닥의 밑바닥.

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: もう、美雪は俺を必要としなかった。
Translation: She doesn't need me anymore.
KR: 미유키는 더 이상 내가 필요하지 않았다.

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: 才能を開花させて、新しい世界に飛び出そうとしていく美雪からしてみれば、俺は邪魔者だ。
Translation: Her talents are taking her somewhere I can't follow. I would just drag her down.
KR: 재능을 꽃피워 새로운 세상으로 날아가려 하는 미유키 입장에서 보면 나는 방해꾼이다.

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: ただの友達――それで充分のはずなのだ。
Translation: We're just friends. That ought to be enough for me.

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: なのに――
Translation: And yet—

Name: a2211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki

Name: a2211.nss
Japanese: 美雪の囁きが、唇が、焼き付いて離れなかった。
Translation: Miyuki's words—her lips—are burned into my brain.
KR: 미유키의 그 말이 입에 붙어 떨어지지 않았다.

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「告白された」
Translation: "He confessed his love to me."

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...What?"

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「自分の趣味を認めてくれたのは、俺が初めてだって」
Translation: "He said I was the first person to look past his weird hobbies."
KR: "자신의 취미를 인정해 준 건 내가 처음이래."

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「ずっとずっと、俺を家族として大事に思ってたけど。
　その気持ちが、それ以上のものだって気付いたって」
Translation:
"That he always loved me as a brother, but...
Lately he's realized it's something more than that."
KR:
"쭉 나를 가족으로서 소중히 생각했지만...
그 마음이 그 이상이라는 걸 깨달았대."

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「龍二郎に、女装姿で、告白された」
Translation: "Ryuujirou... confessed his love to me... while crossdressing."

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「じょそう……すがた？」
Translation: "What... was he wearing...?"

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「スク水だった……」
Translation: "A girl's school swimsuit..."

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...No kidding?"

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「こんな冗談が言えるほど、俺の人生に余裕はないッ！」
Translation: "No, I'm not kidding! I'm too busy trying to figure out my fucked-up life!"
KR: "이런 농담을 할 정도로 내 인생에 여유는 없어!"

Name: a3111.nss
Japanese: 朝からヘヴィだ……
Translation: This is some heavy shit first thing in the morning...

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でもそれ、断るしかないだろ」
Translation: "I mean, you'll have to turn him down, right?"

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Translation: "But... but...!"

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「女装した、龍二郎が――」
Translation: "In that swimsuit... Ryuujirou, he..."

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「可愛かった」
Translation: "He was cute..."

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「可愛かったんだよおおおおおお」
Translation: "HE WAS CUTE!!!"

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「俺の弟が、あんなに可愛いわけがないッ！！」
Translation: "MY LITTLE BROTHER CAN'T BE THAT CUTE!!!"

Name: a3111.nss
Japanese: なんだそれ？
Translation: Sounds like a mediocre light novel...

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「おはよう、みんな」
Translation: "Good morning, everyone!"

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「お、おはようございますッ！　曽根さんッ！」
Translation: "G-Good morning, Sone-san!"

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「曙くん……なんで朝から泣いてるの？」
Translation: "Akebono-kun...? What's got you crying this early in the morning?"

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「曽根さんッ！　よければこの私の、聞くも涙、語るも涙のお話を聞いて――」
Translation: "Sone-san! It's a long story, but hear me out! By the end, I'm sure you'll be crying along with m—"
KR: "소네 씨! 괜찮다면 듣는 것도 눈물, 말하는 것도 눈물인 얘기를 들어..."

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あれ、アオイは？」
Translation: "Wait, where's Aoi?"

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一、知らない？」
Translation: "Shinichi, have you seen her?"

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「――ちょっと、心一？　聞いてる？」
Translation: "—Uh, Shinichi? Are you listening?"

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「遅くない？」
Translation: "She's late, don't you think?"

Name: a3111.nss
Japanese: いつもならもう俺が教室に入った時点で、アオイは席に座ってぼんやり宙を眺めてるはず……
Translation: Normally Aoi's already sitting at her desk and staring into space by the time I arrive...
KR: 평소대로라면 내가 교실에 들어갔을 때, 아오이는 자리에 앉아 멍하니 허공을 바라보고 있을 터.

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ひぐっ、うっ、うううっ……！」
Translation: "Hnn... nnn... waahh...!"

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん？　どした、雄太郎？」
Translation: "Hm? What's wrong, Yuutarou?"

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「全力で……スルーされた……」
Translation: "She completely... ignored me..."

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「っていうか心一！
　おまえいつの間に曽根さんとフレンドリーな仲に――」
Translation:
"Wait... Shinichi!
Since when have you been all buddy-buddy with—"
KR:
"그보다... 신이치!
너 어느새 소네 씨랑 친한 사이가..."

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、おはようなの」
Translation: "Morning, Miyuki!"

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「おはよう、アオイ。遅かったじゃない」
Translation: "Good morning, Aoi. You're late!"

Name: a3111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「バッティングセンターたのしみで、ねぼうなの」
Translation: "Must've been too excited about going to the batting cages... Slept through my alarm."

Name: a3111.nss
Japanese: アオイはそう言うが……
Translation: So she claims...

Name: a3111.nss
Japanese: 俺には、ただの寝坊には見えなかった。
Translation: But that's not what it looks like to me.
KR: 내 눈에는 단순한 늦잠으로 보이지 않았다.

Name: a3111.nss
Japanese: 何となく、疲れているような……
Translation: She doesn't just seem sleepy—she seems worn out.

Name: a3111.nss
Japanese: なにか、気がかりなことでもあるのだろうか？
Translation: Is there something stressing her out, maybe?

Name: a3121.nss
Japanese: 放課後――約束の時間が近づき、俺は屋上に向かう。
Translation: After school, I head to the roof to meet up with the others.
KR: 방과 후, 약속시간이 되어 나는 옥상으로 향했다.

Name: a3121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a3121.nss
Japanese: 振り返ると、アオイは相変わらずデンパを放っていた。
Translation: I turn around, and sure enough, Aoi's up there "transmitting" again.
KR: 뒤돌아보니, 아오이가 여전히 전파를 보내고 있었다.

Name: a3121.nss
Japanese: 俺はハシゴを伝い、屋根の上へ。
Translation: I climb up the ladder.

Name: a3121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「神様に届いたか？」
Translation: "Did God ever answer your call?"

Name: a3122a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「まだなの。でも――」
Translation: "Not yet... but..."

Name: a3122a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きょうなら、とどくかもしれないの」
Translation: "Today feels like a good day."

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あんまり、無理するなよ」
Translation: "Don't wear yourself out, now."

Name: a3123.nss
Japanese: 朝の印象は、変わらない。
Translation: As with this morning, she still seems kinda under the weather.

Name: a3123.nss
Japanese: やっぱり彼女は、どこか具合が悪そうに見えた。
KR: 역시 아오이는 상태가 좋아 보이지 않았다.

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「届いたら、なにするんだ？」
Translation: "What'll you do if he answers?"

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セーブなの」
Translation: "Save the game."

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、美雪と友達になったもんな」
Translation: "Oh, right. You finally made friends with Miyuki, after all."

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うん」
Translation: "Uh huh."

Name: a3123.nss
Japanese: 相変わらずゲーム脳なのは気になるが、アオイが美雪を大切にしてくれているのは嬉しい。
Translation: I'm not crazy about her gamer brain nonsense, but I'm glad she cares about Miyuki.
KR: 여전히 게임 뇌인 건 신경 쓰이지만, 아오이가 미유키를 소중히 생각한다는 게 기쁘다.

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「届くといいな」
Translation: "Well, I hope He picks up, then."

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きっと、とどくの」
Translation: "God will answer. Aoi can feel it."

Name: a3123.nss
Japanese: 夕日に染まる空の向こう――この世界を突き抜けるアオイの視線を、俺は少しだけ、羨ましく思う。
Translation: Her gaze pierces beyond the crimson sky—beyond the farthest reaches of the world—and for a moment, I find myself envious of her.
KR: 석양에 물드는 하늘의 저편... 이 세계 너머에 있는 아오이의 시선이 나는 조금이나마 부럽다고 생각했다.

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチは、きょう、どうしたの？」
Translation: "Shinichi, what's wrong with you today?"

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「何の話だ？」
Translation: "What are you talking about?"

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキにつめたいの」
Translation: "You were avoiding Miyuki."

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きのうよる、こくはく、しっぱいしたの？」
Translation: "Did she shoot you down last night?"

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「してないし」
Translation: "I didn't even confess!"

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺と美雪はただの友達――」
Translation: "Miyuki and I are just friends, and—"

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「うそつきなの。
　アオイにはわかるの」
Translation:
"You're lying.
Aoi knows the truth."

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、シンイチ、すき」
Translation: "Miyuki likes Shinichi."

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ、ミユキ、すき」
Translation: "And Shinichi likes Miyuki."

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「こいびと、ならないの、へんなの」
Translation: "So you two will get together. It would be dumb not to."

Name: a3123.nss
Japanese: 俺たちが「世界の中心」にいるからか――
Translation: When I'm with Aoi, for some reason, it's easier to open up.

Name: a3123.nss
Japanese: アオイと一緒だと、不思議と素直になれた。
Translation: Is it because we're standing in the "center of the universe"?
KR: 아오이랑 같이 있으면 신기하게 솔직해질 수 있었다.

Name: a3123.nss
Japanese: 友達の彼女になら、美雪の悩みを打ち明けてもいいんじゃないかと思った。
Translation: Somehow I feel that, as Miyuki's friend, Aoi's a safe person to tell.
KR: 친구인 아오이에게는 미유키의 고민을 털어놔도 괜찮지 않을까 싶었다.

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「キス、するんだってさ」
Translation: "She said there's going to be a kiss."

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「キス？」
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「演劇の舞台で」
Translation: "In the play."

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「今は友人だから、何ともないけど。
　彼氏だったら、きっと我慢できないから」
Translation:
"If I was her boyfriend, I'd be furious.
But we're just friends, so it doesn't matter."
KR:
"지금은 친구니까 아무렇지 않지만,
남자친구였으면 참을 수 없었을 테니까."

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「がまん？」
Translation: "Are you sure?"

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そもそも俺、アイツとは全然釣り合わなくて」
Translation: "I mean, she's out of my league, anyway."

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「役者として有名になったら、俺よりずっとふさわしい男が現れる」
Translation: "Once she's famous, she'll find someone who deserves her. Someone way better than me."
KR: "배우로 유명해지면 나보다 훨씬 어울리는 남자가 나타날 거야."

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それで苦しむくらいだったら、最初から、好きにならなくていいんだ」
Translation: "Why sit around waiting to get dumped when I could just... not fall for her in the first place?"
KR: "그래서 괴로워질 바엔 처음부터 좋아하지 않는 게 나아."

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ずっと前に、そう、決めたんだ」
Translation: "I made up my mind about this forever ago."

Name: a3123.nss
Japanese: 後ろ向きな考えだと思う。
Translation: I know I'm being a little fatalistic about this.

Name: a3123.nss
Japanese: でもこれが、俺の本心だ。
Translation: But I can't help the way I feel.

Name: a3123.nss
Japanese: だからずっと、彼女との距離をとり続けてきた。
Translation: This is the reason I've kept my distance from her all this time.
KR: 그래서 미유키와 거리를 둔 채 지내왔다.

Name: a3123.nss
Japanese: 近づいても、お互いに、傷つくだけだから。
Translation: Being with her would only get us both hurt later on down the line.
KR: 가까워져 봤자 서로 상처 입을 뿐이니까.

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?"

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチは、ネトラレ、いやなの？」
Translation: "Shinichi, are you scared of getting cucked?"

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ねとられ……？」
Translation: "Excuse me?"

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい！」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: a3123.nss
Japanese: アオイは、高々と左手を挙げる。
Translation: Aoi raises her hand high in the air.

Name: a3123.nss
Japanese: 夕陽に、スマートフォンの画面が眩しく光った。
Translation: The red rays of the sunset reflect off her phone screen.

Name: a3123.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「しんぱい、ないの」
Translation: "Don't worry."

Name: a3124.nss
Japanese: アオイの瞳が、妖しく瞬いて。
Translation: Her eyes shine with an unearthly glint.

Name: a3124.nss
Japanese: 違和感に、空を見上げる。
Translation: Suddenly, something feels off.

Name: a3124.nss
Japanese: 雲が渦を巻いていた。
Translation: I look up to find dark clouds swirling in the sky above us.

Name: a3124.nss
Japanese: それまでの晴天が嘘のように、空には黒い雲が湧き上がり、強風が横から顔を殴りつけた。
Translation: Moments ago it was a perfect sunny day... but now stormy winds rush around us.
KR: 조금 전까지 맑았던 하늘이 거짓말인 것처럼, 검은 구름이 피어오르고 바람이 주위에서 소용돌이치고 있었다.

Name: a3124.nss
Japanese: 夕と夜の狭間、刻が渦を巻いて天の底へと吸い込まれていく――そんな光景。
Translation: It feels as though time itself is being sucked away into an otherworldly portal, leaving us caught in the purgatory between dusk and night.
KR: 저녁과 밤의 틈새, 시간이 소용돌이치며 하늘 저편으로 빨려 들어가는... 그런 광경.

Name: a3124.nss
Japanese: 世界が揺らいでいる。
Translation: The world is caving in.

Name: a3124.nss
Japanese: 表層が剥げ、境界が揺らぎ、向こう側の本質が、今まさに露わになろうとしているその瞬間。
Translation: The protective shell falls away and the borderline falters, threatening to reveal what lies beyond—
KR: 표층이 벗겨지고, 경계가 흔들리며 저편의 진실이 이제 막 드러나려는 그 순간.

Name: a3124.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: a3124.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「何してるんだ？」
Translation: "What are you doing?"

Name: a3124.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる」
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a3124.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチのイベントＣＧ、たくさんたまったの」
Translation: "Collected a bunch of Shinichi event CGs."

Name: a3124.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「ジュウデンカンリョウ。
　カミサマに、デンパとどくの。だから――」
Translation:
"Recharge complete.
Now Aoi can transmit to God... and then..."

Name: a3124.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セカイを『アップデート』するの」
Translation: "The universe will get an update patch."

Name: a3124.nss
Japanese: ――アップデート？
Translation: An... update patch...?

Name: a3124.nss
Japanese: 時々パソコンがインターネットに繋いでやる、あれだ。
Translation: Like the kind of thing a computer program would download off the internet?
KR: 가끔 컴퓨터가 인터넷에서 내려받는, 그걸 말하는 건가?

Name: a3124.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このままだと、ストーリーに、むりがあるの」
Translation: "The way things are going, the plot is going to break down."

Name: a3124.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ、ミユキ、むすばれないの」
Translation: "Shinichi and Miyuki won't end up together."

Name: a3124.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それは、よくないの」
Translation: "And that's no good."

Name: a3124.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから、セカイをかきかえるの」
Translation: "So Aoi will have God overwrite the universe."

Name: a3124.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキが、ネトラレないように」
Translation: "That way Miyuki will never end up with anyone else."

Name: a3124.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチいがいと、むすばれないように」
Translation: "That way you won't get cucked."

Name: a3124.nss
Japanese: "アオイを止める","アオイを止めない"
Translation: "Stop her","Let her do it"

Name: a3124a.nss
Japanese: もし本当に、このセカイに神様がいて――
Translation: Suppose there really is a God out there.
KR: 혹시 정말로 이 세계에 신님이 있고...

Name: a3124a.nss
Japanese: 運命が改められ、不可能が可能になるならば――
Translation: If He could change my fate... and make the impossible possible...

Name: a3124a.nss
Japanese: 引き替えに、カミサマは何を要求するのだろう――？
Translation: What would He ask for in return?

Name: a3124a.nss
Japanese: 俺は何を、差し出せば良いのだろう――？
Translation: What would I be forced to sacrifice?

Name: a3124a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「やめてくれ！」
Translation: "Stop! Please!"

Name: a3124a.nss
Japanese: このままだと、取り返しのつかない過ちを犯してしまうんじゃないか――
Translation: Panicking, I blurt the words out.
KR: 이대로는 돌이킬 수 없는 실수를 저지르는 게 아닐까...

Name: a3124a.nss
Japanese: そんな衝動が、俺を突き動かした。
Translation: Something inside my head tells me I need to stop her before she does something that can never be undone.

Name: a3124a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ……？」
Translation: "Shinichi...?"

Name: a3124a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「頼むから、やめてくれ」
Translation: "Seriously, please don't do this."

Name: a3124a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a3124a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「本当に、いいの？」
Translation: "Are you sure?"

Name: a3124a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このままだと、バッドエンドなの」
Translation: "You're headed for a bad ending right now."

Name: a3124a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それでいいの？」
Translation: "Is that really what you want?"

Name: a3124a.nss
Japanese: バッドエンドなわけがなかった。
Translation: Nothing about my life could be called a "bad ending."

Name: a3124a.nss
Japanese: 特別なことが起きなくても、毎日は楽しい。
Translation: Sure, it's nothing special, but it's still fun.

Name: a3124a.nss
Japanese: 美雪との距離が縮まらなくても、この関係さえ続けば、それ以上望むことはない。
Translation: I don't NEED to date Miyuki, either. Our existing friendship is already more than I could ever ask for.
KR: 미유키와 거리가 좁혀지지 않더라도, 이 관계만 이어진다면 더 바랄 것이 없다.

Name: a3124a.nss
Japanese: それは、本心だった。
Translation: That's the truth, plain and simple.

Name: a3124a.nss
Japanese: 俺は迷わず、返答する。
Translation: I don't even need to think twice about my answer.

Name: a3124a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今のままでいい」
Translation: "This is what I want."

Name: a3124a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「友達で、いいんだ」
Translation: "I'm happy just being friends."

Name: a3124a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ともだち――」
Translation: "Friends..."

Name: a3124a.nss
Japanese: アオイの呟きと同時――
Translation: Just as the word leaves her lips...

Name: a3124a.nss
Japanese: 我が目を疑うほどの早さで、空の渦が収まっていく。
Translation: ...the clouds clear away, right before my eyes.
KR: 내 눈을 의심할 정도의 속도로 소용돌이가 사라져 간다.

Name: a3124a.nss
Japanese: それが神様の仕業なのか、全然わからないけれど。
Translation: Was it an act of God? I honestly don't know.

Name: a3124a.nss
Japanese: 頼めば本当に、何かが起こるのかもしれないけど。
Translation: Maybe she really does have the power to change things.
KR: 부탁하면 정말로 무슨 일이 일어날지도 모르지만.

Name: a3124a.nss
Japanese: 今の俺に、奇跡は必要ない。
Translation: But I don't need any divine miracle.

Name: a3124a.nss
Japanese: ただこの毎日が、続いてくれさえすればいい。
Translation: I just want things to carry on like they always have.
KR: 그저 이런 하루하루가 계속되기만 하면 된다.

Name: a3124a.nss
Japanese: だから、これは白昼夢。
Translation: ...I'll tell myself this was all just a daydream.

Name: a3124a.nss
Japanese: 俺はただ、幻覚を見ていただけだ。
Translation: An illusion. A hallucination.
KR: 나는 단지 환각을 보고 있었을 뿐이다.

Name: a3124a.nss
Japanese: ……そうに決まっている。
Translation: I mean, what else could it have been?

Name: a3124a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪を迎えに行こう」
Translation: "Let's go find Miyuki."

Name: a3124b.nss
Japanese: 動こうとしたのに、できなかった。
Translation: I try to move, but I'm frozen in place.

Name: a3124b.nss
Japanese: 何故だろう？
Translation: What's the matter with me?

Name: a3124b.nss
Japanese: もしかしたら、俺は――
Translation: Do I...

Name: a3124b.nss
Japanese: アオイのカミサマを、信じたのかもしれない。
Translation: Do I actually believe in Aoi's God...?

Name: a3124b.nss
Japanese: 呼び出し音が、途切れて。
Translation: The ringing cuts off...

Name: a3124b.nss
Japanese: カミサマに、繋がる。
Translation: ...and God picks up.

Name: a3124b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「デンパ、とどいたの」
Translation: "My signal got through."

Name: a3124b.nss
Japanese: 空間に、穴が――
Translation: There's a tear in the fabric of space—

Name: a3124b.nss
Japanese: どこかともなく、生じ――
Translation: It opens out of nowhere—

Name: a3124b.nss
Japanese: やがて、侵食し――
Translation: —and begins to consume—

Name: a3124b.nss
Japanese: 影が剥げ――
Translation: The shadows peel away—

Name: a3124b.nss
Japanese: 色が消え――
Translation: The colors vanish—

Name: a3124b.nss
Japanese: ラフが踊り――
Translation: Sketches pitch and skew—

Name: a3124b.nss
Japanese: 線がバラバラになり――
Translation: The lines fade away—

Name: a3124b.nss
Japanese: セカイが――
Translation: The whole world is—

Name: a3124b.nss
Japanese: バグっていく。
Translation: —starting to glitch—!

Name: a3124b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このなかのゲーム、カイゾウして、シンイチとミユキとむすばれるようにしたの」
Translation: "The game has been recoded so that you and Miyuki can be together."

Name: a3124b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ぜったいに、ネトラレないようにしたの」
Translation: "Now you'll never, ever be cucked."

Name: a3124b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「かいぞうしたゲームを、セカイに、ドウキする」
Translation: "Next, the patched game will be synced with the universe."

Name: a3124b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セカイを、アップデートする」
Translation: "Then the update will be complete."

Name: a3124b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なに、バカなこと――」
Translation: "Quit with that nonsense already..."

Name: a3124b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ほんとう」
Translation: "It's the truth."

Name: a3124b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このセカイは、ゲームなの」
Translation: "This world is a video game."

Name: a3125.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うん」
Translation: "Okay."

Name: a3125.nss
Japanese: アオイが笑顔で返答する――と。
Translation: Just as Aoi smiles—

Name: a3125.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?"

Name: a3125.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょっ！！」
Translation: "Whoa!"

Name: a3125.nss
Japanese: 彼女の身体が微かに傾ぐ。
Translation: Her body tumbles sideways.

Name: a3125.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、大丈夫か？」
Translation: "You okay?"

Name: a3125.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でんち、きれかけなの？」
Translation: "Is my battery dying?"

Name: a3125.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「やっぱり、具合悪いじゃないか。今日は中止して――」
Translation: "I could tell you weren't feeling so hot. Let's call off our plans and—"

Name: a3125.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だいじょうぶなの」
Translation: "Aoi's fine."

Name: a3125.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、バッティングセンターいくの」
Translation: "Let's go to the batting cages."

Name: a3125.nss
Japanese: アオイの瞳は、揺るぎない。
Translation: There's no hesitation in her eyes.

Name: a3125.nss
Japanese: まあ、昨日は期待で眠れなかったみたいだし……
Translation: She DID mention she was really excited to go... So excited she didn't get much sleep...
KR: 뭐, 어젯밤에 너무 기대해서 잠을 못 자기도 했고...

Name: a3125.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いいか？　具合悪くなったら、俺に言うんだぞ」
Translation: "Alright... But you better tell me if you start feeling sick, got it?"

Name: a3125.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「わかったの」
Translation: "Got it."

Name: a3125.nss
Japanese: 頷いて、アオイはよろよろとハシゴへと向かう。
Translation: She nods and stumbles over to the ladder.
KR: 아오이는 고개를 끄덕이고 비틀비틀 사다리를 향했다.

Name: a3125.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はやく、ミユキをむかえにいくの」
Translation: "Let's hurry and find Miyuki."

Name: a3125a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……って、なんか進んでるけど」
Translation: "Wait... Some weird video's playing on your phone..."

Name: a3125a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、アオイ」
Translation: "Hey, Aoi!"

Name: a3125a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる……シンイチ？」
Translation: "Boop boop... Shinichi?"

Name: a3125a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「またゲーム、落としてるぞ」
Translation: "You dropped your phone again!"

Name: a3125a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「大事なものなんだろ？
　ちゃんと持っておけよ」
Translation: "If you don't want to risk losing it, you need to make sure you hold onto it!"

Name: a3126.nss
Japanese: 体育館に向かう途中、メールが届いているのに気付く。
Translation: On our way to the gym, I notice an unread email in my inbox.
KR: 체육관에 가던 중, 메일이 와 있는 걸 깨달았다.

Name: a3126.nss
Japanese: 携帯でそれを確認すると――
Translation: I open it up to find—

Name: a3126.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お、ああ、写真！」
Translation: "Oh, hey, it's that group photo from before!"

Name: a3126.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ホラ、俺たちが３人で撮ったアレ」
Translation: "Remember? The one with you, me, and Miyuki?"

Name: a3126.nss
Japanese: アオイがメールで送ったと言っていたが、一向に届かなかったあの写真だ。
Translation: Aoi claimed she'd emailed it to me forever ago, but for some reason I only just got it.
KR: 아오이가 메일로 보냈다고 했는데, 전혀 오지 않았던 사진이다.

Name: a3126.nss
Japanese: だいぶ時間が経って、俺もすっかり忘れていた。
Translation: It's been so long, I totally forgot about it.
KR: 꽤 시간이 지나서 나도 까맣게 잊고 있었다.

Name: a3126.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「さっきのデンパ、とどいたの」
Translation: "It must have sent earlier when my signal went through."

Name: a3126.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん、そっか」
Translation: "Oh, right."

Name: a3126.nss
Japanese: 電波、届くことも……あるんだな。
Translation: I guess her phone actually DOES work on occasion.

Name: a3126.nss
Japanese: どっちにせよ圏外が多くて、使い物にならないけど。
Translation: Not often enough to actually be useful, though...
KR: 어차피 권외일 때가 많아서 별로 쓸모는 없지만.

Name: a3126.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「データのセーブもしたの」
Translation: "Aoi made a new save file, too."

Name: a3126.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから、バッドエンドになっても、あんしん」
Translation: "Now there's no need to worry about any bad endings."

Name: a3126.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ、セーブ……ね」
Translation: "Uh... Right..."

Name: a3126.nss
Japanese: 俺は小さく、溜息をつく。
Translation: I sigh to myself.

Name: a3126.nss
Japanese: 相変わらず、彼女のゲーム脳は治っていないらしかった。
Translation: Apparently her gamer brain isn't going anywhere fast.
KR: 여전히 아오이의 게임 뇌는 낫지 않은 모양이었다.

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「こんばんは……」
Translation: "Hello...?"

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「あ……ご、ごめんなさいっ！！」
Translation: "Oh... I... I'm so sorry!"

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: a3131.nss
Japanese: 体育館に入るなり、演劇部の後輩にいきなり謝られた。
Translation: Right as I walk in the door, I get an impromptu apology from that first-year girl.
KR: 체육관에 들어가자마자 연극부 후배가 갑자기 사과했다.

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「わ、私、須々木先輩を見て、急に、近づかれたりしたから、それでこわくなって！」
Translation: "I... I saw you walking over, and it was all so fast, and I got scared...!"
KR: "저... 스스키 선배를 보고, 갑자기 다가와서, 그래서 무서웠어요...!"

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「こわくなった？」
Translation: "Was it something I did?"

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「ええと、この前の時の話で！　急に来て、こんなところ見られちゃって、私、どうしたらいいか――！！」
Translation: "No, no... umm... At the time, I was just so panicked... y'know, being seen like this... and I didn't know what to do, so I...!"
KR: "그게... 저번에 말이에요! 갑자기 오셔서 이런 모습을 보여버려서, 저... 어떻게 하면 좋을지...!"

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「エッチなめ？」
Translation: "Was he ogling you?"

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「あ、そうじゃなくて……」
Translation: "Huh? No, no..."

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だよな。そんなにジロジロ見てないよな」
Translation: "Of course not! See? She knows I wasn't being creepy!"

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ、きらわれたの？」
Translation: "Maybe she just doesn't like you?"

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「違います！」
Translation: "That's not true!"

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「じゃあ、すきなの？」
Translation: "So you DO like him?"

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese:
「す、すすすすす、好き！？　好きとか！　そんなわけ！
　嫌い！　嫌いです！　大ッ嫌いです！！」
Translation:
"Wh... wha... L-L-L-L-LIKE him?! Fat chance! As if!
I hate him! Yeah, that's right! I hate his guts!"
KR:
"조, 조조조조, 좋아한다!? 좋아한다니! 그렇지 않아요!
싫어요! 싫어해요! 진심으로 싫어해요!"

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Translation: "Oh... uh... uhhhh...!"

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「ご――ゴメンナサイッッ！！！！」
Translation: "I... I'M SORRY!!!"

Name: a3131.nss
Japanese: 頭を下げるやいなや、脱兎の如く逃げ出す。
Translation: A split-second later, she takes off like a bat out of hell.

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「あうっ！」
Translation: "Oww!"

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ころんだの」
Translation: "Looks like she fell."

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だな」
Translation: "Yep."

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ドジっこなの」
Translation: "She's a klutz."

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だな」
Translation: "Yep."

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちょっと、またハルちゃんいじめて！」
Translation: "HEY! What are you doing, picking on Haru-chan again?!"

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いじめてない」
Translation: "We weren't picking on her!"

Name: a3131.nss
Japanese: むしろ俺が色々酷いことを言われた気がする。
Translation: If anything, I'm pretty sure I'm the victim here!
KR: 오히려 내가 심한 말 들은 것 같은데.

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ビクビクしすぎだろ。アレで演劇部なのか？」
Translation: "Man... You sure a delicate little flower like her can handle being in a play?"

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「本番は、いいお芝居するのよ。
　見た目もかなり可愛いしね」
Translation:
"She's actually really talented.
And she's got the looks to boot."
KR:
"실전에선 좋은 연기를 보여줘. 
생김새도 꽤 귀엽고."

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ、フられてショックなの？」
Translation: "Shinichi, you're just upset you got turned down."

Name: a3131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「フられてないし、そもそも告白もしてない」
Translation: "She can't turn down a confession I never made!"

Name: a3131.nss
Japanese: それにしても、彼女がどんな芝居をするのか、かえって興味が湧いてきたな……
Translation: That said, I wouldn't mind seeing her perform sometime...
KR: 그보다, 저 애가 어떤 연기를 보여줄지 궁금해졌다.

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ここが、バッティングセンターなの？」
Translation: "So this is where the batting cages are?"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうよ」
Translation: "Sure is."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ボロいの」
Translation: "It's all run-down."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺たちがちっちゃい頃から、ずっとボロかった」
Translation: "It's been this way ever since we were kids."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「言われてみれば、確かにそうね」
Translation: "Actually, that's true, come to think of it."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ちっちゃいころから、いっしょにきたの？」
Translation: "You two used to come here together as kids?"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一に連れてきてもらって、ね」
Translation: "More like Shinichi would drag me here, but yeah."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「まあな」
Translation: "Yeah, I guess you could say that."

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 小遣いが足りなかったけど、店のおじさんと仲良くなって、サービスしてもらったりして。
Translation: We'd always run out of allowance money, but the guy in charge took a liking to us and would let us play for free now and then.

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 俺たちは時々、バッティングセンターに通った。
Translation: From there, the batting cages quickly became our usual hangout spot.
KR: 용돈은 부족했지만 가게 아저씨랑 친해져서 서비스도 받았다.

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「さあ、早速始めましょう！」
Translation: "Now then, let's get started!"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はいなの」
Translation: "Okay!"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Hyah—!"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "...Boop boop?"

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 空を切るバット。
Translation: The bat cuts through empty air.

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: アオイは不思議そうに、首を傾げる。
Translation: Aoi tilts her head in puzzlement.

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あたらない？」
Translation: "Aoi missed?"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「代わってご覧なさい。
　私がお手本、見せてあげる」
Translation:
"Here, watch me.
I'll show you how it's done."

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: バットを受け取った美雪は、バッターボックスで小さく２回素振りをすると――
Translation: Miyuki takes the bat from Aoi and steps into the batter's box. After two practice swings, the ball erupts forth—
KR: 방망이를 넘겨받은 미유키는 타자석에서 가볍게 두어 번 휘두르더니...

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「すごいの……！」

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 目の覚めるような打球が、ネットに突き刺さる。
Translation: —and the next second, she sends it rocketing into the safety net.

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どこが違うか、わかる？」
Translation: "Can you tell what I'm doing differently?"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、かっこいいの」
Translation: "Miyuki, you're so cool..."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、かっこよくないの」
Translation: "Aoi's not cool at all."

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 溜息をつく美雪。
Translation: Miyuki heaves a sigh.

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それじゃ、どうすればいいと思う」
Translation: "Okay, well, what do you think it is you're missing?"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、せ、たりないの」
Translation: "Height. Aoi's too short."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「かわいさでショウブなの」
Translation: "Can't compete with Miyuki's beauty."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そういう勝負じゃないから」
Translation: "This isn't a pageant!"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一、どうにかならない？」
Translation: "Shinichi, help me out here!"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「んん……そうだな」
Translation: "Hmm... Let's see..."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「まず、ボールをよく見たらどうだ？」
Translation: "For starters, try to keep your eye on the ball."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ボール？」
Translation: "Keep my eye on the ball...?"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「打つとき、視線が離れてるからな。
　直前までじっくり見る」
Translation:
"You're not looking at it when you swing.
This time, try watching it and see what happens."
KR:
"칠 때 시선이 떨어져 있어서 그래.
치기 직전까지 눈을 떼지 마."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる」
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: アオイがバットを受け取り、バッターボックスへ。
Translation: Aoi takes the bat and heads to the batter's box.
KR: 아오이는 방망이를 받아 들고 타석에 섰다.

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「……みたの」
Translation: "...I watched it."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「って、見ただけじゃダメでしょ！？」
Translation: "You have to do more than that, you goof!"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「いや、最初はそれでいいんだ。
　ちゃんと怖がらず、球を見られてるだろ？」
Translation:
"No, it's a good first step.
We want her to get comfortable with the ball."
KR:
"아니, 처음엔 그래도 괜찮아.
겁먹지 않고 공을 보고 있잖아?"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「バントってわかるか？
　バット、前に出したままでいいから」
Translation:
"Why don't you start with a bunt?
Just hold the bat out in front of you."
KR:
"번트라고 알아?
앞에 갖다 놓기만 해도 돼."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「こうなの？」
Translation: "Like this?"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そう。よく見て、軌跡にバットを合わせて――」
Translation: "That's it. Keep your eye on the ball and match the bat to its trajectory."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「よく見て――」
Translation: "Eye on the ball..."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あわせ――」
Translation: "Match the trajectory..."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる！」
Translation: "Boop boop!"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あ……あたったの」
Translation: "Oh... A-Aoi hit it..."

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: ボテボテのゴロだが、なんとかボールは前に転がった。
Translation: It wasn't much of a "hit"—more like the world's weakest ground ball—but I'll take it.
KR: 툭 떨어지는 땅볼이었지만, 간신히 공은 앞으로 굴러갔다.

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「な？　言ったとおりだろ」
Translation: "See? What'd I tell you?"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい！」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ、めいコーチなの」
Translation: "Shinichi, you're a great coach!"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ、ああ。どうも」
Translation: "Th-Thanks, I guess."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「もういっかいなの」
Translation: "Lemme try again."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ボールを、よく見る――」
Translation: "Keep my eye on the ball..."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るるっ！！」
Translation: "Boop boop!!!"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「すごい……また、あたるの」
Translation: "Amazing... Another hit..."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それじゃ次は、バットを振ってみるか」
Translation: "This time, how about you try swinging?"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる！」
Translation: "Boop boop!"

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: よろよろとスイングしたバットに、ボールがかする。
Translation: The ball grazes against her ungainly swing. Foul ball.

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: ファウルだが、確かに進歩はしているようだ。
Translation: Still, she's definitely making progress.
KR: 파울이지만, 확실히 점차 나아지는 것 같다.

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「相変わらず、教えるの上手いわね」
Translation: "You've always been a great teacher, you know."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「大したことは言えないけどな」
Translation: "Eh, I wouldn't say I'm anything special."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちっちゃい頃からの才能よ」
Translation: "It's a talent you've had since grade school."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうか？」
