Translation: "You think so?"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私は覚えてる」
Translation: "Trust me, I remember."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「何回も、日記を読み返したから」
Translation: "I've re-read my diary countless times."

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 本当は俺も、覚えてる。
Translation: Truth be told, I remember it too.

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 今からは想像もつかないが、初めてバットを握った美雪は、アオイよりも一回り酷いへっぴり腰で。
Translation: Looking at her now, you'd never picture it... but back when Miyuki first started, she sucked even worse than Aoi.
KR: 지금은 상상할 수도 없지만, 처음에 방망이를 쥔 미유키는 아오이보다 한층 더 엉거주춤한 자세였고.

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 俺は得意になって、美雪に野球を教えたのだ。
Translation: I was the one who taught her how to swing.
KR: 나는 신이 나서 미유키에게 야구를 가르쳤었다.

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる！」
Translation: "Boop boop!"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "It flew...?"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「前に、とんだの！」
Translation: "It flew!"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、見たぞ」
Translation: "It sure did! I saw the whole thing."

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 無邪気な笑顔を見せるアオイ。
Translation: Aoi's smile is genuine and pure.

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 美雪も小さな頃は、ああやって喜んだ気がする。
Translation: I vaguely remember Miyuki smiling like that way back when.
KR: 미유키도 어렸을 때는 저렇게 기뻐했던 것 같은데.

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ここで野球を教わったから、演劇で主役が掴めたの」
Translation: "If you hadn't taught me baseball here all those years ago, I never would have landed this role."
KR: "여기서 야구를 배웠기 때문에 연극 주역을 따낼 수 있었어."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前が努力したからだろ」
Translation: "Hey, c'mon. You got the part through your own efforts."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「違う」
Translation: "Not true."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「きっかけをくれたのは、いつも、心一よ」
Translation: "You're the one who gave me the opportunity. As usual."

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: そういう美雪は努力を続け、今や遙か遠く。
Translation: Years of diligent hard work, and look where she is now.
KR: 그런 미유키는 계속 노력해서 지금은 한참 먼 곳에 있고.

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: スタートが近かった分だけ、ふたりの距離は遠い。
Translation: We may have started off on equal footing, but now we're miles apart.
KR: 출발점이 가까웠던 만큼 두 사람의 거리는 벌어졌다.

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あれ――昔のままだね」
Translation: "I see that old thing's still around, hm?"

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 美雪がネットの先を指す。
Translation: She points to the safety net.

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 「ホームラン」「三塁打」「二塁打」「ヒット」
Translation: The net is adorned with a series of targets: "Hit," "Double," "Triple," and "Home Run."

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 当たるとサービス券が当たる、的があった。
Translation: Hit these targets and you'll win free play coupons.

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 記憶が蘇る。
Translation: Man, that takes me back...

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 小さい頃、俺と美雪が一緒にやった遊び。
Translation: When we were little, Miyuki and I would always challenge each other to a game.
KR: 어릴 적 나랑 미유키가 같이했던 놀이.

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: どっちが荷物を持って帰るかを賭け、よく勝負した。
Translation: Whoever missed the most shots would have to carry both bookbags all the way home.
KR: 누가 가방을 들고 가느냐를 걸고 자주 대결했었다.

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 当たったことなんて、数えるくらいしかないけど。
Translation: Mind you, we almost never hit those targets...

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: それでも俺たちは、一生懸命、的を狙ったのだ。
Translation: But that didn't stop us from trying.
KR: 그래도 우리는 최선을 다해 과녁을 노렸다.

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私、もう１回、心一が打ってるところ、見たいな」
Translation: "I sure would like to see you take a swing, like old times."
KR: "나 다시 한번 신이치가 치는 거 보고 싶어."

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 美雪はそう、呟いた。
Translation: Her voice is a whisper.

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 俺は答えない。
Translation: But I don't answer her.

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 答えたくない。
Translation: I don't have it in me.

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 無言で、遠くを見つめるだけ。
Translation: Instead, I stare silently into the distance.
KR: 말없이 먼 곳을 바라보고 있을 뿐.

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: もしここで答えたら、これまで築いてきた３人の関係が、一気に崩れてしまう――
Translation: Deep down, something tells me...
KR: 여기서 대답하면, 이제까지 쌓아온 세 사람의 관계가 단번에 무너져 버린다...

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: なんだか、そんな気がした。
Translation: ...if I respond to that request, it'll destroy everything the three of us have built.

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる！」
Translation: "Boop boop!"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……上達早いわね」
Translation: "...You're certainly a fast learner, hmm?"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「コーチ、てんさいなの」
Translation: "All thanks to my master coach."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「これで、美雪ともいい勝負かな？」
Translation: "Maybe you stand a chance of beating Miyuki now."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ショウブ？　たたかうの？」
Translation: "Beating her? In a fight?"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「じゃあ、３人で賭けでもしましょうか？」
Translation: "Why don't we make a little bet?"

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 美雪は、バットでネットの的を指す。
Translation: Miyuki points at the targets with the bat.

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「順番にボールを打って、一番的に近かった人の言うことを、聞かなきゃいけない」
Translation: "We'll each take turns swinging the bat, and the person who hits their ball the closest to the target gets to tell the other two what to do."
KR: "순서대로 공을 쳐서 과녁에 가장 가까웠던 사람의 명령을 듣는 거야."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もちろん、球速にはハンデをつけるわ」
Translation: "We can put a handicap on the ball speed to make it fair."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どう？　やってみない？」
Translation: "How about it? Wanna give it a try?"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「やるの！」
Translation: "Yes!"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「かって、シンイチとミユキがこいびとに――」
Translation: "If Aoi wins, Shinichi and Miyuki have to get tog—"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だめだ」
Translation: "No."

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 俺ははっきり、アオイの言葉を遮った。
Translation: I shoot her down firmly.

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ、もう疲れたろ？」
Translation: "Aoi, aren't you tired after all that?"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「元々体調良くなかったんだから。
　今日はここら辺で帰る――」
Translation:
"I know you weren't feeling 100% today.
Let's call it a day and go home—"
KR:
"원래도 몸이 안 좋았으니까.
오늘은 이쯤에서 그만..."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「逃げるの？
　またそうやって適当に言い訳つけて」
Translation: "What, you chicken? I see you've invented another one of your convenient excuses to get out of it."
KR:
"도망치는 거야?
또 그렇게 적당히 핑계나 대고."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、それでいいよ」
Translation: "Sure, whatever, let's go with that."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「よくない！」
Translation: "It's NOT WHATEVER!"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 美雪が珍しく、声を荒げた。
Translation: It's not like Miyuki to scream like that.

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「前は、そうじゃなかった」
Translation: "You know, you never used to be like this."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一、何を怖がってるの？」
Translation: "Shinichi, what is it you're so afraid of?"

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「別に、何も怖がってなんかないよ」
Translation: "I'm not 'afraid' of anything."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「無駄な争いが嫌なだけだし」
Translation: "I just don't like pointless conflict."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「嘘つき」
Translation: "Liar."

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 美雪の指摘はたぶん図星で。
Translation: She's absolutely right.

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: だからこそ、俺は怒る気力も湧かない。
Translation: I can't even find it in me to get mad about it.

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんにせよ、アオイが調子悪いのは事実だし」
Translation: "Fact of the matter is, Aoi isn't feeling her best."
KR: "어쨌든 아오이 상태가 안 좋은 건 사실이잖아."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そんなこと――るる？」
Translation: "That's not—boop boop?"

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 反論しようと足を踏み出したアオイが、よろける。
Translation: Aoi tries to argue, but staggers sideways.

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ほら、やっぱり」
Translation: "See? Told you."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop..."

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 困ったように呟くアオイ。
Translation: She frowns to herself.

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「じゃあ、帰るぞ」
Translation: "Alright, let's get out of here."

Name: a3141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい」
Translation: "Okay."

Name: a3141.nss
Japanese: 未だ美雪は納得がいかない顔つきだったが、俺は構わず、先導するようにバッティングセンターを出た。
Translation: Miyuki still doesn't look convinced, but I ignore her and lead the way out of the building.
KR: 미유키는 아직 납득하지 못한 얼굴이었지만, 나는 개의치 않고 먼저 야구연습장을 나섰다.

Name: a3151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「機嫌、直せよ」
Translation: "C'mon, don't be mad."

Name: a3151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「普通だけど」
Translation: "I'm not mad."

Name: a3151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どこが」
Translation: "This is your idea of not mad?"

Name: a3151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイの具合が悪いことぐらい、私にもわかるわよ」
Translation: "Look, I get it, okay? I know Aoi's not feeling good."
KR: "아오이가 몸이 안 좋은 건 나도 알아."

Name: a3151.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るるる……る……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop... boop..."

Name: a3151.nss
Japanese: アオイは、いつにも増して心許ない足取りで夜道を歩く。
Translation: Here under the starry night sky, Aoi's gait is even more unsteady than usual.
KR: 아오이는 그 어느 때보다 불안한 발걸음으로 밤길을 걸었다.

Name: a3151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「わかったわ」
Translation: "Fine, whatever."

Name: a3151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「機嫌、直すから。その代わり、ね」
Translation: "I'll stop being mad... IF..."

Name: a3151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……相談にのってくれる？」
Translation: "...you give me some advice."

Name: a3151.nss
Japanese: 嫌な予感がした。
Translation: I have a really bad feeling about this.

Name: a3151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「この前の話、か？」
Translation: "Is it about... that thing from before?"

Name: a3151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それに近い、かな」
Translation: "Somewhere in that ballpark, I guess."

Name: a3151.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「こいのそうだんなの？」
Translation: "Boy troubles?"

Name: a3151.nss
Japanese: 突然会話に割り込むアオイ。
Translation: Aoi cuts in.

Name: a3151.nss
Japanese: 美雪は慌てて、否定する。
Translation: Miyuki flinches in alarm.

Name: a3151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「演劇のことよ、演劇の！」
Translation: "N-No! It's about the PLAY!"

Name: a3151.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「チューのはなし？」
Translation: "About the kiss?"

Name: a3151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Wait, what?!"

Name: a3151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一、話したの？」
Translation: "Shinichi, you TOLD her?"

Name: a3151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ……えっと……」
Translation: "Oh, uhhhh..."

Name: a3151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「誰にも話さないでって、頼んだわよね？」
Translation: "Didn't you promise you wouldn't tell anyone?"

Name: a3151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「信頼したから、話したのに！」
Translation: "How could you? I trusted you!"

Name: a3151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ごめん。でも……友達だから、いいかと思って」
Translation: "I'm sorry... I just... thought it would be okay since we're all friends."

Name: a3151.nss
Japanese: 今にも破裂しそうなほど膨らんだ、美雪の感情。
Translation: Miyuki looks like she's ready to explode.
KR: 금방이라도 폭발할 것 같이 부풀어 오른 미유키의 감정.

Name: a3151.nss
Japanese: 俺は助けを求めるように、アオイを見るが――
Translation: Desperate, I look to Aoi for help.

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Oh!"

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: アオイは、明後日の方向を向いていた。
Translation: She's not paying attention.

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はこなの！」
Translation: "There's a box!"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「箱だな」
Translation: "That... sure is a box, yep..."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それがどうした――」
Translation: "And? What about i—"

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 箱の中から響く可愛らしい鳴き声。
Translation: Just then, we hear a tiny meow from inside.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 美雪の怒りが、一瞬でかき消えた。
Translation: Just like that, Miyuki's fury evaporates.

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あけるの」
Translation: "Time to open it."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちょっと、やめなさ――！」
Translation: "Wait! Don't you d—"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「きゃっ！」
Translation: "Aaah!"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ねこなの？」
Translation: "Is it a kitty?"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「猫だな」
Translation: "That... sure is a cat, yep..."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「み、見てない！　見てないわ！」
Translation: "I... I'm not looking! I'M NOT LOOKING!"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「しかも、まだちっちゃな黒猫」
Translation: "A teeny tiny little black kitten."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あれ？　額の所の白い模様……」
Translation: "Oh, wait, there's a streak of white on its forehead..."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「かみなりみたいなの」
Translation: "Looks like a thunderbolt."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そ、そんな詳細な解説！」
Translation: "Y-You don't have to describe it to me!"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「エルのかお、みるの？」
Translation: "Eru! Let's show Miyuki your little face!"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ああ、もう名前まで――！」
Translation: "Oh god, don't NAME IT!"

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 悲鳴のような声を上げながら目を隠し続ける美雪に、アオイは抱いた子猫を近づける。
Translation: Miyuki shrieks, her face buried in her hands, as Aoi lifts the kitten in her direction.
KR: 비명 같은 소리를 지르며 계속 눈을 가리고 있는 미유키에게 아오이는 고양이를 안고 가까이 다가갔다.

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いやなの？」
Translation: "Don't you wanna see?"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うわっ！　お願い、やめて――」
Translation: "Aaagh! Please don't!"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「かわいいの」
Translation: "Look at the cute kitten."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「せいぎ！」
Translation: "Cute is justice!"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「見たくない！　私は何も見たくな――」
Translation: "I don't want to! I don't want to see anyth—"
KR: "보고 싶지 않아! 나는 아무것도 보고 싶..."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「くしゅん！」
Translation: "Aachoo!"

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: と、凄まじいくしゃみをした拍子に、顔を覆っていた美雪の両手が外れ――
Translation: She sneezes hard, and the force of it pulls her face back from her hands.
KR: 그렇게 엄청난 재채기를 하는 순간, 얼굴을 덮고 있던 양손이 벌어져...

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「みえたの」
Translation: "She saw."

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 見開いた美雪の視線が、黒猫を捉えた。
Translation: Miyuki's wide-eyed stare is transfixed on the kitten.
KR: 미유키는 눈을 부릅뜨고 고양이에 시선을 고정했다.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 今にも食いつかんばかりの勢いで見つめた。
Translation: She looks like she might tackle it at any moment...

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "It's so... so..."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「可愛――はっくしょん！」
Translation: "So cu—aaaachoo!"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる……？　かぜなの？」
Translation: "Boop boop...? Are you sick?"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アレルギーなだけよ」
Translation: "I'm just allergic, that's all."

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 美雪は鼻を啜りながら否定する。
Translation: Miyuki sniffs.

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「ネコなんて、飼えるわけないわ。
　ほら、心一？　行くわよ」
Translation:
"Sadly, I could never own a cat.
C'mon, Shinichi, let's go."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh? But..."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「まつの」
Translation: "Wait!"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんの真似だ？」
Translation: "The hell do you think you're doing?"

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: いつの間にかアオイの頭には、あの猫雑貨店で買った着ぐるみの耳が乗っていた。
Translation: I take my eyes off her for two seconds and now she's wearing the cat ears from her onesie...
KR: 어느새 아오이의 머리에는 고양이 가게에서 산 인형 귀가 있었다.

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おやねこなの」
Translation: "I'm the mommy cat."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺の知ってる猫は人語を解さない」
Translation: "Nice try. Cats don't talk. They meow."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: アオイは、少し困ったように俯いてから――
Translation: Aoi frowns down at herself for a moment.
KR: 아오이는 조금 곤란한 듯 고개를 숙이더니...

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おやねこにゃの」
Translation: "Meow! I'm the mommy cat."

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: そう、俺には確かに見覚えがある。
Translation: I remember this...
KR: 그래, 이 광경 본 기억이 있어...

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: これ……あのゲームで見た光景そっくりだ。
Translation: This same exact thing happened in that game, too...
KR: 이거... 그 게임에서 본 거랑 똑같아.

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ねこまんまで、ねこずき、わかったのにゃ」
Translation: "That day we went to Catnip, Aoi realized you're a super mega cat fanatic, meow!"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、きょうりょく、するのにゃ」
Translation: "That's why you're going to help me, Miyuki! Purrrr!"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「断るわ」
Translation: "I refuse."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?"

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 美雪の反応は、耳を疑ってしまうほどに冷徹だった。
Translation: Miyuki's tone is surprisingly icy.
KR: 미유키의 반응은 귀를 의심할 정도로 차가웠다.

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「貴方、ペットを飼う場所なんてあるの？
　マンガ喫茶に動物持ち込めないわよ？」
Translation:
"Do you have a place for this cat to live?
The manga cafe doesn't allow pets, you know."
KR:
"너, 애완동물 키울 곳은 있어?
만화방에는 동물을 데리고 갈 수 없어."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それは……」

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「それじゃ、保護者の所に帰る？
　頭を下げて、猫を飼ってもらえる？」
Translation:
"Are you going back to your parents' house, then?
Will you beg them to let you both stay?"
KR:
"그럼, 부모님한테 돌아갈 거야?
머리 숙이고 고양이 좀 키워달라고?"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる……でも、ミユキ」
Translation: "Boop boop... But Miyuki..."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「こういうのは、ひろわないとバッドルートに――」
Translation: "If we choose not to rescue the kitten, we'll trigger the bad ending route, and—"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「友達として、忠告するわ！」
Translation: "I'm warning you now, as your friend."

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 美雪の顔が、一際不機嫌に歪む。
Translation: Miyuki's countenance contorts viciously.

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ここはゲームの世界じゃない」
Translation: "This isn't a game."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もし貴方がネコを拾ったりしたなら――」
Translation: "If you try to adopt that cat..."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「絶交よ！！」
Translation: "I'm cutting ties with you!"

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 颯爽と踵を返す、美雪。
Translation: Just like that, Miyuki turns smartly on her heel and stalks away.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 月の光に影となって、長い髪が舞った。
Translation: Her long hair flutters in the moonlight as she disappears into the darkness of night.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 子猫の呼びかけに、振り返ることもない。
Translation: The kitten meows after her, but she doesn't turn back.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 暗闇の中に、美雪の背中が消えていく。
Translation: Moments later, she's gone.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 突然の彼女の行動に、俺は、身動きも取れない。
Translation: It was all so sudden, I had no time to react...
KR: 갑작스러운 미유키의 행동에 나는 아무것도 할 수 없었다.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: ただ、その後ろ姿を見送るだけ……
Translation: All I could do was watch her go.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: ――彼女がちゃんと現実に向き合えるようにする。
Translation: Meanwhile, the memory of our conversation floats through my head.
KR: 아오이가 제대로 현실을 마주 볼 수 있도록 해준다.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: ――それが、自分たちが彼女にしてやるべきこと。
Translation: —"I want to help her come to terms with her reality."

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 美雪の言葉が、脳裏に蘇る。
Translation: —"And I think that's the best thing we can do for her."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ゼッコウなの？」
Translation: "Cutting ties?"

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: ネコミミを取ったアオイの視線が、宙を泳ぐ。
Translation: Aoi's gaze wanders into the distance as she takes off her cat ears.
KR: 고양이 귀를 단 아오이의 시선이 허공을 맴돈다.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: いつも、空の遙か彼方を見通すあの視線とは違う。
Translation: But this isn't her usual absentminded gaze.
KR: 항상 하늘 저편을 바라보던 것과는 다른 시선이었다.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 必死で掴まるものを探して、しかしなにも見つからないような、心細げな視線――
Translation: Instead, she seems to be searching desperately for something she can't quite track down...
KR: 필사적으로 시선 둘 곳을 찾지만, 찾지 못하는 듯한 불안한 시선...

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「大丈夫か？」
Translation: "You alright?"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ、おしえて」
Translation: "Shinichi, explain to me..."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ゼッコウって、なんなの？」
Translation: "What does 'cutting ties' mean?"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「友達をやめて、もう話したりしないってことかな……」
Translation: "Well... I imagine it means she'll stop being friends with you, or maybe stop talking to you at all..."
KR: "더 이상 말도 안 하고, 친구가 아니게 된다는 거라고 할까..."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ともだちを……やめるの？」
Translation: "She's gonna stop... being my friend?"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキは、アオイが、きらいなの？」
Translation: "Does she hate me?"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうじゃないよ」
Translation: "No, she doesn't hate you."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも、ゼッコウって――」
Translation: "But if she's gonna cut ties..."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あの性格だから、ちょっと口が滑っただけだって」
Translation: "Knowing her, she just snapped and lashed out a little harder than she meant to."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 呟いて、そのまま黙り込んでしまうアオイ。
Translation: Aoi falls silent.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 屋上で写真を撮り脅迫が失敗したときとは、明らかに反応が違っていた。
Translation: But her emotional reaction is noticeably different compared to the time she attempted to "blackmail" us with that photo.
KR: 옥상에서 사진 협박이 실패했을 때와는 확연히 다른 반응이다.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: そんな彼女を、それ以上黙って見ていられない。
Translation: ...I have to do something.
KR: 그런 아오이를 더 이상 가만히 보고 있을 수가 없었다.

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「猫、俺の家で飼おうか？」
Translation: "We could keep the kitten at my place."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「一軒家だし。親もいないし。
　こういうとき、ひとり暮らしは便利――」
Translation:
"It's a big house, and my parents aren't around.
Turns out living alone has its perks!"
KR:
"단독 주택이고 부모님도 지금 안 계셔.
이럴 때 혼자 사는 게 도움이..."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ガッコウにいるときはいえにひと、いないの」
Translation: "But Eru would be left alone whenever we're at school."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「しんぱいなの」
Translation: "That's not safe."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...Yeah... Fair point."

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: まだ幼いこの黒猫をずっと家においておくのは、やはり気が咎めてしまう。
Translation: Admittedly, I wouldn't feel comfortable leaving such a small kitten to fend for itself for hours at a time.
KR: 아직 어린 고양이를 집에 계속 두는 것도 마음에 안 내킨다.

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい」
Translation: "Got it."

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: アオイが、そっと、手を挙げる。
Translation: Aoi quietly raises her hand.

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「アオイ、ミユキのともだちなの。
　やっと、ともだちになったの」
Translation:
"It took a long time, but...
Aoi is Miyuki's friend now."
KR:
"아오이, 미유키랑 친구인 거야.
겨우 친구가 됐어."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ゼッコウ、いやなの」
Translation: "And Aoi doesn't want to have to cut ties."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから……かえないの」
Translation: "So... the kitten will have to stay here."

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 先日の帰りがけ、美雪は認めた。
Translation: I remember what Miyuki said on our way home the other day.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: アオイは、昔の自分に似ていると。
Translation: She admitted that she saw her old self in Aoi.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: もしもただのクラスメイトなら、決してこんなことは言わなかっただろう。
Translation: And if this were any regular classmate, she would never have threatened to cut ties.
KR: 만약 평범한 친구였다면 이런 말은 절대 하지 않았겠지.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 適当に話を合わせて、笑顔で振る舞っていただろう。
Translation: She wouldn't have risked making waves.
KR: 웃는 얼굴로 적당히 말을 맞춰줬을 것이다.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 面倒なイベントには首を突っ込まなかっただろう。
Translation: She would have just smiled and played nice, no matter what.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: でも、美雪はそうしなかった。
Translation: And yet when it came to Aoi, Miyuki didn't play nice.

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いいんだな？」
Translation: "You sure?"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "...Yeah."

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 足元に寄り添う子猫を、優しく、段ボールに戻す。
Translation: As the kitten rubs against her leg, Aoi gently scoops it up and puts it back in the cardboard box.
KR: 발밑에 누워있는 새끼 고양이를 천천히 상자에 되돌려 놓았다.

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ごめん、エル」
Translation: "I'm sorry, Eru..."

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 名残惜しげに頭を撫でながら――
Translation: She pets the kitten sadly.
KR: 헤어지기 싫은 듯 머리를 쓰다듬는 아오이.

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いいひとに、ひろわれるの」
Translation: "Someone nice will come along and adopt you for sure."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そっちのほうが、エルもしあわせなの」
Translation: "You'll be happier that way."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから、きっと……きっと……」
Translation: "Don't worry... You'll see..."

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: アオイは子猫を名残惜しげに撫でたまま、なかなかその場を離れることができない。
Translation: She continues to pet the kitten over and over. Evidently she can't quite bring herself to leave.
KR: 아오이는 고양이를 계속 쓰다듬으며 자리를 뜨지 못한다.

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「……だいじょうぶなの」
Translation: "...It's okay."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「エル、バイバイなの」
Translation: "Bye-bye, Eru."

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 立ち上がり、振り返るアオイの顔は――
Translation: With that, Aoi finally stands up and turns back, and sure enough—

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "...Boop boop...?"

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: やっぱり、涙をこぼしていて――
Translation: —her face is soaked with tears.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 俺は思わず、彼女の頭を手で撫でた。
Translation: Reflexively, I reach out and stroke her hair.

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「へんなの」
Translation: "It's so weird..."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うれしくないのに……なみだ？」
Translation: "Aoi's not happy... so what are these tears for?"

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ」
Translation: "Well..."

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そういうことも、ある」
Translation: "They can't all be happy tears, you know."

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 教室では、決して表情の変化を見せなかったアオイ。
Translation: Back in the classroom, Aoi never used to show any emotion whatsoever.
KR: 교실에서는 표정 변화가 전혀 없었던 아오이.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: 彼女は俺たちと友達になって、笑顔を覚えた。
Translation: But once we made friends with her, she learned to smile.
KR: 아오이는 우리와 친구가 되고 웃는 법을 알게 되었고.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: それと同時に、悲しい涙も流すようになった。
Translation: And she learned to cry.
KR: 그와 동시에 슬픔의 눈물도 흘리게 되었다.

Name: a3152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「悲しいときは、涙が出るんだ」
Translation: "Sometimes you cry when you're sad, too."

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: それは決して、悪いことじゃない。
Translation: But this isn't a bad thing.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: アオイは、いい方向に進んでる――
Translation: She's changing for the better.

Name: a3152a.nss
Japanese: きっと、そうだ。
Translation: I'm sure of it.

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい！」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチは、ネトラレいやなの」
Translation: "Shinichi doesn't want to be cucked."

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ネトラレ……？」
Translation: "He what?"

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: アオイは、全く、悪びれずに言う。
Translation: Aoi's tone is perfectly innocent.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 思わず、制止のタイミングさえ失ってしまった。
Translation: It catches me off guard, and I fail to stop her in time.

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキが、ほかのオトコとチューしたり、セックスしたりするの、ガマンできないの」
Translation: "He hates the thought of you kissing or having sex with other guys. It makes him furious."
KR: "미유키가 다른 남자랑 뽀뽀하거나, x스하는 걸 참을 수 없는 거야."

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから、ミユキがすきになれないの」
Translation: "So he refuses to fall in love with you."

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...Shinichi?"

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、静かに、口を開いた。
Translation: Miyuki asks in a low voice.

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それ……心一の、本当の気持ちなの？」
Translation: "Is this true? Is this... how you actually feel?"

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私が……別の男を好きになるとか……」
Translation: "You think I would... fall for some other man?"

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方は、本気で思ったの？」
Translation: "Do you seriously believe that?"

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そ、そういうつもりじゃ――」
Translation: "N-No, that's not—"

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「…………ふざけないで」
Translation: "......How DARE you!"

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私が、貴方の側でどれだけ我慢してたと思ってるの？」
Translation: "Do you have any idea how hard it's been to hold myself back around you?"
KR: "내가 네 옆에서 얼마나 참고 있었던 줄 알아?"

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私が、どんな想いで、友達のフリしてたと思うの？」
Translation: "Can you even begin to imagine how I felt pretending to be all buddy-buddy like this?"

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから、誤解だって――」
Translation: "Look, you've got the wrong idea—"

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「聞きたくない！」
Translation: "I don't want to hear it!"

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「友達になんて、なるんじゃなかった！」
Translation: "I never should have agreed to this!"

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「最初から近づきたいなんて、思うんじゃなかった！」
Translation: "If I'd known I'd end up suffering like this..."

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「こんな想いを……するくらいなら……！！」
Translation: "I never would have... let myself get close to you...!"

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「さよなら！！」
Translation: "Goodbye forever!"

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Miyuki—!"

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: アオイが呼びかけるが、美雪は振り返ろうともしない。
Translation: Aoi tries to stop her, but Miyuki doesn't even glance back.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 何か言葉をかけなければ――
Translation: I know I need to say something... anything...

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: そう思うばかりで、しかし、言葉が出てこない。
Translation: But the words won't come.
KR: 그렇게 생각할 뿐, 말이 나오지 않는다.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: アオイが伝えた俺の気持ちは、真実だった。
Translation: Everything Aoi said about me was true.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 弁解なんて、できなかった。
Translation: I have no excuse.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 暗闇の川縁を、美雪の背中が瞬く間に遠ざかっていく。
Translation: Moments later, Miyuki vanishes into the night.
KR: 어두운 강변을 따라 미유키의 모습이 순식간에 사라져간다.

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ……おこった？」
Translation: "Is she... mad...?"

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイのせい？」
Translation: "Is it my fault?"

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「違う」
Translation: "No."

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: アオイは事実しか言ってない。
Translation: Aoi was just stating the facts, nothing more.

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキおいかけないの？」
Translation: "Aren't you gonna go after her?"

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 今追わなければ、もう二度と追いつけない。
Translation: If I don't go after her now, I'll never have a second chance.
KR: 지금 쫓아가지 않으면 두 번 다신 붙잡을 수 없다.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: はっきり、その予感があった。
Translation: I can feel it in my gut.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: でも、追いかけられない。
Translation: ...And yet I can't bring myself to do it.

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「しっぱいが、こわいから？」
Translation: "Are you afraid of messing up?"

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや」
Translation: "No."

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 俺はひとつ、夜の冷たい息を吸って、言った。
Translation: I take a deep breath, filling my lungs with chilly night air.
KR: 나는 차가운 밤 공기를 들이마시며 말했다.

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いつか、こうなる運命だったんだ」
Translation: "This was fated to happen, sooner or later."

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うんめい……？」
Translation: "Fate...?"

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: ずっと、一緒にいられると思っていた。
Translation: I always hoped we could stay together.
KR: 계속 같이 있을 수 있다고 생각했다.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: この関係が続くと、思っていた。
Translation: That these days would last forever.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: でも、幼い頃とはもう違う。
Translation: But we're not little kids anymore.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 余計なことを考えるし、無駄に相手に気を遣うし、とんでもない気のもみ方もする。
Translation: Our circumstances are complicated now. We overthink things. We walk on eggshells. We freak out over nothing.
KR: 쓸데없는 생각을 하고, 지나치게 상대방을 신경 쓴다.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 今の美雪は学園のアイドル。
Translation: Miyuki is the queen bee of the entire school.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 手の届かないところに咲く高嶺の花で――
Translation: Like the moon hanging in the sky, she's on a pedestal far beyond my reach.
KR: 손이 닿지 않는 높은 곳에 피어있는 꽃.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 俺はもう、友達にすら、ふさわしくない。
Translation: I don't even deserve to count myself among her friends.

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい」
Translation: "Got it."

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: アオイは、突然、手を挙げた。
Translation: Aoi suddenly raises her hand.

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このルートは、バッドエンド」
Translation: "This is the bad ending route."

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「センタクシ、まちがえたの」
Translation: "You made the wrong choice."

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セーブデータをやりなおすの」
Translation: "You need to reload your save file."

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: またしても、ゲーム脳だ。
Translation: There's her gamer brain again.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 俺はふと――空を見上げる。
Translation: I look up at the sky.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 時を隔てて届く星々の光は、驚くほど綺麗だった。
Translation: It's breathtakingly beautiful, the way the starlight twinkles across time and space to reach us down here on Earth.
KR: 세월을 뛰어넘어 도달한 별빛은 놀랄 만큼 아름다웠다.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 毎日は、階段のように過ぎていく。
Translation: Life is like a staircase.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 一度疑問に思ったらその途端、足を上げるのが辛くなる。
Translation: You just gotta keep climbing.
KR: 한 번 의문은 품으면, 다리를 들어 올리는 게 힘들어진다.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: だから、一歩、一歩、なにも考えずに、上る。
Translation: Otherwise, if you start to overthink it, you'll have trouble taking the next step.
KR: 그러니까 한 발, 한 발, 아무 생각하지 않고 오른다.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 階段だから、別れ道はなく。
Translation: There are no branching paths.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 「あの時ああしておけば」なんて後悔は無意味で。
Translation: No point in regretting the actions you didn't take.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 「人生は選択の連続だ」なんていうのは、失敗してから振り返って思う、後悔の絞りかすみたいなものだ。
Translation: They say life is a series of choices, but that's nonsense cooked up by the old and bitter.
KR: '인생은 선택의 연속이다' 라는 말은 실패하고 나서야 생각나는, 후회의 찌꺼기 같은 것이다.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 過去の少し先にある、当たり前の明日へ。
Translation: Yesterday leads to today, and today leads to tomorrow.
KR: 과거의 조금 앞에 있는 당연한 내일로.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 一歩、一歩、進んでいく。
Translation: One step at a time...

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: だから――

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「言っただろ？」
Translation: "Don't you remember what I said?"

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺にはハッピーエンドなんて似合わない」
Translation: "I'm not cut out for a fairytale ending."

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「普通の話が、いいんだ」
Translation: "All I need is a normal life."

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: ひとり、呟いて、振り返る。
Translation: As I mutter to myself, I glance back.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: そこにはもう、人影はない。
Translation: But no one is standing there.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: ただ俺の声だけが、夜の闇に溶けて消えた。
Translation: My voice fades into the night.
KR: 그저 내 목소리만이 어둠 속으로 사라졌다.

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Haha..."

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 独り言。
Translation: Man, I must really be losing it.

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: 一体俺は、誰に話をしていたのだろうか？
Translation: Who was I talking to? Myself?
KR: 나는 대체 누구와 얘기하고 있던 거지?

Name: a3152b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「メール？」
Translation: "An email?"

Name: a3152b.nss
Japanese: そのメールには、彼女からの写真が添付されていた。
Translation: Attached is a single photo.
KR: 그 메일에는 사진 한 장이 첨부되어 있었다.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: でも、ふと俺は思うのだ。
Translation: But then I start thinking...

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: もしもアオイがひとりだったら？
Translation: What if Aoi was alone?

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: もしも俺たちが友達じゃなかったら？
Translation: What if we weren't there for her?

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: もしも美雪が友達として忠告しなかったら？
Translation: What if Miyuki hadn't been around to scold her?

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: アオイは、当然のように、子猫を拾う。
Translation: Obviously Aoi would have adopted the kitten.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: マンガ喫茶に持ち込もうとして、失敗して、店の中から追い出されて、それで――
Translation: She would've tried, and failed, to sneak the kitten into the manga cafe. Then the manager would've thrown her out. And then...
KR: 만화방에 몰래 데려가려다 들켜서 쫓겨나고, 그리고...

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 家にも帰らず、街をうろつき夜を明かす。
Translation: Then she would've spent the night on the streets.
KR: 집에 돌아가지도 못하고 거리를 배회하며 밤을 새겠지.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: そんな様子が、脳裏に浮かぶ。
Translation: I can picture it all clear as day.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: アオイはひとりで過ごさなければならないだろう。
Translation: Aoi wouldn't have had anyone to turn to.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 子猫は寒さで凍えるだろう。
Translation: And the kitten would've frozen to death out in the cold.

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「神様――か」
Translation: "God, are you out there...?"

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 彼女が彼女のやり方を貫くには、神様が必要だったのだ。
Translation: To Aoi, God has to exist. It's the only way she can feel validated in the way she chooses to live her life.
KR: 아오이는 자신의 방식을 관철하기 위해 신님이 필요했던 거다.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 正しい行いには、正しい結末を返してくれる、神様。
Translation: After all, a just God would surely show favor to good people who do good things.
KR: 올바른 행동에 올바른 결말을 내주시는 신님.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: もしもスマフォに電波が届いたら――
Translation: If God really did have a cell phone...

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: もしも神様と通話が出来たら――
Translation: If He really was just one quick phone call away...

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 彼女の願いは、神様まで届くのだろうか？
Translation: Would He answer her prayers?

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: あの空の、向こうまで。
Translation: Is He waiting out there, somewhere beyond the sky...?

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「空の？」
Translation: "Wait... The sky...?"

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Oh crap... It's raining!"

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 秋の雨は冷たい。
Translation: The nights get pretty chilly in the fall.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 段ボールの中まで染みこみ、体温を奪うだろう。
Translation: One measly cardboard box isn't enough to stay warm.
KR: 상자 안까지 스며들어 체온을 빼앗을 것이다.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: なすすべもなく凍え、わけもわからないまま母親を呼び続ける子猫。
Translation: That kitten's gotta be freezing out there, helpless and confused, calling out for a mother that will never return...
KR: 어쩔 줄을 몰라 계속 엄마를 찾는 새끼 고양이를 생각하면,

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 俺でさえ、心が痛むのだ。
Translation: Even I'm not heartless enough to turn a blind eye to it.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: アオイが気付けば、黙っていられないに違いない。
Translation: And the second Aoi puts two and two together, I just know she's gonna run right over there.
KR: 아오이가 알아차렸다면, 가만있지 못할 게 분명하다.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 雨の中でしおれた段ボール。
Translation: I find the cardboard box wilting in the rain.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 蓋を開けて、恐る恐る中身を覗く。
Translation: I open it and hesitantly peer inside...

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 子猫の姿は、消えていた。
Translation: The kitten is gone.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 新たな飼い主が見つかったならいいが――
Translation: Hopefully it just means someone else came along and adopted the poor thing, but...

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 念のため、マンガ喫茶に行ってみるか……？
Translation: Should I swing by the manga cafe, just in case...?

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 思考に割り込む携帯電話。
Translation: Just then, my thoughts are interrupted by my ringtone.
KR: 이런저런 생각을 하던 중 갑작스레 전화가 울렸다.

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もしもし」
Translation: "Hello?"

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 『心一！？　今、マンガ喫茶にいるんだけど――』
Translation: "Shinichi?! I'm at the manga cafe right now—"

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「マンガ喫茶――？」
Translation: "What? You are?!"

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 美雪も、どうやらアオイを捜しに行ったらしい。
Translation: Of course. Miyuki must be looking for Aoi, too.
KR: 아무래도 미유키도 아오이를 찾으러 간 모양이다.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: なんだか少し、ホッとする。
Translation: That's kind of reassuring, actually.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 彼女も俺と同じく、黙っていられなかったわけだ。
Translation: She must've reached the same conclusion I did.
KR: 미유키도 나처럼 가만히 있을 수 없었던 거다.

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイは？」
Translation: "Where's Aoi?"

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 『さっき、店を慌てて飛び出したって』
Translation: "The staff said she bolted outside just a few minutes ago."

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 『出がけに、「ペットは持ち込みできないか？」って訊いて行ったらしいわ』
Translation: "And on her way out, she asked them if they allow pets."
KR: "나가면서 애완동물을 데려올 순 없냐고 물어봤나 봐."

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「やっぱりか」
Translation: "I knew it..."

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「こっちは段ボール箱のとこ。猫がいなくなってる」
Translation: "I'm at the cardboard box. The cat's gone."
KR: "나는 상자 있는 데로 왔어. 고양이는 없고."

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 『アオイってば――！』
Translation: "Damn it, Aoi!"

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「お、怒るなよ。
　この雨の中、子猫をほっとくわけにも――」
Translation: "H-Hey, c'mon, don't get mad at her for this! Nobody in their right mind would leave a kitten to die out here in the rain!"
KR:
"화, 화내지 마.
비가 이렇게 오는데 새끼 고양이를 혼자 둘 순..."

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 『わかってるわよ！』
Translation: "I know that!"

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「大声出すな。落ち着けって」
Translation: "Just... stop shouting, okay? Take a breath."

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 『アオイが独りで猫の面倒見られると思う？』
Translation: "Do you really think Aoi's fit to look after a cat all by herself?"
KR: "아오이가 혼자서 고양이를 돌볼 수 있을 것 같아?"

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: もちろん、アオイだって子供じゃない。
Translation: To be fair, Aoi's hardly a child.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 自分と子猫の面倒くらい、ひとりでちゃんと――
Translation: She could probably look after herself and a kitten, assuming she—

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 校門の前、傘も差さずに美雪を待ちぼうけしていたアオイの姿が、不意に脳裏をよぎる。
Translation: Then I remember the sight of her standing absently outside the school gates, no umbrella, waiting for Miyuki in the pouring rain.
KR: 교문 앞에서 우산도 쓰지 않고 미유키를 기다리던 모습이 떠올랐다.

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 『今すぐ、捜しましょう！』
Translation: "We need to find her!"

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「捜すって、どこを？」
Translation: "But where do we look?"

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 『心当たりない？』
Translation: "Not sure. Any ideas?"

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ええと……保護者の家、とか？」
Translation: "Uhhh... Her parents' house, maybe?"

Name: a3161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 『だったら嬉しいんだけどね』
Translation: "I mean, I certainly HOPE that's where she went, but..."

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 美雪の言外の否定に、納得せざるを得ない。
Translation: The implication is clear, and I can't deny it.
KR: 미유키의 말에 숨은 뜻을 부정할 수가 없었다.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: そのほかに、アオイの行きそうな場所。
Translation: Where else might Aoi go?

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 真っ先に浮かぶのは学校の屋上、階段の屋根だ。
Translation: The first place I can think of is the top of the school roof, up over the stairs.
KR: 가장 먼저 떠오르는 곳은 학교 옥상 꼭대기다.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: だが、流石にこの雨の中、子猫を抱いて外には行かないだろう。
Translation: But there's no way Aoi would want to be outside right now, not with the kitten in tow.
KR: 하지만 아무리 아오이라도 이 빗속에 고양이를 데리고 밖에 있진 않겠지.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: となれば、他に彼女が行きそうな場所は……
Translation: In which case, what does that leave us with?

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 行きそうな場所……
Translation: Where else would she go...?

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: ……だめだ。
Translation: ...It's no use.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 全然、思いつかない。
Translation: I can't think of anywhere else.

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: こんな時、どこを捜せば良いのか……
Translation: I don't know where to even start...

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 俺にはその手掛かりすら、掴めない。
Translation: I don't have the first clue...

Name: a3161.nss
Japanese: 俺には、なにも……
Translation: God, I'm so fucking useless...!

Name: a3162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 『心一！　なにボンヤリしてるの！？』
Translation: "Shinichi! Don't you dare zone out on me right now!"

Name: a3162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
『貴方がアオイの友達になったんでしょ！
　頼りになってあげないでどうするの？』
Translation:
"You call yourself Aoi's friend?!
Don't you think you ought to be there for her?"

Name: a3162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Oh... Right..."

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: 美雪の声で、俺は現実に引き戻された。
Translation: Miyuki snaps me back to reality.

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: 電波少女のアオイ。
Translation: Aoi, the self-professed "transceiver."

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: アドレス帳に、ひとりしか登録がなかったアオイ。
Translation: Aoi, the girl with just one entry in her address book.

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: その彼女を助けてやれるのは、きっと――
Translation: The two of us are her only friends...
KR: 그런 아오이를 도와줄 수 있는 사람은...

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: 友達の、俺たちだけだ。
Translation: And right now, we're the only ones who can help her.

Name: a3162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪」
Translation: "Miyuki?"

Name: a3162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 『なに？』
Translation: "Yeah?"

Name: a3162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「捜しに来てくれて、ありがとな」
Translation: "Thank you for helping me look for her."

Name: a3162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 『あ――当たり前でしょ！』
Translation: "O-Of course I'd help!"

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: 受話器の向こうの美雪の顔が、目に浮かぶ。
Translation: Somehow I can picture her exact expression.
KR: 수화기 너머로 미유키의 얼굴이 눈에 선하다.

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: 彼女だって、アオイと友達になれて嬉しかったはずだ。
Translation: I know her, and I know she likes being friends with Aoi.
KR: 미유키도 아오이랑 친구가 되고 기뻤을 터.

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: 友達でいたいからこそ、彼女のためを思って、絶交だなんて厳しい物言いをした。
Translation: She would never actually end the friendship. She only threatened to "cut ties" because of how much she cares.
KR: 친구로 있고 싶기에, 아오이를 생각해서, 절교라는 심한 말을 했다.

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: そうでなければ、こんな雨の夜、アオイの様子を確かめにマンガ喫茶にやってきたりなんてしない。
Translation: Otherwise, there's no way she'd be out here in the dark—in the pouring rain—trying to check up on her.
KR: 그렇지 않으면 이런 비 내리는 밤에 아오이를 확인하러 만화방에 오거나 하지 않는다.

Name: a3162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 『とにかく、アオイを見つけるわよ』
Translation: "Whatever. We need to find her."

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: 俺はもう一度、思い返してみる。
Translation: I dig through my memories.

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: アオイと一緒に過ごした日々。
Translation: All the days we spent hanging out with Aoi...

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: 俺たちは間違いなく、友達だった。
Translation: I know our friendship was the real deal.

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: その思い出を辿れば、きっとどこかに手掛かりが――
Translation: There has to be a clue in here somewhere...

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: どこかに手掛かりが、あるはず――！
Translation: There just has to be...!

Name: a3162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あのゲームだ」
Translation: "The visual novel!"

Name: a3162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 『え、今なんて――』
Translation: "Wait, what? What did you just—"

Name: a3162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「心当たり、あるかもしれない。１回家に戻る」
Translation: "I gotta swing back by my place real fast. I think I have an idea."
KR: "단서를 찾은 것 같아. 일단 집에 갔다 올게."

Name: a3162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 『本当に？　アテにしていいのね？』
Translation: "Yeah? Is it a good one, at least?"

Name: a3162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「わからないけど、適当に捜すよりはマシだと思う」
Translation: "No clue, but it's gotta be better than searching at random."
KR: "잘 모르겠지만, 아무 데나 찾는 것보단 나을 거야."

Name: a3162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 『わかったわ。すぐに私も行く』
Translation: "Alright then. I'll meet you there."

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: 通話を切ると、俺は早足で家路を戻った。
Translation: I hang up and hurry home.
KR: 나는 전화를 끊고 서둘러 집으로 돌아갔다.

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: アオイが子猫を拾う――あれと全く同じイベントが、雄太郎から借りたゲームにも存在した。
Translation: That mobile game Yuutarou lent me... It has an almost identical stray cat scene.
KR: 아오이가 새끼 고양이를 줍는 이벤트... 유우타로에게 빌린 게임에도 똑같이 존재했다.

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: もしあのゲームの真似をしているのだとすれば、ゲームを進めることで、今の居場所がわかるかもしれない。
Translation: If she's acting out scenes from it, then maybe I need to play through more of the game to see where she goes next.
KR: 만약 이 게임을 흉내 내고 있는 거라면 게임을 진행해서 지금 있는 위치를 알 수 있을지도 모른다.

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: 家に着く頃には駆け足になっていた。
Translation: As soon as my house comes into view, I find myself dashing up the walkway and through the front door.
KR: 집에 다다랐을 즘엔 거의 뜀박질하고 있었다.

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: 部屋に飛び込み、充電しっぱなしになっていた、借り物のスマフォに電源を入れる。
Translation: Then I bolt up the stairs to my room and grab the loaner phone that I had left on charge on my bed.
KR: 방으로 뛰어들어가 충전 중이던 스마트폰을 켰다.

Name: a3162.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 『おやねこにゃの』
Translation: "Meow! I'm the mommy cat."

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: あの日と同じ、アオイが子猫を見つけたイベントシーン。
Translation: I need to get to the next scene as quickly as possible... Impatiently, I hit the Skip button.
KR: 그날과 같이 아오이가 새끼 고양이를 발견하는 이벤트 장면...

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: 俺は目的のシーンを探すべく、スキップボタンを押す。
KR: 나는 원하는 장면을 찾기 위해 스킵 버튼을 눌렀다.

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: 瞬く間に流れていくテキスト。
Translation: The text shoots past in fast-forward.

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: ――あれ？
Translation: ...Wait...

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: 今、過去から現在の時間軸へと、ゲームを進めているわけだが、さらにその先へと読み進めればどうなる？
Translation: Right now I'm skipping through the "past" to line up with the real-world "present day," but... what if I read further?
KR: 지금은 과거에서 현재로 게임을 진행하고 있는데, 그 이후로 진행하면 어떻게 되는 거지?

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: これは、いわゆる恋愛シミュレーションゲーム。
Translation: I mean... this is one of those dating sim type games, right?
KR: 이 게임은 이른바 미소녀 연애 시뮬레이션.

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: 最後には主人公とヒロインが結ばれるんじゃないか？
Translation: Which means the protagonist will probably hook up with the heroine in the end...

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: ゲームがそうなるってことは、現実でもアオイはそれを真似するつもりなのか――
Translation: So... does that mean Aoi will try to act out that part in real life, too...?
KR: 게임이 그렇게 진행되면, 현실 속 아오이도 그걸 흉내 낼 셈인가?

Name: a3162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Whoa!"

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: 突然割り込む音に驚き、思わず手が滑る。
Translation: A sudden sound effect catches me off guard.

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: その途端、スキップ解除されたらしい。
Translation: My hand slips, and I accidentally deselect the Skip button.

Name: a3162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ここ、もしかして――」
Translation: "Wait... Is this—?"

Name: a3162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はいはい、聞こえてる！」
Translation: "Coming!"

Name: a3162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一、場所はわかった！？」
Translation: "Shinichi! Do you know where she went?!"

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: 息も荒く問いかける美雪。
Translation: Miyuki asks through gasps for breath... and I nod.

Name: a3162.nss
Japanese: 俺は彼女に、ゆっくりと頷いてみせた。

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「来てくれたんだな」
Translation: "Thanks for coming with me."

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「当たり前でしょ！」
Translation: "As if I wasn't going to!"

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイがどう行動するかなんて、簡単に予想つくし」
Translation: "I mean, Aoi's extremely predictable, you know."
KR: "아오이가 무슨 행동 할지 간단히 예상할 수 있는 걸."

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そしたら……ほっとけないじゃない」
Translation: "So, like, obviously I had to do SOMETHING!"

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それより、どこに行ったかわかるんでしょうね？」
Translation: "Anyway, you DO know where she went, yes?"

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ……多分、な」
Translation: "Yeah... At least, I'm pretty sure."

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "The school...?"

Name: a3171.nss
Japanese: 美雪の声に疑問が混じるのももっともだ。
Translation: I don't blame her for being skeptical.

Name: a3171.nss
Japanese: 俺も夜の学校には忍び込めないと思ったから、一度は屋上にいる可能性を除外したのだが。
Translation: Despite Aoi's fondness for the roof, I'd told myself there was no way she could have trespassed onto school grounds at night.
KR: 나도 밤에 학교에 들어갈 수 없을 것 같아서 옥상에 있을 가능성을 배제했는데...

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ほら、そこ」
Translation: "See? Look."

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Oh!"

Name: a3171.nss
Japanese: よく見れば、通用口が開きっぱなしになっていた。
Translation: Someone's left the pedestrian gate hanging open.
KR: 자세히 보면 출입구가 열린 채로 있다.

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「全然気付かなかった」
Translation: "I didn't even notice..."

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「行こう」
Translation: "Let's go."

Name: a3171.nss
Japanese: 校門と同じく、昇降口の扉も鍵が開いていた。
Translation: Sure enough, the front entrance doors have been left ajar as well.

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「閉め忘れたってわけじゃないみたいね」
Translation: "I somehow doubt the janitors just forgot to close the doors..."
KR: "문 닫는 걸 까먹은 건 아닌 모양이네..."

Name: a3171.nss
Japanese: 無人の校舎。
Translation: The school building is completely deserted.

Name: a3171.nss
Japanese: 内履きに履き替えるが、床に靴を落としただけでも、音が校舎中に響き渡る。
Translation: As we change into our indoor shoes, the slightest clack of our soles on the linoleum seems to reverberate like a gunshot.
KR: 갈아신으려고 바닥에 떨어트린 실내화 소리가 교내 전체에 울려 퍼졌다.

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「こっちだ」
Translation: "This way."

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「教室じゃないの？」
Translation: "She's not in the classroom?"

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「下、見てみろよ」
Translation: "Look down."

Name: a3171.nss
Japanese: 水滴が転々と、教室とは逆方向――体育館に続いていた。
Translation: There's a trail of water droplets leading in the opposite direction—toward the gym.
KR: 교실과 반대방향인 체육관 쪽으로 물방울이 뚝뚝 떨어져 있었다.

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どうしてわかったの？」
Translation: "How did you know?"

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「心当たりがあるかもって、１回家に戻ったでしょ？
　なんのため？」
Translation:
"Well, you said you had an idea and went back to your house.
But what for?"
KR:
"짚이는 데가 있다면서 집으로 돌아갔잖아?
뭐 때문이야?"

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、それが……」
Translation: "Oh... well, uh..."

Name: a3171.nss
Japanese: 改めて説明を求められると、困ってしまう。
Translation: I'm... honestly not sure how to explain it to her.

Name: a3171.nss
Japanese: ゲーム内の「アオイ」が、びしょ濡れで避難するイベントがあったっていうのが、ここに来た理由だが。
Translation: The whole reason we're here is because there's a scene in the game where a soaking-wet "Aoi" takes cover in the gym.
KR: 게임 속 '아오이'가 흠뻑 젖어 대피하는 이벤트가 있어서 여기에 온 건데...

Name: a3171.nss
Japanese: 美雪がゲームと現実の混同を嫌うことを考えると、なんだか非常に説明しづらい。
Translation: But I know Miyuki hates conflating video games with reality, and that makes it all the more complicated to explain...
KR: 미유키가 게임과 현실을 구별 못 하는 걸 싫어한다는 점을 생각하면, 설명하기가 굉장히 힘들다.

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「――ま、今は良いわ」
Translation: "...It's fine. Don't worry about it right now."

Name: a3171.nss
Japanese: 美雪は動揺を見抜いたのか、溜息交じりに言う。
Translation: Miyuki sighs. She must have sensed my hesitation.
KR: 미유키는 내가 동요하는 걸 눈치챘는지 한숨 쉬며 말했다.

Name: a3171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「後でゆっくり教えて」
Translation: "Just tell me later, okay?"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイ、どこ？」
Translation: "Aoi, where are you?"

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: 美雪の呼びかけが、反響して消えていく。
Translation: Miyuki's voice echoes and fades into the darkness.

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: 真っ暗な体育館。
Translation: The gym is pitch black.

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: 普段なら、誰もいるはずのない時間。
Translation: Normally there wouldn't be a soul here at this hour.

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ、いないのか！？」
Translation: "I know you're in here, Aoi!"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だめ！」
Translation: "Stop!"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今の声――」
Translation: "Did you hear that?"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ええ、聞こえたわ」
Translation: "Yeah, that was definitely her."

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そこにいるんでしょう、返事を頂戴！」
Translation: "We know you're there! Please talk to us!"

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: ――静寂。
Translation: ...Silence.

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: アオイからの返答はない。
Translation: Aoi doesn't answer.

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なんで……出てこないの？」
Translation: "Why are you hiding?"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイ、出てきなさいって！」
Translation: "Come on, Aoi, get out here!"

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: 美雪は体育館の暗がりに呼びかける。
Translation: Miyuki shouts into the dark.

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: だが、アオイの返事は一切ない。
Translation: But Aoi refuses to respond.

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: 代わりに、返ってくるのは――
Translation: Instead, all we hear is—

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: 嗚咽。
Translation: —a muffled sob.

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: 押し殺した、アオイの、泣き声。
Translation: She's crying.

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイ、どうしたの……？」
Translation: "Aoi, what's wrong?"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「こないで！」
Translation: "Stay away!"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きちゃ……ひぐっ、ぅ……だめ……なの……」
Translation: "Don't... hnn... come any... closer..."

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なんでそんな、泣いて……？」
Translation: "Why are you crying?"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「ひぐっ、う……ううっ。
　だ、だって……アオイ……アオイは……」
Translation:
"Hnn... nnn... nnnn...
A-Aoi... can't help it... because..."

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「チュウコク……やぶったの……」
Translation: "Aoi... didn't listen...!"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「忠告？」
Translation: "To what?"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「ミユキ……ダメなのは、わかってるの……
　でも……あたまからはなれなくて……」
Translation:
"Miyuki... told me not to, but...
Aoi... couldn't stop thinking about it..."
KR:
"미유키... 안 되는 건 알고 있어...
근데... 머릿속에서 떠나질 않아서..."

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「みすてること、できなかったの……
　たすけなきゃって、おもったの……」
Translation:
"Couldn't... abandon the kitten...
Wanted... to be a hero..."

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「だから、ゼッコウ……
　ミユキと……ともだちじゃ、ない……」
Translation:
"But now... Miyuki's gonna...
cut ties... and stop being my friend..."

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: 夜の別れ際、美雪は言った。
Translation: Well, that was definitely the threat she made at the time...

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: もしネコを拾ったら、絶交だと。

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それで、出てこない……？」
Translation: "Is that why she won't come out...?"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「たぶん……そうだ」
Translation: "Probably."

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アイツ、絶交したくなくて、１回拾うのを諦めて」
Translation: "She already chose you over the kitten once before."
KR: "저 녀석, 절교하기 싫어서 한 번 줍는 걸 포기하고도..."

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なあ、美雪？」
Translation: "Come on, Miyuki."

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「わかってるって」
Translation: "I get it, alright?!"

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: 美雪がひとつ、深い息をする。
Translation: Miyuki sighs in frustration.

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「撤回よ！　撤回！」
Translation: "I take it back, okay? I take it all back!"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ひぐっ、う……て、てっかい……？」
Translation: "Hnn... nnn... You... take it back...?"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「絶交は、間違い！　私たちはまだ、友達のまま。
　だからアオイ、出てきなさい！」
Translation:
"I don't want to cut ties! I want to stay friends!
Now please get out here and talk to us, Aoi!"
KR:
"절교는 취소! 우리 아직 친구야!
그러니까 아오이, 빨리 나와!"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「て……てっかい、なの？」
Translation: "You... You sure you won't cut ties with me?"

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: 暗闇の向こうから、恐る恐るアオイの声がする。
Translation: Aoi's wavering voice cuts through the darkness.

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ゼッコウ、しないの？」
Translation: "You promise you take it back?"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なんでこの雨の中、貴方を捜しに来たと思ってるの？」
Translation: "Why else would I come looking for you in the middle of the night when it's pouring down rain outside?"
KR: "왜 이런 빗속에서 널 찾으러 왔다고 생각해?"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方が心配だからに決まってるでしょ」
Translation: "I wouldn't do it unless I was worried about you. Obviously."

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ほんとうなの……？」
Translation: "You mean it...?"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「嘘なんてつかない」
Translation: "I wouldn't lie to you about something like this."

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だって、友達でしょ？」
Translation: "I mean, we're friends, aren't we?"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ありがとうなの――――！」
Translation: "Thank you so much!"

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: ステージ袖から姿を現したアオイは――
Translation: Aoi dashes out from backstage—

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「親猫ッ！？」
Translation: "Mommy cat?!"

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: 猫の着ぐるみを着ていた。
Translation: —wearing her kitty onesie.

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ！　だいすきなの……」
Translation: "Miyuki! You're the best!"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「そ……そう。
　アオイが喜んでくれて、嬉しいわ……」
Translation:
"Th... Thanks.
I'm just glad you're feeling better."

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: 抱きつかれ、うわずった声で答える美雪。
Translation: I can hear a tiny squeak in Miyuki's voice as Aoi's flying tackle-hug threatens to nearly send the both of them toppling to the floor.
KR: 아오이에게 안겨 격양된 목소리로 대답하는 미유키.

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: フラフラして、もう一押しあれば倒れてしまいそうだ。
KR: 휘청거려서 살짝 밀기만 해도 넘어질 것 같다.

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あれ？　ところで子猫は――」
Translation: "Wait... Where's the kitten?"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いるの」
Translation: "Right here."

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「エル、でるの」
Translation: "Come on out, Eru."

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: まるで人語を解したかのように、胸ポケットからちょこんと首を出す黒猫。
Translation: As if on command, the kitten pops its head out from the onesie's chest pocket.
KR: 마치 사람 말을 알아듣기라도 한 듯 가슴팍에서 얼굴을 꺼낸 새끼 고양이.

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: 非常に可愛らしい光景であり、横で見ている俺も思わず、頬が緩んでしまうってことは。
Translation: Jesus, the cuteness levels are off the charts... They've even got me grinning.
KR: 너무도 사랑스러운 모습이라 옆에서 보고 있던 나조차 저절로 미소가 지어졌다.

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "I... I could die happy..."

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる！　ミユキ！？」
Translation: "Boop boop! Miyuki?!"

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: 美雪は幸せそうな顔をしたまま、床に倒れた。
Translation: Miyuki falls to the floor, a dreamy smile on her face.
KR: 미유키는 행복한 얼굴을 한 채 바닥에 쓰러졌다.

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ……ごめんなの」
Translation: "Miyuki... Aoi's really sorry..."

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「エルも、あやまるの」
Translation: "Eru's sorry, too."

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「ストップ！　わかった！
　わかったからストップ！」
Translation:
"Stop! I get it!
That's enough! Just stop!"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「それ以上は近づかないで！
　悲劇がまた繰り返されるから！」
Translation:
"Don't come any closer!
We don't want a repeat of what happened last time!"
KR:
"더 이상 다가오지 마!
비극이 반복될 거야!"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でもエル、おれいにだきつきたいって」
Translation: "But Eru wants to hug you!"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「抱きつきですって！？
　し……仕方ないわねッ！！」
Translation:
"Hug me?!
Well... I guess if I have to...!"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、悲劇はどうした？」
Translation: "What happened to avoiding a repeat of last time?!"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「繰り返されるものなのよ！　心一！　マスクは！？」
Translation: "History's always going to repeat itself regardless! Shinichi, do you have a face mask?"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ないよ」
Translation: "Why would I?"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どうしてッ！？」
Translation: "Why WOULDN'T you?!"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「怒るなよ」
Translation: "Don't snap at me!"

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: やはり猫関係のこととなると、美雪はいつもの冷静さを失ってしまうらしい。
Translation: When it comes to cats, I swear, this girl stops thinking straight...
KR: 역시 고양이에 대한 일이라면 미유키는 평소의 냉정함을 잃어버리고 마는 것 같다.

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「アオイもあんまり煽るなよな。
　そもそも、なんでその格好なんだ？」
Translation:
"And Aoi, don't encourage her!
Why are you even wearing that?!"
KR:
"아오이도 너무 부추기지 말고.
애초에 왜 그 꼴이야?"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ふく、ぬれたの」
Translation: "Well, my clothes got all wet."

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「傘は？」
Translation: "What happened to that umbrella I gave you?"

Name: a3181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Oh!"

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: すっかり忘れていたらしい。
Translation: She completely forgot about it, didn't she...

Name: a3181.nss
Japanese: まあ、アオイらしいと言うか、予想通りと言うか。
Translation: Somehow I'm not surprised...

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もう雨、やんでる？」
Translation: "Has it let up out there?"

Name: a3191.nss
Japanese: 昇降口で、もう雨が降っていないことに気付く。
Translation: When we arrive at the front entrance, I notice it looks distinctly less rainy outside.
KR: 정문에 와서야 비가 그친 것을 알아차렸다.

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今のうち、さっさと帰るか」
Translation: "Maybe we should head home now while we can."

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい！　ミユキが、いないの」
Translation: "Got it! Miyuki's missing!"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...Wait, what?"

Name: a3191.nss
Japanese: 俺はゆっくり辺りを見回す。
Translation: I look around.

Name: a3191.nss
Japanese: 確かに靴箱の側に、美雪の姿は見当たらない。
Translation: Sure enough, I can't see her anywhere near the shoe lockers.
KR: 확실히 신발장 쪽에 미유키의 모습이 보이질 않는다.

Name: a3191.nss
Japanese: この夜の学校で、彼女がいなくなるはずが……
Translation: Did she seriously go wandering off into the school building? At night? Alone?

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ひえっ！！」
Translation: "AAAAHH!!!"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「い、い、今の音は――」
Translation: "Wh-Wh-What was that sound?!"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あら？　驚かしちゃった？」
Translation: "Oh, oops. Did I scare you?"

Name: a3191.nss
Japanese: 暗闇の廊下から、美雪が半笑いで姿を現す。
Translation: Miyuki turns up from the direction of the hallway, smirking.
KR: 어두운 복도에서 미유키가 살짝 웃으며 모습을 드러냈다.

Name: a3191.nss
Japanese: その手に、なにかを持っているようだ。
Translation: Looks like she's holding something.
KR: 손에는 무언가를 들고 있는 것 같다.

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「コーンポタージュ？」
Translation: "Corn chowder?"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「まだ寒いでしょ？　これで身体温めなさい」
Translation: "It's cold tonight. Drink this and warm up."

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイに？」
Translation: "It's for me?"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうよ。仲直りの印」
Translation: "Sure is. It's a token of our friendship restored."

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あ、ありがとうなの！」
Translation: "Th-Thank you!"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いただきます、なの」
Translation: "Aoi will drink it right now!"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「んく……んく……んく……」
Translation: "Ggllpp... ggllpp... ggllpp..."

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「んん……あったかいの……」
Translation: "Mmm... It's nice and warm..."

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ぽかぽかなの」
Translation: "Makes me feel all toasty."

Name: a3191.nss
Japanese: アオイの顔に、笑みが浮かぶ。
Translation: Aoi smiles contentedly.

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あ、そうなの！」
Translation: "Oh, that's right!"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん？　アオイ、どこに――」
Translation: "Hmm? Aoi, where are you going?"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい！」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイからも、なかなおりのしるしなの」
Translation: "Aoi has a token of friendship for you, too!"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ヤバトマ」
Translation: "Yabaley's?"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪？　もらっとけ」
Translation: "Just take it, Miyuki."

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「え、いや、でも――」
Translation: "What? No, I—"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「やっぱり、きらいなの？」
Translation: "Is it because you hate me?"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんなわけないでしょ！」
Translation: "Of course not!"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……アオイの気持ちだものね。いただくわ」
Translation: "...Fine. I gratefully accept this token of your affection."

Name: a3191.nss
Japanese: プルタブの引き上げられた缶を、睨み付け――
Translation: She glares down at the newly opened can of tomato juice.

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いただきます！」
Translation: "Bottoms up!"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「んく……んく……んく……んく……！」
Translation: "Ggllpp... ggllpp... ggllpp... ggllpp...!"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Ggllpp... ggllpp... mm... mmm...?"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ、あれ？　美味しい？」
Translation: "Wait... This stuff is actually good?"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「マジで？」
Translation: "For real?"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うん、思ってたよりずっと……」
Translation: "Yeah! Way better than I was expecting, at least..."

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうぜんなの」
Translation: "Of course!"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きもち、つまってるの」
Translation: "It's full of my love!"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうかもしれないわね……ふふ」
Translation: "Yeah, maybe so... Hehe!"

Name: a3191.nss
Japanese: ミユキとアオイはお互いに微笑むのだった。
Translation: Miyuki and Aoi share a grin.

Name: a3191.nss
Japanese: なんか俺だけ、仲間はずれになったような……
Translation: I'm actually starting to feel kinda left out over here...
KR: 왠지 나만 왕따 된 것 같은데...

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そういえば、お腹減ってるんじゃない？」
Translation: "That reminds me. We should pick up some food."

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、結構歩き回ったし――」
Translation: "Yeah! I'm starving after all that running around we—"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あー、おまえの話だよな」
Translation: "Oh. You meant... for the cat. Right."

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「やっぱり子猫だし、ミルクか？」
Translation: "It IS still a kitten, after all... Should we get it some milk?"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でも、ねこまんまはしまってるだろうし」
Translation: "Oh, but Catnip's probably closed at this time of night..."

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「コンビニ？」
Translation: "Maybe the corner store?"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「あれ、でも……
　人間と同じで大丈夫なんだっけ？」
Translation: "Wait... Are kittens even allowed to drink the same milk as humans?"
KR: "어라, 근데 사람이 먹는 걸 먹어도 되나?"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「大丈夫よ」
Translation: "They can, yes."

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「低温殺菌牛乳だと、子猫でも飲めるわ」
Translation: "As long as it's pasteurized, it's safe."
KR: "저온살균 우유는 새끼 고양이도 마실 수 있어."

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうなのか？」
Translation: "Oh, really?"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「家に帰ってから、ネットで調べたの」
Translation: "I was reading about it online."

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、ほんとはねこ、かいたいの？」
Translation: "Admit it, Miyuki. You want a cat, don't you?"

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「別に、そういうわけじゃないけど……」
Translation: "N-No... That's not it..."

Name: a3191.nss
Japanese: それ以外にどういう動機で子猫の飼い方を調べるのかは見当がつかないが、ともかく。
Translation: I can't imagine any OTHER reason why you'd research that kind of thing, but whatever.
KR: 그 외에 어떤 이유로 고양이 키우는 법을 조사했는지 짐작도 안 가지만, 어쨌든...

Name: a3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「えーと、それじゃここから一番近いコンビニは――」
Translation: "Okay, now where's the closest corner store...?"

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる？」
Translation: "Boop boop?"

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ、こないの？」
Translation: "Shinichi, aren't you coming?"

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、それが……」
Translation: "Uhh... About that..."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「曙くんの家だものね」
Translation: "It IS Akebono-kun's family store, after all."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あけぼの、ゆうたろう？」
Translation: "Akebono Yuutarou?"

Name: a3201.nss
Japanese: 曙雄太郎の実家は、コンビニを経営していた。
Translation: See, Yuutarou's parents run a convenience store.

Name: a3201.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎が手伝いに入る日も結構多いらしいし、万一俺たちが一緒に店に入るところを見られたら？
Translation: Yuutarou often ends up working the register after school... If he happens to catch the three of us walking in together this late at night...
KR: 유우타로가 도와주는 날도 꽤 많고, 만약 우리가 가게에 들어가는 걸 보게 된다면...

Name: a3201.nss
Japanese: ……後々めんどくさそうだな。
Translation: ...well, let's just say things won't end well.

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺が行くから、ここで待っててくれるか？」
Translation: "I'll go in by myself. You two wait here, okay?"

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「無理」
Translation: "No way."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?"

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「悪いけど、プレッシャーに耐える自信がないわ」
Translation: "Sorry, but I'm about ready to cave over here."

Name: a3201.nss
Japanese: 確かにこのふたりを残したら、美雪が猫への愛おしさのあまり、すぐにでも暴走しかねない。
Translation: She has a point. If I leave these two alone together, Miyuki will probably go all cat-crazy again.
KR: 확실히 이 둘을 두고 가면 미유키는 고양이에 대한 사랑으로 폭주해버릴지도 모른다.

Name: a3201.nss
Japanese: 帰ってきたら、アレルギーで鼻水グシャグシャの美雪が待っている――あれ？
Translation: And by the time I got back, she'd probably be all congested from her allergies, and...
KR: 돌아오면 알레르기 때문에 콧물 범벅인 미유키가 기다리고... 어라?

Name: a3201.nss
Japanese: ちょっと見たい気もする……
Translation: ...actually, that sounds kind of cute...

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい！」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、いってくるの」
Translation: "Aoi can do it."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ひとりで？」
Translation: "By yourself?"

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ひとりでなの」
Translation: "By myself."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……ちゃんと買い物、できるのか？」
Translation: "...Do you remember which one to get?"

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「テイオンサッキンギューニュー」
Translation: "Pasteurized milk."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「間違わないようにね」
Translation: "Be sure to get one that has it on the label, okay?"

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい！」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: a3201.nss
Japanese: 返答するや否や、コンビニに駆け出すアオイ。
Translation: With that, she darts into the store.

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちゃんと、買えるかしら」
Translation: "I hope she manages to buy the right one."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「不安だな」
Translation: "I'm not too confident..."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「子猫、持ち込むのよ」
Translation: "She took the kitten in there."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「しかも着ぐるみだし」
Translation: "And she's still wearing that onesie."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私が行けばよかったんじゃない？」
Translation: "Maybe I should've handled it myself."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でも、アイツが自分で行くって……」
Translation: "But she said she wanted to do it, so..."

Name: a3201.nss
Japanese: 並んだまま、なんだか気まずい俺と美雪。
Translation: An awkward silence lingers.
KR: 나란히 선 채, 뭔가 어색한 우리 둘.

Name: a3201.nss
Japanese: もしかしてふたりきりにさせるのが、アオイの狙い？
Translation: Did Aoi leave us alone together on purpose?
KR: 설마 둘만 있게 하는 것이 아오이의 노림수인가?

Name: a3201.nss
Japanese: 遠くから、聞こえる車の音。
Translation: Faintly, I can hear cars passing in the distance.

Name: a3201.nss
Japanese: 道路が乾いているときとは微かに違う、雨上がりの粘っこい音。
Translation: Somehow the sound of tires on tarmac is always a little different just after the rain.
KR: 비가 온 뒤의 도로는 마른 도로와 다른 질퍽한 소리가 났다.

Name: a3201.nss
Japanese: チャイムが鳴り、新たな客がコンビニに吸い込まれる。
Translation: Another customer heads inside. A chime plays as the automatic doors slide open.
KR: 종이 울리며 새로운 손님이 편의점으로 들어간다.

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「確かに、さ」
Translation: "You know, I gotta admit..."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイは思いつきで猫を拾ったりしたけど――」
Translation: "Aoi might have adopted that cat purely on a whim, but..."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「正しいことをやってると思うんだ」
Translation: "I think she's just doing what she thinks is right."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それが人を苦しめるのよ」
Translation: "It'll only end in suffering, you know."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「現実とゲームがごっちゃになってさ。
　無計画で、心配なところがあるのもわかるけど」
Translation:
"Well, sure, maybe she can't tell reality from video games...
And her lack of forethought is cause for concern..."
KR: "현실과 게임을 혼동하고 무계획에 걱정되는 점도 있지만..."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイのそういう所、俺、嫌いって言い切れないんだ」
Translation: "But honestly, I can't say I dislike that about her."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「変な話で、ごめん」
Translation: "Sorry. Didn't meant to go off on that stupid tangent."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……別に、変じゃないと思うけど」
Translation: "...I don't think it was stupid."

Name: a3201.nss
Japanese: 何かを考え込むように、美雪は口を閉ざす。
Translation: Miyuki falls silent, as if in thought.
KR: 생각에 잠긴 듯 미유키는 입을 다물었다.

Name: a3201.nss
Japanese: つられて俺も、黙り込んだ。
Translation: I fall silent, too.

Name: a3201.nss
Japanese: 雨上がりの夜の街。
Translation: The smell of rain lingers in the city air.

Name: a3201.nss
Japanese: 晴れた西の空に、星々が瞬く。
Translation: Stars twinkle in the clear westerly sky.
KR: 맑게 갠 서쪽 하늘에선 별들이 반짝이고 있었다.

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あの、さ」
Translation: "Say, um..."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "What about me?"

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「自分の正しさを貫いたら、どうする？」
Translation: "How would you feel if I were to... do what I think is best for myself?"

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What do you mean?"

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……ええと、ね」

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ」
Translation: "Yeah...?"

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから、私の本当の気持ちを――」
Translation: "If I were to... be honest with how I really feel—"

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「しっ！」
Translation: "Shhh!"

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: a3201.nss
Japanese: 買い物を終えたアオイが、いつの間にかコンビニの陰からじっとこちらを見つめていた。
Translation: We turn to find Aoi standing there, shopping bag in hand, blatantly spying on us.
KR: 쇼핑을 끝낸 아오이가 어느샌가 편의점 앞에서 우리를 계속 바라보고 있었다.

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「買い物、終わってたのか？」
Translation: "G-Guess you managed to buy it, huh?"

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そうなの」
Translation: "Sure did."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そ、そう！　よくやったわね！」
Translation: "G-Good for you! I'm proud of you!"

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それじゃ、さっそく行きましょう！」
Translation: "Now then, let's get going!"

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、そ、そうだな！」
Translation: "R-Right!"

Name: a3201.nss
Japanese: 逃げ出すように、早足で歩き出す美雪。
Translation: Miyuki speeds off like she's eager to get out of here.

Name: a3201.nss
Japanese: 俺も慌てて、それについていく。
Translation: I hastily follow suit.

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a3201.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「フタリキリサクセン、シッパイなの？」
Translation: "Does this mean Operation Alone Time was a disaster?"

Name: a3201.nss
Japanese: やっぱり、そういう魂胆だったのか……
Translation: I knew it... She planned this...

Name: a3211.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「エル」
Translation: "Eru!"

Name: a3211.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「のむの」
Translation: "Drink up."

Name: a3211.nss
Japanese: アオイがエルに、ミルク入りのスポイトを近づける。
Translation: Aoi gently presses the tip of the feeding syringe to Eru's mouth.
KR: 아오이는 우유가 든 스포이드를 에루에게 가져갔다.

Name: a3211.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おいしそうなの」
Translation: "Eru seems to like it!"

Name: a3211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Yeah, no kidding."

Name: a3211.nss
Japanese: やっぱりお腹が減っていたのだろう。
Translation: The little thing must be starving.

Name: a3211.nss
Japanese: エルは夢中になって、スポイトに吸い付いた。
Translation: Eru latches on to the tip of the syringe.

Name: a3211.nss
Japanese: 哺乳瓶は手に入れられなかったが、なんとか代用できたみたいでよかった……
Translation: We couldn't find anyplace selling baby bottles, but at least this thing seems to do the trick just fine.
KR: 젖병은 구할 수 없었지만 대신할 만한 걸 찾아서 다행이다.

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そういや、コンビニに雄太郎はいたか？」
Translation: "Oh yeah, so was Yuutarou working the register?"

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いなかったの」
Translation: "Nope."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも、うちきっコてんいんさん、いたの」
Translation: "But that klutz was."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「内気っコ？」
Translation: "What klutz?"

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「エンゲキブの」
Translation: "The one from the theatre club."

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: あ、俺の顔を見るなり悲鳴を上げて逃げた彼女か……
Translation: Oh, right... The girl who screams and runs away whenever she sees me...
KR: 아, 내 얼굴을 보자마자 비명 지르며 도망친 여자애...

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あの性格で、バイトなんてできるのか？」
Translation: "That chick's practically afraid of her own shadow. How can she hold down a customer service job?"

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「こえかけたの」
Translation: "Aoi said hi."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「びっくり！」
Translation: "She got scared."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うしろとんだの」
Translation: "And jumped backwards."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「たなにぶつかるの」
Translation: "And hit the shelf."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
