Japanese: 「ショウヒンバラバラなの」
Translation: "And all the stuff on it went flying."

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: やっぱりか。
Translation: Sounds about right.

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺が入ったら、悲鳴上げて逃げ出したんじゃないか？」
Translation: "Good thing I didn't go in there. She would have run off again."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そっちのほうが、フラグ？」
Translation: "Maybe that's how you trigger her route flag."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、フラグクラッシャーなの？」
Translation: "Is Aoi a 'flag crusher'?"

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから、フラグってなんだよ？」
Translation: "How should I know? I don't even know what a 'flag' is!"

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Hmm?"

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: 背後から物音がしたので、振り返る。
Translation: Just then, I hear a noise behind me and turn to look.

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Whoa!"

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、とけたの！？」
Translation: "Is Miyuki melting?!"

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「い……いや、大丈夫だ……」
Translation: "Uhh... She's probably fine... Probably..."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ものすごい勢いでドアのガラスに張り付いてるだけだ」
Translation: "I think she's just pressed her face right up against the glass door, that's all."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ほんとうなの？」
Translation: "You sure?"

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「たぶん……」
Translation: "Mostly..."

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: あまりに凄まじすぎて、残念ながら映像媒体には載せられません――とか、そういうレベルの溶け方だった。
Translation: Seriously, she looks like she belongs on the set of a B-list horror movie. It's not pretty.
KR: 너무 끔찍해서 죄송하지만, 방송에 내보낼 수가 없습니다... 라고 할 정도로 녹아내렸다.

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: その目が、
Translation: But more importantly, there's a look in her eye that says—

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "GET OVER HERE!!!"

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: と俺を呼んでいた。
Translation: —so I'd better not leave her hanging.

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え、ええと……」
Translation: "Anyway... uh..."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「行ってくる」
Translation: "I'll... be right back."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きをつけるの」
Translation: "Be careful!"

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: まあ、いくらなんでも取って食ったりはしないだろ。
Translation: I mean, she's not ACTUALLY a monster from a B-list horror movie...

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: ……食わないよな？
Translation: ...right?

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんだよ？」
Translation: "What's your problem?"

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ずるい」
Translation: "It's not fair!"

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふたりで独占なんて、ずるいわ」
Translation: "I can't believe you two get to hog him all to yourself."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「しょうがないだろ。お前アレルギーなんだし」
Translation: "What else are we supposed to do? Let you die of allergies?"

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「楽しそう」
Translation: "You're all having fun without me."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、別に楽しくてやってるわけじゃ――」
Translation: "Look, we're not trying to rub it in or anyth—"

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: とん――
Translation: Out of nowhere, her hand suddenly touches mine—?!?!

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: と、出し抜けに俺の手に美雪の手が重なり何事！？
Translation: I start to panic.
KR: 느닷없이 내 손과 미유키의 손이 겹치다니 무슨 일이지!?

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: と混乱している内に美雪が離れ、俺の手に彼女の携帯電話が残った。
Translation: Then Miyuki leans away, and I realize her cell phone is now sitting atop my palm.
KR: 라고 당황하고 있는 틈에 미유키의 손이 빠져나가고 내 손엔 핸드폰이 남아있었다.

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「撮ってきて」
Translation: "Take pics."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「近くで、写真」
Translation: "Close-up shots."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「可愛いのを、お願いします！」
Translation: "Try to get some cute angles, if possible!"

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、どうしたの？」
Translation: "What did Miyuki want?"

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……拝まれた」
Translation: "...I have been tasked with a holy mission."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?"

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「コレで猫の写真撮ってくれって」
Translation: "She asked me to take pics of Eru on her phone."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、ねこ、すきなの」
Translation: "Miyuki sure loves kitty cats."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だな」
Translation: "Yep."

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: 俺は美雪に渡された携帯を、子猫に向ける。
Translation: I aim Miyuki's phone at the kitten.
KR: 미유키에게 받은 핸드폰을 새끼 고양이에게 향했다.

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: 今は食事に没頭しているようだが、果たして怖がったりしないでいてくれるかどうか――？
Translation: Right now he seems to be pretty focused on that tasty milk... I sure hope he won't be scared of me or the camera...
KR: 지금은 식사에 몰두하고 있는 것 같은데, 과연 무서워하진 않을지...

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: どうも、俺の心配は杞憂だったらしい。
Translation: As the shutter sound effect plays, I brace myself—
KR: 아무래도 내 걱정은 기우였던 것 같다.

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: 音を立てる携帯を不思議そうに眺めていたが、決して逃げだそうとはしない。
Translation: —but it doesn't spook Eru at all. In fact, the camera seems to have caught his attention, and he leans in curiously.
KR: 소리가 나는 핸드폰을 신기하게 바라보긴 해도 결코 도망가려 하진 않았다.

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: それどころかむしろ興味津々といった雰囲気で顔を近づけてきたりして。
Translation: Turns out I was worried for nothing.
KR: 그러기는커녕 오히려 흥미진진한 표정으로 얼굴을 가져다 댔다.

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「こいつ、なかなかできるな……！」
Translation: "Looks like we got ourselves the next top model for Feline Weekly over here!"

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「エル、デンパねこなの」
Translation: "Actually, Eru is a transceiver cat."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「電波ネコ……？」
Translation: "Oh yeah? And how does that work?"

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: 確かに額の白い斑点が、デンパに見えなくもない。
Translation: I mean, sure, the little tuft of white fur on his forehead DOES kinda look like a lightning bolt, but...
KR: 이마에 있는 흰 점이 번개처럼 보이긴 하는데...

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「みえないデンパで、きもち、つたわるの」
Translation: "Our emotions transmit on invisible airwaves that Eru can pick up."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、そんなわけ――」
Translation: "Give me a break..."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん？　エル？」
Translation: "Wait, what the? Where's Eru?"

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop!"

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: 食事を終えたエルは、誰が促したわけでもないのに、壁に張り付く美雪の方向へと歩いて行く。
Translation: After finishing his dinner, Eru toddles off—entirely unprompted—in the direction of the glass door Miyuki's currently glued herself to.
KR: 식사를 마친 에루는 누가 부른 것도 아닌데 벽에 붙어있는 미유키 쪽으로 걸어갔다.

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そんな……まさか！」
Translation: "No way..."

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: 子猫と美雪が、ガラス１枚を隔てて対峙した。
Translation: There, Eru and Miyuki face off, with only a single pane of glass between them.
KR: 에루와 미유키는 유리 한 장을 사이에 두고 대치했다.

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: 溶けかけて人外の顔をしている美雪。
Translation: Miyuki's face is still contorted beyond the recognizable trappings of humanity.
KR: 녹아버려 이젠 사람의 얼굴이 아니게 된 미유키.

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: そんな彼女を、エルは首を傾げて見つめると――
Translation: The kitten looks up at her, tilts his head—
KR: 그런 미유키를 에루는 고개를 갸웃하며 바라보더니...

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: ガラス越しに、頬を舐めた。
Translation: —and licks her cheek through the glass.

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おおおおお……！！」
Translation: "Oh my god!!!"

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: デンパ猫、すげえ！
Translation: This "transceiver cat" kicks ass!

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: 空気が読める猫過ぎる――！
Translation: Talk about insanely smart!

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、ガラスとびこえて、アレルギーなの？」
Translation: "Are Miyuki's allergies acting up through the glass now?"

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「言ってやるな。
　アレは、彼女の嬉し涙だ……」
Translation:
"Haha, good one.
Nah, those are just happy tears, methinks..."

Name: a3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うれしなみだ、しってる！」
Translation: "Happy tears! Aoi knows all about that!"

Name: a3212.nss
Japanese: なんにせよ、美雪が嬉しそうで良かった良かった……
Translation: I'm happy for you, Miyuki...

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「これでいいか？」
Translation: "What do you think?"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ありがとう」
Translation: "Perfect, thank you."

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: エルの写真を確認して、美雪は携帯をしまう。
Translation: Miyuki checks over the kitten pictures, then puts her phone away.
KR: 에루의 사진을 확인한 미유키는 핸드폰을 집어넣었다.

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前、ここまで猫好きだったっけ？」
Translation: "Were you always this much of a cat fanatic?"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「近づけないからこそ、想いが募るの」
Translation: "I guess you could say I want what I can't have."

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「その分、一度タガが外れたらあんな顔に――」
Translation: "Man, you should see the faces you make whenever you go all cat-crazy. You look like a cross between a—"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あれは忘れて！」
Translation: "Delete that from your brain, now!"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はいはい」
Translation: "Fine, fine..."

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: なんて返事をしつつも、アレだけ猫に夢中な美雪の顔を、忘れられそうにもないけれど。
Translation: Sorry, but there's no way I'm gonna be able to forget that monstrosity.
KR: 그렇게 대답했지만 그렇게나 고양이에 열중한 미유키의 얼굴을 잊어버릴 수 있을 것 같지 않다.

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ぐっすり眠ってるわね。まるで本物の親子だわ」
Translation: "Look at them, fast asleep in there... Almost like they really are mommy and baby..."
KR: "푹 자고 있네. 마치 진짜 가족 같아..."

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: 美雪に倣い、俺も扉越しにリビングの様子を観察する。
Translation: Following her lead, I peer into the living room from beyond the glass door.
KR: 미유키를 따라 나도 문 너머로 거실을 보았다.

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: アオイがソファの上、猫の着ぐるみ姿で子猫を抱き、寝息を立てていた。
Translation: Aoi's curled up on the couch in her kitty onesie, holding Eru in her arms, snoring away.
KR: 아오이는 고양이 옷을 입고 새끼 고양이를 안고서 소파 위에서 숨소리를 내고 있었다.

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……今回は、私が間違ってたのかもね」
Translation: "...Maybe I was wrong."

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「かもな」
Translation: "Yeah, maybe."

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: あの幸せな笑顔の前では、どんな理屈も無意味だ。
Translation: No amount of logic or reason could possibly hold a candle to that contented little smile.
KR: 저 행복한 미소 앞에서는 어떤 이론도 무의미하다.

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なんか、変な感じ」
Translation: "It's weird, you know?"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ずっと、彼女のやり方が好きになれなくて、絶対に直してやろうって息巻いてたのに」
Translation: "I always took issue with the way she would act... I swore to myself I'd set her straight..."
KR: "계속 아오이의 방식이 맘에 들지 않아서, 무조건 고쳐주겠다고 씩씩거렸는데..."

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「逆にやり込められちゃって」
Translation: "But that little punk totally turned the tables on me."

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でもいっそ、清々しいっていうか」
Translation: "And the funny thing is? It's like a breath of fresh air."

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「吹っ切れちゃった」
Translation: "I just... feel so free."

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: 美雪の言うとおり。
Translation: She's completely right.

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: これから先は大変だろうけど、あそこで猫を拾いに行かなかったら、絶対後悔していただろう。
Translation: Taking care of a kitten won't be easy, but I know we'd have regretted it otherwise.
KR: 앞으로 힘들겠지만, 거기서 고양이를 데리러 가지 않았다면 무조건 후회했겠지.

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: 自分の気持ちを大切にすることだって、必要なのだ。
Translation: In the end, sometimes it's important to just be true to your own desires.
KR: 자신의 마음을 소중히 하는 것도 필요한 일이다.

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「じゃ、今日はこんなところで――」
Translation: "Alright, I guess we should call it a night here and—"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「待って！」
Translation: "Wait!"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「まだ撮影する気か？」
Translation: "What, you want me to take some more pictures?"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうじゃなくて」
Translation: "No, that's not it."

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「泊める？　さすがにそれはマズいだろ」
Translation: "You wanna crash here for the night? I don't think it's a good idea, though."

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「違うの」
Translation: "No."

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今、伝えたくて」
Translation: "There's something I want to tell you."

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「伝え――えっ！？」
Translation: "What's tha—aaah?!"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Mi...yuki...?"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私、吹っ切れたの」
Translation: "I'm done clinging to the past."

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、俺を引っ張った。
Translation: Miyuki pulls me close until neither of us can see Aoi.

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: 俺からも、彼女からも、アオイの姿は見えない。
KR: 두사람 모두 아오이에게 보이지 않는 위치.

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: 美雪の身体は、俺と正面から向き合っている。
Translation: Her body is turned towards me... and yet her face is turned away.

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: そのくせ視線は合わせずに、顔はそっぽを向く。
KR: 그렇지만 시선은 마주치지 않고 다른 곳을 보고있다.

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: 距離感が、狂う。
Translation: We're too close. Way too close.

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: 時間感覚も、歪んでいて。
Translation: Time slows to a crawl.

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「キス、して」
Translation: "...Kiss me."

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: キス――キス――キス――
Translation: Kiss... Kiss... Kiss...

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: あの日、美雪の話を聞いてから。
Translation: Ever since Miyuki told me about the climax of the play...

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: 俺は何度、夢で彼女とキスをしただろう？
Translation: I've kissed her countless times in my dreams.
KR: 나는 몇 번이나 꿈속에서 미유키와 키스했을까.

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: これも夢の続きだろうか？
Translation: Is this all a dream, too?

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: それなら早く醒めて欲しい。早く――
Translation: If so, I need to wake up, fast—

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんで……急に、そんなこと……」
Translation: "Wow, that was... random..."

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「急じゃ……ないよ」
Translation: "No. It's not random, actually."

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: 囁く唇。
Translation: Her lips twitch with her whisper.

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: 俺は、彼女を好きになってはいけない。
Translation: I can't let myself fall in love with her.

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: キスなんてしたら、きっと――
Translation: And if we kiss, I definitely will.

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: だから、今すぐ逃げ出さなきゃならない。
Translation: Which means... I know what I have to do.

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: それを、俺は知っている。
Translation: I know I need to get out of here.

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: 知っているのに、でも――

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: 高鳴る心臓が、それを許してくれない。
Translation: But my heart won't let me.

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: 本当はずっと、キスを望んでいる。
Translation:
I can feel it pounding in my chest.
My heart wants this kiss to happen.

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「初めてのキスが舞台の上って、怖くて、だから……」
Translation: "I'm scared... I don't want my first kiss to be onstage..."

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから、練習、しておきたいの！」
Translation: "So... I want to get some practice in first!"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Practice?"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから、慣れておきたい、っていうか……」
Translation: "Yeah, like, I wanna get the hang of it, you know..."

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だめ、かな？」
Translation: "Is that... cool with you?"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「やるわけ、ないだろ」
Translation: "Hell no."

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "What?"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「相手役がいるだろ。俺には関係ないし」
Translation: "Go practice with your acting partner. This isn't my problem."

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「関係ない――？」
Translation: "Excuse me?"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、関係ない」
Translation: "What? It's not."

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いつでも……相談に乗るって、言った」
Translation: "But... you said you'd help me figure this out!"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから勇気を出して言ったのに、なのに――！」
Translation: "So I worked up all my courage to ask you—"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「練習のために、キスするってことだよな？」
Translation: "—To be your practice partner?"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ……う、うん。そうは言ったけど、でも――」
Translation: "Oh... O-Okay, look, I know what I said, but—"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どうせ俺は、お前にとって、ただの練習台なんだろ？」
Translation: "What am I, your guinea pig?"
KR: "어차피 너한테 있어 나는 그냥 연습용 인형이지?"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ち、違う！　それは誤解で――」
Translation: "N-No! You've got it all wrong—"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前、なんでこんなこと言いだしたんだよ！」
Translation: "Then why the fuck would you say that to me?!"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺が、どんな気持ちでお前と一緒に過ごしてたか――！」
Translation: "Do you have any idea how I feel, spending all this time with you?!"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "STOOOP!"

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: 扉を開けて、アオイがふたりの間に割って入る。
Translation: The glass door slides open, and Aoi jumps in between us.
KR: 아오이는 문을 열고 우리 사이를 파고들었다.

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ふたりとも、ケンカをしたらだめなの」
Translation: "No fighting allowed, you two!"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Aoi?!"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「せっかく、さんにんで、なかよくなれたのに――」
Translation: "Just when we're finally getting along..."

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「けんかなんて、そんなの……いや……な……」
Translation: "You're not... allowed... to... fi..."

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop..."

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょっ――アオイ！」
Translation: "What the—Aoi?!"

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: 倒れるアオイを、俺は慌てて抱きとめた。
Translation: Aoi's body topples sideways, and I quickly catch her in my arms.

Name: a3221.nss
Japanese: ぼんやりと見上げる彼女の瞳は、焦点を結んでいない。
Translation: Her eyes wander, unfocused.
KR: 멍하니 올려다보는 아오이의 눈동자는 초점이 맞지 않았다.

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、大丈夫か？　やっぱり体調――」
Translation: "What's wrong? You feeling sick?"

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a3221.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、デンチ、きれたの」
Translation: "Aoi's battery is dying."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ！」
Translation: "Aoi!"

Name: a3222.nss
Japanese: 外に出るなり、アオイはバランスを崩し倒れる。
Translation: The second we walk outside, Aoi loses her balance.
KR: 밖으로 나가자마자 아오이는 균형을 잃고 쓰러졌다.

Name: a3222.nss
Japanese: 慌てて俺が肩を貸し、事なきを得たが――
Translation: Acting quickly, I pull her arm over my shoulder to keep her upright.
KR: 내가 재빨리 어깨를 대줘서 무사히 넘어갔지만.

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あの、私も一緒に送る――」
Translation: "Wait! I'll help you get her back to the—"

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今日は、ちょっと、無理」
Translation: "Not today. Sorry."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それじゃ、また明日」
Translation: "See you tomorrow."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ……バイバイなの」
Translation: "Bye-bye... Miyuki..."

Name: a3222.nss
Japanese: 黙り込む美雪を、後に残して。
Translation: I walk off with Aoi, leaving Miyuki standing there in silence.
KR: 아무 말 못 하는 미유키를 남겨두고,

Name: a3222.nss
Japanese: 俺は、乾いた制服に着替えたアオイに、肩を貸す。
Translation: With one arm around my shoulders, Aoi hobbles down the street in her newly dried uniform.

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ホントに、マンガ喫茶に戻るのか？」
Translation: "You sure you want to go back to the manga cafe?"

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「一泊くらいならいいんだぞ？」
Translation: "You could always stay a couple nights at my place, you know."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それはキケンなフラグなの」
Translation: "That would trigger a risky event flag."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「病院は？」
Translation: "Okay, what about the hospital?"

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、デンチぶそくなの」
Translation: "Aoi needs to recharge."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ビョウイン、むだなの」
Translation: "The hospital won't help with that."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「じゃあせめてタクシー――」
Translation: "Then at least let me call you a taxi."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だいじょうぶなの」
Translation: "Aoi will be fine."

Name: a3222.nss
Japanese: 一度言い出すと、アオイはなかなか意見を譲らない。
Translation: I swear, once she puts her mind to something, she refuses to be swayed...
KR: 아오이는 한번 말을 꺼내면 좀처럼 의견을 굽히지 않는다.

Name: a3222.nss
Japanese: 幸い熱はないようで、風邪をひいているようにも思えなかったが、何かあったらタクシーを呼ぼう。
Translation: Thankfully she doesn't seem to be running a fever, so it probably isn't serious... but if she gives me another heart attack like that, I'm definitely calling a taxi.
KR: 다행히 열은 없는 것 같고, 감기 걸린 것 같지도 않은데... 무슨 일 있으면 택시를 부르자.

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ……」
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん……なんだ？」
Translation: "Hm? What's up?"

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どうしてアオイと、ともだちになったの？」
Translation: "Why did you make friends with me?"

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どうしてって、それは……」
Translation: "Oh... Well..."

Name: a3222.nss
Japanese: 俺はぼんやり、記憶を辿る。
Translation: I dimly retrace my memories... back to that day I first exchanged email addresses with Aoi.

Name: a3222.nss
Japanese: アオイとアドレスを交換して、友達になったあの日。
Translation: That was the day we officially became "friends."
KR: 아오이와 연락처를 교환하고 친구가 됐던 그날.

Name: a3222.nss
Japanese: 俺と美雪がツーショット写真を撮られて、それから――
Translation: Then she took a photo of me and Miyuki together, and...

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「教室で写真ばらまかれたくなくて」
Translation: "I didn't want you to spread that photo around."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それで、ともだちに？」
Translation: "That was your whole reason?"

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、その、だから、見てられなかったって言うか」
Translation: "Well, I mean, I had to do SOMETHING, right?"
KR: "아니, 그, 뭐냐... 가만둘 수 없었다고 할까."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でもシンイチ、めんどうごと、きらいなの」
Translation: "But you don't have the patience to deal with other people."

Name: a3222.nss
Japanese: 知ってる。
Translation: She's not wrong.

Name: a3222.nss
Japanese: クラスの厄介者であるアオイに声をかけるなんて、それこそ面倒事の中でもトップクラスだ。
Translation: Mukou Aoi is easily the most annoying girl in our class. Even just holding a conversation with her is exhausting.
KR: 교내 골칫덩이인 아오이에게 말을 걸다니, 그야말로 귀찮은 일 중에서도 최상위권이다.

Name: a3222.nss
Japanese: でも俺は、アオイに声をかけてしまった。
Translation: And yet I went and did it anyway.
KR: 하지만 나는 아오이에게 말을 걸고 말았다.

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「似てたのかもな」
Translation: "I guess... you reminded me of Miyuki."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「昔は美雪も、クラスに馴染めなくて、お前みたいにひとりぼっちだったから」
Translation: "When we were little, Miyuki had trouble fitting in, too. She was a loner, just like you."
KR: "옛날에는 미유키도 반에 적응하지 못해서, 너처럼 외톨이였으니까."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ……」
Translation: "Miyuki..."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そっか。シンイチは、ミユキを、たすけたかった……」
Translation: "So that's it... You wanted to help Miyuki..."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる」
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: a3222.nss
Japanese: それまで、おぼつかなげながらもひとりで道を歩くことができていたアオイが、崩れ落ちた。
Translation: One minute she's staggering along on her own two feet, and the next she collapses to the ground.
KR: 여태까지 불안하지만 혼자서 걸어가던 아오이가 땅바닥에 쓰러졌다.

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お、おい！」
Translation: "Y-You okay?!"

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だいじょうぶなの」
Translation: "Yeah..."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょっと待ってろよ」
Translation: "Hold on a sec!"

Name: a3222.nss
Japanese: 俺はタクシーを呼ぶべく、携帯電話を――
Translation: I pull out my phone to call a cab—

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いらないの」
Translation: "No thanks."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ここで、おわかれなの」
Translation: "This is where we say goodbye."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「こんなところに置いていけるかよ」
Translation: "I'm not just gonna leave you here!"

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いいの」
Translation: "It's fine."

Name: a3222.nss
Japanese: 遠くを見つめながら、アオイは言う。
Translation: Aoi speaks softly, her gaze distant.

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ヒコウリャクヒロインは、フェードアウトなの」
Translation: "Once you're on a route, all the other girls fade into the background."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だからアオイのこと、すぐ、わすれるの」
Translation: "So you'll forget about me soon enough."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイを、ここに、おいていったことも」
Translation: "And you'll forget you left me here."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「――バカか」
Translation: "Over my dead body!"

Name: a3222.nss
Japanese: 俺は溜息をついて、道ばたにしゃがみ込む。
Translation: Sighing, I crouch down at the side of the road.

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ほら」
Translation: "Hop on."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?!"

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「負ぶされよ」
Translation: "I'll carry you."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "What for?"

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どうせ、タクシーにも乗らないって言うんだろ？」
Translation: "Well, you won't let me call you a taxi!"

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ま、電話で呼ぶより歩いた方が早そうだし。ほら」
Translation: "Besides, it'll be faster to just walk there. Now hop on."
KR: "택시 부르는 것보다 걷는 게 빠를 것 같기도 하고. 어서."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも、アオイは――」
Translation: "But Aoi—"

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ほら、いいから！」
Translation: "I said, hop on!"

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺たち、友達だろ？」
Translation: "I mean, what else are friends for?"

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ともだち……」
Translation: "Friends..."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "...Okay."

Name: a3222.nss
Japanese: アオイを背負って、月夜を歩く。
Translation: Aoi climbs on my back, and we set off under the moonlight.

Name: a3222.nss
Japanese: 柔らかくて、温かくて、軽い。
Translation: She's so soft... and warm... and small...

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おまえ、軽すぎだろ。メシ食ってるのか？」
Translation: "Wow, you weigh, like, nothing almost. Are you making sure to eat?"
KR: "너 너무 가볍잖아. 밥은 잘 먹고 있는 거야?"

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ヤバトマのんでるの」
Translation: "Aoi drinks a lot of Yabaley's."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もっとカロリーとれ。中身空っぽになるぞ」
Translation: "You need something with more calories! You're gonna fade away to nothing at this rate."
KR: "좀 더 칼로리 있는 걸 먹어. 그러다 텅 비겠어."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きもちはつまってるの」
Translation: "But it has love in it."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「気持ち？」
Translation: "Love?"

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、まいにち、たのしかったの」
Translation: "Aoi's been having so much fun every day."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「わすれていたかんかくを、とりもどしたの」
Translation: "All those long-forgotten emotions have come rushing back."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それは、シンイチのおかげなの」
Translation: "And it's all thanks to you."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ、すきなの」
Translation: "I like you, Shinichi."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「すき。だいすきなの」
Translation: "I like you a whole bunch. I wuv you."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ、かお、あかいの」
Translation: "Shinichi, your face is all red."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「こいびとみたいなの？」
Translation: "Did Aoi sound like your girlfriend just now?"

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうじゃ、ないけどさ」

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うれしい」
Translation: "Aoi feels so happy now."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、うれしいの」
Translation: "Super happy."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おともだちで、よかったの」
Translation: "Being your friend is the best thing ever."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「もしかしたら……アオイルート、あったかもなの」
Translation: "Maybe... there could've been an Aoi route."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも、今は、ちがうの」
Translation: "But not now."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキルートなの」
Translation: "This is Miyuki's route."

Name: a3222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、だからそんなゲームの話じゃ――」
Translation: "I told you, stop talking like we're in a vi—"

Name: a3223.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチは、ネトラレないの」
Translation: "You won't get cucked, Shinichi."

Name: a3223.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ねとられ……？」
Translation: "Excuse me?"

Name: a3223.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そう。アオイは、セカイをアップデートしたから」
Translation: "Aoi already patched the universe to make sure."

Name: a3223.nss
Japanese: 学校の屋上、世界の中心で――
Translation: Up there on top of the roof... at the center of the world...

Name: a3223.nss
Japanese: アオイはセカイをアップデートした。
Translation: Aoi "updated" the universe.

Name: a3223.nss
Japanese: でも、アレはゲームのイベント。
Translation: But that was just her acting out a scene from the game...

Name: a3223.nss
Japanese: だったはず……だよな？
Translation: Right?

Name: a3223.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ――」
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: a3223.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキの、おうじさまになるの」
Translation: "You're going to be Miyuki's prince."

Name: a3223.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Her... prince...?"

Name: a3223.nss
Japanese: 思わず自分の耳を疑ってしまう。
Translation: I can't believe what I'm hearing.

Name: a3223.nss
Japanese: 王子様なんて、俺からもっとも縁遠い存在じゃないか。
Translation: Of all the words that could be used to describe me, "prince" isn't one of them.
KR: 왕자님이라니, 나랑 가장 인연이 먼 존재잖아.

Name: a3224.nss
Japanese: ゆっくり、ゆっくり夜の街を歩き、俺たちはようやくマンガ喫茶に辿り着く。
Translation: Step by step, we walk slowly through the dusky city until we arrive at the manga cafe.
KR: 천천히, 천천히 밤거리를 걸어 우리는 겨우 만화방에 도착했다.

Name: a3224.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ、ありがとうなの」
Translation: "Shinichi, thank you."

Name: a3224.nss
Japanese: おんぶを終えたアオイは、深々と頭を下げた。
Translation: Aoi hops off my back.
KR: 내 등에서 내린 아오이는 깊이 고개를 숙였다.

Name: a3224.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「本当に病院行かなくて、大丈夫か？」
Translation: "You sure you don't need to go to the hospital?"

Name: a3224.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ビリビリ、ジュウデン、カイフクなの」
Translation: "The zappy recharged my batteries."

Name: a3224.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「イベントＣＧのおかげなの」
Translation: "All thanks to the event CG."

Name: a3224.nss
Japanese: だからイベントＣＧって何だ？
Translation: What CG is she talking about?

Name: a3224.nss
Japanese: とは思うものの、確かにアオイの足取りは、家を出たときよりもしっかりしているように思えた。
Translation: The good news is, she doesn't seem as dizzy as she was back outside my house.
KR: 그 와중에 아오이의 걸음은 집을 나왔을 때보다 확실히 좋아 보였다.

Name: a3224.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ゆっくり休めよ」
Translation: "Get plenty of rest, you hear me?"

Name: a3224.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「エルは、俺がちゃんと面倒見ておくから」
Translation: "I'll look after Eru."

Name: a3224.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おねがいするの」
Translation: "Please do."

Name: a3224.nss
Japanese: アオイはペコリと頭を下げて、手を振った。
Translation: Aoi waves to me.
KR: 아오이는 꾸벅 고개를 숙이고 손을 흔들었다.

Name: a3224.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「バイバイなの」
Translation: "Bye-bye."

Name: a3224.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おやすみ」
Translation: "Have a good night."

Name: a3224.nss
Japanese: ゆっくりと、店に入っていくアオイ。
Translation: With that, she slowly disappears into the cafe.

Name: a3224.nss
Japanese: エレベーターに吸い込まれるまで、彼女の姿を見送った。
Translation: I watch her go until the elevator doors close.
KR: 나는 엘리베이터에 타는 모습까지 보고 나서야 집에 돌아갔다.

Name: a3224.nss
Japanese: 思い返せば、とても長い１日だ。
Translation: Thinking back, this has been one hell of a day.

Name: a3224.nss
Japanese: 色々と考えるべき事がある気もする。
Translation: I've still got some stuff to process, myself.
KR: 여러모로 생각해야 할 일들이 있는 것 같은데...

Name: a3224.nss
Japanese: でも――
Translation: But...

Name: a3224.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、一緒に寝るか」
Translation: "Hey there, little buddy. Wanna sleep in my bed?"

Name: a3224.nss
Japanese: 俺は、エルと一緒にベッドに入る。
Translation: Eru and I slide under the covers.

Name: a3224.nss
Japanese: 布団の中に入ると、全身に疲れがやってきた。
Translation: I can feel the exhaustion weighing down every inch of my body.
KR: 이불 속에 들어가자 온몸에 피로가 몰려왔다.

Name: a3224.nss
Japanese: もう、なにも考えたくなかった。
Translation: I'm too tired to think right now.
KR: 더 이상 아무것도 생각하고 싶지 않았다.

Name: a3224.nss
Japanese: 眠りはなかなか訪れてくれそうになかった。
Translation: And yet somehow sleep evades me.
KR: 하지만 좀처럼 잠에 들 수 없었다.

Name: a5111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ふわぁあぁあ……」
Translation: *yaaaawn*

Name: a5111.nss
Japanese: 眠い。
Translation: I'm so sleepy...

Name: a5111.nss
Japanese: 昨晩は、全然眠れなかった。
Translation: I didn't get a wink of sleep last night.

Name: a5111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……眠れるかよ」
Translation: "No surprise there."

Name: a5111.nss
Japanese: 隣で眠っていたエルが、問いかけるように鳴く。
Translation: Eru looks up and meows inquisitively at me.
KR: 옆에서 자고 있던 에루가 따지듯이 울었다.

Name: a5111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、お前のせいじゃないけど」
Translation: "No, it's not your fault."

Name: a5111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「――って、そうか。ごはんだな」
Translation: "Wait, that's right. We gotta have breakfast!"

Name: a5111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ほら、ミルクだぞ」
Translation: "Drink up, furball."

Name: a5111.nss
Japanese: 俺はエルを抱きかかえながら、スポイトでミルクを飲ませてやる。
Translation: With Eru cradled in one arm, I use my free hand to tilt the syringe.
KR: 나는 에루를 안고 스포이드로 우유를 먹였다.

Name: a5111.nss
Japanese: ――さて。
Translation: Now then...

Name: a5111.nss
Japanese: これから、どうしようか。
Translation: What next?

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おはよう」
Translation: "Morning."

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「心一ッッ！！　おッはよ――――うッ！！」
Translation: "SHINICHI! GOOD MORNING!!!"

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「うるさい」
Translation: "Stop shouting!"

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「はっはー？　なになに？
　俺が何故ここまでハイテンションか、その理由を――」
Translation:
"Hah hah! What's this?
Are you curious what's got me so worked up?"
KR:
"하핫! 뭘까뭘까?
내가 어째서 이렇게 텐션이 좋은지, 그 이유를..."

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「知りたくありません」
Translation: "Not in the least."

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「実はな！」
Translation: "Well, you see—"

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「聞けよ」
Translation: "Don't ignore me!"

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「なんと！　龍二郎に！
　好きな女の子が出来たんだ！！」
Translation:
"It turns out! My brother Ryuujirou!
Has a crush on someone!!!"

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お、ホントに？」
Translation: "Really?"

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「たった今、本人からメールが来たから間違いない！」
Translation: "Really really! I just got an email from the man himself!"

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「よかったな。
　これで弟くんも、ノーマルな道を歩むわけだ」
Translation:
"Well, that's good.
Now he can have a more healthy romantic outlet."
KR:
"잘 됐네.
이제 네 동생도 평범한 길을 가는구나."

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「そうなんだ……」
Translation: "Yeah..."

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「そうなんだよ……」
Translation: "You're right..."

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん？　嬉しくないのか？」
Translation: "What? Aren't you happy for him?"

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「いや……失ってみると……
　意外と、切ないものだなって……」
Translation:
"It's just... now that it's gone...
it's surprising how much it hurts..."

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「俺の、幻のロマンス……」
Translation: "My sad, phantom romance..."

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「幻でいいだろ」
Translation: "He was your brother!"

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「でもな心一よく考えろあんな可愛いコが俺に告白してくれたんだぞそんなことあるかありませんないです！」
Translation: "But think about it, Shinichi! He was cute, and he confessed to me! Does that sort of thing happen every day?! It doesn't! It really doesn't!"
KR: "하지만 신이치, 잘 생각해봐. 그런 귀여운 애가 나한테 고백했다고? 그런 일이 또 있을까? 없어, 없다고!"

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「と、そこで相談だッ！」
Translation: "So, I need some advice!"

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「最近心一、向日と仲いいだろ？　懇ろだろ？」
Translation: "Shinichi, you've gotten pretty friendly with Mukou, yeah? Pretty close, you might say?"

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「そして向日は曽根さんと仲が良い――
　ほっら開いた！」
Translation:
"And Mukou is pretty friendly with Sone-san—
There! You see that?"
KR:
"그리고 무코우는 소네 씨와 사이가 좋지...
자! 열렸다!"

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「何が開くんだよ？」
Translation: "See what?"

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「曽根さんへの浪漫街道だよ！」
Translation: "The path to Sone-san's heart!"

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「閉じろ」
Translation: "Do Not Enter."

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「頼む！　心一！　この通り！
　俺が曽根さんと懇ろになるために、どうか、どうか！」
Translation:
"Please, Shinichi! I'm begging you!
Pleeease help me get to know Sone-san! PLEASE!"
KR:
"부탁이야, 신이치! 이렇게 빌게!
소네 씨와 친해지고 싶어! 제발, 제발!"

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「無理」
Translation: "No can do."

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「力を貸してくれ浪漫の神様ァッ！！」
Translation: "Lend me your strength, God of Dreams!"

Name: a5112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「拝むな」
Translation: "Find a different god."

Name: a5113.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ああっ！　噂をすれば曽根さんで――」
Translation: "Ah...! Speak of the angel, and she appears—"

Name: a5113.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一」
Translation: "Shinichi!"

Name: a5113.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一、聞こえないの？」
Translation: "Hello? Shinichi? Can you hear me?"

Name: a5113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「…………なんだよ」
Translation: "......What do you want?"

Name: a5113.nss
Japanese: 普段ならクラス中に笑顔を振りまき教室へやってくるはずの美雪が、真剣極まりない表情で――
Translation: Normally Miyuki's all smiles whenever she walks into the classroom, but today her expression is stony...
KR: 평소대로면 미소를 지으며 교실에 들어왔을 미유키가 진지하기 짝이 없는 표정으로...

Name: a5113.nss
Japanese: モブ中のモブであるところの俺を、名指しした。
Translation: ...and she just spoke to me, the ultimate nobody.
KR: 반에서 학생1을 맡고 있는 나를 콕 집어 말했다.

Name: a5113.nss
Japanese: 教室中が、異変に静まりかえる。
Translation: All at once, the whole room goes weirdly quiet.
KR: 교실 안은 예상치 못한 사태에 조용해졌다.

Name: a5113.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「来なさい」
Translation: "I need to borrow you."

Name: a5113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「は？　どこに――」
Translation: "What? And go where?"

Name: a5113.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いいから来るの！」
Translation: "Just come with me!"

Name: a5113.nss
Japanese: 有無を言わせず、美雪は俺を拉致。
Translation: Unwilling to take no for an answer, Miyuki starts to drag me forcefully away.
KR: 미유키는 대답도 듣지 않고 날 납치했다.

Name: a5113.nss
Japanese: 俺はクラス中の注目を浴びながら、教室を後にする。
Translation: I reluctantly follow her out of the room, trying to ignore all the curious looks we're getting.
KR: 나는 반 전체의 주목을 받으며 교실을 나갔다.

Name: a5113.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「裏切り者のー裏切り者のー裏切り者のーブルースー」
Translation: "Backstabber... Backstabber... Backstabber blues..."

Name: a5113.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「るるるーるるるるーるるるるー」
Translation: "Doo doo doo... doo doo doo doo... doo doo doo doo..."

Name: a5113.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎の陰気な歌が、教室の廊下にこだまする。
Translation: Yuutarou's plaintive song echoes out into the hall.

Name: a5113.nss
Japanese: ああ、今頃クラスメイトは、俺のあらぬ噂で持ちきりなんだろうな……
Translation: Oh god, now the whole class is going to spread rumors about me for sure...
KR: 아... 지금쯤 교실은 나에 대한 얘기로 떠들썩하겠지...

Name: a5113.nss
Japanese: 考えただけで、憂鬱だ。
Translation: This is the pits...

Name: a5121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ホームルーム始まったぞ」
Translation: "Homeroom's starting, you know."

Name: a5121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「関係ない」
Translation: "That doesn't matter."

Name: a5121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょっと！　痛いし！　引っ張るな！」
Translation: "Hey! That HURTS! Quit pulling so hard!"

Name: a5121.nss
Japanese: １限目、授業で使う予定はないらしい。
Translation: It's dead quiet here in the old gymnasium.

Name: a5121.nss
Japanese: 無音の旧体育館。
Translation: Evidently there's no first period gym class today.

Name: a5121.nss
Japanese: センターサークルで、ようやく美雪は手を離した。
Translation: Miyuki drags me all the way to the center of the basketball court.
KR: 미유키는 체육관 한가운데 와서야 겨우 손을 놓았다.

Name: a5121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「で、なんなんだよ？」
Translation: "So, what do you want?"

Name: a5122.nss
Japanese: 演劇の舞台の側で、ふたりきり。
Translation: We're all alone by the stage.

Name: a5122.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、真正面から俺を睨み付ける。
Translation: Miyuki glares deep into my eyes.

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一、貴方――」
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイのこと、まだ何か隠してるでしょう？」
Translation: "You're hiding something from me about Aoi, aren't you?"

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺が、隠し事？」
Translation: "Me? Hiding something?"

Name: a5122.nss
Japanese: とりあえず、昨日のキスの話ではないようだが……
Translation: Okay, so this isn't about the incident from last night, I take it...
KR: 일단 어제 키스 얘기는 아닌 것 같은데...

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あの日！」
Translation: "That night!"

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「雨降りの中、ここでアオイを見つけたあの日、手がかりがあるって言ってたわよね？　家でなにをしてたの？」
Translation: "That night in the rain, when we found Aoi here... You figured it out somehow, right? What did you go back to your house for?"
KR: "비 오는데 여기서 아오이를 발견한 그날, 단서가 있다고 했지? 집에서 뭐하고 있었어?"

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん……ああ、あの時か」
Translation: "Huh? ...Oh, right!"

Name: a5122.nss
Japanese: アオイの居場所を探すためにゲームをしていた、なんて正直に答えたら、美雪はきっと怒り出す――
Translation: God... If I tell her I was looking for clues in a video game, she's gonna kick my ass...
KR: 아오이가 있는 곳을 찾기 위해 게임을 하고 있었다...고 솔직하게 말하면 미유키는 분명 화내겠지...

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「教えなさい！！」
Translation: "Tell me this instant!"

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……ゲームしに戻ったんだよ」
Translation: "...I went back to play a video game."

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ゲーム？」
Translation: "A video game?"

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「初めて会ったときもそうだけど、アオイさ、スマフォのゲームの真似してたみたいなんだ」
Translation: "Aoi's acting out scenes from a mobile game. She's been doing it ever since we first met."
KR: "처음 만났을 때도 그렇지만, 아오이는 게임 속 인물을 흉내내는 것 같아."

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そのゲームで、現実を予想した？」
Translation: "So you used that game to predict the future?"

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「いやあ、まさかホントに学校にいるなんてな。
　そこまで真似してるとは思わなかったし」
Translation:
"I wasn't actually expecting her to be in here!
I guess she's just REALLY dedicated to the game script."
KR:
"이야, 설마 정말로 학교에 있을 줄이야.
그렇게까지 따라 할 줄은 몰랐어."

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Haah..."

Name: a5122.nss
Japanese: 美雪が突然、深く重い溜息をつく。
Translation: Miyuki lets out a heavy sigh.

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あの後、猫を拾ったわよね？」
Translation: "And she adopts a cat in the game?"

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「ああ、エルを見つけた時な。
　アレはすごい再現度――」
Translation:
"Yeah. You know when we found Eru?
I swear, it was almost like a 1:1 reproduction—"

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「台詞はいい。ネコミミも用意できる」
Translation: "Reciting lines is one thing. And cat ears aren't hard to come by."
KR: "대사는 괜찮아. 고양이 귀도 준비할 수 있어."

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でも、肝心の子猫はどうしたの？」
Translation: "But what about the cat?"

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから、捨て猫。エル」
Translation: "The kitten. Eru."

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「家に置いとくのも心配だから、学校に連れてきて屋上で遊ばせといてた――」
Translation: "Oh, well, I was worried about leaving the little thing all by itself in my house, so I brought him to school. I'm letting him hang out up on the roof for now, and—"
KR: "집에 두는 것도 걱정돼서 학교에 데려와서 마음껏 놀게 해뒀..."

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうじゃなくて！」
Translation: "Not that!"

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どうして都合良く、捨て猫を見つけられたの？」
Translation: "What I mean is, how did she 'just happen' to find a stray cat?"
KR: "어떻게 상황에 딱 맞게 버려진 고양이를 찾을 수 있었던 거야?"

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ゲームのシーンを再現するため、わざわざ、保健所からもらってきたっていうの？」
Translation: "Did she go out of her way to get one from a shelter just so she could act out a scene from the game?"
KR: "게임 장면을 재현하려고 일부러 보건소에서 데려왔다는 거야?"

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、それは――」
Translation: "Oh... well..."

Name: a5122.nss
Japanese: 言われてみれば確かにそうだ。
Translation: She has a point.

Name: a5122.nss
Japanese: アオイがそこまでゲームの再現にこだわる必要は、俺には到底思いつかない。
Translation: I can't imagine Aoi would go quite that far.
KR: 어째서 아오이가 그렇게까지 게임을 따라 할 필요가 있었는지 모르겠다.

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ってことは、偶然……？」
Translation: "Maybe it was a coincidence...?"

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんな偶然、あり得ると思う？」
Translation: "A coincidence? Really?"

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイの祈りが、神様に届いた……とか」
Translation: "Maybe God answered her prayers...?"

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょっと美雪！　どこに――」
Translation: "Miyuki, wait! Where are you g—"

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「早退」
Translation: "Home."

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「確かめなきゃならないことがあるの。
　あとでまた連絡するわ」
Translation:
"I need to check something.
I'll call you later."
KR:
"확인해야만 할 게 있어.
나중에 다시 연락할게."

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あとでって――」
Translation: "When is 'later'?"

Name: a5122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……なんなんだよ」
Translation: "...The heck is her deal?"

Name: a5131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「すいません、遅刻しました」
Translation: "Sorry I'm late."

Name: a5131.nss
Japanese: １時間目の授業は、当然始まっていた。
Translation: By the time I get back, first period's already started.

Name: a5131.nss
Japanese: 俺は頭を下げて、自分の席に着く。
Translation: I apologize to the teacher and return to my desk.

Name: a5131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Hm?"

Name: a5131.nss
Japanese: 笑顔でノートの切れ端を差し出す雄太郎。
Translation: Yuutarou passes me a note, smiling.
KR: 웃는 얼굴로 노트 조각을 내미는 유우타로.

Name: a5131.nss
Japanese: ――フられたか？　フられたな！
Translation: —Did she shoot you down? She did, didn't she?!

Name: a5131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Haah..."

Name: a5131.nss
Japanese: 俺は溜息と共に、紙を丸める。
Translation: I sigh and crumple the note into a ball.

Name: a5131.nss
Japanese: ふと顔を上げると――
Translation: When I look up—

Name: a5132.nss
Japanese: アオイの席が空いていた。
Translation: Aoi's desk is empty.

Name: a5132.nss
Japanese: やっぱり、昨日の具合が治らなかったのか……？
Translation: Is she still feeling sick from yesterday?

Name: a5141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Ggllpp... ggllpp... Mm..."

Name: a5141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ぷはぁッ」
Translation: "Whew!"

Name: a5141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "......Disgusting."

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: ヤバトマの空き缶が、屋上に甲高い音を立てる。
Translation: The empty can clinks as I set it on the ground.
KR: 빈 야바토마 캔이 날카로운 소리를 냈다.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 独りで昼食を食べるのは、久々だ。
Translation: It's been a while since the last time I ate lunch alone up here.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 焼きそばパン、コロッケパン。
Translation: Croquettes and a yakisoba sub—the delicious taste of garbage.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 懐かしい、ジャンクの味。

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: ここ最近、美雪の料理に頼りっぱなしだったことに、今さらながら気付かされる。
Translation: Days like these make me realize how much I've been taking Miyuki's home cooking for granted.
KR: 요즘 미유키가 해준 요리에만 의존해왔다는 걸 새삼 깨달았다.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: ずっと、あんな日が続くんだと、漠然と思っていた。
Translation: I'd vaguely hoped those days would last forever...
KR: 그런 날이 계속될 거라고 막연히 믿고 있었다.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: でも、俺たちの関係は、歪んでいて。
Translation: But our friendship is all fucked up.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 全てはあの日――
Translation: Ever since that day...

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 夕陽の落ちるこの屋上で、彼女が俺に告白した、あの瞬間から始まっていたのだ。
Translation: The day she confessed her love to me right here on the roof, beneath the setting sun. That was the moment it all began.
KR: 석양이 지는 옥상에서, 미유키가 고백한 그 순간부터 시작된 것이다.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: あの告白が、彼女の本当の気持ちで。
Translation: She'd meant every word of it.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 彼女がずっと、あの言葉を秘めていて。
Translation: She'd kept those feelings locked away in her heart all this time.
KR: 미유키는 계속 그 말을 간직하고 있어서.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: それを、俺も心のどこかで知っていて。
Translation: Somewhere, deep down, I knew.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: それでも俺は、美雪と近づいてしまった。
Translation: And yet I let myself get close to her anyway.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 苦しむだけだってのは、わかっているのに。
Translation: Even though I knew it would only end in misery.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: ポケットが震える。
Translation: Just then, my pocket vibrates.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 慌てて携帯電話を手に取るが、アオイのスマフォから電波が届くはずはなく――
Translation: I quickly whip my phone out, even though I know there's no chance Aoi's phone has service.
KR: 황급히 핸드폰을 꺼냈지만, 아오이 핸드폰이 터질 리가 없었고...

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: メールの送信者は、曽根美雪だった。
Translation: The email is from Miyuki.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: ――大事な話があります。
Translation: —I need to talk to you.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: ――今日の夜、バッティングセンターに来て下さい。
Translation: —Please come by the batting cages tonight.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: ――お願いします。
Translation: —It's important.

Name: a5141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 美雪の唇が、頭から離れない。
Translation: I can't get her lips out of my head.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: ならいっそ、アオイの言うとおりにキスしてみるか？
Translation: Should I just... kiss her, like Aoi wants me to?

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 本当に、彼女を奪い去ってみるか？
Translation: Should I actually try to make her mine?

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 演劇の舞台――
Translation: The night of the play...

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 連日遅くまでの練習の成果を見せるべく、バット片手にステージ上を縦横無尽に駆け巡る美雪。
Translation: All those late nights of rehearsal have paid off. Miyuki practically dances across the stage, bat in hand, flaunting her skills.
KR: 연일 늦게까지 연습의 성과를 보여주기 위해 방망이를 한 손에 들고 무대 위를 종횡무진 누비는 미유키.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 主役の名に恥じない彼女の芝居に、観客席は釘付け。
Translation: Her stunning talent makes her more than worthy of the lead role. All eyes are glued to her.
KR: 주역에 부끄럽지 않은 미유키의 연기에 관객들은 눈을 떼지 못한다.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 一挙手一投足に溜息が漏れ、笑いが飛び出し、涙がこぼれ落ちる。
Translation: She barely needs to lift a finger and the audience laughs, cries, and gasps right along with her.
KR: 미유키의 일거수일투족에 탄식이 흘러나오고, 웃음이 터져 나오며 눈물이 흘러내린다.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 美雪を中心として、劇の起伏は激しくなり、会場中が大きな渦へと呑み込まれていく。
Translation: With Miyuki in the spotlight, the tension builds, drawing the entire auditorium into her magnetic pull.
KR: 미유키를 중심으로 연극의 기복은 격렬해지고 회장 전체에 큰 소용돌이가 휘몰아친다.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: やがて、舞台は最高潮に。
Translation: Then, at last, the climactic moment.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: バットを振り抜き、ホームランを放つ美雪。
Translation: Miyuki swings her bat and hits a home run.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 沸き上がる歓声、溢れる笑顔。
Translation: The crowd roars in delight.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 降りかかる最大の困難に打ち克った彼女は、自分を支えてきた恋人役と抱き合う。
Translation: With all her troubles safely behind her, she embraces the romantic lead.
KR: 자신에게 닥친 가장 큰 어려움을 이겨낸 여자 주인공은 자신을 지탱해준 애인을 껴안는다.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 唇を重ねようとするふたり。
Translation: Their lips draw close.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: しかし、俺だけは知っている。
Translation: But I know the truth.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 唇をあわせる直前、演劇を完璧なものにしようとファーストキスを捧げる彼女の唇が――
Translation: Just as she's about to sacrifice her first kiss in order to make the play a roaring success...
KR: 입을 맞추기 직전, 연극을 완벽히 하기 위해 첫 키스를 바치는 미유키의 입술이...

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 恐怖に震えていることを。
Translation: ...she'll be trembling in fear.

Name: a5141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "HOLD IT!!!"

Name: a5141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「え！？　その声――心一！？」
Translation: "What?! Is that... Shinichi?!"

Name: a5141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「嘘！　今、演劇の途中――」
Translation: "No way! We're in the middle of a performance—!"

Name: a5141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「良いから、行こう」
Translation: "Who cares? Come on!"

Name: a5141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「演劇を壊して、ごめん」
Translation: "Sorry for ruining the play."

Name: a5141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "But—"

Name: a5141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「これが、俺の本当の気持ちなんだ！」
Translation: "I'm done lying about how I feel!"

Name: a5141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「自惚れるな、バカ野郎」
Translation: "God, I'm so full of myself... Pathetic."

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 思わず、毒づく。
Translation: I curse myself for my stupid fantasy.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 俺はきっと、舞台をブチ壊しにするだろう。
Translation: I would ruin the whole play.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 「他の男にキスするな」なんて、みみっちい個人のわがままで、美雪を困らせてしまうだろう。
Translation: I'd just cause trouble for Miyuki with my selfish desire to keep her from kissing any other guys.
KR: '다른 남자랑 키스하지 마'라니, 쩨쩨한 개인의 욕심으로 미유키를 곤란하게 만들겠지.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 彼女が羽ばたく、足枷になるだろう。
Translation: I'd be the dead weight that keeps her dragged down.
KR: 미유키를 날지 못하게 하는 족쇄가 되겠지.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: だって俺は――ただのモブ。
Translation: After all... I'm just a nobody.

Name: a5141.nss
Japanese: 彼女をキスで目覚めさせる王子には、ほど遠いのだ。
Translation: I'm not some Prince Charming who can wake her with a kiss.
KR: 키스로 공주님을 깨우는 왕자님이 되기엔 한참 멀었다.

Name: a5151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「心一！　帰り、ゲーセンに――」
Translation: "Shinichi! Wanna swing by the arcade l—"

Name: a5151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「悪い。俺、行くところあるから」
Translation: "Sorry, I already have plans."

Name: a5151.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「おう、そうか」
Translation: "Oh, okay."

Name: a5151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「じゃあな！」
Translation: "See ya!"

Name: a5151.nss
Japanese: 授業が終わるやいなや、俺は帰り支度をして席を立つ。
Translation: As soon as class lets out, I grab my things and jump to my feet.
KR: 수업이 끝나자마자 나는 돌아갈 준비를 하고 자리를 일어났다.

Name: a5151.nss
Japanese: 結局あれから、アオイは学校に姿を現さなかった。
Translation: Aoi still hasn't been back to school.

Name: a5151.nss
Japanese: 昨日の判断は間違っていたのだろうか……？
Translation: Did I make the wrong choice last night...?

Name: a5151.nss
Japanese: 屋上でエルを回収し、まずはマンガ喫茶に向かう。
Translation: I retrieve Eru from the roof, then head to the manga cafe.
KR: 옥상에서 에루를 데리고 우선 만화방을 향했다.

Name: a5151.nss
Japanese: 店員も彼女の事はかなり印象に残っているようだったが、アオイは朝早くに店を出たまま。
Translation: When I ask about Aoi, the employees instantly know exactly who I mean. They tell me she left the cafe early this morning and hasn't been back.
KR: 점원분도 아오이가 인상에 남아있는 듯했지만, 아오이는 아침 일찍 가게를 나갔고.

Name: a5151.nss
Japanese: そこまで具合が悪そうな様子は見られなかったという。
Translation: According to them, she didn't look particularly sick.
KR: 그렇게까지 상태가 안 좋아 보이진 않았다고 한다.

Name: a5151.nss
Japanese: でも、それじゃあ何故アオイは学校に来ない？
Translation: So why hasn't she been coming to school?
KR: 그럼, 어째서 아오이는 학교에 오질 않는 거지?

Name: a5151.nss
Japanese: もしかして、保護者の家に帰ったのか？
Translation: Did she go back to her parents' house?

Name: a5151.nss
Japanese: それともなにか別の理由が？
Translation: Or is something else going on with her?

Name: a5151.nss
Japanese: いくら考えても、まるで見当がつかなかった。
Translation: ...No amount of theorizing is going to help me find the answer.

Name: a5151.nss
Japanese: 俺は、アオイのことを知らなすぎた。
Translation: I just don't know enough about her, simple as that.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 家に戻りエルに夕食のミルクを与え、一休み。
Translation: Back at home, after I feed Eru dinner, I finally have time to catch my breath.
KR: 집으로 돌아가서 에루에게 저녁을 주고 잠시 숨을 돌렸다.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 時計を見ると、もうそろそろ日が暮れる。
Translation: I glance at the clock. It's nearly sundown.
KR: 시계를 보니 슬슬 해가 질 시간이다.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 美雪からのメールに時間指定は無かったが、日が暮れてすぐというのが、暗黙の了解になっていた。
Translation: Miyuki never specified a meetup time beyond "tonight," but she probably meant whenever it gets dark outside.
KR: 미유키가 보낸 메일에 정해진 시간은 없었지만, 해가 지자마자라는 것이 암묵적인 룰이었다.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: ――大事な話があります。
Translation: —I need to talk to you.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 何度も何度も、メールの文面を確認する。
Translation: I keep reading her email over and over.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 俺だって、バカじゃない。
Translation: I may be dense, but I'm not THAT dense.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: その話の中身が、一体なにに関係することかくらい、想像はついていた。
Translation: I have a pretty good idea of exactly what she wants to talk about.
KR: 그 얘기라는 게 뭘 말하는 건지 상상이 간다.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: でもそれは……
Translation: The problem is...

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 俺たちの関係が、変わってしまうことを意味するのだ。
Translation: It'll mean upending our entire existing friendship.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 刻一刻と、時だけが過ぎていく。
Translation: The minutes tick by.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 美雪はバッティングセンターで待っているだろうか？
Translation: Is she waiting for me at the batting cages by now?

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 独りで黙々バットを振り続ける彼女。
Translation: I can picture her standing there alone, swinging her bat in silence.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: その姿を想像するだけで、ジリジリと追い立てられるような気分に襲われる。
Translation: The mental image is enough to make me antsy.
KR: 그 모습을 상상하기만 해도 바짝바짝 입술이 마르는 듯한 기분이 든다.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: ただの友達でいよう。
Translation: We should stay friends.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: ずっと、そう自分に聞かせてきた。
Translation: That's what I've told myself all this time.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: なのに――
Translation: And yet...

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: だから――
Translation: I know, but...

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: それとも――
Translation: What if...

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: でも――
Translation: But...

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 背筋を冷たいものが走る。
Translation: A chill runs down my spine.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 身体が動かなかった。
Translation: My body refuses to move.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 集金や勧誘なら、そのまま立ち去るだろう。
Translation: Maybe it's a door-to-door salesman or street fundraiser... in which case, they'll probably give up after one try.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: だが――
Translation: However—

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 立て続けに、チャイムが鳴った。
Translation: The doorbell keeps ringing.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 頭の中にまで鳴り響いて、離れない。
Translation: It resounds inside my head, unending.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 覚悟が決まらないまま、立ち上がる。
Translation: Before I've made up my mind, I'm already on my feet.
KR: 아직 마음을 정하지 못한 채 자리에서 일어났다.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 無人の玄関を目の前にして、歩みが止まる。
Translation: As I approach the front door, however, I freeze.
KR: 현관 앞에 다다르기 전에 걸음이 멈췄다.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: この１回でチャイムが鳴り終わるかもしれない。
Translation: Maybe they'll leave after that last attempt.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: そんな思いが、俺の動きを止め――
Translation: I start to reconsider—
KR: 그런 생각이 내 움직임을 멈추게 했...

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 本当に、止まった？
Translation: Is it over?

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 俺は息を潜め、壁の向こうの気配を推し量る。
Translation: I hold my breath and scan for any signs of life.
KR: 나는 숨을 죽이고 문 너머에 기척을 확인했다.

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ……いないの？」
Translation: "Shinichi...? You there?"

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Aoi?!"

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 慌てて玄関へ下りて、鍵を開ける。
Translation: Hastily I run to the front door and open it.

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「たすけてなの……」
Translation: "Help me..."

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 扉から崩れ落ちるように家の中へと入ったのは、完全に血の気が失せた、アオイだった。
Translation: Aoi tumbles over the threshold into my house, white as a sheet.
KR: 쓰러지듯 현관으로 들어온 아오이는 완전히 핏기가 가셨다.

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「デンワ、なくしたの」
Translation: "Lost my phone..."

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: アオイはソファに崩れ落ちた。
Translation: She collapses onto the couch.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: か細く、今にも消えそうな声。
Translation: Her voice is little more than a tiny, feeble whisper.

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「デンワないと、カミサマにデンパ、とどかないの……」
Translation: "Without my phone, Aoi can't get transmissions from God..."

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ……キオク……きえるの……」
Translation: "Aoi's... memories... will be erased..."

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「大丈夫、大丈夫だから落ち着けよ、な？」
Translation: "Don't worry. It's gonna be alright. Just calm down, okay?"

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: デンパ猫が近づいて頬を寄せると、アオイはようやく一息つくことができたようだった。
Translation: With a little affection from her transceiver cat, Aoi seems to regain her composure.
KR: 전파 고양이가 볼을 가까이 대자 아오이는 겨우 편해진 것 같았다.

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「落としただけだろ？
　俺も探すから、すぐ見つかるって」
Translation:
"You just dropped it somewhere, yeah?
I'll help you look for it. Trust me, we'll find it in no time."
KR:
"그냥 떨어트린 거잖아?
나도 찾아볼 테니까, 금방 찾을 수 있을 거야."

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ほんとうなの？」
Translation: "You mean it?"

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「嘘なんてつかない。安心しろ」
Translation: "Of course! Would I lie to you?"

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ありがとう……！」
Translation: "Thank you so much!"

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「先に約束があるんだ。
　ちょっと待っててくれるか？」
Translation:
"The thing is, uh... I have plans tonight.
Can it wait until after?"

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 美雪と会う約束――とは、何故か言えなかった。
Translation: For some reason, I can't bring myself to admit that I'm meeting up with Miyuki.
KR: 미유키를 만날 약속이라고는... 어째선지 말할 수가 없었다.

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そっちをすぐに済ませて、戻ってくる――」
Translation: "I'll wrap it up real fast, then come straight back and—"

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だめなの」
Translation: "No!"

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: アオイの手が助けを求め、俺の袖を握りしめた。
Translation: Aoi clings to my sleeve.

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いかないで……シンイチ……」
Translation: "Don't leave me... Shinichi..."

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ……きえたくないの……！」
Translation: "Aoi... doesn't want to disappear...!"

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ……」

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 突然、かつての美雪が、彼女にフラッシュバックした。
Translation: Out of nowhere, I suddenly have a flashback of Miyuki as a kid.
KR: 갑자기 예전 미유키가 아오이와 겹쳐 보였다.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: クラスと馴染めなかった、かつての美雪。
Translation: Of the old her, back when she didn't fit in.
KR: 반에 적응하지 못했던 그 시절의 미유키.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: ただ俺だけを頼りにしていた、かつての美雪。
Translation: Back when I was all she had.
KR: 오직 나만을 의지했던 그 시절의 미유키.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: その瞬間、ずっと心のどこかにひっかかっていた疑問が、一気に晴れた。
Translation: All at once, it clicks.
KR: 그 순간, 마음 한구석에 계속 남아있던 의문이 단번에 풀렸다.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 俺には才能はない。
Translation: I have no special talent.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 勉強も、運動もできない。
Translation: I suck at schoolwork, and I suck at sports.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: クラスの中のモブ中のモブ。
Translation: I'm the ultimate nobody.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: そんなのは、誰よりも自分が一番良く知っている。
Translation: I know this better than anyone.
KR: 그런 건 누구보다 내가 제일 잘 알고 있다.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: それでも、俺は彼女を助けたかった。
Translation: And yet I wanted to help her anyway.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: 今度こそ、胸を張って、自分の力で彼女を助けてやったと言いたかった。
Translation: I wanted to be able to hold my head up high, knowing it was something I achieved all on my own.
KR: 이번에야말로 가슴을 펴고 자신의 힘으로 도와줬다고 말하고 싶었다.

Name: a5152.nss
Japanese: そうすれば、もう少しだけ、自分で自分を認めてやれるかもしれなかった。
Translation: Maybe then I could learn to accept myself for who I am.
KR: 그렇게 하면 조금은 스스로를 인정할 수 있을지도 모른다.

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前は、消えたりなんかしない」
Translation: "You won't disappear."

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺が、ちゃんと助けるから」
Translation: "I'm going to help you."

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ……」
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: a5152.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ありがとうなの」
Translation: "Thank you..."

Name: a5161.nss
Japanese: ――急用ができた。
Translation: —Something's come up.

Name: a5161.nss
Japanese: ――悪いけど、少し遅れます。
Translation: —Sorry, but I'll be a little late.

Name: a5161.nss
Japanese: 言葉足らずだが、説明をしている時間が惜しい。
Translation: I know I owe her a proper explanation, but I just don't have time.
KR: 설명이 부족하지만 타자 치는 시간도 아깝다.

Name: a5161.nss
Japanese: 美雪へのメールを打ちながら、アオイに事情を訊ねる。
Translation: Now that the email's on its way, it's time to ask Aoi for more details.
KR: 미유키에게 메일을 보내면서 아오이에게 사정을 물었다.

Name: a5161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どこでなくしたんだ？」
Translation: "Where did you lose it?"

Name: a5161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「わからないの……」
Translation: "No clue..."

Name: a5161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ほんとうなら、アオイがでんわをなくしたとたん、カミサマがそれにきづくはずなの」
Translation: "Normally, whenever Aoi drops the phone, God's supposed to notice and start calling."
KR: "평소라면 아오이가 핸드폰을 잃어버린 순간 신님이 그걸 알아차렸을 거야."

Name: a5161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「チャクシンで、わかるはずなの」
Translation: "That way Aoi will hear the ringtone."

Name: a5161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「神様からの着信……？」
Translation: "God actually calls you?"

Name: a5161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも、きづかなかった」
Translation: "But it didn't happen this time."

Name: a5161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それで、最後に持ってたのは？」
Translation: "Okay then, when was the last time you remember having it?"

Name: a5161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「バッティングセンターにいくまえ、じかん、みたの」
Translation: "Before we went to the batting cages, Aoi checked the time."

Name: a5161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そのあと、ないの」
Translation: "It went missing sometime after that."

Name: a5161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「気付いたのは？」
Translation: "When did you notice it was gone?"

Name: a5161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きょうのあさなの」
Translation: "This morning."

Name: a5161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「マンガきっさ、バッティングセンター、みち。
　ずっとさがしたの」
Translation: "Aoi's been searching and searching... The manga cafe, the batting cages, and all the roads in between."

Name: a5161.nss
Japanese: だからアオイは今日、学校を休んだんだな。
Translation: That explains why she wasn't at school today.

Name: a5161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あとは、このいえだけなの」
Translation: "Now all that's left is your house."

Name: a5161.nss
Japanese: 確かに昨日の夜、アオイは俺の家に来た。
Translation: That makes sense, considering she came over last night.
KR: 분명 어젯밤에 아오이는 우리 집에 왔다.

Name: a5161.nss
Japanese: エルともずっと遊んでいたから、どこかに落とした可能性は高いだろう。
Translation: She spent most of the time playing with Eru, so it's highly possible she dropped it somewhere around here.
KR: 에루랑 놀기도 했으니까 어딘가에 떨어트렸을 가능성은 높겠지.

Name: a5161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「ええと……昨日の夜は……
　まずここでミルクを温めて……」
Translation:
"Okay, let's retrace our steps. Last night...
First we warmed up the milk..."

Name: a5161.nss
Japanese: 一瞬、昨日のやりとりが脳裏を掠める。
Translation: A certain memory drifts through the back of my mind: the moment Miyuki told me to kiss her.
KR: 순간, 어제 했던 대화가 머리를 스쳤다.

Name: a5161.nss
Japanese: 俺にキスをするように求めた美雪。

Name: a5161.nss
Japanese: 俺にメールを送り、彼女は今――
Translation: And right now, she's waiting for me—

Name: a5161.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a5161.nss
Japanese: いや、そっちは後回しだ。
Translation: ...I'll worry about that later.

Name: a5161.nss
Japanese: 感情を押し殺し、俺はスマフォ探しに没頭する。
Translation: Suppressing my emotions, I focus my energy on the search for Aoi's phone.
KR: 감정을 억누르고 나는 핸드폰 찾기에 몰두했다.

Name: a5161.nss
Japanese: ……見つからない。
Translation: ...It's nowhere to be found.

Name: a5161.nss
Japanese: いったいどこにいったんだ？
Translation: Where the hell did it go?

Name: a5161.nss
Japanese: 本当に、この家にあるのか？
Translation: Is it even here, or is it lying in a ditch somewhere?

Name: a5161.nss
Japanese: もしかしたら他の場所に落として、誰かに拾われてしまったんじゃないか……？
Translation: Has someone else found it by now?
KR: 혹시 다른 곳에 떨어트렸거나, 다른 사람이 주운 건 아닐까?

Name: a5162.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だいじょうぶなの。まだ、さがせるの」
Translation: "It's okay. Aoi can keep looking."

Name: a5162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ、身体の具合悪いだろ？　休んで――」
Translation: "But you're not feeling good, right? I think you should rest and—"

Name: a5162.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「さがすの」
Translation: "Aoi will keep looking."

Name: a5162.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「さがさないと……だめなの……」
Translation: "Aoi... has to keep looking..."

Name: a5162.nss
Japanese: アオイはやはり、昨日の具合を引きずったままだ。
Translation: I knew it. She hasn't recovered at all.
KR: 역시 아오이의 몸 상태는 어제 그대로다.

Name: a5162.nss
Japanese: かといって、説得もまともに聞いてくれそうにない。
Translation: But she refuses to heed my advice, either.
KR: 그렇다고 내 말을 들을 것 같지도 않다.

Name: a5162.nss
Japanese: とにかく早く、スマフォを見つけないと――
Translation: I guess my only option is to hurry up and find her phone—

Name: a5162.nss
Japanese: スマフォ？
Translation: Wait... Phone...?

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ、ちょっと待ってろ」
Translation: "Hey, Aoi? I'll be right back."

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 俺は階段を駆け上がる。
Translation: I dash up the stairs to my room.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎から借りたスマフォは、まだ部屋にある。
Translation: I still have the phone I borrowed from Yuutarou.
KR: 유우타로에게 빌린 핸드폰은 아직 내 방에 있다.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 以前俺は、ゲームのシナリオを追いかけることで、アオイの居場所を突き止めた。
Translation: And that visual novel helped me track down Aoi's location a few days ago.
KR: 요전에 나는 게임 시나리오를 따라가서 아오이가 있는 곳을 알아냈었다.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: あの時は、アオイが真似をしているだけだと思っていた。
Translation: At the time, I thought Aoi was just imitating what she played.
KR: 그때는 아오이가 흉내 내는 줄로만 알았다.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: だがもし、ゲームが現実を予言しているのだとしたら？
Translation: But what if the game is actually predicting events that will happen in real life?
KR: 하지만 만약 게임이 현실을 예언하고 있다면?

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 自分でも、とんだゲーム脳だと思う。
Translation: I know... I must sound like I have one awful case of gamer brain.
KR: 스스로도 말도 안 되는 소리라는 걸 알고 있다.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: でも、他に手掛かりはない。
Translation: But it's all I have to go on right now.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 試してみる価値はあるはずだ。
Translation: It's at least worth a try.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 俺はスマフォの電源を入れ、ゲームを立ち上げる。
Translation: I power on the phone and load the game.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 前回の続き、体育館で子猫を抱きしめるシーンだ。
Translation: My save file picks up back at the scene where "Aoi" is cradling a kitten in the gym.
KR: 지난번에 이어서 체육관에서 새끼 고양이를 안고 있는 장면이다.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 俺はすぐさま、スキップボタンを押す。
Translation: I promptly hit the Skip button.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: イベントが――どんどんと早回しされていき――
Translation: The other scenes fly past in fast-forward...

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 早回しされて――行くが――
Translation: On, and on, and on...

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「むだなの……」
Translation: "It's no use..."

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 振り返ると、そこには壁に寄りかかってなんとか身体を支える、アオイの姿があった。
Translation: I look back to find Aoi clutching the wall, desperate to keep herself upright.
KR: 뒤를 돌아보니 벽에 기댄 채 간신히 서 있는 아오이가 있었다.

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このてんかいは……ブンキに、ないの……」
Translation: "This event isn't... in the game script..."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セカイが……バグったの……」
Translation: "There's a glitch... in the universe..."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、アオイ！　大丈夫か！？」
Translation: "Whoa! Aoi! You okay?!"

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「デンチ……きれそうなの……」
Translation: "My battery is... dying..."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「イベントＣＧ……１まいじゃ……たりないの……」
Translation: "One single CG... isn't... enough..."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「なに言ってるんだ！？
　待ってろ、今救急車を――」
Translation:
"What are you babbling about?!
Hold on, I'll call an ambulance—"
KR:
"무슨 소릴 하는 거야!?
기다려, 지금 구급차를..."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「ふつうのビョウキ……ちがうの。
　デンワがないと……セーブも……できないの」
Translation:
"This isn't... a normal disease.
Without my phone... Aoi can't... save the game..."
KR:
"평범한 병이... 아니야.
핸드폰 없으면... 세이브 못해..."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「カミサマに、みはなされて……
　だから、もう……オシマイ」
Translation:
"God has... abandoned me...
This is it... It's all over..."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「終わるかよ！」
Translation: "It's NOT over!"

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop... boop...?"

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「神様が見放したら、俺が助ける。
　勝手に終わりとか言うな！」
Translation:
"If your god won't help you, then I will!
You don't get to decide when it's all over!"
KR:
"신님한테 버림받았다면, 내가 도와줄게.
멋대로 끝 같은 소리 하지 마!"

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だって俺たち、友達だろ……？」
Translation: "I mean... What are friends for?"

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とも……だち……」

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ともだち……なの？」
Translation: "We're... friends...?"

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そう。友達だ」
Translation: "Damn right!"

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: アオイはしばらく俯いて、小声で何かを反芻するように唇を動かすと――
Translation: Aoi stares at the ground for a while and murmurs inaudibly to herself, like she's savoring the concept.
KR: 아오이는 잠시 고개를 숙이고, 작은 목소리로 뭔가 중얼거리듯 입술을 움직이더니...

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 静かに俺の瞳を見据え、囁いた。
Translation: Then she looks up, directly into my eyes.

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「……さむいの」
Translation: "...It's cold."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、汗……拭かないとな」
Translation: "Oh, right. We should wipe that sweat off your face."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「少し待ってろ」
Translation: "Be right back."

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: アオイの変調をこのまま見過ごすわけにはいかない。
Translation: I can't keep turning a blind eye to her condition.
KR: 아오이의 상태를 보고도 가만히 있을 순 없다.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: どうにかして、医者に連れていかなければ……
Translation: There's gotta be some way I can get her to a doctor...

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 何にせよ、人手が欲しい。
Translation: But I'm gonna need help.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: こんな時、頼りになる相手と言えば――
Translation: Times like these, there's only one person I know I can count on.
KR: 이럴 때 의지가 되는 사람이라고 하면...

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『おう、こんな夜にどうした？』
Translation: "Hey, man! How's your night going?"

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『まさか、新たな男の浪漫物件の――』
Translation: "Wait, don't tell me... Did you find a new artifact of male amb—"

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「悪い、トラブル。アオイの具合が悪くなっちゃってさ」
Translation: "Sorry, but I'm in a bad spot right now. Aoi's not doing so great."
KR: "미안, 문제가 생겼어. 아오이 몸 상태가 안 좋아져서..."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『向日が？』
Translation: "Mukou? What's going on?"

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ワケありで、ちょっと協力して欲しいんだけど」
Translation: "I can't really explain, but I need your help."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『どこに行けばいい？』
Translation: "Where should I meet you?"

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺の家だけど……頼めるか？」
Translation: "My place. Is that cool?"

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『部員の窮地を助けるのが、部長の仕事だ！』
Translation: "But of course! It's my job as your captain to lend a hand in times of need!"
KR: "궁지에 빠진 부원을 돕는 게 부장이 할 일이지!"

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ありがとう。恩に着る」
Translation: "Thanks. I really owe you one."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『任せとけ！』
Translation: "Just leave it to me!"

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎はろくに事情も説明しないまま、二つ返事で引き受けてくれた。
Translation: Just like that, Yuutarou's agreed to help me, no questions asked.
KR: 사정을 설명하지 않았지만 유우타로는 선뜻 응해주었다.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 普段は色々やかましいところもあるが、こういうときに頼りになるのが雄太郎のいいところだ。
Translation: He can be downright obnoxious at times, but he always comes through when it matters most—and that's why I love him.
KR: 평소에는 여러 가지로 귀찮은 점도 있지만, 이럴 때 의지가 되는 게 유우타로의 장점이다.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 助けは呼んだが、これからどうしたものか……
Translation: So, now that help is on the way... what next?

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 俺はタオルを手に自分の部屋へと戻る。
Translation: I grab a washcloth and return to my room.
KR: 나는 수건을 들고 내 방으로 돌아왔다.

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うん」
Translation: "Hi."

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 俺は咄嗟に、目を逸らす。
Translation: I immediately avert my gaze.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: アオイは上着を脱ぎ、白い素肌を晒していた。
Translation: Aoi has stripped off her top, revealing her porcelain skin.
KR: 아오이는 윗옷을 벗고 새하얀 살갗을 드러내고 있었다.

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アセ、ふくの」
Translation: "Wipe me down..."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「お願いなの」
Translation: "Please..."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「わ、わかった」
Translation: "O-Okay..."

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 目を背けながら、近づく。
Translation: With my eyes still averted, I walk up to her.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 荒い息を、耳にしながら。
Translation: I can hear her labored breathing.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 視界が吸い寄せられるのを、必死に堪えて。
Translation: And I can feel my gaze being pulled in like a magnet.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 俺はそっと、そっとタオルを彼女に近づける。
Translation: Fighting the impulse to look, I gently extend the washcloth.
KR: 나는 살며시, 살며시 수건을 아오이 쪽으로 가져갔다.

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「じゃ、じゃあ拭く――」
Translation: "O-Okay, here I go—"

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、ごめんなの」
Translation: "Sorry, Miyuki."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん？　なにか――」
Translation: "Huh? Did you say someth—"

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ、みて」
Translation: "Shinichi, look at me."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「みるの！」
Translation: "Look at me!"

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 真剣な、アオイの訴え。
Translation: I can hear desperation in her voice.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 促されるがまま、俺はそっと視線を向ける。
Translation: Quietly, I do as she requests.
KR: 아오이의 말대로 나는 슬쩍 시선을 돌렸다.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 汗まみれの肌。
Translation: Her bare skin is dripping with sweat.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 小刻みに震える肩。
Translation: Her shoulders are shaking.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 小さいながら形のよい双丘。
Translation: And I can see the swell of her small, shapely breasts.

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「さわるの」
Translation: "Touch me."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Wait... Touch you...?!"

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、デンチ、たりないの」
Translation: "Aoi's battery is dying."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ビリビリ、ほしいの」
Translation: "Not enough zappy."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、イベントＣＧあつめるために、つくられたの」
Translation: "Aoi was made to collect event CGs."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あつめないと、でんちぎれなの」
Translation: "Without them, Aoi's battery will die."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セカイから、きえるの」
Translation: "And then Aoi will disappear forever."

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: ゲーム脳。
Translation: Two words come to mind: gamer brain.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: そんな単語が、脳裏に浮かんで。

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: でも、すぐに霧散した。
Translation: But I shake the thought away.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: アオイの感情は、作り物じゃない。
Translation: Aoi's feelings are real.

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: 本気で、彼女は、苦しんでいた。
Translation: And she's suffering.

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ……きえたく、ないの」
Translation: "Aoi... doesn't want to... disappear..."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチと、あえたの」
Translation: "Not after meeting you..."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このキオク、きえるの、いやなの」
Translation: "Please don't take these memories away from me..."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ともだちの、ままで、いいから」
Translation: "We don't have to be more than friends..."

Name: a5163.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチの、ビリビリで、ジュウデンさせて」
Translation: "Please, just... recharge me with your zappy..."

Name: a5163.nss
Japanese: "ビリビリする","ビリビリしない"
Translation: "Get zappy","Don't get zappy"

Name: a5164a.nss
Japanese: 神様なんていなくて。
Translation: Your "god" isn't real, Aoi.

Name: a5164a.nss
Japanese: 電波も電池もお前が創った妄想で。
Translation: All that stuff about batteries and transmissions? It's just your made-up fantasy.

Name: a5164a.nss
Japanese: ゲームはゲームで、リアルはリアルで。
Translation: Video games are not the same as real life.

Name: a5164a.nss
Japanese: だから、お前の言ってること、お前のやっていることは間違いだって、そういえば良かった。
Translation: You're just deluded.
KR: 그러니까 네가 하는 말, 네가 하고 있는 일은 틀렸다고 그렇게 말하면 됐을 텐데.

Name: a5164a.nss
Japanese: けど――
Translation: ...If only I could have told her that.

Name: a5164a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: a5164a.nss
Japanese: 彼女の頬から零れた涙が、動きを止めた。
Translation: Tears roll down her cheeks, freezing me in place.
KR: 아오이의 뺨에서 흘러내린 눈물이 나를 멈춰 세웠다.

Name: a5164a.nss
Japanese: 彼女の熱が、俺の皮膚に伝わった。
Translation: I can feel her heat on my skin.

Name: a5164a.nss
Japanese: 彼女の眼差しが、心臓を鷲掴みにした。
Translation: The look in her eyes pierces me to the core.

Name: a5164a.nss
Japanese: 俺は、彼女を引き離せなかった。
Translation: I can't bring myself to pull away.

Name: a5164a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ――」

Name: a5164a.nss
Japanese: 俺は彼女に頬を寄せ、そして――
Translation: I lean in close—

Name: a5164b.nss
Japanese: その一言が彼女を傷つける。
Translation: What I'm about to say will hurt her.

Name: a5164b.nss
Japanese: 俺たちの関係が、決定的に変わってしまう。
Translation: It'll alter our friendship—permanently.

Name: a5164b.nss
Japanese: それはもちろん、わかっていた。
Translation: I know that.

Name: a5164b.nss
Japanese: だが――俺は、彼女の友達だ。
Translation: But... I'm her friend.

Name: a5164b.nss
Japanese: 彼女を想っているなら、真実を伝えるべきなのだ。
Translation: If I care about her as much as I claim to, then I ought to tell her the truth.

Name: a5164b.nss
Japanese: 神様なんていなくて。
Translation: Your "god" isn't real, Aoi.

Name: a5164b.nss
