Japanese: 電波も電池もお前が創った妄想で。
Translation: All that stuff about batteries and transmissions? It's just your made-up fantasy.

Name: a5164b.nss
Japanese: ゲームはゲームで、リアルはリアルで。
Translation: Video games are not the same as real life.

Name: a5164b.nss
Japanese: だから――
Translation: You're just—

Name: a5164b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ、お前の言ってることは、全部――」
Translation: "Aoi... All that stuff is—"

Name: a5165.nss
Japanese: チャイムが鳴り響き、ふたりの動きが止まる。
Translation: Just then, the doorbell rings, and the two of us freeze like deer in headlights.
KR: 초인종이 울리고, 우리 둘은 움직임을 멈췄다.

Name: a5165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……ゴメン、お客さんだ」
Translation: "...Sorry. Looks like we have a visitor."

Name: a5165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「さっき、雄太郎を呼んだんだ。
　ふたりでなんとかしてやるから。な？」
Translation:
"I called Yuutarou over.
The two of us are going to help you, okay?"
KR:
"아까 유우타로를 불렀어.
우리 둘이 어떻게든 해줄게."

Name: a5165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「コレ、着替え。
　俺のでデカいけど、我慢して着てくれ！」
Translation:
"Here, put this on.
I know it's too big for you, but it'll have to do!"
KR:
"여기, 갈아입을 옷.
내 것이라서 좀 크지만 참고 입어."

Name: a5165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「俺が戻るまでちゃんと着替えててくれよ。
　約束、な？」
Translation:
"Be sure to put it on before I get back, okay?
Can you promise me?"
KR:
"내가 돌아올 때까지 제대로 옷 입고 있어.
약속이다?"

Name: a5165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「頼むぞ！」
Translation: "Just wear it, okay?"

Name: a5165.nss
Japanese: 俺はＴシャツを渡すと、返答を待たず部屋を出た。
Translation: I hand her one of my old T-shirts and promptly leave the room.
KR: 나는 티셔츠를 건네고 대답도 듣지 않은 채 방을 나섰다.

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: 階段を下りながら、一息つく。
Translation: As I head down the stairs, I sigh in relief.

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: 落ち着けと自分に言い聞かせるが、動悸はなかなか収まりそうにない。
Translation: I try to will myself to calm down, but my heart is still pounding like crazy.
KR: 진정하라고 스스로에게 타일러도 심장 고동은 좀처럼 진정되지 않았다.

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: もしあそこでチャイムが鳴らなかったら、俺は今、平静でいられただろうか。
Translation: Saved by the bell—literally.
KR: 만약 거기서 초인종이 울리지 않았다면, 나는 평정을 유지할 수 있었을까.

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: なんにせよ、電話しておいて助かった。
Translation: Thank god I thought to call him.

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: 思ったよりもずっと早く駆けつけてくれたし、持つべきものは友――
Translation: He got here a lot faster than I was expecting, too. Friendship is such a beautiful thi—
KR: 생각보다 훨씬 빨리 달려와 줬다. 역시 친구 밖엔...

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どうして？」
Translation: "Why?"

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: バットが、玄関に乾いた音を響かせた。
Translation: Her baseball bat clatters to the ground.
KR: 방망이가 현관 바닥에 부딪혀 차가운 소리를 울렸다.

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どうしてここに？」
Translation: "Why are you here?"

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「急用って、なに？」
Translation: "What happened to 'something came up'?"

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私と会いたくなかったの？」
Translation: "Were you just trying to get out of meeting me?"

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、そういうわけじゃ――」
Translation: "No, that's not it—"

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Those shoes."

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: 見下ろすと、そこには女物の靴が一足――
Translation: I look down at the pair of women's shoes lying in the entryway.
KR: 내려다보니, 거기에는 여자 신발이 한 켤레...

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイね」
Translation: "Those are Aoi's."

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイがいるのね」
Translation: "Aoi's here, isn't she."

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、違う――」
Translation: "N-No, uh—"

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私のお願いを無視して」
Translation: "So you ignored my request..."

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「家で、アオイと一緒に」
Translation: "...and chose to stay here, alone with Aoi."

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうじゃなくて、これは――」
Translation: "It's not what it looks li—"

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「会わせて」
Translation: "I want to see her."

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Wait—"

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「上がるわよ」
Translation: "I'm coming in."

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから――おい！　待てって！」
Translation: "Wait—HEY! I said wait!"

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイ！　どこ？　出てきなさい！」
Translation: "Aoi! Where are you? Come on out!"

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「邪魔よ！　退きなさい！」
Translation: "You get out of my way! Go on, get!"

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: 足元に追い縋るエルには少しも表情を緩めることなく、美雪がリビングを探し回る。
Translation: Eru tries to rub against Miyuki's leg, but she shows no interest. Instead, she continues to search my living room.
KR: 발밑에서 따라오는 에루를 보고도 미유키는 표정변화 하나 없이 거실을 뒤졌다.

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: もう普通のやり方じゃ、彼女は止められない。
Translation: I'm not going to be able to talk her down from this.
KR: 이제 웬만한 방법으로는 미유키를 말릴 수가 없다.

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: 俺は、事実を伝える覚悟を決めた。
Translation: So instead, I resolve to tell her the truth.

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「美雪、聞いてくれ！
　コレには理由があって――」
Translation:
"Miyuki, just hear me out!
I can explain!"

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ほらアイツ、神様がどうとか言って、スマフォを大事にしてただろ？　それを、なくしちゃってさ」
Translation:
"You know how important her phone is to her?
Well, the thing is, it's gone missing."
KR: "그 녀석, 신님이 어쩌고 하면서 핸드폰을 소중히 했잖아? 그걸 잃어버린 거야."

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アレがないと、記憶を無くすって大騒ぎするから、それで一緒に探して――」
Translation: "She was freaking out, saying she'll lose her memories without it, so I've been helping her look—"
KR: "그게 없으면 기억이 없어진다고 난리 치니까, 그래서 같이 찾으려고..."

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「信じたの？」
Translation: "And you seriously believe that?"

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「別に……そういうわけじゃ……」
Translation: "I mean... not really, but..."

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方は私との約束よりも、アオイを選んだ」
Translation: "We had plans. But you chose Aoi."

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、だからアオイは身体の具合が――」
Translation: "Well, she isn't feeling well—"

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「聞きたくない」
Translation: "I don't want to hear it."

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: リビングにいないことを確認すると、美雪は迷うことなく階段へ向かった。
Translation: After searching the living room with no luck, she promptly heads for the stairs.
KR: 거실에 없는 것을 확인하고 미유키는 망설임 없이 계단으로 향했다.

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そっちは――おい！」
Translation: "Don't—HEY!"

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: 目指すは俺の部屋――まずい。
Translation: Oh crap. She's heading to my room.

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: アオイはまだ、着替えの途中かもしれない。
Translation: Aoi might still be in the middle of getting dressed!
KR: 아직 아오이가 옷 갈아입는 중일 지도 몰라!

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい美雪！　待てって言ってるだろ！！」
Translation: "Miyuki! Will you please just slow down?!"

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: 俺は美雪を追いかけ、２階へと駆け上がる。
Translation: I chase after her, up to the second floor.

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: 部屋の入り口に、美雪は無言で立ち尽くしていた。
Translation: I find her standing silently at the entrance to my room... perfectly still.
KR: 미유키는 내 방 앞에서 가만히 서 있었다.

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: 後ろ姿は微動だにしない。

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: 怒りを押し殺しているのか、それとも――
Translation: Is she holding back her rage, or—?

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: 俺は恐る恐る、部屋の中を覗き込む。
Translation: Hesitantly, I peer past her into my room.

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: いない。
Translation: It's empty.

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: アオイの姿が、どこにも見当たらない。
Translation: Aoi's gone.

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: 消えた……？
Translation: Did she... disappear...?

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイは、どこ？」
Translation: "Where is she?"

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "I... I don't know...!"

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「さあって――！」
Translation: "What do you mean, you don't know?!"

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もしかしたら、スマフォを探しにどこかに行ったのかも」
Translation: "Maybe she left to go look for her phone."

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あの靴は？」
Translation: "Without her shoes?"

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「アイツ具合が悪そうだったからさ。
　多分俺のと履き間違えて、帰ったんじゃないかな」
Translation:
"She was really out of it.
She probably put mine on by mistake when she left."
KR:
"그 녀석 상태 안 좋았으니까.
아마 내 걸 잘못 신고 간 게 아닐까?"

Name: a5171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふうん」
Translation: "Oh really..."

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: 疑いを隠そうともしない、美雪の口調。
Translation: Miyuki doesn't sound the least bit convinced.

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: 説得力がないのは重々承知してる。
Translation: Even I know it's a shitty cover story.
KR: 설득력 없는 건 충분히 알고 있다.

Name: a5171.nss
Japanese: だが、これ以上状況をこじらせるわけには――
Translation: I just don't want things to get any worse—
KR: 하지만 더 이상 상황을 악화시킬 순...

Name: a5172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それじゃあこれは要らないわね」
Translation: "Then I guess we won't be needing this."

Name: a5172.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイのスマフォ！？」
Translation: "Is that Aoi's phone?!"

Name: a5172.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Huh?!"

Name: a5172.nss
Japanese: ベッドの下から漏れるアオイの声。
Translation: Aoi gasps audibly from under my bed.

Name: a5172.nss
Japanese: 俺の背筋が、凍り付く。
Translation: My stomach turns to ice.

Name: a5172.nss
Japanese: だが美雪は、そのまま事情の説明を続けた。
Translation: But Miyuki carries on.

Name: a5172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「やっぱりこれ、アオイのよね」
Translation: "I had a feeling this was hers."

Name: a5172.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どこにあったんだ？」
Translation: "Where did you find it?"

Name: a5172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「バッティングセンターの前に落ちてた」
Translation: "It was lying just outside the batting cages."

Name: a5172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「わざわざ届けに来たんだけど。
　いないなら持って帰ろうかしら――」
Translation:
"I came here to give it back, but...
If she's not here, I guess I'll just go home—"

Name: a5172.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そんな！」
Translation: "Don't!"

Name: a5172.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺が預かるよ！」
Translation: "I'll hold onto it for her!"

Name: a5172.nss
Japanese: アオイの呟きに重ねるように、大声を張り上げる。
Translation: I raise my voice up a notch to drown out Aoi's whisper.
KR: 아오이의 속삭이는 소리를 덮으려 큰 소리로 말했다.

Name: a5172.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もしかしたら、靴を返しに来るかもしれないし！」
Translation: "She'll probably be back for her shoes sooner or later anyway!"

Name: a5172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「ふうん。
　それじゃあ、お願いしようかな」
Translation:
"Hmmm...
I guess that makes sense."

Name: a5172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「はい、これ」
Translation: "Here you go."

Name: a5172.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ありがと――」
Translation: "Thank you—"

Name: a5172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ、ごめんなさい。落としちゃった」
Translation: "Whoopsie daisy! Silly me, I dropped it!"

Name: a5172.nss
Japanese: 不自然に美雪の手を離れたスマフォは、コロコロ床を転がって、ベッドの下へ――
Translation: The phone tumbles to the ground, slides across the floor, and under the bed.
KR: 부자연스럽게 미유키의 손을 떠난 핸드폰은 데굴데굴 굴러 침대 밑으로...

Name: a5172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ここかな？」
Translation: "Are you under here, I wonder?"

Name: a5172.nss
Japanese: 美雪はゆっくりと、ベッドの前にしゃがみ込む。
Translation: Miyuki slowly lowers herself to the floor.
KR: 미유키는 천천히 침대 앞에 쭈그려 앉았다.

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪！　俺が取る――」
Translation: "Wait, Miyuki! I'll get it!"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「何？　そんな青い顔して」
Translation: "What's wrong? You're looking rather pale."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もしかして、あは、エッチな本でも隠してる？」
Translation: "Oh, I get it. Haha! Are you hiding something NAUGHTY under here?"

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 美雪の目は笑っていない。
Translation: Miyuki's smile doesn't reach her eyes.

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: やめてくれ――俺の心の叫びも、届かない。
Translation: I silently scream at her to stop, but my prayers fall on deaf ears.
KR: 그만해줘... 아무리 마음속에서 외쳐도 닿질 않는다.

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: やがて、奥まで伸ばした腕が、止まる。
Translation: She reaches all the way under the bed... and falls still.

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「掴まえた」
Translation: "Gotcha."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: ベッドの下から無理矢理引っ張り出されたアオイは――
Translation: Miyuki drags Aoi out from under the bed.

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 半裸のままだった。
Translation: Oh god... She's still half-naked...!

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あの、これは――」
Translation: "Listen, I can explain—"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「やめろッ！」
Translation: "Stop!"

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 手のひらを振り上げた美雪の腕を、俺は懸命に掴む。
Translation: Miyuki draws back her hand, and I seize her by the arm.
KR: 손바닥을 치켜든 미유키의 팔을 있는 힘껏 붙잡았다.

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「何よ！？　離してよ！」
Translation: "What do you want?! Let go of me!"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「落ち着けって――」
Translation: "Please, let's just stay calm—"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「落ち着けるわけないでしょ、こんなの！！」
Translation: "How can I possibly stay calm right now?!"

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 俺の手を懸命に振り払いながら、アオイに怒鳴る。
Translation: Thrashing against my grip, she rounds on Aoi.
KR: 내 손을 뿌리치려 하며 아오이에게 소리 질렀다.

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「貴方、私の味方だったんじゃないの！？
　ふたりが恋人になるの、応援してたんじゃないの！？」
Translation:
"I thought you were trying to help me!
I thought you wanted me and him to get together!"
KR:
"너, 내 편 아니었어!?
우리 둘이 애인이 되길 응원하고 있었던 거 아니야!?"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「なのに――なんで――
　心一に、手を出して――」
Translation:
"So why...? Why?!
Why would you make a move on him?!"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから、それは誤解――」
Translation: "I'm telling you, you've got the wrong idea!"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うるさい！」
Translation: "SHUT UP!"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私よりも、アオイが大事だったんでしょ？」
Translation: "You care about Aoi more than me, don't you?"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「私は確かに、貴方を傷つけたかもしれない！
　練習台なんて言って、悪かったと思ってる！」
Translation:
"I get it, okay? I know I hurt you!
I never should have treated you like a guinea pig!"
KR:
"나는 분명 너를 상처입혔는지도 몰라!
연습 상대 같은 말을 해서 미안하다고 생각해!"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でも、だからってこんな仕打ち――」
Translation: "But this? This is too far!"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「酷すぎるわよ……！」
Translation: "How could you...?!"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい」
Translation: "Got it."

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: それまで黙り込んでいたアオイが、まだ乾かない彼女の上着を羽織って、手を上げた。
Translation: Now dressed in her still-damp overshirt, Aoi raises her hand to speak for the first time since the fight started.
KR: 그때까지 입을 다물고 있던 아오이가 아직 덜 마른 윗옷을 걸치고 손을 들어 올렸다.

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: ゾッとするような、無表情だった。
Translation: Her expression is so blank, it sends a chill down my spine.

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチを、さそったのは、アオイなの」
Translation: "Aoi's the one who tried to seduce Shinichi."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、デンパなの」
Translation: "Aoi is a transceiver. A space case."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うわさどおり、インランなの」
Translation: "Every bit as slutty as the rumors say."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチとエッチ、しようとしたの」
Translation: "And Aoi tried to have sex with Shinichi."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪！」
Translation: "Miyuki!"

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 再び頬を張ろうとした美雪を、俺はなんとか押さえ込む。
Translation: Miyuki tries once more to raise her hand against Aoi, but I narrowly hold her back.
KR: 다시 뺨을 때리려고 하는 미유키를 어떻게든 막아 세웠다.

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「離してよ！」
Translation: "Let GO of me!"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「やめろって！」
Translation: "Just stop!"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイも、急になんでそんなこと――」
Translation: "And you, Aoi! Where did all that come from?!"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「デンワ、てにはいったの」
Translation: "Aoi got the phone back."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから、データをロードするの」
Translation: "Now it's time to load my save file."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、きえるの」
Translation: "After that, Aoi will disappear."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「もう、あうこと、ないの」
Translation: "You'll never see me again."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ？　なに言って――」
Translation: "Aoi? What are you—"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「バイバイ」
Translation: "Bye-bye."

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 扉の向こうに消えていくアオイ。
Translation: Aoi walks out of the room and vanishes from sight.

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 俺は慌てて、彼女を追いかける。
Translation: I chase after her.

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ、待て――」
Translation: "Aoi, wait!"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方は行かないで！」
Translation: "You're not going anywhere!"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「離せよ！　アイツは身体の具合が――」
Translation: "Let go of me! She's not well!"
KR: "이거 놔! 저 녀석 아직 몸 상태가..."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "I don't care!"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「嫌じゃない、離せって――ッ！」
Translation: "Too bad! Now let go, damn it!"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「離さない！」
Translation: "I'm not letting go!"

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 追いかけようとした俺を、振り向かせる。
Translation: She spins me around to face her.
KR: 미유키는 아오이를 쫓아가려던 나를 뒤돌아보게 했다.

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「練習台なんて、ただの言い訳なの……」
Translation: "The guinea pig stuff... It was all just an excuse..."

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 逃げられない。
Translation: I can't escape.

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「やっと、伝える覚悟が決まったの……」
Translation: "But I'm finally ready to say it."

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 抵抗できない。
Translation: I can't fight it.

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私の気持ち」
Translation: "I'm ready to tell you the truth."

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 恐怖――
Translation: I'm scared—

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「本当の、気持ち」
Translation: "The truth about how I feel."

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: だめだ――
Translation: Don't—

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一、聞いて」
Translation: "Shinichi, listen to me."

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: やめろ――
Translation: Stop—

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: その先は――
Translation: Don't finish that sentence—

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方が、好きなの」
Translation: "...in love with you."

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 息が漏れる。
Translation: I exhale.

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 力が抜ける。
Translation: My knees are weak.

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 思考が止まる。
Translation: My mind is blank.

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 聞きたくなかった。
Translation: I didn't want to hear it.

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 口にしてはいけなかった。
Translation: I didn't want her to say it.

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: それはふたりの禁忌だった。
Translation: We both know it's forbidden.

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 暗黙の了解だった。
Translation: An unspoken agreement.

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: その、破滅の言葉を――
Translation: What she just said...

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 美雪は、とうとう、口にした。
Translation: ...will destroy everything.

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私は、貴方に、キスして欲しかったの」
Translation: "I just wanted you to kiss me."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ただそれだけなの」
Translation: "That's all I really wanted."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ずっと、ずっと言いたくて……」
Translation: "I've been dying to tell you..."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「言えなかったの」
Translation: "But I couldn't."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「好きなの」
Translation: "I'm in love with you."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私は、貴方が、好きなの」
Translation: "Completely and utterly in love with you."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから――心一――」
Translation: "Shinichi... Please..."

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 美雪の唇が、ゆっくりと近づく。
Translation: Slowly, Miyuki's lips draw near.

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 唇。
Translation: Her lips...

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 夢にまで見た、美雪とのキス。
Translation: I've wanted to kiss them so badly I've been seeing it in my dreams.

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: あと少し――
Translation: We're only inches apart now...

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 間近に感じる彼女の、浅く速い呼吸。
Translation: I can feel her rapid, shallow breaths against my skin.

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: ほんのり伝わる柔らかな香り。
Translation: I can smell the faintest hint of her perfume.

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: そして、俺は――
Translation: So I—

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 俺は――
Translation: I—

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...My phone's ringing."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一ッ！」
Translation: "Shinichi!"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「雄太郎から」
Translation: "It's Yuutarou."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイのことだと思う」
Translation: "He's probably calling about Aoi."

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: アオイを逃げ道に使うなんて、我ながら最低だ。
Translation: I'm trash for using Aoi as my excuse. I know that.

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: でも俺は、そうするしかなかった。
Translation: But it's the only choice I have.

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私より……その、電話をとるの……？」
Translation: "You're choosing a phone call... over ME...?"

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、縋るように訊く。
Translation: I can hear a note of pleading in her voice.

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: こぼれ落ちそうなその瞳から――
Translation: Her eyes are swimming with tears...
KR: 눈물이 흘러내릴 것 같은 그 눈으로부터...

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 俺は、逃げた。
Translation: But I look away.

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もしもし？」
Translation: "Hello?"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
『コラ、心一！！
　病人外に放り出して何してるんだ！？』
Translation: "Shinichi, you scumbag! The hell were you thinking, throwing Mukou out on her ass in her condition?!"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『向日、子猫連れて家の前でフラフラしてたぞ！』
Translation: "She stumbled all the way here with a kitten in tow!"
KR: "무코우, 고양이를 데리고 집 앞에서 비틀거리고 있었다고!"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……ゴメン」
Translation: "...I'm sorry."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
『後でちゃんと、本人に謝れよ。
　今は俺が、面倒見といてやるから』
Translation:
"Say that to her, not me.
Anyway, I'll watch over her for now, alright?"
KR:
"나중에 제대로 본인한테 사과해.
지금은 내가 돌봐줄 테니까."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「頼めるか？」
Translation: "Would you?"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『今は忙しいんだろ？』
Translation: "Well, you've got your hands full, yeah?"

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...I really owe you one."

Name: a5173.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『任せとけ。それじゃあな』
Translation: "No sweat. See ya."

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 通話を切り、辺りを見回す。
Translation: I hang up and look around the room.

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: だが――
Translation: But Miyuki is already gone.

Name: a5173.nss
Japanese: 美雪の姿は、そこにはもうなかった。

Name: a6111.nss
Japanese: 毎日は、道じゃなく、階段のように過ぎていく。
Translation: Life is not a highway. Life is a staircase.

Name: a6111.nss
Japanese: 一度疑問に思ったらその途端、毎日が辛くなる。
Translation: You just gotta keep climbing.
KR: 한 번 의문은 품으면, 다리를 들어 올리는 게 힘들어진다.

Name: a6111.nss
Japanese: だから、一歩、一歩、なにも考えずに、上る。
Translation: Otherwise, if you start to overthink it, you'll have trouble taking the next step.
KR: 그러니까 한 발, 한 발, 아무 생각하지 않고 오른다.

Name: a6111.nss
Japanese: 階段だから、別れ道はなく。
Translation: There are no branching paths.

Name: a6111.nss
Japanese: 「あの時ああしておけば」なんて後悔は無意味で。
Translation: No point in regretting the actions you didn't take.

Name: a6111.nss
Japanese: 「人生は選択の連続だ」なんていうのは、失敗してから振り返って思う、後悔の絞りかすみたいなものだ。
Translation: They say life is a series of choices, but that's nonsense cooked up by the old and bitter.
KR: '인생은 선택의 연속이다' 라는 말은 실패하고 나서야 생각나는, 후회의 찌꺼기 같은 것이다.

Name: a6111.nss
Japanese: 過去の少し先にある、当たり前の明日へ。
Translation: Yesterday leads to today, and today leads to tomorrow.
KR: 과거의 조금 앞에 있는 당연한 내일로.

Name: a6111.nss
Japanese: 一歩、一歩、進んでいく。
Translation: One step at a time.

Name: a6111.nss
Japanese: その行き着く先がどんな未来か――
Translation: What lies ahead?
KR: 그렇게 도달하게 될 미래가 어떤 것일지...

Name: a6111.nss
Japanese: それは、まだわからないけれど。
Translation: You won't know until you get there.

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「おはよう心一」
Translation: "Morning, Shinichi!"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ、どうなった？」
Translation: "How's Aoi?"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ったく……昨日は驚いたぞ」
Translation: "Good grief... Last night was crazy!"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「具合が悪そうだから、病院に連れて行こうとしたんだけどさ、夜も遅いからって思いっきり拒絶されたよ」
Translation: "She clearly wasn't feeling too good, so I tried to take her to the hospital, but she totally refused! Said it was too late at night!"
KR: "아파보여서 병원에 데려가려고 했는데, 밤이 늦었다고 한사코 거절했어."

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「それでマンガ喫茶に戻るって言うんだけど。
　うちの頑固オヤジが凄い勢いで反対してな」
Translation: "So then she said she was going back to the manga cafe, but my old man was VEHEMENTLY OPPOSED, as you can imagine!"
KR:
"그리고 만화방으로 돌아간다고 했는데,
우리 고집불통 아버지가 불 같이 화내면서 반대하셔서."

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「とにかく、俺の家に一晩泊まらせたよ」
Translation: "So she ended up spending the night at our house."

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それで、どうなった？」
Translation: "Then what happened?"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「今朝になって、ケロッとしてた」
Translation: "Well, this morning she seemed totally fine."

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え……ケロッと？」
Translation: "What? Really?"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ああ。多分もう、大丈夫だと思う」
Translation: "Yeah. I think she's in the clear for now."

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「念のため今日は休めって言っといたけど」
Translation: "But I told her to stay home and rest for today, just in case."

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ほ……ほんとか？」
Translation: "Y-You did?"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「なんだ？
　この浪漫倶楽部部長を疑うのか？」
Translation: "What, you think the captain of the Boys and Dreams Club would lie to you?"
KR:
"뭐야,
이 낭만 클럽 부장을 의심하는 거야?"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「いや……そんなことない。
　色々助かった。ホント、ありがとな」
Translation:
"No, no... Of course not.
Thank you so much, dude. I really owe you for this."
KR:
"아니, 그건 아닌데...
여러모로 도와줘서 정말 고마워."

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「なあ、心一？」
Translation: "Look, uh, Shinichi?"

Name: a6121.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎は、切り出しづらそうに頭を掻いた。
Translation: Yuutarou scratches his head awkwardly.
KR: 유우타로는 말을 꺼내기 힘든 듯 머리를 긁적였다.

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「もしかして、向日の家って――」
Translation: "Do you think Mukou and her family...?"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「ああ、家族とは仲が良くないらしい。
　いつもはマンガ喫茶に寝泊まりしてるって」
Translation:
"Yeahhh, they're not on good terms at the moment, apparently.
That's why she sleeps at the manga cafe most days."
KR:
"그래, 가족이랑 사이가 안 좋다나봐.
평소에는 만화방에서 지내고 있대."

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それ以上は本人も話したがらないけど」
Translation: "She doesn't ever really talk about it beyond that, though."

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「だったらしばらくはウチで預かるのもアリ……か？」
Translation: "In that case, maybe we could have her stay with us for a while?"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「預かる？」
Translation: "Yeah?"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「いや、ウチのオヤジが面倒見るって言いだして。
　ほんと、頑固で困るよ……」
Translation:
"See, my dad was saying he wanted to keep her off the streets.
And he's a real hardass about this stuff, so, y'know..."
KR:
"아니, 우리 아버지가 돌봐주겠다고 하셔서...
정말로 완고해서 곤란하다니까..."

Name: a6121.nss
Japanese: と、まんざらでもなさそうな雄太郎。
Translation: All in all, Yuutarou looks rather happy about the prospect.

Name: a6121.nss
Japanese: マンガ喫茶に寝泊まりするよりは安心だが……
Translation: Personally, I guess I'd prefer she stay with them rather than at the manga cafe, but...

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「同じ家で、大丈夫か？」
Translation: "You sure that's a good idea, you and her under the same roof?"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「あ……あははは！
　なに？　どういうことだ？」
Translation:
"Wha...? Hahahaha!
Please! What's that supposed to mean?"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「どういうことって、ホラ。
　アオイは同級生の女子――」
Translation:
"You know what I mean.
You're a guy, she's a girl—"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「ふん、見くびるな！
　俺の心は曽根さんと共にある！」
Translation:
"Hmph! You wound me, sir!
My heart belongs to Sone-san alone!"
KR:
"흥! 깔보지 마!
내 마음은 소네 씨에게 있으니까!"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「そもそも向日は、ほら、その、なんだ！
　恋人にしたいと言うよりも、むしろ妹……！」
Translation:
"I mean, Mukou's... you know... She's not... How do I put this...
I don't see her that way. If anything, she's like a little sister!"
KR:
"애초에 무코우는, 그 뭐냐...!
사귀고 싶다기 보단 오히려 여동생...!"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「妹との同棲生活……！
　なんという男の浪漫……！」
Translation:
"Ah, living together with my little sister...
Truly, it would be any man's dream come true...!"

Name: a6121.nss
Japanese: まあ、オヤジさんが見てるならそんなに心配することもない……か。
Translation: Well, as long as his dad's there to supervise, I guess there's nothing to worry about.
KR: 뭐, 아버지가 봐주신다면 그렇게 걱정할 것도 없나...

Name: a6121.nss
Japanese: なんにせよ、アオイが元気でよかった。
Translation: I'm just glad she's feeling better.

Name: a6121.nss
Japanese: 視線を感じて、振り返る。
Translation: I feel someone's eyes on me and turn around.

Name: a6121.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、いつもの挨拶もなく、無言でこちらを見つめる。
Translation: Miyuki is staring silently in my direction.
KR: 미유키는 평소의 인사도 없이 이쪽을 바라보고 있었다.

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Translation: "Whoa... What the...?"

Name: a6121.nss
Japanese: 誰とも会話を交わさないまま、真っ直ぐ俺たちの方へ。
Translation: She strides over without so much as a greeting to anyone in her path.
KR: 누구와도 말하지 않고 곧장 우리 쪽으로 다가왔다.

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「そ、曽根さんっ！！」
Translation: "S-Sone-san!!!"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「おはようございま――」
Translation: "Good morni—!"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一」
Translation: "Shinichi."

Name: a6121.nss
Japanese: 美雪が俺に、封筒を差し出す。
Translation: She hands me an envelope.

Name: a6121.nss
Japanese: その指が、微かに震えている。
Translation: Her fingers are trembling.

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「演劇のチケット」
Translation: "Here's a ticket to the play."

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私、待ってるから」
Translation: "I'll be waiting."

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「お願い」
Translation: "Please."

Name: a6121.nss
Japanese: 美雪はチケットを机に置くと、まるで舞台のワンシーンのように優雅なターン。
Translation: She sets the envelope on my desk, then spins gracefully on her heel like she's exiting stage left...
KR: 미유키는 티켓을 책상에 놓더니, 마치 무대의 한 장면처럼 우아하게 턴.

Name: a6121.nss
Japanese: 無論、周囲にはクラスメイトという観客がいる。
Translation: ...and the whole class is our audience.
KR: 물론 주위에는 같은 반 친구들이라는 관객이 있다.

Name: a6121.nss
Japanese: 教室は一瞬で、困惑とざわめきに包まれた。
Translation: Puzzled whispers fill the air.

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「くそうッ！」
Translation: "Goddamn it!"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「前から怪しい怪しいとは思ってたけど！
　おまえやっぱり、曽根さんと――！」
Translation:
"I always had my suspicions, but now I see the truth!
You and Sone-san—!"
KR:
"전부터 수상하다고 생각했는데,
너 역시 소네 씨랑...!"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ。昨日告白された」
Translation: "Yeah. She confessed her love to me yesterday."

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Translation: "Wha?"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それだけ」
Translation: "That's all that happened."

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「それだけって――」
Translation: "That's it?!"

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、別に付き合う気ないから」
Translation: "I'm not interested in a relationship with her."

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「は、は、は」

Name: a6121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ハァァァァアアア――――ンッ！？」
Translation: "WHAAAAAAAAAAAAAT?!"

Name: a6121.nss
Japanese: いっそ、嫌いだと口にできれば楽だったのだろう。
Translation: If only I could say I wasn't attracted to her.

Name: a6121.nss
Japanese: 嘘さえもつけない自分。
Translation: But I can't even lie.
KR: 거짓말조차 못하는 자기 자신이 너무 한심스럽다.

Name: a6121.nss
Japanese: 今すぐに、死んでしまいたい。
Translation: God, I wish I was dead.

Name: a6121.nss
Japanese: もちろん、それもできない。
Translation: ...But obviously I'm not gonna die, either.

Name: a6121.nss
Japanese: 答えを先延ばしにしたまま、どんどん、時間だけが過ぎ去っていくのだろう。
Translation: As I procrastinate on my decision, time will pass...
KR: 답을 미룬 채 시간만 계속 흘러가겠지.

Name: a6121.nss
Japanese: またいつか、美雪が自然と俺の側を離れるまで。
Translation: ...until eventually Miyuki fades out of my life once again.
KR: 언젠가 미유키가 자연스럽게 내 곁을 떠날 때까지...

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 翌日、アオイが姿を消した。
Translation: The next day, Aoi had disappeared.

Name: a6131.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「帰ったら……もう、いなかったんだ。
　すまない……！！」
Translation:
"When I got home, she was already gone...
I'm so sorry...!"

Name: a6131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前のせいじゃ、ないよ」
Translation: "It's... It's not your fault."

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 具合が悪くて学校を休んだ彼女だったが、雄太郎が家に戻ると猫と共に姿を消してしまっていたらしい。
Translation: She had skipped school to recover from her illness, but by the time Yuutarou got home, she and Eru were both gone.
KR: 몸이 안 좋아서 학교를 쉰 아오이는 유우타로가 집에 돌아오자 고양이와 함께 모습을 감춘 모양이다.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: マンガ喫茶を探し歩いたりもしたのだが、彼女の姿はどこにも見受けられず。
Translation: We tried searching the manga cafe... then the rest of the city... but she was nowhere to be found.
KR: 만화방에도 가봤지만 아오이의 모습은 어디에도 보이지 않았다.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 後で担任に話を聞いても、「家庭の事情で引っ越した」「連絡先は把握していない」の一点張り。
Translation: When we asked our teacher, he wouldn't tell us much beyond "her family moved away" and "they didn't leave an address."
KR: 나중에 담임 선생님께 물어보니 '집안 사정으로 이사했다', '연락처는 파악하지 못했다'는 말로 일관했다.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 携帯電話は、もちろん圏外だ。
Translation: And naturally, her phone still doesn't have service.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: アオイへの手掛かりは、全くなくなってしまった。
Translation: So now I'm left with no way of reaching her ever again.
KR: 아오이에 대한 단서는 완전히 사라져 버렸다.

Name: a6131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「もう、あうこと、ないの」
Translation: "You'll never see me again."

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 彼女はそう言った。
Translation: She left town of her own free will.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: アオイは自分の意思で、姿を消した。
Translation: Her final parting words are proof enough of that.
KR: 아오이는 자기 자신의 의지로 모습을 감췄다.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 別れの言葉も残さずに。
Translation: And she didn't even say goodbye.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 俺は、見捨てられたのだ。
Translation: She just... abandoned me.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: それでも日常は、続いていく。
Translation: But the world goes on anyway.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 大多数の生徒にとっては、奇妙なクラスメイトがひとり、学校に来なくなっただけ。
Translation: To everyone else, she was just a weird girl who used to be in our class.
KR: 대다수 학생에게는 이상한 학급 친구 한 명이 학교에 나오지 않게 되었을 뿐.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 普通のクラスの、普通の生活。
Translation: They've gone back to their normal lives... and so have I.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 見た目には、以前と全く変わらない。
Translation: On the outside, nothing's changed.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 朝、起きて。
Translation: I wake up in the morning.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 学校に行き。
Translation: I go to school.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 授業を受け。
Translation: I go to class.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: メシを食い。
Translation: I eat lunch.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 眠気を堪え。
Translation: I try to stay awake.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 家に帰って。
Translation: I go home.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: テレビを見て。
Translation: I watch TV.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: ただ、寝る。
Translation: And then I go to bed.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 繰り返し……
Translation: Rinse and repeat...

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 繰り返し……
Translation: Rinse and repeat...

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 繰り返し……
Translation: Rinse and repeat...

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: おかしなことは何もない。
Translation: Nothing special or noteworthy happens.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: アオイと仲を深める前と同じ、美雪とは会話すら交わすことのない、平々凡々な毎日。
Translation: My daily life goes back to the way it was before I ever made friends with Aoi. Miyuki and I never talk anymore, either.
KR: 아오이와 친해지기 전과 같이, 미유키와는 말 한마디 안 하는 평범한 나날.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: でも、何かが決定的に、変わってしまった。
Translation: But something has changed—permanently.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: もう元には戻れない。
Translation: And it can never be undone.

Name: a6131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「おはよう！」
Translation: "Good morning!"

Name: a6131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……え？　駅前の、ケーキ屋さん？」
Translation: "...What's that? The bakery by the train station?"

Name: a6131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「ごめんなさい。
　今、演劇の本番前でダイエット中だから」
Translation:
"I'm sorry... I'm on a diet right now.
The big performance is coming up, after all."

Name: a6131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うん、公演が終わったら一緒に行くわね」
Translation: "Yeah! Once it's over, let's definitely go sometime."

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 美雪は相変わらず、クラスの中心。
Translation: Miyuki is still the center of attention, as always.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 彼女の告白とその失敗の噂は、ほんの一瞬学校中に広まったが、結果的に俺の大ボラということでカタがついた。
Translation: For a few days, the rumor mill exploded with talk of her failed love confession, but eventually they decided I must have made the whole thing up.
KR: 미유키가 고백하고 실패했단 소문은 아주 잠시 학교에 퍼졌지만, 내 허풍이었던 걸로 결론지어졌다.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 誰の目から見ても、美雪が俺に惹かれるだけの理由が見当たらなかったと言うことだろう。
Translation: Clearly no one saw any reason for someone of Miyuki's caliber to take romantic interest in a nobody like me.
KR: 누가 봐도 미유키가 내게 끌릴 이유가 없다는 거겠지.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: それも当然だ。
Translation: Not that I blame them.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: きっと俺がクラスメイトでも、同じように行動したに違いないのだから。
Translation: In their shoes, I probably would have had the same reaction.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: あの日以来、美雪も俺に声をかけてはこなかった。
Translation: And Miyuki hasn't spoken to me since.
KR: 그날 이후로 미유키도 나한테 말을 걸지 않았다.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 彼女はアオイと出会う以前の、完全無欠なクラスのアイドルに戻った――
Translation: She's gone back to being the queen bee, just the way she was before we ever met Aoi.
KR: 미유키는 아오이와 만나기 전 같이, 완전무결한 학교의 아이돌로 돌아갔다.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 多分、そうなんだと思う。
Translation: I'm certain of it.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 一方雄太郎は――
Translation: Meanwhile, as for Yuutarou—

Name: a6131.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ヤバいぞ心一！」
Translation: "Big news, Shinichi!"

Name: a6131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……なんだよ」
Translation: "...What is it this time?"

Name: a6131.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「従姉妹のねーちゃんの机から、薄っい本を発掘した！」
Translation: "I found a dirty magazine in my older cousin's desk!"

Name: a6131.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「表紙に１８禁！　と書いてある！
　これは、浪漫物件に違いない……！」
Translation:
"It says 'Adults Only' on the cover!
Surely it must be an artifact of male ambition!"
KR:
"표지에 19금이라고 쓰여 있다고!
이건 낭만 물건인 게 틀림없어...!"

Name: a6131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、でも表紙の感じが――」
Translation: "But you can tell from the cover art that it's—"

Name: a6131.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「心一部員、怖じ気づいたか？」
Translation: "Too chicken, Private Shinichi?"

Name: a6131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、そう言うんじゃなくてな、明らかに絡んでるのが男女じゃなくて――」
Translation: "I wouldn't say that, but... It's pretty obvious the content of her little book isn't het—"
KR: "아니, 그게 아니고 누가 봐도 남녀에 관한 책이 아니라..."

Name: a6131.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「まあいい。俺は、男の浪漫のために――いざッ！！」
Translation: "It matters not! For the sake of boys and dreams everywhere, I must take the plunge!!!"
KR: "뭐, 됐어. 나는 남자의 낭만을 위해... 이만!!"

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 薄い本に釘付けになったまま、雄太郎の動きが止まる。
Translation: Yuutarou freezes, his eyes glued to the pages.
KR: 유우타로는 그 책에 시선을 고정한 채 굳어버렸다.

Name: a6131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「雄太郎？」
Translation: "Yuutarou?"

Name: a6131.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「フザケルナァァァァ――――ッッッッ！！！！」
Translation: "I'VE BEEN BETRAAAAYED!!!"

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 相変わらず男の浪漫倶楽部部長を継続中。
Translation: —he's still the intrepid captain of the B&D Club.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 幾多の挫折にもめげず、新たな男の浪漫を探している。
Translation: He doesn't let any setback stop him from pushing on in search of the next big dream.
KR: 수많은 좌절에도 굴하지 않고 새로운 낭만을 찾아다닌다.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 俺を元気づけるため、いつものウザさがさらに空回りしているのが、ちょっとだけ辛いけど。
Translation: ...Though admittedly I wish he'd quit ramping up his goofy antics just for my sake.
KR: 나를 기운 나게 하려고 평소의 짜증스러움이 한층 더 심한 게 좀 괴롭지만...

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: ちなみに雄太郎の弟がどうなったかというと、新しくできた彼女といきなり別れてしまったらしい。
Translation: As for his brother Ryuujirou, I'm told he and his new girlfriend suddenly broke up.
KR: 덧붙여서 유우타로의 동생은 어떻게 됐냐면, 새로 생긴 여자친구와 갑자기 헤어져 버렸다고 한다.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 再び兄に想いを寄せるんじゃないか……？
Translation: Will he start pursuing things with Yuutarou again, you ask?

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: そんな心配もしたのだが、どうも弟はその彼女に女性の素晴らしさをたっぷりと教わったらしい。
Translation: As far as I can tell, there's no need for concern. I'm told his former girlfriend opened his eyes to the joys of the fairer sex.
KR: 그런 걱정도 했지만, 아무래도 남동생은 전 여자친구에게 여성의 훌륭함을 충분히 배운 것 같다.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: その容姿の素晴らしさも相まって、今や立派なプレイボーイになっている、との噂だ。
Translation: And with the help of his good looks, he's managed to turn himself into a full-fledged playboy, or so the rumors claim.
KR: 이젠 외모에 걸맞는 멋진 플레이보이가 됐다는 소문이다.

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: 実の兄に熱をあげるよりはいいだろう。
Translation: That's... better than having the hots for your own brother, I guess!

Name: a6131.nss
Japanese: そして俺は――
Translation: And as for me, well—

Name: a6141.nss
Japanese: チケットを手にしたまま、動けないでいた。
Translation: I'm rooted to the spot, ticket in hand.
KR: 티켓을 손에 쥔 채 움직이지 못했다.

Name: a6141.nss
Japanese: 美雪がキスシーンを演じるという、あの演劇。
Translation: This performance will take Miyuki's first kiss.

Name: a6141.nss
Japanese: 公演は、明日だ。
Translation: And it's happening tomorrow.

Name: a6142.nss
Japanese: アオイの撮った写真。
Translation: I still have the photo Aoi took of the three of us.

Name: a6142.nss
Japanese: もう二度と、戻れない過去。
Translation: A snapshot of a friendship I can never get back.

Name: a6143.nss
Japanese: あの屋根には登れない。
Translation: I can't bring myself to go back up to the roof again.
KR: 저 옥상 꼭대기에 올라갈 수가 없다.

Name: a6143.nss
Japanese: ３人の思い出が焼き付く、あの場所には。
Translation: That place is etched with all the memories of our friendship.
KR: 우리 세 사람의 추억이 새겨진 저곳에는.

Name: a6143.nss
Japanese: 世界の中心だとアオイが信じた、あの場所には。
Translation: It's the place Aoi referred to as the center of the universe.

Name: a6143.nss
Japanese: 俺はアオイを捜そうとは思わなかった。
Translation: Meanwhile, I have no plans to search for her.

Name: a6143.nss
Japanese: 彼女がいなくなったということは、捜して欲しくないということだろう。
Translation: She probably wouldn't want me to, anyway.
KR: 아오이가 사라졌다는 건 찾지 말아 달라는 뜻이겠지.

Name: a6143.nss
Japanese: 俺たちを見捨てたということだろう。
Translation: She threw our friendship away.

Name: a6143.nss
Japanese: 多分それは仕方ないことなのだろう。
Translation: Not that I really blame her for it.
KR: 아마 그것은 어쩔 수 없는 일이다.

Name: a6143.nss
Japanese: 俺の人生にセーブポイントはない。
Translation: But there are no save points in real life.

Name: a6143.nss
Japanese: もう、やり直しはきかないのだ。
Translation: There's no way for me to reload and try again.
KR: 이제 다시 시작할 수 없는 거다.

Name: a6143.nss
Japanese: それでも俺は、生きて行くのだ。
Translation: Still, I'm going to keep moving forward.

Name: a6143.nss
Japanese: 波風を立てず。
Translation: I'll live a quiet life.

Name: a6143.nss
Japanese: ひっそりと。
Translation: A life without any trouble.

Name: a6143.nss
Japanese: 高望みをせず。
Translation: No unreasonable expectations.

Name: a6143.nss
Japanese: 人並みの幸せで。
Translation: Just a normal, average life.

Name: a6143.nss
Japanese: 地道に毎日を過ごす。
Translation: An honest life.

Name: a6143.nss
Japanese: 街中を見下ろさなくても。
Translation: I don't need to be on top of the world.

Name: a6143.nss
Japanese: 世界の中心にならなくても。
Translation: I don't need to stand at the center of the universe.

Name: a6143.nss
Japanese: そういう生き方だって、いいだろう？
Translation: Not everyone has to be special, right?

Name: a6151.nss
Japanese: 俺は布団の中で、目蓋を閉じる。
Translation: I crawl under the covers and close my eyes.
KR: 나는 이불 속에 들어가 눈을 감았다.

Name: a6151.nss
Japanese: 夢の世界で、演劇が始まる。
Translation: In my dreams, it's opening night.

Name: a6151.nss
Japanese: 拍手喝采が鳴り止まないステージで、美雪はキスをする。
Translation: Miyuki kisses her lover to raucous applause.
KR: 박수갈채가 끊이지 않는 무대에서 미유키가 키스한다.

Name: a6151.nss
Japanese: 相手はもちろん俺じゃない。
Translation: She kisses someone who isn't me.

Name: a6151.nss
Japanese: 観客席の中にも、俺はいない。
Translation: I'm not in the audience.

Name: a6151.nss
Japanese: 俺の居場所は、どこにもない。
Translation: I'm nowhere to be found.

Name: a6151.nss
Japanese: 今すぐ、消えてしまいたい。
Translation: ...I wish I could just disappear.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: ゲームは集中できない。
Translation: I try to play video games, but can't focus.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: テレビはうるさすぎる。
Translation: I try to watch TV, but it grates on my ears.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: 俺はリビングで、ソファに横になる。
Translation: I lie on the sofa in the living room.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: 耳元で時計が秒針を刻む。
Translation: I can hear the clock ticking.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: 正確に、ゆっくりと、時が過ぎていく。
Translation: Time passes, one second at a time.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: いっそ、意識がなくなってしまえば楽だろう。
Translation: It would be so much easier if I could just pass out.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: だが、眠気は全くやってこない。
Translation: But sleep eludes me.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: それどころか、苛立ちばかりが募っていく。
Translation: All I feel is anger, steadily building.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: 何かしていないと、気が狂ってしまいそうだ。
Translation: The longer I lie here doing nothing, the more I feel like I'm going to lose my mind.
KR: 뭔가 하지 않으면 미쳐버릴 것 같았다.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: 俺は携帯電話を掴んで、立ち上がる。
Translation: I grab my phone and jump to my feet.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: そのまま外へ――
Translation: Then I head for the door and—

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: 家を出ようとして、足が止まる。
Translation: Before I can leave the house, I stop short.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: 確かテーブルに、演劇のチケットが置いたままだ。
Translation: The ticket is still lying on the coffee table where I left it.
KR: 분명 탁자 위에는 연극 티켓이 놓여있다.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: 公演までは、あと２時間あまり。
Translation: Just two hours until the show starts.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: 取りに戻るのは、やめた。
Translation: I decide not to go back and grab it.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: そのまま、街へ出る。
Translation: Instead, I head out into the city.

Name: a6161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、雄太郎？　暇か？」
Translation: "Hey, Yuutarou? You busy?"

Name: a6161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もしよかったら、今から一緒に遊――」
Translation: "Wanna hang out?"

Name: a6161.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
『今日、龍二郎に頼まれちまってて。
　これから夜までバイトなんだ』
Translation:
"I gotta work tonight.
I'm covering Ryuujirou's shift."

Name: a6161.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『悪い！』
Translation: "Sorry!"

Name: a6161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうか……いや、急に連絡したこっちが悪い」
Translation: "Nah, it's cool. Just thought I'd ask."

Name: a6161.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『あれ？　でも今日は曽根さんの――』
Translation: "Wait... Isn't Sone-san's performance—"

Name: a6161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「じゃあな、雄太郎！」
Translation: "Anyway, talk to you later!"

Name: a6161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...Fuck."

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎に当たっても仕方ない。
Translation: It's not Yuutarou's fault.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: そのくらい、わかってる。
Translation: I know that.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: 俺はアテもなく、街を放浪した。
Translation: I wander the streets aimlessly.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: だが――
Translation: But no matter where I go...

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: どこに行っても――
Translation: Every street...

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: どこに行っても――
Translation: Every corner...

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: どこに行っても――
Translation: Every store...

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: この街は、彼女たちとの思い出に、彩られている。
Translation: It's all tainted with my memories of Miyuki and Aoi.
KR: 이 거리는 우리들의 추억으로 물들어 있다.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: 忘れることなんてできやしないのだ。
Translation: I can't get them out of my head.
KR: 잊어버리는 일 따윈 할 수 없다.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: 苛立ちは募るばかり。
Translation: Meanwhile, my frustration builds.

Name: a6161.nss
Japanese: この鬱憤を晴らす手段はないだろうか。
Translation: I need to vent... but how...?

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: 相変わらず客のいない、バッティングセンター。
Translation: As usual, the batting cages are empty.

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: 俺はバットを手に、ただぼんやりと、座っている。
Translation: I sit on the bench, bat in hand, staring into space.
KR: 나는 방망이를 손에 쥔 채 가만히 앉아있었다.

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: 胸一杯に湧き出して、破裂寸前だった感情が、有耶無耶のうちにその形を失って、胸の奥に溜まっていく。
Translation: My emotions swell in my chest until they're fit to burst, then sink into a vague shapelessness that swirls around in my gut.
KR: 가슴 속에서 솟아올라 폭발하기 직전이었던 감정은 흐지부지하게 그 형태를 잃고 가라앉았다.

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: 澱のように、行き場所もなく、ただ、埋もれる。
Translation: With no chance of release, it piles up like sludge.
KR: 물웅덩이처럼 갈 곳도 없이 그저 묻힌다.

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: 時だけが過ぎていく。
Translation: Time ticks by.

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: 俺は密かに、期待していた。
Translation: Secretly, I'd gotten my hopes up.

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: ここはかつて、美雪と一緒に通った場所だ。
Translation: Here I am at our old childhood hangout spot.
KR: 이곳은 어릴 적에 미유키와 함께 다닌 곳이다.

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: 彼女の未来を変えた、運命の交差点。
Translation: The place where I once changed her fate.

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: ここに来れば、何かが変わるんじゃないかって、心のどこかで期待していた。
Translation: And somehow I'd convinced myself that maybe coming here would change mine.
KR: 여기에 오면 뭔가 달라지지 않을까 하고 마음 한구석에서 기대하고 있었다.

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: なのに俺は、打てなかった。
Translation: But I couldn't hit a single ball.

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: バットすら、振れなかった。
Translation: I couldn't even take a single swing.

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……ははは」
Translation: "Hahaha..."

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: 余りの情けなさに、乾いた笑いが漏れ出る。
Translation: I laugh weakly at my own sorry state of affairs.

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: ここまで自分が情けないとは、思わなかった。
Translation: I've never hated myself more in my entire life.

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: 懐かしい声が、届く。
Translation: I hear a familiar sound.

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: ベンチの裏から姿を現したのは、黒い子猫。
Translation: A small black kitten totters out from under the bench.
KR: 벤치 뒤에서 모습을 드러낸 건 검은 새끼 고양이.

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「エル、か？」
Translation: "Eru, is that you?"

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: 俺の問いかけに答えるよう、電波ネコは甘えた声で鳴く。
Translation: The transceiver cat meows sweetly in reply.
KR: 내 질문에 대답이라도 하듯 전파 고양이는 어리광부리며 울었다.

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: ということは――
Translation: If Eru's here... then...

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ」
Translation: "Shinichi."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どこに行ってた？」
Translation: "Where have you been?"

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それは……」
Translation: "Well..."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どうして、今さら？」
Translation: "Why bother coming back now?"

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「笑いに来たのか？」
Translation: "Are you here to point and laugh?"

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ちがうの」
Translation: "No."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それじゃ、なにしに？」
Translation: "Then why ARE you here?"

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、そうか。修整するためか」
Translation: "Oh, I get it. You're here to patch things up."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺と美雪が結ばれないのは、間違いなんだっけ？」
Translation: "You think Miyuki and I have to get together, right?"
KR: "나랑 미유키가 이어지지 않는 건 사고라고 했지?"

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから、正しいエンディングのために――」
Translation: "So you're trying to set me on the right 'route' or whatever?"

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あいたかったの」
Translation: "Aoi missed you."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ヒコウリャクヒロインは、フェードアウトがふつう」
Translation: "Once you're on a route, the other girls are supposed to fade into the background."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あっちゃだめなのは、わかってたの」
Translation: "So Aoi wasn't supposed to see you anymore."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あいたかったの」
Translation: "Aoi missed you so much..."

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: 自己嫌悪が襲う。
Translation: This conversation is too little, too late.

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: こんなことを言っても、仕方ないのに。
Translation: And yet, all at once, I'm filled with self-loathing.

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「エンゲキは？」
Translation: "Why aren't you going to the play?"

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキと、うまくいってないの？」
Translation: "Are things not working out with Miyuki?"

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「チュー、したの？」
Translation: "Did you kiss her?"

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……しない」

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アイツのキスの相手は、俺じゃない」
Translation: "She'll be kissing someone, but it won't be me."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「したくないの？」
Translation: "Don't you want to?"

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……その話は、いいよ」
Translation: "...I'm done talking about this."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「したいの？」
Translation: "So you DO want to."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いいってば！」
Translation: "I said I'm done!"

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「したいの」
Translation: "You want to kiss her."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「黙れって！！」
Translation: "Shut up!"

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……俺には、資格、ないし」
Translation: "...I don't deserve to."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪と、全然、釣り合わないし」
Translation: "She's very clearly out of my league."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「自分にだって、そのくらいわかるし」
Translation: "Even I'm not THAT stupid."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そんなの、わからないの」
Translation: "You don't know that."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「わかるだろ」
Translation: "Sure I do."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?"

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「いつまで夢なんて見てるんだよ。
　ゲームじゃない。コレが現実なんだ」
Translation:
"How long are you going to keep living in your fantasy world?
This isn't a game. This is real life."
KR:
"언제까지 꿈만 꾸고 있을 거야?
이건 게임이 아니라 현실이라고."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺は俺で、変われない。限界なんだ」
Translation: "I can't change who I am. I've tried."
KR: "나는 나일 뿐이고, 변할 수 없어. 이젠 한계야."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「神様はいない。奇跡なんてない」
Translation: "God isn't real. Miracles aren't real."

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: 俺の口が、勝手に動く。
Translation: My mouth moves of its own accord, blurting out all the things I could never say before.

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: 今まで絶対に、口にできなかった一言。
KR: 지금까지 절대 입에 담을 수 없었던 한마디.

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「――お前の神様だって、ニセモノだ」
Translation: "And your god isn't real, either."

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: アオイは唐突に、バットを取る。
Translation: Suddenly, Aoi grabs a baseball bat.

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「かけ、するの」
Translation: "Let's make a bet."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What?"

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、ホームラン、うつの」
Translation: "Aoi's gonna hit a home run."

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: そう言って、バッターボックスに立つ。
Translation: She moves into the batter's box.

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: 俺と美雪の教えに忠実に、バットを構え――
Translation: Then she takes up a batting stance, just as we taught her.
KR: 나와 미유키에게 배운 대로 방망이를 들고서...

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ホームランうったら――」
Translation: "And if Aoi does hit a home run..."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ、ミユキにこくはくするの」
Translation: "You have to tell Miyuki how you feel."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「は？　なに言ってんだよ？」
Translation: "Excuse me? Don't be ridiculous."

Name: a6171.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop!"

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: アオイは、俺の言葉にも耳を貸さない。
Translation: She doesn't respond.
KR: 아오이는 내 목소리에 귀 기울이지 않고.

Name: a6171.nss
Japanese: うなりを上げるボールを、迎え撃つ。
Translation: The ball whistles toward her, and she swings her bat.

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: ――１時間が経過した。
Translation: One hour later...

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop... Nnn... nnn..."

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はぁっ……はぁっ……はぁっ……はぁっ……」
Translation: "Haah... haah... haah... haah..."

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: 完全に、振り遅れている。
Translation: Her swing is completely off.

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: ここしばらく、ボールはバットに掠りもしない。
Translation: She hasn't even grazed the ball for a while now.

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: それでも――
Translation: And yet—

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はぁっ……はぁっ……はぁっ……はぁっ……」
Translation: "Haah... haah... haah... haah..."

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: 打てるはずもない、ホームランを狙って。
Translation: —she keeps swinging anyway.
KR: 칠 수 있을 리가 없는 홈런을 노리고.

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: バカのひとつ覚えみたいに。
Translation: She knows she can't hit a home run, but she keeps trying anyway.

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: アオイはバットを振り続ける。
Translation: You'd think she'd have given up by now, but she hasn't.

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Nnnn... nnn... nnn..."

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: 勢い余って、アオイが転倒する。
Translation: The momentum sends her tumbling to the ground.

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: 力を使い果たし、すぐには起き上がることもできない。
Translation: After using up all her energy, she's too exhausted to stand.
KR: 힘이 다 빠져서 일어날 수도 없는 것 같다.

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ。もう、諦め――」
Translation: "Come on, Aoi. Just give up already."

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だめ」
Translation: "No!"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あきらめないの」
Translation: "Aoi will never give up!"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチが……ミユキに、コクハクするまで」
Translation: "Not until you... tell Miyuki you love her!"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「無理だって」
Translation: "I told you, I can't."

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「むりじゃないの」
Translation: "Yes you can!"

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: アオイはバットを杖代わりにして、立ち上がる。
Translation: Aoi heaves herself to her feet, using her bat to support her.

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ホームランうったら、シンイチ、しんじるの」
Translation: "Once Aoi hits a home run, you have to have faith."

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから、神様なんていないって、何回言ったら――」
Translation: "I keep telling you, God isn't real."
KR: "그러니까 신님 같은 건 없다고 몇 번을 말해야..."

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いるの！！」
Translation: "IS TOO!!!"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いる！　いる！　ぜったい、いるの！」
Translation: "Is too, is too, IS TOO!"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "—Nngh!"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、カミサマを、しってて！」
Translation: "Aoi's met God!"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "—Nngh!"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カミサマは、セカイをアップデートできて、だから！」
Translation: "And God can update the universe!"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "—Hnngh!"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「キセキは……おこるの……！」
Translation: "Which means... miracles are real, too...!"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "—Hggh!"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ねがいは……きっと、とどく……」
Translation: "Your wish... can come true...!"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "—Nngah!"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、ホームラン、うてるの」
Translation: "And Aoi can hit a home run!"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うてる……はず……なの……に……」
Translation: "Aoi... knows... Aoi can... do it..."

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ――」
Translation: "Aoi!"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どうして……」

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: 床に手をつき、転がるボールを鷲掴みにする。
Translation: She reaches down and grabs a baseball lying on the ground.
KR: 아오이는 바닥에 주저앉아 구르는 공을 움켜쥐었다.

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: ネットの上の的へ、投げつける。
Translation: Then she flings it up at the net...
KR: 그리고 과녁을 향해 힘껏 집어 던졌다.

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: だが届かない。
Translation: Naturally, it falls far too short of the target.

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: 遥か下に当たって、落ちる。

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どうして！？　どうして！？　どうしてッ！！」
Translation: "Why, why, WHY?!?!"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どうして、うてないの……？」
Translation: "Why can't Aoi do it...?"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ……」

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: 小さい身体をさらに縮こまらせて。
Translation: She shrinks down.
KR: 작은 몸을 더 작게 움츠린 채,

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: 長く伸びた影が、細かく、震えて。
Translation: Her shadow wavers along the ground.
KR: 길게 늘어진 그림자가 조금씩 떨리고 있었다.

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: か細く、アオイが呟く。
Translation: She whispers faintly.

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あのね……シンイチ」
Translation: "Listen, Shinichi..."

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「さいきん、ずっと……」
Translation: "The past few days..."

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「デンパ……とどかないの」
Translation: "My phone calls... They won't go through."

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カミサマに、セーブ、できないの」
Translation: "So Aoi can't ask God to save the game."

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイから、アップデートもできないの」
Translation: "And Aoi can't make an update patch, either."

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カミサマ、アオイを、みすてたの？」
Translation: "Do you think... God abandoned me...?"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、ゲームのヒロインじゃ、なかったの？」
Translation: "Was Aoi never a romance option in the first place?"

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: ずっと学校に来なかったアオイ。
Translation: Aoi's been gone all this time...

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: 圏外のスマフォで、ずっと、ずっと、神様にコールし続けるアオイの姿が、はっきりと目蓋に浮かんだ。
Translation: I can picture her with her arm up in the air, "transmitting" to God with a phone that has no signal.
KR: 권외 상태인 핸드폰을 들고 계속 신님에게 전화 거는 아오이의 모습이 눈에 선했다.

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: 神様は、現実に馴染むことのなかったアオイの、唯一の心の支えだった。
Translation: She's so far removed from reality, her "god" is the only emotional support she has.
KR: 신님은 현실에 적응하지 못했던 아오이의 유일한 버팀목이었다.

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: それがなくなってしまったら、彼女は――
Translation: Without it, she—

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも、シンイチは、アオイに、おしえたの」
Translation: "But you taught me so much."

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このセカイには――」
Translation: "You gave me—"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うれしい――」
Translation: "—joy—"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「たのしい――」
Translation: "—and excitement—"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「さみしい――」
Translation: "—and sadness—"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「くるしい――」
Translation: "—and pain—"

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「たくさんのきもちが、あるって」
Translation: "—and all the other feelings in this universe."

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから、いま、ここにいられるの」
Translation: "It's thanks to you that Aoi is who Aoi is today."

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチはね」
Translation: "And now, Shinichi..."

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイの、あたらしい、カミサマなの」
Translation: "...you're my new God."

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: 俺が……神様？
Translation: I'm her God?

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから……おねがいなの」
Translation: "Please help me..."

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイのきもちは、まちがいじゃないって」
Translation: "Aoi needs something to believe in..."

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ひとをすきになるって、いいことだって」
Translation: "Please tell me my feelings are valid..."

Name: a6181.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そう、しんじさせて……」
Translation: "Help me believe in love...!"

Name: a6181.nss
Japanese: "信じさせられる","信じさせられない"
Translation: "Help her believe","Let her down"

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: 俺は静かに歩き、転がったままのバットを見る。
Translation: I walk over and look at the bat lying on the ground.
KR: 나는 조용히 걸어가 굴러떨어진 방망이를 보았다.

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: アオイが落としたそのグリップには、血が滲んでいた。
Translation: There's blood on the grip from where Aoi was holding it.
KR: 아오이가 잡고 있던 손잡이에는 피가 배어있었다.

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: ゆっくりと、手に取ると――
Translation: Slowly, I pick it up—

Name: a6182a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ――？」
Translation: "Shinichi?"

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: バッターボックスに立つ。
Translation: —and stand in the batter's box.

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: 構える。
Translation: I assume my batting stance.

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: 全神経を、前方に集中させる。
Translation: Then I focus my energy on everything directly in front of me.

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: どうしてこんな気持ちになったんだろう？
Translation: What's gotten into me?

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: 少しだけ、不思議に思う。
Translation: Even I'm not entirely sure.

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: いつもの俺なら、出来ないはずなのに。
Translation: Ordinarily I'd never make it this far.

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: きっと、逃げ出してしまうはずなのに。
Translation: Instead, I'd find a way to get out of it.

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: でも今、俺は、ここに立っている。
Translation: And yet, here I am.

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: もしかしたら、アオイのおかげかもしれない。
Translation: Maybe I have Aoi to thank for this.

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: 鼓動が高鳴るのがはっきりとわかる。
Translation: I can feel my heart pounding.
KR: 심장이 고동치는 것을 똑똑히 알 수 있다.

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: 久しぶりの感覚。
Translation: I haven't felt this way in years.

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: 投げ込まれたボールを、美雪のような美しいフォームで跳ね返す――
Translation: The pitching machine will shoot the ball, and with perfect form on par with Miyuki's, I'll send it rocketing back—
KR: 날아오는 공을 미유키처럼 멋진 폼으로 날린다...

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: 放物線を描いた白球が、「ホームラン」の的に見事的中する――
Translation: —directly into the "Home Run" target.
KR: 포물선을 그린 야구공은 '홈런' 과녁에 멋지게 적중한다...

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: その光景を、何度も何度も思い浮かべる。
Translation: I've had this same fantasy a thousand times.

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: ボールが放たれた。
Translation: The pitching machine fires the ball.

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: 予想通りのコース――
Translation: So far, so good—

Name: a6182a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Miyuki—!"

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: バットは見事に、ボールを外れた。
Translation: My swing misses completely.

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: 俺はそのまま、大地に突っ伏す。
Translation: I promptly collapse to the ground.

Name: a6182a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ははっ」
Translation: "Haha!"

Name: a6182a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はははっ！　はは、ははははははっ！！」
Translation: "Hahaha! Haha... hahahahahaha!"

Name: a6182a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ――」
Translation: "Shinichi!"

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: 俺は笑う。
Translation: Holy shit.

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: 笑いが、止まらなくなってしまう。
Translation: I can't stop laughing.

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: 言い訳できないくらいの、空振りだ。
Translation: I have no excuse for that shameful display.

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: ホームランが、打てなかった。
Translation: I failed to hit a home run.

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: 奇跡は、起こせなかった。
Translation: I failed to make a miracle happen.

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: でも――
Translation: And yet...

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: こんなに、空は晴れ晴れとしていた。
Translation: Somehow, I feel like I'm walking on cloud nine.

Name: a6182a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ――？」
Translation: "Shinichi?"

Name: a6182a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ、ありがとな」
Translation: "Thank you, Aoi."

Name: a6182a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「やっと、バット、振れた」
Translation: "With your help, I finally swung a bat again."

Name: a6182a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ここから、始めればいい」
Translation: "Now I can just start over."

Name: a6182a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうだよな？」
Translation: "It's not too late, right?"

Name: a6182a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そうなの！」
Translation: "Right!"

Name: a6182a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「悪い、時間がないんだ」
Translation: "Sorry, but I've got somewhere to be."

Name: a6182a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪に会いに行ってくる！」
Translation: "I'm going to see Miyuki!"

Name: a6182a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今度こそちゃんと、俺の気持ち伝えてくる！」
Translation: "And this time, I'm going to tell her how I feel!"

Name: a6182a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい！」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: a6182a.nss
Japanese: 走り出す俺の背中で、アオイがピンと空に手を挙げた。
Translation: As I get ready to take off, Aoi raises her hand.
KR: 달려가는 내 등 뒤로 아오이가 팟하고 손을 들어 올렸다.

Name: a6182a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ、カッコイイの！！」
Translation: "Shinichi, you're so cool!"

Name: a6182a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「まだ、カッコ悪いよ！」
Translation: "Hardly!"

Name: a6182a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ちがう。カッコイイの！！」
Translation: "No, really! You're the coolest!"

Name: a6182a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「つぎはまた――」
Translation: "Until we meet again..."

Name: a6182a.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あたらしいアオイが、べつルートで、まってるの！！」
Translation: "A brand new Aoi will be waiting for you in another route!"

Name: a6182b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ごめん」
Translation: "I'm sorry."

Name: a6182b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ――？」
Translation: "Shinichi?"

Name: a6182b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、やっぱり、無理なんだ」
Translation: "I just can't do it."

Name: a6182b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺は、どこまで行っても、俺なんだ」
Translation: "At the end of the day, I can't change who I am."

Name: a6182b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「情けないけど……美雪と一緒にいると、彼女の足を引っ張っちゃうのがわかるんだ」
Translation: "I know it's pathetic of me, but... I don't want to get in the way of Miyuki's dreams."
KR: "한심하지만... 미유키와 함께 있으면 그 녀석의 발목을 붙잡아 버릴 뿐이이라고."

Name: a6182b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「俺、嫉妬深いから。
　アイツがキスするのも許せないから」
Translation:
"I'm the crazy jealous type, y'know.
I'd never let her kiss another guy."
KR:
"나, 질투가 심해서,
그 녀석이 키스하는 것도 용서할 수 없으니까."

Name: a6182b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「好きになんて、なれないよ」
Translation: "So I can't let myself fall for her."

Name: a6182b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アイツには、邪魔なんだよ」
Translation: "I'd just be a burden on her."

Name: a6182b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そんなこと――」
Translation: "You're wr—"

Name: a6182b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「奇跡は、起こらなかった」
Translation: "There are no miracles."

Name: a6182b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「神様なんて、いなかった」
Translation: "No gods."

Name: a6182b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「全部――全部、妄想だったんだ」
Translation: "All of it... All of it is fantasy."

Name: a6182b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だろ？」
Translation: "You know that, right?"

Name: a6182b.nss
Japanese: 振り返る。
Translation: I turn to look at her—

Name: a6182b.nss
Japanese: しかし――

Name: a6182b.nss
Japanese: そこには誰もいない。
Translation: —but no one is there.

Name: a6182b.nss
Japanese: なぜなら、俺はたったひとりだからだ。
Translation: I'm all alone.

Name: a6182b.nss
Japanese: 全部が俺の、妄想だったからだ。
Translation: It was all just in my head.

Name: a6182b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「誰に向かって、話してるんだか」
Translation: "Good grief. Who did I think I was talking to?"

Name: a6182b.nss
Japanese: 独りごちて、俺は落ちたバットを蹴り飛ばす。
Translation: Muttering to myself, I kick the bat lying on the ground.

Name: a6182b.nss
Japanese: 一度も、振ることのなかったバット。
Translation: I couldn't bring myself to swing it even once.

Name: a6182b.nss
Japanese: そして俺は、これから二度と、振ることはないだろう。
Translation: And I'll probably never swing it again for the rest of my life.
KR: 앞으로 두 번 다시 휘두르는 일은 없겠지.

Name: a6182b.nss
Japanese: それが多分、当たり前のことなんだ。
Translation: Not that I should have expected any different.

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: 俺には才能がない。
Translation: I have no talent.

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: 度胸もないし、格好悪いし、クラスのモブだし。
Translation: I'm a gutless loser. A wimp. A nobody.
KR: 배짱도 없고, 꼴사납고, 별 볼 일 없고.

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: ホームランは打てないし、王子様でもない。
Translation: I'm no prince. I can't hit a home run.

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: 美雪には釣り合わない。
Translation: And Miyuki's totally out of my league.

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: 多分、それは事実だ。
Translation: It's all fact, plain and simple.

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: でも――俺は思う。
Translation: And yet...

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: ボロボロになりながら、バットを振り続けたアオイ。
Translation: I think back to Aoi, swinging her bat until she could hardly stand.
KR: 지쳐 쓰러질 때까지 방망이를 휘두른 아오이.

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: 彼女は格好悪かったか？
Translation: Was she pathetic?

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: 彼女の涙は無意味か？
Translation: Were her tears wasted?

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: 違う。
Translation: No.

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: 俺は、彼女のおかげで、バットを振れた。
Translation: With her help, I finally found the strength to take a swing.
KR: 나는 아오이 덕분에 방망이를 휘두를 수 있었다.

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: 結果なんて、どうでもいい。
Translation: Home run or strike, it doesn't matter.

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: ただ、思い切り、挑戦したい。
Translation: All I have to do is keep trying.

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: そう、思うことができた。
Translation: I understand that now.

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: 何度、諦めろって言い聞かせても。
Translation: No matter how many times I told myself to let go...

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: そんなわけないって、騙そうとしても。
Translation: No matter how many times I pretended it wasn't real...
KR: 그럴 리가 없다며 자신을 속이려 해도...

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: 最初の最初の最初から、気持ちは決まっていたのだ。
Translation: My feelings were always there, right from the very start.
KR: 맨 처음부터 내 마음은 정해져 있었다.

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: 俺は、美雪が好きだった。
Translation: I've always loved her.

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: 好きで、好きで、好きで――たまらなかった。
Translation: She was my everything.
KR: 좋아해서, 너무 좋아해서 참을 수 없다.

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: 運命は残酷で、最後に王子となるハッピーエンドが用意されていないとしても。
Translation:
So what if I didn't transform into a prince for my happy ending?
So what if real life doesn't work that way?
KR: 운명이 잔혹하고, 마지막에 왕자가 되는 해피엔딩이 아니라고 해도.

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: もう、自分の気持ちに嘘をつくのは、やめよう。
Translation: I'm done lying to myself about how I feel.

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: 彼女の所に、走りだそう。
Translation: No matter where she is, I'll find her.

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: 机の上に置いてある演劇のチケットを、掴み取る。
Translation: I grab the ticket off the table.

Name: a6191.nss
Japanese: 開演までは、あと１５分――
Translation: Fifteen minutes left until the show starts.

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はぁっ……はぁっ……はぁっ……はぁっ……」
Translation: "Haah... haah... haah... haah...!"

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: もう動けない――鉛のように重くなって抗議する手足を振り回し、なんとか学校まで辿り着く。
Translation: I force my now-leaden legs to carry me all the way to the school.
KR: 납덩이처럼 무거워져 비명을 지르는 손발을 휘저으며 겨우 학교에 도착했다.

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はぁっ……はぁっ……はぁっ……ん――くぅっ！」
Translation: "Haah... haah... haah... nnguh!"

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 靴を揃える手間も惜しんで、演劇が行われているはずの旧体育館へ。
Translation: Flinging off my shoes, I hurry to the old gymnasium where the performance is to be held.
KR: 신발은 아무 데나 휙 던져버리고 연극이 한창인 옛 체육관으로 향했다.

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はぁっ、ん――これ……」
Translation: "Haah... nng... Here... Ticket..."

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 息も絶え絶えで、受付に話しかけることもできない。
Translation: I'm so out of breath, I can scarcely hold a conversation with the ticket clerk.
KR: 숨이 차서 말도 제대로 안 나왔다.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: よろけながら、劇場へと入り込む。
Translation: Exhausted, I stumble my way into the auditorium.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 客席のほとんどは、もう埋まっていた。
Translation: Most of the seats are already full.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 開演までは、あと５分。
Translation: Just five minutes left until the show starts.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 舞台への大きな期待とささやかな不安で、本番前の体育館はざわめきに包まれている。
Translation: The crowd is buzzing with excitement and curiosity.
KR: 연극에 대한 기대와 불안으로 체육관은 술렁이고 있었다.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 俺は懸命に、辺りを見回して――
Translation: Desperately, I search the room—

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪！」
Translation: "MIYUKI!"

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Shinichi...?"

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 大声に、体育館が静まりかえる。
Translation: The gym goes dead silent.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 注目が、一気に集まるのがわかる。
Translation: All at once, everyone's eyes are on me.
KR: 순식간에 모든 이목이 쏠리는 것이 느껴졌다.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: まるで舞台の上にいるようだ。
Translation: It's like I'm on stage again...
KR: 마치 무대 위에 있는 것 같았다.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 彼女に比べれば、俺は三文役者だろう。
Translation: I'm just a bit player compared to her, though.
KR: 미유키에 비하면 나는 삼류 배우일 것이다.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: きっと、自分のセリフは笑われるだろう。
Translation: And I'm sure my lines will be laughed at.
KR: 분명 내 대사를 듣고 비웃을 것이다.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: でも、これは芝居じゃない。
Translation: But this isn't an act.

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ど、どうしたの？」
Translation: "Wh-What's the matter?"

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺！　おまえのこと――！」
Translation: "I... I need to tell you something!"

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 荒い息も収まらないまま、俺は美雪に叫んだ。
Translation: My breath still ragged, I force the words out at full volume.
KR: 거친 숨을 몰아쉬며 미유키를 향해 외쳤다.

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「好きだっ！！」
Translation: "I LOVE YOU!"

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「ああ。ずっと、ずっと――
　前から、言えなかったけど――」
Translation:
"It's the truth... All this time...
I've never been able to admit it, but..."

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「やっぱり俺、美雪が好きなんだ！！」
Translation: "I love you, Miyuki!"

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 美雪は、今にも崩れそうな顔で。
Translation: She looks like she's fighting back tears.
KR: 미유키는 금방이라도 울 것 같은 얼굴을 하고,

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 必死に、息を整えた。
Translation: I gasp for breath.

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ……ありが、とうっ……」
Translation: "Th... Thank... you..."

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: やっぱり、顔は、少しだけ崩れる。
Translation: Her expression falters just a bit.

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ずっと……その、言葉……聞きたかった……」
Translation: "I've... always hoped... you would... say that..."

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 俺だけに聞こえる微かな声で、呟いた。
Translation: She whispers in a tiny voice only I can hear.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 彼女の身体の側で――
Translation: I walk up to her—

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: そっと、彼女の手を握って――
Translation: —and take her hand—

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「ちょ、ちょちょちょっと！　待ってください！」
Translation: "Whoa, whoa, whoa! Hold it!"

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「なにやってるんですか！？　本番前に！」
Translation: "What are you doing?! The show's about to start!"

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え、ええと――」
Translation: "Oh, uh—"

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ファンサービス！」
Translation: "Fan outreach!"

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: パチン！　と、美雪のスイッチが切り替わった。
Translation: Just like that, Miyuki switches back to her usual persona.

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「彼が、私のファンだって言うから」
Translation: "He says he's my biggest fan."

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Translation: "Your fan...?"

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そう。私が好きで、応援してくれてるんだって」
Translation: "Yeah. He said he loves my acting and wants to support me."

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Translation: "...Is that true?"

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうよね？」
Translation: "Of course. Isn't that right?"

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: それは多分、この場を繕うための機転。
Translation: This must be a spur-of-the-moment cover story.
KR: 이건 아마 이 자리를 얼버무리기 위한 임기응변.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: このままでは美雪や演劇部に、迷惑がかかる。
Translation: Otherwise, my actions will just cause drama for Miyuki and the rest of the theatre club.
KR: 이대로는 미유키나 연극부 사람들에게 폐를 끼친다.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 何事もなく演劇を始めるには、その展開に乗るしかない。
Translation: If I don't want to destroy this performance, then my only option is to go along with it.
KR: 무사히 연극이 시작되려면 이 전개대로 가는 수밖에 없다.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: そう、美雪の顔が言っている。
Translation: It's written all over Miyuki's face.

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「演劇が終わったら、また話しましょう」
Translation: "Let's talk after the show, okay?"

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ほら、ハルちゃん」
Translation: "Let's go, Haru-chan."

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「は……はい」
Translation: "O-Okay..."

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 俺の前から姿を消す美雪。
Translation: Miyuki walks off.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: これから、演劇が始まるのだ。
Translation: The performance is about to start.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 俺は、いちファンのフリをして、見送る。
Translation: As a would-be "fan," I can only watch her go.
KR: 나는 한 명의 팬인 척을 하고 미유키를 보내주었다.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: ……ただ見送れば、良いはずなのに。
Translation: I know I should, and yet—

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "WAIT!!!"

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 背中を向けたまま、美雪が歩みを止める。
Translation: Miyuki stops short, her back still turned.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: このまま舞台の幕が上がったら――
Translation: If you go up on that stage—

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 台本通り、演劇が進行したら――
Translation: If this play follows that script—

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なに……かな？」
Translation: "Wh... What is it?"

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 彼女は演技できていなかった。
Translation: Her persona's slipping.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: ここに来て、彼女に気持ちを伝える。
Translation: I had one goal in coming here.
KR: 여기로 와서 미유키에게 내 마음을 전한다.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 俺の意識は、そこまでだった。
Translation: My objective was to tell her how I felt.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: そこから先はなんて、全然、考えていなかった。
Translation: Honestly, I ought to have planned for whatever happened after that...
KR: 지금부터 어떻게 해야 할지 전혀 생각하지 못했다.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 本当は、それじゃダメなのに。
Translation: But I hadn't.

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Shinichi...?"

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 瞳が訴えていた。
Translation: I can see the pleading look in her eyes.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: ――私をここから、連れ去って。
Translation: Begging me to steal her away—

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: でも――
