Translation: But it's too late.

Name: a6201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「がんばれよ」
Translation: "Break a leg up there."

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 美雪は、そのまま、舞台袖へ消える。
Translation: Miyuki disappears backstage without another word.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 俺は力なく、椅子に腰掛けて。
Translation: Weakly, I collapse into an empty chair.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: そのまま、動く気力もない。
Translation: I'm too exhausted to move.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: もう、遅かった。
Translation: I was too late.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 手遅れだった。
Translation: Too late to change anything.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 今の俺にできることは、何もなかった。
Translation: I'm utterly powerless.
KR: 지금 내가 할 수 있는 일은 아무것도 없었다.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 逃げ出さないのが、せめてもの意地……？
Translation: Am I making a choice to stand my ground here?
KR: 도망치지 않는 게, 그나마 남은 오기일까?

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 多分、違う。
Translation: No.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: ただ、身動きが取れないだけだ。
Translation: I'm just unable to move.

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 彼女はこれから――
Translation: And now...

Name: a6201.nss
Japanese: 俺じゃない男と、キスをする。
Translation: Now she's going to kiss some other guy.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 拍手と共に幕が開く。
Translation: The curtains rise to loud applause.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 舞台上で、いきなり美雪がバットを振り抜いている。
Translation: Onstage, Miyuki suddenly starts swinging.
KR: 무대 위에서 미유키는 갑자기 방망이를 휘두르고 있었다.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 静寂の中、響き渡る風の音。
Translation: In the silent auditorium, all that can be heard is the sound of her bat cutting through the air.
KR: 정적 속에서 울려 퍼지는 바람 소리.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 美しいスイング。
Translation: Her swing is flawless.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: なんの言葉も発しないが、しかし、それはどんな言葉よりも説得力を持って、観客の心を掴む。
Translation: She doesn't speak, but her actions do the talking for her, grabbing the audience's attention.
KR: 아무 말도 하지 않았지만, 그 어떤 말보다 설득력이 느껴져 관객들의 마음을 사로잡았다.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 彼女なら、そのくらいのことをして当然だ。
Translation: But this is all child's play for Miyuki.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 俺もただの観客のひとりとして、美雪に見入る。
Translation: Here in the audience, my eyes are glued to her.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 声音が耳に響き渡る。
Translation: Her voice echoes in my ears.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 言葉に魂を握られる。
Translation: Her words seep down to my soul.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 動きから目が離せない。
Translation: Her every move perfectly captures my attention.
KR: 동작 하나하나 눈을 뗄 수가 없다.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 仕草に心を奪われる。
Translation: Every tiny gesture captivates me.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 唇が――
Translation: And her lips—

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 見入れば見入るほど、心が乱れる。
Translation: The more I watch, the more anxious I become.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 話の筋なんて、頭に入るわけがない。
Translation: At this point, I can't even follow the plot.
KR: 줄거리 같은 게 머리에 들어올 리가 없었다.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 女子ソフトボール部に、野球部が助っ人として加わる、とか、そんな話。
Translation: Something about a baseball player filling in a spot on the girls' softball team.
KR: 여자 소프트볼부에 야구부가 용병으로 가세하는 그런 이야기.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 男役が視界に入りそうになっただけで、吐き気を催す。
Translation: The moment the male actor enters my line of sight, I feel queasy.
KR: 남자 배역이 시야에 들어온 것만으로도 토할 것 같았다.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 今すぐ観客席から飛び出したい。
Translation: I'm tempted to jump up out of my seat and make a beeline for the door.
KR: 지금 당장에라도 무대로 뛰쳐 올라가고 싶다.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 逃げ出したい。

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 消え去ってしまいたい。
Translation: I want to disappear.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: でも、身体は動かない。
Translation: But my body won't move.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: クライマックスがやってくる。
Translation: Then the climactic final scene arrives.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: もう限界だった。
Translation: I can't take it.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: やっぱり俺は、こんな柄じゃない。
Translation: I just don't have it in me.
KR: 역시 나는 이런 건 어울리지 않아.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 逃げたい。
Translation: I want to get out of here.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 逃げよう。
Translation: I need to leave.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 逃げなきゃ。
Translation: Now.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: こんなシーン、見たくない。
Translation: I don't want to have to watch this.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 笑われてもいい。
Translation: I don't care if the whole audience laughs at me.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: こんなに胸が張り裂けそうになるなら――
Translation: My chest feels like it's going to explode.
KR: 이렇게 가슴이 터질 것 같을 바에...

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: こんな苦しみにのたうち回らなければならないなら――
Translation: I can't take this agony—

Name: a6211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "—Shinichi!"

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: やっと、気付く。
Translation: Then I realize.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 舞台の上で、完璧な演技をしているはずの美雪。
Translation: Miyuki's supposed to be performing right now.
KR: 무대 위에서 완벽한 연기를 펼쳐야 할 미유키.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 完全無欠のキスシーンを演じかける、女優。
Translation: She's in the middle of her beautifully executed kiss scene.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 視線を合わせ、ふたりの身体が近づく途中――
Translation: But as the two draw close...
KR: 시선을 맞추고 두 사람의 몸이 가까워지는 도중...

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 彼女の口元が、ほんの僅か、苦痛に歪む。
Translation: Her lips twist with the faintest hint of misery.
KR: 미유키의 입꼬리가 아주 살짝 고통으로 일그러진다.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: その演技の綻びは、俺だけにしか気付けない。
Translation: But no one sees the slip in her flawless acting...
KR: 그 완벽한 연기의 틈은 나만 알아볼 수 있다.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: ――俺だけにしか。
Translation: ...No one but me.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 演劇がどうなるかなんて、考えられない。
Translation: I don't care about the play anymore.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: ただ、美雪が愛おしい。
Translation: I just care about Miyuki.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 彼女の苦しみを、救いたい。
Translation: I want to save her from her suffering.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: そのためには――
Translation: And to that end—

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 演劇を、壊すしかない。
Translation: —I have to wreck this performance.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: スローモーションで近づいていく、ふたりの唇。
Translation: The distance between them closes in slow motion.
KR: 슬로우 모션으로 다가가는 두 사람의 입술.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 愛する人の名前を呼ぶべく――
Translation: I need to call her name—

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 劇を壊して彼女を救うべく――
Translation: I need to ruin the performance and save her—

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 観客席の真ん中で、立ち上が――
Translation: I jump to my feet in the middle of the audience—

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 唇が合わさる直前。
Translation: —but just before their lips meet, the stage goes dark.

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 舞台が、暗闇に包まれた。

Name: a6211.nss
Japanese: 突然の停電だった。
Translation: It's a blackout.

Name: a6221.nss
Japanese: 夜の学校の屋上。
Translation: This is my first time being on the roof at night.

Name: a6221.nss
Japanese: 空には、満天の星が輝いている。
Translation: Above me, countless stars sparkle in the sky.

Name: a6221.nss
Japanese: 見下ろす街も、それに負けず劣らず美しく光る。
Translation: Meanwhile, the city below twinkles just as bright.
KR: 내려다본 거리도 그에 못지않게 아름답게 빛난다.

Name: a6221.nss
Japanese: いつまでも見ていられる、夜の光景。
Translation: It's a view I'm sure I could never get tired of.
KR: 언제까지나 보고 있을 수 있을 법한 광경.

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...There you are."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ここ、よくわかったな」
Translation: "How'd you know where to find me?"

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方の思考回路くらい、読めるわよ」
Translation: "Please. I know how you think."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「打ち上げは？」
Translation: "No cast party?"

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今、ちょっと混乱してるから」
Translation: "They're, uh, a little busy right now."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あんな終わり方だったもんな」
Translation: "That was one hell of an ending, that's for sure."

Name: a6221.nss
Japanese: 停電での、突然の幕切れ。
Translation: After the power outage, the performance was cut short.

Name: a6221.nss
Japanese: 本来なら、キスシーンの後も物語は続いたのだろう。
Translation: I imagine there was a bit more to the story after the kiss scene.
KR: 원래대로라면 키스신 이후의 이야기가 진행되었을 것이다.

Name: a6221.nss
Japanese: 大まかなストーリーが完結していたとはいえ、やや物足りない幕切れになってしまったわけだ。
Translation: So while the main plot was resolved, the play itself ended on a somewhat unsatisfactory note.
KR: 대략적인 스토리가 완결되었다고 하나 약간 부족한 연극이 되어 버린 것이다.

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「電源がショートして、ブレーカーが落ちたって」
Translation: "They said some kind of short circuit tripped the breaker."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうか」
Translation: "Interesting."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「学校も、体育館以外は普通に電気ついてたもんな」
Translation: "Especially since the rest of the school seems to be unaffected."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんだよ？」
Translation: "What?"

Name: a6221.nss
Japanese: 無言で美雪に睨み付けられ、俺は思わず後ずさる。
Translation: Miyuki shoots me a sharp glare. Reflexively, I take a step back.
KR: 째려보는 미유키의 시선에 나도 모르게 뒷걸음질쳤다.

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お、俺はなにもやってないぞ！」
Translation: "I... I didn't do anything!"

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「まだ何も訊いてないけど。
　なにか心当たりでもある？」
Translation: "I didn't say you did... You wouldn't happen to know anything about how it happened, would you?"
KR:
"아직 아무 말도 안 했는데?
뭔가 짚이는 거라도 있어?"

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ないってば」
Translation: "Of course not!"

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「停電の直前、我慢しきれず立ち上がったわよね？」
Translation: "You got out of your chair right before it happened, yes?"

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「見てたのか」
Translation: "You saw?"

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「観客席で青くなってたときから、ずっとね」
Translation: "I was watching you from the moment all the blood drained from your face."
KR: "네가 관객석에서 파랗게 질려 있을 때부터 계속."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「演技に集中しろよ」
Translation: "You should pay more attention to your performance!"

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「集中力、切らした覚えはないわよ」
Translation: "Please. I was doing just fine."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「キスの直前以外は、だろ」
Translation: "Until the moment of the kiss, anyway."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「と、とにかく！」
Translation: "A-Anyway!"

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方がやったんじゃないわよね？」
Translation: "You SWEAR you didn't do it?"

Name: a6221.nss
Japanese: 疑いの視線を向ける美雪。
Translation: Miyuki squints at me dubiously.

Name: a6221.nss
Japanese: それはまあ俺だって、あのまま演劇が続いていたら、どうなっていたかわからなかったけど。
Translation: I mean, admittedly, if the power hadn't gone out, it's entirely possible I would have wrecked the show myself, but...
KR: 그야 뭐, 그대로 연극이 계속됐다면 나도 어떻게 됐을지 모르겠지만...

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺は……席を立っただけだし」
Translation: "All I did was stand up."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「合図も、してないのね？」
Translation: "You weren't... giving the signal?"

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「合図？」
Translation: "What signal?"

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「これ、現場に落ちてたんだって」
Translation: "They found this at the scene."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 美雪がポケットから何かを取り出し、手渡す。
Translation: She pulls something out of her pocket and hands it to me.

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ヘアピン……？」
Translation: "A hairpin...?"

Name: a6221.nss
Japanese: それは、俺がアオイに贈ったあのヘアピンだった。
Translation: It's the same kitty hairpin I gave to Aoi.

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「演劇中、猫の着ぐるみを見かけたってコがいるの」
Translation: "There's a witness who claims she saw a girl in a kitty onesie during the performance."
KR: "연극 중에 고양이 옷을 봤다는 애가 있어."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「変な格好だから、関係者だと思ったらしいけど」
Translation: "But she figured it was just part of the show, so she didn't say anything."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……なるほど」

Name: a6221.nss
Japanese: 侵入するのに、わざわざ目立つ格好をする人間はいない。
Translation: No normal person would wear an eye-catching getup like that to sneak in somewhere...
KR: 몰래 침입하는데 일부러 눈에 띄게 하는 사람은 없다.

Name: a6221.nss
Japanese: 普通なら、だけれど。
Translation: Emphasis on normal...

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「捜して捕まえるか？」
Translation: "Are you going to hunt her down?"

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「部長とかは、息巻いてるけど」
Translation: "The club president certainly wants to. He's furious."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今頃、どこにいるんだか」
Translation: "But God only knows where she might be now."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今日、ここに来る前に会ったよ」
Translation: "I actually ran into her before I came here."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "What?"

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「バッティングセンターで、エルと一緒に」
Translation: "She showed up at the batting cages with Eru in tow."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ここに来られたのも、アイツのおかげ」
Translation: "She was the one who encouraged me to come see you."
KR: "여기에 올 수 있었던 것도 그 녀석 덕분이야."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……そう、だったの」
Translation: "I... see."

Name: a6221.nss
Japanese: 美雪の瞳が、微かに憂いの色を帯びる。
Translation: Her gaze is tinged with a tiny hint of sadness.
KR: 미유키의 눈에서 희미하게 걱정하는 눈빛이 보였다.

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「元気だった？」
Translation: "How is she these days?"

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺にはそう見えた」
Translation: "She seemed to be doing pretty okay."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……よかった」
Translation: "...I'm glad."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「最後、ひどい別れ方しちゃったから」
Translation: "We left things on such an awful note."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ」
Translation: "Yeah..."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう、友達じゃいられないけど、でも――」
Translation: "Our friendship may be over, but..."
KR: "더 이상 친구로 지낼 순 없지만, 그래도..."

Name: a6221.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私たちを、応援してくれてるってことかな」
Translation: "I guess it's her way of showing she still supports our relationship."

Name: a6221.nss
Japanese: 美雪はボロボロになった猫のヘアピンを握る。
Translation: Miyuki's fingers curl around the melted hairpin—a gift that was once a symbol of their bond.
KR: 미유키는 엉망진창이 된 고양이 헤어핀을 쥐었다.

Name: a6221.nss
Japanese: それは友情の証として、俺がプレゼントしたものだ。
KR: 내가 선물한 우리 세 사람의 우정의 증표.

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「な、美雪」
Translation: "Hey, Miyuki..."

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あそこ、上ってみないか？」
Translation: "Wanna climb up?"

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...Sure."

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 俺は美雪を先導するように、ハシゴに手をかける。
Translation: I lead Miyuki up the ladder to the top of the roof.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 言葉がなかった。
Translation: There are no words that begin to describe it.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: ここから見渡す昼の光景も、夕の光景も、息を呑むほどに美しかった。
Translation: Morning or evening, the view from up here is completely, breathtakingly beautiful...
KR: 여기서 바라보는 풍경은 낮에도, 저녁에도 숨을 멎을 정도로 아름답다.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: けど、３６０度の夜景には、敵わない。
Translation: But the view at night surpasses them both by far.

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「本当に、世界の中心みたいだな」
Translation: "It really does feel like we're at the center of the universe, huh?"

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今なら、信じられるかも」
Translation: "I could believe it."

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 天地に煌めく光の渦。
Translation: The earth and sky have each transformed into a sea of glimmering lights.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 俺たちは寒さも忘れ、その光景に見とれていた。
Translation: The two of us find ourselves too engrossed to notice the biting cold.
KR: 우리는 추위도 잊고 넋을 잃은 채 바라보았다.

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なあ、美雪？」
Translation: "Say, Miyuki?"

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「屋上の伝説、知ってるか？」
Translation: "Have you heard the school legend about the roof?"

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「え……？　お、屋上の伝説！？」
Translation: "What...? Th-There's a legend?!"

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 美雪の顔が、わかりやすすぎるほどに赤くなる。
Translation: Miyuki's flaming cheeks give her away completely.
KR: 누구라도 알아차릴 정도로 미유키의 볼이 빨개졌다.

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うん、あ、アレね！　もちろん知ってるわよ」
Translation: "Oh, right, that! Of course I've heard about it!"

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私が何回、屋上に呼び出されたと思ってるの？」
Translation: "I get invited up here all the time, you know!"

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そのせいで、おまえも俺に告白を――」
Translation: "Plus, it was the reason you first confessed your feelings to m—"

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それは忘れてってば！」
Translation: "I told you to forget that ever happened!"

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ごめん」
Translation: "Sorry."

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: ――学校の屋上でキスを交わすと、永遠に結ばれる。
Translation: —If two people share a kiss on the roof, they'll spend the rest of their lives together.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: その噂を知らない生徒は、学園にはいないだろう。
Translation: Pretty sure every single person who goes to our school knows about it.
KR: 그 소문을 모르는 학생은 아무도 없겠지.

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「信じない？」
Translation: "Do you think it's true?"

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「噂は信じない」
Translation: "I don't believe in rumors."

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私は、そういうタイプだったけど」
Translation: "That's just not the sort of person I am."

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もしかして、とか、思うようになった、かも……」
Translation: "But... I guess... maybe... I'm willing to try..."

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイのおかげで？」
Translation: "Did Aoi change your mind?"

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 美雪はこくりと頷いた。
Translation: Miyuki nods.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 一度、呼吸を止めて――
Translation: She pauses for a moment—

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 真っ直ぐ、俺の顔を見上げる。
Translation: —then looks directly into my eyes.

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ、心一」
Translation: "Listen, Shinichi..."

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ここを、私の……」
Translation: "Will you help me..."

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「特別な場所にしてくれる？」
Translation: "...make this place the center of my universe?"

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: "頷く"
Translation: "Nod"

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 頷いて、さらに近づく。
Translation: I nod my head and move in close.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 間近から見つめ合う。
Translation: We gaze into each other's eyes.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 美雪が安心して微笑む。
Translation: She smiles, relieved.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: これが、彼女の素顔。
Translation: This is the real Miyuki.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 舞台の下で、演技をやめた美雪。
Translation: The girl behind the stage persona.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 俺だけに、見える顔。
Translation: And I'm the only one she shows herself to.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 両目蓋を閉じる。
Translation: She closes her eyes.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 肩にそっと手を回す。
Translation: I gently put my arms around her.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 小さな息。
Translation: Shallow breathing.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 微かな熱。
Translation: Flushed skin.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 愛おしさに、吸い寄せられるように――
Translation: Magnetized by her charm—

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 俺は美雪と、キスをした。
Translation: —I kiss her.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: ずっと、想い続けてきた彼女と。
Translation: We've loved each other for so long.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: ずっと、ずっと、想いを殺し続けてきた彼女と。
Translation: And we've tried to hide it all this time.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 永遠の、キスをした。
Translation: But now our kiss will bind us together for the rest of our lives.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 喜びに身体が打ち震え、自分の身体の感覚さえ消え、ただ目の前に、美雪だけがいるような。
Translation: My heart pounds with joy as my senses begin to fade... until all that's left is Miyuki.
KR: 기쁨에 몸이 떨리고 모든 감각이 사라진 채 오직 미유키만 있는 것 같았다.

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: 本当に、無重力の宇宙の真ん中にいるような。
Translation: I feel like I'm on cloud nine...

Name: a6222.nss
Japanese: そんな、気がした。
Translation: ...or floating in space.

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私を、ずっと、ずっと――」
Translation: "Promise me..."

Name: a6222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「永遠に離さないでね、心一――」
Translation: "Promise me you'll never let me go, Shinichi."

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: 毎日は、道じゃなく、階段のように過ぎていく。
Translation: Life is not a highway. Life is a staircase.

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: 一度疑問に思ったらその途端、毎日が辛くなる。
Translation: You just gotta keep climbing.
KR: 한 번 의문은 품으면, 그 순간 매일이 힘들어진다.

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: だから、一歩、一歩、なにも考えずに、上る。
Translation: Otherwise, if you start to overthink it, you'll have trouble taking the next step.
KR: 그러니까 한 발, 한 발, 아무 생각하지 않고 오른다.

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: 階段だから、別れ道はなく。
Translation: There are no branching paths.

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: 「あの時ああしておけば」なんて後悔は無意味で。
Translation: No point in regretting the actions you didn't take.

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: 「人生は選択の連続だ」なんていうのは、失敗してから振り返って思う、後悔の絞りかすみたいなものだ。
Translation: They say life is a series of choices, but that's nonsense cooked up by the old and bitter.
KR: '인생은 선택의 연속이다' 라는 말은 실패하고 나서야 생각나는, 후회의 찌꺼기 같은 것이다.

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: 過去の少し先にある、当たり前の明日へ。
Translation: Yesterday leads to today, and today leads to tomorrow.
KR: 과거의 조금 앞에 있는 당연한 내일로.

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: 一歩、一歩、進んでいく。
Translation: One step at a time.

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: その行き着く先に待っているのは――
Translation: What lies ahead?

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「エロス！！」
Translation: "EROTICISM!"

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: そう、エロスがあると部長が言っていた。
Translation: Oh, that's right! Eroticism. Thanks, Captain.

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: ――エロス？
Translation: ...Wait, what?

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: いや、何をバカなことを……
Translation: That's ridiculous—

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんなに、ここが見たい？」
Translation: "You REALLY want to see it, hmm?"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そっか……男の子、だもんね？」
Translation: "I see... I suppose guys can't help it, after all..."

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: はっきりと、自覚する。
Translation: Ah. Now I understand.

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: 俺は、どうも……男の子であるらしい。
Translation: ...Damn right, I'm a guy!

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方だけ、だからね」
Translation: "I'll make a special exception for you, okay?"

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: 美雪の言葉が、俺の理性をかき消す。
Translation: I can feel my rational brain crumbling away...

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: 愛おしさが、溢れ出そうで。
Translation: ...as pure emotion starts to drown it out.

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちょっと、心一！」
Translation: "What the—Shinichi!"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんなに、焦らないで――」
Translation: "Slow down!"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「優しい気持ちが大事なんだ……！」
Translation: "Don't forget to be gentle!"

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: わかったよ部長！
Translation: I know, Captain!

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: 俺は、自分の気持ちに正直になると決めた。
Translation: I promised I wouldn't lie to myself anymore.

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: だから、俺が彼女をリードして――！
Translation: Now it's time to take the lead and—

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「ちょっと、心一！　おかしいわよ！
　早く目、覚まして」
Translation:
"Cut it out, Shinichi! Stop acting crazy!
Wake the hell up already!"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺は正気だ」
Translation: "I'm not crazy."

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪――好きだよ」
Translation: "I love you, Miyuki."

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ……うん、アリガト」
Translation: "Oh... um... thanks..."

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから……美雪のパンツも……」
Translation: "And of course... I love your panties, too..."

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "What?!"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もちろん、その向こう側も好き――」
Translation: "And I love everything under them..."

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ば、バカなの！？　やめなさいって！」
Translation: "Y-You perv! Knock it off!"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「このまま俺、美雪と一緒に――」
Translation: "Miyuki... I want you..."

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「エッチしたい――」
Translation: "Let's have sex...!"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いい加減にしなさいッ！！」
Translation: "GET A GRIP!!!"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「イダダダダダダ……」
Translation: "Ow, ow, ow, ow!"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「げん・じつ？」
Translation: "Is this... real life...?"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ、当たり前でしょッ！！」
Translation: "What do you think, genius?!"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「最低！　朝からスカートに顔を突っ込んだりして！」
Translation: "Now get your head out from under my skirt! You jerk!"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「夢……夢だったのか」
Translation: "Oh... Was I dreaming...?"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「リアルに私のパンツが好きって言った」
Translation: "You said you love my panties!"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「スミマセンデシタ」
Translation: "I'm sorry..."

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: 俺は自分の無意識に戦慄する。
Translation: I curse my subconscious.
KR: 내 무의식에 감탄하지 않을 수 없다.

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: まさか、素面では言えない台詞を、勢いで本人に言ってしまうとは……
Translation: Of all the things I'd want to say to her face, that one is NOT on the short list!
KR: 설마 그런 대사를 당당히 본인에게 말해버리다니...

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: 恥ずかしいを通り越して、尊敬の念さえ抱く。
Translation: It's so embarrassing, it's actually kind of impressive!

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: 道理でなんかリアルな感触だった。
Translation: No wonder it felt so lifelike...

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: どうせなら目を覚ましてれば……
Translation: Well, now that I'm awake—

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「ちょ、ちょっと！
　なんでそんな、お、おっきくさせてるのよ！？」
Translation:
"Wh-What the?!
Why's your... your South Pole standing at attention?!"
KR:
"자, 잠깐!
뭘 그렇게 크, 크게 하고 있는 거야!?"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh? OH."

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: 気付けば俺の股間は男の浪漫街道まっしぐらだった。
Translation: It would appear that my nether regions are... full of male ambition...
KR: 정신차려보니 내 고간은 남자의 낭만가도를 달리고 있었다.

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: なんだ男の浪漫街道って。
Translation: Oh god, now I sound like Yuutarou!

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: 本当になんだ。

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: これもみんな雄太郎が悪いそうに違いない。
Translation: This is all HIS fault... Yeah, let's go with that...
KR: 이것도 전부 유우타로 잘못인 게 틀림없다.

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私を妄想してそんなに！？」
Translation: "Is that what thinking about me does to you?!"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「い、いや違うんだ。
　コレは男性特有の生理現象で」
Translation:
"N-No, you don't understand!
Morning wood is just a normal part of being a guy, that's all!"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おまえの何かを想像してこうなったわけじゃ――！」
Translation: "I didn't get this hard fantasizing about you!"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ち、違うの？」
Translation: "Y-You didn't?"

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: 美雪は概ね恥じらいながらも、どことなく物足りなそうな表情で訊いてくるわけで。
Translation: She looks flustered, but she sounds a bit disappointed...
KR: 미유키는 조금 부끄러워하면서도, 어딘가 서운한듯한 표정으로 물었다.

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「ええと……その……
　全然、関係ないわけでも……」
Translation:
"Well, I mean... uh...
The two aren't ENTIRELY unrelated..."

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「わ、私だってね。
　嬉しくないわけじゃないわよ。それは、認めます」
Translation:
"I... I don't want you to think I'm not flattered, of course!
Because I certainly am! I'll admit it!"
KR:
"나, 나도 말이지.
기쁘지 않은 건 아니야. 그건 인정할게."

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「でも、ムードってものがあるでしょう？
　こっちにだって、心の準備があるし」
Translation:
"But there's a time and a place for these things!
I still need time to prepare myself emotionally..."
KR:
"그래도 분위기라는 게 있잖아?
이쪽도 마음의 준비가 필요하고."

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「オッシャルトオリデス」
Translation: "You're absolutely right."

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「罰として、朝ごはん抜き」
Translation: "As punishment, no breakfast for you today."

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「すいませんでした！　許してください！」
Translation: "I'm really, really sorry! Please forgive me, mistress!"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふーん、そんなに食べたいの？」
Translation: "Oho? You REALLY want to eat my cooking, hmm?"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「この通り！」
Translation: "I'll do anything!"

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: 美雪の朝食で一日が始まるなんて贅沢は、滅多にない。
Translation: It's not every day I get the chance to start my day off with some of Miyuki's delicious home cooking...
KR: 미유키 요리로 아침을 시작하다니, 사치도 이런 사치가 없다.

Name: a7111.nss
Japanese: 俺は反射的に頭を下げていたのだが……
Translation: I'll even prostrate myself if I have to!

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「まあ、そこまで言うんだったら考えなくもないけど」
Translation: "Well, if you want it that badly, I suppose I could reconsider."
KR: "뭐, 그렇게까지 말한다면 다시 생각할 수도 있는데."

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「本当に！？」
Translation: "You mean it?!"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ただし、条件があるわよ」
Translation: "Under one condition."

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「条件？」
Translation: "What's that?"

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「えっと……ね」
Translation: "Well, you see..."

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「な、なんだよ？」

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "......Kiss me."

Name: a7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私に、おはようのキス、して！」
Translation: "I want a good morning kiss!"

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: トイレから出て、一息。
Translation: I step out of the bathroom.

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: 朝から血圧が上がるイベントだった。
Translation: Methinks that was a bit too much excitement for one morning.

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: まさか、美雪に突然キスを求められるなんて。
Translation: I certainly wasn't expecting Miyuki to demand a kiss first thing after I woke up...

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: キス――キス――キスか――
Translation: Man, that kiss...

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: 思い返しただけで、赤面してしまう。
Translation: The memory is enough to make me blush all over again.

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: 美雪も相変わらず、顔が真っ赤だし。
Translation: Her face was bright red the whole time, of course.

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: そんなところが、余計に可愛くて。
Translation: She was so goddamn cute...

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: ずっと、このままでいたい、とか。
Translation: Then I caught myself wishing the moment would last forever...

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: そんなこと思ってしまったりなんかして――
Translation: And other embarrassing shit like that...

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一！」
Translation: "Shinichi!"

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ……うん。今行く！」
Translation: "Oh, right. Coming!"

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: いつの間にか、廊下の途中で立ち止まっていた。
Translation: I find myself standing in the middle of the hall for no reason.
KR: 어느 순간 복도에 멈춰 서 있었다.

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: あんまりボーッとしていると、せっかく作ってもらった美雪の朝ごはんが食べられなくなってしまう。
Translation: If I keep zoning out like this, Miyuki will have slaved over that hot stove for nothing!
KR: 너무 멍하니 있으면 모처럼 미유키가 만들어 준 아침밥을 못 먹게 될 거야!

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: それにしても、朝から美雪の飯が食べられるなんて、俺はなんて幸せ――
Translation: Man, I'm so lucky I get to eat her cooking first thing in the morning—
KR: 그나저나 아침부터 미유키의 요리를 먹을 수 있다니 난 정말 행복한...

Name: a7121.nss
Translation: ...Wait.

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: ちょっと待て。
Translation: Hold on a second...

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: なんでいきなり、朝から美雪が家にいるんだ？
Translation: What is she even doing here this early in the first place?
KR: 왜 아침부터 미유키가 우리 집에 있는 거지?

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一、朝はいつも適当に済ませちゃうでしょ？」
Translation: "Shinichi, you don't have a proper morning routine, do you?"

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今は若いからいいけど、後で絶対ガタが来るんだから」
Translation: "If you don't form good habits while you're young, it's gonna come back to bite you when you're older, you know."
KR: "지금은 젊어서 괜찮지만, 나중에 꼭 몸에 이상이 온다고."

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そこまで未来のこと、心配しなくても」
Translation: "No sense in worrying about it now, though."

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「当然心配するわよ！　だって――」
Translation: "Why shouldn't I worry?! I mean—"

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「屋上で、キス、したでしょ？」
Translation: "We kissed on the roof, didn't we?"

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ、うん」
Translation: "Uh... yeah...?"

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから」

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...So what?"

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: ――学校の屋上でキスを交わすと、永遠に結ばれる。
Translation: —If two people share a kiss on the roof, they'll spend the rest of their lives together.

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前、噂信じてるのか？」
Translation: "You seriously believe that dumb rumor?"

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「え？　なんで？」
Translation: "What, don't you?"

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: 反応から察するに、本気であの噂を信じてるっぽい。
Translation: Oh my god, she actually believes it?
KR: 반응으로 보건대 진심으로 그 소문을 믿는 것 같다.

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: ……ま、それはそれで美雪らしいか。
Translation: ...I guess I can't be too surprised, knowing how she is.

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ほら、冷めないうちに食べて」
Translation: "Now eat up before your breakfast gets cold."

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「朝練するって家に嘘ついて来たんだから。
　残さず食べてよね」
Translation: "I lied to my parents and said I had morning rehearsal, so you better clean your plate, got it?"
KR:
"아침 연습한다고 집에 거짓말하고 왔으니까,
남기지 말고 먹어. 알겠지?"

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ありがとう」
Translation: "Thanks."

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: 食卓に並ぶのは、焼き魚に味噌汁に梅干しにほうれん草のごま和えという、純和風のいわゆる「ザ・朝食」。
Translation: The table is lined with grilled fish, miso soup, pickled plums, and sesame spinach salad—a pure, unadulterated Japanese breakfast.
KR: 식탁에 차려진 것은 생선구이에 된장국에 메실 장아찌에 시금치 무침이라는 이른바 'THE 아침 식사'다.

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: 見た目には全く派手な所がないのだが、一口運ぶと――
Translation: It seems plain and functional at first glance, but—

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ヤバイ」
Translation: "Holy shit."

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「え、ヤバイって？」
Translation: "What?"

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美味い。相変わらず、美味すぎる」
Translation: "This is delicious! I don't know how you do it, but you knock it out of the park every single time!"

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「朝からこんなの、もったいないくらい」
Translation: "This feels more like a feast than a regular old breakfast!"
KR: "아침부터 이런 걸 먹을 수 있다니, 아까울 정도야!"

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんな、もったいなくはないでしょ」
Translation: "Oh, please. It's nothing so special as that."

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「間に合わせの材料しか持ってきてないんだし……」
Translation: "I was only able to bring a handful of ingredients, after all..."

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: と、顔を赤らめつつも否定する美雪が可愛らしくて。
Translation: Miyuki's so cute when she tries to be humble... Especially when she's blushing...

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: 俺はつい、彼女をからかってしまう。
Translation: I can't help but want to tease her more.

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ということは、隠し味の調味料が利いてるのか？」
Translation: "What's this? Do I detect a hint of your famous secret ingredient?"

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんなの、入れた記憶はないけど」
Translation: "What? I don't have a secret ingredient."

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いいや、あるよ」
Translation: "Sure you do."

Name: a7121.nss
Japanese: 俺は、一世一代の名演技で言う。
Translation: I put on my award-winning smile.

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪が入れた隠し味――それは愛情」
Translation: "It's seasoned with your love."

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "You... you—!"

Name: a7121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「バカっ！　調子に乗らないのッ！！」
Translation: "You CLOD! Don't get so full of yourself!!!"

Name: a7131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「おはよう！」
Translation: "Good morning!"

Name: a7131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「おはよ――ほら！　もっと近づいて！」
Translation: "Good morn—Hey! Get over here!"

Name: a7131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「い、いきなりこんなことしなくても」
Translation: "W-We don't have to do this, you know..."

Name: a7131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「彼氏でしょ？」
Translation: "But you're my boyfriend!"

Name: a7131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「一緒に登校するくらい、当たり前じゃない」
Translation: "Why wouldn't we walk to school together?"

Name: a7131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 柔らかな手に、手を引かれ。
Translation: She pulls me along by the hand.
KR: 미유키는 부드러운 손으로 나를 끌고 갔다.

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: 俺はそれ以上、抵抗できない。
Translation: I can't argue the point any further.
KR: 나는 더 이상 저항할 수 없었다.

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: 学校へと向かう人々の流れの中で、俺たちの周りには明らかに不自然な空間ができていた。
Translation: As we head through the crowds of people on our way to school, I can feel weird vibes from everyone we encounter.
KR: 학교로 향하는 사람들, 그 사이를 지나가는 우리 주위로 작은 원이 생겼다.

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: 俺と美雪の想いは通じた。

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: でももちろん、客観的には不釣り合いなのはわかってる。
Translation: Miyuki may be in love with me, but it doesn't change the fact that she's objectively out of my league.
KR: 물론 남들이 보기에 어울리지 않는다는 건 알고 있다.

Name: a7131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おまえ、よく平然と歩けるな」
Translation: "You're surprisingly calm, I see."

Name: a7131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「演技してるだけ。心臓は、バクバクなんだから」
Translation: "It's just an act. On the inside, my heart's pounding like crazy."

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: さすが演劇部。
Translation: Stated like a true thespian.

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: 人の前では、ちゃんと動揺を隠せるんだ。
Translation: Only an actress of her caliber would be able to mask her agitation this well.

Name: a7131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でも俺、演技なんてできないし」
Translation: "I'm not a good actor, though."

Name: a7131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「泣き言言わない」
Translation: "Oh, suck it up already."

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: なんて言いながらも、俺たちはふたり並んで登校。
Translation: Side by side, we approach the gates.

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: 校門までやってくると、開き直ってしまったというか。
Translation: At this point, I'm already over it.

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: もうどうにでもしてくれ、という感じであり。
Translation: The haters can stay mad for all I care.

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: 今さら恥ずかしいとかいう感覚も麻痺――
Translation: Nothing can possibly faze me now—

Name: a7131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「やっぱりやめよう」
Translation: "I can't. I can't do it!"

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: 麻痺できたら、楽なんだろうけど。
Translation: —okay, maybe I lied.

Name: a7131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「一番アピールしなきゃならないのはココでしょ？」
Translation: "But we need to do this to win everyone over, remember?"

Name: a7131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「わ、わかるんだけど、心の準備が――」
Translation: "I... I know, but I'm not emotionally prepared—!"

Name: a7131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ウダウダ言わない。ほら、行くわよ！」
Translation: "Don't be such a baby. Now come on!"

Name: a7131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Whoa!"

Name: a7131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ととっ、とっ、と」
Translation: "Not so fast...!"

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: よろけながらも教室に入る。
Translation: I stumble into the classroom.

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: それに並ぶように、美雪が中へ。
Translation: Then she steps in after me.

Name: a7131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「おはよう」
Translation: "Good morning!"

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: いつもと全く変わらない、軽やかな挨拶。
Translation: She greets the room casually, just the same as always.

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: 教室中から、次々に返答がある。
Translation: One by one, our classmates greet her in kind.

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: 皆の声に少々の戸惑いはあるが、美雪はすぐに教室の輪の中心になってしまう。
Translation: I can hear confusion in their voices... but nevertheless, they crowd around their queen, as usual.
KR: 다들 약간 당황한 눈치였지만, 미유키는 곧 교실의 중심이 되어 버렸다.

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: ふたりが一緒に登校してきたという話は、既にクラス中に伝播していたらしく、俺にも好奇の視線は向けられた。
Translation: Evidently the whole class has already heard the news that we'd walked to school together; I can feel some curious stares pointed in my direction.
KR: 우리 둘이 등교했다는 소문이 벌써 반에 퍼졌는지, 나에게도 호기심 어린 눈빛이 쏠렸다.

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: いつも挨拶をしてこないような男子まで、ニヤケ顔で俺に笑いかけてくる。
Translation: And I can see my male classmates grinning at me—some of whom ordinarily never would have noticed I exist.
KR: 평소엔 인사하지 않던 남자애들도 나를 보고 미소 지었다.

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: 中には馴れ馴れしく肩を叩くようなヤツも――
Translation: A few of them came up to clap me on the back—

Name: a7131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いでッ！　いでで！　おい、やめろって！」
Translation: "Ow! That hurts! Cut it out, guys!"

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: 調子に乗って男子たちが、やっかみ交じりに俺の身体をハタキ始める。
Translation: I notice some of them have taken this opportunity to vent their jealousy...
KR: 신이 난 녀석들이 부러움이 담긴 구타를 시작했다.

Name: a7131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ、ははは……お、おい！　勘弁してくれよ」
Translation: "Aack! Hahaha... C-Come on, you guys, give me a break!"

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: もちろんそれは冗談交じりの祝福で、このくらいの覚悟はしていた。
Translation: But I know they're mostly joking. Besides, I figured they'd haze me somehow.
KR: 물론 그건 다 장난이었고 이 정도 각오는 하고 있었다.

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: 温かく迎え入れられて拍子抜けした所もある。
Translation: Though, admittedly, I'm a teensy bit disappointed with how easily they came around.
KR: 오히려 따뜻하게 받아줘서 김이 샌 느낌도 있다.

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: こんな風に毎日が過ぎていってくれると――
Translation: If only every day could be like this—

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: いきなり出鼻が、挫かれた。
Translation: Just then, I get a nasty wake-up call.
KR: 그러던 도중, 내 책상에 무언가 놓여 있었다.

Name: a7131.nss
Japanese: 俺の机に１枚、紙切れが置かれている。
Translation: A single scrap of paper waits for me on my desk.

Name: a7132.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「これは退部、届け……」
Translation: "Is this a club resignation form...?"

Name: a7132.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「じゃ――ない？」
Translation: "...Apparently not..."

Name: a7132.nss
Japanese: ――破門状。
Translation: The words "Club Resignation Form" are scribbled out.

Name: a7132.nss
Japanese: 「退部届」の文字が二重線で消されその上に毛筆で「破門状」の文字が書いてあった。
Translation: Instead, the words "LETTER OF DISOWNMENT" have been printed above it in a flowery calligraphic script.
KR: '퇴부 안내서'라는 글자는 찍찍 그어놓고 그 옆에 붓으로 '파문장'이라고 써놨다.

Name: a7132.nss
Japanese: 無駄に達筆だった。
Translation: Sure enough, the letter is signed "Akebono Yuutarou".

Name: a7132.nss
Japanese: 部長の署名に書かれた名前は、「曙雄太郎」。
Translation: Why did he bother making it so fancy...?
KR: 부장 서명란에 적힌 이름은 아케보노 유우타로.

Name: a7132.nss
Japanese: 文面は、ただの一行。
Translation: Then I see the contents of the letter.

Name: a7132.nss
Japanese: ――爆発しろ！！
Translation: —DIE!!!

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「雄太郎……」
Translation: "Yuutarou..."

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: 俺は破門状を手に、そっと席へと近づく。
Translation: Letter in hand, I quietly approach his desk.
KR: 나는 파문장을 들고 슬쩍 유우타로 쪽으로 다가갔다.

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎はジッと机を見つめたまま、細かく震えている。
Translation: I find him staring down in silence, his hands trembling faintly.
KR: 유우타로는 부들부들 떨며 계속 책상을 바라보고 있었다.

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、昨日まで、美雪とこうなるとは思わなくて」
Translation: "I swear, I didn't know things between me and Miyuki were going to turn out like this."
KR: "나, 어제까진 미유키랑 이렇게 될 줄 몰랐는데."

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「騙すつもりはなかったのに。
　結局、裏切ることになった」
Translation: "I wasn't trying to hide it from you... but that doesn't change the fact that I hurt you."

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ゴメン！」
Translation: "I'm sorry, Yuutarou."

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「もう、こんなことはしない。
　反省してる。だから――」
Translation:
"I feel really bad about this...
And I promise I won't do it again, so..."
KR:
"더 이상 이러지 않을게.
반성도 하고 있어. 그러니..."

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 破門状を、そっと雄太郎の机に差し出す。
Translation: I gently set the letter back on his desk.

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今まで通り、朝から一緒に馬鹿話できないか？」
Translation: "Can't we keep goofing around every morning, like always?"
KR: "항상 그랬던 것처럼 바보 같은 얘기하지 않을래?"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それに、ほら。俺がいなくなったら、定員割れで、男の浪漫倶楽部も困るわけだし」
Translation: "Besides... With me gone, the Boys and Dreams Club won't have enough members to avoid being shut down."
KR: "게다가 내가 나가면 남자의 낭만 클럽도 인원이 부족하고..."

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だったら――」
Translation: "So it makes sense to—"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ふふふふ、はははははは……」
Translation: "Heheheheh... Hahahahahaha..."

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ふは――っはっはっはっはっはっはっはっ！」
Translation: "Pfffhaaahahahahahahaha!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「心一部員――いや、心一元部員よ！
　おまえは大きな勘違いをしているぞっ！」
Translation:
"Private Shinichi—no, Former Private Shinichi!
You appear to be operating under a grave misunderstanding!"
KR:
"신이치 부원... 아니, 신이치 전 부원!
너는 큰 착각을 하고 있어!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「勘違い？」
Translation: "I am?"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「何故我ら男の浪漫倶楽部がこれほどまでに慢性的な人員不足に見舞われているか、おまえは知っているか！？」
Translation: "Do you know why it is that the great B&D Club chronically suffers from such a dire shortage of members?!"
KR: "어째서 우리 남자의 낭만 클럽이 이토록 만성적인 인력난을 겪고 있는지 알고 있느냐!?"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「部長が暑苦しいから？」
Translation: "Because you're obnoxious?"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「違う違います！　時々言われるけど違うぞっ！」
Translation: "No! I'm afraid not! I mean, I am, but that's not the reason!"

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: 時々は言われるのか。
Translation: So he admits he's obnoxious...

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「男の浪漫倶楽部が慢性的な部員不足に見舞われる理由」
Translation: "So, then, why does the Boys and Dreams Club chronically suffer from a shortage of members, you ask?"
KR: "남자의 낭만 클럽이 만성적인 인원 부족을 겪는 그 이유."

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「それは、浪漫倶楽部の鉄の掟！」
Translation: "The answer lies in the oath sworn by the B&D Boys!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「浪漫倶楽部部員は、すべからく、男の浪漫を追い求め続けるべし！」
Translation: "As a member of the B&D Club, you must always remain in pursuit of your dreams!"
KR: "낭만 클럽의 부원은 모름지기 남자의 낭만을 추구해야 한다!"

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: ああ、なんか聞いたことがあるような。
Translation: Oh, right... This sounds familiar...

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「追い求めるからこそ、手に入らないからこそ、浪漫ッ！」
Translation: "Yes, we call them dreams only because they remain out of our reach!"
KR: "추구하면서도 손에 넣을 수 없는 그것이 낭만!!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「お前はもう、手に入れちまったんだよ」
Translation: "But you have already achieved yours..."
KR: "너는 그걸 이미 손에 넣어 버린 거다!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「曽根美雪って名前の、でっかい浪漫をな……」
Translation: "The lofty dream known as Sone Miyuki..."
KR: "소네 미유키라는 이름을 한 크나큰 낭만을 말이지..."

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「雄太郎……」
Translation: "Yuutarou..."

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「男の浪漫倶楽部部長！
　曙雄太郎の名において命ずる！」
Translation: "As captain of the Boys and Dreams Club, I, Akebono Yuutarou, hereby command—"
KR:
"남자의 낭만 클럽 부장,
아케보노 유우타로의 이름으로 명한다!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「今日、この日を以て――」
Translation: "As of this day—"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「須々木心一は、男の浪漫倶楽部を卒業するッ！！」
Translation: "Susuki Shinichi has officially graduated from the B&D Club!!!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「おめでとう、心一ッ！！」
Translation: "Congratulations, Shinichi!!!"

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: 曙雄太郎は、卒業証書のように、「破門状」を突き出す。
Translation: Yuutarou pushes the letter of disownment into my hands like it's a diploma...

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: 彼は、泣いていた。
Translation: ...all the while crying manly tears.

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: 男泣きに、泣いていた。

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: 意味がわからない。
Translation: I don't understand.

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: 意味がわからないのに――なぜだ？
Translation: For some reason...

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: なんだか俺の心の奥底から、こみ上げてくるものが……
Translation: Some kind of strange emotion is... welling up in my chest...?
KR: 왠지 마음 깊은 곳에서 복받쳐 오르는 게...

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: 確かに、ある？
Translation: Is this really happening?

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: 俺は今まで、浪漫を散々バカにしてきた。
Translation: All this time, I've just been rolling my eyes at the concept of the B&D Club.
KR: 나는 지금까지 낭만이라는 것을 무턱대고 무시해왔다.

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: 自分はただの人数合わせだと思ってきた。
Translation: I thought I was just a stand-in member.
KR: 자기 자신을 그냥 머릿수나 채우는 부원이라고 생각했다.

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: でも――
Translation: And yet...

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「雄太郎」
Translation: "Yuutarou..."

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 俺は神妙な顔で、破門状を奪い取ると……
Translation: I take the letter, my expression firm.

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「これは、もらえない」
Translation: "I can't accept this."

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「なっ、ちょ、なななな――ッ！？」
Translation: "Wha?! Wait—Whawhawhawha?!?!"

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: 俺は雄太郎の破門状を破り、丸めて、突き返す。
Translation: I shred the letter, crumple the pieces into a ball, and push it back into his hands.
KR: 나는 파문장을 찢어 뭉친 다음 돌려주었다.

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「おまえッ！？　なんでこんなことを――」
Translation: "Dude! The hell are you doing, man—?!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今日の朝、俺の夢の中におまえが出てきた」
Translation: "You appeared to me in a dream this morning."

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺に、新たな浪漫の探し方を、教えてくれたんだ」
Translation: "And you showed me a new way to search for my dreams."

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「なんだと！？」
Translation: "What?!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「確かに、俺は浪漫を掴んだのかもしれない」
Translation: "While I admit I might have attained one dream..."

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「手に掴んだその瞬間、浪漫は形のある幸せになって、俺の中に根付いていくのかもしれない」
Translation: "The very moment I did, it transformed into pure joy and took root deep in my heart."
KR: "붙잡은 그 순간, 낭만은 형태를 갖춘 행복이 되어 내 안에 뿌리내린 걸지도 몰라."

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「けど――だったらまた、新しい男の浪漫を探せばいいだけじゃないのか？」
Translation: "Now all that's left is to find a new dream... don't you think?"
KR: "하지만 그럼 또 새로운 낭만을 찾으면 되는 게 아닐까?"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「新しい、男の浪漫……？」
Translation: "A new dream, you say...?"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「本気でわからない！　曽根さんという浪漫を手に入れたおまえが、これ以上何を望もうと言うんだ！？」
Translation: "You're not making any sense, my guy! Now that you have Sone-san, what more could you possibly wish for?!"
KR: "정말 모르겠어! 소네 씨라는 낭만을 손에 넣은 네가 이 이상 무엇을 바란다는 거야?!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そ……それは……」
Translation: "W-Well..."

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: うーん、なんだろう？
Translation: Good point.

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: 俺が、次に探す浪漫……？
Translation: What's my next big dream?

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: 浪漫……浪漫……一度は失ってしまった浪漫……
Translation: Think, think... Are there any dreams I gave up on in the past...?

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: ん？
Translation: Wait...

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: そういえば雄太郎も、例の女装した弟くんの件で、一度浪漫を失ってしまったんだったか……？
Translation: Come to think of it, didn't Yuutarou once proclaim his dreams dead after that whole situation with his crossplaying brother...?
KR: 그러고 보니 유우타로도 남동생이 여장했던 일로 낭만을 잃어버렸었지...?

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「えっと……コスプレ、とかはどうだ？」
Translation: "How about... cosplay, or something?"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ここここここコスプレええええええ！？」
Translation: "C-C-C-C-C-C-COSPLAAAAAAY?!?!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「ナース！　バニー！　婦警！　巫女！
　そそそそそそ、そしてメイド！」
Translation:
"Nurse! Bunny! Policewoman! Shrine maiden!
And f-f-f-finally, m-m-m-maid!!!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「学園のアイドル曽根美雪！　クールビューティーな曽根美雪！　ツンデレ挙動をしてくれる曽根美雪！」
Translation: "Sone Miyuki, the queen bee of the school! Sone Miyuki, the picture of sophistication and grace! Sone Miyuki, the closet tsundere!"
KR: "학교의 아이돌 소네 미유키! 쿨뷰티 소네 미유키! 츤데레의 모범 소네 미유키!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「そんな彼女が、もし万が一、メイド服を着たら！
　『お帰りなさいませ、ご主人様』とか言ったら！」
Translation: "If, by any chance, she could wear a maid outfit... and say things like 'Welcome home, master'...!"
KR:
"그런 소네 씨가 만에 하나라도 메이드복을 입는다면!
'어서 오세요, 주인님' 같은 말을 한다면!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「た……確かにそれは、ちょっとわかるような……！」
Translation: "Oh, yeah, definitely... I think I can see the appeal..."

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「それが<RUBY text=ろまんちから>浪漫力</RUBY>だっ！」
Translation: "THAT'S THE POWER OF DREAMS!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ろまんちから？」
Translation: "The what now?"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「そう、男の浪漫は消えない！　何度でも蘇る！」
Translation: "Dreams never truly die! They will rise again as many times as it takes!"
KR: "그래, 남자의 낭만은 사라지지 않아! 몇 번이라도 되살아나!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「俺たちが、望むことを止めない限り――！」
Translation: "As many times as we wish them to!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「う、うおおおおおおおお――――ッ！！」
Translation: "Nn... NNNNRRRRRRRGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHH!!!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「はむ！　はむ、はむはむ！！」
Translation: "Nom! Om nom nom nom!!!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、どうした！？」
Translation: "Whoa! What are you doing?!"

Name: a7133.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎は突き返された破門状を、突然食いだした。
Translation: Yuutarou suddenly stuffs the crumpled paper ball into his mouth.

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「はむ……んぐ……お、おれは……
　ん……んごくっ！　前言を、撤回するッ！！」
Translation:
"Nom... ggllpp... I... I...
Nn... nngghh! I take back what I said!!!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Yuutarou?!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「男の浪漫倶楽部部長の自分が、恥ずかしいッ！」
Translation: "As the captain of the Boys and Dreams Club, I am truly ashamed of myself!!!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「心一よ、おまえは今でも立派な、男の浪漫倶楽部部員だッ！」
Translation: "Shinichi, you remain a truly exceptional soldier in the B&D Army!"
KR: "신이치여, 너는 지금도 어엿한 남자의 낭만 클럽 부원이다!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Yuutarou...!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「心一ッ！」
Translation: "Shinichi!"

Name: a7133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方たちバカなの……？」
Translation: "How stupid are you two?"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ほら、早く！」
Translation: "Come on, hurry up!"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そんなに急ぐ必要ないだろ？」
Translation: "What's the rush?"

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: 美雪を追いかけ、太陽の光が目映く降り注ぐ屋上へ。
Translation: I follow Miyuki up to the roof, where the sunlight sparkles over the concrete.
KR: 미유키를 쫓아 햇빛이 눈부시게 쏟아지는 옥상으로 올라갔다.

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「なんでココなんだ？
　せっかく、クラスにも慣れてきたのに」
Translation:
"Why bother coming up here?
We don't have to hide it from anyone, you know."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もう隠れることない――」
Translation: "Everyone in class has come around—"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから、なに拗ねてるんだ？」
Translation: "Seriously, what's got you so pissy?"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「別に、拗ねてないし」
Translation: "I'm NOT pissy."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「顔を見ればわかる」
Translation: "Yes, you are. It's extremely obvious."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それじゃ、わざわざここに来た理由もわかってよ！」
Translation: "If it's so 'obvious,' then hurry up and figure out why I brought you up here!"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「理由って……」

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: 頭を掻いて、辺りを見回す。
Translation: Scratching my head, I look around.

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今日は天気もいいから？」
Translation: "Because the weather's nice today?"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「違う」
Translation: "No."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ここは見晴らしがいいから」
Translation: "Because the view from up here is so pretty?"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「違う！」
Translation: "No!"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「えっと、それじゃあ――」
Translation: "Okay then, uhh..."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「また、俺とキスをしたくなっちゃったとか」
Translation: "Because you want to kiss me?"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そ、それが理由なわけ、ないでしょ！」
Translation: "Wh-What kind of stupid guess is that?!"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もうちょっと真面目に考えてよねっ！」
Translation: "Quit messing around and THINK!"

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: ちょっとからかいすぎたか……
Translation: I guess I went a little too far with that last one...

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: でも、うーん……なんだろう？
Translation: Hmmm... What other reason could there be?

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ヒントは？」
Translation: "Can I get a hint?"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……しょうがないわね」
Translation: "...Fine, I guess I'll throw you a bone."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ここは、特別な場所だけど、でも、今日はここじゃなくてもいいっていうか……」
Translation: "This place is obviously special to me, but... technically anywhere would be special today..."
KR: "여기는 특별한 장소지만, 오늘은 여기가 아니어도 괜찮다고 할까."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「場所は、関係ない？」
Translation: "So the location doesn't matter?"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「問題なのは、私たちっていうか……」
Translation: "The important part is that we're together, I guess..."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「むしろ私たちじゃないっていうか……
　だからその……」
Translation:
"Or rather, the problem is with everyone else...
You know what I mean..."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ふたりきりに、なりたかった？」
Translation: "Oh, so you just wanted to be alone together?"

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: ポツリ、とつぶやいた。
Translation: She mumbles, pouting slightly.

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「せっかく、恋人同士だし……」
Translation: "I mean, we're together now, after all..."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふたりきりでお弁当、食べたいなって……」
Translation: "Obviously I want you all to myself during lunch..."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「――なんなのよもうっ！」
Translation: "...Ugh! God!"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一って、肝心なところで鈍いんだから！」
Translation: "You're so dense when it comes to the stuff that matters!"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ごめんなさい」
Translation: "I'm sorry..."

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: もう謝るしかない。
Translation: All I can do is apologize.

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: シートをひいて、屋根の上に座る。
Translation: Together, we lay out a blanket and sit up on top of the roof.

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: 美雪お手製の弁当は相変わらず豪勢で、メインはウナギの蒲焼きとかだったりする。
Translation: As usual, her lunch is homemade and ridiculously massive— a sumptuous feast. Today, the main course is eel kabayaki.
KR: 미유키가 손수 만든 도시락은 여전히 호화스러웠는데, 주메뉴는 장어구이였다.

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: 素晴らしい味なのは言うまでもないし、説明しようとしたってできるものでもない。
Translation: Naturally, it's perfectly seasoned, and the taste is so exquisite I couldn't even begin to describe it.
KR: 기가 막힌 맛이라는 건 두말할 필요도 없고, 설명한다고 되는 게 아니다.

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: のだが、隣には俺の様子を見つめる美雪がおり、その顔は「美味しい？」と俺に問いかけを投げている。
Translation: Meanwhile, Miyuki sits next to me, watching me eat with a look on her face that says she's dying to know what I think of it.
KR: 하지만 옆에서 내 모습을 바라보는 미유키가 '맛있어?'라고 얼굴로 말하고 있었다.

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: ボキャブラリーが貧困で、一生懸命考えた挙げ句――
Translation: So I dig through my limited vocabulary—

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「メチャクチャ美味い！」
Translation: "This is, like, crazy good!"

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: なんてバカみたいな誉め言葉しか思いつかないが、美雪もきちんと俺の想いを汲み取ってくれて――
Translation: Despite my complete and utter failure to sound remotely eloquent, Miyuki doesn't complain.
KR: 그런 뻔한 칭찬밖에 할 수 없었지만, 미유키는 내 마음을 제대로 이해해줬다.

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……ありがとう」
Translation: "...Thank you."

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: 顔を真っ赤にして、答える。
Translation: Her cheeks flush pink.

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: 噛み合わないようで、噛み合っているような。
Translation: Looks like we're on the same wavelength after all.
KR: 서로 맞지 않는 듯 잘 맞는 듯.

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: 言葉が足りているような、足りないような。
Translation: Sometimes it feels like I can't find the right words... but in the end, it turns out I didn't need to try.
KR: 말이 부족한 듯 부족하지 않은 듯.

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: そんなやりとり。

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「こういうときの美雪って、いいよな」
Translation: "I like it when you're like this."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「なんか、飾ってないっていうか。
　素に戻ってるっていうか」
Translation:
"You know, when you don't have to put on airs.
It's like you're back to your normal self."
KR:
"뭔가 꾸미지 않았다고 할까,
본모습으로 돌아갔다고나 할까."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そう、かな」
Translation: "Oh... I guess so."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……なんで暗くなるんだよ？」
Translation: "...Why the long face?"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ほら、バッティングセンターでさ、私に『演じ過ぎ』って言ってくれたでしょ？」
Translation: "Well... You know how, back at the batting cages, you told me I put too much effort into my act?"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「やっぱり、自分でもそう思うの」
Translation: "I actually kind of agree with you."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう少し、みんなの前でも私らしく、自然に振る舞えたら、って思うんだけど」
Translation: "If possible, I'd like to have the freedom to be myself around the others, even just a little bit."
KR: "좀 더 모두 앞에서도 나답게 자연스럽게 행동했으면 좋겠는데."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんな自分をさらけ出すの、怖くて」
Translation: "But I'm scared of opening myself up like that."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪にも、そういう悩みあったんだな」
Translation: "Wow... I had no idea you even cared about that kinda stuff."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「わ、私をなんだと思ってるのよ？」
Translation: "I... I'm human too, you know!"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、クラスじゃあんまり上手くやってるからさ」
Translation: "I mean, you seem to be getting along just fine in class."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……見た目だけはね」
Translation: "...Key word, 'seem'."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「見た目繕えれば充分とか、俺は思うけど。
　相手と場所で、態度が変わるのが当たり前だし」
Translation: "The way I see it, you can just fake it 'til you make it. Besides, it's normal to change how you act based on where you are and who you're with."
KR:
"겉보기에 좋으면 충분한 것 같은데.
상대랑 장소에 따라 태도가 달라지는 게 당연한 거고."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「無理して素を出すことなんて、ないよ」
Translation: "You don't need to force yourself to open up all the way."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……そうかな？」
Translation: "...You really think so?"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「もしそれで、息が詰まったらさ。
　俺の前で、素顔を見せてくれれば、それでいいから」
Translation:
"If it ever gets to be too suffocating, just come find me.
You can open up to me as much as you want."
KR:
"혹시 너무 숨 막힐 때는
내 앞에서 편한 모습으로 있으면 되니까."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ってか、こういう素の美雪、独り占めしたいし」
Translation: "I mean, personally, I'd rather have the 'real you' all to myself, if we're being honest."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ……う、うん」
Translation: "Oh... O-Okay."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私も……心一を、独り占めしたいな」
Translation: "Same here... I want you all to myself, too..."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「な、なにか言ってよ！」
Translation: "W-Well?! Say something!"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え？　あ、ええと……」
Translation: "Huh? Oh, uh..."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……どうも」
Translation: "...Thanks...?"

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: 我ながら気が利いてなさ過ぎる返答だった。
Translation: Wow, what an asshole response... Nice going, me...

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「は、早く食べましょう！
　のんびりしてると、お昼終わっちゃう」
Translation:
"L-Let's hurry up and eat!
Lunch will be over before we know it!"
KR:
"어, 어서 먹자!
멍하니 있다간 점심시간 끝나버릴 거야!"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お、おう」
Translation: "R-Right!"

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: 気付けば、昼休みも半分以上が過ぎていた。
Translation: Just like that, our lunch break is already halfway over.
KR: 정신 차려보니 벌써 점심시간이 반이나 지나갔다.

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: 美雪が気になって、箸はまだほとんど進んでいない。
Translation: But I'm so focused on Miyuki, I can scarcely eat.
KR: 미유키가 신경 쓰여 거의 먹지도 못했다.

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: 俺は景気づけに、自販機で買ったヤバトマを飲むと――
Translation: To calm myself down, I take a sip of my Yabaley's—
KR: 나는 다시 정신을 가다듬고 자판기에서 뽑아온 야바토마를 마시는데...

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どうしたの？」
Translation: "What's wrong?"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん、いや。マズいなって」
Translation: "Oh, nothing. This stuff is gross, that's all."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「マズいなら、なんで買ったの？　健康志向？」
Translation: "Well, why'd you buy it, then? Are you on a health kick or something?"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、そうじゃないんだけど」
Translation: "No, no, it's nothing like that."

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: 気付くと俺は、このジュースを買っていた。
Translation: I've been buying this nasty tomato juice for as long as I can remember.
KR: 나도 모르게 이 주스를 사고 있었다.

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: 好きでもないのに――なんでだ？
Translation: Why do I keep buying it when I don't even like it?

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ、あの……ね！」
Translation: "S-Say, um...!"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん？　どうした美雪」
Translation: "Hm? What's up, Miyuki?"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「聞きたいことが、あるの」
Translation: "I have a... question."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一って……やっぱり……」
Translation: "Shinichi... are you, um..."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「メイド服とかっ、好きなのっ？」
Translation: "...Are you into maid outfits and stuff?"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今、なんて？」
Translation: "Come again?"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ、やっぱり、ナシ！　ナシで！」
Translation: "Uhh, actually, never mind! I take it back!"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「いや、ナシなことないと思う！
　そこはとても大事だと思う！」
Translation:
"Whoa, whoa! No take-backsies!
I'm gonna need you to repeat that!"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちょっと、心一怖い！」
Translation: "Shinichi, you're scaring me!"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「怖いことないと思うよ！」
Translation: "There's nothing to be afraid of!"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だってそれ、曙くんの目――！」
Translation: "You're acting like Akebono-kun!"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ゴメン落ち着く」
Translation: "My bad. I'll calm down."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うん、そうして」
Translation: "Thank you."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「突然変なことを聞いた、私も悪いわ。ごめんなさい」
Translation: "Sorry for the random dumb question. I shouldn't have asked."
KR: "갑자기 이상한 걸 물어봐서 미안해. 내가 나빴어."

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: ということで、ふたりそろってクールダウン。
Translation: We both pause to take a breath.

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「で、なんで急に？」
Translation: "So, where did THAT come from?"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「朝、話してたじゃない」
Translation: "Well, you were talking about it this morning..."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「男の浪漫が、どうとか……」
Translation: "Something about dreams or whatever..."

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: ……そういえば、そうだった。
Translation: ...Oh, right.

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: 思い返して、恥ずかしくなる。
Translation: Oh god, this is so embarrassing...

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: アレじゃまるで、クラス中に自分の変態性癖を言いふらしたようなもの――
Translation: I feel like I just blurted out all my weird fetishes in front of the entire class...
KR: 이래선 마치 반 친구들에게 내 변태적 성벽을 말하고 다닌 거잖아...

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: いや、違う。
Translation: Wait, no!

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: 俺は変態じゃない。
Translation: I'm not weird!

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: クラスのモブ中のモブ。
Translation: I'm a nobody!

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: 極々一般的な青年的性癖の持ち主だ。
Translation: So that means my fetishes are utterly average at best!

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: その……はずだ。
Translation: ...Probably!

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: そこの所だけは、是非強調をしておかないと。
Translation: The point is, I need her to think I'm normal!

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「あ、あのね。
　もし、私がメイド服を着たら――」
Translation:
"S-Say, um...
If I wore a maid outfit—"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「大変喜びます！」
Translation: "I'd love it!"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「えっ」
Translation: "Huh?!"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……と、思う。思います。思うよ、うん」
Translation: "...I mean, I'm sure it would look very nice."

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: クールになるんだ俺。
Translation: Play it cool, buddy!

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: 余りの勢いに、美雪もちょっとヒいてるぞ。
Translation: You're freaking her out!

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: ここは優しく、あくまでも紳士的に。
Translation: We need to be a gentleman about this!

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「思うんだけど、さ。
　別に、服は、関係ないだろ」
Translation:
"It's just a fun idea I had.
Ultimately, the clothes aren't what matters most."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そ、そうなの……？」
Translation: "Th-They aren't...?"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そう……見損なわないで欲しいんだよな……！」
Translation: "Of course not... What kind of skeeze do you think I am? Haha..."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「大切なのは、中身……！」
Translation: "What matters most is who you are on the inside...!"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「どれだけ可愛い服を着ていても……！
　中身がダメだったら、ダメだし……！」
Translation:
"A girl could wear designer clothes for all I care...
But if her personality's bad, that's a deal-breaker...!"
KR:
"아무리 귀여운 옷을 입고 있어도...
내면이 나쁘면 안 되고."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「好きな子だったら、どんな格好でも、全然……！」
Translation: "When it comes to someone I'm in love with, they automatically look great in anything...!"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うん、そう、そうよね！」
Translation: "Oh, I get it! Right!"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちょっと安心した」
Translation: "That's good to hear."

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だってほら！　メイド服とか、恥ずかしいし」
Translation: "I mean, maid uniforms are kinda degrading, you know?"

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: ――くっ！
Translation: Nnngh!!!

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: な……なんだ？
Translation: Wh... What was that...?

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: この、言いようのない喪失感は……
Translation: Why do I feel so crushed...?
KR: 이 말로 형용할 수 없는 상실감은...?

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一？　顔が――」
Translation: "Shinichi? You look a little—"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「なんでもない！　っていうか、ほら！
　美雪は演劇で色々衣装着るだろ？」
Translation:
"It's nothing! Anyway, I'm surprised you feel that way!
I mean, you wear all kinds of costumes for your plays, right?"
KR:
"아무것도 아니야! 그것보다 너,
연극하면서 여러 의상을 입었잖아?"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今さらメイド服くらい――」
Translation: "Surely a maid outfit isn't that much d—"

Name: a7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「舞台じゃ、ないし……恥ずかしいわよ」
Translation: "But it wouldn't be for a play, so... it'd just be embarrassing."

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: で、ですよねー。
Translation: Figures...

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: なんだか俺は、とても貴重なチャンスを失った……
Translation: For some reason, I can't shake this feeling like I missed out on the chance of a lifetime...
KR: 왠지 정말 소중한 찬스를 잃어버린 듯한...

Name: a7141.nss
Japanese: そんな気がしている。

Name: a7151.nss
Japanese: そんな風に過ぎていく、毎日。
Translation: The days fly by.

Name: a7151.nss
Japanese: 美雪が側にいて、俺はとても満たされている。

KR: 미유키 곁에 있어, 난 정말 행복하다.

Name: a7151.nss
Japanese: 彼女とこんな風に過ごせるなんて、想像していなかった。
Translation: You know, I never imagined things would turn out this way.
KR: 이렇게 함께 있게 될 줄은 상상도 못했다.

Name: a7151.nss
Japanese: まるで夢のようだとさえ、思う。
Translation: Sometimes it feels like a dream...

Name: a7151.nss
Japanese: でも、ほんの少しだけ、物足りない。
Translation: But something's missing.

Name: a7151.nss
Japanese: 何かが欠けている気がする。
Translation: Something's not quite right...

Name: a7151.nss
Japanese: この違和感の原因は一体……？

Name: a7151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんだ、こんな時間に？」
Translation: "Who could that be at this hour...?"

Name: a7151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「わかった！　わかったってば！！」
Translation: "Chill out! I heard you the first time!"

Name: a7151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪？　ってか、それ花束？」
Translation: "Miyuki? Is... Is that a bouquet?"

Name: a7151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「お誕生日、おめでとう！」
Translation: "Happy birthday!"

Name: a7151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...Oh, right."

Name: a7151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ありがとう」
Translation: "Thanks."

Name: a7151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「何、その微妙な間」
Translation: "What was with that awkward silence just now?"

Name: a7151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もしかして、自分の誕生日忘れてたとか？」
Translation: "Did you forget your own birthday?"

Name: a7151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あはははは……」
Translation: "Hahahahaha..."

Name: a7151.nss
Japanese: 否定できないのだった。

Name: a7151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「独りだと、日付の感覚がなくて」
Translation: "Well, it's easy to lose track of the date when I'm by myself."

Name: a7151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私が側にいてあげないと、駄目ね」
Translation: "Then I'd better stick around, hmm?"

Name: a7151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ほら、一緒にお祝いしてあげる！」
Translation: "Here, let's have a little party!"

Name: a7151.nss
Japanese: 言うが早いか、美雪は大きな手荷物と共に、部屋の中へと入る。
Translation: With that, she steps inside, carrying a large box.
KR: 말하자마자 미유키는 커다란 상자를 들고 방에 들어갔다.

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー」
Translation: "Happy birthday to youuu..."

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー」
Translation: "Happy birthday to youuu..."

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ハッピーバースデー・ディア・シンイチ」
Translation: "Happy birthday dear Shinichiii..."

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー」
Translation: "Happy birthday to youuu!"

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Pfffooooo!!!"

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「誕生日、おめでとう」

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ありがとう」

Name: a7161.nss
Japanese: 俺と美雪は、テーブルを挟んで向かい合う。

Name: a7161.nss
Japanese: 間には、美雪の手作りケーキ。

Name: a7161.nss
Japanese: ふたりきりで、こぢんまりとしたパーティーだが、俺にはコレだけあれば充分だ。

KR: 둘이서 하는 조촐한 파티지만 내겐 이걸로 충분하다.

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「どれだけぶりだっけ？
　美雪と一緒の誕生日って」

"이게 얼마 만이지?
미유키랑 생일을 같이 보내다니."

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「小学校の頃は、一緒にやってたわよね」
Translation: "Since grade school, at least."

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「やっと、元に戻れたんだ」
Translation: "But now things are finally back to normal."

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それ以上、だろ？」
Translation: "I'd say they're even BETTER than normal, personally."

Name: a7161.nss
Japanese: 昔はただの友達だった。

Name: a7161.nss
Japanese: でも今は、恋人同士。

Name: a7161.nss
Japanese: なんだか今も、フワフワして実感がない。

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki

Name: a7161.nss
Japanese: 美雪は持ってきたカバンから、ケーキナイフを取り出す。

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……このケーキ、大きすぎないか？」

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki

Translation: "Oh, it's fine! You can never have too much birthday cake!"

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「自分が食べたいだけなんじゃ……？」

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なにか言った？」

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いいえ、なにも！」

Name: a7161.nss
Japanese: ケーキナイフを持った美雪を怒らせてはいけない。

KR: 케이크 칼을 든 미유키를 화나게 해선 안 된다.

Name: a7161.nss

KR: 한편, 미유키는 자른 케이크 조각을 접시에 올려놓았다.

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いただきます」
Translation: "Wow, this looks great..."

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「はい、召し上がれ」

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もぐもぐ……んむ、んん……」
Translation: "Nom nom... gllpp... Mmm..."

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あれ？」
Translation: "Hmm?"

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一、どうしちゃったの？」
Translation: "Shinichi, what's wrong?"

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もしかして、おいしくなかった？」
Translation: "Does it... taste bad or something?"

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、美味しい。すごく、美味しいよ。なのに……」
Translation: "No, it's great. Really great! I just..."

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんだか最近、ずっと夢みてるみたいで」
Translation: "I feel like I'm dreaming."

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……さめないよね？」
Translation: "...You won't wake up and change your mind, will you?"

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私たち、これからもずっと、ずっと、一緒だよね」
Translation: "We'll be together for the rest of our lives, right?"

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「永遠……だよね？」
Translation: "Forever and ever?"

Name: a7161.nss
Japanese: 美雪の瞳は、真剣で。
Translation: Her expression is dead serious.

Name: a7161.nss
Japanese: ただの伝説を、まるで信じているように思えた。
Translation: It's like she actually believes the school legend...
KR: 단순한 전설을 정말 믿는 것 같았다.

Name: a7161.nss
Japanese: 現実と虚構の区別が、つかなくなったようにも思えた。
Translation: ...or she's unable to tell the difference between fiction and reality.
KR: 현실과 허구를 구별하지 못하는 것 같아 보였다.

Name: a7161.nss
Japanese: でも、もし、彼女の心が安らぐなら。
Translation: But I'll do anything in my power to help her feel secure.

Name: a7161.nss
Japanese: 俺にできることは、確かにあって。
KR: 내가 할 수 있는 일이 있다면...

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「キス、して」

Name: a7161.nss
Japanese: 耳元に、美雪が囁く。
Translation: She whispers in my ear.

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「キスをすると、不安じゃなくなるの」
Translation: "Your kiss always calms me down..."

Name: a7161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから、もっと、夢中にさせて」
Translation: "Make me forget all my worries, okay...?"

Name: a7161.nss
Japanese: 囁く美雪の唇に、俺は吸い寄せられた。
Translation: Like a magnet, my lips are drawn to hers.
KR: 나는 속삭이는 미유키의 입술로 빨려 들어갔다.

Name: a7161.nss
Japanese: 誕生日のキスは、とても甘い味だった。
Translation: I never knew a birthday kiss could taste so sweet.

Name: a7211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Miyuki..."

Name: a7211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: a7211.nss
Japanese: 俺は、美雪に口づける。
Translation: We kiss.

Name: a7211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「んちゅ……ん、ん……ちゅ……」
Translation: "Mmph... mm... mmm... mmph..."

Name: a7211.nss
Japanese: 唇が合わさり、さらにその奧へ。
Translation: Our lips intertwine, then our tongues.

Name: a7211.nss
Japanese: 舌と舌が絡み合い、相手との動きをゆっくりと合わせていく。
Translation: Slowly, our movements fall in sync.
KR: 혀와 혀가 얽혀 천천히 서로의 움직임을 맞춰간다.

Name: a7211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「んちゅ……心一……あ……すごい……

Translation:
"Mmph... Shinichi... Oh my god...
I can't believe... we're really... kissing... Mm..."
KR:
"쪽... 신이치... 굉장해...
나, 신이치랑... 키스하고 있어... 으응..."

Name: a7211.nss
Japanese: 美雪の熱い吐息が、肌にかかる。
Translation: I can feel her breath, hot against my skin.

Name: a7211.nss
Japanese: 蕩けるような美雪の瞳。
Translation: She gazes at me, enraptured.

Name: a7211.nss
Japanese: 誘われるように、もう一度深い口づけ。
Translation: Then she pulls me in for another deep kiss.
KR: 유혹하는 것처럼 다시 한번 진한 입맞춤.

Name: a7211.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「んちゅっ、ん……んん、ん……
　ちゅ、ちゅ……んん……っ」

Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから私今日は、メイド服を準備して、それで……」
Translation: "Well... I bought one just for today, and..."

Name: a7222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私を、貴方にプレゼントしようかなって」
Translation: "I thought I'd give it to you as your birthday present."

Name: a7222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「でも、ああいうこと、しちゃったから。
　せっかく準備したのに、無駄に――」
Translation: "But then I got caught up in the heat of the moment... and now my gift will just go to waste—"
KR: "하지만 그런 짓, 해버렸으니까. 기껏 준비해왔는데, 쓸모없게..."

Name: a7222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「無駄になんてしない！」
Translation: "No it won't!"

Name: a7222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「え？　でも心一、もう――」
Translation: "Huh? But Shinichi, we already—"

Name: a7222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「って、きゃっ！　しん……いち？」
Translation: "What the—AAAH! Shin...ichi...?"

Name: a7222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪のためなら、何回だって！」
Translation: "For you, I can get it up as many times as it takes!"

Name: a7222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……なんかそれ、色々不純な動機を感じるような」
Translation: "Gee, how thoughtful of you..."

Name: a7222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪！」
Translation: "Miyuki!"

Name: a7222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺はただ……お前が、好きなだけ！」
Translation: "I'm madly in love with you! Nothing more, nothing less!"

Name: a7222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Oh, shush... You big dork!"

Name: a7222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「わかった！　わかりました！」
Translation: "Fine, okay? I get it!"

Name: a7222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「き……着替えてくるから……
　ちょ、ちょっとだけ待ってて下さいね」
Translation:
"I'll... I'll go put it on...
Y-You just wait right here."
KR: "가... 갈아입고 올 테니까... 조, 조금만 기다리고 계세요."

Name: a7222.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ご主人……さま？」
Translation: "Got that, M-Master...?"

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ぁあっ、惜しい……」
Translation: "Aaagh! So close..."

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あと少し、だな」
Translation: "You nearly had it that time."

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「まだまだ！　今度こそ――！」
Translation: "I'm not giving up! I'll get it this time!"

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: 貸し切り状態のバッティングセンター。
Translation: Today we rented out the batting cages just for ourselves.

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: 白球を打ち返す、美雪。
Translation: Miyuki hits ball after ball.

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: 相変わらずの美しさに、俺はつい見とれてしまう。
Translation: Her form is still just as captivatingly beautiful as ever.
KR: 변함없는 아름다움에 나는 그만 넋을 놓았다.

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Hmm?"

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: 足元から、鳴き声が聞こえた。
Translation: I hear a little meow from below me.

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: つられてベンチの下を覗くと――
Translation: I look down under the bench to find—

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あれ、おまえは」
Translation: "Wait... I know you..."

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ううっ、惜しい！　三塁打！」
Translation: "Ugghhh... So close! I got a triple that time!"

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「んん……もうちょっとなんだけどな」
Translation: "Hmm... I know I've almost got it..."
