Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「って、心一！？　見てなかったの」
Translation: "What the?! Shinichi! You weren't even watching?!"

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ、ゴメン。急に猫が来て」
Translation: "Oh, sorry. I got distracted by this random cat."

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "There's a cat?!"

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ホントだ、黒い子猫！」
Translation: "So there is! A little black cat!"

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「心一、写真よ写真！
　近くから、写真撮って！」
Translation:
"Shinichi, take pics!
Get some close-up shots for me!"

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え？　でも携帯……あれ、どこにいったっけ？」
Translation: "Huh? But my phone... Wait, where'd I even put my phone...?"

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私の使って！　コレ！」
Translation: "Just use mine! Here!"

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お、おう！」
Translation: "Oh, okay!"

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: 差し出されたのは、スマートフォン。
Translation: She hands me her phone, and I take it.

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: あれ？
Translation: Wait, what the?

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: 美雪って、スマフォじゃなく普通の携帯じゃ……
Translation: It's a smartphone... What happened to her old clamshell phone?

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一！」
Translation: "Shinichi!"

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「お、おう。
　よーし、逃げるなよ」
Translation:
"R-Right!
Alright, little buddy, just hold still..."

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ、おい、逃げるなって！」
Translation: "Gah! Hey! I said hold still!"

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ……間に合わなかった」
Translation: "Damn... I wasn't fast enough..."

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「チャンスだったのに」
Translation: "What a waste of a perfect opportunity..."

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「悪かったよ」
Translation: "Look, I'm sorry, okay?"

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 全く、美雪の猫好きには困ったもんだ。
Translation: Good grief... Miyuki loves cats WAY too much...
KR: 정말이지... 미유키의 고양이 사랑에는 못 당하겠다니까...

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 溜息をつきながら、彼女にスマフォを返そうとして――
Translation: I heave a sigh and go to hand her phone back to her—

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: 指先が、おかしな場所を撫でたらしい。
Translation: —but just then, my finger taps the wrong button.

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: 画面に、突然写真が表示される。
Translation: Out of nowhere, a photo pops up onscreen.

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: 一緒に撮った、あの写真だ。
Translation: It's that photo we took together.

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: 画面の向こうの俺たちは、いかにも幸せそうで――
Translation: We look so happy together—
KR: 화면 속 우리는 너무 행복해 보여...

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: ――あれ？
Translation: ...Wait.

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: ちょっと待て。
Translation: Hold on a second.

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: あの屋上は、俺と美雪だけの場所のはず……
Translation: The roof is our special little place for just the two of us...

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: それじゃあこの写真は、一体誰が撮ったんだ？
Translation: ...So who the hell took this picture of us?
KR: 그럼 이 사진은 도대체 누가 찍은 거지...?

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...Shinichi?"

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちょ、ちょっと！　何見てるの！？」
Translation: "Whoa, hold on! Are you going through my phone?!"

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、ゴメン。ちょっと写真を――」
Translation: "Oh, sorry! I didn't mean to—

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「返して！」
Translation: "Give it back!"

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: 渡すまでもなく、真っ赤になった美雪にスマフォを奪い返される。
Translation: Before I can even respond, a very red-faced Miyuki snatches the phone back from me.
KR: 건네주기도 전에 새빨개진 미유키가 스마트폰을 빼앗았다.

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「まさか、日記見てたんじゃないでしょうね！？」
Translation: "You weren't reading my diary, were you?!"

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「日記？」
Translation: "Your diary's on there?"

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: 言われてみれば確かに、サムネイルの中に、日記の写真のようなフォルダがあった気がする……
Translation: Now that she mentions it, I seem to recall seeing a folder full of what looked like photos of handwritten notes, judging from the thumbnail images.
KR: 듣고 보니 분명 썸네일 중에 일기 사진 같은 폴더가 있었던 것 같은데...

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「写真に撮ってるのか？　わざわざ？」
Translation: "You take pictures of your diary entries? What for?"

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: 一度書いた日記を写真に撮るなんて、二度手間だ。
Translation: Who would bother going to all that effort?
KR: 이미 쓴 일기를 사진으로 찍을 필요가 있나?

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「う……うるさい！　私の勝手でしょ！」
Translation: "Sh-Shut up! It's a free country, you know!"

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私はね、いつでもどこでも、貴方との思い出を見返せるようにしたいの！　おかしい？」
Translation: "I just want to be able to look back on my memories with you at any given time! Is that so wrong?"
KR: "난 말이지, 언제 어디서라도 너와의 추억을 볼 수 있게 하고 싶어! 그게 이상해?"

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、全然おかしくない」
Translation: "No, not at all."

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: 美雪はもともと、そういう几帳面な所のある性格だ。
Translation: Miyuki's always been the fastidious type.

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: この怒りようは、ちょっと大げさな気もするけど。
Translation: Though I think she's getting a little overly upset about it...
KR: 이렇게 화내는 건 좀 오바하는 것 같기도 한데...

Name: a7231.nss
Japanese: じろじろ他人のスマフォを覗いたのは、確かに良くない行いなワケで。
Translation: But, to be fair, it wasn't cool of me to look at stuff on her phone in the first place.
KR: 남의 핸드폰을 훔쳐보는 건 확실히 나쁜 짓이니까.

Name: a7231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺が悪かったよ。ゴメン」
Translation: "I'm really sorry, Miyuki. I shouldn't have looked."

Name: a7233.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ゴメンじゃ、すまないわね」
Translation: "Sorry won't cut it, I'm afraid."

Name: a7233.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「すまないって……じゃあ、どうしろって言うんだよ？」
Translation:
"What do you mean, it won't cut it?
What do you expect me to do?"

Name: a7233.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「罰として――私の代わりに、ホームラン打って」
Translation: "As your punishment... I want you to hit a home run in my place."

Name: a7233.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: a7233.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「打つまで、バット振り続ける」
Translation: "You better swing that bat until you get one."

Name: a7233.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それとも、空振りを笑われるのが嫌？」
Translation: "Or are you too scared you'll strike out?"

Name: a7233.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Okay, you're on."

Name: a7233.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そこまで言われたら、黙ってられないな」
Translation: "Can't have you calling me some kind of chicken, now can I?"

Name: a7233.nss
Japanese: 俺はベンチから、重い腰を上げる。
Translation: Reluctantly, I get up from the bench.

Name: a7233.nss
Japanese: 美雪から金属バットを借り受けた。
Translation: Miyuki hands me a metal baseball bat.
KR: 그리고 미유키가 들고 있던 쇠 방망이를 손에 쥐었다.

Name: a7233.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「やってやる！」
Translation: "Prepare to get schooled!"

Name: a7233.nss
Japanese: 思い切り、素振りをする。
Translation: I practice a few swings.

Name: a7233.nss
Japanese: 俺だって、自分のフォームが誉められたものではないことを、知っている。
Translation: I know my batting stance isn't perfect.
KR: 나도 내 폼이 별로라는 건 알고 있다.

Name: a7233.nss
Japanese: 美雪と比べれば、きっと差は歴然としているだろう。
Translation: Especially not in comparison to hers.
KR: 미유키와 비교하면 그 차이는 확연히 드러나겠지.

Name: a7233.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一！　格好いいよ！」
Translation: "Looking cool, Shinichi!"

Name: a7233.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「まだ、カッコ悪いよ！」
Translation: "Hardly!"

Name: a7233.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ううん。本当に、格好いい！」
Translation: "No, really! You're the coolest!"

Name: a7233.nss
Japanese: これが、俺に今できる、精一杯。
Translation: I mean, I'm trying my best...
KR: 이게 내가 할 수 있는 최선이다.

Name: a7233.nss
Japanese: 吉と出るか凶と出るか、そんなのはわからない。
Translation: But the rest is up to sheer luck.
KR: 당첨일지 꽝일지, 그런 건 알 수 없다.

Name: a7233.nss
Japanese: ただとにかく、バットを振るだけ。
Translation: All I can do is summon up the full extent of my strength—

Name: a7233.nss
Japanese: 自分のできる限りの力を、出し切るだけ。
Translation: —and take the swing.

Name: a7233.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「よし、来いッ！！」
Translation: "Alright, bring it on!!!"

Name: a7233.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「やっちゃえッ！！」
Translation: "You can do it!"

Name: a7233.nss
Japanese: ――さて、皆さんは信じるだろうか。
Translation: I know this will sound ridiculous...

Name: a7233.nss
Japanese: 俺だって信じられなかったのだから、まあ無理にとは言わないのだけれども。
Translation: Trust me, I can scarcely believe it either.
KR: 못 믿는 게 당연하다. 나도 믿을 수 없었으니까.

Name: a7233.nss
Japanese: バットにぶつかり、放物線を描いたその打球は――
Translation: But believe it or not, when I hit that ball—

Name: a7233.nss
Japanese: 見事に一発で、ホームランに命中したのだ。
Translation: —it nailed that "Home Run" target dead-center on my first try.
KR: 멋지게도 단 한 방에 홈런을 맞춘 것이다.

Name: a7233.nss
Japanese: まるで、神様がイカサマしたみたいに。
Translation: As if God made it happen just to mess with me.

Name: a9111.nss
Japanese: ――美雪が主役を演じる定期公演が、終わった。
Translation: —Just like that, Miyuki's final performance came and went.

Name: a9111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「おはよう」
Translation: "Good morning!"

Name: a9111.nss
Japanese: いつものように教室へと美雪がやってきて、いつものようにクラス中の注目が彼女に集まる。
Translation: The second she walks into the classroom, she instantly draws everyone's attention. Just like always.
KR: 언제나처럼 미유키가 교실에 들어오자 반의 이목이 쏠렸다.

Name: a9111.nss
Japanese: だが彼女は、もう俺に声をかけようとしない。
Translation: Except she doesn't talk to me anymore.
KR: 하지만 미유키는 더 이상 나에게 말을 걸지 않는다.

Name: a9111.nss
Japanese: 俺もまた、彼女には声をかけない。
Translation: And I don't talk to her, either.
KR: 나도 미유키에게 더 이상 말을 걸지 않는다.

Name: a9111.nss
Japanese: 普段の朝。
Translation: Just another morning here at school.

Name: a9111.nss
Japanese: 普段の教室。
Translation: Same as always.

Name: a9111.nss
Japanese: 俺は結局、演劇を見に行かなかった。
Translation: In the end, I never went to see the play.
KR: 나는 결국 연극을 보러 가지 않았다.

Name: a9111.nss
Japanese: 話によると、大盛況で幕を閉じたらしい。
Translation: I'm told it was a roaring success.

Name: a9111.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、主役とキスをする――
Translation: I can imagine Miyuki up on stage, kissing the romantic lead...

Name: a9111.nss
Japanese: きっと、奇跡のように美しい光景だっただろう。
Translation: I'm sure it was a beautiful moment.

Name: a9111.nss
Japanese: でも俺は、その観客になりたいとは思わない。
Translation: But I couldn't care less.
KR: 하지만 그걸 보고 싶은 마음은 없었다.

Name: a9111.nss
Japanese: 俺と美雪は、もう、友達じゃない。
Translation: Miyuki and I aren't friends anymore.

Name: a9111.nss
Japanese: また前の関係に戻った。
Translation: We've gone back to the way we were before.

Name: a9111.nss
Japanese: たぶん、それでいいのだ。
Translation: And that's probably for the best.

Name: a9111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「しかし、危ないところだったな！」
Translation: "Man, that was a close one!"

Name: a9111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「危ない？」
Translation: "What was?"

Name: a9111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「お前最近リア充臭がプンプンしてたからな」
Translation: "For a while now you've reeked of normie..."

Name: a9111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「爆発寸前だったぜ！」
Translation: "You came thiiiis close to dying, pal!"

Name: a9111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「しねーよ」
Translation: "I sincerely doubt that."

Name: a9111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「戦え！　浪漫倶楽部！
　爆発しろ！　リア充！」
Translation:
"Fight on, B&D Boys!
Death to normies!"

Name: a9111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「この世にリア充がある限り――」
Translation: "So long as normies exist in this world..."

Name: a9111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「俺たちの戦いは！　永遠に！　終わらない！」
Translation: "OUR WORK IS NEVER DONE!"

Name: a9111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「終われ」
Translation: "Get a new job."

Name: a9111.nss
Japanese: そんな地味な戦い、いつまでも続いてたまるか。
Translation: I don't know what this "work" entails, but please leave me out of it!
KR: 그런 보잘것없는 싸움, 언제까지 할 생각이냐고.

Name: a9121.nss
Japanese: 夕暮れの街に、太陽が沈んでいく。
Translation: The sun sets over the city.

Name: a9121.nss
Japanese: ゆっくり、ゆっくりと、消えていく。
Translation: Slowly but surely, it sinks beyond the horizon.

Name: a9121.nss
Japanese: 夕陽の空は、美しすぎて――
Translation: The crimson sky is breathtaking...

Name: a9121.nss
Japanese: まるで書き割りのようだと思う。
Translation: Almost like a stage backdrop.

Name: a9121.nss
Japanese: 俺は、俺以外のものにはなれない。
Translation: As for me, I can only be myself.

Name: a9121.nss
Japanese: 壁に取り囲まれたこのセカイで、普通の人生を送り、いつの間にか物語は終わっているのだろう。
Translation: Trapped within the confines of my little world, I'll live out a normal life, and then the story will come to an end before I know it.
KR: 벽으로 둘러싸인 이 세계에서 평범한 인생을 살다 보면, 어느새 이야기가 끝날 것이다.

Name: a9121.nss
Japanese: 盛り上がりも、クライマックスも、カタルシスも、わかりやすい救いもないままに。
Translation: No rising action, no climax, no falling action, no tidy little resolution.

Name: a9121.nss
Japanese: いつの間にかどこにも行けなくなっている。
Translation: Here I find myself, stuck in a rut, all other routes closed to me.

Name: a9122a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「――俺には、お似合いだろ？」
Translation: "Just what I deserve, don't you think?"

Name: a9122a.nss
Japanese: あの日届いた写真に向かって、そう呟く。
Translation: I mutter down at the photo from that day.

Name: a9122a.nss
Japanese: だが彼女は、当然何も答えてはくれなかった。
Translation: Needless to say, she doesn't answer me.

Name: a9122b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「――俺には、お似合いだろ？」
Translation: "Just what I deserve, don't you think?"

Name: a9122b.nss
Japanese: 空に向かって、そう呟く。
Translation: I mutter up at the sky.

Name: a9122b.nss
Japanese: だが、当然何も答えてはくれなかった。
Translation: Needless to say, no one answers me.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: あれから、３年――
Translation: Three years later—

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: 俺はひとり、部屋で特売肉を焼いている。
Translation: I'm in my kitchen, frying up some discount pork.
KR: 난 혼자 방에서 특별 할인으로 싸게 산 고기를 굽고 있다.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: 豚肉にタマネギを絡めて炒める。
Translation: I chop up some onions and add them to the pan.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: あとは３割引で買ってきた総菜のサラダ、乾燥の具を入れた椀に、出汁入りの味噌を解けば出来上がり。
Translation: Bought myself a side salad for 30% off, too. Now I just need to stir a little dashi broth into my miso soup mix and I'm set!
KR: 그리고 30% 할인된 샐러드, 그리고 된장국을 그릇에 담으면 완성!

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: ひとりのバイト暮らしには贅沢な夕飯だ。
Translation: This is a pretty fancy dinner for a bachelor who works minimum wage, if I do say so myself.

Name: a9201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん……やばい、時間だ！」
Translation: "Mmm... Oh crap, the show's on!"

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: 俺は慌ててコンロの火を止める。
Translation: I hastily shut off the burner.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: もう生焼けってことはないし、大丈夫だろう。
Translation: Surely I've cooked it for long enough by now... probably... Eh, it'll be fine!
KR: 설익지는 않았을 거고... 이 정도면 괜찮겠지.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: 炊きたてのごはんをよそって、豚肉の味噌炒めをサラダに盛りつけると、慌ててテレビのチャンネルを合わせる。
Translation: I serve myself a bowl of steaming hot rice, then dump the stir-fried pork onto my salad and quickly switch on the TV.
KR: 갓 지은 밥을 잘 담고 TV를 틀었다.

Name: a9201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ、どうして！？」
Translation: "Why?! Answer me!"

Name: a9201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君は――私を裏切るの！？」
Translation: "Why... Why would you betray me like this?!"

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: 曽根美雪は、学校を中退して芸能界デビュー。
Translation: Sone Miyuki dropped out of high school to make her debut in the entertainment industry.
KR: 소네 미유키는 학교를 그만두고 연예계에 데뷔했다.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: たちまち人気が急上昇、今や画面に出ない日がないほどの売れっ子女優になっている。
Translation: These days, her popularity is skyrocketing; scarcely a day goes by when I don't see her onscreen somewhere.
KR: 순식간에 인기가 오르더니 지금은 화면에 나오지 않는 날이 없을 정도로 인기 배우가 되었다.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: その人気は凄まじく、半ばアイドル扱いだ。
Translation: She's so famous, she's practically worshipped.
KR: 인기가 얼마나 뛰어난지, 아이돌 팬클럽 같은 것도 생겼다.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: 以前から才能はあると思っていたけれど、まさかここまでだなんて……
Translation: I always knew she had talent, but I never imagined this...
KR: 예전부터 재능은 있다고 생각했지만, 설마 이 정도일 줄이야...

Name: a9201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「裏切るなら……」
Translation: "If you're going to betray me..."

Name: a9201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私も……貴方を、ユルサナイ……」
Translation: "Then I'll just have to get even."

Name: a9201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「地の果てまでも、追い詰めてやる……」
Translation: "You can run, but you can't hide. I'll chase you to the ends of the earth..."

Name: a9201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「怖っ！」
Translation: "Yikes! Creepy!"

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: さすがは美雪。
Translation: That's Miyuki for you.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: 相変わらずの演技力だ。
Translation: Her acting skills are really out of this world.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: かくいう俺は、今やすっかり彼女のいちファンで、出演する番組は全てチェックしている。
Translation: As for me, I'm a big fan. I watch any and every show she's in.
KR: 이러는 나는 지금은 완전히 미유키 팬이 되어, 출연하는 프로그램은 전부 확인하고 있다.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: ま、流行に乗って騒ぐようなタイプでもないし、わざわざサイン会に出向いたりなんかはしないけど。
Translation: That said, I'm not the kind of person who typically gets caught up in the hype, and I don't foresee myself attending any of her autograph sessions.
KR: 뭐, 유행을 따라가는 타입도 아니고, 일부러 팬 사인회에도 가지 않지만.

Name: a9201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でもね」
Translation: "That said..."

Name: a9201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もし君が、ずっと私を好きでいてくれるなら」
Translation: "If you'll promise to love me always..."

Name: a9201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「永遠に愛してくれるなら」
Translation: "Then I'll love you for the rest of our lives."

Name: a9201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「幸せにしてあげるよ」
Translation: "I'll make you the happiest man alive."

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: 共演の主演男優に、熱い視線を向ける美雪。
Translation: Miyuki gazes at her male co-star with fervor in her eyes.
KR: 상대 배우에게 뜨거운 시선을 보내는 미유키.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: が、それも当然だ。
Translation: No surprise there, either.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: 先日、マスコミではふたりの熱愛が発覚したばかり。
Translation: Their relationship was just leaked to the press a few days ago.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: 会見場で、ふたりはそれを否定することなく、芸能界は大型カップルの成立に沸いた。
Translation: Neither of them denied it in the subsequent interviews, and now the celebrity blogs are all going crazy over the news.
KR: 기자 회견장에서도 부인하지 않았고, 연예계는 대형 커플의 탄생이라며 들썩였다.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: でも、それは遠いどこかの話。
Translation: But none of that is my business now.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: 彼女はもう向こう側のひとで、もう、手の届かない場所に行ってしまっている。
Translation: The two of us are worlds apart—and she's somewhere I can never reach.
KR: 미유키는 이미 내 손이 닿지 않는 먼 곳으로 떠나버렸다.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: 当然、苦しさも覚えない。
Translation: But it doesn't bother me.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: 嫉妬も覚えない。
Translation: I can't bring myself to feel jealous, either.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: ただちょっと、ごはんの湯気がかかるだけ。
Translation: All I feel is the steam rising from my rice.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: 味つけの濃すぎる豚肉が、喉を刺激するだけ。
Translation: And the over-seasoned pork stinging the back of my throat.
KR: 양념이 센 돼지고기 때문에 목이 아팠을 뿐.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: 刻んだタマネギが、時間差で目にしみるだけ。
Translation: And the chopped onions belatedly stinging my eyes.
KR: 다진 양파가 뒤늦게 눈을 자극했을 뿐.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: 百歩譲って、これが涙だとしよう。
Translation: ...Okay, maybe I'm crying.
KR: 백 보 양보해서 이걸 눈물이라고 하자.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: でも、会見時の美雪の、あの笑顔を見れば、わかる。
Translation: But I saw that interview, and I know.
KR: 하지만 기자 회견하던 미유키의 미소를 보면 알 수 있다.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: 彼女は今、最高に幸せだ。
Translation: I know she's the happiest she's ever been.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: だから俺のこの涙だって、嬉し涙に違いないのだ。
Translation: So clearly these are just happy tears.
KR: 그러니 내 눈물도 기쁨의 눈물인 게 틀림없다.

Name: a9201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「さて……と」
Translation: "Now then..."

Name: a9201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「後片付けでもするか！」
Translation: "Time to wash up!"

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: 俺は食器を片付けて、流し台に立つ。
Translation: I gather my dirty dishes and head to the sink.

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: ただ過ぎていく、日常。
Translation: The days pass by...

Name: a9201.nss
Japanese: これが、俺の辿るべき運命だった。
Translation: ...as I follow the path I was fated to take.

Name: b0112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Hmmm?"

Name: b0112.nss
Japanese: 入り口のすぐ側に、何かが落ちていた。
Translation: I look down.
KR: 문 바로 옆에 뭔가가 떨어져 있었다.

Name: b0112.nss
Japanese: 裏返ったスマートフォン。
Translation: There's a cell phone lying facedown on the ground by the door.

Name: b0112.nss
Japanese: 一体、誰の携帯だろう？
Translation: Whose is this?

Name: b0112.nss
Japanese: "電話をかける","通話履歴を見る"
Translation: "Place a phone call","Check the call history"

Name: b1121.nss
Japanese: ……ん？　あ、あれ？
Translation: ...Hmm? Wh-What the...?

Name: b1121.nss
Japanese: ここは……教室？
Translation: I'm... in the classroom?

Name: b1121.nss
Japanese: ということは、今のは……
Translation: Then what was that just now?

Name: b1121.nss
Japanese: 自動送りにしていたら、いつの間にかタイトル画面になっていた。
Translation: One minute I have it set to Auto, and the next I'm back at the title screen.
KR: 자동 모드로 해놨더니 어느새 타이틀 화면이 나오고 있었다.

Name: b1121.nss
Japanese: どうやらゲームの途中で眠ってしまったらしい。
Translation: I guess I passed out while playing the game.

Name: b1121.nss
Japanese: 記憶もなんだか、曖昧だ。
Translation: My memories are kind of fuzzy...

Name: b1121.nss
Japanese: 気を取り直して、最初からプレイし直してみよう。
Translation: Shaking myself awake, I tap New Game.

Name: b3122b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「まだなの」
Translation: "Not yet."

Name: b3122b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「さいきん、ずっと、とどかないの」
Translation: "The past few days... My phone calls won't go through."

Name: b3124.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このなかのゲーム、カイゾウして、シンイチとミユキとむすばれるようにしたの」
Translation: "The game has been recoded so that you and Miyuki can be together."

Name: b3124.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ぜったいに、ネトラレないようにしたの」
Translation: "Now you'll never, ever be cucked."

Name: b3124.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから、シンイチはアンシン」
Translation: "So you don't have to worry about anything anymore."

Name: b3124.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「すきなだけ、ミユキをすきになっていいの」
Translation: "You can love Miyuki as much as you want."

Name: b3124.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ……そっか」
Translation: "Oh... Right."

Name: b3124.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ありがとな」
Translation: "Thanks."

Name: b3124.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うん」
Translation: "No prob."

Name: b3124.nss
Japanese: 俺にアオイの神様の姿は見えない。
Translation: I can't see Aoi's god.

Name: b3124.nss
Japanese: 彼女の神様から救ってもらえると信じられるほど、虚実の区別が付かないわけがない。
Translation: I know the difference between reality and fiction. I'm not crazy enough to believe that her god will actually help me.
KR: 그 신님에게 구원받을 수 있다고 믿을 만큼 정신이 이상한 것도 아니다.

Name: b3124.nss
Japanese: でも、彼女が俺のために、神様に祈ってくれている。
Translation: But Aoi's praying for my sake...
KR: 하지만 아오이가 나를 위해 신님에게 기도해주고 있어...

Name: b3124.nss
Japanese: それだけで、嬉しかった。
Translation: And it's the thought that counts.

Name: b3124.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「じゃ、美雪を迎えに行くか」
Translation: "Anyway, let's go find Miyuki."

Name: b3223.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このセカイは、ゲームなの」
Translation: "This world IS a video game."

Name: b3223.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カミサマにたのめば、アップデートできる」
Translation: "And Aoi can ask God to make an update patch."

Name: b3223.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチのフアン、カイショウできる」
Translation: "That'll solve your problems."

Name: b3223.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「その、はずだったの。でも――」
Translation: "Or at least... that's how it was supposed to be..."

Name: b3223.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でんわ、ケンガイ。つながらないの」
Translation: "But my phone has no service... It won't connect."

Name: b3223.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「……ごめんなの」

Name: b3223.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「謝ることないって」
Translation: "C'mon, don't apologize."

Name: b3223.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「カミサマなんかいなくても、俺は適当にやるからさ」
Translation: "I'll figure something out, with or without God."
KR: "신님 같은 거 없어도 내가 알아서 잘할 테니까."

Name: b3223.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「てきとう、だめなの」
Translation: "You can't just 'figure something out'."

Name: b3223.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチは、ミユキのおうじさまに、なるの」
Translation: "You're going to be Miyuki's prince."

Name: b3223.nss
Japanese: 思わず自分の耳を疑ってしまう。
Translation: I can't believe what I'm hearing.

Name: b3223.nss
Japanese: 王子様なんて、俺からもっとも縁遠い存在じゃないか。
Translation: Of all the words that could be used to describe me, "prince" isn't one of them.
KR: 왕자님이라니, 나랑 가장 인연이 먼 존재잖아.

Name: b5113.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ああっ！　噂をすれば曽根さんではないですか！」
Translation: "Ah...! Speak of the angel, and she appears!"

Name: b5113.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「おはよう」
Translation: "Good morning!"

Name: b5113.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「おはようございますッ！」
Translation: "Good morning indeed!"

Name: b5113.nss
Japanese: と、今日も元気に挨拶をする雄太郎。
Translation: As usual, Yuutarou greets Miyuki with gusto.

Name: b5113.nss
Japanese: やはり、話しかけづらいのだろう。
Translation: She must feel so awkward.

Name: b5113.nss
Japanese: それは俺だって、同じ事だ。
Translation: I know I definitely do.

Name: b5113.nss
Japanese: 美雪と俺は目を合わせようともせず、席に着く。
Translation: The two of us take our seats without making eye contact.
KR: 미유키와 나는 눈을 마주치지도 않고 자리에 앉았다.

Name: b5113.nss
Japanese: 困ったように視線を転じると――
Translation: I shift my gaze to find—

Name: b5162.nss
Japanese: 探しても……探しても……
Translation: No matter how hard we look...

Name: b5162.nss
Japanese: アオイのスマフォは、見つからない。
Translation: ...Aoi's phone is nowhere to be found.

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「やっぱり、外にあるんじゃないか？」
Translation: "I'm starting to think you must've dropped it somewhere else."

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも……そとは、さがして……」
Translation: "But Aoi... already searched everywhere else..."

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「エル、ちょっと静かに」
Translation: "Eru, pipe down for a sec!"

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ごはんはさっき、食べただろ？」
Translation: "You just had your dinner, didn't you?"

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あ……ちがう」
Translation: "No... That's not it."

Name: b5162.nss
Japanese: 突然、エルがリビングから飛び出した。
Translation: All of a sudden, Eru bolts out of the living room.

Name: b5162.nss
Japanese: 何事かと追いかけると、玄関に寄りかかるようにして、盛んに扉を引っ掻いている。
Translation: Alarmed, I follow the kitten to the front door, where he starts clawing like crazy to get out.
KR: 무슨 일인가 싶어 쫓아가니 현관에 기대어 마구 할퀴고 있었다.

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そこに……あるの？」
Translation: "Is it... out there?"

Name: b5162.nss
Japanese: 俺はゆっくりと、ドアを開けた。
Translation: I gingerly open the door.

Name: b5162.nss
Japanese: 家を出ると、エルは脇目もふらず茂みの中に飛び込む。
Translation: The next instant, Eru dives straight into the bushes.
KR: 집을 나서자 에루는 곧장 수풀 속으로 뛰어들었다.

Name: b5162.nss
Japanese: 慌てて後を追いかけると――
Translation: I promptly follow suit.

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ、あった！」
Translation: "Oh! There it is!"

Name: b5162.nss
Japanese: 茂みの中に、アオイのスマートフォンが落ちてた。
Translation: Aoi's phone is right there under the shrubbery.
KR: 수풀 속에 아오이의 핸드폰이 떨어져 있었다.

Name: b5162.nss
Japanese: そういえば……
Translation: Come to think of it...

Name: b5162.nss
Japanese: 昨晩、ここでアオイがよろけて転びかけたような……
Translation: I think this is the spot where Aoi nearly fell last night...
KR: 어젯밤에 여기서 아오이가 비틀거리다 넘어질 뻔했었지...

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、アオイ！　これでいいんだよな？」
Translation: "Hey, Aoi! Isn't this your phone?"

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うん！　まちがい、ないの……」
Translation: "Yeah! No doubt about it, that's mine..."

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「エル、えらい」
Translation: "Good job, Eru."

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ありがと……なの……」
Translation: "Thank... you..."

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お、おいアオイ？」
Translation: "Wh-Whoa... Aoi?"

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ、大丈夫か？　顔色が……」
Translation: "Aoi, are you okay? You're white as a sheet!"

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だいじょうぶ……」
Translation: "Aoi's okay..."

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「これが、あれば」
Translation: "As long as... Aoi has this phone..."

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カミサマから、デンワ、くるの」
Translation: "Aoi can... get transmissions... from God."

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「キオク、なくならないの」
Translation: "Aoi won't... forget."

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「デンワ……つうじるの……」
Translation: "Now God will... come to the phone..."

Name: b5162.nss
Japanese: アオイは、神様に電話をかける。
Translation: She starts to place a call.

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: b5162.nss
Japanese: だが、神様が受信する気配はない。
Translation: But it doesn't seem like "God" is going to pick up.
KR: 하지만 신님은 전화받을 생각이 없어 보인다.

Name: b5162.nss
Japanese: アンテナは圏外のまま。
Translation: Her phone is still out of service.

Name: b5162.nss
Japanese: アオイの電波は、届かない。
Translation: Her signal won't go through.

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「つうじる……」
Translation: "Pick up..."

Name: b5162.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「つうじて……カミサマ……」
Translation: "Pick up the phone, God...!"

Name: b5162.nss
Japanese: 電話はなんとか見つかった。
Translation: I'm glad we found her phone.

Name: b5162.nss
Japanese: だが、昨日の帰り道でも話したとおり、神様に電波が届かなければ、意味がない。
Translation: But, as we discussed yesterday on the way home, it won't do her any good unless God answers her call.
KR: 하지만 어제 돌아오는 길에도 말했듯이, 신님에게 전파가 닿지 않으면 소용이 없다.

Name: b5162.nss
Japanese: 少なくとも、彼女はそう信じている。
Translation: At least, that's what she believes, anyway.

Name: b5162.nss
Japanese: どうすれば彼女の力になってやれるのか――
Translation: What can I do to help her?
KR: 어떻게 하면 아오이의 힘이 되어줄 수 있을까...

Name: b5162.nss
Japanese: どうすれば彼女を幸せにしてやれるのか――
Translation: How can I help her live happily ever after?
KR: 어떻게 하면 아오이를 행복하게 해줄 수 있을까...

Name: b5162.nss
Japanese: ――ん？　幸せに？
Translation: ...Wait... Happily ever after...?

Name: b5172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ、ところで――」
Translation: "By the way—"

Name: b5172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「このゲーム、何？」
Translation: "What game is this?"

Name: b5172.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Oh, uh..."

Name: b5172.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、机の上に手を伸ばす。
Translation: Miyuki reaches out and picks something up off my desk.

Name: b5172.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎から借りている、もうひとつのスマフォ。
Translation: It's the loaner phone I borrowed from Yuutarou.

Name: b5172.nss
Japanese: 画面には先ほどのゲーム画面が表示されたままだ。
Translation: The visual novel from earlier is still active onscreen.

Name: b5172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あれ？　このキャラ、アオイに似てない？」
Translation: "Wait... Doesn't this character kinda look like Aoi?"

Name: b5172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それに台詞も――」
Translation: "And her dialogue—"

Name: b5172.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だ、ダメだ！　返せ――」
Translation: "S-Stop! Give that back!"

Name: b5172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なに焦ってるの？」
Translation: "What are you so freaked out about?"

Name: b5172.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それ、借りたヤツなんだ！」
Translation: "Don't mess with it! It belongs to a friend of mine!"

Name: b5172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「まあ、返せって言うなら返すけど――」
Translation: "Well, fine. If you don't want me touching it, then you can have it back."

Name: b5172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あら」
Translation: "Whoops!"

Name: b5172.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きゃっ」
Translation: "Aaah!"

Name: b5172.nss
Japanese: 返そうとした拍子に、美雪の手からスマフォが落ちる。
Translation: Before she can hand it back, it slips out of her hand, slides across the floor, and disappears under the bed.
KR: 미유키가 돌려주려고 하는 순간, 핸드폰이 떨어졌다.

Name: b5172.nss
Japanese: コロコロ転がるその先、ベッドの下から、声が届く。
Translation: Aoi lets out a squeak in surprise.
KR: 데굴데굴 구르더니 침대 밑에서 목소리가 들렸다.

Name: b5172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あれ？　心一、今なにか言った？」
Translation: "That's strange. Did you say something just now?"

Name: b5172.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え？　べ、別になにも？　空耳じゃないかな！」
Translation: "Huh? N-No, why? Maybe you're hearing things?"
KR: "어? 아, 아무 말도? 잘못 들은 거 아니야?"

Name: b5172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「あはは、そうよね。
　この部屋には、アオイなんていないはずだもの」
Translation: "Hahaha! I guess I must be, seeing as Aoi DEFINITELY isn't here."
KR: "아하핫! 그렇겠지. 이 방에 아오이가 있을 리 없는걸."

Name: b5172.nss
Japanese: 弄ぶような口調で、美雪は落としたスマフォを拾うべく、ベッドの側に腰を屈める。
Translation: Her tone playful, Miyuki lowers herself to the floor to retrieve the phone.
KR: 장난치는 말투로 미유키는 떨어트린 핸드폰을 주우려 침대 아래로 허리를 굽혔다.

Name: b6142.nss
Japanese: 目蓋を閉じれば――
Translation: If I close my eyes, I can picture it...

Name: b6142.nss
Japanese: もう戻れない過去の光景が、目蓋に浮かぶ。
Translation: Memories of a friendship I can never get back.
KR: 다시는 돌아가지 못할 과거의 모습이 눈에 선하다.

Name: c2182.nss
Japanese: ワンオフらしく、表情が微妙に歪んだものが１匹、窓際にぽつんと置いてあった。
Translation: Apparently it's a one-of-a-kind handmade item. Its expression is twisted slightly.
KR: 직접 만든 것인지, 표정이 이상한 고양이 한 마리가 창가에 덩그러니 진열되어 있었다.

Name: c2193.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ダメ。シンイチの、プレゼントなの――」
Translation: "No. It's a gift from Shinichi!"

Name: c2193.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私は、後で私に似合うプレゼントを個別でもらう」
Translation: "I'll just have him get me something else later. Something that better suits me."
KR: "나는 나중에 어울리는 선물을 따로 받을 거야."

Name: c2193.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いいでしょ、心一？」
Translation: "You don't mind, right, Shinichi?"

Name: c2193.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ハァ……しょうがないな」
Translation: "Haah... I guess I don't have a choice, do I?"

Name: c2193.nss
Japanese: 果たしてそれがアオイを納得させるための方便なのか、それとも本気で美雪がプレゼントを要求するのか。
Translation: Does she actually want me to buy her something, or is she just saying that to get Aoi off her case?
KR: 과연 그것이 아오이를 납득시키기 위한 임시방편인지, 아니면 진짜로 선물을 달라는 건지...

Name: c2193.nss
Japanese: 後のことが、ちょっと怖い気もするが……
Translation: I'm not excited to find out...

Name: c2193.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ということで、はい」
Translation: "Now then, here you go."

Name: c2193.nss
Japanese: 美雪がアオイに、小包を突きつける。
Translation: Miyuki thrusts the parcel into Aoi's hands.

Name: c2193.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「……ほんとうに、いいの？」
Translation: "...Are you sure?"

Name: c2193.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いいってば」
Translation: "Extremely sure!"

Name: c2193.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺と美雪からのプレゼントだぞ」
Translation: "Think of it as a present from both of us."

Name: c2193.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「笑顔でつけてね」
Translation: "Try it on! Let's see that pretty smile."

Name: c2193.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: c2193.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「わかったの」
Translation: "Okay."

Name: c2193.nss
Japanese: アオイは静かに、小包を受け取った。
Translation: Aoi quietly accepts the gift.

Name: c3162.nss
Japanese: 受話器の向こうの美雪も、沈黙したまま。
Translation: Miyuki falls silent, too.

Name: c3162.nss
Japanese: 一言も、喋らない。
Translation: For a moment, neither of us say a word.

Name: c3162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なにか……心当たりは、ないのか？」
Translation: "Got any idea where she could be...?"

Name: c3162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 『わからないわよ』
Translation: "How would I know?"

Name: c3162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
『こんな雨の中、学校の屋上にいるわけないし。
　そもそも、学校には入れないはずだし』
Translation: "There's no way she's up on the school roof, not when it's pouring down rain outside. She shouldn't even be able to get through the gates."
KR: "이렇게 비 오는데 학교 옥상에 있을 리도 없고. 애초에 학교에는 들어갈 수 없을 테니까."

Name: c3162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「しらみつぶしに捜すしかない、か」
Translation: "Guess we'll just have to search everywhere."

Name: c3162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 『たぶんね』
Translation: "Probably."

Name: c3162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
『貴方はそこから南側をお願い。
　私は北側を捜してみるから』
Translation:
"You work your way south.
I'll head north."
KR: "너는 남쪽을 맡아줘. 나는 북쪽을 찾아볼 테니까."

Name: c3162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょうど、俺の家あたりで合流だな」
Translation: "In that case, we can meet up at my house."

Name: c3162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 『そうね、そうしましょう』
Translation: "Sure. Sounds like a plan."

Name: c3162.nss
Japanese: 俺は美雪と手分けして、夜の街を捜し回る。
Translation: And so Miyuki and I split up to search the dark city.
KR: 나와 미유키는 나뉘어 밤거리를 여기저기 찾아다녔다.

Name: c3162.nss
Japanese: この夜更けに、ペットを抱いて行ける場所。
Translation: Where could she possibly bring a small animal this late at night?
KR: 이런 한밤중에 애완동물을 데려갈 수 있는 곳.

Name: c3162.nss
Japanese: 考えてみるが、まったく想像がつかない。
Translation: I can't think of anything.

Name: c3162.nss
Japanese: 駅前――
Translation: The station square—

Name: c3162.nss
Japanese: 商店街――
Translation: The shopping district—

Name: c3162.nss
Japanese: 公園――
Translation: The park—

Name: c3162.nss
Japanese: 通学路――
Translation: The roads leading to the school—

Name: c3162.nss
Japanese: コンビニ――
Translation: The corner store—

Name: c3162.nss
Japanese: ファーストフード店――
Translation: Various fast food restaurants—

Name: c3162.nss
Japanese: 街中を、闇雲に捜し、捜し、捜し――
Translation: With no clues to go on, we search and search and search—
KR: 거리를 닥치는 대로 찾고, 찾고, 찾다가...

Name: c3162.nss
Japanese: １時間後。
Translation: An hour passes.

Name: c3162.nss
Japanese: 夢中で捜しているうちに、雨は止んでいた。
Translation: At some point during the hunt for Aoi, the rain lets up.
KR: 정신없이 찾고 있는 사이에 비가 그쳤다.

Name: c3162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「見つかったか？」
Translation: "Did you find her?"

Name: c3162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方も駄目だったの」
Translation: "I take it you didn't, then."

Name: c3162.nss
Japanese: 家の前で俺を待っていた美雪。
Translation: I find Miyuki waiting for me outside my house.

Name: c3162.nss
Japanese: 彼女の顔には、はっきりと諦めの色が浮かんでいた。
Translation: I can tell from the look on her face that she's given up entirely.

Name: c3162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「これ以上、捜しようがないわね」
Translation: "At this point, there's nothing else we can do."

Name: c3162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "But—"

Name: c3162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「きっと、保護者の家に帰ったのよ」
Translation: "She probably went home to her parents' house."

Name: c3162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「雨も止んだし、もう諦めましょう」
Translation: "Now that it's stopped raining, let's call it a night."

Name: c3162.nss
Japanese: "諦める","諦めない"
Translation: "Give up","Don't give up"

Name: c3163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アイツの性格だし、大人しく家に戻ったとは思えない」
Translation: "This is Aoi we're talking about. There's no chance in hell she went home to her parents' house."
KR: "아오이 성격상, 얌전히 집에 갔을 것 같지 않아."

Name: c3163.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「せめて捜すあてはあるの？
　これ以上街をさまよっても、時間の浪費だわ」
Translation: "Well, do you have an idea of where to look? We can wander aimlessly around town all we want, but it'll only be a waste of time."
KR: "하다못해 찾을 방법은 있어? 이 이상 거리를 돌아다녀도 시간 낭비야."

Name: c3163.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「大人しく、諦めた方がいいわよ」
Translation: "We should just call it quits."

Name: c3163.nss
Japanese: "諦める","諦めない"
Translation: "Give up","Don't give up"

Name: c3164.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイの手掛かり、なにかあった気がするんだ」
Translation: "I feel like there's gotta be some clue..."
KR: "아오이를 찾을 단서... 뭔가 있었던 것 같은데..."

Name: c3164.nss
Japanese: なんとなく、そんな気が……
Translation: It's just a feeling I have in my gut...

Name: c3164.nss
Japanese: するような……しないような……
Translation: There's gotta be something... right...?
KR: 드는 것 같기도 하고, 아닌 것 같기도 하고...

Name: c3164.nss
Japanese: うー、ダメだ！
Translation: Nrrggh... It's no use...!

Name: c3164.nss
Japanese: 喉のここまで出かかっているのに。
Translation: I can feel it right on the tip of my tongue, too!

Name: c3164.nss
Japanese: ええと、確か手掛かりは……
Translation: Okay, think! Where could I look for clues?

Name: c3164.nss
Japanese: "スマフォのゲーム","校門の通用口"
Translation: "The mobile game","The school pedestrian gate"

Name: c3165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あのスマフォのゲームだ！」
Translation: "The mobile game!"

Name: c3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あのって……どのゲーム？」
Translation: "What? ...What mobile game?"

Name: c3165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「雄太郎から借りたんだけど、アオイそっくりのキャラクターが出て来るゲームがあるんだ！」
Translation: "There's this game I borrowed from Yuutarou. It's got a character that's dead-on EXACTLY like Aoi!"
KR: "유우타로에게 빌린 건데, 아오이랑 꼭 닮은 캐릭터가 나오는 게임이 있어!"

Name: c3165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「見かけだけじゃなくて、行動も瓜二つで。
　屋上のことも、ほとんどゲームと一緒――！」
Translation: "Not just looks-wise, either. They act identical, too! That day we met her on the roof? Almost the same exact thing happened in this one scene—"
KR: "겉모습만이 아니라, 행동도 판박이야. 옥상에서 있던 일도 그 게임이랑 거의 똑같아!"

Name: c3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Haah..."

Name: c3165.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、呆れ果てた顔で溜息をついた。
Translation: Miyuki sighs, exasperated.

Name: c3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方まで現実とゲームの区別がつかなくなった？」
Translation: "Now YOU'RE mixing up games with reality?"
KR: "너까지 현실과 게임을 구별할 수 없게 됐어?"

Name: c3165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「だから、アオイがゲームを真似してるんだよ！
　猫を拾ったときの台詞もそっくり――！」
Translation: "No, listen to me! Aoi's acting out scenes from the game! When she found that stray kitten, everything she said was like a 1:1 reproduction of—"
KR: "아니, 아오이가 게임을 따라 하고 있다니까! 고양이를 주울 때 했던 대사도 똑같고..."

Name: c3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「捨て猫はどうしたの？
　わざわざ、保健所からでももらってきた？」
Translation:
"How'd she get the cat, then?
Did she go out of her way to get one from a shelter?"
KR: "버려진 고양이는 어떻게 된 건데? 일부러 보건소에서 데려왔어?"

Name: c3165.nss
Japanese: ゲームのシチュエーションを再現するために、わざわざ捨て猫を用意した……？
Translation: Would she really go to all that trouble just to recreate a scene out of the game...?
KR: 게임 상황을 재현하려고 일부러 버려진 고양이를 준비했다...?

Name: c3165.nss
Japanese: アオイがそんな手の込んだ事をする意味がわからない。
Translation: I can't see any reason for her to put that much effort into it...
KR: 아오이가 그렇게 손이 가는 일을 할까...?

Name: c3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「単なる偶然よ」
Translation: "It's all just a coincidence."

Name: c3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それ以外に、何か考えられる？」
Translation: "What else could it possibly be?"

Name: c3165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え、いや……その……えっと……」
Translation: "Huh? Well... uh... er..."

Name: c3165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「神様のイタズラ、とか？」
Translation: "A divine miracle, maybe?"

Name: c3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一！」
Translation: "Shinichi!"

Name: c3165.nss
Japanese: 美雪は俺の目を覚まさせるように、大声で言う。
Translation: Miyuki raises her voice.
KR: 미유키는 정신 차리라는 듯 큰 목소리로 말했다.

Name: c3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「焦る気持ちはわかるけど、冷静になって」
Translation: "I understand you're worked up right now, but use your head!"

Name: c3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「この世界に、神様なんていない。そうでしょう？」
Translation: "God isn't real. You do know that, don't you?"
KR: "이 세상에 신님 같은 건 없어. 그렇지?"

Name: c3165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ……ああ」
Translation: "Oh... Right..."

Name: c3165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そう……だよな」
Translation: "Of course..."

Name: c3165.nss
Japanese: 俺は、冷静なつもりでいたのだが。
Translation: I WAS trying to use my head...

Name: c3165.nss
Japanese: 結局、ゲームと現実を混同していたのかもしれない。
Translation: Guess I ended up babbling like a crazy person.
KR: 결국, 게임과 현실을 혼동하고 있었는지도 모른다.

Name: c3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「疲れてるのよ。
　今日はもう、家で休みなさい」
Translation:
"You're exhausted.
Now go home and get some rest."

Name: c3166.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それじゃあ、また明日学校で」
Translation: "See you tomorrow at school."

Name: c3166.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、また明日」
Translation: "Right. See you tomorrow."

Name: c3166.nss
Japanese: 俺は、美雪と別れて家へ入る。
Translation: I head inside my house.

Name: c3166.nss
Japanese: 長い１日だった。
Translation: What a long day...

Name: c3166.nss
Japanese: 結局、アオイが今どこでどうしているかはわからない。
Translation: In the end, I still have no idea where Aoi is or what she's doing.
KR: 결국 아오이가 지금 어디서 뭘하는 지는 알 수 없었다.

Name: c3166.nss
Japanese: そもそも、彼女が猫を確保しにマンガ喫茶を飛び出したと言うことすら、憶測にしか過ぎないのだ。
Translation: In fact, I don't even have concrete proof that she left the manga cafe to rescue the cat.
KR: 애초에 아오이가 고양이를 데리러 만화방에서 뛰쳐나왔다는 것조차 억측에 지나지 않는다.

Name: c3166.nss
Japanese: 明日、本人に訊くしかないだろう。
Translation: All I can do is ask her tomorrow when I see her at school.

Name: c3166.nss
Japanese: 俺はベッドの中で、静かに目蓋を閉じた――
Translation: I crawl into bed and quietly close my eyes—
KR: 나는 침대에 누워 조용히 눈을 감았다...

Name: c3171.nss
Japanese: ――眠れない。
Translation: —but I can't sleep.

Name: c3171.nss
Japanese: どうしても、気になる。
Translation: My brain won't stop thinking about it.

Name: c3171.nss
Japanese: 枕元には、借りっぱなしのスマフォ。
Translation: The loaner phone sits on charge by my pillow.

Name: c3171.nss
Japanese: 授業中プレイして以来、先に進めていない。
Translation: I haven't played it since that one day during class...
KR: 수업 중에 플레이한 이후로 더 진행하지 않았다.

Name: c3171.nss
Japanese: もし、あの続きをプレイしたなら、何かアオイの手掛かりが掴めるんじゃないか？
Translation: Maybe I'd learn something useful about Aoi if I made some progress in the game...?
KR: 혹시 게임을 계속해보면 아오이에 대한 단서를 찾을 수 있지 않을까?

Name: c3171.nss
Japanese: "あのゲームをプレイする","無理矢理眠る"
Translation: "Play the game","Force myself to fall asleep"

Name: c3172.nss
Japanese: 現実とゲームの区別がつかなくなっている――
Translation: Maybe Miyuki has a point.
KR: 현실과 게임을 구별하지 못하고 있다는 미유키의 지적은 옳고,

Name: c3172.nss
Japanese: 美雪の指摘がもっともで、わざわざアオイが捨て猫を用意したはずがないことは、俺もわかる。
Translation: Maybe I'm just conflating video games with reality. I mean, there's no way Aoi went out of her way to procure a cat for this.
KR: 아오이가 일부러 버려진 고양이를 준비하지 않았을 거란 것은 나도 알고 있다.

Name: c3172.nss
Japanese: でも、雨露に濡れる彼女の姿が、脳裏から離れない。
Translation: But I keep thinking back to that day I saw her standing out in the rain...
KR: 하지만 비에 젖은 아오이의 모습이 머리에서 떠나지 않는다.

Name: c3172.nss
Japanese: 子猫を抱きながら、深夜の街を行くあてもなくさまようアオイの影。
Translation: I can picture her wandering aimlessly down the darkened streets, kitten in tow...
KR: 새끼 고양이를 안고 갈 곳도 없이 거리를 헤매는 아오이의 모습...

Name: c3172.nss
Japanese: 理屈がどうだろうと、知ったことか。
Translation: Fuck it.

Name: c3172.nss
Japanese: ゲーム脳と罵られようと、構わない。
Translation: Call it a bad case of gamer brain. I don't give a shit.

Name: c3172.nss
Japanese: この不安が晴れる可能性があるならば――
Translation: At this point, I'll do anything to clear up these lingering doubts.

Name: c3172.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「よし！」
Translation: "Let's do this."

Name: c3172.nss
Japanese: 俺はフトンから飛び起きて、スマフォを手に取った。
Translation: I jump out of bed and grab the loaner phone.

Name: c3181.nss
Translation: —Twenty minutes later...

Name: c3181.nss
Japanese: 俺は、校門の前に立っていた。
Translation: I'm standing in front of the school gates.

Name: c3181.nss
Japanese: 正門はがっちりと閉ざされ、通用口にも南京錠がかけられている。
Translation: They're completely locked up tight; there's even a padlock on the pedestrian gate.

Name: c3181.nss
Japanese: 他に、侵入できるような場所はない。
Translation: There's no other way to sneak in.
KR: 달리 침입할 수 있을만한 곳은 없다.

Name: c3181.nss
Japanese: あのゲームが正しければ、アオイはここにいるはずだ。
Translation: But if that game is true to life, then Aoi is definitely in there.
KR: 그 게임대로라면 아오이는 여기 있을 거야.

Name: c3181.nss
Japanese: 引き返す最後のチャンス。
Translation: This is my last chance to turn back.

Name: c3181.nss
Japanese: 俺は、扉の前でひとつ息をつく。
Translation: I pause at the entrance to take a deep breath.
KR: 나는 문 앞에 서서 숨을 깊게 들이마셨다.

Name: c3181.nss
Japanese: "校舎に侵入する","諦めて帰る"
Translation: "Sneak into the school","Give up and go home"

Name: c3182.nss
Japanese: 校門に、手をかけた。
Translation: I put my hands on the bars of the school gates.

Name: c3182.nss
Japanese: 雨露に濡れた鉄の扉は、思ったよりもずっと冷たい。
Translation: The metal is wet from the rain and quite a bit colder than I was expecting.
KR: 비에 젖은 철문은 생각보다 훨씬 차가웠다.

Name: c3182.nss
Japanese: 夜の校庭に大きな音が響き渡る。
Translation: The loud rattling echoes through the moonlit campus.
KR: 한밤중 학교에 큰 소리가 울려 퍼졌다.

Name: c3182.nss
Japanese: だが、構うもんか。
Translation: But I don't care.

Name: c3182.nss
Japanese: 俺は身体を持ち上げると、一気に校門を乗り越えた。
Translation: I haul myself up and jump over in one fluid motion.
KR: 나는 몸을 들어 올려 단숨에 교문을 뛰어넘었다.

Name: c3182.nss
Japanese: ひとりで訪れる、夜の学校。
Translation: Here I am, alone on school grounds in the middle of the night.

Name: c3182.nss
Japanese: 正直言って不気味だ。
Translation: It's a little eerie, to tell the truth.

Name: c3182.nss
Japanese: 普段ならば、逃げ出したくなるだろう。
Translation: In any other situation, I'd probably turn around and run home with my tail between my legs.

Name: c3182.nss
Japanese: だが俺の身体は、不思議な高揚感に包まれていた。
Translation: And yet, strangely enough, I find myself in high spirits.
KR: 하지만 내 몸에는 이상한 고양감이 넘쳐 흘렀다.

Name: c3182.nss
Japanese: 靴箱の蓋を開くと、その奥は暗闇に続いている。
Translation: At night, the inside of my shoe locker extends in an endless tunnel of darkness.
KR: 신발장을 열자 그 안은 어둠으로 가득 차 있었다.

Name: c3182.nss
Japanese: 内履きを床に置くだけで、校舎中にエコーが響く。
Translation: As I change into my indoor shoes, the slightest clack of my soles on the linoleum seems to reverberate like a gunshot.
KR: 실내화를 내려놓는 소리조차 온 교실에 울려 퍼진다.

Name: c3182.nss
Japanese: ただ時間が夜に入れ替わっただけなのに、日常の光景が一転して、見たこともない異世界になる。
Translation: It's kind of incredible how a few hours' difference can turn a familiar location into an entirely different world...
KR: 그저 시간이 바뀌었을 뿐인데, 평소의 모습과 대비되어 전혀 다른 세계로 보인다.

Name: c3182.nss
Japanese: この夜の校舎の向こう側に、アオイがいる。
Translation: Aoi is here somewhere, lurking in the dark.

Name: c3182.nss
Japanese: 俺には、不思議と確信があった。
Translation: I'm strangely confident about this.

Name: c3182.nss
Japanese: 足音が鳴らないよう、慎重に廊下へ踏み出して――
Translation: I sneak down the halls, careful not to make a sound.
KR: 발소리가 나지 않도록 조심스럽게 복도를 걷다가...

Name: c3182.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「やっぱり……」
Translation: "Bingo..."

Name: c3182.nss
Japanese: 俺は、床に水滴が零れているのを見つける。
Translation: There are puddles of rainwater on the floor.
KR: 바닥에 물방울이 떨어져 있는 걸 발견했다.

Name: c3182.nss
Japanese: 明らかに、雨が降ってからのもの。
KR: 분명하게 비가 내린 뒤에 묻은 것.

Name: c3182.nss
Japanese: そして、水滴が向かう先は……
Translation: And these puddles form a trail...

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ！　どこだ！？」
Translation: "Aoi! Where are you?!"

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: 呼びかけが、ゆっくりと反響して消えていく。
Translation: My voice echoes and fades into the darkness.

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: 真っ暗な体育館。
Translation: The gym is pitch black.

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: 普段なら、誰もいるはずのない時間だ。
Translation: Normally there wouldn't be a soul here at this hour.

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ？　いるんだろ？」
Translation: "Aoi! I know you're in here!"

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「しずかに」
Translation: "Quiet!"

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "I heard that!"

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: 間違いない、アオイの声だ。
Translation: That was Aoi's voice just now, I'm sure of it!

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なあ、返事してくれよ！」
Translation: "C'mon, answer me!"

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: アオイの代わりに、子猫が返答をする。
Translation: The kitten meows back in Aoi's stead.

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: 声に導かれるように、俺はステージへと近づいた。
Translation: I follow the sound to the stage area.
KR: 그 소리를 따라 무대 쪽으로 향했다.

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ」
Translation: "Aoi."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、なんだその格好？」
Translation: "Gimme a break. What are you doing in that stupid onesie?"

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「猫を拾ったからって、着ぐるみまで――？」
Translation: "Did you really feel the need to put it on just because you rescued a kitten?"

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「雨に濡れたな？
　また傘、持ってないだろ？」
Translation:
"You got caught out in the rain, didn't you?
Did you forget to bring your umbrella? Again?"

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ほら、風邪引くと悪いから――」
Translation: "Look, we can't have you getting sick—"

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: アオイは、黙り込んだまま。
Translation: Aoi doesn't say a word.

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: 全く反応しない。
Translation: She refuses to respond.

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: 俺は、彼女の腕に手を伸ばす。
Translation: I reach out to take her hand.

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「とにかく俺の家に――」
Translation: "Let's just go back to my place and—"

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だめなの」
Translation: "No."

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: 指が、振り払われた。
Translation: She slaps my hand away, outright rejecting my help.

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: はっきりとした、拒絶の意志。

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: でも、ここまで来て手ぶらで帰るわけにはいかない。
Translation: But I refuse to go home empty-handed.
KR: 하지만 여기까지 와서 빈손으로 돌아갈 순 없다.

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ほら、こいつも寒そうだぞ」
Translation: "Don't be like that. The little thing's probably freezing."

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: 同意するように、黒猫が鳴く。
Translation: The kitten meows, as if in agreement.

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「エルは……つれていって」
Translation: "Go ahead... Take Eru, then."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、きえるの」
Translation: "Aoi's going to disappear."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What...?"

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「イミ、ないから」
Translation: "My existence has no purpose."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「は？　何言って――」
Translation: "What? Don't be stup—"

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、シンイチと、ミユキ、こいびとにする」
Translation: "Aoi wants you and Miyuki to get together."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そのために、トモダチになったの」
Translation: "That's why Aoi made friends with you."

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: 確かに最初は、そう言っていた。
Translation: Yeah, she told me as much from the start.

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: でももう、俺たちはそんな関係じゃない。
Translation: But that doesn't matter now.
KR: 하지만 우린 이제 그런 관계가 아니잖아?

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイはヤクソクやぶったの」
Translation: "Aoi broke the promise."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ネコ、ひろったら、ミユキ、ゼッコウっていったの」
Translation: "Miyuki said she would cut ties if Aoi rescued the cat."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でも、お前がやったことは正しい――」
Translation: "So? I think you did the right thing—"

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カンケイないの」
Translation: "That's not important."

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: 掠れたアオイの言葉が、どんな大きな声よりも、俺の心に刺さった。
Translation: Aoi's feeble whisper stabs into my heart, sharper than any scream.
KR: 아오이의 쉰 목소리가 그 어떤 것보다 내 마음에 꽂혔다.

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「トモダチのシカク、なくて」
Translation: "Aoi has no right to be Miyuki's friend anymore."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「コイビトに、できなくて」
Translation: "And Aoi can't be a romance option."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「イミ、ないの」
Translation: "So now Aoi's life has no purpose."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「……バイバイなの」
Translation: "...Bye-bye."

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: アオイがこちらに背を向ける。
Translation: Aoi turns her back to me.

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: 小柄な影が遠ざかる。
Translation: Her small frame fades into the shadows.

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: 足音が、残響と共に消えていく。
Translation: The echo of her footsteps grows faint.

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: そのままステージの闇に溶けていく。
Translation: Then she vanishes into the backstage area.

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: ――本当に、それでいいのか？
Translation: —Is this really for the best?

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ！」
Translation: "Aoi!"

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: 気付けば俺は、走り出していた。
Translation: Before I know it, I find myself running after her.

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: 飛びついて、彼女の手を引っぱる。
Translation: I lunge forward and grab her hand.

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「待てよ！」
Translation: "Wait!"

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いや」
Translation: "No!"

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ！」
Translation: "Aoi!"

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: 逃げようとするアオイに、回り込んだ。
Translation: Aoi tries to get away, but I block her path.

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: アオイの目が、今にもこぼれ落ちそうなほど潤んでいる。
Translation: Her eyes are swimming with tears.
KR: 아오이는 금방이라도 울 것 같은 모습이었다.

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: それはやっぱり、悲しい涙だ。
Translation: Tears of sadness...

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: だから――

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「意味、あるよ」
Translation: "Your life DOES have a purpose!"

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ない」
Translation: "No it doesn't."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だって、アオイはデンパで、だから――」
Translation: "Aoi's just a transceiver... a weirdo..."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「最初は変なヤツだと思った」
Translation: "I mean, yes, I admit, I did think you were weird at first."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ひとりぼっちで、突拍子もなくて、突然脅迫したり」
Translation: "Completely unpredictable, always alone... and then you randomly tried to blackmail us."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でも、だんだん目が離せなくなって」
Translation: "But as time passed, I started to worry about you."
KR: "하지만 점점 눈을 뗄 수 없게 되고."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「一緒にいることが、楽しくなって」
Translation: "And I started to enjoy having you around."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それはサッカク」
Translation: "You're just confused."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「違う！」
Translation: "No, I'm not!"

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、何にも取り柄がなくて、目立つのが嫌で、平穏無事な毎日が好きだった」
Translation: "Look at me. I've got absolutely nothing going for me. I hate being in the spotlight. My life is boring and uneventful, and I prefer to keep it that way."
KR: "나는 아무런 장점도 없고, 눈에 띄기도 싫어서 조용히 지내는 날들이 좋았어."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それなのに、学校に不法侵入してる」
Translation: "And yet here I am, trespassing on school grounds at night."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前を、見つけるために」
Translation: "All for the sake of tracking you down."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも……ミユキは……」
Translation: "But... Miyuki..."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ミユキは、どうでもいい！」
Translation: "Miyuki doesn't matter right now!"

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺は、お前の友達だ」
Translation: "I'm your friend, remember?"

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Fri...end...?"

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: 堪えきれず、アオイの瞳から、涙が零れる。
Translation: The dam bursts, and tears roll down her cheeks.
KR: 참지 못하고 아오이의 눈에서 눈물이 흘러내린다.

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「トモダチで……いいの？」
Translation: "Is that... allowed?"

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「ミユキとゼッコウされても。
　アオイと、トモダチで、いいの？」
Translation:
"Are you sure you want to be my friend?
Even if Miyuki cuts ties with me?"

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「絶交なんて、俺がさせない」
Translation: "I won't LET her cut ties with you."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「３人は、ずっと、友達だ」
Translation: "The three of us will be friends forever."

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチッ！！」
Translation: "Shinichi!!!"

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: アオイが勢いよく、俺に抱きつく。
Translation: Aoi jumps into my arms.

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ひぐっ、うっ、うぐっ、うう……！！」
Translation: "Hnn... nnn... nnngh... waaahh...!"

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あっ、あ……ありがとう……なのっ！」
Translation: "Th... Th... Thank you... so much...!"

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「アオイ……アオイも……
　シンイチと……いっしょにいたいの……っ！」
Translation:
"Shinichi... Aoi...
Aoi wants to... stay with you too...!"

Name: c3191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いっしょに……ともだちが……いいの……！」
Translation: "Aoi just wants to... stay friends with you...!"

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: 顔をなすりつけて、泣きじゃくるアオイ。
Translation: She buries her face in my chest and begins to sob.

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: 俺はそっと、彼女の頭を撫でてやる。
Translation: I gently stroke her hair.

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: まだまだ、全然不器用だけど。
Translation: We're both so bad at this "friendship" thing.

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: こうやって少しずつ、友達の意味を覚えていけばいい。
Translation: But we can just figure things out as we go along.
KR: 이렇게 조금씩 친구의 의미를 기억하면 돼.

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: そんな風に、思う。
Translation: I'm sure of it.

Name: c3191.nss
Japanese: 俺たちを祝福するように、傍らで子猫が鳴いた。
Translation: Meanwhile, the kitten meows at us like he's cheering us on.
KR: 우리를 축복하듯 옆에서 새끼 고양이가 울었다.

Name: c3192.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「よし、じゃあ俺が担ぐから――」
Translation: "Okay, now you get on my shoulders, and—"

Name: c3192.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる……カギ、しまってるの？」
Translation: "Boop boop...? Is it locked?"

Name: c3192.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「夜だし、普通だろ？」
Translation: "Of course it's locked. It's nighttime."

Name: c3192.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はいるとき、アオイがあけたの」
Translation: "But Aoi unlocked it earlier."

Name: c3192.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前が開けられるわけ――」
Translation: "What? There's no way you could unlock—"

Name: c3192.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あいたの」
Translation: "There."

Name: c3192.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...What?"

Name: c3192.nss
Japanese: アオイの言ったとおり、南京錠が開いていた。
Translation: Sure enough, the padlock pops open.

Name: c3192.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「これ、ぐあいいいの」
Translation: "This thing comes in handy."

Name: c3192.nss
Japanese: アオイが見せたのは、俺がプレゼントしたヘアピン。
Translation: She holds up the kitty hairpin I gave her.
KR: 아오이가 보인 것은 내가 선물한 헤어핀.

Name: c3192.nss
Japanese: 肌身離さず大事にすると言われてはいたが、まさか鍵開けに使われているとは……
Translation: When she told me she'd carry it around in her pocket for safekeeping, I didn't think she was going to use it for something like THIS!
KR: 항상 지니고 다니며 소중히 한다고는 했지만, 설마 자물쇠 푸는 데 쓰고 있을 줄은...

Name: c3192.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もしかして、屋上の鍵もそれで？」
Translation: "Is that how you unlock the roof door, too?"

Name: c3192.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そうなの」
Translation: "Yup."

Name: c3192.nss
Japanese: アオイに悪気が皆無なのが、かえって怖かったりする。
Translation: Her childlike innocence actually makes that kind of terrifying.
KR: 아무런 악의가 없는 게 오히려 무서웠다.

Name: c3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん？　どうした？」
Translation: "Hmm? What's up, furball?"

Name: c3201.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はらぺこなの？」
Translation: "You hungry?"

Name: c3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「やっぱり子猫だし、ミルクか……？」
Translation: "It IS still a kitten, after all... Should we get it some milk?"

Name: c3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でも、店はだいたい閉まってるな」
Translation: "But all the stores are probably closed by now..."

Name: c3201.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「コンビニで、ミルク？」
Translation: "Maybe the corner store?"

Name: c3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「あれ、でも……
　子猫って、人間と同じミルクで大丈夫なんだっけ？」
Translation: "Wait... Are kittens even allowed to drink the same milk as humans?"
KR: "아니 잠깐... 고양이가 사람이 마시는 우유를 먹어도 괜찮은 건가?"

Name: c3201.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる……わかんないの」
Translation: "Boop boop... Not sure."

Name: c3201.nss
Japanese: でもまあ、いずれは何か食べ物が必要なわけで。
Translation: Either way, the little thing's gonna need some kind of food sooner or later.
KR: 하지만 어찌 됐든 먹일 것이 필요하다.

Name: c3201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「とりあえず、コンビニに行ってみるか」
Translation: "Hmm... Corner store it is."

Name: c3211.nss
Japanese: 俺は店に入るなり、レジを見る。
Translation: As soon as I walk in, I look over at the counter.

Name: c3211.nss
Japanese: だが、そこに立っていたのは雄太郎ではなかった。
Translation: Someone's working the register, but it's not Yuutarou.
KR: 하지만 거기에 있는 건 유우타로가 아니었다.

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「い、いらっしゃいま――」
Translation: "W-Welco—"

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「きゃあああああっ！！」
Translation: "AAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHH!!!"

Name: c3211.nss
Japanese: 悲鳴を上げて、レジの向こうに隠れようとする。
Translation: She lets out a shriek and tries to hide behind the counter.
KR: 비명을 지르며 계산대 밑으로 숨으려 했다.

Name: c3211.nss
Japanese: 後ろのタバコ陳列棚にぶつかる。
Translation: Then she hits the shelves of cigarette boxes behind her.

Name: c3211.nss
Japanese: タバコ、雪崩となって崩れる。
Translation: The boxes tumble over her in an avalanche, burying her.

Name: c3211.nss
Japanese: 埋もれる。

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うちきっコなの？」
Translation: "Is that the klutz?"

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「演劇部の……だな」
Translation: "Yeah... The one from the theatre club."

Name: c3211.nss
Japanese: この反応は、見間違いようがなかった。
Translation: No chance I'd mistake that bloodcurdling scream.

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あの……大丈夫かな？」
Translation: "Um... Are you okay back there?"

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese:
「は……はい、なんとか……
　いたたたた……」
Translation:
"Y-Yeah... I'm fine...
Owww..."

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「タバコ直すの手伝う――」
Translation: "I can help you put the cigarettes back—"

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese:
「いえ、結構です！　大丈夫です！
　気にしないで下さい！」
Translation:
"No thank you! I can handle it!
Don't worry about it!"

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「こういうの、慣れてますんで」
Translation: "I'm used to it by now, anyway."

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ラッキースケベ？　パンツみえたの？」
Translation:
"Did you catch a glimpse of something naughty?
Her panties, maybe?"

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「えっ？　いやっ！　そんなっ！！　うそ――」
Translation: "What? Oh my god! Shut up! No way—!"

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「見えてない」
Translation: "I saw nothing."

Name: c3211.nss
Japanese: そもそもはいてるのズボンだし。
Translation: She's wearing pants, genius!

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そんなことより猫だろ？」
Translation: "Anyway, we need to prioritize the kitten here."

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そうなの」
Translation: "Good point."

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Oh, wait—!"

Name: c3211.nss
Japanese: 呼び止めたが、遅かった。
Translation: I try to stop her, but it's too late.

Name: c3211.nss
Japanese: アオイのポケットから取り出されたエルが、カウンターの上に飛び上がる。
Translation: Aoi pulls Eru out of her pocket, and it jumps up onto a shelf over the counter.
KR: 아오이의 품속에서 나온 에루가 카운터 위로 점프했다.

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「きゃっ！　先輩、だめっ！」
Translation: "AAAH! Senpai, no!"

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「このお店は、ペット入店禁止ですよぉっ！！」
Translation: "Our store doesn't allow pets!!!"

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「ああっ！　ネコちゃん、早くこっちに――！」
Translation: "Aaagghh! Get down from there, kitty—!"

Name: c3211.nss
Japanese: エルはまだ小さくて、決して動きが俊敏とは言えない。
Translation: The kitten's still a bit clumsy in its movements—
KR: 에루는 아직 어려서 움직임이 빠르지 않다.

Name: c3211.nss
Japanese: ――はずなのだが、彼女も負けず劣らず鈍くさい。
Translation: —and yet this theatre girl is somehow even worse.

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「もしこんなのが店長に見つかったら――ひゃっ！」
Translation: "If they found out I let you in the store—AAAHH!"

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「お給料、下げられ――ちゃう――きゃあああああ！！」
Translation: "They're gonna—lower my wages—AAAAAAAHHH!!!"

Name: c3211.nss
Japanese: 棚に潜ったエルを引っ張り出そうとして、転ぶ。
Translation: She tries to pull a shelf forward to reach the kitten, and it promptly collapses.

Name: c3211.nss
Japanese: 衝撃で、再び頭上から大量の煙草ケースが降り注いだ。
Translation: Once again, she's buried in a mountain of cigarette boxes.
KR: 또다시 머리 위로 담뱃갑이 우수수 떨어졌다.

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ドジっコもえなの？」
Translation: "Are you a fan of the clumsy type?"

Name: c3211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いいから、早く掘り出すぞ」
Translation: "Just shut up and help me dig her out of there."

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ハルちゃんがいて、たすかったの」
Translation: "Good thing Haru-chan was there to help us."

Name: c3212.nss
Japanese: あの後俺たちは、惨状となった煙草周りの品物を整頓。
Translation: After we dug her out, we helped her put the cigarettes back in place.
KR: 그 후, 우리는 엉망이 된 담배 진열대를 정리했다.

Name: c3212.nss
Japanese: そのお礼に、演劇部の内気＆ドジっ娘ハルちゃんから、子猫の飼い方をみっちり教わることができた。
Translation: As a token of thanks, shy and clumsy Haru taught us everything she knows about how to take care of a kitten.
KR: 답례로, 연극부의 내성적인 덜렁녀 하루에게 새끼 고양이 기르는 방법을 제대로 배우게 됐다.

Name: c3212.nss
Japanese: 今与えているのも、彼女から聞いた「低温殺菌牛乳」だ。
Translation: Now we're feeding Eru pasteurized milk that Haru picked out for us.
KR: 지금 에루에게 먹이고 있는 것도 하루가 가르쳐 준 '저온 살균 우유'다.

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今日、さ」
Translation: "Do you wanna maybe..."

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「泊まってくか？」
Translation: "...crash here tonight?"

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?"

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「遅いし、具合悪そうだし、マンガ喫茶じゃ休めないし」
Translation: "It's pretty late, and I know you aren't feeling well. And sleeping at a manga cafe doesn't sound conducive to proper rest."
KR: "벌써 늦었고 몸 상태도 안 좋잖아. 만화방에선 편히 못 쉴 것 같은데."

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも、それはキケンなフラグ……」
Translation: "But... that would trigger a risky event flag..."

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「フラグ？」
Translation: "What's an event flag...?"

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "......Boop boop."

Name: c3212.nss
Japanese: そのまま言葉を呑み込んで、アオイはエルを見る。
Translation: Aoi falls silent and gazes at Eru.

Name: c3212.nss
Japanese: ピチャピチャとミルクを舐めるエルを見つめているうちに、ふたりの表情は自然と緩む。
Translation: The kitten laps up the milk with his tiny tongue. Before we know it, we're both smiling.
KR: 할짝할짝 우유을 핥는 에루를 바라보니 우리 두 사람의 표정은 자연스레 풀어졌다..

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「幸せそうだな」
Translation: "The little furball looks pretty happy."

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セーエキ、なめるみたいなの」
Translation: "The milk looks like semen."

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょ！　お前、そういうことは人前で言わない！」
Translation: "Whoa! Jeez! Don't talk like that!"
KR: "잠깐, 너 그런 소리 사람들 앞에서 하지마?"

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どうしてなの？」
Translation: "Why not?"

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どうしても！」
Translation: "Because I said so!"

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる……わかったの」
Translation: "Boop boop... Okay."

Name: c3212.nss
Japanese: アオイが黙り込んだまま、俺の方をじっと見る。
Translation: Aoi falls silent and stares at me.
KR: 아오이는 입을 다문 채 날 물끄러미 바라보았다.

Name: c3212.nss
Japanese: いや、俺の方というか……
Translation: No, not at me...

Name: c3212.nss
Japanese: むしろ、俺の股間？
Translation: At my crotch...?!

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチの、なめたいの」
Translation: "Aoi wouldn't mind drinking yours."

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ぶはっ！」
Translation: "Pfffff?!"

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、アオイ！　お前やっぱりおかしい――」
Translation: "Cut it out, Aoi! You're acting weird—!"

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「へんなの」
Translation: "Yeah, it IS weird."

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチってなまえをよぶと」
Translation: "Whenever Aoi calls your name..."

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「むねが、つまるの」
Translation: "...my chest gets all tight..."

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あたまが、ぽーっとするの」
Translation: "...and my head goes fuzzy."

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「これ、なんなの？」
Translation: "What's wrong with me?"

Name: c3212.nss
Japanese: 身を乗り出すように、アオイが近づく。
Translation: Aoi leans in closer to me.

Name: c3212.nss
Japanese: ほんのり、頬が赤らんでいる。
Translation: Her cheeks are faintly pink.

Name: c3212.nss
Japanese: 瞳が、俺の意識を掴んで離そうとしない。
Translation: My eyes are locked on hers.

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「き、きっと風邪、ひいたんだろ？」
Translation: "Sounds like y-you probably have a cold or something."

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そんなイベントＣＧ、ないの」
Translation: "Nope. There's no CG of that."

Name: c3212.nss
Japanese: アオイの手のひらが、彼女の胸に当てられる。
Translation: She puts a hand to her chest.

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイのココ……」
Translation: "Aoi feels so zappy..."

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ビリビリ、するの」
Translation: "Right around here."

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「チューして、いい？」
Translation: "Can Aoi kiss you?"

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、待て――」
Translation: "Whoa, hold on—!"

Name: c3212.nss
Japanese: 俺は咄嗟に、彼女の手を押し戻す。
Translation: I quickly push her hand away.

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる？」
Translation: "Boop boop?"

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どうして、だめなの？」
Translation: "Why not?"

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どうしてって、そりゃ――」
Translation: "Well... because..."

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どうしてもだよ」
Translation: "Because I said so."

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチも、へんなの？」
Translation: "Are you feeling weird, too?"

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、寝るから！」
Translation: "I'm... I'm going to bed!"

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「お前もホラ、そこに毛布出しておいたから！
　あとはなんとかなるだろ？」
Translation: "I've got a blanket laid out for you already, so you should be all set."

Name: c3212.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「じゃあな！」
Translation: "Good night!"

Name: c3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はぁ、はぁ、はぁ……」
Translation: "Haah... haah... haah..."

Name: c3221.nss
Japanese: 息が苦しい。
Translation: I can't breathe.

Name: c3221.nss
Japanese: 胸が激しく鼓動を打つ。
Translation: My heart's thumping like crazy.

Name: c3221.nss
Japanese: これはきっと、一気に階段を駆け上がったからで。
Translation: ...It's probably just from bolting up the stairs.

Name: c3221.nss
Japanese: 俺たちは、友達で。
Translation: We're just friends...

Name: c3221.nss
Japanese: 多分、そのはずで。
Translation: ...at least, I think so...

Name: c3221.nss
Japanese: そのはずなのに。
Translation: ...aren't we?

Name: c3221.nss
Japanese: まだ、彼女の吐息の感触が、残っている。
Translation: So why can I still feel her breath on my skin?

Name: c3221.nss
Japanese: 目蓋を閉じれば、すぐそこに、頬を上気させたアオイがいるような気がする。
Translation: Every time I close my eyes, I see her flushed cheeks...
KR: 눈을 감으면 바로 앞에 볼을 붉힌 아오이가 있는 것처럼 느껴진다.

Name: c3221.nss
Japanese: 収まりかけた心臓の鼓動が、再びその早さを増す。
Translation: The memory makes my pulse quicken all over again.
KR: 가라앉을 뻔한 심장 박동이 다시 빨라진다.

Name: c3221.nss
Japanese: 昨日までと同じアオイのはずなのに。
Translation: Nothing's changed between us...

Name: c3221.nss
Japanese: 昨日までとは全く違って見える。
Translation: ...and yet everything feels completely different.

Name: c3221.nss
Japanese: それはつまり……
Translation: Does that mean...?

Name: c3221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……落ち着こう」
Translation: "...Calm down, buddy."

Name: c3221.nss
Japanese: 考えすぎると、余計にこんがらがりそうだ。
Translation: If I keep overthinking things, I'm just going to make everything more complicated.
KR: 계속 생각하다간 더 엉망이 될 것 같다.

Name: c3221.nss
Japanese: それよりも今は、解決しなければならない問題がある。
Translation: Right now, I have a more pressing problem on my hands: the falling-out between Miyuki and Aoi.
KR: 그것보다도, 지금은 해결해야 할 일이 있다.

Name: c3221.nss
Japanese: ケンカ別れした美雪とアオイ。

Name: c3221.nss
Japanese: 明日、ふたりは学校で顔を合わせることになる。
Translation: I imagine they'll see each other tomorrow at school.
KR: 두 사람은 내일 학교에서 마주하게 된다.

Name: c3221.nss
Japanese: 美雪に、今日のことをどう説明すればいいだろう？
Translation: How should I explain today's events to Miyuki?

Name: c3221.nss
Japanese: 仲直りさせるために、何か方法を考えなければ……
Translation: I need to think of some way to help them mend their friendship...

Name: c3221.nss
Japanese: すぐ脇道に逸れかける思考を、俺は必死に繋ぎ止めた。
Translation: With that, I hastily set my train of thought back on its proper course before it can derail entirely.
KR: 나는 딴생각이 들지 않도록 필사적으로 노력했다.

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「んく……んく……んく……ぷは」
Translation: "Ggllpp... ggllpp... ggllpp... Whew!"

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おいしいの」
Translation: "Yummy."

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ヤバトマは、かみなの」
Translation: "Yabaley's is godlike."

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチも、そうおもうの？」
Translation: "Don't you think, Shinichi?"

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ？　どしたの？」
Translation: "Shinichi? What's wrong?"

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ、いや！　なんでもない！」
Translation: "Oh, nothing! Nothing at all!"

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも、ボーッとしてるの」
Translation: "You're spacing out."

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「昨日さ、なかなか眠れなかったから」
Translation: "I just... didn't get much sleep last night."

Name: c4111.nss
Japanese: 一緒に朝食をとっているだけなのに。
Translation: All during breakfast...

Name: c4111.nss
Japanese: 俺の視線は、アオイの唇に吸い寄せられている。
Translation: For some reason, I can't stop staring at her lips.
KR: 내 시선은 아오이의 입술에 고정되어 있다.

Name: c4111.nss
Japanese: ……やっぱり、だめだ。
Translation: ...God, I'm a mess.

Name: c4111.nss
Japanese: 昨日から、アオイへの接し方がわからなくなっている。
Translation: After everything that happened yesterday, I'm not sure how to interact with her anymore.
KR: 어제부터 아오이를 어떻게 대해야 할지 모르겠다.

Name: c4111.nss
Japanese: 俺は意識を逸らすように、ピチャピチャとミルクを舐めるエルを見た。
Translation: To distract myself, I look down at Eru lapping up his milk.
KR: 나는 의식을 바꾸려고 우유를 할짝거리는 에루를 보았다.

Name: c4111.nss
Japanese: この家に置いて行くのは、さすがに気が引ける。
Translation: I'm not crazy about the idea of leaving the little thing all by himself while we go off to school...
KR: 집에 두고 가는 건 아무래도 불안하다.

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、やすむの」
Translation: "Aoi's going to skip school today."

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いえで、エルのようす、みるの」
Translation: "Aoi will stay here and look after Eru."

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そうすると、あんしんなの」
Translation: "That way you won't have to worry."

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「学校でも、屋上なら大丈夫だろ」
Translation: "We can just let it run around on the roof while we're in class."

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「もし、だれかきたら――」
Translation: "But if someone went up there—"

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「誰も来ないって」
Translation: "No one's gonna go up there, trust me."

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "But—"

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪と仲直り、したいんだろ？」
Translation: "Besides, don't you want to patch things up with Miyuki?"

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「任せとけ。
　寝不足になりながら、作戦考えたんだから」
Translation:
"Let me handle it.
I stayed up all night coming up with a plan."

Name: c4111.nss
Japanese: 鳴き声の方に視線を転じると、移動用に俺が持ち出したバスケットに、エルがすっぽり収まっていた。
Translation: My gaze shifts in the direction of the meow. There, I find Eru already curled up neatly in his cat carrier.
KR: 울음소리가 들리는 쪽으로 시선을 돌리자 이동용으로 꺼낸 바구니에 에루가 쏙 들어가 있었다.

Name: c4111.nss
Japanese: 自らアオイを説得するかのように。
Translation: Almost like the kitten's trying to help bolster my argument...

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「……わかったの」
Translation: "...Okay."

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、がっこう、いくの」
Translation: "Aoi will go to school."

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それで、ミユキと、なかなおりするの」
Translation: "And Aoi will patch things up with Miyuki, too."

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「うん、それでよし」
Translation: "Good! I'm glad."

Name: c4111.nss
Japanese: 足元のエルも、賛成するかのように声を上げた。
Translation: At my feet, Eru meows happily.

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「エルって時々、俺たちの会話がわかるみたいだよな」
Translation: "You know, sometimes it feels like the little furball can understand what we're saying."
KR: "가끔 에루가 우리 대화를 알아듣는 것 같단 말이지."

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「デンパねこなの」
Translation: "He's a transceiver cat."

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんだそれ？」
Translation: "What does THAT mean?"

Name: c4111.nss
Japanese: 確かに、額の模様はデンキっぽいけど……
Translation: I mean, sure, the little tuft of white fur on his forehead DOES kinda look like a lightning bolt, but...
KR: 확실히 이마 쪽 무늬가 번개 같긴 한데...

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ねこのひげ、デンパとらえるの」
Translation: "He can use his whiskers to pick up electromagnetic waves."

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ねこのひとみ、カノウセカイみるの」
Translation: "And he can use his cat vision to see an infinite number of possible worlds."

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「カノウセカイ」
Translation: "He can... see different worlds...?"

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「エスエフなの。すこしふしぎなの」
Translation: "It's kinda weird. Like sci-fi."

Name: c4111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、そんなわけ――」
Translation: "C'mon, there's no way—"

Name: c4111.nss
Japanese: 疑問の声をあげる俺に、エルはばっちり返答する。
Translation: Eru interrupts my skepticism with a meow.
KR: 의심하는 나를 향해 에루는 분명하게 대답했다.

Name: c4111.nss
Japanese: 全く、本当に奇妙な猫だ。
Translation: What a strange little creature...

Name: c4121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おはよう」
Translation: "Morning!"

Name: c4121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「おはよう」
Translation: "Morning..."

Name: c4121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん？　顔色悪いぞ」
Translation: "What's up, buddy? You don't look too good."

Name: c4121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「そんなこと……あるか、やっぱり」
Translation: "I'm fine... No, I'm really not."

Name: c4121.nss
Japanese: いつも悩みを知らない雄太郎だが、弟問題がそこまでダメージを与えているということか。
Translation: Yuutarou almost never lets stuff get to him like this... which means the situation with his brother must be pretty serious.
KR: 항상 고민을 모르는 유우타로였는데... 동생 문제가 그렇게까지 타격을 준 건가?

Name: c4121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、ちょっと考えたんだけどさ」
Translation: "I've been thinking."

Name: c4121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前の弟くん、彼女を作ればいいんじゃないか？」
Translation: "Maybe what your brother needs is a girlfriend."

Name: c4121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Translation: "A girlfriend...?"

Name: c4121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今は不安定だけど、恋人ができたら、きっと血迷ったりしなくなると思うんだ」
Translation: "He might be a little unstable right now, but if he had a proper romantic outlet in his life, he'd probably chill out."
KR: "지금은 조금 불안정한 상태지만, 애인이 생기면 분명 원래대로 돌아올 거야."

Name: c4121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「なるほど。確かに一理あるな」
Translation: "Oh, I get it. That makes sense."

Name: c4121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だろ？」
Translation: "Doesn't it?"

Name: c4121.nss
