Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「で、どうやって恋人を用意するんだ？」
Translation: "So how do we get him a girl?"

Name: c4121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「男の浪漫倶楽部部長だろ？
　だったらロマンスのひとつやふたつ――」
Translation:
"You're the captain of the Boys and Dreams Club, aren't you?
Surely you can help him find a dream or two—"
KR: "남자의 낭만 클럽 부장이잖아? 그럼 연애 한두 번쯤은..."

Name: c4121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「自分のだってままならない状態なんだッ！
　だからこそ追い求めてる！」
Translation:
"I can't even find my own damn dreams!!!
That's why I must pursue them!!!"
KR: "나 자신도 마음대로 못하는 상태라고!! 그래서 쫓고 있는 거잖아!!"

Name: c4121.nss
Japanese: それは知ってる。
Translation: So I've heard.

Name: c4121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「でもさ、おまえの弟ってモデルやってるんだろ？
　見た目も可愛いんだろ？」
Translation:
"But your brother's a model, right?
So he's gotta be good-looking."
KR: "그래도 네 동생, 모델 하고 있지? 얼굴도 귀여운 편이고."

Name: c4121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ガールフレンドとか、いてもいいんじゃないか？」
Translation: "Surely he can find someone to date without too much trouble."

Name: c4121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「うーん、そんな話は聞かない……」
Translation: "Hmmm... He doesn't really talk about it too much..."

Name: c4121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Translation: "Oh!"

Name: c4121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「そういえばなんか今朝、気になるコができたとか、そんな話をしてたような」
Translation: "Come to think of it, I'm pretty sure he mentioned this morning that he's got a little crush on someone..."
KR: "그러고 보니 오늘 아침, 신경 쓰이는 애가 생겼다든가, 그런 얘기를 한 것 같아."

Name: c4121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ホントか？」
Translation: "Oh, for real?"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セックスするの？」
Translation: "He should fuck her."

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ぬはっ！！」
Translation: "Nngah?!"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ！　何言って――」
Translation: "Aoi! Watch your mouth!"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「にくよく、おぼれるの」
Translation: "He'll get addicted to carnal pleasure."

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おとこのほんのう、めざめるの」
Translation: "His masculine instincts will kick in."

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、はいはい。わかったから――」
Translation: "Okay, that's enough of that, thank you—"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイがあいてになるの？」
Translation: "Should Aoi fuck him?"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから、そういうのはやめろって――」
Translation: "I told you, stop talking like that!"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「心一部員！」
Translation: "Private Shinichi!"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんだ、急に真顔で」
Translation: "What? What's that look for?"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「今、男の浪漫倶楽部部長曙雄太郎は僕の本当の気持ちに気付いたよ君が好きだっ！！」
Translation: "As of this moment, I, Akebono Yuutarou, captain of the Boys and Dreams Club, have just come to terms with my true feelings! I'm in love with you!"
KR: "지금, 남자의 낭만클럽 부장 아케보노 유우타로는 자신의 진짜 마음을 알아차렸어! 널 좋아해!"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はあ？」
Translation: "Come again?"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「びーえるなの？」
Translation: "Is this BL?"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「君が――好き、なのだろうか？　好き、かもしれない。好き、だろう。およそ好き、大体好き、ほぼ好き」
Translation: "I'm in love with you—maybe? I mean, I might be? Probably? Most likely? For the most part? Almost entirely?"
KR: "네가... 좋아, 인 걸까? 좋아, 할지도 몰라. 좋아, 하는 거겠지. 대체로 좋아. 대강 좋아. 거의 좋아."

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「好き――嫌い――好き――嫌い――好き――
　ああっ！　わからない！　自分の心がわからない！」
Translation:
"I am... I'm not... I am... I'm not... I am...
AAAGGHH! I don't know! I don't understand myself!"
KR: "좋아... 싫어... 좋아... 싫어... 좋아... 아아악! 모르겠어! 내 마음을 모르겠다고!"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「くそうっ！　男の本能に目覚めさせてもらいたい！
　だれかの肉欲に溺れさせていただきたい助けてくれ！」
Translation:
"Damn it! If only my masculine instincts would kick in!
Someone, please! Help me get addicted to carnal pleasure!"
KR: "젠장! 남자의 본능에 눈뜨게 해주고 싶어! 누군가 육욕에 빠지게 도와줘!"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「ということで！
　向日さんよろしくお願いいたします！」
Translation:
"Alright then!
Mukou-san, I'm counting on you!"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セックスするの？」
Translation: "You wanna fuck?"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「そんな卑猥な！」
Translation: "Nonsense! I'm a gentleman!"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「愛のまぐわいとお呼び下さい！」
Translation: "I don't 'fuck'—I make love!"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「まぐわうの？」
Translation: "How do you make it?"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「まぐわいます！」
Translation: "Oh, I'm sure you can help me figure it out!"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「イデッ！」
Translation: "OW!"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「アホか。
　朝っぱらっからなに大声で言ってるんだよ！」
Translation:
"Dipshit! It's eight in the morning!
Don't talk about this crap at full volume!"
KR: "바보, 아침부터 큰 소리로 무슨 말을 하는 거야!"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「しっとなの？」
Translation: "Are you jealous?"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「違う！」
Translation: "No!"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「おはよう」
Translation: "Good morning!"

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「お、おはようございます曽根さんッ！！」
Translation: "G-Good morning, Sone-san!!!"

Name: c4122.nss
Japanese: いつものように堂々と教室に入る美雪。
Translation: Miyuki steps into the classroom with her head held high, just like always.

Name: c4122.nss
Japanese: 自分の席に着く前に、チラリ、とこちらを流し見した。
Translation: Before she arrives at her desk, she shoots us a sidelong glance.
KR: 자기 자기에 앉기 전, 슬쩍 이쪽을 쳐다봤다.

Name: c4122.nss
Japanese: アオイの表情が、一気に沈むのがわかる。
Translation: Instantly, Aoi's face falls.

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ……」
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: c4122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、俺がなんとかするから」
Translation: "Don't worry. I'll handle it."

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: そして、昼休み――
Translation: At lunch—

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Aah... aah..."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「はくしょん！！」
Translation: "AACHOO!!!"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Snnnfff..."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「大丈夫か？」
Translation: "You okay?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……ただのアレルギーよ」
Translation: "...It's just my allergies."

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 昼休みの屋上の屋根。
Translation: We're up on top of the roof.

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 俺と美雪は、ふたりきりで対峙していた。
Translation: I'm having a private conversation with Miyuki.

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「話はわかったわ」
Translation: "Alright, I understand."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「まさか貴方も、ゲーム脳の持ち主だったなんてね」
Translation: "I didn't realize you had a bad case of gamer brain, too."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「誤解だ」
Translation: "I don't!"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ほら、アレ見ろよ」
Translation: "C'mon, look at them."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「エル、こっち――」
Translation: "Come here, Eru!"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる？　いきすぎなの」
Translation: "Boop boop? Where are you going?"

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 指さした先には、エルと戯れるアオイの姿がある。
Translation: I point over at Aoi, who's currently playing with Eru.
KR: 내가 가리키는 곳에 아오이가 에루와 놀고 있었다.

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 百聞は一見にしかず。
Translation: A picture is worth a thousand words, after all.

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: あの姿を見せるために、わざわざエルをここに連れてきたと言っても過言ではない。
Translation: And this may or may not be the exact reason why I went out of my way to bring Eru to school with us in the first place.
KR: 저 모습을 보여주려고 일부러 에루를 데려왔다고 해도 과언이 아니다.

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前、あのふたりを見てどう思う？」
Translation: "How does it make you feel to see them playing?"
KR: "넌 저 둘의 모습을 보고 어떻게 생각해?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...Miyuki?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「涎、出てるぞ」
Translation: "Uh... you're drooling."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ハッ！」
Translation: "AH!"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「大丈夫か？」
Translation: "You okay there?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「な、何が大丈夫なのよ！
　大丈夫じゃないわよ、全然ッ！」
Translation:
"A-Are you blind?!
Of course I'm not okay!"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイも子猫も、幸せそうだろ？」
Translation: "Aoi and Eru seem pretty happy together, don't you think?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ん……まあ、ね」
Translation: "Mm... I guess so."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「昨日、アオイが拾おうとしなかったら、こんな光景、絶対にあり得なかった」
Translation: "This never would have happened if Aoi hadn't rescued the little thing last night."
KR: "어제 아오이가 데려오지 않았으면 이런 광경은 볼 수 없었을 거야."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「やっぱり、昨日の行動は間違いじゃない」
Translation: "And I think she was right to do it."
KR: "역시, 어제 한 행동은 틀린 게 아니야."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイたちは幸せそうだけど、それとこれとは話が別」
Translation: "Sure, they're happy, but that's hardly the problem here."
KR: "저 둘은 행복해 보이지만, 그거랑 이거는 다른 얘기야."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今は良くても、後で困るに決まってるんだから」
Translation: "Things may be fine for right now, but sooner or later there's gonna be trouble."

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: やはり美雪は簡単に折れない。
Translation: Miyuki's as stubborn as ever, I see...

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: だが、ここまでは充分予想していた展開。
Translation: Fortunately, I saw this coming.
KR: 하지만 여기까지는 충분히 예상 가능한 전개.

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 俺にはちゃんと、奥の手がある。
Translation: And I have a trump card.

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なあ美雪？」
Translation: "Say, Miyuki?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Hm?"

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 俺は用意していた携帯電話の画面を、彼女に見せる。
Translation: I show her my phone screen—but just for a moment.
KR: 나는 준비하고 있던 핸드폰 화면을 미유키에게 보여주었다.

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: と思ったら引っ込める。
Translation: Then I put it away.

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「え！？　ちょっと、なに今の？」
Translation: "What the?! What was THAT about?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「見たい？」
Translation: "You wanna see it?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「見たい！　っていうか、見せてよ！
　今の、まさか――」
Translation:
"Of course I do! Show me!
Was that—?!"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「貴重なエルの寝顔写真です」
Translation: "A super-rare photo of Eru sleeping? Sure is."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「見たい？」
Translation: "If you want to see it..."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ならみんな、仲良くしないとな」
Translation: "...then let's see you mend things with Aoi."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「わ、私がこんなもので懐柔されると思ってるの……？」
Translation: "Y-You seriously think you can bribe me with THAT?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ、抱いてるアオイは猫着ぐるみ着用ね」
Translation: "Oh, and Aoi's wearing the kitty onesie in the photo, too."
KR: "어라, 안고 있는 아오이는 고양이 옷을 입고 있네?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「懐柔――されて――」
Translation: "I can't be bought... I can't be bought...!"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ホーレホーレ」
Translation: "C'mooon, you know you want toooo..."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ひ、卑怯者ッ！！」
Translation: "Y-You CHEAT!!!"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「卑怯者でもゲーム脳でもなんでもいい」
Translation: "Cheat, gamer brain, whatever. You can call me names all you want."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺は３人で友達として過ごしたいだけなんだ……」
Translation: "I just wanna hang out with my two good friends again."
KR: "나는 셋이서 함께 친구로 지내고 싶을 뿐이야."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なんで格好良さそうなわけ？」
Translation: "You think I buy a second of that little suave act?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、ふざけてごめん」
Translation: "Sorry. Just messing around."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でも、最後のは本気なんだ」
Translation: "But I'm serious about that last part."

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 俺はしっかり美雪を見据えると――
Translation: I look straight into Miyuki's eyes.

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「頼む、この通り！！」
Translation: "Please, I'm begging you!"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今まで通り、アオイと友達でいてやってくれ！」
Translation: "Aoi needs you! Please keep being there for her!"

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 深々と、頭を下げた。
Translation: I bow humbly before her.

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 下げて――
Translation: And wait.

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 下げたのだけれど――
Translation: And wait... and wait...

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: ……反応が、なかなかこない。
Translation: ...No response.

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あの、さ」
Translation: "Listen..."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……なんでそこまでできるわけ？」
Translation: "...Why are you going to all this effort?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんでって？」
Translation: "What do you mean, why?"

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 顔を上げる。
Translation: I look up to find Miyuki squinting at me suspiciously.

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 美雪は、いかにも不審げに俺の顔を覗き込んでいた。
KR: 미유키는 아무래도 이상한 듯 내 얼굴을 들여다보고 있었다.

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もしかして貴方、アオイが好き？」
Translation: "Do you have feelings for her?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そんなことないっ！！」
Translation: "Of course not!"

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 不意に、至近距離のアオイの吐息が、蘇り――
Translation: Suddenly, I remember the feel of her breath on my skin—
KR: 불연듯, 가까이서 느꼈던 아오이의 숨결이 떠올랐다.

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「アイツは天地がひっくり返ったって！！
　俺にとってはただの友達――！！」
Translation: "She'll never be anything more than a friend to me!!!"
KR: "말도 안 되는 소리 하지 마!! 세상이 멸망해도 나한테 그 녀석은 그냥 친구...!!"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一」
Translation: "Shinichi."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「声、聞こえるわよ」
Translation: "She can hear you, you know."

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 全身から血の気が引く。
Translation: My blood runs cold.

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 俺はすぐに屋上を見下ろすが――
Translation: I quickly look down at Aoi—

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ねこみみなの」
Translation: "Look! Kitty ears!"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「もえー」
Translation: "So cute!"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「聞こえてなくて、安心した？」
Translation: "Are you glad to know she didn't hear you after all?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「別に、そういうのじゃ――！」
Translation: "N-No, that's not—"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「ま、いいわ。
　貴方の熱意に免じて、仲直りしてあげる」
Translation:
"Well, whatever.
In light of your sincerity, I'll extend an olive branch."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「本当か！？」
Translation: "You mean it?!"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私もどうやって話しかけようか、悩んでた所だしね」
Translation: "I've been meaning to reach out to her anyway."
KR: "나도 어떻게 말 걸어야 할지 고민하고 있던 참이야."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ありがとう」
Translation: "Thank you!"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「その代わり！」
Translation: "On one condition!"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちゃんと、エルちゃんの写真送りなさいよ」
Translation: "I want you to send me all your Eru pics."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おう」
Translation: "You got it."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「絶対よ！」
Translation: "Promise me!"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「わかったって」
Translation: "I promise!"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今すぐね！」
Translation: "Send them right now!"

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: ホントに写真欲しいんだな……
Translation: Man, she's crazy about cat photos...

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 俺はエルとアオイの写った写真を、美雪の携帯に送る。
Translation: I promptly email her all my shots of Eru and Aoi.
KR: 나는 에루와 아오이가 찍힌 사진을 미유키에게 보냈다.

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「行ったぞ」
Translation: "Sent."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ありがと！」
Translation: "Thanks!"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「かわいい……ッ！」
Translation: "Oh my god, so CUTE...!"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「こんな生きものがこの世の中に存在するなんて、まさに、奇跡的……」
Translation: "I can't believe such a perfect little creature exists on this earth..."

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 例によって、食い入るように見入る美雪。
Translation: Sure enough, Miyuki stares rapturously at the photos—

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: の、首が。
Translation: —but then—

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あれ？」
Translation: "Wait, huh?"

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 突然、傾いだ。
Translation: —she tilts her head.

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「この背景、見覚えが――」
Translation: "I feel like I recognize this background—"

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: ……あ、ヤバイ。
Translation: Oh shit.

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「え？　ああ、これは、その。
　暗くて見えづらいけど、学校の用具室――かな？」
Translation: "Huh? Oh, that's, er... It's probably too dark to tell, but it's... I think it's a storage closet at school...?"
KR: "어? 아, 이거... 그... 어두워서 잘 안 보이는데, 학교 기구실... 인가?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイ！」
Translation: "Aoi!"

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 俺の言い訳に聞く耳を持たず、美雪は声を張り上げた。
Translation: Miyuki ignores me and calls out to Aoi.
KR: 미유키는 내 변명은 귀 기울이지 않고 소리쳤다.

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「この写真、どこで撮ったの？」
Translation: "Where was this photo taken?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチのいえなの」
Translation: "At Shinichi's house."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょっと！」
Translation: "Hey!"

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 少しは隠してくれ！
Translation: Don't just tell her!

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「昨日、行ったの？」
Translation: "You were at his house yesterday?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とまったの」
Translation: "Uh huh. Spent the night."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「と、泊まったって、どういうこと！？」
Translation: "Wh-What do you mean, you spent the night?!"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ひとばん、ひとつやねのしたなの」
Translation: "We slept in the same house last night."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「いやいや、一晩リビングに泊めただけ。
　真夜中に女の子ひとり追い出す方が、非常識だろ？」
Translation:
"Don't get it twisted. She slept on the couch, okay?
I mean, what was I supposed to do, let her sleep on the street?"
KR: "그게 아니고, 거실에서 하룻밤 재운 것뿐이라고? 한밤중에 여자애를 내쫓는 게 더 이상하잖아?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……それは、そうだけど」
Translation: "...Okay, fair point..."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「アオイ、大丈夫だった？
　何もされてない？　ちゃんと眠れた？」
Translation:
"How'd it go, Aoi?
Did he try anything? Did you get enough sleep?"
KR: "아오이, 괜찮아? 무슨 짓 당하진 않았지? 잠은 좀 잤어?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ねぶそくなの……」
Translation: "Couldn't sleep at all..."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「寝不足？」
Translation: "You couldn't?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチのいえ、シンイチのにおい、するの」
Translation: "Shinichi's house smells like him."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そわそわなの」
Translation: "Makes me restless."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どきどきなの」
Translation: "Makes my heart pound."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それで、眠れなかった？」
Translation: "And that kept you up all night?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ふしぎなの」
Translation: "It's weird..."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、からだビリビリ……」
Translation: "My body was all zappy..."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「これは……ビョーキなの？」
Translation: "Is... Is Aoi sick?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Haah..."

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: 美雪は、思いっきり聞こえよがしな溜息をつく。
Translation: Miyuki sighs loudly.

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイ、教えてあげる」
Translation: "Allow me to fill you in, Aoi."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる？」
Translation: "Boop boop?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「その気持ちは、ただの友情じゃない」
Translation: "Those feelings you have? Those aren't friendship feelings."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...It's love."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あなたは、心一に、恋してる」
Translation: "You're in love with Shinichi."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Love...?"

Name: c4131.nss
Japanese: アオイの視線が、宙に泳ぐ。
Translation: Aoi stares into space.

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチに、こい、してる」
Translation: "Aoi's... in love... with Shinichi..."

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチに、こい、してる……の？」
Translation: "Aoi's... in love... with Shinichi...?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Wh... What the?"

Name: c4131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、バグったの？」
Translation: "Is Aoi glitched?"

Name: c4141.nss
Japanese: そのまま、日が暮れた。
Translation: The sun began to set.

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、アオイ？」
Translation: "Uh, Aoi?"

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「――おい、アオイってば！」
Translation: "Hey! Aoi!"

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる？」
Translation: "Boop boop?"

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「まだ、デンパ、届かないのか？」
Translation: "Are you still having trouble getting any signal?"

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「……うん。ずっと、とどかない」
Translation: "...Uh huh. It just won't go through no matter what."

Name: c4141.nss
Japanese: アオイは午後の授業をサボって、屋上でずっとデンパを飛ばし続けていた。
Translation: Aoi didn't show up to her afternoon classes. Instead, she stayed on the roof and has been calling "God" since lunch.
KR: 아오이는 오후 수업도 빼먹고 옥상에서 계속 전파를 보내고 있다.

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺はそろそろ帰るけど、どうする？」
Translation: "I'm gonna head home now. What about you?"

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「もうすこし、とばすの」
Translation: "Gonna stay here and try for a little longer."

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「セカイを、アップデートするの。
　アオイのバグ、つぶすの」
Translation:
"Aoi needs an update patch.
A bugfix patch."
KR: "세계를 업데이트할 거야. 아오이의 버그, 잡을 거야."

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それが、ひつようなの」
Translation: "It's important."

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でもいい加減――」
Translation: "Look, I think you should call it a day."

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ほら、エルもお腹が減ったって言ってるぞ」
Translation: "See? Eru's hungry."

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ」
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「エル、おねがいしていい？」
Translation: "Can you take care of Eru for me?"

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん、いいけど」
Translation: "I mean, sure, I don't mind..."

Name: c4141.nss
Japanese: そもそも今夜、アオイを俺の家に泊めるつもりはない。
Translation: We didn't make plans for her to stay over tonight.
KR: 애초에 오늘 밤은 아오이를 우리 집에서 재울 생각이 없다.

Name: c4141.nss
Japanese: 必然的に、俺は家でエルの面倒を見ることになる。
Translation: Which means I'm gonna be looking after Eru by myself anyway.

Name: c4141.nss
Japanese: 俺は屋根の上から、子猫を受け取った。
Translation: I bend down and pick up the kitten.

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あんまり無理するなよ？」
Translation: "...Just don't overwork yourself, alright?"

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だいじょうぶなの」
Translation: "Aoi will be fine."

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、バグ、つぶすの」
Translation: "Just gotta patch out my bugs."

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だって、アオイたちは」
Translation: "After all, Aoi..."

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「てんちがひっくりかえっても、ただのともだちなの」
Translation: "Aoi will never be anything more than a friend to you."

Name: c4141.nss
Japanese: あれ？
Translation: Wait...

Name: c4141.nss
Japanese: その台詞って、俺が昼にここで――
Translation: That's the exact same thing I said earlier...

Name: c4141.nss
Japanese: もしかして、聞こえてたのか？
Translation: Did she overhear me after all...?

Name: c4141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: c4141.nss
Japanese: 俺の疑問は言葉にならず。
Translation: Before I can ask her about it, Aoi starts "dialing" again.
KR: 그러나 내 의문은 말로 표현되지 못한 채.

Name: c4141.nss
Japanese: アオイは再び世界の中心で、デンパを飛ばし始める。
Translation: Phone in hand, she looks out over the city...
KR: 아오이는 다시 세계의 중심에서 전파를 날리기 시작했다.

Name: c4141.nss
Japanese: スマートフォンを手に、書き割りの街の遙か向こう、世界の彼方にいるともしれない神様に向かって。
Translation: Transmitting to a god beyond the furthest reaches of our world.
KR: 스마트폰을 들고 마을을 넘어 아득한 저편으로, 세상 너머에 있을지도 모르는 신님을 향해...

Name: c4151.nss
Japanese: それを最後に、アオイは街から姿を消した。
Translation: That was the last time I saw Aoi before she disappeared.
KR: 그것을 마지막으로 아오이는 마을에서 모습을 감췄다.

Name: c4151.nss
Japanese: 俺の元に、１匹の捨て猫だけを残して。
Translation: All she left behind was a single kitten.

Name: c4151.nss
Japanese: あまりに呆気ない別れだった。
Translation: It was just so... sudden.

Name: c4151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「絶交されちゃったって、ことなのかな」
Translation: "I guess she wanted to cut ties with us."

Name: c4151.nss
Japanese: ポツリと美雪が呟いた。
Translation: Miyuki mutters to herself.

Name: c4151.nss
Japanese: 仲直りしたと思ったら、これだ。
Translation: Just when I thought we'd all patched things up, too.

Name: c4151.nss
Japanese: なぜ、アオイは俺たちの前から姿を消したのか。
Translation: Why would Aoi ghost us like this?

Name: c4151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一は、心当たりある？」
Translation: "Do you have any idea where she might be?"

Name: c4151.nss
Japanese: わからない。
Translation: Of course not.

Name: c4151.nss
Japanese: 心当たりなんて、なにもない。
Translation: I don't have the first clue.

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: 担任にアオイの話を聞くが、「連絡はない」の一点張り。
Translation: I tried to ask my homeroom teacher about Aoi, but all he would tell me was "We haven't heard anything from her."
KR: 담임 선생님께 아오이에 대해 물었지만, '연락이 안 된다'는 말 뿐.

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: 保護者も、事情を掴んでいないらしい。
Translation: No one knows anything about her family situation, either.
KR: 부모님도 사정을 파악하지 못하고 있는 것 같다.

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: というかそもそも、彼女がマンガ喫茶に寝泊まりしていたこと自体、知らなかったそうだ。
Translation: Apparently no one else had any idea she was staying at a manga cafe in the first place.
KR: 애초에 아오이가 만화방에서 지내고 있었던 것 자체를 몰랐던 모양이다.

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: あの後、１度だけ――
Translation: Ever since then...

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: 俺は世界の中心に立ってみたことがある。
Translation: I've gone up to the "center of the universe" exactly once.

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: 世界の中心から発信すれば、俺の携帯の電波だって、きっとアオイに届く。
Translation: I thought maybe if I called her from up there, my phone signal might reach her.
KR: 세계의 중심에서 발신하면, 내 핸드폰의 전파라도 분명 아오이에게 닿을 거다.

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: 脈絡もなく奇跡を願う、ゲーム脳。
Translation: I know it was just gamer brain. I was basically just hoping for a miracle.
KR: 맥락도 없이 기적을 바라는 게임 뇌다.

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: だが、どれだけ電波を飛ばしても。
Translation: But no matter how many times I tried...

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: アオイのスマフォまでは、届かなかった。
Translation: ...the call never went through.

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: 圏外のまま、通じることがなかった。
Translation: All I got were "out of service" error messages.

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: 友達なんて、そんなものだ。
Translation: But that's just how it goes, right?

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: 出会って。
Translation: Someone new comes into your life...

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: 別れて。
Translation: ...and then, next thing you know, they're gone.

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: また出会って。
Translation: Another person comes, another person goes.

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: また別れて。

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: その、繰り返し。
Translation: Over and over and over.

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: 何かが変わったわけじゃない。
Translation: So what if she's gone? Nothing's changed.

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: 元に戻っただけ。
Translation: If anything, things have just gone back to normal.

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: 側に、アオイがいない。
Translation: Aoi's not in my life anymore.

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: ただ、それだけで。
Translation: That's all there is to it.

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: きっとすぐに、慣れるだろう。
Translation: I'm sure I'll get used to it soon.

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: きっと、すぐに――
Translation: I'll get used to it soon...

Name: c4152.nss
Japanese: すぐに……
Translation: I'll get used to it...

Name: c4153.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……なあ、エル？」
Translation: "...Hey, Eru?"

Name: c4153.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「きっと、そのうち、慣れるよな？」
Translation: "I'll get used to it eventually, right?"

Name: c4153.nss
Japanese: アオイが拾ってきた子猫はただ、無言でミルクを舐め続けるだけだった。
Translation: But Aoi's kitten just quietly laps up his milk.
KR: 아오이가 데려온 고양이는 그저 말없이 우유를 핥을 뿐이었다.

Name: c4161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「これは？」
Translation: "What am I looking at here?"

Name: c4161.nss
Japanese: 教室にやってくるなり、雄太郎が俺に叩き付けた紙。
Translation: As soon as Yuutarou steps into the classroom, he walks over and slaps a piece of paper on my desk.
KR: 유우타로는 교실에 오자마자 내게 종이 한 장을 던졌다.

Name: c4161.nss
Japanese: 退部届。
Translation: A club resignation form.

Name: c4161.nss
Japanese: の、上にはみ出さんばかりの勢いで文字が書かれている。
Translation: Wait... There's something written above it.
KR: 그 위에는 튀어나올 듯한 기세로 글씨가 쓰여 있다.

Name: c4161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「破門状？」
Translation: "A... letter of disownment...?"

Name: c4161.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「どうやらお前を男の浪漫倶楽部に誘ったのは、俺の見込み違いだったらしい」
Translation: "It seems I made a mistake in inviting you to the B&D Club."
KR: "아무래도 너를 남자의 낭만 클럽에 가입시킨 건 내 실수였던 것 같다."

Name: c4161.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「今日付で、貴様は退部だッ！！」
Translation: "As of today, you're OUT!!!"

Name: c4161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どうぞ」
Translation: "Okay."

Name: c4161.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「そんなあっさり！？」
Translation: "How are you okay with this?!"

Name: c4161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、元々入りたくて入ったわけじゃないし」
Translation: "I mean, I didn't want to join in the first place."
KR: "아니, 애초에 들어가고 싶어서 들어간 것도 아니고."

Name: c4161.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「貴様がそこまでの腑抜けとは思わなかったぞ！」
Translation: "I didn't realize you were such a coward!"

Name: c4161.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「男だろ！？　日々に、寂しさを覚えてるんだろ！？
　探せよ浪漫！　それが男の生き様だッ！！」
Translation: "You call yourself a man?! Don't you feel the weight of loneliness upon your shoulders?! Find your dreams! That's how a real man lives!"
KR: "남자잖아!? 매일 외로움을 느끼잖아!? 찾아라, 낭만! 그게 남자의 삶이닷!!!"

Name: c4161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はいはい、どうぞ独りで探してください」
Translation: "You have fun without me, buddy."

Name: c4161.nss
Japanese: いくら雄太郎が怒鳴ったところで、俺の気持ちは――
Translation: Yuutarou can keep screaming all he likes, but I—

Name: c4161.nss
Japanese: 俺は突然、雄太郎に、胸ぐらを掴まれる。
Translation: Out of nowhere, Yuutarou grabs me by the collar.

Name: c4161.nss
Japanese: いつも暑苦しい雄太郎の顔が、いつもの５割増しで、俺の顔を睨み付けてくる。
Translation: He glares at me with an intensity about 50% more obnoxious than usual.
KR: 언제나 숨 막힐듯한 유우타로의 얼굴이 평소의 50%는 커져서 내 얼굴을 노려보았다.

Name: c4161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Yuutarou...?"

Name: c4161.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「絶交だ」
Translation: "I'm cutting ties with you."

Name: c4161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What...?"

Name: c4161.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「向日を捜そうともしないお前とは、つきあえん」
Translation: "I can't be friends with you if you won't even go looking for Mukou."
KR: "무코우를 찾으려고도 하지 않는 너랑은 친구 안 해."

Name: c4161.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「金輪際、絶交だ！！」
Translation: "Never speak to me ever again!!!"

Name: c4161.nss
Japanese: 絶交――
Translation: Cutting ties...

Name: c4161.nss
Japanese: 先日、耳にしたばかりの言葉が、俺の心を揺すぶる。
Translation: The familiar word pierces my heart.
KR: 저번에 들었던 그 단어가 내 마음을 흔들었다.

Name: c4161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、なに言って――」
Translation: "C'mon, that's not funny."

Name: c4161.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「冗談じゃない。本気だ！」
Translation: "I'm not messing around. I'm serious!"

Name: c4161.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「心一。わかるだろ？
　今、浪漫を失ったら、お前は駄目になる」
Translation:
"Shinichi, I know you know.
If you let your dreams slip away, you'll ruin your life."
KR: "신이치 너도 알잖아? 지금 너는 낭만을 잃어선 안 돼."

Name: c4161.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「自分は何をするべきか、知ってるはずだ」
Translation: "And I know you know what you need to do."
KR: "자신이 뭘 해야 할 지 알고 있을 거야."

Name: c4161.nss
Japanese: "浪漫を探す","浪漫を探さない"
Translation: "Search for my dreams","Let it go"

Name: c4171.nss
Japanese: 絶交をかけてまで、雄太郎が俺に訴えたこと。
Translation: Yuutarou's willing to cut ties with me over this.
KR: 절교까지 하면서 유우타로가 내게 호소한 것.

Name: c4171.nss
Japanese: ずっと、目を背けてきたけど……
Translation: I've been turning a blind eye to it for a while now, but...

Name: c4171.nss
Japanese: やっぱり俺は、動き出すべきだ。
Translation: ...I know I can't just sit on my ass.

Name: c4171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、アオイを捜さなきゃ」
Translation: "I'm gonna look for Aoi."

Name: c4171.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Translation: "ATTA BOY!!!"

Name: c4171.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「それでこそ、浪漫倶楽部部員！」
Translation: "Now THAT'S a real B&D Boy if I ever saw one!"

Name: c4171.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 雄太郎はビリビリと音を立て、破門状を切り裂く。
Translation: Yuutarou rips up the letter of disownment.

Name: c4171.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「早速今日の放課後から、捜査開始だ！」
Translation: "The search begins today after school!"

Name: c4171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え？　お前も？」
Translation: "Huh? Are you coming with me?"

Name: c4171.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「それが部長の務めだッ！」
Translation: "But of course! I'm your captain, after all!"

Name: c4171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ははは……まあ、よろしく」
Translation: "Hahaha... Alright. See you then."

Name: c4171.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「よろしくな！」
Translation: "You certainly will!"

Name: c4171.nss
Japanese: ガッシリと手を握る、俺と雄太郎の向こうで――
Translation: We exchange a firm handshake. Meanwhile...

Name: c4171.nss
Japanese: 美雪が無言のまま、こちらを睨みつけていた。
Translation: ...Miyuki glares silently at us from across the room.

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「捜すぜ、男の浪漫！」
Translation: "Let's find those dreams!"

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: ……どうやら雄太郎は、わざわざ一度着替えたらしい。
Translation: ...Apparently Yuutarou decided to change clothes for this.
KR: ...아무래도 유우타로는 일부러 옷을 갈아입은 것 같다.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: その胸に、彼のやる気がみなぎっていた。
Translation: Guess he wants to wear his enthusiasm on his sleeve... literally.

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「で、どうする？　何か作戦でも――」
Translation: "So, what's the plan? We should figure something out—"

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「無策！」
Translation: "Or we could wing it!"

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 曙雄太郎は、本気で無策だった。
Translation: Akebono Yuutarou, the champion of winging it.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: その上、色々適当だった。
Translation: And wing it we did.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 捜索中、すれ違った美少女の後を追いかけたり――
Translation: At some point during the search, he got distracted by a pretty girl on the street and decided to follow her...
KR: 수색 중에 스쳐 지나간 미소녀를 쫓아간다거나...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 休憩でバッティングセンターで遊んだり――
Translation: Then we took a break and hung out at the batting cages...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 道ばたの犬に突然追いかけられたり――
Translation: Then we got chased by a random stray dog...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 聞き込み相手に新手のナンパと勘違いされたり――
Translation: Then, when we tried to ask around about Aoi, people thought we were hitting on them...
KR: 탐문 상대에게 새로운 헌팅으로 착각 받는다거나...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: タバコ屋のおばちゃんに色目を使われたり――
Translation: Then the older lady at the tobacco shop batted her lashes at us...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 男の浪漫を求めてＡＶショップに潜入したり――
Translation: Then we followed our dreams all the way to the adult store...

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「こんなんで、見つかるのか……？」
Translation: "Is any of this really going to help us find her...?"

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「見つけたくなかったりしてな」
Translation: "Not like you actually wanna find her anyway."

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...What?"

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「お前、向日がいなくなって、ホッとしただろ？」
Translation: "You're glad Mukou's gone, aren't you?"

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……そんなわけ、ないだろ？」
Translation: "...Of course not!"

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「傷つくのを覚悟で白黒つけるか」
Translation: "Would you rather set the record straight at the risk of someone getting hurt..."

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「何もかもうやむやにして逃げ出すか」
Translation: "...or leave things vague and run away?"

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「いつものお前なら、どっちを選んでた？」
Translation: "What's your typical go-to response?"

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: それから毎日、俺たちは街中を歩き回った。
Translation: We spent every day after that just wandering around town.
KR: 그 후로도 우리는 매일같이 거리를 돌아다녔다.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: アオイが行きそうな場所を、ずっとずっと考えた。
Translation: Every day, we brainstormed places Aoi might go.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 今どこにいて、何を見て、どんな風に考えているのか。
Translation:
Every day, I wondered to myself... Where are you right now?
What are you doing? What are you thinking about?
KR: 지금 어디에 있고, 무엇을 보고, 어떤 생각을 하고 있는지.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 休むことなく、想像を続けた。

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 彼女はマンガ喫茶に住んでいて――
Translation: She was spending her nights at a manga cafe...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: でも、どんな理由で家に帰れないのかを知らない。
Translation: ...but she never explained why she refused to go home.
KR: 하지만 어째서 집에 돌아가지 못했는지는 모른다.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 両親といっしょに暮らしておらず――
Translation: She was avoiding her parents...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: でも、なぜ一緒に暮らせないのかを知らない。
Translation: ...but she never told me why they made her life so hard.
KR: 하지만 어째서 같이 살지 않는지 모른다.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: いつも感情を表に出さず――
Translation: She would typically never let her emotions show...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: でも、なんでそう振る舞うのかを知らない。
Translation: ...but I never knew what made her hide them.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 現実と虚構が時々混ざってしまったりして――
Translation: She often mixed up fiction with reality...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: でも、どこまでそれが本気なのかを知らない。
Translation: ...but I could never be sure if she was serious.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: ゲームの「カミサマ」を信じていて――
Translation: She believed that "God" made our world as a video game...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: でも、どうしてそんなものを信じるのかを、知らない。
Translation: ...but I don't know what led her to that conclusion in the first place.
KR: 하지만 어째서 그런 걸 믿는지 모른다.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: いなくなってから、初めて気付く。
Translation: And now that she's gone...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 俺は今までずっと、アオイについて何も知らないということすら、知らなかったのだ。
Translation: ...I finally realize just how little I ever really knew about her.
KR: 나는 지금까지 아오이에 대해 아무것도 모른다는 것조차 모르고 있었다.

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なあ、エル」
Translation: "Hey, Eru."

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前、電波ネコだったよな？」
Translation: "You're a transceiver cat, right?"

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイの電波、わかるだろ？」
Translation: "Which means you can sense Aoi's signal, right?"

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「案内してくれないか？」
Translation: "Could you take me to her?"

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: エルには結局、無視されてしまった。
Translation: But Eru ignores me.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 俺には電波がわからない。
Translation: I can't pick up signals on my own.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 彼女への携帯も、通じないまま。
Translation: And I can't get through to her over the phone.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 俺は俺のやり方で、彼女を捜すしかない。
Translation: All I can do is search for her the only way I know how.
KR: 난 내 방식대로 아오이를 찾을 수밖에 없어.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 夜空を見上げて、思い浮かべてみる。
Translation: As I stare up at the night sky, I think back.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 「ねこまんま」に入って、彼女が何に目を奪われるか。
Translation: The things she fixated on when we visited Catnip...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 蔵上商店のアイスクリームを、どんな風に舐めるか。
Translation: The way she licked her ice cream from Kurakami Electronics...
KR: 쿠라카미 가전제품점의 아이스크림은 어떤 식으로 핥을지...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: スナック菓子の袋をどうやって開けるか。
Translation: How she used to open her potato chip bags...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 好きなのはなに味か。
Translation: The flavors she liked best...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: コンビニに向かう時は、どんな道を辿るか。
Translation: The path she chose on the way to the corner store...
KR: 편의점에 갈 땐 어떤 길로 갈까...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 道ばたで犬とすれ違うときはどんな反応をするか。
Translation: The way she'd act anytime we spotted a dog...
KR: 길가에서 개와 마주쳤을 땐 어떤 반응을 보일까...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 歩道を歩くとき、彼女はどちら側を歩くか。
Translation: Which side of the sidewalk she chose...
KR: 보도블록을 걸을 때, 아오이는 어느 쪽으로 걸을까...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: どんな風に階段を下りるか。
Translation: The way she walked down the stairs...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: どっちの方にカバンをかけるか。
Translation: The way she carried her bookbag...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: どっちの靴を先に履くか。
Translation: Which shoe she would put on first...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: どんなまばたきをするか。
Translation: The way she'd blink at me...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: どんな瞳で、俺と美雪を見ていたか。
Translation: The way she looked at me and Miyuki...
KR: 어떤 눈으로 나와 미유키를 보고 있었을까...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: アオイの動き、ひとつひとつが。
Translation: Every slight movement...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 彼女の呼吸と共に。
Translation: Every breath...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 今目の前で行われている事のように、浮かびあがる。
Translation: They all rush vividly to the forefront of my mind.
KR: 지금 눈앞에서 벌어지고 있는 것처럼 떠오른다.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: この大切な記憶が、このままなんとなく消えて良いはずなんて、ない。
Translation: These memories are all so important to me... and I refuse to let them go.
KR: 이런 소중한 기억이 이대로 휙 사라져도 좋을 리가 없다.

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「向日は、ずっと人形みたいなヤツだと思ってた」
Translation: "I always thought Mukou was kinda like a mannequin."

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「でも……いつからだろうな」
Translation: "But... at some point..."

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「少しずつ、思うようになってきたんだ」
Translation: "At some point, I started thinking..."

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「彼女は彼女なりに、苦しんでるんじゃないかって」
Translation: "...maybe she feels pain like the rest of us."
KR: "아오이는 아오이 나름대로 괴로워하고 있는 게 아닐까 하고."

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 自販機に身体を預けながら、雄太郎が言う。
Translation: Yuutarou leans against the vending machine as he talks.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: やっぱりコイツ、見た目も行動も非常に暑苦しいけど、根は真面目で良いヤツなのだ。
Translation: For all his obnoxious behavior, deep down, he really does care.
KR: 역시 이 녀석, 생김새도 행동도 이상하리만치 기분 나쁘지만, 본성은 성실하고 좋은 녀석이야.

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「休みの日まで……ありがとうな」
Translation: "Thanks for spending your weekend helping me with this."

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「歩き回って、色々気持ちの整理がついた」
Translation: "After all that walking, I think I've figured out how I feel."

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「はっはー、まかせろ！」
Translation: "Hahah! But of course, my good sir!"

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「なにせ俺は、浪漫の伝道師だからなッ！！」
Translation: "Just call me the Evangelist of Dreams!!!"

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: ――なんだそりゃ？
Translation: ...Yeah, I'm not gonna call you that.

Name: c4181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ、悪い」
Translation: "Oh, sorry. One sec."

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎に断って、メールを確認する。
Translation: I pull out my phone.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 差出人は、美雪。
Translation: There's an email from Miyuki in my inbox.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: 文面は――
Translation: It reads...

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: ――時間、ありますか？
Translation: —Are you busy later?

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: ――大事な話があります。
Translation: —I need to talk to you.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: ――バッティングセンターに来て下さい。
Translation: —Please come by the batting cages tonight.

Name: c4181.nss
Japanese: ――お願いします。
Translation: —It's important.

Name: c4191.nss
Japanese: 月が綺麗な夜だ。
Translation: The moon is gorgeous tonight.

Name: c4191.nss
Japanese: 秋の虫が鳴く川縁を、俺はゆっくり歩いて行く。
Translation: Crickets chirp as I walk down by the river.
KR: 가을벌레가 우는 강변을 나는 천천히 걸어갔다.

Name: c4191.nss
Japanese: バッティングセンターを訪れるのは、あの日以来だ。
Translation: I haven't been back to the batting cages since that fateful day.
KR: 야구연습장을 찾은 건 그날 이후 처음이다.

Name: c4201.nss
Japanese: 相変わらず美しい、美雪のフォーム。
Translation: Miyuki's form is beautiful, just as it always is.

Name: c4201.nss
Japanese: 打ち返された球は、速く、深く、ネットに突き刺さる。
Translation: The baseball flies up and hits the net.
KR: 방망이에 맞은 공은 빠른 속도로 그물망에 꽂혔다.

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「代わらない？」
Translation: "Want a turn?"

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いいよ」
Translation: "I'll pass."

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「見てて飽きない？」
Translation: "Don't you ever get tired of just watching?"

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「別に。お前も、飽きないだろ」
Translation: "Not really. And apparently you don't get tired of swinging, either."

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私は、バットを振るのが、好き」
Translation: "Of course not. I really love it."

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ここに立って、ボールを見つめて――」
Translation: "I love standing here, my eye on the ball—"

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「打つ！」
Translation: "Then I swing!"

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「演技も、嘘も、なにひとつない」
Translation: "No acting, no lies..."

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「無心で、裸の私になれるから」
Translation: "I don't have to think... I can just be myself. My raw self."
KR: "생각 없이 나 자신인 채로 있을 수 있으니까."

Name: c4201.nss
Japanese: 何となく言いたいことはわかる。
Translation: Somehow, I feel like I know what she's getting at.

Name: c4201.nss
Japanese: スイングする美雪は、まるで世の中の全ての煩わしさから解き放たれたように、美しい。
Translation: Miyuki swings that bat like she's been freed from all the world's troubles.
KR: 스윙하는 미유키는 마치 세상 모든 번거로움에서 해방된 것처럼 아름다웠다.

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いなくなって」
Translation: "Now that she's gone..."

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「遠く離れて」
Translation: "Now that she's far away..."

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「寂しくなって」
Translation: "Now that I miss her..."

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「やっと、わかった」
Translation: "I finally understand."

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「本当のことを言うわ」
Translation: "I'll be perfectly honest."

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私、アオイが嫌いだった」
Translation: "I always hated Aoi."

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「側にいたくなかった」
Translation: "I wanted her gone."

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「逃げ出したかった」
Translation: "I didn't want to be around her."

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でも、無視もできなかった」
Translation: "But at the same time, I couldn't shut her out."

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私のどこかは、彼女に憧れてたから」
Translation: "Somewhere deep down... I wanted to BE her."

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「飾らなくて、正直で、正しいことを正しいって言えて」
Translation: "She was true to others, and true to herself, and she always stood up for what she believed in."
KR: "꾸미지 않고, 솔직하고, 옳은 것을 옳다고 할 수 있는..."

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんな彼女が、好きだったから」
Translation: "And I liked that about her."

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから私も……」
Translation: "So I decided..."

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もしかしたらなれるかもと思った」
Translation: "Maybe I could be like that."
KR: "어쩌면 그렇게 될 수 있을지도 모른다고 생각했어."

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私も、アオイみたいに、余計なものを目に入れないで、真っ直ぐに向き合えるかなって」
Translation: "Maybe I could learn to be like her—to stop overthinking and start facing my fears head-on."
KR: "나도 아오이처럼 쓸데없는 생각 없이 똑바로 마주 볼 수 있을까 싶어서."

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから――心一」
Translation: "And now... Shinichi..."

Name: c4201.nss
Japanese: 無音のバッティングセンターで、美雪が俺に振り返る。
Translation: She turns back to face me. The batting cages are dead silent.

Name: c4201.nss
Japanese: 全てが静止している。
Translation: Everything comes to a standstill.

Name: c4201.nss
Japanese: 俺もまるで、心臓を射貫かれたように、動けない。
Translation: I'm rooted to the spot like she's got me by the heart.
KR: 나도 마치 심장을 뚫린 것처럼 움직일 수가 없었다.

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「聞いてくれますか？」
Translation: "Will you hear me out?"

Name: c4201.nss
Japanese: 知っている。
Translation: I get it.

Name: c4201.nss
Japanese: 美雪がなぜ、妥協を知らないアオイをうらやんだのか。
Translation: I understand why Miyuki would envy a stubborn, uncompromising girl like Aoi.
KR: 어째서 미유키가 타협을 모르는 아오이를 부러워했는지.

Name: c4201.nss
Japanese: アオイから影響を受けた美雪が、何を言うのか。
Translation: And now that Aoi's changed her, I know what she's going to say.
KR: 아오이의 영향을 받은 미유키가 무슨 말을 할지.

Name: c4201.nss
Japanese: ずっと、抑圧されてきた想い。
Translation: She was terrified of hurting anyone... and of getting hurt herself.

Name: c4201.nss
Japanese: 傷つけあうのが恐くて、ひた隠しにしてきた想い。
Translation: And so she suppressed her feelings for all these years.
KR: 상처 입는 게 두려워서 그저 숨기고만 있었던 마음.

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "I want you to know..."

Name: c4201.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方が――」
Translation: "That I—"

Name: c4202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "—Huh?"

Name: c4202.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……どうしたの？」
Translation: "...What is it?"

Name: c4202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今、あそこから……」
Translation: "I just heard something..."

Name: c4202.nss
Japanese: 聞き覚えのある、ネコの鳴き声。
Translation: A very familiar meow.

Name: c4202.nss
Japanese: 俺は慌てて視線を走らせる。
Translation: Hastily, I look over in the direction of the sound.

Name: c4202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Eru!"

Name: c4202.nss
Japanese: ベンチの下から鳴き声を上げるのは、間違いなく、アオイが拾ってきた子猫のエルだった。
Translation: Sure enough, it's Aoi's kitten, meowing from under the bench.
KR: 벤치 밑에서 울음소리를 내는 건 틀림없이 아오이가 주워 온 새끼 고양이 에루였다.

Name: c4202.nss
Japanese: 俺の家から、どうやってここに？
Translation: How did you get here from my house, you little furball?
KR: 우리 집에 있었는데, 어떻게 온 거지?

Name: c4202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「まさか、ついてこいっていうのか？」
Translation: "Do you want me to follow you or something?"

Name: c4202.nss
Japanese: 電波ネコ――アオイは確かに、エルをそう呼んだ。
Translation: Aoi had called Eru a "transceiver cat."
KR: 전파 고양이... 아오이는 분명 에루를 그렇게 불렀다.

Name: c4202.nss
Japanese: ただの妄想だと言われれば、それまでだろう。
Translation: Sure, maybe it was just one of her delusions.

Name: c4202.nss
Japanese: だが、現に子猫のエルは家から抜け出し、遥か遠い距離を隔てたバッティングセンターへと辿り着いていた。
Translation: But that very kitten somehow escaped the confines of my house and traveled all this way just to find me.
KR: 하지만 지금 이 새끼고양이 에루는 집에서 빠져나와 한참 먼 거리에 있는 야구연습장에 다다랐다.

Name: c4202.nss
Japanese: 俺を呼び出すために。

Name: c4202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「エル」

Name: c4202.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一！」
Translation: "Shinichi!"

Name: c4202.nss
Japanese: 一歩足を踏み出しかけたところで、美雪が呼びかける。
Translation: Before I can take a single step, Miyuki calls out to me.
KR: 걸음을 내딛으려 하는 순간, 미유키가 불러 세웠다.

Name: c4202.nss
Japanese: 拳を強く握りしめながら、震える声を抑えて。
Translation: Her voice is shaking—her hands balled into fists.
KR: 주먹을 꽉 쥔 채 떨리는 목소리를 억누르면서...

Name: c4202.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...Are you leaving?"

Name: c4202.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「話の途中……だよ？」
Translation: "Right in the middle of our... conversation?"

Name: c4202.nss
Japanese: "その場に残る","エルを追いかける"
Translation: "Stay with Miyuki","Chase after Eru"

Name: c4203.nss
Japanese: その先にアオイがいる保証は皆無だ。
Translation: There's no guarantee Eru will actually take me to Aoi.
KR: 에루를 쫓아가도 아오이가 있을 거란 보장은 없다.

Name: c4203.nss
Japanese: 美雪を置いてまで追いかける理由は、ない。
Translation: It's not worth abandoning Miyuki over it.

Name: c4203.nss
Japanese: エルを追いかけることを、合理的に説明はできない。
Translation: There's absolutely no logical reason why I should follow Eru.
KR: 에루를 따라갈 이유를 합리적으로 설명할 수 없다.

Name: c4203.nss
Japanese: それは、わかってる。
Translation: I know that...

Name: c4203.nss
Japanese: それでも――
Translation: And yet...

Name: c4203.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、行って、決着つけなきゃダメなんだ」
Translation: "I have to go. I have to settle this once and for all."

Name: c4203.nss
Japanese: 美雪は１度、肺の中の空気を全て入れ換えるように、深呼吸をして――
Translation: Miyuki takes a single deep breath, filling her lungs completely, then exhales slowly.
KR: 미유키는 폐 안에 있는 공기를 전부 내뱉듯이 심호흡하더니...

Name: c4203.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「わかった」
Translation: "Fine."

Name: c4203.nss
Japanese: 大きなものを呑み込むように、頷いた。
Translation: She nods reluctantly.

Name: c4203.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「その代わり、後でちゃんと話、聞かせて」
Translation: "But in exchange, you'd better hear me out later."

Name: c4203.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、それじゃ――」
Translation: "Alright. See you then."

Name: c4203.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一！」
Translation: "Shinichi!"

Name: c4203.nss
Japanese: 走り出す俺に、美雪は呼びかけた。
Translation: As I take off running, Miyuki calls out to me.
KR: 달리기 시작한 나를 향해 미유키가 소리쳤다.

Name: c4203.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「待ってる！」
Translation: "I'll be waiting!"

Name: c4203.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私、心一を信じて、待ってるから！！」
Translation: "That's a promise, you hear me?! I'll be waiting!"

Name: c4211.nss
Japanese: エルは、店の正面に座っていた。
Translation: I find Eru sitting outside the entrance to the building.

Name: c4211.nss
Japanese: こんな小さな身体で、よく来てくれたもんだ。
Translation: I'm genuinely impressed the little furball made it all the way here on those tiny legs.

Name: c4211.nss
Japanese: 身体を抱えてやると、電波ネコのヒゲがピンと張る。
Translation: As I scoop the kitten into my arms, his whiskers perk up.
KR: 몸을 들어 올리자, 전파 고양이의 수염이 빳빳해졌다.

Name: c4211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイが呼んでるんだな？」
Translation: "Aoi's calling, isn't she?"

Name: c4211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「こっちだよな？」
Translation: "Let me guess... This way?"

Name: c4211.nss
Japanese: エルはまるで、こちらの言葉を理解しているかのようなタイミングで鳴く。
Translation: Eru meows in response, as though he understood my question.
KR: 에루는 마치 내 말을 알아듣는 듯이 적절한 타이밍에 울었다.

Name: c4211.nss
Japanese: 俺の足取りに、迷いはない。
Translation: My feet carry me forward, unwavering.

Name: c4211.nss
Japanese: 数日間、ずっと会うことができなかったアオイ。
Translation: I haven't seen Aoi for days now.

Name: c4211.nss
Japanese: 届くことのなかった、彼女への電波。
Translation: Somehow, my transmission just couldn't get through to her.

Name: c4211.nss
Japanese: 俺と彼女の心を結ぶ、微かな信号。
Translation: Our connection is tenuous at best... but at least it's there.
KR: 나와 아오이의 마음을 이어주는 희미한 신호.

Name: c4211.nss
Japanese: それは運命なのか、それとも――
Translation: Is this fate? Or...

Name: c4211.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ここか」
Translation: "Is she here?"

Name: c4211.nss
Japanese: エルに問いかけるまでもない。
Translation: The answer is obvious.

Name: c4211.nss
Japanese: 通用口の錠が、開かれていた。
Translation: After all, the pedestrian gate was unlocked.

Name: c4211.nss
Japanese: こんなことが出来るのは、彼女しかいない。
Translation: And she's the only one who knows how to pick it.
KR: 이런 짓을 할만한 사람은 아오이 밖에 없다.

Name: c4211.nss
Japanese: そしてもちろん、あの日と同じ――
Translation: And as with that one fateful day, sure enough—

Name: c4211.nss
Japanese: 屋上への扉のカギも、開いている。
Translation: —the roof is unlocked, too.

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: エルが駆け出す。
Translation: Eru darts forward.

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: 初めて見る夜の屋上。
Translation: This is my first time seeing the roof at night.

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: 広がる夜景に、一瞬、息を呑む。
Translation: For a moment, the nightscape takes my breath away.

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: そこには人影がない。
Translation: Upon first glance, the roof is deserted.

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: だが、後ろを振り返れば、そこには――
Translation: But I know if I turn around, I'll find—

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: 振り返っても、そこにアオイの姿は見当たらなかった。
Translation: ...Aoi isn't on top of the roof, either.

Name: c4221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "She's not here...?"

Name: c4221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんで……いないんだよ……」
Translation: "She was... supposed to be here..."

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: 毎日、毎日、屋根の上で空を見つめていたアオイ。
Translation: Aoi used to spend every day up there, staring up into the sky.
KR: 매일매일 옥상 위에서 하늘을 바라보고 있던 아오이.

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: 圏外のスマフォを手に、神様に電波を飛ばしたアオイ。
Translation: She'd stick her broken phone straight into the air and call God.
KR: 권외인 핸드폰을 들고 신님에게 전파를 보내던 아오이.

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: 彼女の姿が、見当たらない。
Translation: But she's nowhere to be found.

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: 諦めるなと言わんばかりに、屋根に向けエルが鳴く。
Translation: Eru looks at the ladder and meows, as if to push me forward.
KR: 포기하지 말라는 듯 에루는 꼭대기를 향해 울었다.

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: だが、いくら注意を向けても、そこには――
Translation: But no matter how hard I look, I—

Name: c4221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん――アオイ？」
Translation: "Hm? Aoi?"

Name: c4221.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 『とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……』
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: c4221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ、いるのかッ！？」
Translation: "Aoi?! Are you there?!"

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: 彼女の電波が、微かに届いた。
Translation: I pick up her signal, ever so faintly.

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: 俺は慌ててハシゴを上る。
Translation: Hastily, I bolt up the ladder.

Name: c4221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Whoa..."

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: 彼女は、屋根の上に倒れていた。
Translation: There she is—sprawled out on top of the roof.

Name: c4221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、アオイ――！？」
Translation: "Aoi?! Hey!"

Name: c4221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 抱きとめて、気付く。
Translation: I pull her into my arms.

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: 身体が冷たい。
Translation: She's freezing cold.

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: 息をしていない。
Translation: She's... not breathing.

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: 目はずっと、閉じたまま。
Translation: Her eyes are closed.

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: 声を出していたのは――
Translation: So who was "dialing" just now?

Name: c4221.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 『デンチ、きれたの』
Translation: "My battery is dying."

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: 屋上に転がったスマートフォンの中――
Translation: Aoi's smartphone is lying on the ground beside her.

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: ゲームキャラの「アオイ」が呟いていた。
Translation: I can see the game version of "Aoi" onscreen.

Name: c4221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「おい、アオイ！　アオイッ！！
　なんなんだよ！？　返事しろよ！」
Translation:
"Hey! Aoi! AOI!
What's wrong?! Answer me!"

Name: c4221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「やっと、また会えたのに――ああ、クソッ！！」
Translation: "Just when I finally found you... Goddamn it!!!"

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: このままじゃ、ダメだ。
Translation: I have to do something.

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: 俺が今、取るべき行動は――
Translation: But what?

Name: c4221.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 『ジュウデン、ひつようなの』
Translation: "Need to recharge."

Name: c4221.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 『ビリビリ、するの？』
Translation: "Wanna... get zappy?"

Name: c4221.nss
Japanese: "人工呼吸する","救急車を呼ぶ"
Translation: "Mouth-to-mouth resuscitation","Call an ambulance"

Name: c4222.nss
Japanese: 彼女は呼吸していない。
Translation: She's not breathing.

Name: c4222.nss
Japanese: 知識も経験もないし、正真正銘の見よう見まねだが――
Translation: I never took any first aid training, so I'm basically just winging it, but—
KR: 지식도 경험도 없고, 진짜 그냥 흉내 내는 거지만...

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Haaaaa...!"

Name: c4222.nss
Japanese: 俺は大きく息を吸い込んで――
Translation: I take a deep breath in—

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Pfffffff...!"

Name: c4222.nss
Japanese: 彼女の唇に、唇を重ねた。
Translation: —and press my lips to hers.

Name: c4222.nss
Japanese: 電気が走ったような錯覚。
Translation: A spark of electricity shoots through me.

Name: c4222.nss
Japanese: 俺は願いを直接吹き込むように、息を送る。
Translation: Praying for a miracle, I blow my lungful of air into her.
KR: 나는 바램을 보내는 것처럼 숨을 불어넣었다.

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Haaaaa...!"

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Pfffffff...!"

Name: c4222.nss
Japanese: 頼む、アオイ――目を覚ましてくれ！
Translation: Please wake up, Aoi! Please!

Name: c4222.nss
Japanese: まだ俺、お前に伝えなきゃならないことがある！
Translation: There's something I haven't told you yet!
KR: 나 아직 너에게 전해야 할 말이 있어!

Name: c4222.nss
Japanese: こんな風に、なにもわからないまま別れるなんて――
Translation: I don't want it to end like this!
KR: 이런 식으로 아무것도 모른 채 이별이라니...!

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Haaaaa...!"

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Mmm...? Mmmn?! Mmmnnn!"

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Mm... mmng... mmm..."

Name: c4222.nss
Japanese: 唇の向こうから、微かな反応。
Translation: I feel something move against my lips.

Name: c4222.nss
Japanese: 閉ざされたままだった瞳が、瞬く。
Translation: Aoi blinks her eyes.

Name: c4222.nss
Japanese: それまで微動だにしなかった腹部が、上下に動き始める。
Translation: Finally, her chest begins to rise and fall once more.
KR: 지금까지 미동도 하지 않던 배가 위아래로 움직이기 시작한다.

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop... boop boop...?"

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お、おい！　アオイ、わかるか？　俺だ――」
Translation: "H-Hey! Aoi! It's me! Can you hear me?"

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シン……イチ？」
Translation: "Shin...ichi...?"

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そう、心一！」
Translation: "Yeah! It's me, Shinichi!"

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どうして……ここに……いるの？」
Translation: "Why... are you... here...?"

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「電波、届いたんだ！」
Translation: "I picked up your transmission!"

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "My transmission...?"

Name: c4222.nss
Japanese: 耳元で、エルが鳴く。
Translation: Eru meows into her ear.

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「アオイのデンパ、カミサマじゃなく……
　シンイチに……とどいたの……？」
Translation:
"My transmission... went to you...
instead of God...?"
KR: "아오이의 전파, 신님이 아니라... 신이치한테... 간 거야...?"

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「みたいだな」
Translation: "Apparently so."

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「からだ……ビリビリ……するの」
Translation: "My body... is all... zappy..."

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ジュウデン……したの？」
Translation: "Did you... recharge me...?"

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What do you mean?"

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ……でんち、きれてたの」
Translation: "Aoi's battery... died..."

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そ、そっか」
Translation: "Oh... I see..."

Name: c4222.nss
Japanese: 意識を取り戻したからといって、安心は出来ない。
Translation: I'm glad she's conscious, but it's too early to relax just yet.

Name: c4222.nss
Japanese: 俺は携帯電話を取り出すと――
Translation: I take out my phone—

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「キュウキュウシャ、いみないの」
Translation: "There's no point in calling an ambulance."

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「意味ない？」
Translation: "What do you mean, there's no point?"

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そばに、いて」
Translation: "Just stay with me."

Name: c4222.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それで、ジュウデン、できるの」
Translation: "That way Aoi can recharge."

Name: c4222.nss
Japanese: "救急車を呼ぶ","話し相手になる"
Translation: "Call an ambulance anyway","Talk to Aoi"

Name: c4223.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……わかったよ」
Translation: "...Alright."

Name: c4223.nss
Japanese: 俺は、アオイの懇願に負け、頷いた。
Translation: If that's what she wants, I won't say no.
KR: 나는 어쩔 수 없이 고개를 끄덕였다.

Name: c4223.nss
Japanese: ここで彼女の願いを聞かなければ、彼女がどこか手の届かない世界へと消え去ってしまう――そんな気がした。
Translation: I have this feeling like... if I don't give her what she wants, she's going to vanish off into some distant world.
KR: 여기서 아오이의 소원을 들어주지 않으면 어딘가 손이 닿지 않는 곳으로 사라져버릴 것 같았다.

Name: c4223.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: c4223.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチのデンキ……つたわるの」
Translation: "Aoi can feel... your electricity..."

Name: c4223.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ビリビリ……ビリビリ……」
Translation: "Zappy... zappy..."

Name: c4223.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ずっと……ジュウデン、したかったの……」
Translation: "Aoi has... wanted to recharge... for so long..."

Name: c4223.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ビリビリ……ビリビリ……」
Translation: "Zappy... zappy..."

Name: c4223.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ」
Translation: "Yeah, I bet."

Name: c4223.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「好きなだけ、充電してけ」
Translation: "Feel free to recharge as much as you like."

Name: c4231.nss
Japanese: 彼女の言うとおり、側で話をしているだけで、アオイは少し、元気になったようだった。
Translation: Sure enough, the more we talk, the more Aoi seems to recover.
KR: 아오이의 말대로, 옆에서 얘기하는 것만으로 상태가 좋아지는 것 같았다.

Name: c4231.nss
Japanese: まるで本当に、充電しているみたいに。
Translation: It's almost like she's actually recharging her batteries.

Name: c4231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なあ、教えてくれないか？」
Translation: "Hey, can I ask you something?"

Name: c4231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どうして、俺たちの前から、消えた？」
Translation: "Why did you ghost us like that?"

Name: c4231.nss
Japanese: アオイは、困ったように空を見上げた。
Translation: Conflicted, Aoi stares up at the sky.

Name: c4231.nss
Japanese: 澄み渡る夜の闇に、きらきらと星が瞬く夜。
Translation: Stars twinkle amid the sea of darkness.
KR: 맑게 갠 어두운 하늘, 별이 반짝이는 밤..

Name: c4231.nss
Japanese: 俺たちは世界の中心に座っている。
Translation: And here we are, at the center of the universe.

Name: c4231.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このセカイは、ゲームなの」
Translation: "This world is a video game."

Name: c4231.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このルート、アオイは、サブキャラ」
Translation: "In this route, Aoi is a side character."

Name: c4231.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも――アオイ、バグったの」
Translation: "But... Aoi's glitched."

Name: c4231.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「プログラム、おかしくなったの」
Translation: "There's a bug in the program."

Name: c4231.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「デンパがとどかないと、アップデートもできないの」
Translation: "And it can't be patched unless my transmission goes through."

Name: c4231.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから、きえたの」
Translation: "So that's why Aoi disappeared."

Name: c4231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「説明もなしに？」
Translation: "With no explanation? No goodbye?"

Name: c4231.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイがいなくなったことも、すぐ、わすれる」
Translation: "Once Aoi's gone, you're supposed to forget."

Name: c4231.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それが、セカイの、ルールなの」
Translation: "That's the rule of this universe."

Name: c4231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「忘れないし」
Translation: "Well, sorry, but I won't."

Name: c4231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「雄太郎と一緒に、街中捜したんだからな」
Translation: "Yuutarou and I searched the whole damn city for you."

Name: c4231.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイを？」
Translation: "For me?"

Name: c4231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どうしても、話したいことがあったんだ」
Translation: "There's something I really needed to get off my chest."

Name: c4231.nss
Japanese: 街中を走り回りながら、俺は考えた。
Translation: All that time I spent running around town, I kept asking myself: why am I looking for her?

Name: c4231.nss
Japanese: どうしてアオイを捜すのか。

Name: c4231.nss
Japanese: 見つけ出した彼女に、何の話をしたいのか。
Translation: And once I found her, what was it I wanted to say?
KR: 아오이를 찾아내서 무슨 말을 하고 싶은 걸까.

Name: c4231.nss
Japanese: それはもちろん――
Translation: As it turned out, I wanted to talk about—

Name: c4231.nss
Japanese: "美雪のこと","アオイのこと"
Translation: "Miyuki","Aoi herself"

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイに、話したいことがあるんだ」
Translation: "Aoi, there's something I want to tell you."

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?"

Name: c4232.nss
Japanese: 俺は大きく胸を反る。
Translation: I lean back.

Name: c4232.nss
Japanese: 視界を一杯に満たす、満天の星。
Translation: The starry night sky fills my vision.

Name: c4232.nss
Japanese: 星々の光と人々の灯りで、上も下もわからなくなって。
Translation: And with the lights of the city below, it's hard to tell up from down.
KR: 별빛과 마을의 빛으로 위아래가 분간할 수 없게 돼서.

Name: c4232.nss
Japanese: 重力も消えてしまって、俺は今宇宙のただ中にいる。
Translation: It's almost like we're suspended, weightless, in space.
KR: 중력이 사라진 우주, 그 한가운데 있는 것과 다름없었다.

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、美雪とアオイ、３人でいるのが好きだった」
Translation: "I really liked the time we spent together as a triad."
KR: "나, 너, 미유키. 나는 우리 세 사람이 함께 있는 게 좋았어."

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから、一緒に泊まった日、急にアオイが近く見えて、焦った」
Translation: "Then, the night you crashed at my place, suddenly everything was up close and personal... and I panicked."
KR: "그래서 우리 집에서 자고 간 그날, 갑자기 네가 가까워 보여서 당황했어."

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「この関係が崩れちゃうんじゃないかって思った」
Translation: "I was scared it was going to destroy our friendship."
KR: "이 관계가 무너져 버리는 게 아닐까 두려웠어."

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だからあの日、天地がひっくり返っても、ただの友達とか、バカなこと言って――」
Translation: "Which is why I said you'd never be anything more than a friend to me. In hindsight, that was a really dumb thing to say."
KR: "그래서 세상이 멸망해도 그냥 친구라던가, 그런 바보 같은 말을 해버린 거야."

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「本当に、ごめん！」
Translation: "I'm really, really sorry!"

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ……」
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でも、あれ、間違いだった」
Translation: "It was total bullshit anyway."

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あれからずっと、考えてたんだ」
Translation: "I've done a lot of thinking, and..."

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、お前が、ただの友達だなんて――」
Translation: "Aoi... You're not 'just a friend' to—"

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だめ！」
Translation: "Stop!"

Name: c4232.nss
Japanese: アオイの言葉が、俺の心臓を突き刺した。
Translation: The word pierces my heart.
KR: 아오이의 그 한마디가 내 심장을 찔렀다.

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そのルートは、まちがいなの」
Translation: "My route is just a glitch."

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「たたないはずのフラグなの」
Translation: "That event flag isn't supposed to trigger."

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前が一緒に笑ったのも、間違いか？」
Translation: "Was your smile a glitch, too?"

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「わらった……？」
Translation: "My smile...?"

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前が楽しく感じたのも、間違いか？」
Translation: "What about your happiness? Was that all just another glitch?"

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「悲しくて泣いたのも？」
Translation: "And your sadness? And your tears?"

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「人を好きになったり――
　そのせいで、ひとりきりになって苦しんだり！」
Translation: "You fell in love, pushed us away, and suffered in solitude."

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そういう感情も、あっちゃいけないことだったのか？」
Translation: "Are those emotions all just errors and glitches, too?"

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺は神様じゃない。完璧なんてまっぴらだ」
Translation: "I'm not a god. I'm not perfect. Fuck that."
KR: "나는 신님이 아니야. 완벽 같은 건 딱 질색이야."

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「笑ったり、泣いたり、悲しんだり、喜んだり。
　嫌いになったり――人を好きになったり」
Translation:
"Laughter, tears, sadness, joy...
Love and hate..."
KR: "웃거나, 울거나, 슬퍼하거나, 기뻐하거나, 사람을 싫어하거나 좋아하거나..."

Name: c4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「これからもずっとそうやって、アオイと一緒に、変わっていきたい」
Translation: "I want to feel all of these things, and I want you right there with me."
KR: "앞으로도 쭉 그렇게 아오이와 함께 변해가고 싶어."

Name: c4232.nss
Japanese: アオイを捜しながら、やっとわかった自分の気持ち。
Translation: Over the course of searching for Aoi, I finally figured out how I really feel.
