Name: c5221.nss
Japanese: 気を落ち着かせ、再び雄太郎に向き合った。
Translation: I will myself to calm down, then turn back to Yuutarou.

Name: c5221.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……大声上げて、ごめん」
Translation: "...Sorry for shouting like that."

Name: c5221.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「いや、俺こそ、悪い」
Translation: "Nah, it was my bad. Sorry."

Name: c5221.nss
Japanese: アオイを信じているのなら、声など荒げる必要はない。
Translation: If I actually trusted Aoi, then I wouldn't have felt the need to shout in the first place...
KR: 아오이를 믿고 있었다면 언성을 높일 이유도 없다.

Name: c5221.nss
Japanese: それを自覚しているのが、かえって辛かった。
Translation: ...and this realization really stings.
KR: ...오히려 그 사실을 알고 있는 나 자신이 싫어졌다.

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「曙君を疑ってるの？」
Translation: "Are you suspicious of Akebono-kun?"

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What?"

Name: c5231.nss
Japanese: 朝の大声の理由を話したら、美雪に思いもよらない疑問をぶつけられた。
Translation: This is the first thing Miyuki says to me after I tell her what happened this morning.
KR: 아침에 큰 소리를 낸 이유를 말했더니 미유키는 생각지도 못한 의문을 제기했다.

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「曙君がアオイを狙ってる――そう思ってるのね」
Translation: "You think he's trying to take Aoi for himself, is that it?"
KR: "아케보노가 아오이를 노리고 있다, 그렇게 생각하는 거지?"

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、雄太郎はお前を――」
Translation: "No way. He's more interested in y—"

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私、はっきり断った。それに、随分昔の話だわ」
Translation: "I already shot him down. And quite some time ago, too."
KR: "난 확실히 거절했어. 그것도 꽤 오래전 얘기야."

Name: c5231.nss
Japanese: 確かに美雪は魅力的だが、いつまでも雄太郎の心がそちらに向かっているという保証はない。
Translation: She's got a point. As attractive as she is, there's no guarantee he'll hold out for her forever.
KR: 확실히 미유키는 매력적이지만, 언제까지나 유우타로의 마음이 그쪽을 향하고 있다는 보장은 없다.

Name: c5231.nss
Japanese: むしろ別の女子に興味が移るのが普通だろう。
Translation: Most people would probably try to find someone else.
KR: 오히려 다른 여자를 좋아하게 되는 게 평범한 편이다.

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でも、だからってどうしてアオイを好きに？」
Translation: "But why Aoi?"

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「さあ。理由なんて人それぞれよ」
Translation: "Who can say? People have their reasons."

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイを捜すとき、ずっと協力してくれたんだぞ」
Translation: "But he helped me look for her the whole time!"

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから、疑ったんじゃないの？」
Translation: "Isn't that part of why you suspect him?"

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What...?"

Name: c5231.nss
Japanese: 俺は、雄太郎の協力を友情の証だと思っていた。
Translation: I thought it was just proof that he cares about me...
KR: 나는 유우타로의 협력을 우정의 증거라고 여기고 있었다.

Name: c5231.nss
Japanese: でも美雪の言うとおり、下心があったとしたら？
Translation: Could Miyuki be right? Could he have had an ulterior motive?
KR: 하지만 미유키 말대로 무슨 속셈이 있었다면?

Name: c5231.nss
Japanese: なんて、あるわけが――
Translation: No way... It can't be—

Name: c5231.nss
Japanese: アオイは家を空けた帰り、安いスーパーではなく、コンビニで牛乳を買ってくる。
Translation: The day I came home to an empty house, Aoi showed up with milk from the corner store.
KR: 아오이는 집을 비우고 돌아올 땐 값싼 슈퍼가 아닌 편의점 우유를 사온다.

Name: c5231.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎が手伝っているその店で。
Translation: Yuutarou's family store.

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「顔色、悪いわよ」
Translation: "You don't look so good."

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……いや、大丈夫」
Translation: "...No, I'm fine."

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「全然、大丈夫じゃないじゃない」
Translation: "Really? Because you don't look fine to me."

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「これ、使いなさい」
Translation: "Here, use this."

Name: c5231.nss
Japanese: 美雪が差し出したのは、演劇のチケット。
Translation: She hands me tickets to the play.

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「案ずるより産むが易し。
　単なる勘違いかもしれないしね」
Translation: "Instead of just letting it eat at you, you might as well do something about it. It might turn out to be a simple misunderstanding."
KR: "시작이 반이라는 말도 있잖아. 단순한 착각일 지도 모르니까 말이야."

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「変に抱えるより、デートに誘って直接訊いてみなさい」
Translation: "Rather than stewing in your feelings, you should just ask her out on a date."
KR: "끙끙 혼자 앓지 말고 데이트 신청해서 직접 물어봐."

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ねこぱんちなの！　にゃ！」
Translation: "Kitty punch attack! Meow!"

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「にゃ！　にゃ！　にゃ！」
Translation: "Meow! Meow! Meow!"

Name: c5231.nss
Japanese: エルと猫パンチの練習中の、アオイ。
Translation: Meanwhile, Aoi practices her "kitty punch attack" with Eru.
KR: 에루와 고양이 펀치를 연습 중인 아오이.

Name: c5231.nss
Japanese: しかし俺は、彼女とギクシャクしている。
Translation: Things are so awkward between us now...

Name: c5231.nss
Japanese: デートなんて、一体どう切り出せばいいのか……
Translation: How could I possibly ask her out on a date, of all things?

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「セーブしてみる？」
Translation: "Maybe you should save the game?"

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What?"

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「セーブしたら、失敗してもやり直せるわよ」
Translation: "That way, if you screw up, you can just try again."

Name: c5231.nss
Japanese: 冗談だとわかっても、つい、考え込んでしまう。
Translation: I know she's joking, but... it gives me pause.

Name: c5231.nss
Japanese: もしここでセーブが出来たら、どれだけ楽だろうか？
Translation: If only I could "save my progress" in real life... Everything would be so much easier...
KR: 혹시 여기서 세이브할 수 있으면 얼마나 좋을까...

Name: c5231.nss
Japanese: もし失敗しても、データをロードし直せばいいだけだ。
Translation: I could just reload my file and give it another shot...

Name: c5231.nss
Japanese: 躊躇することなんてなにもないに決まってる。
Translation: With a power like that, I'd never need to hesitate.
KR: 아무것도 주저하지 않고 선택할 수 있다.

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それじゃ私、先に失礼するわ」
Translation: "Well, I'm gonna get going."

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え、いや、ちょっと！」
Translation: "Huh? Whoa, hold on a sec!"

Name: c5231.nss
Japanese: 気付けば美雪は、俺の手元に２枚のチケットを残し、屋根から去るところだった。
Translation: Before I can react, Miyuki walks off, leaving me with the tickets.
KR: 정신을 차리자 미유키는 내 손에 티켓 2장을 두고 떠나려고 했다.

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「迷ってないで、決着つけなさい」
Translation: "Don't think twice. Just do it."

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もし失敗しても、やり直せるんだから」
Translation: "If you mess up, you'll get another chance."

Name: c5231.nss
Japanese: 一方的に言って、美雪はハシゴを下りていく。
Translation: With that, she climbs down the ladder.

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、どこいくの？」
Translation: "Miyuki, where are you going?"

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「ごめんなさい。
　今日はこれから委員会があるの」
Translation: "Sorry... I have a committee meeting today."

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「また午後にね」
Translation: "See you later."

Name: c5231.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「バイバイなの」
Translation: "Bye-bye!"

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: 扉を閉めて、美雪が屋上からいなくなる。
Translation: The door closes, and Miyuki's footsteps fade away.

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: 俺は気持ちの整理がつかないまま、青空を眺める。
Translation: I stare up at the vast blue sky, my feelings still a jumbled mess.
KR: 나는 마음이 정리되지 않은 채 푸른 하늘을 바라봤다.

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「失敗してもやり直せる……か」
Translation: "I'll get another chance, huh...?"

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: 最後に美雪が告げた言葉が、やけに耳に残った。
Translation: Her final words echo in my mind.

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: なんだかまるで、失敗が既に決まっているような……
Translation: It's almost like she knows I'm going to screw up for sure...
KR: 뭔가 마치 실패가 이미 정해져 있다는 듯이...

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: いつの間にか、アオイが目の前で電波を発信していた。
Translation: Out of nowhere, Aoi suddenly starts transmitting.
KR: 어느샌가 아오이가 눈앞에서 전파를 보내고 있었다.

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "...Boop boop..."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「圏外か？」
Translation: "No service?"

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セーブできないの」
Translation: "Aoi can't save the game."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「やっぱり、カミサマ、いなくなったの？」
Translation: "Did God go away somewhere?"

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もしも本当に、いなくなったら？」
Translation: "Supposing He did... what then?"

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「かんがえたく、ないの」
Translation: "It's not a fun thought."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そわそわして……にげだしたくて……」
Translation: "Aoi feels restless... and stir-crazy..."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「怖いんだな」
Translation: "Feeling scared, huh?"

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「こわい？」
Translation: "Scared?"

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: クラスで爪弾きにされ、マンガ喫茶に泊まるアオイ。
Translation: Shunned by her classmates... Living alone in a manga cafe...

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: 彼女は現実を受け入れられなかった。
Translation: She could never bring herself to accept reality.

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: 現実から逃げ出すために、別のセカイが必要だった。
Translation: She needed a new reality that she could escape to...
KR: 현실에서 도망치기 위해 또 다른 세계가 필요했다.

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: だから、神様を創り出した。
Translation: So she invented her God.

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: 神様に頼んで、セーブデータを使って、よりよい現実をやり直すことができる。
Translation: With God's help, she could load her save files and strive for a better outcome in real life.
KR: 신님에게 부탁해서 세이브 데이터를 사용하면 더 나은 현실로 다시 시작할 수가 있다.

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: そうでも考えなければいられなかったんだろう。
Translation: At least, that's what she had to tell herself, I'm guessing.
KR: 그렇게 생각하지 않고는 버틸 수 없었던 거겠지.

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: けどもう、彼女の電波は通じない。
Translation: But now her signal can't reach.
KR: 하지만 더 이상 아오이의 전파는 통하지 않는다.

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: セーブデータから、やり直すことはできないのだ。
Translation: She can't reload her save file.
KR: 세이브 데이터로 다시 시작할 수 없는 것이다.

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そう……こわい」
Translation: "Yeah... It's scary."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、こわがってる」
Translation: "Aoi's just... scared."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチは？」
Translation: "What about you?"

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Me?"

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「はなしてると、わかるの。
　そわそわして……にげだしたくて……」
Translation:
"When we talk, Aoi can tell...
You're restless and stir-crazy, too..."
KR: "말하고 있으면 알 수 있어. 안절부절못하고... 도망치고 싶어하는 게..."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチも、こわがってる」
Translation: "So that means you must be scared, too."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そんなこと……」

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: それっきり、口を開けない。
Translation: I fall silent.

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: アオイに、嘘がつけなかった。
Translation: I can't bring myself to lie to her.

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あたりまえなの」
Translation: "It's normal."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「アオイはふつうのニンゲンじゃなくて。
　ふつうのカンジョウとか、よくわからなくて」
Translation:
"Aoi's not a normal girl.
Aoi doesn't understand normal emotions."
KR: "아오이는 평범한 사람 아니라서. 평범한 감정 같은 것도 잘 모르고."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「あたまのなかがヘンで、デンパで。
　しんぱいかけてばっかりで」
Translation:
"My brain's all weird and spacey...
All Aoi does is get into trouble..."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「……いやなうわさも、たくさんたってて」
Translation: "And everyone spreads all these bad rumors about me..."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「こわがるのは、あたりまえなの」
Translation: "So it's normal to be scared."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うたがうのは、とうぜんなの」
Translation: "It's normal to be suspicious."

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: アオイの瞳が、眩しい。
Translation: Her eyes are so dazzling...

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このままは、いやなの」
Translation: "Aoi doesn't want things to stay like this."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチが、すきなのに」
Translation: "Aoi loves you..."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「こうやって、すれちがって」
Translation: "But we keep misunderstanding each other..."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「なにもえらばないで、こわがってるだけは、いやなの」
Translation: "Aoi can't just put off making a decision out of fear."
KR: "아무것도 선택하지 않고, 무서워하는 건 싫은 거야."

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: アオイの手が、そっと、俺の手のひらに重ねられた。
Translation: She gently takes my hand in hers.
KR: 아오이의 손이 살며시 내 손에 포개졌다.

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おねがい」
Translation: "Please..."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「しんじてほしいの」
Translation: "Please trust me."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイが、シンイチのことがだいすきだって」
Translation: "Trust that Aoi loves you..."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このきもちだけは、うそじゃないって」
Translation: "Trust that these feelings are real..."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイを、ぜんぶ、しんじてほしいの」
Translation: "Aoi needs you to believe everything."

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: この数日、俺はずっと、アオイに恐れを抱いていた。
Translation: For the past few days, I've been so afraid of her.
KR: 요 며칠, 나는 계속 아오이를 두려워하고 있었다.

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: でもそれは、きっと、アオイも同じだ。
Translation: But the feeling was probably mutual.
KR: 하지만 그건 분명, 아오이도 똑같을 터.

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: 失敗を怖がって、ずっと、同じ場所で足踏みしてた。
Translation: Scared of rejection, we've been keeping each other at arm's length.
KR: 실패를 두려워해서 계속 같은 자리에서 제자리걸음 했다.

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: でも、彼女は勇気を振り絞って切り出した。
Translation: But she's finally gathered all her courage to talk about it.
KR: 하지만 아오이는 용기를 쥐어짜내 말을 꺼냈다.

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: セーブデータがなくても、俺ならその言葉に応えてくれると、信じてくれたのだ。
Translation: Even without her save files, she trusts that I'll hear her out.
KR: 세이브 데이터가 없어도 나라면 그 말에 답해주리라고 믿어줬던 것이다.

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: だったらこんどは、俺の番だ。
Translation: And now it's my turn.

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「一緒に、行かないか？」
Translation: "Wanna come with me?"

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: 美雪から受け取ったチケットを、差し出す。
Translation: I hold out the tickets to the play.

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる……いっしょ？」
Translation: "Boop boop... Just the two of us?"

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今度こそふたりきりで、デートしよう」
Translation: "Yeah. It'll be a real, actual date this time around."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「デート……」
Translation: "A date..."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それは、あの、デートなの？」
Translation: "Like, a... a romantic sorta date?"

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ。俺たち、恋人だろ？」
Translation: "Of course. We're boyfriend and girlfriend, aren't we?"

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「コイビト……！」
Translation: "We are...!"

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Got it!!!"

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: アオイは青空に向けて、ピン！　と手をあげる。
Translation: Her hand shoots up into the sky.
KR: 아오이는 푸른 하늘을 향해 팟하고 손을 들었다.

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: その手に握られているのは、俺がプレゼントとして贈った黒猫のヘアピンだ。
Translation: Clutched in her palm is the kitty hairpin I bought for her.
KR: 그 손에 쥐어있는 건 내가 선물로 준 검은 고양이 헤어핀이었다.

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ヘアピンつけて、デートなの！！」
Translation: "Aoi can wear her hairpin and everything!"

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、シンイチと、デートするの！！」
Translation: "Aoi's going on a real date with Shinichi!"

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、そんな改まって言わなくても――」
Translation: "I mean, it won't be super fancy—"

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも、うれしいの」
Translation: "But Aoi's really excited!"

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「すごく、すごく、うれしいの」
Translation: "And really, really happy..."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セカイが、でんぐりがえり、するくらい……」
Translation: "Feels like the whole world is topsy-turvy..."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Aoi's... just so... happy... Boop boop?"

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: アオイが、その場に崩れ落ちる。
Translation: Aoi crumples to the ground.

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ？　大丈夫か！」
Translation: "Aoi?! You okay?!"

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いたいの」
Translation: "It hurts..."

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ホントにでんぐり返るとか――大げさなんだよ」
Translation: "You weren't supposed to literally get topsy-turvy, you dork!"

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる……ごめんなさいなの」
Translation: "Boop boop... Sorry..."

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: 肩を貸す俺の耳元に、アオイが囁いた。
Translation: With her arm around my shoulder, she whispers into my ear.
KR: 어깨를 빌려주는 내 귓가에 아오이가 속삭였다.

Name: c5241.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「デンチ、そろそろ、すくないの」
Translation: "Aoi's battery is getting really low..."

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: 何故そんな表情をするのかは、わからない。
Translation: I don't understand why she looks so miserable... but...

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: でも――

Name: c5241.nss
Japanese: 呟くアオイの横顔は、やっぱりまだ、俺とは違うセカイを見ているように思えた。
Translation: To me, it still feels like the world she sees is entirely different from mine.
KR: 중얼거리는 아오이의 옆모습은 역시 아직도 나와 다른 세계를 보고 있는 것 같았다.

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "37.5 degrees..."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「微熱だな」
Translation: "That's a fever, alright."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: c6111.nss
Japanese: アオイの表情は、既に憔悴しきっていた。
Translation: Her face is already completely haggard.

Name: c6111.nss
Japanese: 最近ずっと具合が悪いようだったが、まさか演劇の当日だなんて。
Translation: She's been sick a lot lately, but to think it would get this bad on the day of the performance...
KR: 최근에 계속 몸이 안 좋아 보였는데, 설마 연극 날 이럴줄은...

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「デートの、じゅんび……」
Translation: "Gotta get ready for... the date..."

Name: c6111.nss
Japanese: ヘアピンを握りしめながら、アオイがうなされる。
Translation: She writhes on the sofa, the hairpin clutched in her hand.
KR: 아오이는 헤어핀을 꼭 쥔 채 괴로워하고 있었다.

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いいから寝てろ」
Translation: "Just get some sleep."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「来週、俺の誕生日だろ？」
Translation: "It's my birthday next week, you know."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「最近ずっと体調悪かったから。
　それまでにはちゃんと、治すんだ。な？」
Translation:
"And you've been sick a lot lately.
You gotta make a full recovery by then, you hear me?"
KR: "요즘 계속 몸 안 좋았으니까. 그때까지는 다 나아야 해?"

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「誕生日……」
Translation: "Your birthday..."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「ああ、そうだ。
　お前がこのままだと、俺も喜ぶに喜べない」
Translation: "That's right. And I won't be very happy if you don't get better."
KR: "그래. 네가 이 상태면 나도 행복하지 않으니까."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちゃんと、身体、治すんだ」
Translation: "So you need to rest up and recover."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「アオイが……ぐあい、わるいと……
　シンイチも、ふしあわせ？」
Translation: "You're... sad... when Aoi's sick...?"

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「当たり前だろ？」
Translation: "Of course!"

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: c6111.nss
Japanese: アオイは一度、逡巡するように唇を結ぶ。
Translation: Aoi purses her lips and hesitates for a moment.

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「わかったの。はやくげんきになるの」
Translation: "Okay. Aoi will focus on getting better."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そのぶん、シンイチはえんげき、たのしんでくるの」
Translation: "In exchange, you better go have fun tonight at the play."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「残るよ」
Translation: "I'm staying here."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だめなの。ぜったい、だめなの」
Translation: "No! Absolutely not!"
KR: "안 되는 거야! 절대 안 되는 거야!"

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、シンイチをまってるの」
Translation: "Miyuki is waiting for you!"

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でも、アイツは主役降りてるし――」
Translation: "Nah. She dropped out of the lead role—"

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カンケイないの」
Translation: "That doesn't matter."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「チケットくれたから、いくべきなの」
Translation: "She gave you the tickets, so you should go."

Name: c6111.nss
Japanese: いつになく強いアオイの口調に、押し切られる。
Translation: Her voice is unusually firm, and I fall silent.
KR: 어느 때보다 강한 아오이의 어조에 뭐라 할 말이 없었다.

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ひとりでちゃんと、眠ってられるか？」
Translation: "You sure you can fall asleep without me here?"

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うん」
Translation: "Yeah."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「エルと遊ぶのもナシだぞ」
Translation: "No playing with Eru, you hear me?"

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うん」
Translation: "Okay."

Name: c6111.nss
Japanese: アオイのことは心配だが、彼女は一度言いだしたら頑固なところがある。
Translation: I don't feel great about this, but I know how stubborn she can be about this stuff.
KR: 걱정되긴 하지만, 아오이는 고집스러운 면이 있어서 한번 꺼낸 말은 지킨다.

Name: c6111.nss
Japanese: 美雪にチケットをもらった恩もあることだし、ここは大人しく演劇を観に行くことにしよう。
Translation: I DO owe Miyuki for getting us the tickets, so I guess I ought to give in and go see the play.
KR: 티켓을 받고서 안 가기도 뭐하니, 여기선 얌전히 연극을 보러 가자.

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それじゃ、行ってくる」
Translation: "Alright, I'll be back later."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ！」
Translation: "Shinichi!"

Name: c6111.nss
Japanese: 不意に、アオイがソファから身を起こした。
Translation: Just then, Aoi sits upright on the sofa.

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あのね、シンイチ」
Translation: "Listen, Shinichi."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイのたんじょうび」
Translation: "Do you know..."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「しってる？」
Translation: "...when my birthday is?"

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え、えっと……聞いたこと、あったっけ？」
Translation: "Uhhhh... Not sure you ever told me..."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "It's May 23rd."

Name: c6111.nss
Translation: May 23rd...

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それじゃ、アオイは俺より早いんだな」
Translation: "So you were born before me, huh?"

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「コールナンバー、おしえるの」
Translation: "Aoi will teach you my code number."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「コールナンバー？」
Translation: "What's a code number?"

Name: c6111.nss
Japanese: 新たな単語に、俺はまたアオイのデンパ発言を覚悟するが――
Translation: I assume this is just another one of Aoi's verbal tics...
KR: 새로운 단어의 등장에 나는 아오이의 4차원 발언을 각오했지만...

Name: c6111.nss
Japanese: なんだか、アオイの表情はやけに真剣だった。
Translation: ...and yet her expression is steely.
KR: 왠지 아오이의 표정이 유난히 심각해 보였다.

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「かみさまがくれた、きんきゅうのれんらくさき」
Translation: "God gave me this special phone number for emergencies."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「もしもアオイが、シンイチのそばからきえても、このバンゴウをニュウリョクすれば、もどってこられるの」
Translation: "If anything happens to me, you can dial this number to bring me back."
KR: "혹시 아오이가 신이치 곁에서 사라져도, 이 번호를 누르면 돌아올 수 있어."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイが……消える？」
Translation: "Bring you back... from where...?"

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おぼえるの」
Translation: "Just memorize it, okay?"

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、消えるって――」
Translation: "No, hang on! Where are you going?"

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きえないの。だいじょうぶなの」
Translation: "Nowhere. It's okay."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「でも、まんがいち。
　コールナンバー、おぼえるの」
Translation:
"This is just a safety measure.
Now memorize this code number."
KR: "그래도 만에 하나. 콜 넘버 기억하는 거야."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アタマにキューキューの『９・９・９』をつけて、たんじょうびの０・５・２・３を、２かい」
Translation: "First, put 999, like you're calling the cops. Then dial my birthday, 0523, two times."
KR: "맨 처음 999를 누르고, 내 생일 0523을 두 번."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それが、アオイのコールナンバーなの」
Translation: "That's my code number, okay?"

Name: c6111.nss
Japanese: アオイの誕生日は、５月の２３日。
Translation: First, dial 999...

Name: c6111.nss
Japanese: ９９９を頭につけて、繰り返す。
Translation: Then punch in Aoi's birthday twice.

Name: c6111.nss
Japanese: 言われるがまま、俺は頭の中で復唱した。
Translation: I repeat it over and over in my mind.

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイのたんじょうび、おぼえてたら、わすれない」
Translation: "If you can remember my birthday, you won't forget."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ぜったい、キオク、してほしいの」
Translation: "So make sure to memorize it."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ぜったい……おねがいなの」
Translation: "Promise me... okay?"

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「わかったよ」
Translation: "Okay. I promise."

Name: c6111.nss
Japanese: なぜ突然言いだしたのかはわからなかったが。
Translation: Not sure where the heck that came from...
KR: 왜 갑자기 저런 말을 꺼냈는지는 몰라도...

Name: c6111.nss
Japanese: ５月２３日――メモしておいた方がいいかもしれない。
Translation: Maybe I should write this number down somewhere.

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ」
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、シンイチを……」
Translation: "Aoi wants you to know..."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アイしてるの」
Translation: "...Aoi is in love with you."

Name: c6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ……うん」
Translation: "Right... Thanks."

Name: c6111.nss
Japanese: 真っ赤な顔で告白する、アオイ。
Translation: Her face is flushed bright red.

Name: c6111.nss
Japanese: こんなことを言われたのは初めてで。
Translation: No one's ever said that to me before...

Name: c6111.nss
Japanese: 嬉しいけど、嬉しいんだけど……
Translation: Part of me is thrilled...

Name: c6111.nss
Japanese: やっぱり、様子がいつもと違っていた。
Translation: ...and yet, somehow, something seems off about her.

Name: c6112.nss
Japanese: 演劇に向かおうと玄関で靴を履いていると、首輪の鈴を鳴らして、エルが行く手を塞ぐ。
Translation: As I'm putting my shoes on by the front door, I hear the jingle of a bell, and the next thing I know, Eru is standing in my path.
KR: 연극을 보러 가려고 현관에서 신발을 신고 있는데, 목에 방울을 울리며 에루가 길을 막았다.

Name: c6112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、こら。落ち着けって」
Translation: "Hey, c'mon. Settle down, furball."

Name: c6112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんだ？　行かせないってのか？」
Translation: "What? You don't want me to go, is that it?"

Name: c6112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「別にアオイが嫌いになったわけじゃないから」
Translation: "Just relax. I'm not abandoning Aoi or anything, okay?"

Name: c6112.nss
Japanese: 言い聞かせるが、エルは全く聞く素振りを見せない。
Translation: Eru ignores me.
KR: 타일러봐도 에루는 전혀 들은 척도 하지 않았다.

Name: c6112.nss
Japanese: 明らかに気が立っていた。
Translation: The little guy is completely pissed.

Name: c6112.nss
Japanese: 普段はもっと聞き分けが良いはずなのだが……
Translation: Normally he's so well-behaved, too...
KR: 평소에는 좀 더 말귀를 알아듣는 편이었는데...

Name: c6112.nss
Japanese: "嫌な予感がする","気にせず演劇に向かう"
Translation: "Take this as a sign","Go see the play anyway"
KR: "안 좋은 예감이 든다","신경 쓰지 않고 연극을 보러 간다"

Name: c6113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もしかして……」
Translation: "Maybe..."

Name: c6113.nss
Japanese: 猫デンパ。
Translation: Eru is a transceiver cat.

Name: c6113.nss
Japanese: エルが持つ予知能力のようなものを、アオイはそうやって表現した。
Translation: Aoi told me all about his supposed powers of precognition.
KR: 에루가 지닌 예지능력을 아오이는 그렇게 표현했다.

Name: c6113.nss
Japanese: 簡単に信じるのもどうかと思うが、夜の校舎でアオイを見つけたのは、エルのおかげだ。
Translation: I know I should probably take it all with a grain of salt, but at the same time... Eru's the one who helped me find her on the school roof that night.
KR: 그런 걸 믿는 사람이 있을까 싶지만, 한밤중 학교에서 아오이를 찾아낸 건 에루 덕분이다.

Name: c6113.nss
Japanese: 俺は携帯で時計を確認。
Translation: I check the time on my phone.

Name: c6113.nss
Japanese: 開演までは、まだ３０分ほどの余裕がある。
Translation: Thirty minutes until the show starts.
KR: 개막 전까지 아직 30분 정도 여유가 있다.

Name: c6113.nss
Japanese: 疑うようで気が引けるが、いつもと違うアオイの素振りも、気になって仕方ない。
Translation: I feel bad for suspecting her, but admittedly, something has been bothering me about her behavior lately.
KR: 의심하는 것 같아 꺼림칙하지만, 평소와 다른 아오이의 모습도 신경 쓰여 어쩔 수 없었다.

Name: c6113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……わかったよ」
Translation: "...Fine."

Name: c6113.nss
Japanese: 言いようのない衝動が、俺を突き動かしていた。
Translation: My instinct compels me to take action.
KR: 형용할 수 없는 본능이 나를 움직였다.

Name: c6113.nss
Japanese: しばらく庭の茂みで、様子を窺うことにする。
Translation: And so I decide to hide in the bushes and wait.
KR: 나는 잠시 수풀에 숨어 상황을 지켜보기로 했다.

Name: c6121.nss
Japanese: 確かにここ数日、アオイは目に見えておかしかった。
Translation: Fact of the matter is, Aoi hasn't been acting like herself the past few days.
KR: 확실히 요 며칠 동안 아오이는 눈에 띄게 이상했다.

Name: c6121.nss
Japanese: なんだかめっきり元気がなくなり、日常生活でもぼんやりすることが多くなっていた。
Translation: Her sparkle is completely gone. She just sort of... survives each day, from one moment to the next.
KR: 어쩐지 부쩍 힘이 없고 일상생활에서도 멍하니 있는 때가 많았다.

Name: c6121.nss
Japanese: 体調が悪いものだとばかり思っていたが――
Translation: I had assumed she was physically sick, but...

Name: c6121.nss
Japanese: 扉が開く小さな音に、飛び上がるほど反応してしまう。
Translation: The sound of the door opening makes me flinch.
KR: 살며시 문이 열리는 소리에 놀라 자빠질 뻔했다.

Name: c6121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: c6121.nss
Japanese: 赤らんだ顔をしたアオイが、玄関から姿を現した。
Translation: Aoi steps outside, her face still flushed.

Name: c6121.nss
Japanese: 家で寝ているように、何度も念を押したのに。
Translation: I told her to stay home and get some rest.
KR: 집에서 자고 있으라고 몇 번이고 거듭 말했는데...

Name: c6121.nss
Japanese: 彼女は約束を破り、家から出ていた。
Translation: But here she is, breaking our promise.

Name: c6121.nss
Japanese: 俺がプレゼントした、黒猫のヘアピン、
Translation: She gazes down at the kitty hairpin in her hand.

Name: c6121.nss
Japanese: それをじっと見つめて、呟いた。

Name: c6121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ――」
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: c6121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイを、ゆるしてなの」
Translation: "Please forgive me..."

Name: c6121.nss
Japanese: 祈るように呟くと、アオイは熱に浮かされたような足取りで道路へ。
Translation: As she whispers, she staggers onto the street in a feverish haze.
KR: 기도하듯 중얼거리던 아오이는 열이 나는 환자처럼 비틀거리며 걸어갔다.

Name: c6121.nss
Japanese: 懺悔するようなアオイの呟きが、耳の奥に響く。
Translation: I can still hear Aoi's pained plea ringing in my ears.
KR: 참회하는 듯한 아오이의 목소리가 귀에 맴돈다.

Name: c6121.nss
Japanese: 俺は茂みの陰で唇を噛み締めながら、覚悟を決めた。
Translation: Biting my lip, I come to a decision.

Name: c6121.nss
Japanese: このままアオイの外出を見過ごすわけにはいかない。
Translation: I can't overlook this little excursion.
KR: 이대로 아오이의 외출을 두고 볼 순 없었다.

Name: c6121.nss
Japanese: 家を出て、アオイの後ろを追いかける。
Translation: I climb out of the bushes and follow her.

Name: c6121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop... boop..."

Name: c6121.nss
Japanese: まるで宙に浮かぶように、不安定に。
Translation: She stumbles along like she's walking on clouds.

Name: c6121.nss
Japanese: なにか見えない電波に導かれるように、ゆらゆらと。
Translation: Almost as though she's following an invisible signal.

Name: c6121.nss
Japanese: 学校へ向かう最短ルートを離れ、アオイは――
Translation: Then she steps off the road to the school and...

Name: c6131.nss
Japanese: コンビニに入った。
Translation: ...heads inside the corner store.

Name: c6131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……買い物、だよな？」
Translation: "...She's just going shopping... right?"

Name: c6131.nss
Japanese: きっと、風邪薬の買い置きが切れたのだろう。
Translation: She must have run out of cold medicine.
KR: 분명 감기약이 다 떨어져서 그런 걸 거야.

Name: c6131.nss
Japanese: あるいは、エルの牛乳がなくなったのかもしれない。
Translation: Or maybe Eru needs more milk.
KR: 아니면 에루가 마실 우유가 다 떨어진 걸지도 몰라.

Name: c6131.nss
Japanese: 他には、そうだな、突然トイレに入りたくなったとか。
Translation: Or... that's it! Maybe she randomly needed to use the restroom!
KR: 아님... 그래, 갑자기 화장실에 가고 싶어졌을지도!

Name: c6131.nss
Japanese: 好物のヤバトマを買いに来たとか。
Translation: Or maybe she's just jonesing for a Yabaley's!

Name: c6131.nss
Japanese: それから、それから――
Translation: Or... or...

Name: c6131.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「もしかして、浮気されてる気配とか、ないか？」
Translation: "Do you think maybe she's cheating on you?"

Name: c6131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「曙君を疑ってるの？」
Translation: "Are you suspicious of Akebono-kun?"

Name: c6131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アイツは俺の、友達だぞ……」
Translation: "He's my friend..."

Name: c6131.nss
Japanese: 呟きは、泣けるくらいに空々しい。
Translation: The words sound painfully fake, even to me.
KR: 그렇게 중얼거렸지만 눈물이 날 정도로 공허했다.

Name: c6131.nss
Japanese: 身体の奥底から、やり場のない怒りと、どうしようもない情けなさがわき上がってくる。
Translation: My chest fills with suppressed anger and unbearable guilt.
KR: 몸속 깊은 곳에서 참을 수 없는 분노와 억누를 수 없는 한심함이 북받쳐 올라왔다.

Name: c6131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイを、ぜんぶ、しんじてほしいの」
Translation: "Aoi needs you to believe everything."

Name: c6131.nss
Japanese: 彼女は俺に、そう懇願した。
Translation: I remember her begging me.

Name: c6131.nss
Japanese: あの言葉はなんだったんだ？
Translation: But what did she mean by that?

Name: c6131.nss
Japanese: そこまでして、アオイは俺を騙そうとしていたのか？
Translation: Would she really go that far to deceive me?
KR: 그런 말까지 해서 날 속이려 한 거야?

Name: c6131.nss
Japanese: チャイムと共に、コンビニの自動ドアが開く。
Translation: The automatic doors slide open with the familiar corner store chime.
KR: 그때, 딩동 소리와 함께 편의점 문이 열렸다.

Name: c6131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: c6131.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「アオイ先輩……大丈夫ですか？」
Translation: "Aoi-senpai... Are you alright?"

Name: c6131.nss
Japanese: ハルちゃん……だった。
Translation: It's... Haru-chan...

Name: c6131.nss
Japanese: 確か彼女も、このコンビニでバイトをしている。
Translation: I forgot she works here, too...

Name: c6131.nss
Japanese: それに気付いた途端、俺の中で燻っていた疑問が、一気に氷解した。
Translation: Instantly, my misgivings melt away.
KR: 그걸 깨달은 순간, 내 안에서 피어오르던 의문이 단번에 녹아내렸다.

Name: c6131.nss
Japanese: アオイは、彼女に会いに来ただけ。
Translation: Aoi just came to see her.

Name: c6131.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎が目的ではなかった。
Translation: She's not here for Yuutarou at all.

Name: c6131.nss
Japanese: 浮気をしていたわけではないのだ。
Translation: She isn't cheating on me!

Name: c6131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ハルちゃん、はやく、いくの」
Translation: "Haru-chan, we have to hurry."

Name: c6131.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Translation: "O-Okay...!"

Name: c6131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はは……はははは……」
Translation: "Haha... hahahaha..."

Name: c6131.nss
Japanese: ふたりの後ろ姿を見送りながら、笑いが漏れた。
Translation: I laugh to myself as I watch them go.
KR: 두 사람의 뒷모습을 떠나보내자 웃음이 새어나왔다.

Name: c6141.nss
Japanese: 夕陽の暮れかけた道を、俺は早足で進む。
Translation: I hurry down the road, beneath the red rays of the sunset.

Name: c6141.nss
Japanese: 急いで行けば、開演までには間に合いそうだ。
Translation: If I run, I can still make it in time for the play.
KR: 서두르면 공연 시간에 맞출 수 있을 것 같았다.

Name: c6141.nss
Japanese: とんだ寄り道だったが、誤解が解けて良かった。
Translation: Admittedly I took a hell of a detour, but at least I've resolved that misunderstanding!
KR: 엄청 돌아가긴 했지만, 오해가 풀려서 다행이야...

Name: c6141.nss
Japanese: 一瞬でもアオイや雄太郎を疑ってしまった自分が、恥ずかしくてたまらない。
Translation: Man, I'm so ashamed of myself for ever doubting Aoi or Yuutarou.
KR: 한순간이라도 아오이와 유우타로를 의심한 자신이 너무나 부끄럽다.

Name: c6141.nss
Japanese: もちろん、アオイの外出の理由は気になる。
Translation: Of course, I'd still like to know why Aoi left the house.

Name: c6141.nss
Japanese: なぜ彼女が、俺を騙すように家を出たのか……
Translation: Especially since she did it behind my back...
KR: 어째서 아오이는 날 속이고 집을 나간 건지...

Name: c6141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「理由があるんだよな」
Translation: "I'm sure there's gotta be a good reason for it... right...?"

Name: c6141.nss
Japanese: ハルちゃんは演劇部だ。
Translation: Haru-chan's in the theatre club.

Name: c6141.nss
Japanese: 彼女に協力してもらって、なにか俺を驚かそうとしている可能性だって、ないとはいえない。
Translation: I can't rule out the possibility that the two of them are working on some kind of birthday surprise for me.
KR: 어쩌면 하루의 도움을 받아 나를 놀래키려는 속셈일 지도 모른다.

Name: c6141.nss
Japanese: もしかしたら、俺はなにも見なかったことにした方が良いかもしれない。
Translation: Maybe I should pretend I didn't see anything.
KR: 아무것도 못 본 척하는 게 나을지도...

Name: c6151.nss
Japanese: チケットをもぎってもらい、暗幕の張られた体育館へ。
Translation: I hand in my ticket and head into the dark gymnasium.

Name: c6151.nss
Japanese: まだ開演はしていないが、席はほぼ満席。
Translation: The play has yet to start, but most of the seats are full.
KR: 아직 연극이 시작하지 않았지만, 자리는 거의 만석이었다.

Name: c6151.nss
Japanese: 後は幕が上がるのを待つだけだ。
Translation: All that's left is to wait for the curtain to rise.

Name: c6151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一！　遅いじゃない！」
Translation: "Shinichi! You're late!"

Name: c6151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、ちょっと野暮用で」
Translation: "Yeah, I know. Something came up."

Name: c6151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイいないみたいだけど、彼女絡み？」
Translation: "I see Aoi's not with you. Is something going on with her?"
KR: "아오이 없는 것 같은데, 무슨 일 있어?"

Name: c6151.nss
Japanese: もし美雪もサプライズを用意してるとすると、ここで正直に答えるのは悪い。
Translation: If Miyuki's in on the surprise, then I probably shouldn't cop to what I saw just now...
KR: 혹시 미유키도 서프라이즈를 준비했다면, 여기서 솔직하게 말하기엔 미안하다.

Name: c6152.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あいつは体調不良」
Translation: "She's feeling sick today."

Name: c6152.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「体調不良――！？」
Translation: "She's sick?!"

Name: c6152.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、そんな深刻じゃないって」
Translation: "Don't worry. It's nothing serious."

Name: c6152.nss
Japanese: 表情を強張らせる美雪に、俺は軽く首を振る。
Translation: Miyuki's expression stiffens, but I wave away her concern.
KR: 표정이 굳은 미유키에게 나는 고개를 저었다.

Name: c6152.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「微熱が出ただけだから
　最近ずっと調子悪かっただろ？」
Translation:
"Just a minor fever.
You know how she's been under the weather lately."
KR: "열이 조금 올라서. 최근에 몸 안 좋았잖아?"

Name: c6152.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちょっと、アオイに連絡してみてくれる？」
Translation: "You should try calling her."

Name: c6152.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、でもアイツいつも圏外だし」
Translation: "Her phone's always out of service, though."

Name: c6152.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「家の電話でいいわ」
Translation: "Call your house phone, then."

Name: c6152.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「心配しなくても大丈夫だって――」
Translation: "Seriously, you don't need to worry abou—"

Name: c6152.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「お願い」
Translation: "Please."

Name: c6152.nss
Japanese: 美雪の表情は真剣極まりなかった。
Translation: The look in her eyes is dead serious.

Name: c6152.nss
Japanese: どうしてそこまで……？
Translation: Weird... Why is she so insistent about this?

Name: c6152.nss
Japanese: 不思議に思ったが、どうせ電話一本で済むことだ。
Translation: Oh well. It's just one measly phone call, I guess.
KR: 이상하다고 생각했지만, 어차피 전 화 한통이면 끝날 일이다.

Name: c6152.nss
Japanese: 促されるがまま、携帯電話を取りだした。
Translation: As requested, I take out my cell phone.

Name: c6153.nss
Japanese: これもサプライズの一環か？
Translation: Is this part of the birthday surprise?

Name: c6153.nss
Japanese: 半信半疑ながら、俺は無人の自宅に電話をかける。
Translation: Confused, I call my empty house.
KR: 반신반의하며 나는 아무도 없는 집에 전화를 걸었다.

Name: c6153.nss
Japanese: アオイは外出中だろうから、誰かが出るはずはない。
Translation: I know Aoi's not there right now, so no one's going to answer.
KR: 하지만 아오이는 외출 중이라 그 누구도 받을 리가 없었다.

Name: c6154.nss
Japanese: しばらく待ってから、俺は通話を切った。
Translation: After a handful of rings, I end the call.

Name: c6154.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「具合も悪そうだったし、きっと――美雪？」
Translation: "She wasn't doing too well when I last saw her, so she's probably—Miyuki?"

Name: c6154.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「やっぱり、一緒にいるんだ」
Translation: "I knew it. They're together."

Name: c6154.nss
Japanese: 美雪もいつの間にか、どこかに電話をかけていた。
Translation: I look over to find Miyuki on her phone, too.
KR: 어느샌가 미유키도 어딘가에 전화를 걸고 있었다.

Name: c6154.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「わかったわ。うん、今から行く」
Translation: "Got it. Okay. I'll head there now."

Name: c6154.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「用事、終わったか？」
Translation: "Finished your call?"

Name: c6154.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイは出なかったわね」
Translation: "Looks like Aoi didn't pick up, hmm?"

Name: c6154.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「多分、寝てるんじゃないか？」
Translation: "She's probably just asleep."

Name: c6154.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もし外で誰かと会ってたら？」
Translation: "What if she's out with someone?"

Name: c6154.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「デートの約束を蹴ってまで、彼女が会わなきゃならない人がいるとしたら？」
Translation: "What if she flaked out on her date with you to go be with someone else?"
KR: "데이트 약속을 어기면서까지 아오이가 만나야 할 사람이 있다면?"

Name: c6154.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……なに言ってるんだ？」
Translation: "...What are you talking about?"

Name: c6154.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「一緒に来て」
Translation: "Come with me."

Name: c6154.nss
Japanese: 言うが早いか、美雪は出口に向かって歩き出す。
Translation: Without another word, Miyuki strides off toward the exit.
KR: 말이 끝나기도 전에 미유키가 출구를 향해 걷기 시작했다.

Name: c6154.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょっと！　演劇は？」
Translation: "Wait! What about the play?"

Name: c6154.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「役を降りたって言ったでしょう？」
Translation: "I told you, I stepped down from the lead role."

Name: c6154.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でも、せっかくチケット――」
Translation: "But you went to the trouble of getting me these tickets—"

Name: c6154.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私は、誰よりもよく貴方の性格を知っている」
Translation: "I know you better than anyone."
KR: "나는 누구보다 네 성격 잘 알고 있어."

Name: c6154.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方の優しさも、勇敢さも。そして何より――」
Translation: "I know how kind and brave you are... and most importantly..."

Name: c6154.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「嫉妬深さも」
Translation: "I know your jealous side."

Name: c6154.nss
Japanese: 俺が……嫉妬深い？
Translation: My... jealous side...?

Name: c6154.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方には、この現実を見届ける義務がある」
Translation: "You need to face reality."
KR: "너에겐 이 현실을 지켜봐야 할 의무가 있어."

Name: c6154.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから、ついて来て」
Translation: "Now come with me."

Name: c6161.nss
Japanese: もう暗くなった道を、無言で歩く。
Translation: We walk silently down the dark road.
KR: 이미 어두워진 길가를 아무 말 없이 걸었다.

Name: c6161.nss
Japanese: 演劇を抜け出してまで俺を外に連れ出した美雪。
Translation: Miyuki abandoned the performance just to drag me out here.
KR: 연극에 빠지면서까지 날 밖으로 데리고 나온 미유키.

Name: c6161.nss
Japanese: その表情は真剣で、軽々しく冗談を口に出来るような雰囲気ではなかった。
Translation: She's so deadly serious, I don't even feel right making a casual joke.
KR: 그 표정이 너무 진지해서 가볍게 농담이나 할 분위기가 아니었다.

Name: c6161.nss
Japanese: サプライズ……ではないような気がする。
Translation: Something tells me there isn't a birthday surprise after all.

Name: c6161.nss
Japanese: 道筋は、学校にやってきた時と真逆。
Translation: We head back down the road I took to get here.

Name: c6161.nss
Japanese: そうなると、辿り着くのは――
Translation: Then, finally, we arrive—

Name: c6161.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎のコンビニだ。
Translation: —at Yuutarou's family corner store.

Name: c6161.nss
Japanese: もしかしたら美雪も、雄太郎とアオイの仲を勘違いしているのかもしれない。
Translation: Maybe Miyuki has the same misconception about Yuutarou and Aoi.
KR: 어쩌면 미유키도 유우타로와 아오이의 사이를 오해하고 있는지도 모른다.

Name: c6161.nss
Japanese: ならば、やはりここで事情を説明しておくべきだろう。
Translation: If so, I should probably go ahead and explain everything.

Name: c6161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「えっと……
　ホントのこと言うと、俺、さっきここに来たんだ」
Translation: "Listen, uh... To tell the truth, I stopped by here on my way to the performance just now."
KR: "저기... 사실대로 말하면, 나 아까 여기 왔었어."

Name: c6161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイがさ、熱出して留守番してるはずなのに、フラフラ家から外に出てきて」
Translation: "Aoi was supposed to be laid up in bed with a fever, but I saw her stumbling out of the house."
KR: "아오이가 말이지, 열이 나서 집에 있어야 하는데 비틀비틀 집을 나와서..."

Name: c6161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、アオイが浮気してるんじゃないかと思ったんだ」
Translation: "I thought maybe she was cheating on me."

Name: c6161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「でも、それってただの勘違いでさ。
　ハルちゃんってお前の後輩がいただろ？　彼女と――」
Translation:
"But that was all just a misunderstanding.
You know that Haru-chan girl in your club? She—"
KR: "근데 그건 그냥 착각이었어. 하루라고 네 후배 있지? 그 애랑..."

Name: c6161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「知ってるわ」
Translation: "Oh, I know Haru, alright."

Name: c6161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「知ってる？」
Translation: "Yeah?"

Name: c6162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「彼が問題なのよ」
Translation: "He's the problem."

Name: c6162.nss
Japanese: いまいち、ピンと来ない。
Translation: ...I don't get it.

Name: c6162.nss
Japanese: アオイがハルちゃんと出歩くことに、なんの問題が？
Translation: What's wrong with Aoi hanging out with Haru-chan?
KR: 아오이가 하루랑 돌아다니는 게 뭐가 문제지?

Name: c6162.nss
Japanese: いや待て、それより今美雪は――
Translation: Wait...

Name: c6162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「『彼』、って言ったか？」
Translation: "Did you just say 'he'?"

Name: c6162.nss
Japanese: 俺たちの会話を遮って、自動ドアの扉が開く。
Translation: Just then, the automatic doors slide open.

Name: c6162.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「心一！」
Translation: "Shinichi!"

Name: c6162.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「すいませんでしたッッ！！」
Translation: "I'm so sorry, dude!!!"

Name: c6162.nss
Japanese: 店内から現れた雄太郎が、突然店頭に膝をついた。
Translation: Yuutarou dashes outside and drops to his knees.
KR: 가게 안에서 나타난 유우타로는 갑자기 무릎을 꿇었다.

Name: c6162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょ、おい。急にどうした？」
Translation: "Whoa, what's going on?"

Name: c6162.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「まさか龍二郎が……そんなこと、するなんて……」
Translation: "I never thought Ryuujirou was that kind of guy...!"

Name: c6162.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「本当に……なんて言えばいいのか！！」
Translation: "I just... I have no excuse!!!"

Name: c6162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前の弟が、なに？」
Translation: "What's going on with your brother? I don't get it..."

Name: c6162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「まさかとは思ってたけど、知らなかったのね」
Translation: "I always had my suspicions, but this just confirms it."

Name: c6162.nss
Japanese: 美雪は静かに、俺に告げた。
Translation: Miyuki turns to me.

Name: c6162.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「その龍二郎が、ハルちゃんなのよ」
Translation: "Ryuujirou IS Haru-chan."

Name: c6171.nss
Japanese: 曙雄太郎の弟、龍二郎。
Translation: Ryuujirou is Yuutarou's younger brother.

Name: c6171.nss
Japanese: つい先日、雄太郎の悩みの種であった彼が、美雪の後輩のハルちゃんと同一人物――？
Translation: Yuutarou's been agonizing over him for days... and now Miyuki claims he and Haru-chan are actually the same person?
KR: 얼마 전까지 유우타로에게 고민을 안겨줬던 그 녀석이, 미유키의 후배인 하루와 동일 인물...?

Name: c6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どうやっても、男には見えないだろ……」
Translation: "But Haru-chan doesn't look like a guy at all!"

Name: c6171.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「……そうなんだ」
Translation: "...Exactly."

Name: c6171.nss
Japanese: そうか。
Translation: Oh. Right.

Name: c6171.nss
Japanese: 散々話を聞かされてきたが、一番の被害者は雄太郎だ。
Translation: Yuutarou's told me time and time again about Ryuujirou's dangerous good looks.
KR: 쭉 얘기를 들어왔지만, 가장 큰 피해자는 유우타로다.

Name: c6171.nss
Japanese: 言われてみれば、確かに納得いく点もある。
Translation: And if I think about it, it does sort of explain some things...
KR: 듣고 보니 확실히 납득할만한 점도 있다.

Name: c6171.nss
Japanese: コンビニでアルバイトをしているときは、かなりボーイッシュな格好をしていたし……
Translation: Like why "she" was wearing a guy's work uniform at the corner store...
KR: 편의점 아르바이트를 할 때, 남자 옷 스타일이었고...

Name: c6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「待て。女子の制服着てなかったか？」
Translation: "Wait... But Haru-chan was wearing a girl's uniform at school!"

Name: c6171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「演劇用の衣装よ」
Translation: "It's just a costume."

Name: c6171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「本当は今日の舞台、男の子が女装してソフトボール部の助っ人にくるって話だったから」
Translation: "In the play, a male character crossdresses in order to fill in on the girls' softball team."
KR: "실은 오늘 무대, 남자가 여장하고 소프트볼부에 용병으로 잠입한다는 이야기였으니까."

Name: c6171.nss
Japanese: 最初の出会いが女子の制服だったから、その先入観がずっと、俺の頭に染みついていたのだが……
Translation: He was wearing a girls' uniform when we first met, so I must have just assumed...
KR: 첫 모습이 여자 교복이라 그 선입견이 계속 머릿속에 남아있긴 했다지만...

Name: c6171.nss
Japanese: そういえば、あの時の彼女は用具室に隠れるほどに動揺していたっけ。
Translation: Come to think of it, that would explain why "she" was flustered enough to hide in the prop closet.
KR: 그러고 보니, 그때 하루는 준비실에 숨을 정도로 동요하고 있었지...?

Name: c6171.nss
Japanese: だがそれも、兄の友人に突然、女装姿で出くわしたと考えれば、俄然納得がいく。
Translation: After all, I'd probably do the same if my brother's friend walked in on ME crossdressing...
KR: 그것도 형의 친구와 갑자기 여장 차림으로 마주쳤다고 생각해보면 이해가 된다.

Name: c6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「でもさ、龍二郎だっけ？
　なんでハルちゃんなんて名前で？」
Translation:
"But isn't his name Ryuujirou?
Why would he go by Haru?"

Name: c6171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ハルは、曙」
Translation: "Ever heard of 'Haru wa akebono'?"

Name: c6171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation:
"Of course... 'In spring it is the dawn'...
That famous quote by Sei Shounagon or whoever..."

Name: c6171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そろそろ、認識が追いついてきたかしら？」
Translation: "So. Has it sunk in yet?"

Name: c6171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ハルちゃんは、男」
Translation: "Haru-chan is a guy."

Name: c6172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「つまりアオイは、貴方とのデートの約束を反故にしてまで、別の男と外出した」
Translation: "Aoi threw her date with you in the trash in order to go see some other man."
KR: "즉, 아오이는 너와의 데이트 약속을 깨면서까지 다른 남자와 외출했어."

Name: c6172.nss
Japanese: 突きつけられる現実。
Translation: Miyuki thrusts the cold, hard reality in my face.

Name: c6172.nss
Japanese: 無駄だとわかっても、俺は必死に目を背けようとする。
Translation: Pointless as it is, I still try to stick my head in the sand.
KR: 의미 없다는 걸 알면서도 나는 필사적으로 현실을 외면하려 했다.

Name: c6172.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「何かのサプライズを狙ってたり、しないか？
　ほら、俺を喜ばせようとして――」
Translation:
"Maybe they're working on a birthday surprise for me!
You know, some fun little—"
KR: "무슨 서프라이즈 같은 게 아닐까? 날 기쁘게 해주려고..."

Name: c6173.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「俺、薄々気付いてたんだ」
Translation: "I think, deep down, I knew."

Name: c6173.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎が、重い口を開く。
Translation: Yuutarou chokes the words out.

Name: c6173.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「龍二郎に、彼女が出来たらしいって話、しただろ？」
Translation: "Remember when I told you Ryuujirou got himself a girlfriend?"
KR: "류지로한테 여자친구가 생긴 것 같다는 얘기, 했었지?"

Name: c6173.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「考えてみたら、向日が店に顔を見せるようになったの、ちょうどその頃からで」
Translation: "Thinking back, that was right around the time Mukou started coming by the store."
KR: "생각해보니 무코우가 가게에 얼굴을 비추기 시작했어. 바로 그 무렵부터."

Name: c6173.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「最近はよく、一緒に外出してた」
Translation: "Lately they've been spending a lot of time out and about together."

Name: c6173.nss
Japanese: アオイはよく、ふたりでねこまんまに姿を現した。
Translation: Aoi was often seen visiting Catnip with a friend...
KR: 아오이가 자주 둘이서 냥이간식에 모습을 나타냈다...

Name: c6173.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「龍二郎もゲームに詳しいから、結構話が弾んでるなあ、っては思ってたんだけど……」
Translation: "And Ryuujirou's a big fan of visual novels and games and stuff, so they'd have all these intense conversations..."
KR: "류지로도 게임 잘 아니까 꽤 신나서 얘기하는구나, 라고 생각했는데..."

Name: c6173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一！　しっかりして！」
Translation: "Shinichi! Pull yourself together!"

Name: c6173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Miyuki...?"

Name: c6173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイは、嘘をついて、心一とのデートの約束を破って、別の男と外出してるだけ！」
Translation: "Aoi lied to you and broke off your date plans in order to be with another guy. But that's all we know for sure."
KR: "아오이는 거짓말해서 신이치와 데이트 약속을 어기고 다른 남자랑 외출한 것뿐이야!"

Name: c6173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「浮気したって、決まったわけじゃないわ」
Translation: "We don't have proof that she's actually cheating."

Name: c6173.nss
Japanese: ――浮気。
Translation: Cheating.

Name: c6173.nss
Japanese: 視界が、眩む。
Translation: My sight goes fuzzy.

Name: c6173.nss
Japanese: クラスの噂通り、なのかもしれない。
Translation: Maybe the rumors were right.

Name: c6173.nss
Japanese: 俺を騙して……裏切って……別の男の前で……
Translation: She tricked me... betrayed me... and now she's with another guy...

Name: c6173.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイを、ぜんぶ、しんじてほしいの」
Translation: "Aoi needs you to believe everything."

Name: c6173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「嘘……だろ」
Translation: "This... This can't be real..."

Name: c6173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「落ち込むのは、事実が明らかになってからでも遅くない」
Translation: "Your feelings can wait until after you learn the truth."
KR: "우울해지는 건 사실이 명확해지고 나서도 늦지 않아."

Name: c6173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「行きましょう」
Translation: "Let's go."

Name: c6173.nss
Japanese: まだ微かに眩む視界の中、美雪の声だけが、俺の行く手を照らす希望だった。
Translation: Blinded by despair, Miyuki's voice is the one guiding light left in my darkness.
KR: 아직 어두운 시야 속에서 미유키의 목소리만이 내 앞길을 비추는 희망이었다.

Name: c6173.nss
Japanese: 追い縋るようにして、俺は道を進む。
Translation: Clinging to that faint hope, I walk down the road.

Name: c6173.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「龍二郎には、さっきから全然電話が通じない。
　心当たりはここだけだ」
Translation: "Ryuujirou's not answering his phone, so this is the only place I can think of to check."
KR: "아까부터 류지로랑 전화가 전혀 안 돼. 짐작 가는 곳은 여기뿐이야."

Name: c6173.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「龍二郎のバイト仲間が、衣装部屋って言って、共同で一部屋借りてるんだ」
Translation: "He shares an apartment here with one of his model friends. It's their 'dressing room,' or whatever..."
KR: "류지로의 아르바이트 동료가 의상실이라고 해서, 공동으로 방을 하나 빌리고 있어."

Name: c6173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「こんな所に？」
Translation: "Here?"

Name: c6173.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ああ。友達は売れっ子ばかりだから、な」
Translation: "Yeah. His friend's at the height of popularity, apparently."

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: エレベーターが止まり、扉が開いた。
Translation: The elevator comes to a stop, and the doors open.

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: 俺たちの他には動くものが何ひとつない、静かな廊下。
Translation: The hallway is quiet and devoid of life, save for us.
KR: 우리 말고 아무도 없는 조용한 복도.

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: 息を潜め、足音さえ立てないようにして、先へと進む。
Translation: We creep down the hall, careful not to make a sound.
KR: 숨을 죽이고 발소리조차 내지 않은 채 앞으로 나아간다.

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: やがて、先頭の雄太郎が足を止めた。
Translation: Then Yuutarou stops in front of a door.
KR: 이윽고 선두에 선 유우타로가 멈춰 섰다.

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: 目的の部屋――８０４号室。
Translation: Apartment 804.

Name: c6181.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ここから先は、お前に任せる」
Translation: "You take the lead from here."

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎の指には、部屋の鍵がぶら下がる。
Translation: The door key dangles from his finger.

Name: c6181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一、よく聞いて」
Translation: "Listen very carefully, Shinichi."

Name: c6181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今なら、ここでやめることもできる」
Translation: "It's not too late. We can still turn back."

Name: c6181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それでも……どうしても、先に進むのね？」
Translation: "So... Are you sure this is what you want?"
KR: "그럼에도... 무슨 일이 있어도 앞으로 나아갈 거지?"

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: 俺はアオイを信じたかった。
Translation: I wanted to believe in Aoi.

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: あの願いを――
Translation: Her words...

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: あの涙を――
Translation: Her tears...

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: 今も、信じていたいと強く願う。
Translation: Hell, I'm still desperate to believe her now.

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: でも――
Translation: But Miyuki's right.

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: 美雪の言うとおり、俺はとても嫉妬深い男なのだ。
Translation: I'm a jealous guy.
KR: 미유키가 말한 대로 나는 질투심이 강한 남자다.

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: 好きになった人が、別の人と付き合うなんて、許せるわけがないのだ。
Translation: I refuse to let the woman I love cheat on me with someone else.
KR: 좋아하게 된 사람이 다른 사람과 놀아나다니, 용서할 수 있을 리가 없다.

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎の手から、鍵を受け取る。
Translation: I take the key from Yuutarou.

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: 冷たく、重く、肌を刺すような感触。
Translation: It's cold and heavy and digs into my skin.
KR: 차갑고 무겁고 피부를 찌르는 듯한 감촉.

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: 受け取った手が震えている。
Translation: My hand shakes.

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: だが、もう止まることはできない。
Translation: But there's no turning back now.
KR: 하지만 더 이상 멈출 수 없다.

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: この扉の向こうに、何があるのか――
Translation: No matter what waits for me beyond this door—

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: 現実を、受け入れることが出来るのか――
Translation: Whether or not I can accept the reality I find there—

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: 疑念ごと押し込むようにして、鍵を穴へと差し込む。
Translation: Pinning all my hopes and fears on the key, I stuff it into the lock.
KR: 의심 가득 담은 열쇠를 구멍에 집어넣었다.

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: 音を立てないように、ゆっくりと回す。
Translation: Slowly, quietly, I turn the key.

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: 重い鍵が、開く。
Translation: Slowly, quietly, the lock slides free.

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: 俺たちは無言で、部屋の中へと足を踏み入れた。
Translation: We walk silently into the apartment.
KR: 우리는 말없이 방 안에 발을 들여놓았다.

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: 床が擦れる音さえ、うるさい。
Translation: The faintest shuffle of our footsteps sounds deafening.

Name: c6181.nss
Japanese: 息を殺し、心臓を押さえ込みながら先へと進み――
Translation: I hold my breath, clutch at my chest, and let my feet carry me forward—
KR: 숨을 죽이고 마음을 억누르며 앞으로 나아갔다...

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: 無人の部屋に辿り着く。
Translation: The apartment is empty.

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: そこは、普通の学生が借りるには明らかに不相応な高級マンションで。
Translation: With all the high-end furnishings, I can't possibly imagine an ordinary high schooler living here.
KR: 평범한 학생이 빌리기에 걸맞지 않은 고급빌라.

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: だが、そこに、人影は、ない。
Translation: But either way, no one is here.

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「お手洗いにもいない。お風呂場にもいない。
　何より玄関に靴がない」
Translation:
"Nobody in the bathroom. Nobody hiding in the tub.
And no shoes by the door, either."
KR: "화장실에도 없어. 욕실에도 없어. 무엇보다 현관에 신발이 없어."

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「来てない……？」
Translation: "So they didn't come here...?"

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いいえ、来てるわ」
Translation: "No, they definitely did."

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「お風呂場はまだ濡れてる。
　蛇口を捻ったら、水は冷め切ってなかったわ」
Translation: "The tub is wet. And the water from the faucet is still warm."
KR: "욕실이 아직 젖어있어. 수도꼭지를 틀어도 물이 덜 식었고."

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「龍二郎は、アオイといっしょにコンビニを出た」
Translation: "Ryuujirou left the corner store with Aoi."

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そしてその後、この部屋のシャワーが使われていた」
Translation: "Then, at some point afterwards, someone took a shower here."
KR: "그리고 그 후, 이 방 샤워기를 썼어."

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……推理は推理だ」
Translation: "...That's just circumstantial evidence..."

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうね。今のところ、確証はないわ」
Translation: "True. As of right now, we don't have any concrete proof."

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「雄太郎、少し探してみて良いか？」
Translation: "Yuutarou, is it cool if I poke around?"

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「お前がそれを望むなら」
Translation: "Whatever you wanna do, buddy."

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: 躊躇がないと言えば、嘘になる。
Translation: I'd be lying if I said I wasn't scared.

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: だが、アオイの潔白が証明できる可能性があるなら――
Translation: But maybe there's a chance I could find proof of her innocence.
KR: 하지만 아오이의 결백을 증명할 가능성이 남아있다면...

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: 俺は、無言のまま、うなずいた。
Translation: I nod silently.

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: 探したくない。
Translation: I don't want to look.

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: 見つけたくない。
Translation: I don't want to find anything.

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: そんな本能の叫びをねじ伏せて、俺は証拠を探す。
Translation: But I ignore the voice screaming in my head and dig around anyway.
KR: 그런 본능의 외침을 억누르고 증거를 찾아다녔다.

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: 見えない何かに追い立てられるように。
Translation: Almost like I'm compelled by some invisible force.

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「きゃっ」
Translation: "Aaah!"

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪！」
Translation: "Miyuki!"

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: 後ずさる美雪の身体を、俺が支えた。
Translation: Miyuki jumps back, and I catch her in my arms.

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どうした？」
Translation: "What's wrong?"

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「その、中に……」
Translation: "In there..."

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: 美雪が指さしたのは、ベッド脇のゴミ箱。
Translation: Miyuki points at a trash can beside the bed.
KR: 미유키가 가리킨 것은 침대 옆 쓰레기통.

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: あの中に、美雪が思わず膝を落とすほどのものが入っていると言うことだろう。
Translation: Whatever's in there, it's enough to make her legs give out, apparently.
KR: 그 안에 미유키가 놀라 자빠질 뻔한 것이 들어있다는 거겠지.

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: 目の前が眩むような感覚。
Translation: I feel my vision grow fuzzy.

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: このまま気を失ってしまえれば、どれだけ楽だろうか？
Translation: If only I could just pass out instead.

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「心一？」
Translation: "Shinichi?"

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、頼む」
Translation: "Go ahead."

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: 俺は美雪を抱えていて、動けない。
Translation: With Miyuki in my arms, my hands are a little full.
KR: 나는 미유키를 안고 있어서 움직일 수 없다.

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: 代わりに雄太郎が、ゆっくりとゴミ箱へと近づき――
Translation: In my stead, Yuutarou slowly approaches the trash can.

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: つい口から溢れてしまった、そんな溜息を漏らす。
Translation: He groans.

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんだ？」
Translation: "What is it?"

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「何が、あるんだ？」
Translation: "What's in there?"

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、雄太郎！　何があるんだよッ！！」
Translation: "Hey! Yuutarou! Tell me what's in there!!!"

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「……コンドーム」
Translation: "...Condoms."

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: 頭を殴られたような、衝撃。
Translation: The word hits me like a punch to the gut.

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「封が切られて、でも――」
Translation: "The package has been opened, but..."

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「使われてない」
Translation: "It's unused."

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: 追い打ちに、視界が完全に途切れる。
Translation: This is the nail in the coffin, the final blow that makes my sight dim.

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: 足の裏の痛覚も、まるで別の世界の出来事のように、遠く感じる。
Translation: The pain in my foot feels distant, like it's happening in some other world.
KR: 발바닥의 감각도 마치 다른 세상 일처럼 멀게 느껴진다.

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一、しっかりして」
Translation: "Shinichi, hang in there."

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: 落ち着きを取り戻した美雪が、代わりに俺の身体を支えてくれた。
Translation: With her composure restored, this time Miyuki wraps her arms around me.
KR: 정신을 차린 미유키가 반대로 내 몸을 지탱해 주었다.

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「まだ落ち込むのは早いんだから」
Translation: "It's too early to give up yet."

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ほら、相手がアオイだって、決まったわけじゃ――」
Translation: "I mean, we don't have any proof that Aoi's the one he—"

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイは、この部屋に来てる」
Translation: "Aoi was definitely here."

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: 脚の下に踏んだそれに、俺はゆっくり手を伸ばす。
Translation: I slowly reach down to grab the thing I stepped on.
KR: 발에 깔린 무언가를 향해 나는 천천히 손을 뻗었다.

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: 指先が震えて、感覚がなくて。
Translation: My fingers are numb and trembling.

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: 掴むことなんて、できなかった。
Translation: I can barely even pick it up.

Name: c6182.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイは――浮気、してる」
Translation: "Aoi is cheating on me."

Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: 床{Wait($time_c6182);}に{Wait($time_c6182);}落{Wait($time_c6182);}ち{Wait($time_c6182);}て{Wait($time_c6182);}い{Wait($time_c6182);}た{Wait($time_c6182);}そ{Wait($time_c6182);}れ{Wait($time_c6182);}は、{Wait($time_c6182);}猫{Wait($time_c6182);}の{Wait($time_c6182);}ヘ{Wait($time_c6182);}ア{Wait($time_c6182);}ピ{Wait($time_c6182);}ン{Wait($time_c6182);}だ{Wait($time_c6182);}っ{Wait($time_c6182);}た。{Wait($time_c6182);}
