Name: c6182.nss
Japanese: 床に落ちていたそれは、猫のヘアピンだった。
Translation: Lying on the floor is a kitty hairpin.
KR: 떨어져 있던 것은 고양이 모양 헤어핀.

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ？」
Translation: "Shinichi?"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...What?"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「しつもんなの」
Translation: "Question!"

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 弾むような、アオイの笑顔。
Translation: Aoi smiles brightly at me.

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「なにか、ほしいもの、ある？」
Translation: "Is there anything you want real bad?"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ほしいもの？」
Translation: "What do you mean?"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「プレゼントされたら、うれしいものなの！」
Translation: "Anything you'd really like to get as a gift?"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチがくれた、このヘアピンみたいに」
Translation: "Like when you gave me this hairpin."

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: アオイがポケットから取り出すそれは、俺が彼女にプレゼントしたものと同じ、黒猫のデザイン。
Translation: Aoi takes a kitty hairpin out of her pocket. Sure enough, it looks exactly like the one I gave her.
KR: 아오이가 주머니에서 꺼낸 건 내가 선물한 것과 똑같은 검은 고양이 헤어핀.

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 肌身離さず持っていると、彼女は言った。
Translation: She always said she'd take good care of it.
KR: 몸에서 떼지 않고 지니고 있다고 아오이는 말했다.

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: だが――本当に、同じ物なのか？
Translation: But... is it really the same one?

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「……シンイチ？」
Translation: "...Shinichi?"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんで急に、そんなこと言いだしたんだ？」
Translation: "What brought this on all of a sudden?"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「え？　あ、なんでもなくて……ただ……その……」
Translation: "Huh? Oh, nothing... Just... um..."

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチのこと、しりたかったの」
Translation: "Aoi wants to know more about you."

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん。そっか」
Translation: "Ah. I see."

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でも、そんな急に言われてもなあ……」
Translation: "It's kinda hard to answer on the spot..."

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「よくかんがえるの」
Translation: "Think long and hard about it!"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ぜったい、なにか、ほしいものあるの」
Translation: "There's gotta be something you want!"
KR: "무조건 뭔가 갖고 싶은 게 있을 거야!"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうだなあ……」
Translation: "Let's see..."

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 俺は、冗談めかして言う。
Translation: A joke answer comes to mind.

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺のことを、ずっと、好きでいてくれる人とか？」
Translation: "Someone who will love me forever, I guess?"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?"

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: アオイの顔が、微かに染まる。
Translation: Aoi blushes faintly.

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うん。それ、アオイも、いいとおもうの」
Translation: "Yeah... That sounds good to me, too."

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「じゃ、それで」
Translation: "Let's go with that, then."

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うん、それで……」
Translation: "Okay..."

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる？」
Translation: "Boop boop?"

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 思い直したように、アオイはひょいと首を傾げた。
Translation: She pauses, then tilts her head.

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それは、プレゼントにならないの」
Translation: "That's not a gift!"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ほかには、なにか、ないの？」
Translation: "Isn't there anything else?"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「他にって言われても……」
Translation: "Like I said, it's hard to think of anything when you put me on the spot..."

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「例えば、アオイが欲しいものってなんだ？」
Translation: "Like... If I asked you what YOU want—"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ！」
Translation: "Shinichi!"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「うわっ！」
Translation: "Whoa!"

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 後ずさる俺に、構わずアオイは抱きついた。
Translation: I recoil, but Aoi clings to me anyway.

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチが、ほしいの」
Translation: "Aoi wants Shinichi!"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だって、アオイは……シンイチが、だいすきで」
Translation: "Aoi just... loves you... so much..."

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ほかには、なにも、いらないの」
Translation: "Aoi doesn't need anything else."

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: うっとりとした瞳で顔を見上げる。
Translation: She looks at me with love in her eyes.

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 夕陽が眩しい。
Translation: The sunset dazzles me.

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 視界が回る。
Translation: I feel dizzy.

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 頭の中が掻き回される。
Translation: My brain rattles around in my head.

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 正気を失ってしまいそうだ。
Translation: I might lose it altogether.

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「すきだから……」
Translation: "Aoi loves you..."

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: アオイの手が、背中からゆっくり下がり――
Translation: Her hand slides down my back.

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイと、いっしょに……」
Translation: "Let's..."

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 尻をそっと撫で回し、そのまま――
Translation: She rubs my ass.

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「エッチ、するの……」
Translation: "...have sex..."

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: ポケットが、震えた。
Translation: Just then, my pocket vibrates.

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「んんっ、悪い！」
Translation: "Mmm, sorry!"

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 俺は慌てて、携帯を取り出す。
Translation: I push her away and hastily take out my phone.

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: アオイを突き放し、美雪のメールに飛びつく。
Translation: It's an email from Miyuki.

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: そうしなければ、俺は、全てを台無しにしてしまっていたかもしれない。
Translation: And if Aoi knew what it said, everything would come crashing down.
KR: 그렇게 하지 않았다면 나는 모든 걸 망쳐버렸을지도 모른다.

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ……？」
Translation: "Shinichi...?"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ごめん、美雪から呼び出しだ」
Translation: "Sorry, Miyuki wants to see me."

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あの、ほしいものは……」
Translation: "Umm... What about your gift...?"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「とにかく、さ！」
Translation: "Just get me whatever!"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前が好きなものでいいから！」
Translation: "Get me something you'd like!"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイが……すきなもの？」
Translation: "Something Aoi would like...?"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それじゃ、またな」
Translation: "Anyway, see ya!"

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 俺はそう言って、逃げるようにハシゴを下りる。
Translation: With that, I dash down the ladder.

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 神様へと電波を飛ばす、アオイの声が微かに届いた。
Translation: Above me, I can faintly hear her start "transmitting."
KR: 신님에게 전파를 보내는 아오이의 목소리가 희미하게 들려왔다.

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 扉を閉めて、離れた途端。
Translation: The instant the door closes—

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「うぷっ、おっ、おぇええええ――――――ッ！！」
Translation: "Urp... hhgg... hhhllllggggg!!!"

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 辛うじて堪えていた吐き気が、一気に噴き出した。
Translation: My nausea overwhelms me.
KR: 간신히 참았던 구역질이 한꺼번에 터져 나왔다.

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ぅげっ、うっ、ぅぅ――ぅ……ぅぅ……」
Translation: "Guh... nng... hhhggg... nnnn..."

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一？　大丈夫？」
Translation: "Shinichi? You okay?"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ぅぐっ、ぅ……ぅ、美雪……」
Translation: "Nnggh... nnn... Miyuki..."

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 美雪はずっと、ここで様子を見ていてくれたのだろう。
Translation: Miyuki must have been watching the whole thing.
KR: 미유키는 계속 여기서 상황을 지켜본 것이다.

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 彼女の手が、俺の背中を優しくさする。
Translation: She gently rubs my back.

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ぅぅ……悪い……」
Translation: "Nngh... Sorry about that..."

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アイツに……身体触られたら……急に……ぅぅっ」
Translation: "Whenever she touches me... I just get so... Hggh!"

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 弾むようなアオイの笑顔を思い出すだけで、ぶり返す。
Translation: The memory of her smile threatens to make me puke all over again.
KR: 신난 아오이의 미소를 생각만 해도 구역질이 다시 올라왔다.

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 背中に手を回されても、寒気しか走らなかった。
Translation: When she put her arms around me, it made my skin crawl.
KR: 아오이가 등을 만져도 오싹한 기운밖에 들지 않았다.

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: なぜならアオイはあの手で……
Translation: After all, I know what she did with those hands...

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 俺以外の……男と……
Translation: She used them to... touch some other guy...

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「無理、しなくていいのよ」
Translation: "Just take it easy, okay?"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……ありがとう」
Translation: "...Thanks."

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 美雪は俺を慰め、吐瀉物の処理までしてくれる。
Translation: Miyuki consoles me and even cleans up the mess I made.

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 彼女がいなければ、きっと、気がおかしくなっていた。
Translation: Without her, I'm sure I would've completely lost my shit by now.

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それで、メールの件は？」
Translation: "So, I got your email. What did you want to talk about?"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どうしてアオイが、なくしたはずのコレを？」
Translation: "Did you find out how she got another one of these?"
KR: "어째서 아오이가 이 헤어핀을 갖고 있는 거야?"

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: 俺はポケットから、黒猫のヘアピンを取り出す。
Translation: I pull the kitty hairpin out of my pocket.
KR: 나는 주머니에서 검은 고양이 헤어핀을 꺼냈다.

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: あの部屋でアオイが俺を裏切った証拠。
Translation: This is proof that she betrayed me.
KR: 그 방에서 아오이가 날 배신했다는 증거.

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: これとよく似たものを、今、彼女は持っていた。
Translation: And yet she somehow has a near-identical pin in her possession.
KR: 그것과 아주 닮은 물건을, 지금 아오이는 가지고 있다.

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「『ねこまんま』で確認してきたわ。
　やっぱりあれ手作りで、ひとつしかなくて……」
Translation:
"I confirmed it with Catnip.
These pins are handmade and one-of-a-kind."
KR: "'냥이간식'에서 확인하고 왔어. 역시 그거 수제작이고 하나밖에 없는 건데..."

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「再入荷した商品を、あの日、彼女が買いに来たって」
Translation: "And Aoi showed up to buy one the same day they restocked."
KR: "다시 들어온 상품을 그날 아오이가 사러 왔대."

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: その一言で、決心がついた。
Translation: ...That settles it.

Name: c6191.nss
Japanese: ただ、吐き気を堪えながら――
Translation: I bite back my nausea—

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「この間の話だけど――頼む、美雪」
Translation: "Okay... I've made up my mind. You know that idea you had?"

Name: c6191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺に、協力してくれないか？」
Translation: "Let's do it."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは」
Translation: "Aoi is..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ゲームのヒロインなの」
Translation: "...a romance option."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「なかみは、からっぽ」
Translation: "Just a 2D character."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「こころも、からだも、かぞくも。
　ともだちも、たんじょうびも」
Translation:
"No soul, no substance, no family,
no friends, no birthday..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「なかったの」
Translation: "Nothing."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも――シンイチはくれた」
Translation: "But then you came along."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイに、ぜんぶ、くれた」
Translation: "And you gave me everything."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから、ありがとう」
Translation: "Thank you, Shinichi."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: ハラリ――目隠しが外される。
Translation: The blindfold falls from my eyes.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 目の前に置いてあるのは、ロウソクの灯ったケーキ。
Translation: Before me sits a candlelit cake.
KR: 눈앞에 있는 것은 촛불이 켜진 케이크.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 「「「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー」」」
Translation: "Happy birthday to you..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー」
Translation: "Happy birthday to you..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー」
Translation: "Happy birthday to you..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー」
Translation: "Happy birthday to you..."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 「「「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー」」」
Translation: "Happy birthday to you..."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 「「「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー」」」
Translation: "Happy birthday to youuu..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー」
Translation: "Happy birthday to youuu..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー」
Translation: "Happy birthday to youuu..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー」
Translation: "Happy birthday to youuu..."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 「「「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー」」」
Translation: "Happy birthday to youuu..."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 「「「ハッピーバースデー・ディア・シンイチ」」」
Translation: "Happy birthday, dear Shinichiii..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ハッピーバースデー・ディア・シンイチ」
Translation: "Happy birthday, dear Shinichiii..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ハッピーバースデー・ディア・シンイチ」
Translation: "Happy birthday, dear Shinichiii..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ハッピーバースデー・ディア・シンイチ」
Translation: "Happy birthday, dear Shinichiii..."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 「「「ハッピーバースデー・ディア・シンイチ」」」
Translation: "Happy birthday, dear Shinichiii..."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 「「「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー」」」
Translation: "Happy birthday to youuu!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー」
Translation: "Happy birthday to youuu!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー」
Translation: "Happy birthday to youuu!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー」
Translation: "Happy birthday to youuu!"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 「「「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー」」」
Translation: "Happy birthday to youuu!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Pfffoooooooo!!!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「心一よ、おめでとう！
　またひとつ、男の階段を上ったな！」
Translation:
"Happy birthday, Shinichi, my guy!
You've taken another step towards true manhood!"
KR: "축하한다, 신이치! 또 한 번 남자의 계단을 올라갔구나!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「いくつになったんだっけ？」
Translation: "How old are you now? I forget."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前と同い年だよ」
Translation: "Same as you, genius."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「べんぎじょう、１８さいなの？」
Translation: "You're legally obligated to be at least 18."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「便宜上ってなんだよ？」
Translation: "What do you mean, legally obligated?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ほら、わけわからないこと言ってないで」
Translation: "Okay, no more shenanigans!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一、お誕生日おめでとう」
Translation: "Happy birthday, Shinichi."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おっ！　デカい……！」
Translation: "Whoa! Look at the size of that thing!"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 美雪が手渡してくれたのは、巨大な花束。
Translation: Miyuki hands me a giant bouquet of flowers.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 百合の花が、すぐ側で香る。
Translation: I can smell the lilies from here.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 色々やってくれていたのは知っていたが、こんなものまで用意してくれているとは思わなかった。
Translation: She's been putting quite a few things into place for me, but I hadn't realized she'd prepared such a thoughtful gift.
KR: 여러모로 준비한 건 알고 있었지만 이렇게까지 해줄 줄은 몰랐다.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 俺だって、こんな誕生日は初めてだ。
Translation: This is shaping up to be one hell of a birthday party...

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 湧き上がる感情を必死に抑えて、口にする。
Translation: Wrestling with my emotions, I force myself to speak.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「みんな……ありがとうな」
Translation: "Thanks, everyone."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「まだまだ、感謝するのは早いわよ」
Translation: "Oh, don't thank us just yet!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「さ、プレゼントを渡しましょう！」
Translation: "Now then, it's time for your presents!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうね、まずは――アオイから！」
Translation: "Who should go first... How about you, Aoi?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい！」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: アオイは勢いよく手を挙げて、廊下へと向かうと。
Translation: Aoi's hand shoots up into the air. Then she dashes out into the hall.
KR: 아오이는 힘차게 손을 들더니 복도로 향했다.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ん……しょ」

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 大きな箱を引きずりながら戻ってきた。
Translation: She returns, dragging a large, heavy box.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: ずいぶん重い物らしく、一生懸命足を動かすが、身体はなかなか前に進まない。
Translation: Though she pulls with all her might, the box barely inches forward.
KR: 꽤 무거운 물건인 듯 열심히 밀어보지만, 몸이 나아가질 않았다.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる……るるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop... boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「えっと、なんなら俺が――」
Translation: "Uhh... Maybe I should h—"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だいじょうぶなの」
Translation: "No help needed..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ」
Translation: "This is..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「からの」
Translation: "...my gift..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「プレゼン」

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「たっ！」
Translation: "...Shi... aaah!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「あちゃー」
Translation: "Whoopsie..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイ、大丈夫？」
Translation: "Aoi, you okay?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「しっぱいなの」
Translation: "Aoi messed up..."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 転んだ拍子に箱が潰れ、中身が飛び出した。
Translation: The box opens, spilling its contents.
KR: 넘어지는 바람에 상자 속 내용물이 튀어나왔다.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ヤバトマ……」
Translation: "Yabaley's...?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「けんこうなの！」
Translation: "It's healthy!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「それが、誕生日プレゼント？」
Translation: "That's your birthday present?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる」
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: アオイはキッチンに向かうと、冷蔵庫の扉を開けた。
Translation: Aoi walks into the kitchen and opens the fridge.
KR: 아오이는 부엌으로 가더니 냉장고 문을 열었다.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「トマトばたけなの」
Translation: "It's tomato paradise!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「だな」
Translation: "Figures."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……今までの中身はどうしたの？」
Translation: "...What did you do with all the stuff that was in there?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「すてたの」
Translation: "Threw it away."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちょっと！」
Translation: "Excuse me?!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「これがアオイのほしいもの」
Translation: "This is what Aoi likes!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それを、シンイチにプレゼントするの！」
Translation: "So now Aoi's giving it to Shinichi!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「よろこんで、くれるの？」
Translation: "Do you... like it...?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ……ありがとう」
Translation: "Yeah. Thanks."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「しばらく健康生活だな」
Translation: "Looks like I'll be getting plenty of vitamins from here on out."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……逆に身体、壊すわよ」
Translation: "...You're gonna make yourself sick drinking all that."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「お弁当づくり、やめられないわね」
Translation: "Guess I'd better keep making lunches for you."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「幼馴染みの、手作り弁当！？」
Translation: "Homemade lunches from your childhood friend?!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「貴様！　食ってるのか！？　食ってるんだなッ！！」
Translation: "You bastard! You've been eating them, haven't you?! You have!!!"
KR: "네 녀석! 먹고 있구나!? 먹고 있는 거구나!!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイもたべてるの」
Translation: "Me too."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ななななっ！！　なんと二色弁当！？」
Translation: "Whawhawhawha?! You get BOTH of them at lunch?!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「いいですね！　男の浪漫ですね！　モテモテですね！
　羨ましいですね！　リア充ですね！」
Translation:
"How nice! How popular you are! How envious I am!
What a dream! What a normie!"
KR: "좋네요! 남자의 낭만이네요! 인기 많으시네요! 부럽네요! 리얼충이네요!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「爆　発　し　ろ　！　！」

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「雄太郎くんも、大変ね」
Translation: "Hang in there, Yuutarou-kun."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「そ、曽根さんに憐れまれた……！」
Translation: "S-Sone-san pities me...!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「おかしい……なぜだ……！？
　憐れみの瞳に、俺の浪漫力が高まっていく……！」
Translation:
"That's strange... I don't understand...
Why does her abject pity make my dreams swell so...?!"
KR: "이상해... 어째서지...!? 연민의 눈동자에 나의 낭만력이 높아져 가...!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「Ｍのめざめなの？」
Translation: "Maybe you're a masochist?"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 曙雄太郎は幸せだな……
Translation: He seems happy...

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: なんて内心、感心さえしていると。
Translation: I'm almost a little impressed.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「さ、いつまでも遊んでないで」
Translation: "Now then, that's enough messing around."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 曽根美雪が長い髪をなびかせ振り返った。
Translation: Miyuki whirls around, her long hair swaying behind her.
KR: 미유키는 긴 머리를 휘날리며 뒤를 돌았다.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そろそろ本番、行きましょう」
Translation: "Let's get back to business."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: ――本番。
Translation: —Back to business.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: その単語が、合図だ。
Translation: That's the code phrase.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎に緊張が走る。
Translation: Yuutarou tenses up.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 俺は、微笑みを押し隠すので必死だ。
Translation: I try to keep a straight face.
KR: 나는 웃음이 나오려는 걸 억지로 참았다.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「え、ええと……
　それじゃあ、まず、俺のプレゼントだな」
Translation:
"Uhhhh...
Guess it's my turn, huh?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「お誕生日、おめでとう！」
Translation: "Happy birthday!"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: ガチガチになりながら、雄太郎がプレゼントを差し出す。
Translation: Stammering, Yuutarou holds out his gift.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ＤＶＤ」
Translation: "A DVD?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ああ。特別編集の、秘蔵ＤＶＤだ」
Translation: "Yep! It's an ultra-rare super-special edition."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ムシュウセイは、だめなの」
Translation: "It better not be uncensored."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カイシュウのキケンなの！」
Translation: "We could get in trouble with the cops."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「あははははは……」
Translation: "Hahahahahaha..."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 明らかにぎこちない、雄太郎の笑い。
Translation: Yuutarou laughs awkwardly.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: だが、アオイがそれに気付いた様子はないようだ。
Translation: Aoi doesn't seem to notice, though.
KR: 그러나 아오이는 알아차리지 못한 것 같다.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「中、見てみていいか？」
Translation: "Can we see what's on it?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「おう、そ、それじゃ俺がセットするな」
Translation: "Oh, sure! I'll just... put it in the player for you."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ケーキ食いながら、みんなで見よう」
Translation: "We can all watch it while we eat our cake."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい！」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: アオイが天高く、手を挙げる。
Translation: Aoi raises her hand to the ceiling.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「美雪のプレゼントは？」
Translation: "What about Miyuki's gift?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Huh? Me?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「私のプレゼントは……
　そうね、最後に渡そうかしら」
Translation:
"Hmm, let's see...
I think I'll save mine for last."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「さいごなの……？」
Translation: "For last...?"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: アオイが問い返した直後、玄関のチャイムが鳴る。
Translation: Just then, the doorbell rings.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる？」
Translation: "Boop boop?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「あ……アイツかな。俺、出てくるわ」
Translation: "Oh, he's here. I'll go get him."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 逃げるようにリビングを出る雄太郎。
Translation: Yuutarou dashes out of the living room.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だれなの？」
Translation: "Who is it?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ。アオイには言ってなかったっけ？」
Translation: "Oh, did we not tell you?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もうひとりお客さんが来るんだ」
Translation: "We invited one more person."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おきゃくさんなの？」
Translation: "Another party guest?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「最近、彼女が出来たって言い始めただろ？」
Translation: "You know how Yuutarou said he got himself a girlfriend?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あの、のうないかのじょ？」
Translation: "An imaginary girlfriend?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そう思ったから、誘ってみたんだ。そしたら――」
Translation: "Or so I thought, anyway. So I told him to invite her, and—"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「かのじょ、じつざいした？」
Translation: "She's real?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「おじゃま……します」
Translation: "Sorry I'm late..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あれ？」
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: アオイの表情が固まるが、それも当然。
Translation: Aoi freezes, but I'm not surprised.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: この声は、彼女には馴染みの声であるはずで。
Translation: After all, she probably recognizes that voice.
KR: 이 목소리는 아오이도 아는 목소리일 테니까.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「コホン！　お待たせいたしました！」
Translation: "Ahem! Thank you all for waiting!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「俺の彼女の――ハルです」
Translation: "Allow me to introduce my girlfriend, Haru!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「ぇ……ぇ、えと……あの……」
Translation: "Uh... uhhh... umm..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「み、皆さん……初めまして……」
Translation: "N-Nice to meet you... everyone..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「私、ハルと言います……よろしくお願いします……」
Translation: "My name is... Haru... Thanks for having me..."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 消え入りそうな声で囁くのは、ハルこと龍二郎。
Translation: Haru (Ryuujirou) whispers feebly.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「あっははははは……」
Translation: "Hahahahahaha..."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎の弟であり――
Translation: Yuutarou's brother—

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 美雪の後輩であり――
Translation: Miyuki's fellow thespian—

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: アオイの、浮気相手。
Translation: And Aoi's secret paramour.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop... boop..."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 笑えるくらい、アオイの周囲の空気が凍り付く。
Translation: The tension hangs in the air.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Hmm?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ、知り合いか？」
Translation: "Aoi, do you know her?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「しらないの！」
Translation: "No!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あれ？　でも……おかしいな」
Translation: "Huh? That's funny..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「たしかコンビニでエルのミルク、相談したよな？」
Translation: "Wasn't she the one who helped you pick out Eru's milk at the corner store?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そうかも。でも、それだけ――」
Translation: "Oh... Yeah, but that's all—"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「まあまあ、細かいことはいいじゃない！」
Translation: "Now, now! Let's not sweat the small details!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それよりほら、ケーキ、食べましょ？」
Translation: "Why don't we all have some cake?"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: テーブルを囲んでケーキを口にする、５人。
Translation: The five of us sit around the table and eat our cake.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 席順の関係で、アオイは龍二郎の隣になっている。
Translation: Aoi ends up seated next to Ryuujirou.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 誰も、なにも、喋らない。
Translation: Nobody says a word.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 黙々と、ケーキが消費されていく。
Translation: Bit by bit, the cake disappears.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: アオイは、まだ混乱しているようだ。
Translation: Aoi still seems panicked.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 普段からあやふやな瞳の焦点が、一向に定まらない。
Translation: She keeps glancing all around the room.
KR: 평소에도 흐릿한 초점이 전혀 고정되지 않았다.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: それを見ると俺は、腹の奥から湧き上がってくる喜びを、抑えることができなかった。
Translation: I can barely suppress a rush of glee.
KR: 그 모습을 보자, 몸 안쪽에서 솟아오르는 기쁨을 주체할 수가 없었다.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Translation: "H-Hey, um...!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「誕生日、おめでとう……ございます」
Translation: "Happy... birthday...!"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 空気に耐えられなくなったように、龍二郎が席を立つ。
Translation: Unable to bear the tension in the room, Ryuujirou stands up from his chair.
KR: 이 분위기를 견디지 못한 듯 류지로가 자리에서 일어났다.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 打ち合わせ通りの台詞は、とても演劇部とは思えないほど小さく、震えていた。
Translation: We'd told him to rehearse this line in advance—but his voice shakes so badly, I find myself wondering how he made it into the theatre club at all.
KR: 미리 짠 대사가 연극이라는 생각이 들지 않을 정도로 작게 떨리고 있었다.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「これ……私から、プレゼント、です」
Translation: "Here's... my gift to you."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 龍二郎が差し出したのは、小さな箱。
Translation: Ryuujirou hands me a small box.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ふぅん」
Translation: "Hmmm..."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 礼は言わず受け取った。
Translation: I take it without saying thank you.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: アオイを焦らすように、ゆっくりと包み紙を開ける。
Translation: Then I open it slowly, to really make her sweat.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Whoa!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「これ、俺がアオイにあげたヘアピン――！」
Translation: "This is the hairpin I gave Aoi!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?!"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 驚きの声を上げ、アオイがポケットの中をさぐる。
Translation: Aoi starts digging around in her pocket.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも、シンイチからもらったのはここに――」
Translation: "But the one you gave me is right—"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「私の部屋に……落ちてました」
Translation: "You dropped it... in my room."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: アオイの表情が、強張る。
Translation: Aoi's expression stiffens.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: まるで突然背後から、突き落とされたようだ。
Translation: Her eyes are wide, like someone just shoved her off a cliff.
KR: 마치 등 뒤에서 누가 밀어버린 것 같은 모습이었다.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: ――その顔が、見たかった。
Translation: ...This is the exact look I wanted to see on her face.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: ――でも、まだまだ、これからだ。
Translation: But we're only just getting started.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「不思議だな。手作りで、数が少ないんじゃ――」
Translation: "That's strange. I thought it was handmade and one-of-a-kind."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ちがうの！　おとしたりしないの！」
Translation: "No! Aoi would never drop it!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチのプレゼントは、はだみはなさないの！」
Translation: "It's a gift from you! Aoi always takes good care of it!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それ、嘘よね」
Translation: "You're lying, aren't you?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ？　アオイ、ウソなんて――」
Translation: "Miyuki?! Aoi would never—"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「店員さんに、聞いたわよ」
Translation: "I spoke to the clerk at Catnip."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あの演劇の日、熱っぽい顔をした貴方が、再入荷されたばっかりのヘアピンを買いに来たって」
Translation: "The day of the performance, you went into the store, flushed with fever, and re-bought the same hairpin."
KR: "연극 당일, 새빨간 얼굴을 한 네가 재입고된 헤어핀을 사러 왔다고."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どこかに落として、慌てて買いに行ったんじゃないの？」
Translation: "You lost it, so you needed a replacement. Isn't that right?"
KR: "어디에 떨어트리고 당황해서 사러 간 거 아니야?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、そんなことしてない――！」
Translation: "Aoi never did that!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私、店員さんに後で聞いたの」
Translation: "Oh, and the clerk also told me..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方、ハルちゃんと何度も行ってたって」
Translation: "You go there a lot with Haru-chan, don't you?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それは……でも……」
Translation: "Well... but...!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「謝るなら今のうちよ」
Translation: "Now's your chance to apologize."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、友人の声で忠告する。
Translation: Miyuki's using her "friendly advice" tone of voice.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「本当の事を言えば、心一だって許してくれるわ」
Translation: "If you come clean, I'm sure Shinichi will forgive you."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも……アオイ、ウソなんて、いってないの……」
Translation: "But... Aoi isn't lying..."
KR: "그치만... 아오이 거짓말 같은 거 하지 않았어..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それは、たいせつなもので……」
Translation: "This is my treasure..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それだけは、おとしたりしない……」
Translation: "Aoi would never lose it..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「じゃあ、部屋に入ったのは、認めるの？」
Translation: "Then you admit you were there, at least?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop... boop..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ハルちゃんの部屋には、入ったのよね？」
Translation: "You went into Haru-chan's room, yes?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ハルちゃんの……へやに……は、その…………」
Translation: "Haru-chan's... room...? Well..."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: アオイの言葉は、掠れて、部屋の中に消えた。
Translation: Her voice is barely a whisper.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 唇を震わせて、沈黙する。
Translation: Her lips tremble, and she falls silent.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「雄太郎」
Translation: "Yuutarou."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「お、おう」
Translation: "O-On it."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎のプレゼントは、ドライブに入っている。
Translation: Yuutarou's "gift" is sitting in the disc tray.
KR: 유우타로의 선물은 DVD 플레이어 안에 들어있다.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 再生ボタンが押され、画面に映りだしたのは――
Translation: He presses the Play button, and the screen lights up with—
KR: 재생 버튼이 눌러지고, 화면에 나타난 것은...

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop?!"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: コンビニエンスストアの映像。
Translation: —security camera footage from the corner store.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 他に客のいない薄暗い店内で。
Translation: The store is dimly lit and devoid of any other customers.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: カウンターの奥で龍二郎とアオイが向かい合っていて。
Translation: Behind the counter, Ryuujirou and Aoi share a tender embrace.
KR: 카운터 안에서 류지로와 아오이는 마주보고 있었다.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うそ……なの」
Translation: "This... can't be happening..."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 荒い画面がズームされて、さらに荒く滲む。
Translation: Then the camera zooms in, and the footage grows more distorted.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 龍二郎と、アオイが、キスをしていた。
Translation: It shows Ryuujirou and Aoi kissing.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 何度も……何度も……
Translation: Over and over...

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「店の防犯カメラを見直したら、映ってたんだ」
Translation: "Found this on our store security cameras."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なあ、アオイ？」
Translation: "Tell me, Aoi."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: どうも俺は、最高に嫉妬深い性分らしい。
Translation: Apparently I'm quite the jealous monster.
KR: 아무래도 나는 질투의 화신인 것 같다.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 今すぐテレビを壊したい衝動を、必死に抑えながら。
Translation: As I fight the urge to smash the TV...
KR: 당장 TV를 부수고 싶은 충동을 필사적으로 참으며...

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 俺は優しく――努めて優しく、彼女に声をかける。
Translation: I force myself to speak calmly.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺たち、恋人、なんだよな？」
Translation: "We're boyfriend and girlfriend, aren't we?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なのになんで、キスしてるんだ？」
Translation: "So why did you kiss him?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前、俺の、恋人なんだよな？」
Translation: "You're my girlfriend, aren't you?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「自分を信じてくれって、言ったよな？」
Translation: "You told me to believe in you, isn't that right?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「涙だって流したよな？」
Translation: "And you cried and everything?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あれは……なんの涙だったんだ？」
Translation: "What was that, anyway? Just an act?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ……」
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺は、頑張ったよ、努力したよ」
Translation: "I tried. I tried really hard."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前を受け入れようとした、信じようとしたよ」
Translation: "I tried to accept you. I tried to trust you."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ところで、お前は俺を、どう思ってたんだ？」
Translation: "But how did you feel about me?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どんな気持ちで、コイツとキスをしてたんだ？」
Translation: "What was on your mind when you were kissing him?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「すき……なの」
Translation: "Aoi loves you..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、ずっと、シンイチがすきで――だから――」
Translation: "Aoi loves you so much... That's why—"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いい加減にしろっての！！」
Translation: "BULLSHIT!"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 限界だった。
Translation: I can't take it anymore.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 俺はそれを、アオイに投げつけた。
Translation: I throw it at her.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "That's...!"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 彼女は避けることもしなかった。
Translation: She doesn't try to dodge.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 呆然と、頬にぶつかり足元に落ちたそれを見ていた。
Translation: It hits her in the face and falls to her feet.
KR: 멍하니 뺨에 부딪혀 발밑에 떨어진 그것을 보고 있었다.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「すげえ画期的な仕組みだな！　感心するわ！」
Translation: "What an incredible tribute! I'm impressed!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺が好きだと、俺以外の男とセックスするんだな！！」
Translation: "You love me so much, you fuck other guys?!"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 投げたのは、あの日ゴミ箱で見つけたコンドーム。
Translation: ...It's the condom we found in the trash can.
KR: 던진 것은 그날 쓰레기통에서 발견된 콘돔.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「演劇の日、龍二郎の部屋に忍び込んで、見つけた」
Translation: "Found it on the day of the play, when we snuck into Ryuujirou's room."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「しってたの……？」
Translation: "You knew...?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「全部、知ってた」
Translation: "Everything."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ハルが雄太郎の弟だってのも、知ってた」
Translation: "I knew Haru was Yuutarou's brother."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あのマンションでふたりきりだったのも知ってた」
Translation: "I knew you were alone together in that apartment."
KR: "그 빌라에 단둘이 있었던 것도 알고 있었어."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でも、俺は知らないフリをした」
Translation: "But I played dumb."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あの日からずっと、隠し続けた」
Translation: "All this time, I acted like everything was fine."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「感情を押し殺して、毎日笑顔でお前と一緒に過ごした」
Translation: "I held back my feelings and played the part of the happy boyfriend."
KR: "감정을 억누르고 매일 웃는 얼굴로 너와 같이 지냈어."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「途中死ぬほど吐き気に襲われて、何度も吐いて」
Translation: "Being around you made me so sick... I threw up dozens of times..."
KR: "도중에 죽을 정도로 구역질이 나서, 몇 번이나 토하고..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前がセックスしようって言うたび、悪寒に身体の言うことが利かなくなって」
Translation: "I shuddered every time you asked to have sex."
KR: "네가 섹스하자고 할 때마다 오한이 들어 몸이 말을 듣지 않고..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「けど、俺は我慢した」
Translation: "But I endured it."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「歯を食いしばって、耐えきった」
Translation: "Told myself I had to grit my teeth and bear it."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今日、こうやって、お前に証拠を突きつけるために！」
Translation: "All so I could shove it in your face right here, right now!"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: アオイへの愛情を空っぽにして。
Translation: My love for Aoi is gone.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 理性も完璧にすり切れて。
Translation: My rational sense is gone.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: もう憎悪しか残っていない。
Translation: All that's left is hate.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 復讐への渇望しかありえない。
Translation: And a thirst for revenge.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: すっかり、そう思い込んでいた俺の心に。
Translation: Or so I thought.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: まだどこからともなく、怒りがわき上がる。
Translation: And yet, I can still feel a burning anger somewhere deep down inside.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なあお前、なにしたんだ？」
Translation: "So, what were you doing?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺とのデートの約束反故にして、男と女ふたりきりで、一体何をしてたんだよッ！？」
Translation:
"You broke off our date to go be alone with some other guy, right?
So what the fuck were you doing?!"
KR: "데이트 약속도 어기도, 남자랑 여자 둘이서 도대체 뭐 하고 있었냐고!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、お前を信じて……信じたかったのに……」
Translation: "I wanted to believe in you... I really did..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんで……俺を、裏切ったんだよ……！！」
Translation: "Why would you betray me like this...?!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ！　なんでだって訊いてるだろ！？」
Translation: "I asked you a question, Aoi!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイの……ソンザイリユウ」
Translation: "It's Aoi's... raison d'etre..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「存在理由……？」
Translation: "Your what?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そうしろって……カミサマが」
Translation: "God told me... to do it..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「またカミサマかよ――ッッッッ！！！！」
Translation: "You and your fucking god!!!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「やめてください！」
Translation: "Stop! Please!"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 手を挙げようとした俺の前に、龍二郎が立ちはだかる。
Translation: Before I can lash out, Ryuujirou jumps in between us.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「もう……やめてください」
Translation: "Please, just... stop..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「約束通り、お芝居に付き合ったじゃないですか」
Translation: "I cooperated with your little charade, just like you asked..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「私が、みんな、悪いです」
Translation: "This is all my fault."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「私の、気の迷いだったんです」
Translation: "I never should have given in to temptation."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「だからもう……やめてあげて下さい……」
Translation: "So please, just... let her go..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なあ、やったんだろ？」
Translation: "So, did you fuck her?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おまえ、アオイとセックス、したんだろ？」
Translation: "You fucked her, right?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「だから……してないんですって！」
Translation: "I told you, we didn't!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「アオイ先輩が、途中で、やっぱり、須々木先輩のことが好きだからって言って、それで、結局――」
Translation: "Partway through, Aoi-senpai changed her mind... She said she loved you too much... So then we—"
KR: "아오이 선배가 도중에 역시 스스키 선배가 좋다고 해서, 그래서 결국..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「コンドームの封を破いたところで、やめた？」
Translation: "You didn't go through with it? After you'd already opened a condom?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Translation: "......Exactly."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はっはーすごいね！　愛だね！　泣けるね！」
Translation: "Hah! Wow! That's love for you! I'm so touched I could cry!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……信じられるわけ、ないだろ」
Translation: "...I'm not buying that bullshit."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: テーブルに叩き付けた拳が痛みを感じなさすぎて笑える。
Translation: I slam my fist down on the table, but it's funny—at this point, I can't even feel the pain.
KR: 탁자를 주먹으로 내리쳤지만, 아픔이 느껴지지 않아 웃음이 나왔다.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なあ、おまえら」
Translation: "Be straight with me."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「使わずに、やったんだろ？」
Translation: "You guys just fucked without it, didn't you?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お互いあそこ舐めあって、それでいよいよ挿入って時に、言ったんだろ？」
Translation: "First you sucked and licked each other, and then when it came time to put it in..."
KR: "서로 여기저기 핥고 그리고 드디어 삽입하기 직전, 말한 거지?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「『ナマで、ビリビリ、ほしい』とか！
　言ったんだろ？　言ったんだよな！！」
Translation:
"You were like 'Aoi wants the zappy raw!'
Isn't that what you said? Well?!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「男と女がふたり部屋にいて、コンドームまで破っといて、直前でやめた？」
Translation: "You think I could possibly believe the two of you went that far just to call it quits after opening a condom?"
KR: "남자랑 여자 둘이 방에 있는데 콘돔까지 꺼내놓고 직전에 그만뒀다?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そんな話信じられるワケあるかよッッ！！！！」
Translation: "NO ONE IN THEIR RIGHT FUCKING MIND WOULD BELIEVE THAT!!!"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 反論は、どこからも聞こえない。
Translation: No one argues.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: できるはずがない。
Translation: Probably because no one can.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「は……はは……ははははは……」
Translation: "Ha... haha... hahahahaha..."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 笑える。
Translation: This is hilarious.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: おかしくて、たまらない。
Translation: My sides are in orbit.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 俺の頬から流れる涙は、悔しい涙か？
Translation: I'm actually crying, too...
KR: 내 볼에 흐르는 이것은 분노의 눈물인가?

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 悲しい涙か？
Translation: Are these tears of frustration?

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: それとも――
Translation: Or sadness?

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 嬉し涙かもしれないな。
Translation: Or... maybe they're happy tears?

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: アオイが突然、空にスマートフォンを掲げた。
Translation: Out of nowhere, Aoi pulls out her phone and lifts it into the air.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カミサマ……おねがい……」
Translation: "God... Please..."

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「デンパ、とどいてなの……」
Translation: "Please pick up my signal...!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、バグって、しっぱいしたの……」
Translation: "Aoi's glitched... Aoi's messed up...!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「バッドエンド……こんなの……だめだから……」
Translation: "Aoi doesn't want... a bad ending...!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「データ、ロードしなおして……
　もういっかい……もういっかい、やりなおし……」
Translation:
"Please let me reload my save file...
Please let me... Let me try again...!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おねがい……カミサマ……カミサマ……！！」
Translation: "Please, God... God...!!!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どうして……こたえて、くれないの……！？」
Translation: "Why won't you answer me...?!"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 俺はアオイから、スマートフォンを取り上げる。
Translation: I snatch the phone from her.

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Aah! No!"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「黙れ！」
Translation: "Shut the fuck up!"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 画面に表示された、「カミサマ」への発信画面。
Translation: The screen displays her mid-call to "God".

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「神様が言ったから、浮気したとか――」
Translation: "You cheated on me because GOD told you to?"

Name: c7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そんなの、誰が信じるかッ！」
Translation: "That's such a load of bullshit!"

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 力一杯投げつけた、スマートフォン。
Translation: I fling her phone to the ground.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 床に叩き付けられて、粉々に砕けた。
Translation: The screen shatters on impact.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: アオイはただそれを、呆然と見つめていた。
Translation: Aoi just stares down at it.

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: 彼女に今、たったひとつ俺が望むこと、それは――
Translation: There's only one thing I want from her now.
KR: 이제 내가 아오이에게 바라는 단 하나, 그것은...

Name: c7111.nss
Japanese: "アオイの真実が聞きたい","アオイの顔も見たくない"
Translation: "Tell me the truth","Get the fuck out of my house"

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なあ、聞かせてくれよ」
Translation: "Look, just be honest with me."

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「裏切った、本当の理由、教えてくれよ」
Translation: "Tell me the real reason why you cheated on me."

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それで、俺を、納得させてくれよ」
Translation: "Please, just... help me understand."

Name: c7112.nss
Japanese: 自分でも情けないくらいの、懇願だった。
Translation: I know it's pathetic, but I'm desperate.

Name: c7112.nss
Japanese: 簡単に諦められるほど、浅い想いであるわけがない。
Translation: I love her too much. I can't just shrug this off.
KR: 간단히 포기할 정도로 얕은 마음이 아니었다.

Name: c7112.nss
Japanese: 俺への愛情が冷めてしまったとか。
Translation: Did she lose interest in me?

Name: c7112.nss
Japanese: 龍二郎のセックスが死ぬほど気持ち良かったとか。
Translation: Was Ryuujirou just really good in bed?
KR: 아니면 류지로와의 x스가 죽도록 기분 좋았다든가.

Name: c7112.nss
Japanese: なんでもいいから、説明が欲しかった。
Translation: I just want an explanation. I don't care what it is.

Name: c7112.nss
Japanese: 俺に納得、させて欲しかった。
Translation: I just want to understand why.

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: c7112.nss
Japanese: アオイは、まるで昔のように感情の薄い瞳で……
Translation: Aoi looks at me blankly, the same way she always used to.
KR: 아오이는 마치 예전처럼 감정 없는 눈으로...

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ふたりきりに、してほしいの」
Translation: "Can we speak in private?"

Name: c7112.nss
Japanese: アオイは、ぽつりと、口にする。
Translation: She mumbles quietly.

Name: c7112.nss
Japanese: いつもと変わらない口調のはずだった。
Translation: On the surface, she sounds normal.

Name: c7112.nss
Japanese: なのに、俺にははっきりとわかった。
Translation: But I can tell.
KR: 그렇지만, 나는 확실히 알 수 있었다.

Name: c7112.nss
Japanese: もう、彼女はみんな、諦めてしまったのだ。
Translation: She's utterly defeated.

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……みんな」
Translation: "...Guys?"

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「わかった」
Translation: "Alright."

Name: c7112.nss
Japanese: 黙りこくった美雪の代わりに、雄太郎が返答した。
Translation: Miyuki falls silent, but Yuutarou pipes up in her stead.

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ほら龍二郎、行くぞ！」
Translation: "Come on, Ryuujirou, let's go!"

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Translation: "Umm—"

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「須々木先輩、なんて、言ったらいいのか、その――」
Translation: "Susuki-senpai... I don't really know what to say... I..."

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「何も聞きたくない」
Translation: "I don't want to hear it."

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「でも、これだけは信じてください！」
Translation: "Okay, but... You have to believe me!"

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「私の部屋に上がった時、アオイ先輩が、途中で帰っちゃったのは、本当の事で、だから、その……」
Translation: "Yes, we went to my room, but I swear, Aoi-senpai really did leave before anything happened... Honest... So..."
KR: "제 방에 올라갔을 때, 아오이 선배가 중간에 돌아간 건 사실이고, 그러니까 그게..."

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「アオイ先輩の好きって気持ちは……きっと、ずっと、須々木先輩に……」
Translation: "I'm pretty sure... she never stopped loving you, Susuki-senpai..."
KR: "아오이 선배의 마음은... 분명 계속 스스키 선배에게..."

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「龍二郎」
Translation: "Ryuujirou."

Name: c7112.nss
Japanese: 震える弟の肩を、雄太郎がポンと抱きかかえる。
Translation: Yuutarou gently puts a hand on Ryuujirou's trembling shoulder.
KR: 떨리는 동생의 어깨를 유우타로가 감싸 안았다.

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「行くぞ」
Translation: "Let's go."

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「……失礼します」

Name: c7112.nss
Japanese: 曙兄弟は、揃ってリビングを退場した。
Translation: The Akebono brothers walk out of the living room.

Name: c7112.nss
Japanese: 残ったのは、俺と、アオイと、美雪。
Translation: Now it's just me, Aoi, and Miyuki.
KR: 이제 남은 사람은 나, 아오이, 미유키.

Name: c7112.nss
Japanese: 時計の秒針が、ゆっくりと、ゆっくりと進んでいく。
Translation: The seconds tick by, slow and steady.

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪」
Translation: "Miyuki..."

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「頼む」
Translation: "Please."

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「わかったわよ」
Translation: "Fine."

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふたりきりにしてあげるけど、約束して」
Translation: "I'll leave you two alone... but promise me something."

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「おかしなことは、しないでよ」
Translation: "Don't do anything crazy."

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「わかってるよ」
Translation: "I won't."

Name: c7112.nss
Japanese: 俺の返答に、美雪は大きく息をついた。
Translation: Miyuki sighs heavily.

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私はあの日、決めたの」
Translation: "I made a promise to myself back then."

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「一度の過ちなら、許すわ」
Translation: "Everyone makes mistakes. I can forgive and forget—the first time."

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「二度目は絶対に、許さない」
Translation: "Mark my words... There better not be a second time."

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「永遠の愛を、裏切らないで」
Translation: "Love is eternal. Don't ruin it."

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「永遠の……愛」
Translation: "What...?"

Name: c7112.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それじゃあまた、会いましょう」
Translation: "See you later."

Name: c7112.nss
Japanese: 美雪は部屋を出る。
Translation: Miyuki leaves the room.

Name: c7112.nss
Japanese: けれど今の俺には、永遠の愛なんて信じられるわけがなかった。
Translation: Unfortunately, I'm in no mood to believe in eternal love.
KR: 하지만 지금의 나는 영원한 사랑 따윈 믿을 수 없었다.

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ふたりきりに、なったぞ」
Translation: "Okay... They're gone."

Name: c7121.nss
Japanese: 部屋に残されたのは、俺とアオイ、ふたりだけ。
Translation: It's just me and Aoi now, alone in the living room.
KR: 방에 남은 사람은 나와 아오이 둘.

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: c7121.nss
Japanese: 彼女の瞳は、芒洋としていた。
Translation: Her eyes are like saucers.

Name: c7121.nss
Japanese: スマフォが粉々に壊れると同時、何かをすっかり諦めてしまったようだった。
Translation: It's like all her hopes were crushed with her cell phone.
KR: 핸드폰이 산산조각난 순간, 무언가를 완전히 놓아버린 듯했다.

Name: c7121.nss
Japanese: 俺は、大きく息を整えて――
Translation: I take a deep breath to steady myself.

Name: c7121.nss
Japanese: アオイに、詰め寄った。
Translation: Then I move in close to Aoi.

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前が俺を裏切った本当の理由……」
Translation: "Please, tell me..."

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「話してくれ」
Translation: "Why did you betray me...?"

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは――」

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ゲームのヒロインなの」
Translation: "Aoi is a romance option."

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カミサマがこのセカイにあわせてつくった――」
Translation: "God created me as a character in this game—"

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "SHUT THE FUCK UP!"

Name: c7121.nss
Japanese: 俺は思わず、アオイに怒鳴りつけている。
Translation: Before I can stop myself, I scream at her.

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そんな話は、もう、一言も、聞きたくない――」
Translation: "I'm SICK of your fucking game bullshit!"

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ほんとうなの」
Translation: "It's the truth."

Name: c7121.nss
Japanese: アオイの瞳は、微塵も揺るがなかった。
Translation: Her gaze is firm.

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カミサマがいるの」
Translation: "God is real."

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カミサマはガイネンテキそんざい」
Translation: "God is a concept."

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あらゆるセカイのコウリャクキャラのソウゴウタイ」
Translation: "An amalgamation of every possible love interest in every possible world."

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ヒロインのイデアなの」
Translation: "An abstract."

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、カミサマからうみだされたアバター」
Translation: "Aoi is a manifestation of that God."

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ボウダイなデータベースから、このセカイにサイテキカされたかたち」
Translation: "An avatar pulled from a massive database and optimized to perfectly suit this world."

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そのモクテキは、ひとつ」
Translation: "With only one objective."

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「たくさんのシュジンコウをこうりゃくして」
Translation: "To pursue as many protagonists as possible."

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「イベントＣＧをカイシュウすること」
Translation: "And collect all the event CGs."

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「キミの、アオイルートは」
Translation: "This 'Aoi route' that YOU'RE on..."

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どうじに、カミサマの、シンイチルートなの」
Translation: "...also serves as the 'Shinichi route' for God."

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチと、エッチして」
Translation: "Once God achieves sex with Shinichi..."

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「もう、シンイチルートは、コンプリート」
Translation: "The Shinichi route is complete."

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あたらしいＣＧ、カイシュウできないと、アオイにそんざいりゆう、ないの」
Translation: "Without new CGs, Aoi's entire existence is pointless."
KR: "새로운 CG, 회수 못 하면 아오이에게 존재 이유 없어."

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「デンチもきれて、デンパとどかなくて、セーブできないまま、きえるの」
Translation: "My battery will run dry and my signal won't reach, which means no saving the game... and so Aoi will disappear."
KR: "전지 다 닳고, 전파도 닿지 않고, 세이브하지 못한 채 꺼져."

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから、アオイは、ハルちゃんルートにいったの」
Translation: "So Aoi started playing Haru-chan's route."

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それが、シンイチをうらぎった、りゆう」
Translation: "That's why Aoi cheated on you."

Name: c7121.nss
Japanese: 表情を微塵も動かさず。
Translation: Her expression doesn't shift an inch.

Name: c7121.nss
Japanese: ひとり、淡々と、最後まで。
Translation: She rattles it all off like it's the most normal thing in the world.

Name: c7121.nss
Japanese: 原稿を読み上げるように、言って。
Translation: Like she's reading from a script.

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも、もう、おわかれなの」
Translation: "But this is where we say goodbye."

Name: c7121.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「バイバイなの」
Translation: "Bye-bye."

Name: c7121.nss
Japanese: 音もなく、背を向けた。
Translation: She silently turns away.

Name: c7121.nss
Japanese: 俺の側から、離れていく。
Translation: And then she walks off.

Name: c7121.nss
Japanese: おぼつかなげな足取りで、遠くなっていく。
Translation: Her uncertain footsteps grow faint.

Name: c7121.nss
Japanese: "アオイは嘘をついている","アオイの言葉を信じられない"
Translation: "Aoi is lying","I don't know what to believe"

Name: c7122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「みんな……嘘だったんだな」
Translation: "It was all lies, wasn't it?"

Name: c7122.nss
Japanese: 俺の唇が、勝手に、動いていた。
Translation: My mouth moves of its own accord.

Name: c7122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺が好きだって言ったのも」
Translation: "You never loved me."

Name: c7122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ただ、ＣＧ回収をするための、嘘だったんだな」
Translation: "You just wanted CGs."

Name: c7122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから、簡単に、俺を裏切ったり――」
Translation: "So you cheated on me without a second thought..."

Name: c7122.nss
Japanese: その瞬間――
Translation: Just then—

Name: c7122.nss
Japanese: アオイの顔が、歪んだ。
Translation: Aoi's face twists in misery.

Name: c7122.nss
Japanese: 瞳から、みるみるうちに、感情が溢れ出た。
Translation: Pure emotion wells up in her eyes.

Name: c7122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ」
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: c7122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、シンイチを、うらぎったの」
Translation: "Aoi betrayed you."

Name: c7122.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「たくさん、たくさん、わるいことをしたの」
Translation: "And did all sorts of awful things."

Name: c7122.nss

「ふぁっ！　あっ！　あああ……！
　すごい、また、かたくなって……あああっ！！」
Translation:
"Haaah! Aah! Aaahh...!
Oh god... It's getting big again... AAAAHH!!!"
KR: "후앗! 앗! 아아앗...! 굉장해, 또, 단단해져서... 아아앗!!"

Name: c7133.nss
Japanese: 俺の意識は、幸福感に包まれたまま……
Translation: A warm fuzzy happiness envelops my mind...

Name: c7133.nss
Japanese: 遠く……さらに遠く……
Translation: My consciousness fades...

Name: c7133.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ……だいすき……」
Translation: "Shinichi... Aoi loves you..."

Name: c7133.nss
Japanese: ああ……俺も……
Translation: I love you too...

Name: c7133.nss
Japanese: 幸せすぎて……怖い……かな……
Translation: I'm so happy... it's almost scary...

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: あれからどれだけ、時間が経っただろうか。
Translation: An indeterminate amount of time passes.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ジュウデン……カンリョウなの……」
Translation: "Recharge... complete..."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ビリビリ……いっぱい……」
Translation: "So full... of zappy..."

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 夢うつつのアオイを抱き、俺はベッドに横になっていた。
Translation: I lie in bed with Aoi in my arms.
KR: 비몽사몽인 아오이를 안고 나는 침대에 누워있었다.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: ちなみに龍二郎は、意識が消えかけながらも下の階へ移動していた。
Translation: As for Ryuujirou, he stumbled downstairs earlier on the verge of passing out.
KR: 참고로 류지로는 의식이 없어지려 하면서도 아래층으로 내려가고 있었다.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 最後の気力を振り絞ってまで、俺たちに気を遣ってくれたのだろう。
Translation: He must've used up the very last of his energy just to give us some private time.
KR: 마지막 기력을 다할 때까지, 우리를 신경써 준 거겠지.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シン……イチ……」
Translation: "Shin...ichi...?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、ここにいる」
Translation: "Don't worry. I'm right here."

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: アオイの寝言に、俺は小さく返答する。
Translation: I whisper back as she mumbles, half-asleep.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「こんど……また……デート、するの……」
Translation: "Let's... go on... a date again... sometime..."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「この……ヘアピン、つけるの……」
Translation: "Aoi can... wear the... hairpin..."

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 寝ぼけたまま、手のひらを握りしめるアオイ。
Translation: She clenches her fist.
KR: 아오이는 잠이 덜 깬 채로 손을 움켜쥐었다.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: その手には、彼女の記憶を刻んだヘアピンが、しっかりと握られていた。
Translation: Inside is the kitty hairpin, etched with all her happiest memories.
KR: 그 손은 아오이의 기억이 새겨진 헤어핀을 꼭 쥐고 있었다.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「わかった。今度こそ、デートしような」
Translation: "Yeah, that sounds nice."

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 寝ぼけた声のアオイに、そっと答える。
KR: 잠이 덜 깬 아오이에게 살며시 대답했다.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 今度こそ、ちゃんと、恋人らしいデートがしたい。
Translation: This time, I'd like to go on a really cheesy, romantic date...
KR: 이번에는 제대로 연인다운 데이트를 하고 싶었다.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「やくそく……なの……」
Translation: "Promise... me..."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ。約束な」
Translation: "Okay. I promise."

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 意識があるかどうかはわからないけど。
Translation: She might not remember this in the morning.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 絶対に約束は守ろうと、心に誓う。
Translation: But I'm going to make sure I keep this promise anyway.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 今思えば、なんだか不思議な気もする。
Translation: Thinking back, it's kind of funny.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 嫉妬に狂うほどだった俺がなぜ、彼女の世界を信じられないくせに、彼女を許す気になれたのか？
Translation: Why would a jealous bastard like me—a guy who never once believed in her little world—suddenly decide to forgive her?
KR: 질투에 미칠 지경이었던 내가, 아오이의 세계를 믿지도 못하면서, 왜 아오이를 용서할 마음이 들게 된 거지?

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 龍二郎を呼び戻して、あんなことをしてまで、どうしてこの関係に戻ることが出来たのか。
Translation: Why would I invite Ryuujirou back over—and have a threesome—just to win her back?
KR: 어째서 류지로를 불러 그런 짓까지 하면서까지 이 관계로 돌아왔을까?

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「運命」
Translation: "Fate..."

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 人間には操ることの出来ない運命。
Translation: People can't control their fate.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: それが、俺を突き動かした――
Translation: That must be what urged me to do it.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: そう考えるより他、なさそうに思える。
Translation: At least, I can't think of anything else.
KR: 그렇게 생각할 수밖에 없는 것 같다.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイと結ばれる運命だったんだろうな」
Translation: "Fate must have brought me and Aoi together, huh?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「違う」
Translation: "Wrong."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Hmm?"

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 空耳か？
Translation: Am I hearing things?

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: どこからか、声が聞こえたような……
Translation: I thought I heard a voice from somewhere...

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 疑問に答えるように、ベッドの下から物音がする。
Translation: Just then, I hear a thumping sound under the bed.
KR: 내 의문에 답하듯, 침대 아래에서 소리가 났다.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 姿を現したのは――
Translation: And the next thing I know—

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 目を真っ赤に泣き晴らし、しかし、驚くほど感情の抜け落ちた目をした、美雪だった。
Translation: Miyuki appears, her eyes red from crying, her expression... startlingly blank.
KR: 눈이 벌게진, 그러나 놀랄 만큼 감정 없는 눈을 한 미유키였다.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「裏切ったわね」
Translation: "You betrayed me."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "I what...?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「待ってなさい。下から取ってくるから」
Translation: "Wait right here. I need to go get something."

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: そう言って、美雪は部屋から消えた。
Translation: With that, Miyuki leaves the room.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 今のは一体……なんだ？
Translation: What the heck was that about?

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ、どこいくの？」
Translation: "Shinichi, where are you going?"

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 寝ぼけ眼で、アオイが俺の身体を掴んだ。
Translation: Aoi latches onto me drowsily.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え、いや。その、美雪が――」
Translation: "Oh, nowhere. Miyuki's just—"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Miyuki...?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチは……ミユキ、すきなの？」
Translation: "Shinichi... Are you in love with her?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「やっぱり……アオイ、きらいなの？」
Translation: "Have you... changed your mind about me?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「すてるの？」
Translation: "Are you going to abandon me?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そんなこと、しない」
Translation: "Of course not!"

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 言い聞かせると、まだ意識の半分を夢の世界に置いてきたままのアオイが、うっすら微笑む。
Translation: With a little reassurance, Aoi smiles, her mind still halfway in dreamland.
KR: 아직 의식의 반은 꿈나라에 있는 아오이가 살며시 미소 지었다.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキは、たいせつな、しんゆうなの」
Translation: "Aoi cares about Miyuki. She's my best friend."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも、おねがい」
Translation: "But... please..."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いまは、わすれて、ねむるの……」
Translation: "Right now, just forget about her and fall asleep with me..."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop... boop... boop..."

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 腕を掴んだまま、アオイは静かに寝息を立ててしまう。
Translation: Aoi starts snoring, her arms still wrapped around mine.
KR: 아오이는 팔을 붙잡은 채 조용히 숨소리를 내고 있다.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: ……そうだ。
Translation: ...Now I get it.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: こんなこと、あるわけがない。
Translation: This isn't reality.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 今のは単なる夢。
Translation: This is just a dream.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 俺は、寝ぼけていたに違いな――
Translation: I must have been dreaming—

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 聞こえた。
Translation: What the heck?

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 確かに、エルの声が、聞こえた。
Translation: That sounded like Eru just now.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: アオイは、安らかに寝息を立てたまま。
Translation: Aoi's still sleeping like a baby.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 立ち上がろうとするが、彼女の手が俺の腕を離さない。
Translation: I try to get up, but she won't let go of my arm.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 彼女を起こさないように、そっと身体を――
Translation: I gently pull away, trying not to wake her—

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 足音が、ゆっくり、近づいてくる。
Translation: Then I hear the sound of footsteps approaching.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 美雪がベッドの下にいたとすれば、いつからだ？
Translation: If Miyuki was under my bed just now—how long was she there?
KR: 미유키가 침대 밑에 있었다고 하면, 그건 언제부터지?

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 俺がこの部屋を覗く前。
Translation: She must've been under there since before I peeked in on Aoi and Ryuujirou having sex.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: アオイが龍二郎を連れて階段を上がった、あのタイミングで、既に美雪はベッドの下にいたことになる。
Translation: Which means she must've been under there since before they came up here.
KR: 아오이가 류지로를 데리고 계단을 올라갔을 때, 그때 미유키는 이미 침대 밑에 있었던 것이다.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: しかもその後、俺や龍二郎が彼女の上で――
Translation: And that means... the three of us had sex inches away from her—
KR: 게다가 그 후에, 나랑 류지로가 아오이랑...

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「待たせたわね」
Translation: "I'm back."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What the...?"

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: そこには、血まみれの美雪がいた。
Translation: Miyuki returns... covered in blood.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 腕に例の花束を抱え。
Translation: In her arms is my birthday bouquet.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 頬の引っ掻き傷から、真っ赤な血を流していた。
Translation: A long, bloody scratch extends across her cheek.
KR: 뺨에는 긁힌 상처가 나 피가 흐르고 있었다.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Where's Eru...?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「残念だったわ」
Translation: "It's a real shame about him."

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 理性を支えるバネが、弾けて飛んだ――そんな笑み。
Translation: She smiles like she's got a few screws loose.
KR: 이성을 붙잡는 끈이 끊어진 듯한 미소.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 鞘を抜くように花束が散る。
Translation: The bouquet falls away like a fragrant sheath.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: その中から現れたのは、血まみれのバット。
Translation: Inside is a bloodstained metal bat.
KR: 그 속에서 나타난 건 피투성이 방망이.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私の邪魔をするんだもの」
Translation: "But that's what he gets for getting in my way."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あんなに可愛いけれど……仕方がないわよね」
Translation: "He was so cute... Oh well."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前――エルに――まさかッ！！」
Translation: "Wh... What the FUCK did you do to Eru?!"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 俺の大声で、アオイが目を覚ます。
Translation: My shout wakes Aoi.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「エルが……どうしたの？」
Translation: "What's wrong... with Eru...?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今、会わせてあげる」
Translation: "Here, let me show you."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: アオイの頭が割れた。
Translation: Aoi's head splits open.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: ……割れた？
Translation: ...Splits open?

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 視界は真っ赤に閉ざされている。
Translation: Everything is red.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 現実感のない世界。
Translation: Nothing feels real.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 目蓋の奥で繰り返される、バットを振り下ろす前の美雪の微笑み。
Translation: Miyuki's smile floats up behind my eyelids—the look on her face just before she swung that bat.
KR: 눈 안에서는 방망이를 내려치기 직전 미유키의 미소가 반복됐다.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、バットで、アオイを、殴り――
Translation: Miyuki... swung her bat... and hit... Aoi...

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 割れた額から流れ出した血で、俺の視界が遮られた。
Translation: Blood trickles down my forehead and into my eyes.
KR: 깨진 머리에서 나온 피로 내 시야가 가려졌다.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ、心一？」
Translation: "Hey, Shinichi?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私からのプレゼント、まだだったよね」
Translation: "I still need to give you my present, don't I?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あげる」
Translation: "Here you go."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ぶあっ！！」
Translation: "Bwugh!!!"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「な――なんだよっ！　やめ――ふがっ！！」
Translation: "Wh-What are you doing?! Sto—Bwggh!!!"

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 顔を圧迫する、何かの感触。
Translation: An indescribable sensation overwhelms my whole face.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 俺は、真っ赤な視界の中、ベッドの上に押しつけられ、倒れ込んでいる。
Translation: I collapse on top of the bed, pinned down, my vision nothing but crimson.
KR: 나는 새빨간 시야 속에서 침대 위에 밀려 쓰러져 있었다.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「やめ――ろっ！　なにする――ふがっ！」
Translation: "St—op—! What are you—Bwggh!"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー」
Translation: "Happy birthday to you..."

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 変な音がした。
Translation: That was weird...

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: なんだ？　なんの音だ？
Translation: What the heck was that sound?

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: まさか、美雪がアオイを――
Translation: Oh god—is she hitting Aoi again?!

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「や、やめろッ！！」
Translation: "S-Stop!!!"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイにこれ以上、酷いことを――」
Translation: "Don't hurt her!!!"

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 俺は美雪を止めようと手を伸ば――
Translation: I reach out to stop her—

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: ――あれ。
Translation: ...What the?

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 右腕が、動かない？
Translation: My right arm won't move.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー」
Translation: "Happy birthday to youuu..."

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 次は、左側に、衝撃。
Translation: I feel an impact on my left side.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: そして、俺の左腕が、動かない。
Translation: Now my left arm won't move, either.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: ああ、これはやっぱり――
Translation: Oh, I get it.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ハッピーバースデー・ディア・心一」
Translation: "Happy birthday, dear Shinichiii..."

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 右脚――
Translation: My right leg...

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ハッピーバースデー・トゥー・ユー！」
Translation: "Happy birthday to youuu!"

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 左脚。
Translation: My left leg...

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あはっ！　あははははは……ッ！！」
Translation: "Haha! Hahahahahaha...!!!"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なにが起こったかわからない？」
Translation: "Confused, are we?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「目が見えない上に、痛すぎて、感覚が消えてるのね？」
Translation: "You're too blinded and numb from the pain, hmm?"
KR: "눈이 안 보이는데다 너무 아파서 감각이 사라진 거지?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私が殴ったのは――」
Translation: "The person I hit..."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一、貴方よ」
Translation: "...was you, Shinichi."

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 美雪の言うとおりだった。
Translation: Of course it was.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 右足も、左足も――
Translation: My legs...

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 俺の四肢は、もう思い通りに動かなくなっていた。
Translation: No, all four of my limbs are broken now.
KR: 내 사지는 이미 생각대로 움직이지 않았다.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんで、こんなこと……？」
Translation: "Why... are you doing this...?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイは死んじゃったから」
Translation: "Well, Aoi's already dead."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「死体を殴っても、意味ないし」
Translation: "No fun in hitting a dead body, now is there?"

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 右手も、左手も、動かない。
Translation: My hands won't move.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 瞳に入った血を拭うこともできない。
Translation: I can't even wipe the blood from my eyes.
KR: 눈에 들어간 피도 닦을 수 없다.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「見たい？　見たいの？　貴方の目で？」
Translation: "You want to see it for yourself, is that it?"
KR: "보고 싶어? 보고 싶은 거야? 네 눈으로?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「こんなにグロい画像見せたら、倫理審査で弾かれちゃうかもね。モザイクかかっちゃうわ」
Translation: "I'm not sure that's a good idea. It's so gory, the ratings board will have a field day. Might have to censor it."
KR: "이런 그로테스크한 장면 보여주면, 윤리 심사에서 떨어져 버릴지도 몰라. 모자이크 걸릴걸?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「――あれ？
　この世界、ゲームじゃなかったんだったかしら？」
Translation: "...Oh, wait. I forget, do you still think this world is real life?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なに言ってるんだよ――！！」
Translation: "What the fuck are you talking about?!"

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 興奮と、激情で、神経がおかしくなっている。
Translation: Every nerve in my body is screaming with adrenaline and raw emotion.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 見開いた目を、涙腺が、潤し、潤し、潤して、ようやく微かに開いてきたその視界の中――
Translation: Bit by bit, tears well in my eyes, then roll down my cheeks, clearing my vision ever so slightly.
KR: 억지로 뜬 눈에 눈물이 조금씩, 조금씩 흘러 겨우 희미하게 보이는 시야...

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: さっきまで、アオイだったものが、そこにはあった。
Translation: There, I can see... something that used to be Aoi.
KR: 방금 전까지 아오이였던 것이 거기 있었다.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: ベッドの上に零れた血が、内側まで染みこんでいく……
Translation: The blood soaks deep into my mattress.
KR: 침대에 흐른 피는 안쪽까지 스며들고 있었다.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: なんだ、これは？
Translation: What is happening?

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 一体、なにが起こっているんだ？
Translation: What the actual fuck is happening?
KR: 도대체 무슨 일이 일어나고 있는 거냐고!

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前……おかしいよ……」
Translation: "You're... insane..."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「うん。私、おかしいわよ」
Translation: "Yup! I'm insane, alright."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「正常でこんなことができたら、逆に変よね？」
Translation: "It'd be weirder if I wasn't, actually, considering what I just did."
KR: "제정신으로 이런 짓을 하는 게 오히려 이상하지?"

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 美雪の瞳は、出会った頃のアオイによく似ていた。
Translation: Miyuki's expression reminds me of the way Aoi used to look, back when we first met her.
KR: 미유키의 눈은 아오이를 처음 만났을 때와 꼭 닮았다.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 俺を向いているが、俺を見てはいない。
Translation: Her gaze is pointed at me, but she's not really seeing me.
KR: 나를 향해 있지만 나를 보고 있지 않다.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 遙か遠く――別の世界を、見つめているようだ。
Translation: Instead, it's like she's... looking at some other distant world.
KR: 아득히 먼... 다른 세계를 바라보는 것 같았다.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方が、バッティングセンターに私を置き去りにして、屋上でアオイとセックスしてたって知ったとき」
Translation: "The moment I found out you abandoned me at the batting cages to go fuck Aoi on the roof..."
KR: "네가 야구연습장에 날 두고, 옥상에서 아오이랑 x스했단 걸 알았을 때..."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「本当なら、その時、既におかしくなってたのかもね」
Translation: "Honestly, I think that was the point I truly lost it."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「永遠の愛を誓った相手に裏切られる苦痛――」
Translation: "It really hurts, being betrayed by the one you vowed to love for all eternity..."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方にも、わかるんだったかしら？」
Translation: "But maybe you know what that feels like now, hmm?"

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 俺がアオイと二股をかけていたかのような物言いだ。
Translation: She's talking like I cheated on her with Aoi.
KR: 내가 아오이랑 양다리 걸치고 있었다는 말투다.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 冗談じゃない。
Translation: Don't be ridiculous.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 俺は確かに、美雪の好意を感じていた。
Translation: Sure, I knew she had feelings for me.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: だが、だからこそ注意深く、距離を保ってきたのだ。
Translation: But that's why I was always so careful to keep my distance.
KR: 하지만 그렇기에 조심스럽게 거리를 유지해 온 것이다.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私は考え直したの」
Translation: "So I changed my mind."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイには大きな隠し事がある」
Translation: "I knew Aoi was hiding something big."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方だって、悪意があったわけじゃない」
Translation: "And I knew you didn't mean to hurt me."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから、もう一度だけ、チャンスをあげようって」
Translation: "So I decided to give you another chance."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「チャンス……？」
Translation: "For what...?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私が噂を流したり、コンビニに貴方を連れていったりしなかったら、きっと貴方は気付かなかったでしょう？」
Translation: "If I hadn't spread that rumor or dragged you to the corner store, you probably never would've noticed..."
KR: "내가 소문내거나, 편의점에 널 데리고 가지 않았으면 분명 눈치채지 못했을걸?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイが、他の男とセックスをしてること」
Translation: "...that Aoi was fucking some other guy."

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 記憶を辿れば……確かに、そうだ。
Translation: Thinking back... she's right.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 俺の疑念の種を蒔いたのは、いつも美雪。
Translation: Miyuki was always the one who put those doubts in my head.
KR: 내게 의심의 씨앗을 심은 건, 항상 미유키였다.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「マンションで浮気の証拠を掴んで、貴方が復讐の決意を固めたとき、私は天にも昇る気持ちだったわ」
Translation: "When you found proof of her cheating in that apartment and vowed to get your revenge, oh, I was so happy I could fly."
KR: "빌라에서 바람 핀 증거를 찾고 네가 복수를 결심했을 때, 나는 하늘을 나는 기분이었어."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「復讐計画、私が随分手助けしたわよね。
　貴方の心のケアもちゃんとして……ね」
Translation:
"I helped you plan it all...
And I was always there to console you, too."
KR: "복수 계획, 내가 꽤 도와줬지? 네 기분도 관리해줬...지?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今日の誕生日パーティーは、今までのどんな舞台よりも、喜びを押し隠すのが難しかった」
Translation: "All during the birthday party today, I could barely contain myself! It was the most challenging performance I've ever had to give."
KR: "오늘 생일파티는 지금까지 올랐던 어떤 무대보다 기쁨을 감추기 어려웠어."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「せっかくだから、ふたりの破局の瞬間まで、この目で見たいのは当然よね？」
Translation: "So naturally, anyone with half a brain would want a front-row seat to the trainwreck, right?"
KR: "모처럼인데 두 사람이 파국을 맞이하는 순간까지, 이 두 눈으로 보고 싶은 게 당연하잖아?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「階段の脇で、ずっと成り行きに聞き耳立ててた」
Translation: "I waited by the stairs and listened in on the whole thing."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「アオイがリビングを出たときは、焦ったわ。
　すぐに階段を上がって、ベッドの下に隠れて」
Translation: "When Aoi walked out of the living room, boy, did I ever panic. I dashed right up the stairs and hid under your bed."
KR: "아오이가 거실을 나왔을 땐 당황했어. 바로 계단을 올라가서 침대 밑에 숨었지."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「龍二郎とアオイがセックスを始めたときは、流石にびっくりしたけど、天にも昇る気持ちだったわね」
Translation: "Then, when she and Ryuujirou started having sex, well... I wasn't expecting it, but I was over the moon."
KR: "류지로랑 아오이가 x스하기 시작했을 땐 정말 놀랐지만, 하늘을 나는 기분이었어."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「これで、心一はアオイに愛想を尽かした」
Translation: "I thought, this means Shinichi will hate her guts."

Name: c7141.nss
