Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「念願叶って、私たちはやっと、やっと結ばれる――」
Translation: "At last, my dream would come true. At last, we would be together."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方が、この部屋にやってくるまでは、そう思ってた」
Translation: "And I believed it right up until the moment you walked into the room."
KR: "네가 이 방에 오기 전까지는 그렇게 생각했어."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ、想像できる？」
Translation: "So, can you imagine?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ベッドの下の私が、どんなことを考えてたか」
Translation: "Everything that went through my head while I was down there?"
KR: "침대 밑에서 내가 어떤 생각을 하고 있었는지..."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「愛する人が、すぐ何センチか上で、他の女の性器に口つけて、他の男の精液吸い取ってるのよ？」
Translation: "I mean, think about it. The love of my life was just inches away, with his face in some other girl's vagina, sucking out some other guy's semen!"
KR: "사랑하는 사람이 바로 몇 센치 위에서 다른 여자의 성기에 입을 대고, 다른 남자의 x액을 빨아먹고 있다고?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そこまでして、他の女の気を惹こうとしてるのよ？」
Translation: "I mean, you were just THAT enamored with her?"
KR: "그렇게까지 해서 다른 여자의 마음을 뺏으려 한다고?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「私は何もできないの。
　ただ黙ってベッドの下で祈るだけなの」
Translation:
"I was powerless.
All I could do was lie under the bed and pray."
KR: "나는 아무것도 할 수 없었어. 그저 침대 밑에서 잠자코 기도할 뿐이지."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「私は心一を信じてる。
　だから貴方は、最後の最後で私を選ぶ」
Translation:
"I believed in you.
I believed that in the end, you would choose me."
KR: "나는 신이치를 믿고 있어. 그러니까 신이치는 마지막에는 결국 나를 선택한다고."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そう自分に言い聞かせながら、貴方たちがヘコヘコ腰を振ってるのを、じっと聞いてるしかないの」
Translation: "But in the meantime, all I could do was listen to you idiots bumping uglies for hours on end."
KR: "그렇게 자신을 타이르면서, 너희들이 들썩들썩 허리 흔드는 걸 가만히 듣고 있을 수 밖에 없었어."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「――やめてッ！」
Translation: "—Stop!"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「――アオイに愛を、誓わないで！！」
Translation: "—Don't tell her you love her!"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「願いは届かないわ」
Translation: "But my prayers fell on deaf ears."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それじゃあ、何？　私って、一体何なの？」
Translation: "So, what? What was I, chopped liver?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ついさっきまで、やっと貴方と結ばれるって、息を殺して喜びの涙を流してた私は、一体何なの？」
Translation: "What kind of idiot was I, silently weeping tears of joy in the hopes that we'd finally be together?"
KR: "방금 전까지 겨우 너와 맺어진다고 숨죽여 기쁨의 눈물을 흘리던 난 대체 뭐야?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「永遠の愛を誓い合った人が、私の真上で裏切ってるの。
　これでおかしくならないでいられる？　ねえ！？」
Translation: "The person I vowed my eternal love to... was betraying me, directly overhead. Could you stay sane after that? Could you?!"
KR: "영원한 사랑을 맹세한 사람이 내 바로 위에서 배신하고 있어... 이래도 미치지 않을 수 있겠냐고? 응!?"

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 手足が動かない。
Translation: My body refuses to move.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 全く、身動きが取れない。
Translation: At all.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 誰かが助けに来るアテもない。
Translation: And no one's coming to save me.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 助かる方法は、なにも、思いつかない。
Translation: I can't think of any way to get out of this.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 俺はもう一度、動かなくなったアオイの身体を見る。
Translation: I look back at Aoi's lifeless body.
KR: 나는 다시 움직이지 않게 된 아오이의 모습을 보았다.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: わからない。
Translation: I don't know what to do.

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 何も、理解できない。
Translation: I don't understand.

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「何でだよ……？」

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「何で、俺が、こんな目に遭うんだよ……？」
Translation: "Why are you doing this to me...?"
KR: "왜 내가 이런 꼴을 당해야 하는 거냐고...?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私との愛の誓いを破った」
Translation: "You broke our vows."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「裏切り者だもの。当然でしょう？」
Translation: "You're a traitor. Serves you right, don't you think?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから、俺はお前を裏切ってなんて――」
Translation: "I'm telling you, I never betrayed y—"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私はね、貴方に言ってるんじゃないわ」
Translation: "I'm not talking to you."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君に、言ってるんだよ」
Translation: "I'm talking to YOU."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「最初のルートで、私に永遠の愛を誓った、君に」
Translation: "YOU were the one who promised me your eternal love in the first route."
KR: "첫 루트에서 나에게 영원한 사랑을 맹세한 당신한테."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一じゃ絶対に選べなかった選択肢を選んだ、君に！」
Translation: "And YOU were the one who made all those choices Shinichi would never have made!"
KR: "신이치라면 절대 선택하지 않았을 선택지를 고른 당신한테!"

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 美雪は……いったい、誰に話しかけているんだ？
Translation: Miyuki... Who are you talking to...?
KR: 미유키... 대체 누구한테 말하고 있는 거지?

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ……君は、憶えてるでしょう？」
Translation: "Look... YOU remember, don't YOU?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「演劇が終わった後、こぼれ落ちそうな満天の星の下、永遠の愛を誓ったあのキス――」
Translation: "After the play, when we pledged our love to one another and shared a kiss beneath the starry sky..."
KR: "연극이 끝난 뒤, 쏟아질 것 같은 하늘의 별 아래에서 영원한 사랑을 맹세했던 그 키스..."

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 美雪は、どうしてしまったんだ？
Translation: What's the matter with her?

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: 俺には、彼女の言葉が、少しも理解できない――
Translation: I can't understand a single thing she's saying...
KR: 나는 미유키의 말을 조금도 이해할 수 없었다...

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君はね、ずっと、ずっと、永遠に、私のルートに入る選択肢だけを選んでいれば良かったの」
Translation: "YOU were supposed to only ever choose the options that would lead to MY route."
KR: "당신은 계속, 계속 영원히, 내 루트로 가는 선택지만 고르면 됐어."

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それが、永遠の愛を誓った君の、務めでしょう？」
Translation: "YOU had one job: to love me forever and ever!"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私がどれだけ、アオイルートを阻止しようとしたか……君なら、わかるわよね？」
Translation: "Do YOU realize... just how hard I tried to keep YOU out of Aoi's route? Surely YOU do, right?"
KR: "내가 얼마나 아오이 루트를 저지하려고 했는지... 당신은 알고 있지?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なのにどうして、私の気持ちに応えてくれないの？」
Translation: "So why won't YOU return my feelings?"
KR: "그런데 어째서 내 마음에 답해주지 않는 거야?"

Name: c7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「言ってよ！　ねえ、私が誰より好きだって！」
Translation: "Just say it! Say you love me more than anyone else!"

Name: c7141.nss
Japanese: "美雪が好きだ","美雪が嫌いだ"
Translation: "I love you","I hate you"

Name: c7142a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「好きだ」
Translation: "I love you."

Name: c7142a.nss
Japanese: 手遅れだとは知っていても、このまま殺されるわけにはいかない。
Translation: I know it's too little, too late, but I can't just lie here and let her kill me!
KR: 늦은 건 알지만, 이대로 죽을 수는 없다.

Name: c7142a.nss
Japanese: なんとか彼女の機嫌を取らなければ。
Translation: I need to get her to calm down somehow...

Name: c7142a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「絶対、美雪を愛し続けるって、誓うから、だから――」
Translation: "I promise I'll always love you, so..."

Name: c7142a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もうこんな真似は、やめてくれ！！」
Translation: "...Please, just stop doing this!"

Name: c7142a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふふふ」
Translation: "Hehehe."

Name: c7142a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「貴方はもう、生きることも諦めてしまってるの。
　今さら私の機嫌を取ろうとか、思うはずない」
Translation:
"You've already resigned yourself to death.
You'd never bother trying to win brownie points with me now."
KR: "너는 이미 사는 것도 포기해버렸어. 이제 와서 내 기분에 맞춰주려 할 리가 없지."

Name: c7142a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それは、つまり、貴方じゃなく――」
Translation: "Which means you're not the one saying it."

Name: c7142a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君が選んだ、選択肢ってことでしょう？」
Translation: "No... It was a choice YOU made, wasn't it?"

Name: c7142a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「それ自体は、嬉しいよ。
　すごく、嬉しい」
Translation:
"I'm touched...
Really touched, actually."

Name: c7142a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でも、もう遅いの」
Translation: "But it's too late."

Name: c7142a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今さら、信じられると思う？」
Translation: "You really think I could believe anything you say now?"
KR: "이제 와서 믿을 수 있을 것 같아?"

Name: c7142b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「嫌いだ」
Translation: "I hate you."

Name: c7142b.nss
Japanese: ボソリ、と呟きが漏れた。
Translation: The words leave my lips in a mumble.

Name: c7142b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「こんなことしておいて、それでもまだ、自分を愛し続けろだなんて――」
Translation: "After everything you've done, you want me to love you...?"
KR: "이런 짓을 해놓고서 그래도 자신을 사랑해 달라니..."

Name: c7142b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それは、貴方の答えよね」
Translation: "Yes, I'm sure that's how you feel."

Name: c7142b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君は、そうは思ってない」
Translation: "But I know YOU feel differently."

Name: c7142b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どうせデータをロードし直して、またやり直せばいいとか、思ってるんでしょう？」
Translation: "YOU think YOU can just reload YOUR save file and try again, don't YOU?"
KR: "어차피 데이터를 불러와서 다시 시작하면 된다고 생각하고 있지?"

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君は、私を、裏切った」
Translation: "YOU... betrayed me."

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「これから、たっぷり、復讐してあげる」
Translation: "And now... I'm going to have my revenge."

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Miyuki...?"

Name: c7143.nss
Japanese: 身動きが取れない、俺の股間――
Translation: She gently sets the tip of her bat...

Name: c7143.nss
Japanese: 陰嚢の上に、そっと、バットがあてがわれる。
Translation: ...right on my scrotum.

Name: c7143.nss
Japanese: 縮こまるのが、はっきりとわかる。
Translation: I feel myself flinch.
KR: 내 몸이 움츠러드는 걸 확연히 알 수 있었다.

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方がただのアバターだっていうのはわかってるけど」
Translation: "I know you're just a self-insert character."

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「感情が納得しないの」
Translation: "But my heart disagrees."

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから……バイバイ」
Translation: "So... this is goodbye."

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ま……待て、待ってくれ――！」
Translation: "W-Wait... Please wait!"

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「大丈夫。またやり直せば良いんだから」
Translation: "It's okay. You can just start over."

Name: c7143.nss
Japanese: 美雪は、興味を失ってしまったような顔で――
Translation: Miyuki looks at me, almost bored.

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「バグは、潰しちゃいましょう？」
Translation: "Time to patch out those bugs, hmm?"

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪！　やめ――」
Translation: "Miyuki! Sto—"

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もしもし？　カミサマ」
Translation: "Hello? God?"

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私の記憶をセーブして――そろそろ始めましょう」
Translation: "Save my memories. It's showtime."

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私がスマフォで改造したゲーム」
Translation: "Use my mod patch..."

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「『君と彼女と彼女の恋。』のアップデートをね」
Translation: "...and push an update for [YOU and ME and HER]."
KR: 당신과 그녀와 그녀의 사랑'의 업데이트를 말이죠.

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もしもし？　カミサマ」
Translation: Hello? God?

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もしもし？　カミサマ」
Translation: "Hello? God?"

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私の記憶をセーブして――そろそろ始めましょう」
Translation: Save my memories. It's showtime.

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私の記憶をセーブして――そろそろ始めましょう」
Translation: "Save my memories. It's showtime."

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私がスマフォで改造したゲーム」
Translation: Use my mod patch...

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私がスマフォで改造したゲーム」
Translation: "Use my mod patch..."

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「『君と彼女と彼女の恋。』のアップデートをね」
Translation: ...and push an update for [YOU and ME and HER].
KR: 당신과 그녀와 그녀의 사랑'의 업데이트를 말이죠.

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「『君と彼女と彼女の恋。』のアップデートをね」
Translation: "...and push an update for [YOU and ME and HER]."
KR: 당신과 그녀와 그녀의 사랑'의 업데이트를 말이죠.

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「――ハッピーバースデー」
Translation: "HaPPY BiRTHdaY"

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「――ハッピーバースデー」
Translation: HaPPY BiRTHdaY

Name: c7143.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「――ハッピーバースデー」
Translation: "HaPPY BiRTHdaY"

Name: d3163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「確かにそうかもしれないな」
Translation: "Yeah, you're right."

Name: d3163.nss
Japanese: 電話を何度かけても、相変わらず、圏外だ。
Translation: No matter how many times I call, her phone's out of service.

Name: d3163.nss
Japanese: 時間も遅いし、捜しようがない。
Translation: It's late, and we don't have any leads.

Name: d3163.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今日は終わりにしましょう」
Translation: "Let's just call it a day."

Name: d3163.nss
Japanese: 美雪の言葉に、俺は頷いた。
Translation: I nod.

Name: d3163.nss
Japanese: 無力感が、全身を満たす。
Translation: I feel so utterly powerless...

Name: d3163.nss
Japanese: 友達になったとかはしゃいでいても、所詮はこの程度なのだ……
Translation: I was so happy to finally be friends with her, but in the end, this is what we get...?
KR: 친구가 됐다고 떠들어봐야 결국 이 정도다...

Name: d3163.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ほらほら、落ち込まないの！」
Translation: "Come on now! Don't let this get you down!"

Name: d3163.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「きっとアオイは保護者の家に帰った。
　そうに決まってるんだから」
Translation:
"I'm sure Aoi just went back to her parents' house.
That's gotta be where she is."
KR: "분명 아오이는 부모님 집으로 돌아간 거야. 그런 게 분명해."

Name: d3163.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だと、いいんだけど」
Translation: "I hope you're right..."

Name: d3163.nss
Japanese: 俺は割り切れないものを抱えながらも、頷いた。
Translation: Reluctantly, I nod again.
KR: 나는 석연치 않았지만, 그럼에도 고개를 끄덕였다.

Name: d3165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「校門の通用口だ！」
Translation: "The pedestrian gate in front of the school!"

Name: d3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "The what...?"

Name: d3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「って、ちょっと心一！？」
Translation: "Wait... Shinichi?!"

Name: d3165.nss
Japanese: 気付けば、俺は駆け出していた。
Translation: Before I know it, I'm running at full speed.

Name: d3165.nss
Japanese: さっき段ボール箱を見に行く前、校門の前を通った。
Translation: I passed by the school gates earlier on my way to check the cardboard box.
KR: 아까 상자를 보러 가기 전에 교문 앞을 지나갔다.

Name: d3165.nss
Japanese: 普通ならば、覚えていないような記憶――
Translation: Normally it'd be a tiny, forgettable detail—

Name: d3165.nss
Japanese: だが俺には、なぜか確信があった。
Translation: But right now, I'm strangely confident.

Name: d3165.nss
Japanese: あの時、確かに通用口は開いていたはず――
Translation: I remember it being open—

Name: d3165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「閉まってる！？」
Translation: "It's closed?!"

Name: d3165.nss
Japanese: 記憶違いか？
Translation: Am I misremembering?

Name: d3165.nss
Japanese: いや、でも確か……
Translation: No, I can't be...

Name: d3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あのね、心一」
Translation: "Look, Shinichi..."

Name: d3165.nss
Japanese: 追いついた美雪が、息を切らせながら反論する。
Translation: Miyuki catches up to me, completely out of breath.

Name: d3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「校門は私だって確認したわ。
　ちゃんと、鍵が閉まってた」
Translation:
"I already checked the school gates.
They were locked."

Name: d3165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "But—!"

Name: d3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「別に勘違いって言ってるんじゃないわ」
Translation: "I'm not saying you remembered wrong."

Name: d3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「例えば――そうね。
　貴方が見た時に開いてて、私の時には閉まってた」
Translation: "Maybe... Oh, I know. Maybe they were open when you last saw them, but by the time I got there, they were closed."
KR: "예를 들자면... 그래. 네가 봤을 땐 열려있었고, 내가 봤을 땐 닫혀있었다."

Name: d3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「つまり、校舎の中にいた誰かが、外に出てきた」
Translation: "Whoever was on school grounds earlier, they must have left."
KR: "즉, 학교 안에 있던 누군가가 밖으로 나왔다."

Name: d3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そういう予想も、立つんじゃないかしら？」
Translation: "That would make sense, wouldn't it?"

Name: d3165.nss
Japanese: 確かに、美雪の言葉は筋が通っていないわけじゃない。
Translation: I can't pretend I don't see the logic there.
KR: 확실히 미유키의 말도 일리 없는 건 아니다.

Name: d3165.nss
Japanese: けど――
Translation: But...

Name: d3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なに？　まだ、納得いかない？」
Translation: "What? You're still not convinced?"

Name: d3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なら、不法侵入してみる？」
Translation: "You wanna trespass, then?"

Name: d3165.nss
Japanese: 俺は、目の前にそびえ立つ校門を見上げる。
Translation: I look up at the tall gate towering above us.
KR: 나는 눈앞에 우뚝 선 교문을 올려다보았다.

Name: d3165.nss
Japanese: 夜の校舎に忍び込む――
Translation: Sneaking onto school grounds at night?

Name: d3165.nss
Japanese: それだけのことをする確信は、なかった。
Translation: Even I'm not confident enough for THAT.
KR: 그런 일을 할 정도의 확신은 없었다.

Name: d3165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「興奮して、ごめん」
Translation: "Sorry for overreacting."

Name: d3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ううん、いいのよ」
Translation: "No, it's fine."

Name: d3165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「さ、家に戻りましょう」
Translation: "Now, let's go home."

Name: d3165.nss
Japanese: 俺たちは静かに、校門へと背を向けた。
Translation: We quietly turn away from the gates.

Name: d3172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方まで現実とゲームの区別がつかなくなった？」
Translation: "Now YOU'RE mixing up games with reality?"
KR: "너까지 현실과 게임을 구별할 수 없게 됐어?"

Name: d3172.nss
Japanese: 美雪の言うとおり。
Translation: Miyuki's right.

Name: d3172.nss
Japanese: 俺はあくまで、アオイを更正させる側のはず。
Translation: I'm supposed to be rehabilitating her back into the real world.

Name: d3172.nss
Japanese: 一緒にゲーム脳になってどうする？
Translation: I can't go catching her gamer brain disease!
KR: 같이 게임 뇌가 되면 안 되지!

Name: d3172.nss
Japanese: 無理矢理にでも眠った方が良さそうだ。
Translation: I should just force myself to go to sleep.

Name: d3172.nss
Japanese: 俺は枕を抱いて、強く強く目を閉じた。
Translation: Hugging my pillow, I squeeze my eyes shut.
KR: 나는 베개를 껴안고 눈을 꾹 감았다.

Name: d3182.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……なに、考えてるんだか」
Translation: "...The hell am I thinking?"

Name: d3182.nss
Japanese: そこでようやく、我に返る。
Translation: Finally, I snap back to my senses.

Name: d3182.nss
Japanese: ゲームのアオイが体育館の中にいるから、現実の俺も彼女を迎えに、夜の学校に不法侵入する？
Translation: Am I seriously contemplating trespassing onto school grounds at night to look for Aoi just because a video game told me she might be here?
KR: 게임 속 아오이가 체육관에 있으니까, 현실의 나도 아오이를 데리러 학교에 무단침입한다?

Name: d3182.nss
Japanese: 馬鹿馬鹿しい。
Translation: God, I'm so stupid.

Name: d3182.nss
Japanese: そもそも、猫を抱いたアオイが、カギのかかった夜の学校にどう侵入できるんだ？
Translation: How would Aoi even sneak onto campus with a kitten in tow?
KR: 애초에 아오이가 고양이를 안은 채 굳게 닫힌 학교에 몰래 들어갔다고?

Name: d3182.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……あり得ないし」
Translation: "...No chance."

Name: d3182.nss
Japanese: 自分に言い聞かせるように呟いて、家路を戻った。
Translation: I turn around and head home.

Name: d4122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「おはよう」
Translation: "Good morning!"

Name: d4122.nss
Japanese: 美雪が教室に入り、教室に活気が満ちる。
Translation: Miyuki steps into the room, and instantly the whole class livens up.

Name: d4122.nss
Japanese: いつものように、彼女中心にできる生徒の輪。
Translation: As usual, she quickly draws a crowd.
KR: 언제나처럼 미유키를 중심으로 모이는 학생 무리.

Name: d4122.nss
Japanese: 教室を一通り見回す美雪の視線が、無人のアオイの席で止まった。
Translation: She scans the room—and her gaze stops on Aoi's empty desk.
KR: 교실을 둘러보던 미유키의 시선이 빈 아오이 자리에서 멈췄다.

Name: d4122.nss
Japanese: ――アオイは？

Name: d4122.nss
Japanese: 問いかけるようにこちらを見つめる。
Translation: She shoots me a questioning look.

Name: d4122.nss
Japanese: だが俺は、何も答えられない。
Translation: But I don't have an answer for her.
KR: 하지만 나는 아무 대답도 할 수 없었다.

Name: d4151.nss
Japanese: そのまま、アオイは俺たちの前から消えた。
Translation: That was the last time I saw Aoi before she disappeared.

Name: d4151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「やっぱり、あのネコを拾ったんだわ。
　だから、私たちの前から消えた」
Translation:
"I bet she adopted that cat.
That's why she's ghosting us."
KR: "역시 그 고양이를 주운 거야. 그래서 우리 앞에서 사라진 거고."

Name: d4151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……私のせいね」
Translation: "...This is my fault."

Name: d4151.nss
Japanese: 美雪はしばらく落ち込んでいた。
Translation: Miyuki was in low spirits for a long time after that.

Name: d4151.nss
Japanese: しかし俺は、アオイがいなくなってしまったことに、なにかもっと別の理由があるように思えてならなかった。
Translation: But as for me, I have to believe there was more to her disappearance than just that...
KR: 하지만 나는 아오이가 없어진 것에 뭔가 다른 이유가 있을 것 같았다.

Name: d4151.nss
Japanese: 俺たちには理解できない、もっと別の何かが……
Translation: There has to be some other reason... Something we don't understand...
KR: 우리가 이해할 수 없는... 뭔가 다른 이유가...

Name: d4151.nss
Japanese: アオイがいなくても、一度繋がった俺と美雪の関係は、途切れなかった。
Translation: But even without Aoi around, my relationship with Miyuki stayed strong.
KR: 아오이는 사라졌지만, 한번 연결된 나와 미유키의 관계는 끊어지지 않았다.

Name: d4171.nss
Japanese: 一瞬、俺の脳裏をあの日の出来事が掠める。
Translation: The memory of that fateful day flashes through my mind.

Name: d4171.nss
Japanese: もし、美雪がアオイに絶交を宣言しなかったら、俺たちはまだ友達でいられたのだろうか。
Translation: If Miyuki hadn't threatened to cut ties with Aoi back then, maybe we'd still be friends today.
KR: 만약 미유키가 아오이에게 절교 선언을 하지 않았다면, 우린 아직 친구였을까?

Name: d4171.nss
Japanese: でももうそれは、終わってしまったことで。
Translation: But it's all over now.

Name: d4171.nss
Japanese: アオイは絶交を受け入れて、姿を消した。
Translation: Aoi disappeared without protest.

Name: d4171.nss
Japanese: 俺たちは、友達でさえ、なくなった。
Translation: And now our friendship is over.

Name: d4171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もう……終わったんだ」
Translation: "It's all in the past now."

Name: d4171.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「心一ッ！！」
Translation: "Shinichi!!!"

Name: d4171.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎が、目の前で叫ぶ。
Translation: Yuutarou screams in my face.

Name: d4171.nss
Japanese: だが、俺の心までは、届かない。
Translation: But it doesn't reach me.

Name: d4171.nss
Japanese: 俺の世界に、神様はいない。
Translation: There is no God in my world.

Name: d4171.nss
Japanese: 電波が届く、奇跡はない。
Translation: No divine signal.

Name: d4171.nss
Japanese: だから俺は、この毎日に慣れる。
Translation: My only choice is to get used to my new life without her.

Name: d4171.nss
Japanese: そうやって、生きていく。
Translation: My only choice... is to keep on living.

Name: d4171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アイツは自分の意思でいなくなった」
Translation: "She vanished of her own volition."

Name: d4171.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「それは自分への言い訳だろ？」
Translation: "You're just using that as an excuse."

Name: d4171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「わかってる。わかってるんだ」
Translation: "I know that, okay? I know that!"

Name: d4171.nss
Japanese: 俺はいつも、何もしない言い訳を捜してる。
Translation: I'm constantly looking for an excuse to not do anything.
KR: 난 언제나 아무것도 하지 않기 위해 변명거릴 찾는다.

Name: d4171.nss
Japanese: 惨めな思いをしたくないから。
Translation: That way I avoid feeling pathetic.

Name: d4171.nss
Japanese: 傷つきたくないから。
Translation: That way I avoid getting hurt.

Name: d4171.nss
Japanese: でも、その性格は変えられない。
Translation: This is just the kind of guy I am.

Name: d4171.nss
Japanese: だから、上手く慣れていくしかない。
Translation: So I'll just have to get used to it.

Name: d4171.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎が、投げ捨てるように手を離す。
Translation: Yuutarou whips his hands off me like I'm trash.

Name: d4171.nss
Japanese: 勢い余った俺は、机に寄りかかるようにして止まった。
Translation: I stumble backwards and catch myself on a desk.
KR: 나는 기세 좋게 밀려 책상을 붙잡아 멈췄다.

Name: d4171.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「向日に何を教わったか、よく考えるんだな！」
Translation: "Ask yourself what Mukou's taught you!"

Name: d4171.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎は破門状を投げつけて、そう吐き捨てた。
Translation: He shoves the letter of disownment at me.
KR: 유우타로는 파문장을 던지며 그렇게 말을 뱉었다.

Name: d4181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイに教わったこと……」
Translation: "What Mukou's taught me..."

Name: d4181.nss
Japanese: 果たしてそんなこと、あっただろうか？
Translation: Did she really teach me anything?

Name: d4181.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「いらっしゃいま――あ！」
Translation: "Welcome—AAH!"

Name: d4181.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「す、須々木先輩！」
Translation: "S-Susuki-senpai!"

Name: d4181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ、ハルちゃん」
Translation: "Oh, hey, Haru-chan."

Name: d4181.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese:
「あ、あの。
　私、須々木先輩に、話があって！」
Translation:
"Uh... um...
I need to talk to you!"

Name: d4181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "You do?"

Name: d4182a.nss
Japanese: 目撃者は、意外なところから現れた。
Translation: And so a witness turned up—in the most unlikely of places.

Name: d4182a.nss
Japanese: あの雨の夜、ハルちゃんが店でバイトをしていると、ネコを抱いたアオイが姿を現したらしい。
Translation: According to Haru-chan, on that rainy night, she'd been working the register when Aoi turned up, kitten in tow.
KR: 비 내리던 그날 밤, 하루가 가게에서 아르바이트하고 있을 때, 고양이를 안은 아오이가 모습을 나타낸 모양이다.

Name: d4182a.nss
Japanese: お腹を減らした子猫に、ミルクを飲ませてやりたい――
Translation: The kitten was starving, and Aoi wanted to feed him.
KR: 배고픈 새끼 고양이에게 우유를 먹이고 싶다.

Name: d4182a.nss
Japanese: そんなやりとりからはじまり、アオイが学校に来なくなってからしばらく、ふたりは何度か会っていたという。
Translation: That was how their friendship started, and even after Aoi stopped coming to school, Haru-chan encountered her a handful of times.
KR: 그런 말을 주고받으며, 아오이가 학교에 안 온 지 얼마 되지 않아 두 사람은 몇 번인가 만났다고 한다.

Name: d4182b.nss
Japanese: 思いもよらない、目撃者だった。
Translation: Haru-chan was the world's most unlikely witness.

Name: d4182b.nss
Japanese: アオイは俺の前から姿を消した後も、時折ハルちゃんがバイトをしているこの店へ買い物に来たのだという。
Translation: And yet, according to her, Aoi had visited the corner store several times to buy things... even after her supposed disappearance.
KR: 아오이는 내 앞에서 사라진 후에도 가끔 하루가 아르바이트하는 이 가게에 쇼핑하러 왔다고 한다.

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「アオイ先輩、電波が届かないってずっと言ってました」
Translation: "Aoi-senpai kept saying her signal wouldn't go through."
KR: "아오이 선배, 전파가 닿지 않는다고 계속 말했어요."

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「電話、かけてた？」
Translation: "Was she trying to make a call?"

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「はい。何度も、かけてました」
Translation: "Uh huh. Several, actually."

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese:
「カミサマに連絡するって。
　アップデートして、正しいルートにしてもらうって」
Translation: "She said she needed to get in touch with God in order to 'patch the game into the correct route'."
KR: "신님한테 연락한다고. 업데이트해서 올바른 루트로 바꿀 거라고."

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese:
「でも、届くはずないですよね。
　ＳＩＭカード、抜かれてましたから」
Translation:
"But obviously she wasn't going to have any signal.
She didn't even have a SIM card."
KR: "하지만 닿을 리가 없죠. SIM 카드가 뽑혀 있었으니까요."

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん……なんだそれ？」
Translation: "Huh? What's a SIM card?"

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「ええと、なんて言えばいいのかな……携帯電話の番号とか、電話帳とかが埋め込んであるＩＣカードで」
Translation: "Oh, uh... How do I put it... It's the IC card that holds your phone number, address book, and all that stuff."
KR: "음... 뭐라고 해야 할까... 전화번호 같은 게 들어 있는 IC 카드인데..."

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「それがないと、携帯電話としては使えないんですよね」
Translation: "Without it, your cell phone can't do any 'phone' type stuff."
KR: "그게 없으면 핸드폰으로는 쓸 수 없는 거죠."

Name: d4183.nss
Japanese: そういえば、さすがにアオイのスマフォの中までは、見たことがなかった。
Translation: Come to think of it, I never did check inside her phone...
KR: 그러고 보니 아오이의 핸드폰 안까지는 본 적이 없었다...

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「結局一度も、メールしなかったな……」
Translation: "She never did send me a single email..."
KR: "그래, 한 번도 메일 보낸 적이 없었어..."

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese:
「連絡先は、聞いたんですよ。
　アドレス帳に登録して、これで友達だって」
Translation:
"She gave me her contact info, though.
Said it was a symbol of our new friendship."

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はは……俺と同じだ」
Translation: "Haha... Same here."

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「なんだか、ちょっと変わってますよね」
Translation: "She's a bit of an oddball, huh?"

Name: d4183.nss
Japanese: 多少打ち解けたのか、はにかみながらも微笑んで見せるハルちゃん。
Translation: Haru-chan smiles shyly. She seems like she's more comfortable around me now.
KR: 긴장이 풀렸는지, 수줍어하면서도 미소 짓는 하루.

Name: d4183.nss
Japanese: その笑顔が可愛らしくて、俺は思わず見入ってしまう。
Translation: Her smile's so cute, I can't help but stare...
KR: 그 미소가 귀여워서 나도 모르게 넋을 잃었다.

Name: d4183.nss
Japanese: 演劇部なら、彼女も美雪と舞台に立つのだろうか……
Translation: If she's in the theatre club, does that mean she'll share the stage with Miyuki at some point...?
KR: 연극부면 하루도 미유키랑 같이 무대에 서는 걸까...?

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「あ、あのっ！」
Translation: "L-Listen, um!"

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「私、アオイ先輩と会って、ほんの少しだけ、勇気をもらった気がするんです」
Translation: "I feel like meeting Aoi-senpai has given me a tiny bit of courage."
KR: "저 아오이 선배랑 만나서 약간 용기를 얻은 것 같아요."

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese:
「今までと違う、新しい自分になろうって。
　そう、思えたんです」
Translation:
"And I've decided...
I want to turn over a new leaf."
KR: "지금까지와 다른, 새로운 내가 되자고... 그렇게 생각했어요."

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「だから、その……」
Translation: "So, um..."

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「思い切って、お願いして、いいですか？」
Translation: "I have a big favor to ask... Is that cool?"

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ。話も聞いたし、できることならなんでも」
Translation: "Sure. You've been a huge help, so I'm happy to return the favor."

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「キス、して欲しいんです！」
Translation: "There's someone I think you should kiss!"

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What?"

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「キス？」
Translation: "Don't tell me... You want me to kiss you?"

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese:
「はい、キス――じゃ、なく、っていうか、えっ！？
　ちょ、やだっ！　ちがっ！　あっあっ！！」
Translation:
"Yeah, I—What? No! I mean... What?!
Whoa! No! No way! Aah! AAH!!!"
KR: "네, 키스... 가 아니라, 엣!? 시, 싫어! 아니! 아아앗!!!"

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese:
「そうじゃないんですッ！　そうじゃなくて！
　私はキスなんて全ッ然したくなくてッ！！」
Translation:
"That's not what I meant! At all!
I don't want to kiss you in the least!!!"
KR: "그게 아니에요! 그게 아니라! 전 키스 같은 건 절대 하고 싶지 않은데!!"

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうですか……」

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「あ、いや！　須々木先輩が嫌とかそういうわけじゃなくてむしろタイプで、って私何を――あああああああ！！」
Translation: "Uh... well... I mean... I don't think you're gross or anything! That's not it! In fact, if anything, you're totally my type—Oh god, what am I saying?! AAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!!"
KR: "아, 아니! 스스키 선배가 싫다거나 그런 게 아니라, 오히려 타입인데... 아니 무슨 소릴... 아아아아악!!"

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょっと落ち着こうか、な？」
Translation: "Let's just take a deep breath and calm down, shall we?"

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Translation: "R-Right..."

Name: d4183.nss
Japanese: 相変わらずの、ドジっ娘＆内気っ娘だ――
Translation: Shy and clumsy to a fault, this one...

Name: d4183.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ、悪い」
Translation: "Oh, sorry, one sec."

Name: d4183.nss
Japanese: ハルちゃんに断って、メールを確認する。
Translation: I pull out my phone and check my inbox.

Name: d4183.nss
Japanese: メールの差出人は、美雪。
Translation: There's a new email from Miyuki.

Name: d4183.nss
Japanese: ――時間、ありますか？
Translation: —Are you busy later?

Name: d4183.nss
Japanese: ――大事な話があります。
Translation: —I need to talk to you.

Name: d4183.nss
Japanese: ――バッティングセンターに来て下さい。
Translation: —Please come by the batting cages tonight.

Name: d4183.nss
Japanese: ――お願いします。
Translation: —It's important.

Name: d4202.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「好きです」
Translation: "I'm in love with you."

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: 風が、彼女の髪を靡かせた。
Translation: Her hair flutters in the wind.

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: ずっと澱んでいたふたりの間の時間が、動き出した。
Translation: Finally, the frozen space between us melts to life again.
KR: 계속 멈춰있던 두 사람의 시간이 움직이기 시작했다.

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: きっと、きっかけをくれたのは、アオイだ。
Translation: And we have Aoi to thank for that.

Name: d4202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ハルちゃんだっけ？　演劇部の後輩」
Translation: "One of your club underlings... Haru-chan, was it?"

Name: d4202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「彼女から、美雪にキスしてくれって頼まれた」
Translation: "She asked me to kiss you."

Name: d4202.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「え……ハルちゃんが！？
　な、なんで！？」
Translation:
"What?! She did?!
Wh-What for?!"

Name: d4202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「理由はふたつ」
Translation: "Two reasons."

Name: d4202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「演劇を成功させたいのと――」
Translation: "One, to help make the play a success..."

Name: d4202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイに、頼まれたのと」
Translation: "And two, because Aoi asked her to ask me."

Name: d4202.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイに？」
Translation: "Aoi asked her to?"

Name: d4202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あの日の後も、アオイと何回か会ったんだって」
Translation: "She said she ran into Aoi a few times since her disappearance."

Name: d4202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺と美雪が、友達じゃなく恋人になれるように、ずっと祈ってたんだって」
Translation: "And according to her, Aoi said she'd been praying for me and you to finally get together."
KR: "나랑 미유키가 친구가 아닌 연인이 되길 계속 바래왔대."

Name: d4202.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……そうなんだ」
Translation: "...I see."

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: 俺たちは、口には出さなかったが、気付いていた。
Translation: Neither of us say it, but we both know.
KR: 우리 둘은 입 밖에 내지는 않았지만 깨달았다.

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: アオイは、俺たちを恋人にするために、消えたのだ。
Translation: Aoi chose to disappear in order to help our relationship blossom.
KR: 아오이는 우리를 연인으로 만들기 위해 사라진 것이다.

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: これ以上近づけば、自分が邪魔者になってしまうことを恐れて。
Translation: She was afraid of getting in the way of our romance.
KR: 더 이상 다가가면 자신이 방해꾼이 될까 봐.

Name: d4202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪」
Translation: "Miyuki."

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: 俺は静かに、美雪に近づく。
Translation: I quietly approach her.

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: 普段は威圧感のある美雪だが、身長で比べれば、俺の方がずっと大きい。
Translation: Normally she gives off this intimidating vibe, but physically, I'm bigger than her by a long shot.
KR: 평소에는 위압감이 있는 미유키지만 키로 치면 내가 훨씬 크다.

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: 見上げる彼女の瞳は、期待と不安に揺れている。
Translation: She looks up at me, eyes full of hope and worry.
KR: 올려다보는 미유키의 두 눈은 기대와 불안으로 흔들리고 있었다.

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: アオイが俺の目の前から姿を消してまで、教えようとしたものがあるとすれば。
Translation: Whatever it was Aoi was trying to grant me by making herself scarce...
KR: 아오이가 내 앞에서 모습을 감추면서까지 가르쳐주려 한 것이 있다면...

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: それはきっと、最後の一歩を踏み出す勇気だ。
Translation: ...please, let it be the courage to take this last step.
KR: 그건 분명 마지막 한 걸음을 내디딜 용기다.

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: 自分は傷ついてでも、自分の気持ちに素直になる覚悟だ。
Translation: Let me have the strength to face my feelings, even if it means I'll get hurt.
KR: 상처 입더라도 자신의 마음에 솔직해질 각오다.

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: だから俺は、ずっと隠していた本当の気持ちを口にする。
Translation: It's time to finally confess everything I've secretly felt all this time.
KR: 그래서 나는, 계속 숨기고 있던 진심을 말했다.

Name: d4202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、美雪と、キスしたい」
Translation: "I want to kiss you, Miyuki."

Name: d4202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「演劇の成功のためじゃなく」
Translation: "Not for the play."

Name: d4202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイがそれを祈ったからじゃなく」
Translation: "Not because Aoi wants me to."

Name: d4202.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ずっと、好きだったから」
Translation: "But because I've always loved you."

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: 人生は選択の連続だ――
Translation: They say life is a series of choices.

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: なんて言葉は、嘘だ。
Translation: But that's a load of crap.

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: 神様はサイコロを振らない。
Translation: God's not up there rolling the dice.

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: 人生に、「ＩＦ」なんてない。
Translation: What-ifs don't exist.

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: 過去の少し先にある、当たり前の明日へ。
Translation: Yesterday leads to today, and today leads to tomorrow.
KR: 과거의 조금 앞에 있는 당연한 내일로.

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: その行き着く先の未来は――
Translation: What lies ahead?

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: 今、ここにある。
Translation: I'm about to find out.

Name: d4202.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: 俺たちは、そっと身体を寄せ合って――
Translation: Slowly, we draw close—

Name: d4202.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私のはじめて……もらって」
Translation: "Will you... be my first?"

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: そっと、目蓋を閉じる。
Translation: I gently close my eyes...

Name: d4202.nss
Japanese: 俺たちはこうして、結ばれたのだ。
Translation: And with this, our hearts are finally one.

Name: d4203.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……ああ、ごめん」
Translation: "...Oh, my bad."

Name: d4203.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「エルが急に出てきて、びっくりしただけで」
Translation: "I was just surprised to see Eru here."

Name: d4203.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「残ってくれるの？」
Translation: "Will you stay?"

Name: d4203.nss
Japanese: 寂しげにエルが鳴く。
Translation: Eru meows sadly.

Name: d4203.nss
Japanese: だが、俺の心は決まっていた。
Translation: But I've already made up my mind.
KR: 하지만 내 마음은 이미 정해져 있다.

Name: d4203.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もちろん、残るよ」
Translation: "Of course I'll stay."

Name: d4203.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺はずっと、アオイを捜してた」
Translation: "You know, I spent all that time looking for Aoi..."

Name: d4203.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「でもそれは、自分の気持ちがやっとわかって。
　それを、彼女にも伝えなきゃと思ったからで」
Translation:
"But in the end, I just wanted to tell her...
that I'd finally come to terms with how I truly feel."
KR: "하지만 그건, 내 마음을 겨우 알게 돼서 그걸 아오이한테 알려줘야 할 것만 같아서 그런 거야."

Name: d4203.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一の……気持ち……？」
Translation: "How you feel...?"

Name: d4222.nss
Japanese: 素人がどうこうするよりも、助けを呼んだ方が良いに違いない。
Translation: I don't have the first clue how to help her. I should just call an ambulance.
KR: 아마추어가 이렇게 저렇게 하는 것보다 도움을 부르는 편이 좋겠지...

Name: d4222.nss
Japanese: 俺はポケットから、自分の携帯電話を取り出した。
Translation: I take my phone out of my pocket.

Name: d4223.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「バカ言うな。
　さっきまで、息も止まってたんだぞ？」
Translation: "Don't be ridiculous. Are you forgetting that when I found you just now, you weren't breathing?"
KR: "바보 같은 소리 하지 마. 방금 전까지 숨을 안 쉬었다니까?"

Name: d4223.nss
Japanese: 俺はすぐさま、携帯を手に取った。
Translation: I quickly grab my phone.

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイを捜しながら、俺ずっと、考えてたんだ」
Translation: "The whole time I was searching for you, I kept asking myself..."

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんでこんなに、お前が気になるのか」
Translation: "Why was I so worried about you?"

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、ちっちゃい頃から美雪と一緒にいただろ？」
Translation: "Well, you know how Miyuki and I have basically grown up together?"

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから色々、いらないことばっかり考えちゃって」
Translation: "All that time, I kept stressing out over the small details."

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「本当の気持ちを、しまい込んで」
Translation: "I locked up all my emotions..."

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「自分に嘘ばっかりついて、過ごしてた」
Translation: "...and lied to myself constantly."

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きかせて」
Translation: "Aoi wants to know."

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチの、ほんとうのきもち」
Translation: "Tell me how you really feel."

Name: d4232.nss
Japanese: アオイの瞳が、揺らいでいるのがわかる。
Translation: Her eyes are swimming with emotion.
KR: 아오이의 눈동자가 흔들리고 있는 걸 알 수 있었다.

Name: d4232.nss
Japanese: 思わず彼女から、目を逸らしたくなる。
Translation: I can feel the urge to look away.

Name: d4232.nss
Japanese: でも、これを伝えなければ俺は先に進めない。
Translation: But I can't move forward unless I tell her.
KR: 하지만 이걸 전하지 않고는 앞으로 나아갈 수 없다.

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺――美雪が好きなんだ」
Translation: "I... I'm in love with Miyuki."

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今日、これからアイツに告白してこようと思う」
Translation: "And I'm going to confess my feelings to her tonight."
KR: "오늘, 지금부터 그 녀석한테 고백하러 갈 생각이야."

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「それに気づけたのは、アオイのおかげだから。
　だから――」
Translation:
"Honestly, I owe you big time.
You helped me figure it all out."
KR: "그걸 깨닫게 된 건 아오이 덕분이야. 그러니까..."

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今まで、本当に、ありがとう」
Translation: "Thank you so much. Seriously."

Name: d4232.nss
Japanese: 頭を下げた。
Translation: I bow my head.

Name: d4232.nss
Japanese: 深く――深く。

Name: d4232.nss
Japanese: 静寂が、辺りを満たした。
Translation: Silence falls between us.

Name: d4232.nss
Japanese: しばらく、星の瞬く音さえしなかった。
Translation: For a while, all I can hear is the stillness of the night.

Name: d4232.nss
Japanese: 俺はずっと頭を下げながら、アオイの返答を待ち――
Translation: Meanwhile, I await Aoi's response...
KR: 나는 고개를 숙인 채 아오이의 대답을 기다렸다.

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい！」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: d4232.nss
Japanese: 震える声で、彼女は手を挙げた。
Translation: She raises her hand, voice shaking.

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おめでとうなの」
Translation: "Congratulations!"

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「これは……かなしい、なみだじゃ、ないの」
Translation: "These... aren't sad tears, okay?"

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うれしい、なみだなの」
Translation: "They're happy tears."

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ――うれしいの」
Translation: "Aoi's... really happy for you."

Name: d4232.nss
Japanese: 涙をボロボロこぼしながら言うアオイ。
Translation: Sure enough, fat tears roll down her cheeks.

Name: d4232.nss
Japanese: 俺は、目を逸らしたい衝動を必死に堪える。
Translation: Once again, I suppress the urge to avert my gaze.
KR: 나는 눈을 돌리고 싶은 충동을 필사적으로 참았다.

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチの、きもち、わかった」
Translation: "Aoi understands how you feel."

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、まってる」
Translation: "Now... Miyuki's waiting for you."

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから、いって」
Translation: "Go on."

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はやく！」
Translation: "Hurry!"

Name: d4232.nss
Japanese: 珍しく、アオイが声を荒げる。
Translation: Her voice is uncharacteristically rough.

Name: d4232.nss
Japanese: 俺は一体、どんな言葉を彼女に伝えればいいのだろう。
Translation: What do I even say to her now?
KR: 나는 대체 어떤 말을 해줘야 하는 걸까?

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ！」
Translation: "Shinichi!"

Name: d4232.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...R-Right."

Name: d4232.nss
Japanese: 俺は踵を返しながら、携帯電話を取る。
Translation: I turn away and take out my phone.

Name: d4232.nss
Japanese: ついさっきまで、アオイは呼吸さえできない状態だった。
Translation: After all, Aoi wasn't even breathing as of a few minutes ago.
KR: 방금 전까지 아오이는 숨도 쉴 수 없는 상태였다.

Name: d4232.nss
Japanese: 夜の屋上において行くわけにはいかないだろう。
Translation: I can't just leave her up here alone.
KR: 한밤중에 옥상에 두고 갈 순 없지.

Name: d4233.nss
Japanese: 指を滑らせ、１１９を押す。
Translation: I quickly dial 911.

Name: d4233.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もしもし、すいません」
Translation: "Hello?"

Name: d4233.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「救急車をお願いします。場所は――」
Translation: "I need an ambulance. We're located—"

Name: d4233.nss
Japanese: 学校の屋上。
Translation: ...Do I tell them we're on the roof of the school?

Name: d4233.nss
Japanese: やはり、アオイと一緒に校門まで下りた方がいいか？
Translation: Or do I have Aoi come down with me to the gates?
KR: 역시 교문 앞까지는 데려가는 편이 좋을까?

Name: d4233.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「エル？　ちょっと待ってて――」
Translation: "Eru, hold on a second—"

Name: d4233.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "......What the?"

Name: d4233.nss
Japanese: 右手から、力が抜ける。
Translation: The strength drains from my fingers.

Name: d4233.nss
Japanese: 自分の目が、信じられない。
Translation: My brain struggles to process what I'm seeing.

Name: d4233.nss
Japanese: エルの鳴き声で、周囲に意識を引き戻されると――
Translation: Eru's meow brings me back to reality—

Name: d4241.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイの姿が、消えてた」
Translation: "...And that's when I realized she was gone."

Name: d4241.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「消えてた……？」
Translation: "Gone...?"

Name: d4241.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「何かの間違いだと思うか？」
Translation: "You think I'm making this up?"

Name: d4241.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「普通なら、信じないけど。
　相手はアオイなのよね」
Translation:
"Under any other circumstance, yeah...
But then again, this is Aoi we're talking about."

Name: d4241.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「あそこはセカイの中心。
　まして、時間は夜だから」
Translation:
"That place is the center of the universe...
Plus, it was the middle of the night."

Name: d4241.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どんな不思議なことが起こっても、おかしくない」
Translation: "The perfect environment for a little magic."

Name: d4241.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「――意外だな」
Translation: "...Huh. I'm surprised."

Name: d4241.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、また『ゲーム脳だ！』って怒られるかと思った」
Translation: "I was expecting you to call me a gamer brain or something."
KR: "나는 또 게임 뇌라고 혼낼 줄 알았는데."

Name: d4241.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私、信じることにしたの」
Translation: "I've decided to believe..."

Name: d4241.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「現実の半歩先にある、非現実的じゃない、夢」
Translation: "...in a middle ground between dreams and reality."
KR: "...현실의 반걸음 앞에 있는 비현실적이지 않은 꿈."

Name: d4241.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それは、アオイのおかげかもね」
Translation: "I guess I have Aoi to thank for that."

Name: d4241.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そっか」
Translation: "Yeah..."

Name: d4241.nss
Japanese: 俺が今、ここにいるのは、アオイのおかげ。
Translation: It's thanks to Aoi that I'm here at all.
KR: 내가 지금 여기에 있는 건 아오이 덕분이다.

Name: d4241.nss
Japanese: それは絶対、間違いない。
Translation: That much is for certain.

Name: d4241.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それで、アオイの話は終わったのよね」
Translation: "So, that's it for Aoi, yes?"

Name: d4241.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「じゃあ次は、私の――」
Translation: "Now then, let me—"

Name: d4241.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「――待ってくれ」
Translation: "—Hang on a sec."

Name: d4241.nss
Japanese: 本物だったのか、幻だったのか、それはわからない。
Translation: I don't know if the Aoi I saw up there was real or just an illusion.

Name: d4241.nss
Japanese: でも、あのアオイに何か意味があったとするなら。
Translation: But if she purposely came to see me one last time...
KR: 하지만 그 아오이에게 뭔가 의미가 있다면...

Name: d4241.nss
Japanese: わざわざ俺に、会いに来てくれたとするなら。
Translation: If that moment we shared held any deeper meaning...

Name: d4241.nss
Japanese: 彼女が伝えたかった言葉は、きっと――
Translation: Then I think I know what she wanted me to understand.

Name: d4241.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺から、話させてくれないか」
Translation: "Can you let me go first?"

Name: d4241.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一から……？」
Translation: "What is it...?"

Name: d4242.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪」
Translation: "Miyuki..."

Name: d4242.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「は……はい」

Name: d4242.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「ずっと、素直になれなくて。
　回り道ばっかりで」
Translation:
"I've been in denial for a long time...
Constantly skirting around the issue..."

Name: d4242.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でも、アオイのおかげで、自分の気持ちに向き合えた」
Translation: "But with Aoi's help, I've finally come face to face with how I feel."
KR: "하지만 아오이 덕분에 자기 자신을 마주할 수 있었어."

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: 俺は、大きく、深呼吸。
Translation: I take a deep breath.

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: ふたりの関係を、決定的に変えるその言葉を、口に出す。
Translation: These are the words that will change us forever.
KR: 그리고 두 사람의 관계를 결정적으로 바꿀 그 말을 입에 담았다.

Name: d4242.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、美雪が、好きだった」
Translation: "I love you."

Name: d4242.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ずっと、ずっと、好きだった」
Translation: "I've always loved you."

Name: d4242.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから――」
Translation: "And I want to be with you!"

Name: d4242.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「つきあってください！！」
Translation: "Please be mine!"

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: 頭を下げる。
Translation: I bow my head...

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: 下げて、待って、待って、待って――
Translation: ...and wait.

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: 待ちきれずに、頭を上げる。
Translation: I wait... and wait... and wait... until I can't take it any longer.

Name: d4242.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "......Shinichi."

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: そこには、演技なんて全然できない、裸の、そのままの美雪が棒立ちで――
Translation: Miyuki stands there, no persona to hide behind, nakedly vulnerable.
KR: 거기에는 절대 연기라고 할 수 없는, 있는 그대로의 소네 미유키가 서 있었다.

Name: d4242.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ずっと、ずっと、待ってたんだから」
Translation: "I've been waiting all this time..."

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: 美雪の瞳から一筋、涙がこぼれ落ちた。
Translation: A single tear streaks down her cheek.

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: 俺も彼女も、知っている。
Translation: Both she and I know...

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: この涙は、うれし涙だ。
Translation: ...it's a happy tear.

Name: d4242.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……ねえ、心一？」
Translation: "...Hey, Shinichi?"

Name: d4242.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「好きっていう気持ちの証に――」
Translation: "If you really do love me..."

Name: d4242.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私に、キス、してくれる？」
Translation: "...will you kiss me?"

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: 美雪の、吐息。
Translation: I can feel her breath.

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: 間近で見る、彼女の瞳。
Translation: Her eyes are inches from mine.

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: 俺を悩ませ続けたあの記憶が、吹き飛ばされるように霧散する。
Translation: The memory that once held me back now scatters in the wind like ash.

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: 人生は選択の連続だ――
Translation: They say life is a series of choices.

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: なんて言葉は、嘘だ。
Translation: But that's a load of crap.

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: 神様はサイコロを振らない。
Translation: God's not up there rolling the dice.

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: 人生に、「ＩＦ」なんてない。
Translation: What-ifs don't exist.

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: 人はただ、脳のシナプスが決めた「必然」を歩いている。
Translation: It's the synapses in our brains that make our choices for us.
KR: 사람은 그저 뇌의 시냅스가 정한 '필연'을 걷고 있다.

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: ただそれだけ。
Translation: That's all there is to it.

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: 全ては運命。
Translation: Everything is fate.

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: 俺たちは、最初から、こうなる運命だったのだ。
Translation: And we were fated to end up together, right from the very start.
KR: 우리는 처음부터 이렇게 될 운명이었던 것이다.

Name: d4242.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Miyuki..."

Name: d4242.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: 俺は、そっと彼女の身体を抱いて――
Translation: I gently pull her into my arms...

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: その唇に、キスをした。
Translation: ...and kiss her lips.

Name: d4242.nss
Japanese: こうして俺たちは、結ばれたのだ。
Translation: And with this, our hearts are finally one.

Name: d6111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そろそろ、始まる時間ね」
Translation: "Show's about to start, huh?"

Name: d6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だな」
Translation: "Yeah..."

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: 屋上から旧体育館を見下ろし、そう呟く。
Translation: We look down at the old gymnasium from our vantage point on the roof.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: 俺はあの後、演劇部に乗り込んだ。
Translation: After that night, I joined the theatre club.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: 用件はひとつ――美雪のキスシーンを、変更してくれ。
Translation: I had one goal: to make them revise Miyuki's kiss scene.
KR: 목적은 단 하나. 미유키의 키스신을 바꿔달라는 것이다.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: わがままだとはわかっていても、恋人の唇が俺以外の男に奪われることが、我慢できなかったのだ。
Translation: I knew it was selfish, but I simply couldn't tolerate the thought of some other guy kissing my girlfriend.
KR: 제멋대로인 줄 알면서도 애인의 입술을 다른 남자에게 빼앗기는 걸 참을 수가 없었다.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: もちろん演出家や脚本家は、俺の提案に難色を示した。
Translation: Naturally, the director and playwright were completely against it.
KR: 물론 감독이나 각본가는 내 제안에 난색을 표했다.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: 既に芝居はほとんど出来上がっていて、美雪のキスシーン、それがハマれば完璧なデキになる。
Translation: The play was already coming together nicely, and once they nailed the kiss scene, it would be perfect.
KR: 이미 연극은 거의 완성되어서 미유키의 키스신으로 완벽한 결말을 맺는다.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: もしそこに手を加えることになれば、文字通り画竜点睛を欠くわけで。
Translation: If they were to change it now, they wouldn't be able to polish it in time, they said.
KR: 만약 거기에 손을 대면 말 그대로 화룡점정이 없는 셈이다.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: そんな大事な変更を、突然現れたどこの馬の骨ともわからない男に指図されるのは、不愉快だろう。
Translation: They probably didn't appreciate some rando showing up out of nowhere and demanding such a massive overhaul.
KR: 그런 중요한 변경 점을 갑자기 나타난, 어디서 굴러먹던 말뼈다귀인지도 모르는 놈이 말하면 불쾌할 것이다.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: それは、当然だ。
Translation: I didn't blame them, of course.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: でも俺は諦めなかった。
Translation: But I refused to back down.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: 何度も、何度も演劇部へと足を運んだ。
Translation: I went to them over and over and over again.
KR: 몇 번이고, 몇 번이고 연극부를 찾아갔다.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: なんて嫉妬深いヤツなんだろうと、自分でも思う。
Translation: I know—I'm a jealous little bastard.
KR: 이 얼마나 질투심 많은 놈인지... 라고 스스로도 생각한다.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: 沈んでいく夕陽を見ながら、遠くの歓声を聞く。
Translation: As I look out at the sunset, I can hear the cheers of the crowd.
KR: 저무는 석양을 바라보고 있자니 멀리서 함성소리가 들렸다.

Name: d6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ごめんな」
Translation: "I'm sorry."

Name: d6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺のわがままで、迷惑かけて――」
Translation: "I know I was being selfish."

Name: d6111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「言いっこナシよ」
Translation: "No apologies, okay?"

Name: d6111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんなわがままも含めて、貴方が好きなの」
Translation: "I love all of you, even your so-called 'selfish' side."

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: 美雪は一片の曇りもなく、微笑んでくれる。
Translation: Miyuki smiles at me without a hint of resentment.
KR: 미유키는 흐림 한 점 없는 미소 지었다.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: 最終的に演劇の行く先を決めたのは、美雪だった。
Translation: She was the one who ultimately settled the fate of the play.
KR: 최종적으로 연극의 결말을 정한 것은 미유키였다.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: このままキスシーンを演劇に組み入れるなら、私は今回の公演を降りる――そう、直談判したらしい。
Translation: I'm told she went to them and threatened to resign from her role if they left the kiss scene intact.
KR: 이대로 키스신을 연극에 넣는다면 자신은 이번 공연에서 내려갈 것이다...라고 담판 지었을 것 같다.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: そして今、美雪は俺の隣にいる。
Translation: And now here she is, standing by my side.
KR: 그리고 지금, 미유키는 내 옆에 있다.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: 美雪がずっと、真剣に取り組み続けた演劇。
Translation: She put so much hard work into her rehearsals...

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: せっかく掴んだ、大舞台へのチャンス。
Translation: It was her chance to make it into the big leagues.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: 彼女はそれを、みすみす捨てることになったのだ。
Translation: And now she's thrown it all away.
KR: 그걸 빤히 바라볼 수밖에 없게 된 것이다.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: 申し訳なさに、以前の俺は耐えられなかったと思う。
Translation: The old me would've felt guilty as hell.
KR: 예전의 나라면 미안함에 견디지 못했을 것 같다.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: でも、今は違うのだ。
Translation: But I'm different now.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: そこまでしてくれた美雪が、愛おしくてたまらない。
Translation: I see the sacrifice she's made and I love her all the more for it.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: 彼女を幸せにしよう。
Translation: And now I'm going to make her happy for the rest of her life.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: そう、心に誓う。
Translation: That's the promise I've made to myself.

Name: d6111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ、心一」
Translation: "Hey, Shinichi?"

Name: d6111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ」
Translation: "Yeah?"

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: 俺たちはそっと手を繋ぎながら、西の空を見る。
Translation: Hand in hand, we look up at the westerly sky.
KR: 우리는 살며시 손을 잡고 서쪽 하늘을 바라보았다.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: 建物の向こうへと沈んでいく夕陽。
Translation: The sun sinks beyond the skyline.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: 言葉もないまま、ただ、ふたりで、ずっと。
Translation: We stand there, wordlessly.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: 重なり合った手の血潮が、静かに時を刻んでいく。
Translation: Our hearts beat as one, pulsing with the flow of time.
KR: 겹친 두 손의 고동이 시간을 새겨나간다.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: 太陽は赤々と燃えながら、ゆっくりと沈み――
Translation: The sun burns crimson as it makes its slow descent.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: やがて、夜の闇が訪れる。
Translation: Then, finally, night falls.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: 少しずつ、少しずつ、街にも灯りがともっていく
Translation: One by one, the city lights flicker to life.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: 呼応するように、頭上に星々が瞬き始める。
Translation: As if in response, the stars come out overhead.
KR: 호응하듯 머리 위로 별들이 깜빡이기 시작한다.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: 今まで一度も見たことがない、夜の屋上。
Translation: This is my first time being on the roof at night.
KR: 지금까지 한 번도 본 적 없는 밤의 옥상.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: ふたりとも、息を呑んで、その光景に見入っていた。
Translation: Together, we lose ourselves in the breathtaking view.
KR: 두 사람 모두 숨을 죽이고 그 광경을 지켜보고 있었다.

Name: d6111.nss
Japanese: ――どれだけ時間が過ぎただろう？
Translation: ...How much time has passed now?

Name: d6113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だめだって。そろそろ時間なんだから、な？」
Translation: "Sorry, buddy. The show's starting soon. I gotta go."

Name: d6113.nss
Japanese: 俺は無理矢理立ち上がり、玄関の扉を開ける。
Translation: I force my way past him and open the door.

Name: d6113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「コラコラ、出るなって」
Translation: "Hey! Get your butt back in there!"

Name: d6113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「アオイが具合悪いんだから。
　留守番頼んだぞ」
Translation:
"Aoi's not feeling good.
I need you to stay here and look after her, okay?"

Name: d6113.nss
Japanese: エルを玄関の中へと入れると、しっかり扉を閉めた。
Translation: I scoop him up, toss him back inside the house, and firmly shut the door.
KR: 에루를 집 안에 넣어놓고 단단히 문을 잠갔다.

Name: d6151.nss
Japanese: チケットをもぎってもらい、暗幕の張られた体育館へ。
Translation: I hand in my ticket and head into the dark gymnasium.

Name: d6151.nss
Japanese: 余裕をもってやってきたので、まだ開演まで時間がある。
Translation: Thankfully, I made it here with plenty of time to spare.
KR: 여유 있게 왔기 때문에, 아직 공연까지 시간이 있다.

Name: d6151.nss
Japanese: 観客席の入りも、まだ半分程度だった。
Translation: The auditorium seats are only about half full.

Name: d6151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ、来たわね」
Translation: "Oh, you're here!"

Name: d6151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪……準備はいいのか？」
Translation: "Hey, Miyuki... You guys all set up back there?"

Name: d6151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「主役を降りたって言ったでしょ。
　休んだって大丈夫なくらいよ」
Translation:
"I already told you I quit the play, remember?
I don't really even need to be here in the first place."

Name: d6151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それより、アオイは？」
Translation: "Anyway, where's Aoi?"

Name: d6151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちゃんと、誘ったのよね？」
Translation: "You DID invite her, right?"

Name: d6153.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...What the?"

Name: d6153.nss
Japanese: 家にいるはずのアオイは、受話器を取らない。
Translation: Aoi should be home right now, and yet she's not answering.
KR: 집에 있을 터인 아오이가 전화를 받지 않는다.

Name: d6153.nss
Japanese: 電話が、繋がる気配がない。
Translation: The phone just keeps ringing and ringing and ringing.

Name: d6161.nss
Japanese: 暗くなりはじめた道を、無言で歩く。
Translation: We walk silently down the road as night falls over us.

Name: d6161.nss
Japanese: 演劇を抜け出してまで俺を外に連れ出した美雪。
Translation: Miyuki abandoned the performance just to drag me out here.
KR: 연극에 빠지면서까지 날 밖으로 데리고 나온 미유키.

Name: d6161.nss
Japanese: その表情は真剣で、軽々しく冗談を口に出来るような雰囲気ではなかった。
Translation: She's so deadly serious, I don't even feel right making a casual joke.
KR: 그 표정이 너무 진지해서 가볍게 농담이나 할 분위기가 아니었다.

Name: d6161.nss
Japanese: 一体彼女は、俺をどこに連れて行くのか？
Translation: Where the heck is she taking me, exactly?

Name: d6161.nss
Japanese: 道筋は、俺の普段の通学路をわずかにずれて――
Translation: We take a slight detour from my usual route—

Name: d6161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ここよ」
Translation: "We're here."

Name: d6161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「雄太郎のコンビニ……？」
Translation: "Yuutarou's family corner store...?"

Name: d6161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「他にも、働いてるコがいるでしょ」
Translation: "He's not the only one who works here, you know."

Name: d6161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……あ、そうか。ハルちゃんだっけ？」
Translation: "...Oh, right. There's Haru-chan, or whatever her name is."

Name: d6161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「確か、お前の後輩だよな」
Translation: "She's in your club, right?"

Name: d6172.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「まあ、それはわかったけど、それで？」
Translation: "Yeah, and?"

Name: d6172.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ハルちゃんが龍二郎だから、何なんだよ？」
Translation: "So what if Haru-chan is Ryuujirou?"

Name: d6172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「裏方で手伝いに来るはずだったハルちゃんが来なくて、もしかしたらとは思ったんだけど」
Translation: "I had my suspicions when Haru-chan didn't show up to help out backstage like we agreed."
KR: "뒤에서 도와주기로 한 하루짱이 안 와서 혹시나 싶었는데."

Name: d6172.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイとハルちゃんは、ふたりでコンビニを出た」
Translation: "Sure enough, it turns out Aoi and Haru-chan left the store together."

Name: d6172.nss
Translation: ...What?

Name: d6172.nss
Japanese: なんだ、それ。
Translation: What is she talking about?

Name: d6172.nss
Japanese: 俺にはよく、意味がわからない……
Translation: I don't understand.

Name: d6172.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「間違いだろ？」
Translation: "There must be some mistake."

Name: d6172.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「俺が、レジから見送った」
Translation: "I was working the register, dude. I saw them."

Name: d6172.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「フラフラの足取りで、コンビニから出て行った」
Translation: "They stumbled right on out the door together."

Name: d6172.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でもアオイは家に――！」
Translation: "But Aoi's at my house!"

Name: d6172.nss
Japanese: いなかった。
Translation: ...No she isn't.

Name: d6172.nss
Japanese: 俺がかけた電話に、出なかった。
Translation: I tried to call her, and she didn't answer.

Name: d6182.nss
Japanese: 女子校生の制服で、スカートの下からペニスを剥き出しにさせる龍二郎と――
Translation: There, I find Ryuujirou wearing a girl's uniform, his cock peeking out from under his skirt...
KR: 여자 교복을 입은 채, 치마 밑으로 x지를 드러내고 있는 류지로와...

Name: d6182.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop..."

Name: d6182.nss
Japanese: フェラチオする、アオイがいて。
Translation: And there's Aoi, sucking him off.

Name: d6182.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "No way..."

Name: d6182.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Translation: "Aaah..."

Name: d6182.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「きゃあああああああ――――ッ！！」
Translation: "AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHH!!!"

Name: d6182.nss
Japanese: 俺の意識は、そこで途切れていた。
Translation: The next thing I know, everything fades to black.

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: あれ……？
Translation: What the...?

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: ここはどこだ？
Translation: Where am I?

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: この感覚は？
Translation: What is this pain I'm feeling?

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 辛い――？　悲しい――？
Translation: Heartbreak? Anguish?

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: いや、違う。
Translation: No...

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 痛い？　痛い。痛いんだ。
Translation: Just regular pain. Physical pain.

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 痛いのは、痛いのは――
Translation: Physical pain from where?

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "My hand...?"

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 俺の拳には、包帯が巻かれていた。
Translation: My hand is wrapped up in a bandage.

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「どうした心一」
Translation: "How you doin', Shinichi?"

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 椅子には、雄太郎が座っていた。
Translation: I find Yuutarou sitting in a chair nearby.

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あれ……俺、なんでここに？」
Translation: "What the...? What am I doing here?"

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Translation: "Hmm?"

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ってか、この手は？」
Translation: "And what happened to my hand?"

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、マンションにいたんじゃ――」
Translation: "Last I remember, I was in that fancy condo..."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「記憶、飛んでるのか？」
Translation: "Oh. You must've blacked out."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What? I blacked out?"

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ま、あれだけやったら、な」
Translation: "Not that I blame you, after what went down."

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 俺はジッと、自分の手を見る。
Translation: I stare down at my hand.

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 包帯が巻かれた拳。
Translation: My knuckles are all bandaged up.

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……俺、何をしたんだ？」
Translation: "...What did I do?"

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Oh god, did I—?!"

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「お前は、気にしなくていい」
Translation: "Don't worry about it."

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎は、小さく首を振る。
Translation: Yuutarou shakes his head slightly.

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「龍二郎、しばらく痣は残るからモデルは休業だけど。
　あのくらいのお灸は必要だよ」
Translation:
"Ryuujirou's taking a break from modeling until his injuries heal.
It's not much of a punishment, but it's something."
KR: "류지로도 잠시 멍이 남으니까 모델 일은 쉬겠지만... 저 정도 벌은 필요해."

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: ……つまり、俺は。
Translation: Then that means I...

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 拳に怪我を負うほどの勢いで、龍二郎を殴った――
Translation: I punched him... and hard enough to damage my hand, too...

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: たぶん、そういうことなのだろう。
Translation: That must be what happened.

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 美雪の言うとおりだ。
Translation: Miyuki was exactly right about me.

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 俺は自分で思っているよりもずっと、嫉妬深い。
Translation: I'm way more of a jealous monster than I ever thought possible.
KR: 난 내가 생각하는 것보다 훨씬 질투가 심하다.

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……アオイは？」
Translation: "...What about Aoi?"

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、アオイに何をした？」
Translation: "What did I do to her?"

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「なにも」
Translation: "Nothing."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なにも？」
Translation: "Nothing?"

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「龍二郎に襲いかかったお前を俺が羽交い締めにしてる間、ずっと部屋の隅っこにいた」
Translation: "After you attacked Ryuujirou, I grabbed you and held you back. Meanwhile, she was just sitting in the corner of the room."
KR: "류지로에게 덤벼든 널 내가 붙잡고 있는 동안, 계속 방 한구석에 있었어."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「電話を空に掲げて、最後まで独り言を言ってた」
Translation: "She was holding her phone up in the air, muttering to herself the whole time."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「神様がどうとか。セーブデータがどうとか」
Translation: "Something about God, or save files, I dunno."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「お祈りみたいに、繰り返し、繰り返し」
Translation: "She just kept repeating it over and over, like a prayer."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……そうか」

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: その時のアオイの様子が、目に浮かぶようだ。
Translation: I can picture her doing it.
KR: 그때 아오이의 모습이 어땠을지 눈에 선하다.

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 多分、彼女の電波は最後まで届かなかったんだろう。
Translation: I somehow doubt her call ever went through, though.

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それで、今はどこに？」
Translation: "Where is she now?"

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「それが……」
Translation: "Well..."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「わからないんだ」
Translation: "We don't know."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「わからない？」
Translation: "You don't know?"

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「気付いたら、部屋から消えてた」
Translation: "The next thing we knew, she was just... gone."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「まるで、突然消えたみたいに」
Translation: "Almost like she vanished into thin air."

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: ひとりの人間が、突然消えるなんてあり得ない。
Translation: Human beings don't just vanish into thin air.

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: そんなことは、わかっているけど。
Translation: I know that.

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: アオイならもしかしたら――
Translation: But part of me wonders if...

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: そう思う自分も、確かにいる。
Translation: ...maybe Aoi is a special exception.

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: それに――
Translation: Besides...

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「捜してみるか？」
Translation: "Wanna go look for her?"

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、いい」
Translation: "No thanks."

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 今さら、会いたいとは思えなかった。
Translation: I don't want to see her again. Not after that.

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「お前も正気に戻ったみたいだし――
　俺、そろそろ行くな」
Translation: "Alright. Seems like you've come back to your senses, so I'm gonna get going."
KR: "너도 제정신으로 돌아온 것 같고... 나 슬슬 갈게."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「迷惑かけたな」
Translation: "Sorry for all the trouble."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「こっちこそ、こんなことになって……」
Translation: "If anyone should apologize, it's me, dude..."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いい」
Translation: "No, it's not your fault."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そういう話は、もう、いいよ」
Translation: "Seriously, don't blame yourself for this."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「……わかった」
Translation: "...Alright."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「じゃあ」
Translation: "See ya."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ」
Translation: "Later."

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎に手を振って、別れる。
Translation: Yuutarou waves at me and walks off.

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 俺はひとり、部屋に残された。
Translation: I'm left all alone in the room.

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: ベッドに寝転び、窓から外を見やる。
Translation: I collapse back onto the bed and stare out the window.

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: ハリボテのような星空に浮かぶ月。
Translation: The moon hangs over the dark canvas of the night sky.
KR: 둥근 달이 그림 같이 밤하늘에 떠있다.

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 結局俺は、アオイと同じ空を見ることはできなかった。
Translation: In the end, Aoi and I were living in two different worlds.
KR: 결국 나는 아오이와 같은 하늘을 볼 수 없었다.

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 俺は彼女の神様に、なれなかった。
Translation: I wanted to be her new God, but I couldn't.
KR: 난 아오이의 신님이 될 수 없었다.

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「――そうだ」
Translation: "...Oh yeah."

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: エルにごはんは、やっただろうか？
Translation: Did anyone remember to feed Eru?

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 俺はベッドから起き上がり、部屋を出る。
Translation: I get out of bed and leave the room.

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Hmm?"

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: リビングの灯りが、ついたままだった。
Translation: The lights are on in the living room.

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 俺は吸い込まれるように、中に入る。
Translation: I find myself drawn inside.

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪……いたのか」
Translation: "Miyuki? I didn't know you were here."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「落ち着いたって？」
Translation: "I'm told you're feeling calmer now?"

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「色々迷惑かけて、ごめん」
Translation: "Yeah. Sorry for all the trouble back there."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「幼馴染みなんだから、たまには世話を焼かせてよ」
Translation: "Please. What are old friends for? I'm happy to look after you every now and then."

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 美雪の優しい言葉に、ほんの少し、救われる。
Translation: Her kind words are the silver lining on my raincloud right now.
KR: 미유키의 상냥한 그 말에 아주 약간 편안해졌다.

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「エルは？」
Translation: "Where's Eru?"

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「ミルクをあげようとしたんだけど。
　手を引っ掻かれて、家の外に逃げちゃった」
Translation: "I tried to give him some milk, but he scratched me and ran outside."
KR: "우유 주려고 했는데, 손을 할퀴고 집 밖으로 도망쳤어."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「引っかかれた？　大丈夫か？」
Translation: "He scratched you?! Are you okay?"

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「痕は残らないと思うけど」
Translation: "It's fine. Probably won't leave a mark."

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: 美雪が差し出した手のひらには、確かに猫の爪痕がはっきりと見えた。
Translation: She shows me her palm. Sure enough, I can see deep claw marks.
KR: 미유키가 내민 손바닥에는 고양이 손톱자국이 뚜렷했다.

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「珍しいな……
　エル、普段はそんなことしないのに」
Translation:
"That's weird...
He's normally such a good cat."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「嫌われちゃったかもね」
Translation: "Maybe he doesn't like me anymore."

Name: d7111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……好きだったのにな」
Translation: "...Shame. I really loved that little furball."

Name: d7111.nss
Japanese: ぽつりと呟く美雪の一言が、胸に染みる。
Translation: Her whispered words resonate within my chest.

Name: d7112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "I can't take this."

Name: d7112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前の顔も、見たくない」
Translation: "Get the fuck out of my house."

Name: d7112.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは……」

Name: d7112.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「せんたくし……まちがえたの……」
Translation: "...picked... the wrong choice..."

Name: d7112.nss
Japanese: ひとり、俯いてうわごとのように呟き続けるアオイ。
Translation: Aoi hangs her head and mumbles deliriously to herself.
KR: 혼자 고개를 숙이고 계속 중얼거리는 아오이.

Name: d7112.nss
Japanese: もう、それを修正させるだけの気力もなかった。
Translation: I no longer have the energy to bother correcting her.

Name: d7112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「もう、これでいいだろう？」
Translation: "Are we done here?"

Name: d7112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「今日は、やめにしよう」
Translation: "Let's call it a night."

Name: d7112.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎の一言が、重く澱んだ部屋に響く。
Translation: His voice echoes through the heavy air in the room.
KR: 유우타로의 한마디가 무거운 분위기 속에 울려 퍼졌다 .

Name: d7112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「みんな頭を冷やして。また後日――」
Translation: "Let's all just take a day to cool off, and then later—"

Name: d7112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「でも、アオイ先輩――」
Translation: "But Aoi-senpai—"

Name: d7112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「龍二郎！」
Translation: "Ryuujirou!"

Name: d7112.nss
Japanese: 促され、龍二郎は黙り込む。
Translation: Ryuujirou falls silent.

Name: d7112.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「曽根さんも……帰りましょう」
Translation: "Come on, Sone-san... Let's all go home."

Name: d7112.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でも、アオイはどうするの？」
Translation: "But what about Aoi?"

Name: d7112.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「しんぱいいらないの」
Translation: "Don't worry."

Name: d7112.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「みんな、すぐに、わすれるの」
Translation: "You'll all forget about me."

Name: d7112.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そういうふうに、できてるの」
Translation: "That's how the story goes."

Name: d7112.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイ……」

Name: d7112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「本人がいいって言うなら、いいだろ」
Translation: "You heard her. She doesn't need your concern."

Name: d7112.nss
Japanese: 余計な同情は要らない。
Translation: I'm not going to waste my time feeling sorry for her.

Name: d7112.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ、バイバイ――」
Translation: "Shinichi... Bye-bye."

Name: d7112.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Oh... Wait!"

Name: d7112.nss
Japanese: まだ、忘れ物があった。
Translation: Almost forgot something.

Name: d7112.nss
Japanese: 俺は慌てて、廊下を駆け戻り階段を上がる。
Translation: I dash upstairs.

Name: d7122.nss
Japanese: 俺は、彼女が信じられるわけがない。
Translation: I couldn't possibly believe her story.

Name: d7122.nss
Japanese: あくまで、自分の罪を認めず。
Translation: She refuses to accept responsibility for what she's done.

Name: d7122.nss
Japanese: 神様なんて架空の存在に、自分の罪をなすりつける。
Translation: Instead, she puts all the blame on some imaginary god.
KR: 신님 같은 허구의 존재에게 죄를 덮어씌운다.

Name: d7122.nss
Japanese: そんなアオイと、これ以上話すのは無駄だった。
Translation: Talking to her is just a waste of time at this point.
KR: 그런 아오이와 더 이상 얘기하는 건 시간 낭비였다.

Name: d7122.nss
Japanese: 彼女との生活の痕跡を、全て、消してしまいたかった。
Translation: Now I just want to erase every last trace of our life together.

Name: d7122.nss
Japanese: だから――
Translation: Thus...

Name: d7122.nss
Japanese: 俺は彼女に忘れ物を届けるため、部屋へと戻る。
Translation: ...I head back to my bedroom to get her belongings.
KR: 나는 아오이가 까먹은 물건을 전해주러 방으로 돌아갔다.

Name: d7122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「決着、ついたみたいね」
Translation: "Seems like you've made up your mind."

Name: d7122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「――まだ、いたのか」
Translation: "...What are you still doing here?"

Name: d7122.nss
Japanese: 美雪は、家を出てはいないようだった。
Translation: I thought she left the house already...

Name: d7122.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ごめんなさい。どうしても心配で――」
Translation: "Sorry... I just couldn't help but worry."

Name: d7122.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もう大丈夫だ」
Translation: "Well, you don't have to. Not anymore."

Name: d7122.nss
Japanese: 俺は美雪の脇をすり抜け、自分の部屋へと向かう。
Translation: I slip past her to my room.
KR: 나는 미유키를 지나쳐 내 방으로 향했다.

Name: d7123.nss
Japanese: 猫アレルギーの美雪がいるため、一時的に２階へと退避させていたエル。
Translation: I'd temporarily confined Eru to the second floor so Miyuki wouldn't have an allergy attack.
KR: 고양이 알레르기가 있는 미유키를 위해, 잠시 2층에 대피시켜 놓았던 에루.

Name: d7123.nss
Japanese: 俺はそっと、抱きかかえる。
Translation: I gently pick him up.

Name: d7123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今日で、お別れだ」
Translation: "This is where we say goodbye."

Name: d7123.nss
Japanese: エルは珍しく、一言も、鳴き声をあげなかった。
Translation: Surprisingly, Eru doesn't make a sound.
KR: 평소와 다르게 에루는 전혀 울지 않았다.

Name: d7123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ」
Translation: "Aoi."

Name: d7123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「こいつの面倒、見られるな？」
Translation: "You'll look after him, won't you?"

Name: d7123.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うん」
Translation: "Yeah."

Name: d7123.nss
Japanese: アオイは、覚悟していたように、頷く。
Translation: Aoi nods like she was prepared for this.

Name: d7123.nss
Japanese: 俺はそっと、抱きかかえていたエルを離した。
Translation: I set Eru down.

Name: d7123.nss
Japanese: 電波ネコは一度、背後を振り返る。
Translation: The "transceiver cat" looks back at me, just once.

Name: d7123.nss
Japanese: 物言わぬ瞳に、俺は思わず視線を逸らした。
Translation: I avert my eyes.
KR: 그 눈동자를 보고 나는 무심코 시선을 돌렸다.

Name: d7131.nss
Japanese: 風もなく、ただ夜気が肌を刺すような夜だった。
Translation: The night air is still, yet biting cold.
KR: 바람 없이 그저 공기가 차가운 밤이었다.

Name: d7131.nss
Japanese: 夜の空気は澄み渡り、街灯の明かりがアオイの影を真っ直ぐに大地に映していた。
Translation: The sky is clear; the streetlamps send Aoi's shadow stretching across the ground.
KR: 밤 공기는 맑고, 가로등 불빛이 아오이의 그림자를 길게 드리웠다.

Name: d7131.nss
Japanese: 遠く空の向こうに吸い込まれたように、俺たちの他、なにひとつ音はしない。
Translation: The whole world is silent save for us—as though all noise has been sucked away into another dimension.
KR: 모든 소리가 저 하늘로 빨려들어 간 것처럼 우리 외에 아무 소리도 들리지 않았다.

Name: d7131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それじゃあな」
Translation: "Well, see ya."

Name: d7131.nss
Japanese: すぐに玄関を閉じて、カギをかけるつもりだった。
Translation: This is the part where I shut the door and lock the deadbolt.

Name: d7131.nss
Japanese: ドアノブを引こうとした、その瞬間。
Translation: But right as I go to pull the door shut—

Name: d7131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい」
Translation: "Got it."

Name: d7131.nss
Japanese: アオイの手が、ぴんと、空をさした。
Translation: Aoi raises her hand in the air.

Name: d7131.nss
Japanese: その瞳は、相変わらず、芒洋として。
Translation: Her gaze is as blank as always.

Name: d7131.nss
Japanese: 目の前の俺を、見ているようには思えなかったけど。
Translation: I get the sense she isn't really looking at me.
KR: 눈앞에 있는 나를 바라보고 있는 것 같지도 않았다.

Name: d7131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ」
Translation: "Shinichi."

Name: d7131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイのセーブデータは、きえるの」
Translation: "Aoi's save files will disappear."

Name: d7131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ぜんぶ、なくなっちゃうの」
Translation: "It'll all be lost."

Name: d7131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも」

Name: d7131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おともだちになれて、うれしかったの」
Translation: "Aoi really enjoyed being your friend."

Name: d7131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このセカイにうまれてきて、よかったの」
Translation: "And Aoi's glad to have been born into this world."

Name: d7131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「みんなが、アオイのこと、わすれても」
Translation: "Even if everyone here forgets me..."

Name: d7131.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「キミは、おぼえててくれるの？」
Translation: "YOU'LL remember, right?"

Name: d7131.nss
Japanese: アオイの言葉は、まるで最後にかけられた呪詛だ。
Translation: Her words feel like some sort of curse.
KR: 아오이의 말은 마치 최후에 걸린 저주 같았다.

Name: d7131.nss
Japanese: 俺は、ゲームの登場人物じゃない。
Translation: I'm not a character in a video game.

Name: d7131.nss
Japanese: 記憶をリセットしてやり直しなんて、できるわけがない。
Translation: I can't just reset my memories and start again.
KR: 기억을 리셋해서 다시 시작할 수 있을 리가 없다.

Name: d7131.nss
Japanese: 溢れ出しそうな俺の感情が、はっきりと形を持つ前に。
Translation: But before my swelling emotions can take shape...
KR: 넘쳐 흐를듯한 감정이 형태를 갖추기 전에...

Name: d7131.nss
Japanese: 俺は、扉を閉めた。
Translation: ...I shut the door.

Name: d7132.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Not again..."

Name: d7132.nss
Japanese: 俺はその紙に、見覚えがあった。
Translation: I recognize the paper.
KR: 나는 이 종이를 본 기억이 있다.

Name: d7132.nss
Japanese: ――破門状。
Translation: —LETTER OF DISOWNMENT.

Name: d7132.nss
Japanese: 一度、破門されているような気もするが……
Translation: I thought I was already "disowned" earlier, though...

Name: d7132.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎の美雪への気持ちは、俺もしっかり理解している。
Translation: Still, I know full well how he feels about Miyuki.
KR: 유우타로의 미유키를 향한 마음은 나도 확실히 이해하고 있다.

Name: d7132.nss
Japanese: 男として、きちんと説明しておく必要があるだろう。
Translation: I ought to man up and explain myself.

Name: d7141.nss
Japanese: ……終わった。
Translation: ...It's over.

Name: d7141.nss
Japanese: もう、愛する人の裏切りに苦しめられることはない。
Translation: I don't have to agonize over my girlfriend's betrayal anymore.
KR: 이제 사랑하는 사람에게 배신당해 괴로워할 필요가 없어졌다.

Name: d7141.nss
Japanese: 心ゆくまで、復讐も果たした。
Translation: I got my revenge. I'm satisfied.

Name: d7141.nss
Japanese: これで、やっと、全てが終わった。
Translation: At last, it's all over.

Name: d7141.nss
Japanese: 終わったのだ。
Translation: Everything.

Name: d7141.nss
Japanese: 俺は、ふわふわと落ち着かない足取りで、玄関を上がる。
Translation: I stumble back into the house on shaky legs.

Name: d7141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: d7141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪？　いたのか……」
Translation: "Miyuki? I didn't realize you were still here..."

Name: d7141.nss
Japanese: 人気がないように思えたリビング。
Translation: I thought the living room was empty...

Name: d7141.nss
Japanese: そこにはまだ、美雪がいてくれた。
Translation: ...and yet, there she is, waiting for me.

Name: d7142.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「少しは、楽になった？」
Translation: "Feeling a little better?"

Name: d7142.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「――苦しい」
Translation: "...It hurts so much..."

Name: d7142.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「全然、楽になんか、なるわけないだろ」
Translation: "There's no way I could feel remotely good about any of this...!"

Name: d7142.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうかも、しれないわね」
Translation: "Yeah... I guess not."

Name: d7142.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、こうするしかなかった」
Translation: "It was the only choice I had..."

Name: d7142.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「他の結末なんて、選べなかった」
Translation: "Things were never going to turn out any differently..."

Name: d7142.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうだよな、美雪……？」
Translation: "Right, Miyuki? Please tell me I'm right..."

Name: d7142.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「誰も、貴方を責められないわ」
Translation: "No one blames you for what happened."

Name: d7142.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だって――他の道はあり得ない」
Translation: "This was always going to happen one way or another."

Name: d7142.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「全ては、運命なんですもの」
