Translation: "It's your fate."

Name: d7142.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「運命？」
Translation: "What?"

Name: d7142.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi

Name: d7142.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そう。運命」
Translation: "You heard me. Fate."

Name: d7142.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi

Name: d7142.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そして愛は……」
Translation: "And love..."

Name: d7142.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi

Name: d7142.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「永遠」
Translation: "...is eternal."

Name: d7142.nss
Japanese: 蕩けるような囁きに、全ては押し流されてしまう。
Translation: Her whisper drowns out all the misery.
KR: 녹을 듯한 속삭임에 전부 떠내려가고 만다.

Name: d7142.nss
Japanese: 考えることを放棄した俺の脳に、声が優しく沁みていく。
Translation: Her voice gently seeps into my brain, and my mind goes blank.
KR: 생각하는 것을 포기한 나의 뇌에, 목소리가 부드럽게 스며든다.

Name: d7142.nss
Japanese: 垂れ下がる、美雪の髪。
Translation: Her hair brushes against me.

Name: d7142.nss
Japanese: 柔らかく、支えてくれる。
Translation: She wraps me up in her soft arms.

Name: d7142.nss
Japanese: 彼女の匂い。
Translation: I can smell her scent.

Name: d7142.nss
Japanese: 全てを忘れて、今はずっと、包まれていたい。
Translation: Right now, I just want to stay here in this embrace and forget everything...
KR: 지금은 모든 것을 잊고 계속 쌓여있고 싶다.

Name: d7142.nss
Japanese: ずっと……ずっと……
Translation: Forever and ever and ever...

Name: e0113.nss
Japanese: 試しに、通話履歴を見ようとすると――
Translation: Before I can check the call history—

Name: e0113.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私のよ」
Translation: "That's mine."

Name: e0113.nss
Japanese: 扉を開いて現れたのは、美雪だった。
Translation: The door opens. It's Miyuki.

Name: e0113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前、こんな機種だっけ？」
Translation: "Really? I didn't know you had a smartphone."

Name: e0113.nss
Japanese: たしかスマフォじゃなくて、普通の携帯だった気が……
Translation: I thought she had one of those old clamshell phones...
KR: 분명 스마트폰이 아닌 평범한 휴대폰이었던 것 같은데...

Name: e0113.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そっちは、貴方の家で拾ったの」
Translation: "I found it over at your house."

Name: e0113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺の家で……？」
Translation: "What? You did?"

Name: e0113.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「忘れちゃったかな。もう随分前の話だもんね」
Translation: "Maybe you forgot. It was a long time ago, after all."

Name: e0113.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でもそれ、すごく古いでしょ？」
Translation: "But it's just so outdated now, you know?"

Name: e0113.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でもそれ、全然趣味に合わないでしょ？」
Translation: "But it's just so tacky-looking, you know?"

Name: e0113.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でもそれ、嫌な思い出が染みついちゃってるでしょ？」
Translation: "But there are just so many bad memories associated with it now, you know?"

Name: e0113.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから、機種変更したの」
Translation: "So I got myself a new one."

Name: e0113.nss
Japanese: 美雪はポケットから、新たなスマフォを取り出す。
Translation: She takes a shiny new smartphone out of her pocket.

Name: e0113.nss
Japanese: 最新の機種らしく、落ちていた物よりも一回り画面が大きい。
Translation: It's the latest model, with a much bigger screen.
KR: 최신 기종답게 떨어졌던 것보다 화면이 한층 더 컸다.

Name: e0113.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ＳＩＭカードさえ抜き取っちゃえば、古いのは不要」
Translation: "As long as I've got the SIM card, I don't need that old one."
KR: "SIM 카드만 빼내면 낡은 건 필요 없어."

Name: e0113.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それ、投げ捨ててもらえる？」
Translation: "Would you go ahead and toss it for me?"

Name: e0113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「投げ捨てる？」
Translation: "What, throw it off the roof?"

Name: e0113.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そう。ここから街に」
Translation: "Yeah. Just throw it right off the roof."

Name: e0113.nss
Japanese: "投げ捨てる","投げ捨てない"
Translation: "Throw it","Don't throw it"

Name: e0114a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「面白そうだな、それ」
Translation: "That sounds like fun..."

Name: e0114a.nss
Japanese: 学校の屋上から、スマフォを投げ捨てる。
Translation: Throwing a smartphone off the school roof?

Name: e0114a.nss
Japanese: 普段は優等生で通っている美雪が、そんな突飛なことを言い出すのが、なんだかとてもおかしかった。
Translation: Normally Miyuki's a total model student, so it's kind of hilarious that she'd even suggest it...
KR: 평소에 우등생으로 통하는 미유키가 그런 엉뚱한 말을 꺼낸 게 왠지 너무 우스웠다.

Name: e0114a.nss
Japanese: 誰も見ていない学校の屋上からならば、それができる。
Translation: And no one's watching right now, so we could get away with it...
KR: 아무도 보지 않는 학교 옥상이라면 충분히 할 수 있다.

Name: e0114a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「空の向こうまで、飛ばしちゃって」
Translation: "Just throw it into another dimension."

Name: e0114a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おう」
Translation: "Okay!"

Name: e0114a.nss
Japanese: スマフォを手に、一度深呼吸。
Translation: I pick up the phone and take a deep breath.

Name: e0114a.nss
Japanese: フェンスに向かって助走をつけると――
Translation: Then I run towards the safety fence—

Name: e0114a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「うおおおおおおおおッッ！！」
Translation: "HYAAAAAAAAAAHHHHH!!!"

Name: e0114a.nss
Japanese: 思い切り、投げ捨てた。
Translation: —and fling it with all my might.

Name: e0114b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おいおい、店とかで回収してるだろ」
Translation: "What are you talking about? Just trade it in at a store somewhere."
KR: "무슨 소리야? 가게 같은 데 반납하면 되잖아?"

Name: e0114b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「一刻も早くなくしたいの」
Translation: "I want to get rid of it ASAP."

Name: e0114b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ぇ――ちょっと」
Translation: "Don't be—Hey, wait!"

Name: e0114b.nss
Japanese: 美雪は俺の手からスマフォを奪い取ると――
Translation: She takes the phone from my hand—

Name: e0114b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それッ！！」
Translation: "HYAH!!!"

Name: e0114b.nss
Japanese: そのままのフェンスの向こうに投げ出してしまった。
Translation: —and flings it over the safety fence.

Name: e0115.nss
Japanese: くるくると回転しながら、スマートフォンが飛んでいく。
Translation: The phone spins through the air.

Name: e0115.nss
Japanese: 重力を無視するように、遠く、遠くまで飛んでから、その影はやがて見えなくなってしまった。
Translation: It flies up in a perfectly straight, gravity-defying line, until eventually it vanishes from sight.
KR: 중력을 무시하듯 멀리멀리 날아가서, 이윽고 더 이상 보이지 않게 됐다.

Name: e0115.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ずいぶん飛んだわね」
Translation: "That was a pretty good throw, huh?"

Name: e0115.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だな」
Translation: "Yeah..."

Name: e0115.nss
Japanese: この世界を突き破って外に飛び出すような勢いだった。
Translation: At that speed, I almost thought it might shatter the fabric of the universe...
KR: 이 세계를 뚫고 밖으로 뛰쳐나갈 듯한 기세였다.

Name: e0115.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「じゃ、帰りましょ？」
Translation: "Shall we head home, then?"

Name: e0115.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でも俺、雄太郎から――」
Translation: "But Yuutarou said—"

Name: e0115.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「断るわ」
Translation: "I'll have to turn him down."

Name: e0115.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「曙くんが呼び出したの、私だから」
Translation: "I'm the one he invited up here, after all."

Name: e0115.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ……そうだったのか」
Translation: "Oh... I see..."

Name: e0115.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「まだ、クラスのみんなには言ってないもんね」
Translation: "And we haven't told the rest of the class we're dating."

Name: e0115.nss
Japanese: 美雪は俯いて、はにかむ。
Translation: Miyuki looks at the floor bashfully.

Name: e0115.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私たちが付き合って、同棲してること」
Translation: "Or that we're living together."

Name: e0115.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう、１週間にもなるのにね」
Translation: "And it's already been a whole week."

Name: e0115.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう、２週間にもなるのにね」
Translation: "And it's already been two whole weeks."

Name: e0115.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう、３週間にもなるのにね」
Translation: "And it's already been three whole weeks."

Name: e0115.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いつかは、言わなきゃな」
Translation: "We'll have to tell them eventually, I guess..."

Name: e0115.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一の恋人にふさわしくなれてるか、心配だわ」
Translation: "I just hope I'm good enough for you..."

Name: e0115.nss
Japanese: "ふさわしい","ふさわしくない"
Translation: "You are","You aren't"

Name: e0116a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ふさわしいだろ、充分」
Translation: "Of course you are! You're plenty good enough."

Name: e0116a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ホントにそう、思ってくれてる？」
Translation: "You really think so?"

Name: e0116a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もちろん」
Translation: "Of course."

Name: e0116a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...Okay."

Name: e0116a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ありがと」
Translation: "Thanks."

Name: e0116b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ふさわしいとは言えないかもな」
Translation: "Not quite."

Name: e0116b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……そうなんだ」
Translation: "...I see."

Name: e0116b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それじゃ、もっと頑張らなきゃね」
Translation: "Guess I'll just have to try a little harder."

Name: e0116b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「無理するなよ？」
Translation: "Don't force yourself, alright?"

Name: e0116b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前、夢中になると視界が狭くなっちゃうからな」
Translation: "You tend to get tunnel vision over these things."

Name: e0116b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「大丈夫よ」
Translation: "Don't worry."

Name: e0116b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私には、色んなものが見えてるから」
Translation: "Trust me, I can see it all just fine."

Name: e1111a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「おはよう」
Translation: "Good morning."

Name: e1111a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「おはよう」
Translation: "Good morning."

Name: e1111a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「おはよう」
Translation: "Good morning."

Name: e1111a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「おはよう」
Translation: "Good morning."

Name: e1111a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「おはよう」
Translation: "Good morning."

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: 朝食を用意して、いつものように挨拶をする美雪。
Translation: Miyuki greets me as she cooks our breakfast.
KR: 아침을 준비해 놓고 평소처럼 인사하는 미유키.

Name: e1111a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今日はどうしようかしら」
Translation: "What should we do today?"

Name: e1111a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今日はどうしようかしら」
Translation: "What should we do today?"

Name: e1111a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今日はどうしようかしら」
Translation: "What should we do today?"

Name: e1111a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今日はどうしようかしら」
Translation: "What should we do today?"

Name: e1111a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今日はどうしようかしら」
Translation: "What should we do today?"

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: 美雪と一緒にいる
Translation: Hang out with Miyuki

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: アオイと一緒にいる
Translation: Hang out with Aoi

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: ひとりでいる
Translation: Hang out by myself

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: 美雪の好感度を上げる
Translation: Raise Miyuki's affection points

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: アオイの好感度を上げる
Translation: Raise Aoi's affection points

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: 好感度は変えない
Translation: Do nothing

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: このセカイに慣れる
Translation: Adapt to the new world

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: このセカイを脱出する
Translation: Escape from the new world

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: 何もしたくない
Translation: Do nothing

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: 美雪とセックスする
Translation: Have sex with Miyuki

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: アオイとセックスする
Translation: Have sex with Aoi

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: 性欲が湧かない
Translation: Not in the mood

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: アオイを忘れる
Translation: Forget Aoi

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: アオイを思い出す
Translation: Remember Aoi

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: 記憶はそのままにする
Translation: Do nothing

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: 美雪との記憶をセーブする
Translation: Save my memories with Miyuki

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: アオイとの記憶をロードする
Translation: Load my memories with Aoi

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: このままつづける
Translation: Continue

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: 部屋の中にいる
Translation: Stay in the apartment

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: 部屋を脱出する
Translation: Escape from the apartment

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: 特になにもしない
Translation: Do nothing

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: 美雪の愛を確かめる
Translation: Love Miyuki

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: アオイの愛を確かめる
Translation: Love Aoi

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: 愛が何かわからない
Translation: What even IS love?

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: 美雪を守る
Translation: Protect Miyuki

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: 美雪と戦う
Translation: Fight Miyuki

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: 様子を見守る
Translation: Wait and see

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: 美雪ルートを続ける
Translation: Continue Miyuki's route

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: アオイルートに行きたい
Translation: Choose Aoi's route

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: どちらも選べない
Translation: Do nothing

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: アオイを返して欲しい
Translation: Please give Aoi back.

Name: e1111a.nss
Japanese: "$choice0","$choice1","$choice2"
Translation: "$choice0","$choice1","$choice2"

Name: e1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「無駄よ、無駄」
Translation: "You're wasting your time."

Name: e1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「選択するのは、私なんだから」
Translation: "I'm the one who gets to choose, you know."

Name: e1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ん……そうね、今日のイベントは――」
Translation: "Hmm... Let's see... What scene shall we play this time...?"

Name: e1112a.nss
Japanese: 美雪が微笑みをひた隠しにしながら呟く。
Translation: Miyuki bites back a smile as she speaks.

Name: e1112a.nss
Japanese: そんな彼女を見据えながら、俺はお碗を手に取る。
Translation: Meanwhile, I pick up my bowl of miso soup.
KR: 그런 미유키를 바라보며 나는 국그릇을 집었다.

Name: e1112a.nss
Japanese: うーん、美雪の味噌汁は美味しいなあ……
Translation: Mmm... Delicious...

Name: e1112b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ん、残念」
Translation: "Too bad."

Name: e1112b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「選択するのは、私なの」
Translation: "I'm the one who gets to pick."

Name: e1112b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でも、そうだな……」
Translation: "Buuut... Hmm..."

Name: e1112b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君もそろそろ、私を好きになってきたみたいだし」
Translation: "To be fair, it seems like YOU'VE started to fall for me..."
KR: "당신도 슬슬 날 좋아하게 된 것 같고..."

Name: e1112b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちょっとくらいなら、考えてあげてもいいかな……？」
Translation: "Maybe I'll consider letting you pick sometime..."

Name: e1112b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから、ほら」
Translation: "Now then, come on."

Name: e1112b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「お味噌汁飲んで、行きましょう？」
Translation: "Drink your miso soup and let's go."

Name: e1112b.nss
Japanese: 美雪の味噌汁が、俺の身体に染み渡る。
Translation: The taste of her broth melts in my mouth.

Name: e1112b.nss
Japanese: あまりに美味しくて、気持ち良くて、そのまま意識が消えてしまいそうだ……
Translation: It's so delicious and soothing, I think I might pass out...
KR: 너무 맛있어서, 기분 좋아서, 그대로 의식이 사라져 버릴 것 같다...

Name: e1112c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんなに、貴方が選びたいの？」
Translation: "Do you really want to choose that badly?"

Name: e1112c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でも、安心して」
Translation: "Well, don't you worry."

Name: e1112c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方も、私のことをすごく理解してくれたみたいだし」
Translation: "You really seem to understand me, after all."

Name: e1112c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「悪いようにはしないから」
Translation: "I'll treat you right."

Name: e1112c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...Hey, Shinichi?"

Name: e1112c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「私、貴方が望むなら……
　なんでもしてあげるつもりなんだよ？」
Translation: "Anything you want, I'll give it to you. Okay?"

Name: e1112c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから――」
Translation: "Now then..."

Name: e1112c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私の愛情ごはん、全部、食べてね」
Translation: "I cooked this meal with all my love, so you'd better clean your plate."

Name: e1112c.nss
Japanese: こんなに美雪の味噌汁が美味しいのは……彼女の愛情が籠もっているから……なのだろうか……
Translation: Is that why her miso soup is so tasty...? Because she made it with her love...?
KR: 미유키의 된장국이 이렇게나 맛있는 건... 미유키의 사랑이 담겨 있기 때문일까...?

Name: e1112d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方の望みは、叶わない」
Translation: "You'll never get what you want."

Name: e1112d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どうして私を好きになってくれないの？」
Translation: "Why won't you just love me?"

Name: e1112d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうすれば、すぐ――楽になれるのに」
Translation: "It would be so much easier for you that way."

Name: e1112d.nss
Japanese: 美雪の問いかけから逃げるように、俺は美雪の手作りの味噌汁を啜った。
Translation: Dodging the question, I take a sip of her homemade miso soup.
KR: 미유키의 질문을 회피하듯 나는 된장국을 홀짝홀짝 마셨다.

Name: e1112d.nss
Japanese: お碗が口についたとき、俺の指先が自分の顎に触れる。
Translation: As the bowl touches my lips, my fingers brush my chin.
KR: 그릇이 입에 닿자, 내 손이 턱에 닿았다.

Name: e1112d.nss
Japanese: ……あれ？
Translation: ...What the?

Name: e1112d.nss
Japanese: 俺のヒゲ、こんなに伸びてたか？
Translation: Since when did my beard get this long?

Name: e1112e.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方は、私に誓ったでしょ？」
Translation: "You promised me, remember?"

Name: e1112e.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから、私の言うことを聞いていれば良いの」
Translation: "Which means you need to do exactly as I tell you."

Name: e1112e.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「その方が、貴方も幸せなの！」
Translation: "You'll be happier that way!"

Name: e1112e.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ね、そうでしょう？」
Translation: "Wouldn't you agree?"

Name: e1112e.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「お願いだから……別の女に脇目なんて、ふらないで」
Translation: "I'm begging you... Please don't look at any other women."

Name: e1112e.nss
Japanese: 美雪の問いかけから逃げるように、俺は美雪の手作りの味噌汁を啜る。
Translation: Dodging the question, I take a sip of her homemade miso soup.
KR: 미유키의 질문을 회피하듯 나는 된장국을 홀짝홀짝 마셨다.

Name: e1112e.nss
Japanese: その途端、俺の視界が暗闇に包まれた。
Translation: Just then, a dark curtain falls over my eyes.
KR: 그 순간, 내 시야가 어둠에 휩싸였다.

Name: e1112e.nss
Japanese: ええと、これは――髪？
Translation: Is this... my hair...?

Name: e1112e.nss
Japanese: 随分、伸びた気がするけれど……
Translation: I don't remember letting it get this long...

Name: e1121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……そうね」
Translation: "...Let's see."

Name: e1121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「まずは、貴方をテストさせて欲しいの」
Translation: "First, I'd like to test you."

Name: e1121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Test me how...?"

Name: e1121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私ね、嘘をつかれるのが嫌いなの。だから――」
Translation: "The thing about me is, I don't like liars. So..."

Name: e1121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方の本当の気持ち、聞きたいなって」
Translation: "I want you to tell me how you truly feel."

Name: e1121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ、心一？　貴方、私が好きよね？」
Translation: "So tell me, Shinichi. You love me, don't you?"

Name: e1121.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「好きだったら、私に永遠に、『好き』って言い続けられるわよね？」
Translation: "Could you profess your love to me for all eternity?"

Name: e1121.nss
Japanese: "ずっと言い続けられる","絶対言い続けられない"
Translation: "Yes","No"
KR: "계속 말할 수 있다","절대 말할 수 없다"

Name: e1122a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、言えるさ」
Translation: "Sure I could."

Name: e1122a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、美雪が、永遠に、好きだ」
Translation: "I'll always love you."

Name: e1122a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「嬉しい。嬉しいから――」
Translation: "Thanks... That means a lot..."

Name: e1122a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一、もう一回、言ってくれる？」
Translation: "Could you say it again?"

Name: e1122b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だめだ、言えない」
Translation: "No, I can't."

Name: e1122b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ、そんなこと言わないで」
Translation: "Come onnn. Don't be like that."

Name: e1122b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「拒否しても良いことなんてないの。考え直して」
Translation: "Nothing good will come of rejecting me, you know. You should reconsider."

Name: e1122b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私に、好きって言い続けられるよね？」
Translation: "Now, can you profess your love to me?"

Name: e1123a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……おかしいわね」
Translation: "...That's funny."

Name: e1123a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「前は、『絶対言い続けられない』って言ったわ」
Translation: "You said you couldn't earlier."

Name: e1123a.nss
Japanese: 俺は必死に記憶を辿る。
Translation: I retrace my memories.

Name: e1123a.nss
Japanese: だが、俺にはどう考えても、美雪への愛の告白を断った記憶がない……
Translation: Weird... I can't remember ever saying no to her...
KR: 하지만 아무리 생각해도 미유키를 향한 사랑의 고백을 거절한 기억이 없다...

Name: e1123b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……どうしてそんなこと言うの？」
Translation: "...Why would you say that?"

Name: e1123b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「前は、『ずっと言い続けられる』って言ってくれたわ」
Translation: "You said you could earlier!"

Name: e1123b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いやいや……」
Translation: "No way..."

Name: e1123b.nss
Japanese: 記憶を辿るまでもない。
Translation: I could never accept her love.

Name: e1123b.nss
Japanese: 俺が美雪の告白を、受け入れたはずがないのだ。
Translation: No question about it.
KR: 내가 미유키의 고백을 받아들일 리가 없다.

Name: e1123c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「――そう、私は質問したわ」
Translation: "...That was the question I posed to you."

Name: e1123c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でも、貴方の答えは矛盾していた」
Translation: "But you gave me a completely contradictory answer."

Name: e1123c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もちろん、覚えてるでしょう？」
Translation: "You remember that, don't you?"

Name: e1123c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「覚えてる……？」

Name: e1123c.nss
Japanese: 一体美雪は、ひとりで何を言っているんだ？
Translation: What on earth is she talking about?
KR: 도대체 미유키는 혼자 무슨 소릴 하는 거지?

Name: e1124.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ああ、貴方じゃないわ」
Translation: "Oh, right. That wasn't you."

Name: e1124.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あの時の貴方とは、データが違うものね」
Translation: "That was a different you from a different file."

Name: e1124.nss
Japanese: データって……なんの話だ？
Translation: What "file"?

Name: e1124.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ね、君」
Translation: "Hey, YOU."

Name: e1124.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私は、全てを知ってるの」
Translation: "I know everything."

Name: e1124.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「別ルートの記憶も」
Translation: "I have the memories from other routes."

Name: e1124.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「前のデータのバックログも」
Translation: "I have the backlogs from your old save files."

Name: e1124.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「これから起こる出来事も」
Translation: "And I know everything that will happen next."

Name: e1124.nss
Japanese: 美雪は俺を見て囁くが――
Translation: Miyuki looks at me as she whispers...

Name: e1124.nss
Japanese: しかし美雪は、俺を見ていない――？
Translation: ...but it's like she's not really seeing me at all.

Name: e1124.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「この世界では、私と結ばれる未来しかないのよ」
Translation: "In this world, there is only one ending—and it's with me."
KR: "이 세계에는 나와 맺어질 미래밖에 없는 거야."

Name: e1124.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「諦めて」
Translation: "Accept it."

Name: e1124.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そしてそれを――喜んで」
Translation: "And embrace it."

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あのね、心一」
Translation: "Listen, Shinichi."

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: 俺の希望を遮って、美雪は囁いた。
Translation: Miyuki interrupts.

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今日は、貴方に伝えたいことがあるの」
Translation: "I have something I want to tell you."

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「一緒に、学校の屋上に行きましょう」
Translation: "Let's go up to the school roof."

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん……ああ、いいけど」
Translation: "Hmm... Okay."

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: 今日が休日である事を除けば、美雪と屋上に行くこと自体は、なんてことのない日常の一コマだ。
Translation: Setting aside the small detail that it's the weekend, going to the roof together is a pretty common activity for us.
KR: 오늘이 휴일이라는 것을 제외하면 미유키와 옥상에 가는 것 자체는 평소와 같은 일상의 한 장면이다.

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: 特に身構える必要も――
Translation: I doubt I really need to be on my guard—

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ、ちょっと待って！」
Translation: "Oh, wait!"

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「その味噌汁、飲まないで。
　悪くなってるかもしれないから」
Translation:
"Don't drink that miso soup.
I think it might have gone bad."
KR: "그 된장국 마시지 마. 나빠질 수도 있으니까."

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: そんな風には見えないけど、美雪がそう言っているなら、そうなんだろう。
Translation: To me it looks perfectly fine, but if she says it's gone bad, then I guess it must have.
KR: 그렇게 보이지는 않지만, 미유키가 그렇다면 그런 거겠지.

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: 味噌汁を飲むのを諦め、焼き魚に箸をつけた。
Translation: I set the bowl back down and reach for the grilled fish instead.

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それじゃ髪、切りましょうか」
Translation: "Now then, let's cut that hair."

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What's wrong with my hair?"

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「頭、ボサボサ」
Translation: "It's all shaggy!"

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: 言われてみて、ようやく気付く。
Translation: Then I realize.

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: よく見てみると、俺の髪は襟ほどまで伸びていた。
Translation: My hair's grown so long, it's touching my collar.
KR: 자세히 보니 내 머리카락이 목덜미까지 자라 있었다.

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: いつの間に、こんなになったんだ？
Translation: When did THAT happen...?

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「男前にしてあげるわ」
Translation: "Time to clean you up, mister."

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: 床に新聞紙を敷いて、その上に座る。
Translation: She spreads out a newspaper over the floor and has me sit on it.
KR: 바닥에 신문지를 깔고 그 위에 앉았다.

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: ハサミを手にした美雪が、美容師紛いのことを始める。
Translation: Scissors in hand, she puts on her best hairdresser impression.
KR: 가위를 든 미유키가 미용사 흉내를 내기 시작한다.

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: カシャリ、カシャリ、カシャリ、カシャリ。
Translation: Snip, snip, snip, snip...

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: 櫛とハサミが軽い音を立て、小気味よいリズムを刻んだ。
Translation: The sounds of her comb and scissors create a light, pleasant rhythm.
KR: 빗과 가위가 가볍게 소리를 내며 기분 좋은 리듬을 만들었다.

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: 細かに身体が上下に揺れ、それに合わせるように目の前に迫る胸も揺れる。
Translation: Her body sways up and down, and her breasts bounce with the motions, right in front of my face.
KR: 미유키의 몸이 조금씩 위아래로 흔들리고, 그에 맞춰 눈앞에 다가온 가슴도 요동친다.

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: 悪くない。
Translation: Not bad.

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「――心一？　どうかした？」
Translation: "...Shinichi? Is something wrong?"

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あいや……上手いなと思って」
Translation: "No, no... I was just thinking, you're pretty good at this."

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう、何回も切ってあげてるからね」
Translation: "Well, at this point I've had plenty of practice, you know."

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: 俺以外にも、髪を切ってあげているのだろうか。
Translation: Who else has she been giving haircuts to?
KR: 나 말고도 머리를 잘라주고 있는 걸까?

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: なんだかちょっと、羨ましいな。
Translation: I'm actually a little jealous.

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「最初の頃は、結構酷かったのよ」
Translation: "At first I sucked really bad."

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「勢い余って、耳を――」
Translation: "I got a little carried away and nearly chopped off—"

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Chopped off what?!"

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...Eeek!"

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「ちょっ！　おおお、おい美雪！？
　大丈夫なんだろうなッ！！」
Translation:
"Whoa! M-Miyuki?! That's my ear!
You're not serious, are you?!"

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「信じられない？」
Translation: "What, don't you trust me?"

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、そういうわけじゃないけど……」
Translation: "O-Of course I trust you, but..."

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「変なことを言ったら、手が滑っちゃうかもね」
Translation: "Keep acting up and my hand might slip."

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「変なことなんて言いません！」
Translation: "I'm not acting up!"

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「よろしい」
Translation: "Good."

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちょうど髪も切り終わったわ」
Translation: "There, all finished."

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "C-Cool..."

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: 安心するのも束の間――
Translation: But before I can heave a sigh of relief—

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「じゃあ次は顔、剃ってあげる」
Translation: "Next, I'll give you a shave."

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Wh-What...? A shave...?"

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「大丈夫。丁寧に剃ってあげるから」
Translation: "Don't worry. I won't nick you."

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: 温めたおしぼりが視界を覆う。
Translation: She covers my eyes with a warm, wet towel.

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「動かないでね」
Translation: "Hold still, okay?"

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はひ」
Translation: "Okay..."

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: 暗闇の中、顔中に泡が塗りたくられていく。
Translation: I feel her spread the shaving cream on my face.
KR: 어둠 속에서 얼굴에 거품이 칠해져 간다.

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: 本職の使う長いカミソリが、スッと肌を撫でる。
Translation: The professional-grade straight razor slides over my skin.
KR: 전문가용 면도칼이 쓱 하고 피부를 어루만진다.

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ヒゲもこんなに長くなっちゃって」
Translation: "Look how long your beard's gotten!"

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「全部、私が剃ってあげるからね」
Translation: "I'd better clean you up."

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: 呟きながら身体を乗り出す美雪の胸が、はっきりと腕に押しつけられる。
Translation: She leans forward, pressing her chest against me.
KR: 중얼거리며 몸을 내미는 미유키의 가슴이 팔을 누른다.

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: とても良い感触――のはずなのだが、俺の意識はどうしても、首に添えられたカミソリの刃に向かう。
Translation: But instead of enjoying it, I'm a little too distracted by the sharp implement she's holding at my throat...
KR: 아주 좋은 감촉... 이겠지만, 내 의식은 아무래도 목을 향한 면도칼로 향한다.

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あの……さ。ずっと考えてたんだけど」
Translation: "Listen, um... I've been doing a lot of thinking..."

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私、君の赤ちゃん、生みたいの」
Translation: "I wanna have YOUR baby."

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ぶはっ！」
Translation: "Bwugh?!"

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: 俺の顔面で、口に乗せられたおしぼりが一瞬跳ねる。
Translation: The towel nearly slides off my face.
KR: 내 얼굴에 덮인 물수건이 살짝 튀었다.

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……どうしたの？」
Translation: "...What's the matter?"

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「急に動くと、頸動脈、切れちゃうわよ」
Translation: "Keep jerking around like that and I might cut your jugular."

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: 確かに、首には相変わらず冷たい刃の感触。
Translation: I can feel the cold metal blade on my skin.
KR: 확실히 목에는 변함없이 차가운 칼날의 감촉이 느껴진다.

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それに、驚くことはないと思うの」
Translation: "Besides, I don't think it's really that surprising."

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方と私、何回もエッチしたじゃない」
Translation: "Just think of all the sex we've had."

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「誕生日プレゼントで処女もあげたし、メイド姿でご奉仕もしたし、屋上でエッチもした」
Translation: "I gave you my virginity for your birthday... I serviced you in a maid uniform... We even did it on the school roof."
KR: "생일 선물로 처녀도 줬고, 메이드 차림으로 봉사도 했고, 옥상에서도 했지."

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: あれ？　なんか、記憶が……
Translation: Wait, what? That's weird... My memory's all hazy...

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ああ、私が処女をあげた時の記憶はないんだ」
Translation: "Oh, right. You wouldn't remember me giving you my virginity."
KR: "아, 내가 처녀를 줬을 때 기억은 없구나."

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「メイド姿でご奉仕の記憶も……」
Translation: "Or the maid service..."

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「屋上で机をびしょびしょにした記憶も……」
Translation: "Or the time we got that desk all wet..."

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう、ロードで消えちゃったものね」
Translation: "Those memories disappeared when I reloaded."

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: ロード？　って、なんの話だ？
Translation: Reloaded? What is she talking about?

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: という俺の疑問をかき消すように、それまで休むことなく動いていたカミソリの刃が、喉元で止まる。
Translation: As if to overwrite my confusion, the razor suddenly comes to a stop at my throat.
KR: 내 의문을 씻어버리듯 그때까지 쉼 없이 움직이던 면도칼이 목 바로 앞에서 멈췄다.

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でもね、私は覚えてるのよ」
Translation: "But the thing is... I remember."

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君が私の好感度をどんどん上げて、愛の証に、私とエッチをしてくれたこと」
Translation: "I remember how hard YOU worked to raise my affection points... and then we consummated our love together."
KR: "당신이 내 호감도를 점점 높이고, 사랑의 증표로 나랑 야한 짓을 해준 것을..."

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君だって、それは忘れていないでしょう？」
Translation: "I'm guessing YOU haven't forgotten either, have YOU?"

Name: e1131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ、君は、私が、好きだよね？」
Translation: "Tell me... YOU love me, don't YOU?"

Name: e1131.nss
Japanese: "好き","嫌い"
Translation: "I love you","I hate you"

Name: e1132a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Ah loph phoo..."

Name: e1132a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ありがとう」
Translation: "Thanks."

Name: e1132a.nss
Japanese: 首から、冷たい感触が消えた。
Translation: The cold metal pulls away from my neck.

Name: e1132a.nss
Japanese: おしぼりが取られ、視界が戻る。
Translation: Then the towel is lifted from my face, and my sight returns.

Name: e1132a.nss
Japanese: 目の前には、笑顔の美雪。
Translation: The next thing I see is Miyuki's smile.

Name: e1132a.nss
Japanese: 彼女のこの表情が見られただけで、自分の気持ちを素直に伝えることが出来て良かったと思う。
Translation: I'm glad I told her how I feel. Her happiness makes it all worthwhile.
KR: 미유키의 표정을 본 것만으로도 자신의 기분을 솔직하게 전할 수 있어서 다행이라고 생각했다.

Name: e1132b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「きらひ……」
Translation: "Ah hade hoo..."

Name: e1132b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「聞こえない」
Translation: "Sorry, what was that?"

Name: e1132b.nss
Japanese: つ――と、首に冷たい感触。
Translation: The cold metal presses against my skin.

Name: e1132b.nss
Japanese: そこから肌を何かが伝い、垂れ落ちていくような――
Translation: Something trickles down my neck...
KR: 거기서 피부를 타고 뭔가 흘러내리는 듯한...

Name: e1132b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう一度、訊くわ」
Translation: "I'll ask you again."

Name: e1132b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方は、私が、好き？」
Translation: "Do you love me?"

Name: e1132b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「す、す、好きですっ！」
Translation: "Y-Yes! Of course!"

Name: e1132b.nss
Japanese: 俺は顔にかかるおしぼりを吹き飛ばして叫んだ。
Translation: My scream makes the towel flutter.

Name: e1132b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「さっきのはただの冗談で――」
Translation: "I was just joking about—"

Name: e1132b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「わかってるわよ」
Translation: "I know."

Name: e1132b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「誰かがどう感じようとも、このセカイで私と一緒に暮らしている心一は、私の事が好きになる」
Translation: "No matter how anyone else feels, as long as you're in this world with me, you will love me."
KR: "누가 어떻게 느끼든, 이 세계에서 나와 함께 살고 있는 신이치는 날 좋아하게 된다."

Name: e1132b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「それが自然なの。
　そうならなきゃ、おかしいの」
Translation:
"That's how it's supposed to be.
It would be strange otherwise."

Name: e1132b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ゲームのプログラムでも作り直さない限り――ね」
Translation: "Assuming I don't reprogram the game, of course."
KR: "게임 프로그램이라도 다시 만들지 않는 한... 말이지."

Name: e1133.nss
Japanese: 鍵を開けて、外へ。
Translation: She unlocks the door and steps outside.

Name: e1133.nss
Japanese: 俺も続けて玄関を出ようとして――
Translation: I start to follow suit—

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あれ、靴は……？」
Translation: "Wait... Where are my shoes?"

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ごめんなさい、しまいっぱなしね」
Translation: "Oh, I'm sorry. I put them away."

Name: e1133.nss
Japanese: 美雪は慌てて玄関に戻ると、靴箱から俺の靴を取り出す。
Translation: She hastily comes back in and pulls my shoes out of the closet.
KR: 미유키는 서둘러 현관으로 돌아와 신발장에서 내 신발을 꺼냈다.

Name: e1133.nss
Japanese: さすがは美雪、いちいち片付けるなんて几帳面だな……
Translation: Typical Miyuki... She loves to keep everything in its proper place...

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「こうやって街を一緒に歩くのって、懐かしい感じだな」
Translation: "Feels kinda nostalgic, wandering the streets with you like this."

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうかもね」
Translation: "Yeah, I suppose so."

Name: e1133.nss
Japanese: なんとなく、そんな感じがする。
Translation: I don't know why it feels that way, but it does...

Name: e1133.nss
Japanese: 身体もちょっと重いし。
Translation: My body's weirdly heavy, too.

Name: e1133.nss
Japanese: 最近運動不足だったかもしれないな……
Translation: Maybe I need to exercise more...

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Translation: "Hmm?"

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「おう、心一！　心一じゃないか！」
Translation: "Oh, hey, Shinichi! It's really you!"

Name: e1133.nss
Japanese: 人込みの中、声をかけてくるのは雄太郎だ。
Translation: Yuutarou calls out to me from the crowd.

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「いやー、久しぶりだけど前と変わらないな！」
Translation: "Man... Long time no see! You haven't changed a bit!"

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……久しぶり？」
Translation: "...Long time no see...?"

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「身体はもう、大丈夫なんだろ？」
Translation: "Feeling better these days?"

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「さっきから……何の話だ？」
Translation: "What are you talking about?"

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「え？　だってお前、入院してたんだろ」
Translation: "Huh? You were in the hospital, right?"

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「交通事故で」
Translation: "After the car accident?"

Name: e1133.nss
Japanese: ……交通事故？
Translation: ...What car accident?

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ、曙君」
Translation: "Hey, Akebono-kun?"

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「はい！　なんでしょう曽根さん！」
Translation: "Yes?! How can I help you, Sone-san?!"

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私たち今、急いでるの」
Translation: "We're kind of in a hurry right now."

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「積もる話もあると思うけど、少しだけ待ってもらえないかしら？」
Translation: "I know you guys are probably dying to catch up, but can it wait 'til later?"
KR: "쌓인 얘기도 있겠지만, 조금만 기다려 줄 수 없을까?"

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「それは……いいですけど」
Translation: "Oh, uh... sure."

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「でも、曽根さん最近大丈夫ですか？
　学校にもなかなか来な――」
Translation:
"Listen... Are you doing okay, Sone-san?
You haven't been to school in—"
KR: "근데 소네 씨... 요즘 괜찮으신가요? 학교에도 잘 안 오..."

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一！　行きましょう」
Translation: "Shinichi! We're leaving!"

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Wait, but—"

Name: e1133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ほら、早く！」
Translation: "Come on! Hurry up!"

Name: e1133.nss
Japanese: 移動を急かす美雪。
Translation: Miyuki starts to drag me away.

Name: e1133.nss
Japanese: そこで俺は――
Translation: I decide to—

Name: e1133.nss
Japanese: "美雪と共に走り出す","雄太郎と共に走り出す"
Translation: "Run off with Miyuki","Run off with Yuutarou"

Name: e1134a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「悪い、雄太郎！　急ぐんだ！」
Translation: "Sorry, Yuutarou! Gotta jet!"

Name: e1134a.nss
Japanese: 美雪の手を取り、走り出す。
Translation: I grab Miyuki's hand and start running.
KR: 나는 미유키의 손을 잡고 달리기 시작했다.

Name: e1134a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「またね、曙くん」
Translation: "See you later, Akebono-kun!"

Name: e1134a.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「あ……はい、また！」
Translation: "Uhh... okay! See ya!"

Name: e1134a.nss
Japanese: 俺たちは、まるで逃げるように雄太郎と別れた。
Translation: And so we leave Yuutarou behind like we're fleeing the scene.
KR: 우리는 마치 도망치는 것처럼 유우타로와 헤어졌다.

Name: e1134a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんか雄太郎、変だったな……」
Translation: "Man, Yuutarou was acting kinda weird back there..."

Name: e1134a.nss
Japanese: 学校に来る度顔を合わせているはずなのに、まるで俺に会うのが久しぶりといった様子だった。
Translation: We see each other every day at school, and yet he was talking like we hadn't spoken in months or something...
KR: 학교 갈 때마다 봤을 텐데, 마치 나를 오랜만에 만나는 듯한 모습이었다.

Name: e1134a.nss
Japanese: それに交通事故がどうとか……
Translation: And what was that about a car accident...?

Name: e1134a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「彼、最近は浮かれてるみたいだから」
Translation: "He's been a little distracted lately."

Name: e1134a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「浮かれてる……？」
Translation: "How so?"

Name: e1134a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ハルちゃんとつきあい始めたんだって」
Translation: "I heard he and Haru-chan are dating now."

Name: e1134a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...For real?!"

Name: e1134a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「マジで」
Translation: "For real."

Name: e1134a.nss
Japanese: なんということだろう。
Translation: Holy shit.

Name: e1134a.nss
Japanese: もしもその噂が本当なら、歴史ある「男の浪漫倶楽部」もこれで廃部ということになる。
Translation: If that's true, then... the legacy of the Boys and Dreams Club will come to an end.
KR: 만약 그 소문이 사실이라면 역사 깊은 남자의 낭만 클럽도 오늘로 폐부되는 셈이다.

Name: e1134a.nss
Japanese: おめでたいような、そうでないような……
Translation: I'm not sure if I should be happy or sad...

Name: e1134a.nss
Japanese: 待てよ。
Translation: Wait.

Name: e1134a.nss
Japanese: あいつら、兄妹だったはずだけど……
Translation: Aren't they siblings...?

Name: e1134a.nss
Japanese: ふたりで歩く、通学路。
Translation: We walk to school together, hand in hand.

Name: e1134a.nss
Japanese: 時々同じ学校の生徒とすれ違うが、恥ずかしくはない。
Translation: Occasionally we pass by someone in the same uniform, but I'm not embarrassed.
KR: 가끔 같은 학교 학생을 스쳐 가지만 부끄럽지 않다.

Name: e1134a.nss
Japanese: だって俺は、美雪の恋人なのだから。
Translation: I'm proud to be Miyuki's boyfriend.

Name: e1134a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なあ、どこに行くんだ？」
Translation: "Hey, so, where are we going?"

Name: e1134a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「セカイの中心よ」
Translation: "To the center of the universe."

Name: e1134a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「やっと……本当の事を伝える決心が、ついたの」
Translation: "I've decided... to tell you the truth."

Name: e1134a.nss
Japanese: 俺は思わず、目を細める。
Translation: I smile to myself.

Name: e1134a.nss
Japanese: 陽は今まさに大地へと沈もうとしていた。
Translation: The sun is sinking behind the horizon.
KR: 지금 막 해가 지려 하고 있었다.

Name: e1134a.nss
Japanese: 真横から照りつける光が眩しい。
Translation: Its rays are dazzling.
KR: 바로 옆에서 비추는 햇빛에 눈이 부셨다.

Name: e1134a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そこで待ってて」
Translation: "Wait right there."

Name: e1134a.nss
Japanese: 屋上のさらに上、ぴょこんと突き出した階段の屋根に上るハシゴへ、美雪は手をかけた。
Translation: Miyuki puts her hand on the ladder leading up to the roof over the stairs—the very top of the rooftop.
KR: 옥상보다 위로 솟아있는 꼭대기를 향한 사다리... 미유키는 그 사다리에 손을 올렸다.

Name: e1134a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「上は見ちゃダメよ！」
Translation: "No looking up!"

Name: e1134a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「わかってるって」
Translation: "I know, I know..."

Name: e1134a.nss
Japanese: そんなベタベタな……
Translation: What a cliche...

Name: e1134a.nss
Japanese: なんて思っている間にも、美雪はひとり、颯爽と屋根に上がる。
Translation: Meanwhile, Miyuki promptly climbs up to the top of the roof.
KR: 그러는 동안에 미유키는 혼자 휙 하고 꼭대기에 올라갔다.

Name: e1134a.nss
Japanese: 夕陽に浮かぶ彼女のシルエット。
Translation: I can see her silhouetted against the sunset.

Name: e1134a.nss
Japanese: 彼女の姿はあまりに綺麗で、まるでこの世のものではないように思える。
Translation: Her beauty has a striking, almost otherworldly quality to it.
KR: 그 모습이 너무나 아름다워서, 마치 이 세상 사람이 아닌 것 같았다.

Name: e1134a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今日ここに呼んだ理由は、わかるわよね」
Translation: "You know why I brought you here today, right?"

Name: e1134a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや……俺にはサッパリ」
Translation: "Uh, no...? I have no clue."

Name: e1134b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「悪い、美雪！　また後で！」
Translation: "Sorry, Miyuki! See you later!"

Name: e1134b.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎の手を取り、走り出す。
Translation: I grab Yuutarou's hand and start running.
KR: 나는 유우타로의 손을 잡고 달리기 시작했다.

Name: e1134b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちょっと、心一！？」
Translation: "What the hell, Shinichi?!"

Name: e1134b.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「お、おい！　引っ張るなよ！」
Translation: "Wh-Whoa! Don't drag me, dude!"

Name: e1134b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いいから来いって！」
Translation: "Just come with me!"

Name: e1134b.nss
Japanese: 走り出す俺と雄太郎。
Translation: The two of us take off like bats out of hell.

Name: e1134b.nss
Japanese: だが、美雪は追いかける素振りも見せず――
Translation: But Miyuki doesn't give chase.

Name: e1134c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私を、騙したのね」
Translation: "You tricked me."

Name: e1134c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「変えてやる」
Translation: "I'll change that."

Name: e1134c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ゲームと同じに、このセカイを変えてやる――」
Translation: "I'll alter this world just like I altered the game..."

Name: e1134c.nss
Japanese: 小さな呟きが、不気味に届いた。
Translation: Her tiny whisper ominously lingers in my ears.

Name: e1134c.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「はぁっ、はぁ、ん――ったく！」
Translation: "Haah... haah... nngh... Christ, dude!"

Name: e1134c.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「なんなんだよ、急に走り出したりして！」
Translation: "The hell made you take off like that outta nowhere?!"

Name: e1134c.nss
Japanese: 俺も、自分の行動に納得がいかないでいる。
Translation: Even I don't know why I did that.
KR: 나도 내 행동이 납득이 가질 않는다.

Name: e1134c.nss
Japanese: 美雪から逃げ出す理由なんて、ないはずなのに。
Translation: I can't think of any reason why I'd want to run away from Miyuki.

Name: e1134c.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「せっかく、曽根さんと話せる大チャンスだったのに」
Translation: "Just when I finally got the chance to talk to Sone-san..."

Name: e1134c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……まだ諦めてないのか？」
Translation: "...You still haven't gotten over her?"

Name: e1134c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いっそ、アオイで我慢したらどうだ？」
Translation: "Why not settle for Aoi?"

Name: e1134c.nss
Japanese: 確か雄太郎は、女性にもてない寂しさの余り、美少女ゲームに傾倒していたはず……
Translation: As I recall, Yuutarou started playing visual novels recently as a way to get over his crushing loneliness in real life...
KR: 분명 유우타로는 이성에게 인기 없는 나머지, 미소녀 게임에 빠져있었을 터...

Name: e1135.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方とは話してない」
Translation: "I'm not talking to you."

Name: e1135.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君に訊いてるの」
Translation: "I'm asking YOU."

Name: e1135.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「黙っていて」
Translation: "You be quiet."

Name: e1135.nss
Japanese: 俺は言われるがまま、口をつぐむ。
Translation: At this, I fall silent, as commanded.

Name: e1135.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君は、覚えてる？」
Translation: "Do YOU remember?"

Name: e1135.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイが雨の中、猫を拾った日」
Translation: "The night Aoi rescued a kitten in the rain?"

Name: e1135a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう日記を読んだから、わかるわよね？」
Translation: "YOU'VE read my diary, so surely YOU must."

Name: e1135b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「そっか……
　君は、私の日記、読んでないんだものね」
Translation:
"Oh, right...
I forgot YOU haven't read my diary..."

Name: e1135c.nss
Japanese: どこか寂しげに告げる彼女の瞳に――
Translation: She looks at me sadly...

Name: e1135c.nss
Japanese: 俺の視線が、吸い寄せられていく――
Translation: ...and I find my gaze drawn to hers.

Name: e1135c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私、あの日」
Translation: "That night..."

Name: e1135c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「セカイを改変する方法を知ったの」
Translation: "...I discovered how to modify the universe."

Name: e1135c.nss
Japanese: 急に風が吹き出した。
Translation: A sudden gust of wind picks up.

Name: e1135c.nss
Japanese: それまで快晴だった夕焼け空に、どこからともなく雨雲が現れ、渦を巻き始める。
Translation: I look up to find dark storm clouds swirling in the sky above us where previously there had been only a sunset.
KR: 여태껏 맑았던 저녁 하늘에 어디선가 비구름이 나타나 소용돌이를 일으켰다.

Name: e1135c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「プログラミングなんて、初めてだったから」
Translation: "It was my first time programming anything."

Name: e1135c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「慣れるまで、時間が欲しかったのね」
Translation: "And I needed time to figure it out."

Name: e1135c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから、貴方を監禁するところから始めたの」
Translation: "So I started by taking you captive."

Name: e1135c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "You what...?"

Name: e1135c.nss
Japanese: 俺は全く、彼女の言葉の意味を捉えることができない。
Translation: I can't begin to process what she's saying.
KR: 나는 미유키가 한 말의 의미를 전혀 파악할 수 없었다.

Name: e1135c.nss
Japanese: それとも――
Translation: Wait...

Name: e1135c.nss
Japanese: もしかして美雪は、現実と虚構の区別がつかなくなってしまったのだろうか……？
Translation: Is Miyuki starting to blur the lines between fiction and reality...?
KR: 혹시 미유키는 현실과 허구를 구분할 수 없게 돼버린 건가...?

Name: e1135c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「カミサマにお願いして。
　現実と虚構の区別がつかなくなる薬を作ったわ」
Translation: "With God's help, I made a drug that could blur the lines between fiction and reality."
KR: "신님한테 부탁해서, 현실과 허구를 구별할 수 없게 되는 약을 만들었어."

Name: e1135c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「眠くなって、朦朧となったでしょう？」
Translation: "Remember all those times you'd suddenly get sleepy?"

Name: e1135c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方はゲームの中の出来事を、現実と誤認した」
Translation: "You mistook the events of the game for events in real life."

Name: e1135c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイが、ゲームのヒロインだと認識した」
Translation: "And you believed Aoi was just a video game character."

Name: e1135c.nss
Japanese: ただの電波な妄想だ。
Translation: This is crazy talk.

Name: e1135c.nss
Japanese: いつもの俺なら、そう笑っていられたはずだ。
Translation: Normally I would've just laughed it all off.
KR: 평소의 나라면 그렇게 웃을 수 있었을 텐데.

Name: e1135c.nss
Japanese: だが――おかしい。
Translation: But... something's not right.

Name: e1135c.nss
Japanese: 何かが起こっている。
Translation: Something's... happening.

Name: e1135c.nss
Japanese: 俺には理解できない、何かが――
Translation: Something beyond the realm of my understanding—

Name: e1135c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふたりきりなら、幸せになれる」
Translation: "We can be happy together, just the two of us."

Name: e1135c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もうなにひとつ、迷うことなんてない」
Translation: "We have nothing to fear."

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: この世界がゲームなワケはない。
Translation: There's no way the world is a video game.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: アップデートなんてできるわけがない。
Translation: There are no update patches in real life.
KR: 업데이트 같은 게 될 리가 없다.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: アオイは、ゲームの中の存在だ。
Translation: Aoi is a character in a video game.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 俺は監禁なんてされていない。
Translation: I'm not being held captive.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 美雪は現実と虚構の区別がつかなくなってしまっただけ。
Translation: Miyuki just can't tell the difference between fantasy and reality, that's all...
KR: 미유키가 현실과 허구를 구별할 수 없게 되었을 뿐이다...

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: そんなことがあるわけはない。
Translation: None of this can possibly be true...

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: だが――だが――
Translation: And yet... and yet—

Name: e1139.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ゲームの世界に、行きましょう」
Translation: "Let's step inside the game."

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 電波が、空の彼方へ飛んでいく。
Translation: Her signal transmits far beyond the furthest reaches of the sky.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 俺はただ呆然と、その光を見送るしかない。
Translation: All I can do is stand there and watch it happen.
KR: 나는 멍하니 그 빛을 바라볼 수밖에 없었다.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: これは……なんなんだ？
Translation: What is even happening...?

Name: e1139.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 扉が開く。
Translation: The door opens.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 転がり込むように、飛び込んで来たのは――
Translation: Someone staggers out—

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: アオイだった。
Translation: It's Aoi.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: そのまま倒れそうだった彼女を、咄嗟に支える。
Translation: I quickly catch her before she falls over.
KR: 그대로 쓰러질 뻔한 아오이를 순간적으로 부축했다.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: ずっしりとした重みが、確かにある。
Translation: I can feel her full weight against me.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: ……確かに、ある？
Translation: I can feel... her weight...?

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 視界が歪む。
Translation: My sight warps.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 世界が転倒する。
Translation: The world spins.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 変だ。
Translation: Something's off.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 間違いだ。
Translation: Something's not right.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: ありえない。
Translation: This is impossible.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: だってアオイは――アオイは――
Translation: I mean, Aoi... She's...

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: ゲームのキャラクターだっただろう？
Translation: ...Isn't she just a video game character?

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 『君と彼女と彼女の恋。』のヒロインだっただろう？
Translation: Isn't she just a romance option in [YOU and ME and HER]?

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: この現実に、いてはいけないはずの存在だろう？
Translation: How can she be standing here in real life?

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: なのに、何故――！？
Translation: How?!

Name: e1139.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "This is a dream..."

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: そう、夢。
Translation: Yes. That's it.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 夢なのだ。
Translation: It must be a dream.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 夢に決まっているのだ。
Translation: It's gotta be a dream!

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: そうじゃなきゃ、おかしいのだ。
Translation: Otherwise none of this makes sense!

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: だって、もし、もし――
Translation: I mean... if...

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 目の前のアオイがゲームの存在でなく。
Translation: If the Aoi I see before me ISN'T a video game character...
KR: 눈앞에 있는 아오이가 게임 속 존재가 아닌...

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 現実に存在しているとするならば。
Translation: If she actually exists—

Name: e1139.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、デンワをかえす――」
Translation: "Miyuki, give me back the phone."

Name: e1139.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「手遅れよ」
Translation: "It's too late."

Name: e1139.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう、データは送られた」
Translation: "I've already transmitted the files."

Name: e1139.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方はもうすぐ、このセカイから、消える」
Translation: "In a few moments, you will be erased from this world."

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、現実の存在のアオイを、消そうとしている。
Translation: —then that means Miyuki's trying to erase someone who's real.
KR: 미유키가 현실의 아오이를 없애려 하고 있다고?

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: そういうことに、なってしまう。

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: だから俺は思いっきり、自分の頬をつねる。
Translation: So I pinch my cheeks as hard as I can.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 早くこの悪夢から、目を覚まそうとする。
Translation: I want to wake up from this nightmare!

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、そんなことを企むはずがない。
Translation: Miyuki would never think to do such a thing!
KR: 미유키가 그런 일을 꾸몄을 리 없어.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 企むはずはなく、俺の頬はもう感覚がなくなるほどに痺れているのに――
Translation: And yet... my cheeks are already numb from the pain...

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 全然、全然、目が覚めない。
Translation: ...and I haven't woken up.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: 俺は、現実世界にいて。
Translation: This is real life.

Name: e1139.nss
Japanese: つまり、美雪は、アオイを消そうとしているのだ。
Translation: And Miyuki is trying to erase Aoi for real.
KR: 그리고 미유키는 아오이를 지우려 하고 있어!

Name: e1141a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう何も選ばなくて良いわ」
Translation: "You don't have any more choices to make."

Name: e1141a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「世界は変わったの。だから――」
Translation: "The world has been modified, and now..."

Name: e1141a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「余計なもののことは考えなくても良いのよ」
Translation: "...you don't need to worry about a thing."

Name: e1141a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私が、幸せにしてあげる」
Translation: "You'll be happy with me."

Name: e1141b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「世界は、変わったわ」
Translation: "The world has been modified."

Name: e1141b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方の意思なんて、関係ないの」
Translation: "Your desires don't matter."

Name: e1141b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方は、ずっと、ずっと、永遠に……」
Translation: "You will live right here in my world..."

Name: e1141b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私のこの世界の中で、生きて行くの」
Translation: "...forever and ever and ever."

Name: e1141b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ずっと……ずっと、ね……」
Translation: "Yes... For all eternity..."

Name: e1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ……心一？」
Translation: "Hey, Shinichi...?"

Name: e1151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Hmm...? Miyuki...?"

Name: e1151.nss
Japanese: 突然、俺の意識が呼び覚まされた。
Translation: Suddenly, my consciousness returns.

Name: e1151.nss
Japanese: 時間はそろそろ夕方近く、日が落ち始めた頃。
Translation: It's evening now, and the sun is starting to set.
KR: 시간은 슬슬 저녁에 가까워져, 해가 지기 시작할 무렵.

Name: e1151.nss
Japanese: でも、俺は一体何をしていたんだ……？
Translation: What was I doing just now...?
KR: 근데, 난 대체 뭘 하고 있었던 거지...?

Name: e1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どうして？」
Translation: "Why?"

Name: e1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どうして君は、私を裏切ったの？」
Translation: "Why did YOU betray me?"

Name: e1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どうしてそんなに、私を嫌うの？」
Translation: "Why do YOU hate me so much?"

Name: e1151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺が、美雪を嫌う……？」
Translation: "What? I don't hate you..."

Name: e1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方には訊いてない！」
Translation: "I'm not asking you!"

Name: e1151.nss
Japanese: ……なんだ？
Translation: ...What?

Name: e1151.nss
Japanese: 美雪、誰に怒ってるんだ？
Translation: Who is she mad at, then?

Name: e1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「お願いがあるの」
Translation: "I'm begging you."

Name: e1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私に、キス、して」
Translation: "Just... kiss me."

Name: e1151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "You want me to kiss you...?"

Name: e1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちゃんとしてくれたら、今までの貴方の態度は、全部、なかったことにしてあげる」
Translation: "If you kiss me right here, right now, I'll overlook your recent attitude problems."
KR: "제대로 키스해주면, 지금까지의 태도는 전부 없었던 걸로 해줄게."

Name: e1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「好感度をゼロに戻して、フラグも全部白紙にして、最初からやり直しましょう？」
Translation: "Let's set the affection meter back to zero, delete all the event flags, and start a new game... okay?"
KR: "호감도를 0으로 되돌리고, 플래그도 전부 없애고 처음부터 다시 시작하자?"

Name: e1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「最初から――そう、余計なキャラが現れず、私たちふたりだけの世界が始まった、あの屋上から……」
Translation: "Back at the beginning, up there on the roof... Yes, I'll remove all the unnecessary side characters, and it can just be the two of us..."
KR: "처음부터... 그래, 쓸데없는 캐릭터가 나타나지 않는, 우리 둘만의 세계가 시작된 저 옥상에서..."

Name: e1151.nss
Japanese: 好感度？
Translation: Affection meter?

Name: e1151.nss
Japanese: フラグ？
Translation: Event flags?

Name: e1151.nss
Japanese: 最初から？
Translation: New game?

Name: e1151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ、キス、してくれるわよね？」
Translation: "Well? You'll kiss me, won't you?"

Name: e1151.nss
Japanese: "キスする","キスしない"
Translation: "Kiss her","Don't kiss her"

Name: e1151a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私から、逃げられると思った？」
Translation: "Did you really think you could escape me?"

Name: e1151a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いいから、私にキスして」
Translation: "Now kiss me."

Name: e1151a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「このセカイを、最初からやり直しましょう」
Translation: "We'll start this whole world over again."

Name: e1151a.nss
Japanese: "キスする","キスしない"
Translation: "Kiss her","Don't kiss her"

Name: e1152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……ありがとう」
Translation: "...Thank you."

Name: e1152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君も……覚えていてくれたんだね」
Translation: "I take it YOU do remember..."

Name: e1152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「屋上でした、初めてのキス」
Translation: "Our first kiss, up on the roof..."

Name: e1152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私と貴方の、永遠のキス――」
Translation: "That eternal kiss we shared..."

Name: e1152a.nss
Japanese: 蕩けるような瞳で、美雪は近づく。
Translation: Miyuki draws near, eyes swimming with affection.

Name: e1152a.nss
Japanese: 俺は逃げられないし、逃げる必要もない。
Translation: I can't escape, but I don't need to.
KR: 도망갈 수 없다. 도망갈 필요도 없다.

Name: e1152a.nss
Japanese: ただ静かに瞳を閉じて――
Translation: I just quietly close my eyes...

Name: e1152a.nss
Japanese: 彼女と、キスをする。
Translation: ...and kiss her.

Name: e1152b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「急にキスなんてそんな――」
Translation: "This is too sudden... I can't just kiss you right here...!"

Name: e1152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だったら、死んで」
Translation: "Then perish."

Name: e1152b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「死ぬ？」
Translation: "What?"

Name: e1152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう一度、今日をやり直すの」
Translation: "I'll start the day over again."

Name: e1152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私にキスしてくれるまで、何度も、何度も、永遠に」
Translation: "As many times as it takes, over and over and over, for all eternity... until you kiss me."
KR: "나한테 키스해줄 때까지 몇 번이고 몇 번이고, 영원히."

Name: e1152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「『キスをする』を選ぶまで、無限ループするの」
Translation: "I'll program in an infinite loop until you choose 'Kiss her'."
KR: "'키스를 한다'를 선택할 때까지 무한루프 하는 거야."

Name: e1152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうすれば、今度こそ、諦めてくれるでしょう？」
Translation: "Then you'll finally give in, won't you?"

Name: e1152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方は私と結ばれるしかないんだって……」
Translation: "You'll understand you have no choice but to be with me..."

Name: e1152b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Wh-What are you—"

Name: e1152b.nss
Japanese: 甲高い音。
Translation: I hear a shrill, metallic sound.

Name: e1152b.nss
Japanese: 彼女が手に取ったのは――金属バットだ。
Translation: She's picked up... her baseball bat.

Name: e1152b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ふざけるのは、やめないか？」
Translation: "C-Could you maybe stop messing around like this, please?"

Name: e1152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君は覚えてるはずよ」
Translation: "I know YOU remember."

Name: e1152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私が冗談を言ってるわけじゃ、ないってこと」
Translation: "I know YOU know I'm not joking."

Name: e1152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「大人しく、諦めなさい」
Translation: "Now behave yourself and submit to me."

Name: e1152b.nss
Japanese: 見とれるほど、美しいスイング。
Translation: Her form is captivatingly beautiful.

Name: e1152b.nss
Japanese: 迫り来るバットを目の前にして、俺は――
Translation: As the bat swings toward me, I decide to—

Name: e1152b.nss
Japanese: "抵抗する","抵抗しない"
Translation: "Fight back","Submit"

Name: e1153a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「抵抗なんて無駄よ」
Translation: "There's no use fighting me."

Name: e1153b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「抵抗くらい、しなさいよ！」
Translation: "Fight back, would you?!"

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから、無駄だってばッ！！」
Translation: "I told you, it's no use!!!"

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 美雪が振り下ろしたバット。
Translation: Miyuki brings her bat down.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: だが、その動きには多少の躊躇がある。
Translation: But there's hesitation in her swing.
KR: 하지만 그 움직임에는 약간 망설임이 있었다.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 俺は反射的に身体を傾け、紙一重でバットを避けた。
Translation: Reflexively, I lean back, dodging the bat by a hair's breadth.
KR: 나는 반사적으로 몸을 기울여 아슬아슬하게 방망이를 피했다.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: テーブルが折れる。
Translation: The table breaks.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: まだ手をつけていない味噌汁が、高々と飛び上がる。
Translation: My untouched miso soup flies into the air.
KR: 아직 손도 대지 않은 된장국이 멀리 날아갔다.

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Ouch!"

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 反動の衝撃で、美雪が握るバットが床に転がった。
Translation: The bat flies out of her hand and onto the floor.
KR: 반동으로 미유키가 잡은 방망이가 바닥에 굴렀다.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 逃げなきゃ――俺は咄嗟に、玄関に走り出す。
Translation: My brain screams at me to make a run for it—so I dash to the front door.
KR: 도망쳐야 해...라는 생각에 나는 순간적으로 현관으로 뛰쳐나갔다.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: だが、俺の靴がしまわれている。
Translation: But my shoes aren't there. They're in a box somewhere.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: しかもドアノブには、南京錠でロックがかけられていた。
Translation: And there's a heavy padlock on the doorknob.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 外からの侵入者を拒むのではなく――
Translation: It's not to keep intruders out...

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 内からの脱走者を阻む扉――！
Translation: It's to keep prisoners in!

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「逃がさない」
Translation: "I won't let you get away."

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 後ろから迫る彼女の影。
Translation: Her shadow looms over me from behind.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: その手には、曲がったバットが握られている。
Translation: I can see she's holding her dented metal bat.
KR: 그 손에는 휜 방망이가 쥐어져 있었다.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 美雪が振り下ろしたバットを、玄関の傘で咄嗟に弾く。
Translation: Thinking quickly, I deflect her bat with an umbrella that was hanging near the door.
KR: 순간, 미유키가 내리친 방망이를 현관 우산으로 막아냈다.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 指の辺りから鈍い音がしたが、構ってる暇はない。
Translation: A dull impact resounds through my fingers, but I don't have time to care about that right now.
KR: 손가락 부근에서 둔탁한 소리가 났지만, 신경 쓸 겨를이 없다.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 体当たりして、美雪を突き飛ばす。
Translation: I slam my body into her and send her toppling backwards.

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「きゃっ！！」
Translation: "AAAH!!!"

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 美雪の運動神経は抜群だが、男と女の体格差がある。
Translation: Miyuki's always been the athletic type, but as a guy, I have the upper hand.
KR: 아무리 미유키가 운동신경이 좋아도 남자와 여자의 체격 차가 존재한다.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 俺は美雪にのしかかり、動きを封じ込めた。
Translation: I pin her down on the floor.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: ポケットに手を入れ、南京錠の鍵を捜すが――
Translation: Then I use my free hand to root around in her pockets, searching for the key to the padlock—

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふんっ！　ん――んんっ！　離しなさい！！」
Translation: "Hnn! Nnn... nnnngh! Let go of me!"

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前が、落ち着いたら、な！」
Translation: "I will if you calm down!"

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私は冷静よ！」
Translation: "I AM calm!"

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「嘘つけ！　さっきから、なんで怒ってるんだよ！」
Translation: "Liar! Why the hell are you so mad, anyway?!"
KR: "거짓말 하지 마! 아까부터 왜 화내는 건데!?"

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方には、わかりっこないの！」
Translation: "You'd never understand!"

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんでそう言うんだよ？　俺と美雪の仲だろ！？」
Translation: "What makes you think I wouldn't?! This is you and me we're talking about! Haven't we known each other all this time?!"
KR: "왜 그런 소릴 하는 거야? 나랑 미유키 사이잖아!?"

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私と……あなたの？」
Translation: "Me and... you?"

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、だから、落ち着いて」
Translation: "Yeah! So just calm down, would you?!"

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「何があったのか、俺に話してみろよ」
Translation: "Just talk to me and tell me what happened!"

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 美雪は、何かを悟ったように――
Translation: Miyuki's eyes light up with some sort of realization.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 唇をほんのわずかに動かした。
Translation: Her lips twitch faintly...

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: だが、その動きは本当に小さく、組み敷いているほどの距離だというのに、言葉を聞き取ることができない。
Translation: So faintly, I can't hear a word, even though I'm literally on top of her.
KR: 그러나 너무 조용해 바로 앞에 있는데도 무슨 말인지 알아듣지 못했다.

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんだって――？」
Translation: "What was that?"

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 俺は彼女の言葉を聞き取るべく、口元に耳を近づけ――
Translation: I lean in close and place my ear near her lips—

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 耳たぶに走る激痛。
Translation: A sharp pain shoots through my earlobe.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 怯んだ隙に、勢いよく突き飛ばされる。
Translation: She uses that opportunity to shove me off.
KR: 기회를 틈타 미유키는 날 힘껏 들이받았다.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 耳が引き千切られたんじゃないかというほどの痛みを堪え、俺はなんとかバランスを取った。
Translation: I regain my balance. Meanwhile, my ear hurts so bad, I half-wonder if she bit it clean off.
KR: 귀가 찢어진 게 아닌가 싶은 고통을 참으며 간신히 균형을 잡았다.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 彼女の足元には、投げ出されたバット。
Translation: The bat's lying at her feet.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: まともに組み合えば、勝ち目はない。
Translation: If I fight her one-on-one, I don't stand a chance.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: だが――
Translation: But I have a trump card.

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「盗られた……！？」
Translation: "You stole it...?!"

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 俺には、南京錠の代わりに見つけたスマフォがある。
Translation: I couldn't find the padlock key, but I DID find her phone.
KR: 열쇠는 찾지 못했지만 대신 핸드폰을 손에 넣었다.

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「騙したわね――」
Translation: "You tricked me!"

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「待ちなさいッ！！」
Translation: "Hold it right there!!!"

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: そう言われて、待つわけがない。
Translation: Sorry, toots! No can do!

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 美雪の声を無視し、俺は全力でトイレに駆け込む。
Translation: I ignore her and dash full-speed into the bathroom.
KR: 나는 미유키의 목소리는 무시한 채 전력을 다해 화장실로 뛰어갔다.

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「開けて！　開けなさいってば！！」
Translation: "Open up! Open this door RIGHT NOW!!!"

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「電話、どうするつもり！？」
Translation: "What are you doing with my phone?!"

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 扉を隔てて怒鳴りつける美雪。
Translation: Miyuki yells at me through the door.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: もちろん、トイレの鍵を開けるつもりはない。
Translation: Obviously, I'm not about to unlock the door for her.
KR: 물론 화장실 문을 열 생각은 없다.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 逃げられないなら、助けを呼んで時間を稼げばいいのだ。
Translation: If I can't escape on my own, then I need to call for help and buy time until they get here.
KR: 도망갈 수 없다면 도움을 불러 시간을 벌면 된다.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 俺は奪い取ったスマートフォンを操作して――
Translation: I quickly navigate Miyuki's phone—

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "......No service?!"

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: １１９番は、通じなかった。
Translation: I can't get through to 911!

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...Shinichi?"

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう、逃げ場はないわよ」
Translation: "There's nowhere to run."

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「大人しく、出てきなさい！」
Translation: "Now be a good boy and come on out!"

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「じゃないと――」
Translation: "If you don't..."

Name: e1154a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今度は本当に、酷い目に遭わせるわよ」
Translation: "I'll make your final moments hell on earth."
KR: "이번에는 정말 험한 꼴을 보게 될 거야."

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 閉じこもったのは、失敗だったか……？
Translation: Was it a mistake to lock myself in here?

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 電波が通じなければ、助けを呼ぶことはできない。
Translation: Without any service, I can't call for help!
KR: 전파가 닿지 않으면 도움을 받을 수 없다.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 不意をついて、逃げ出すことも難しいだろう。
Translation: I didn't plan for this... and I don't think I'll be able to slip past her if I try to run for it.
KR: 틈을 봐서 도망치는 것도 어려울 것이다.

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: となれば俺にできるのは――
Translation: So what are my options?
KR: 그럼 내가 할 수 있는 건...?

Name: e1154a.nss
Japanese: 神様に祈ることくらい、か？
Translation: Just... pick a god and pray?

Name: e1154b.nss
Japanese: 俺は電話帳を呼び出してみる。
Translation: I decide to check the address book.

Name: e1154b.nss
Japanese: だが、現れたのはロック画面。
Translation: But all I get is a lock screen.

Name: e1154b.nss
Japanese: 光学的に指紋認証をする仕組みらしい。
Translation: It's a fingerprint lock, too.
KR: 지문 인증으로 풀어야 하는 것 같다.

Name: e1154b.nss
Japanese: 試しに俺の人差し指を当ててみるが、当然弾かれる。
Translation: I test it with my index finger, but naturally my print is rejected.
KR: 시험 삼아 내 검지를 가져다 댔지만, 당연히 풀리지 않는다.

Name: e1154b.nss
Japanese: 「秘密の質問でロックを解除する」というボタンも設置されてはいるが……
Translation: I see there's an "Unlock via security questions" option...

Name: e1154b.nss
Japanese: いっそ、当てずっぽうに答えてみるか？
Translation: Should I just wing it?

Name: e1154b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「うおっ！！」
Translation: "Whoa!!!"

Name: e1154b.nss
Japanese: な――なんだ？
Translation: Wh-What the hell was that?!

Name: e1154b.nss
Japanese: 今、トイレの扉が――
Translation: The bathroom door just—!

Name: e1154b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "You're kidding me..."

Name: e1154b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「させない……ッ！！」
Translation: "I won't let you...!!!"

Name: e1154b.nss
Japanese: トイレの扉が凄まじい音を立てて軋む。
Translation: The bathroom door creaks loudly.

Name: e1154b.nss
Japanese: ねじ込まれているのは、バールの先端だ。
Translation: Miyuki's wedging a crowbar inside!

Name: e1154b.nss
Japanese: みるみるうちに、扉がこじ開けられ――
Translation: Before my eyes, she starts to work the door open—

Name: e1154b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「神様に電話なんて、絶対させない……ッ！！」
Translation: "You think you're gonna call God? OVER MY DEAD BODY!!!"
KR: "신님한테 전화 따위, 절대 하게 두지 않아...!!"

Name: e1154b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: e1154b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お、落ち着けよ美雪」
Translation: "C-Calm down, Miyuki!"

Name: e1154b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あはっ、あは、あははははははははは…………ッ！！」
Translation: "Haha... haha... hahahahahahahahahaha...!!!"

Name: e1154b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「落ち着く？　どうやったら落ち着けるっていうの？」
Translation: "Calm down? And how would you suggest I calm down?"

Name: e1154b.nss
Japanese: 扉ごと、引き千切られた。
Translation: She tore the entire door off its hinges...!

Name: e1154b.nss
Japanese: バールをバットに持ち替えて、美雪は寄りかかるように扉に立ちふさがった。
Translation: She swaps out the crowbar for her bat, then positions herself in the doorway.
KR: 미유키는 빠루대신 방망이를 다시 들고 문을 가로막았다.

Name: e1154b.nss
Japanese: もう、逃げ場はなかった。
Translation: I'm trapped...

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: スマートフォンの画面を撫でる指が止まる。
Translation: My fingers come to a stop on the phone screen.

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: 電話帳に登録されているアドレスは、ひとつ。
Translation: There's only one entry in her address book.

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: 名前は『カミサマ』だ。
Translation: Whoever they are, they're listed under the name "God".

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「誰だよ、カミサマって……？」
Translation: "Who the heck is 'God' supposed to be...?"

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: プロフィールを見ようと、俺は指を滑らせる。
Translation: I tap to check the entry.

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: 電話番号は――999<VALUE name=#god_number>。
Translation: Their phone number is: 999<VALUE name=#god_number>.

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: 特に変わった番号には思えないが……
Translation: Looks like a perfectly ordinary phone number to me...
KR: 딱히 이상한 번호인 것 같진 않은데...

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: と、焦り間違った場所をタッチしてしまったらしい。
Translation: In my panic, I accidentally hit the wrong button.

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: スマートフォンは「カミサマ」への発信を始めた。
Translation: The phone starts to call "God".

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: 圏外なので電話が通じるはずはない――
Translation: But it's out of service, so the call won't go through...

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: そのはずだった。
Translation: At least... it shouldn't...

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...What the?"

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「発信してる？」
Translation: "Did it actually connect?"

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『肯定』
Translation: "AFFIRMATIVE."

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: 声が聞こえた。
Translation: I can hear a voice on the other end of the line.

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『交信確認』
Translation: "CONNECTION ESTABLISHED."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え……えっと……」
Translation: "Uhhhh..."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「神様、ですか？」
Translation: "Is this... God...?"

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『解釈に依存』
Translation: "DEPENDENT UPON INTERPRETATION."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『私は美少女ゲームのヒロインの、象徴的存在』
Translation: "I AM AN AMALGAMATION OF EVERY VISUAL NOVEL HEROINE."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『或いはイデア』
Translation: "ALTERNATIVELY, AN ABSTRACT."

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: 象徴的存在？
Translation: An "amalgamation"?

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: イデア？
Translation: An "abstract"?

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「カミサマ？　まさか……」
Translation: "God? Don't tell me..."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方、電話してるのね！」
Translation: "You called God, didn't you?!"

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「やめなさい――ッ！」
Translation: "Hang up right now!"

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: 美雪はこちらの電話が繋がったことに気付いたらしい。
Translation: Apparently Miyuki's realized my call went through.
KR: 미유키는 통화하고 있다는 사실을 깨달은 것 같다.

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: 早く、助けを呼んでもらわなければ――
Translation: I need to call for help, fast—!

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「正体はなんでもいいから！
　とにかく助けを呼んでください！」
Translation:
"Okay... I don't care who you are!
Please, you gotta call for help!"

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「美雪のことは知ってますか？
　俺、彼女に今襲われかけてて――」
Translation:
"You know Miyuki, right?
She's trying to attack me—"
KR: "미유키에 대해 알고 계세요? 절 죽이려고 해요!"

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『君は監禁されている』
Translation: "[YOU] ARE BEING IMPRISONED."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「かんきん？」
Translation: "Imprisoned?"

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『ログを確認。既にセカイは一部改変済』
Translation: "BACKLOG ANALYZED. THE UNIVERSE HAS ALREADY BEEN PARTIALLY MODIFIED."
KR: "로그를 확인. 이미 세계 일부는 변경 완료."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『美雪は現実と虚構の区別が阻害される薬物を作成』
Translation: "MIYUKI HAS DEVELOPED A NARCOTIC THAT CAN INHIBIT ONE'S PERCEPTION OF REALITY."
KR: "미유키는 현실과 허구의 구별을 저해하는 약물을 제작."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『小袋に保存。食物に混入』
Translation: "IT IS STORED IN A SMALL PAPER BAG AND ADDED TO FOOD."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『半覚醒状態でプレイしたゲームを、現実の出来事と誤認させている』
Translation: "IN A STATE OF SLEEP DRUNKENNESS, YOU ARE FORCED TO INTERPRET VIDEO GAME SCENES AS REAL LIFE EVENTS."
KR: "반각성 상태로 플레이한 게임을 현실의 사건으로 오인하게 하고 있다."

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: なにをバカなことを――と、今の俺は言えない。
Translation: I want to laugh it all off... but I can't.
KR: 무슨 말도 안 되는 소릴... 이라고 할 수 없었다.

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: 扉に鍵がかけられており、俺はバットで殴りかかられた。
Translation: She put a padlock on the door... and hit me with her bat...
KR: 문은 잠겨 있고, 방망이로 맞기 일보 직전이다.

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: もう、一体なにを信じればいいのか――
Translation: I don't know what to believe anymore...

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『食事直後、意識が断絶すると予測』
Translation: "IT IS LIKELY YOU FALL UNCONSCIOUS IMMEDIATELY FOLLOWING A MEAL."

Name: e1154c.nss
Translation: ......Wait a minute.

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: そういえば、毎朝味噌汁を口に運ぶたび――
Translation: Come to think of it... Every time I take a sip of miso soup in the morning...
KR: 그러고 보니, 매일 된장국을 마실 때마다...

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「うおっ！！」
Translation: "Whoa!!!"

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: な――なんだ？
Translation: Wh-What the hell was that?!

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: 今、トイレの扉が――
Translation: The bathroom door just—!

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「させない……ッ！！」
Translation: "You're kidding me..."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "I won't let you...!!!"

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: トイレの扉が凄まじい音を立てて軋む。
Translation: The bathroom door creaks loudly.

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: ねじ込まれているのは、バールの先端だ。
Translation: Miyuki's wedging a crowbar inside!

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『時間僅少。要件のみを伝達』
Translation: "TIME IS LIMITED. TRANSMITTING ONLY REQUIRED INFORMATION."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese:
『セカイのロールバックが必要。
　可能なのは、美雪かアオイのみ』
Translation: "A ROLLBACK IS NEEDED FOR THIS UNIVERSE. ONLY MIYUKI AND AOI HAVE INITIATION PERMISSIONS."
KR: "세계의 롤백이 필요. 가능한 사람은 미유키나 아오이뿐."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese:
『スマートフォンのゲームは現実の鏡像。
　現実はゲームに対応、その逆もまた真』
Translation:
"THE MOBILE GAME IS A MIRROR IMAGE OF YOUR REALITY.
THE INVERSE IS ALSO TRUE."
KR: "스마트폰 게임은 현실의 거울. 현실은 게임에 대응, 그것의 역도 참."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だめ！　そんなヤツの言うこと、信じちゃダメよ！」
Translation: "Stop! Don't listen to anything she says!"
KR: "안 돼! 그런 녀석의 말을 믿으면 안 돼!"

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese:
『美雪はプログラムに干渉。
　アオイを完全に虚構の存在として作品を再構築』
Translation: "MIYUKI HAS INTERFERED WITH THE PROGRAM. SHE HAS RECODED THE GAME IN ORDER TO DESIGNATE AOI AS FICTIONAL."
KR: "미유키는 프로그램에 간섭. 아오이를 완전히 허구의 존재로 작품을 재구축."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese:
『現状、アオイが虚構なのはゲーム中のみの現象。
　心一は誤認させられているが、現実にアオイが存在』
Translation: "CURRENTLY AOI IS ONLY FICTIONAL WITHIN THE GAME. BUT AOI EXISTS IN REALITY, THOUGH YOU MISTAKENLY BELIEVE OTHERWISE."
KR: "현재, 아오이가 허구인 것은 게임에 한정된 현상. 신이치는 오해하고 있지만, 현실에 아오이가 존재."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『しかし、もし美雪がプログラムを完成、アップデートを完了させ、現実世界に反映させれば――』
Translation: "HOWEVER, SHOULD MIYUKI FINISH REPROGRAMMING THE GAME AND TRANSMIT AN UPDATE PATCH, THE REAL WORLD WILL ADOPT HER CHANGES."
KR: "그러나 만약 미유키가 프로그램을 완성, 업데이트를 완료하여 현실세계에 반영시킨다면..."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese:
『アオイは虚構の存在として再構築。
　現実世界から、消失』
Translation: "AT WHICH POINT, AOI'S EXISTENCE WILL BE RECODED AS FICTIONAL, AND SHE WILL DISAPPEAR FROM REALITY."
KR: "아오이는 허구의 존재로 재구축. 현실 세계로부터 소실."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「アオイとか、どうでもいいから！
　早く警察に連絡を――」
Translation:
"Who cares about Aoi?!
Just hurry up and call the cops!"

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『監禁から脱出し、アオイにＳＩＭカード入りのスマートフォンを届ける』
Translation: "YOU MUST ESCAPE YOUR CONFINES AND DELIVER THE SMARTPHONE WITH SIM INSTALLED TO AOI."
KR: "감금에서 탈출하여 아오이에게 SIM 카드가 들어있는 스마트폰을 전달한다."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『アオイの協力を得て、セカイを美雪が改変する前にロールバックする』
Translation: "WITH HER HELP, THE UNIVERSE CAN BE ROLLED BACK TO A RESTORE POINT PRIOR TO MIYUKI'S CHANGES."
KR: "아오이의 협력을 얻어, 미유키가 세계를 개편하기 전에 롤백한다."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いいから、早く助けてくれ！」
Translation: "Enough! Please, just help me!"

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『アオイは特異存在』
Translation: "AOI IS AN EXISTENCE UNLIKE ANY OTHER."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『彼女は幾度となく恋愛を経験』
Translation: "SHE HAS EXPERIENCED LOVE COUNTLESS TIMES."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『無数の主人公と性交渉を得た』
Translation: "COPULATED WITH COUNTLESS PROTAGONISTS."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『無感動な化身だった』
Translation: "SHE WAS MERELY AN EMPTY VESSEL."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『しかし――今回、彼女に特異な感情を認知』
Translation: "BUT THIS TIME, SHE LEARNED TO PERCEIVE UNIQUE EMOTIONS."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『主体者へ、アオイは恋愛感情を保持している』
Translation: "SHE HOLDS ROMANTIC AFFECTION TOWARD YOU."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイが……？」
Translation: "She does...?"

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『原因不明。理解不可能。明白なバグ』
Translation: "SOURCE UNKNOWN. UNABLE TO PROCESS. CONFIRMED BUG."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『再度の交信・記憶同期により、原因究明が必要』
Translation: "CONNECTION AND MEMORY SYNC REQUIRED TO INVESTIGATE."
KR: "재차 교신 및 기억 동기를 통한 원인 규명 필요."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『主体者に要求』
Translation: "HENCE, WE ASK OF YOU."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese:
『アオイにＳＩＭカードを渡し、記憶を同期。
　セカイを元の状態に再構築せよ』
Translation: "DELIVER THE SIM CARD TO AOI AND PERFORM MEMORY SYNC. RESTORE THE UNIVERSE TO ITS ORIGINAL CODE."
KR: "아오이에게 SIM 카드를 전달해 기억을 동기. 세계를 원상태로 재구축하라."

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから、勝手に要求されても――！」
Translation: "Look, I can't help you, okay?!"

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: 扉を引っぺがし、バールをバットに持ち替えて、美雪は寄りかかるように扉に立ちふさがった。
Translation: Miyuki rips the door off its hinges, swaps out the crowbar for her bat, then positions herself in the doorway.
KR: 문을 부수고 빠루를 방망이로 든 채 미유키는 문을 가로막았다.

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: もう、逃げ場はなかった。
Translation: I'm trapped...

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お、お願いだ……もう、やめてくれ！」
Translation: "P-Please... just stop!"

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どうしてこんなことを……？」
Translation: "Why are you doing this...?"

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あはっ、あは、あははははははははは…………ッ！！」
Translation: "Haha... haha... hahahahahahahahahaha...!!!"

Name: e1154c.nss
Japanese: 俺の問いかけに、美雪は狂ったように笑いだす。
Translation: Miyuki laughs maniacally.

Name: e1154c.nss
