Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どうして？　どうしてですって？」
Translation: "Why? Why, you ask?"

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんなの、決まってるじゃない」
Translation: "Isn't it obvious?"

Name: e1154c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君が、私を、愛してくれないからよ」
Translation: "Because YOU won't love me."

Name: e1154d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どうして君は、私の愛に応えてくれないの？」
Translation: "Why won't YOU return my affection?"
KR: "어째서 당신은 내 사랑에 답해주지 않는 거야?"

Name: e1154d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私、こんなに君を愛してるのよ！」
Translation: "I love YOU so much!"

Name: e1154d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「愛しているのに、殺さなきゃならないのよ！！」
Translation: "So much, I have to kill YOU!"

Name: e1154d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「愛してる人を、何度も、何度も何度も何度もッ！！」
Translation: "I have to kill the person I love, over and over and over and over!!!"
KR: "사랑하는 사람을 몇 번이고, 몇 번이고, 몇 번이고, 몇 번이고!!!"

Name: e1154d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう私、頭がおかしくなっちゃいそうなのッ！！」
Translation: "I'm losing my fucking mind!!!"
KR: "이제 나 머리가 이상해져 버릴 것 같아!!"

Name: e1154d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ、君は……」
Translation: "Please..."

Name: e1154d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私を助けてくれないの？」
Translation: "Won't YOU help me?"

Name: e1155.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ、こんなの……やめましょう？」
Translation: "Come on... Let's stop all this."

Name: e1155.nss
Japanese: 目の前に、何故か俯く美雪の姿が――
Translation: Miyuki hangs her head.

Name: e1155.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう、絶対、逃げられないんだよ？」
Translation: "You know you'll never escape from me."

Name: e1155.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「諦めて、私にキス、して……」
Translation: "So just give up... and kiss me..."

Name: e1155.nss
Japanese: "キスする","キスしない"
Translation: "Kiss her","Don't kiss her"

Name: e1155a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんなこと言わないで……」
Translation: "Come on, don't be like that..."

Name: e1155a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「お願い……
　私にキス、して……」
Translation:
"Please...
Just... kiss me..."

Name: e1155a.nss
Japanese: "キスする","キスしない"
Translation: "Kiss her","Don't kiss her"

Name: e1155b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんなこと言わないで……」
Translation: "Come on, don't be like that..."

Name: e1155b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「お願い……
　私にキス、して……！」
Translation:
"Please...
Just... kiss me...!"

Name: e1155b.nss
Japanese: "キスする","キスしない"
Translation: "Kiss her","Don't kiss her"

Name: e1155c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんなこと言わないで……」
Translation: "Come on, don't be like that..."

Name: e1155c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「お願い…………
　私にキス、して……！！」
Translation:
"Please...
Just... KISS ME...!!!"

Name: e1155c.nss
Japanese: "キスする","キスしない"
Translation: "Kiss her","Don't kiss her"

Name: e1155d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんなこと言わないで……」
Translation: "Come on, don't be like that..."

Name: e1155d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「お願い……なの……
　私にキス、して……！！」
Translation:
"Please... I'm begging you...
Just... KISS ME...!!!"

Name: e1155d.nss
Japanese: "キスする","キスしない"
Translation: "Kiss her","Don't kiss her"

Name: e1155e.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんなこと言わないで……」
Translation: "Come on, don't be like that..."

Name: e1155e.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「お願い……なの……！
　私にキス、して……！！」
Translation:
"Please... I'm begging you...!
Just... KISS ME...!!!"

Name: e1155e.nss
Japanese: "キスする","キスしない"
Translation: "Kiss her","Don't kiss her"

Name: e1155f.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんなこと……言わないで……」
Translation: "Come on... Don't be like that..."

Name: e1155f.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「お願い……なの……！
　私にキス、してよ……！！」
Translation:
"Please... I'm begging you...!
Just... KISS ME ALREADY...!!!"

Name: e1155f.nss
Japanese: "キスする","キスしない"
Translation: "Kiss her","Don't kiss her"

Name: e1155g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんなこと言わないで……お願いだから……」
Translation: "Come on... Don't be like that... I'm begging you..."

Name: e1155g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「お願い……だから……ねえ……！！
　私にキス、して……ください……！！」
Translation:
"Please... I'm begging you... PLEASE...!!!
Just... KISS ME ALREADY!!! PLEASE!!!"

Name: e1155g.nss
Japanese: "キスする","キスしない"
Translation: "Kiss her","Don't kiss her"

Name: e1155h.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「こんなに……」
Translation: "I'm begging you..."

Name: e1155h.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「こんなに、お願いしてるのに……」
Translation: "Can't you see how desperate I am?"

Name: e1155h.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どうしても……だめ、なの？」
Translation: "And yet... you still refuse...?"

Name: e1155h.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そこまでして……アオイに会いたいの？」
Translation: "You really... want to be with Aoi that badly...?"

Name: e1155h.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だったら……」
Translation: "Well, in that case..."

Name: e1155h.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「その気なら、私にだって考えがあるわ」
Translation: "If that's how you feel, then two can play at that game."

Name: e1155h.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「変えてやる！」
Translation: "I'll change that!"

Name: e1155h.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ゲームと同じに、このセカイを変えて――！！」
Translation: "I'll alter this world just like I altered the game!!!"

Name: e1155h.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイを、完全に、消してあげる！！」
Translation: "I'll erase Aoi!!! Completely!!!"

Name: e1155h.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お……おい、美雪？」
Translation: "Uh... Miyuki...?"

Name: e1155h.nss
Japanese: 俺の呼びかけも聞かず、美雪は外へと飛び出してしまう。
Translation: Miyuki ignores me and dashes out of the house.
KR: 미유키는 내 목소리도 무시한 채 밖으로 뛰쳐나갔다.

Name: e1155h.nss
Japanese: 突然泣き出したと思ったら、いったいどうしたんだ？
Translation: What's going on with her? Why'd she burst into tears?
KR: 갑자기 울기 시작하더니, 도대체 왜 저러는 거지?

Name: e1155h.nss
Japanese: 言っていることも支離滅裂だったし……
Translation: Nothing she said made any sense...

Name: e1155h.nss
Japanese: 俺は――
Translation: I decide to—

Name: e1155h.nss
Japanese: "美雪を捜しに行く","アオイを捜しに行く"
Translation: "Look for Miyuki","Look for Aoi"

Name: e1155i.nss
Japanese: あれ？
Translation: Wait, what?

Name: e1155i.nss
Japanese: 俺は何をしていたんだ……？
Translation: What was I doing just now...?

Name: e1155i.nss
Japanese: ああ、そうだ！
Translation: Oh, that's right!

Name: e1155i.nss
Japanese: 俺が外に出ようとしている理由、それは――
Translation: I was going outside to—
KR: 내가 밖을 나가려 하는 이유, 그것은...

Name: e1155i.nss
Japanese: "美雪を捜しに行く","アオイを捜しに行く"
Translation: "Look for Miyuki","Look for Aoi"

Name: e1156a.nss
Japanese: 突然おかしなことを言い出した美雪が心配だった。
Translation: After all that crazy stuff she said, I'm worried about Miyuki.
KR: 갑자기 이상한 말을 꺼낸 미유키가 걱정되었다.

Name: e1156a.nss
Japanese: 俺は彼女を追いかけ、家の外へ――
Translation: And so I follow her out of the house—

Name: e1156b.nss
Japanese: アオイを捜しに――？
Translation: ...Look for Aoi?

Name: e1156b.nss
Japanese: いや、おかしいだろ？
Translation: That can't be right.

Name: e1156b.nss
Japanese: だって、アオイはゲームの中の存在だ。
Translation: Aoi's a video game character!

Name: e1156b.nss
Japanese: この現実に、存在するわけがない。
Translation: There's no way she exists in real life!

Name: e1156b.nss
Japanese: いや、つまり捜しに行くってのは、「フィギュアや抱き枕なんかのアオイを探しに行く」ってことか？
Translation: I guess I could go look for an Aoi figure, or an Aoi pillowcase...
KR: 그럼 찾으러 간다는 건 '아오이 피규어나 다키마쿠라를 찾으러 간다'는 건가...?

Name: e1156b.nss
Japanese: 確かにそれなら、美雪がいない今がチャンス……というのもわからなくはないけれど。
Translation: And since Miyuki's gone, this is my one chance to get my hands on some merch...
KR: 그렇다면 미유키가 없는 지금이 찬스일지도 모른다.

Name: e1156b.nss
Japanese: 今、気にかけなければならないことは、他にある。
Translation: But that's not important right now.
KR: 하지만 지금 신경 써야 할 것은 따로 있다.

Name: e1156b.nss
Japanese: それは――
Translation: No, my top priority is to—

Name: e1156b.nss
Japanese: "美雪を捜しに行く","アオイを捜しに行く"
Translation: "Look for Miyuki","Look for Aoi"

Name: e1156c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああっ、クソッ！」
Translation: "Aargh! Goddamn it!"

Name: e1156c.nss
Japanese: なんなんだ、この感情は！？
Translation: Why do I feel like this?!

Name: e1156c.nss
Japanese: こんなことしてる場合じゃないってのはわかってる。
Translation: I know I'm just wasting time.
KR: 이럴 때가 아니라는 건 알고 있어.

Name: e1156c.nss
Japanese: わかってるんだけど――アオイを探しに行かなきゃダメだって強迫観念が俺を襲う。
Translation: And yet... I feel this weird, compulsive urge to look for Aoi...!
KR: 알고 있지만... 아오이를 찾으러 가야 한다는 강박관념이 나를 엄습한다.

Name: e1156c.nss
Japanese: 展開も脈絡も関係なく、俺は、そうしなきゃならない。
Translation: It makes absolutely no sense... but I feel compelled to do it anyway!
KR: 전개도 맥락도 상관없어... 나는 그래야만 해!

Name: e1156c.nss
Japanese: こうなったら、フィギュアでもなんでもいい。
Translation: Fine, whatever! Let's go buy a figure, I guess!

Name: e1156c.nss
Japanese: 一刻も早くアオイを探すしかないだろう。
Translation: My only choice is to find Aoi as fast as possible!

Name: e1156c.nss
Japanese: 腹をくくり、俺は玄関から外へ――
Translation: I take a deep breath, then head for the door—

Name: e1157.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "......Wait, what the?"

Name: e1157.nss
Japanese: いつも履いているはずの靴が、玄関にない。
Translation: My shoes are missing.

Name: e1157.nss
Japanese: 慌てて靴箱を開き、一番奥まであさってようやく、いつも履いているものを見つけ出すことができた。
Translation: I hastily dig through the shoeboxes in the closet, and eventually I find them—all the way in the back.
KR: 부랴부랴 신발장을 열고 가장 안쪽까지 뒤져서 늘 신던 신발을 찾아냈다.

Name: e1157.nss
Japanese: いちいち丁寧に靴箱にしまうなんて……
Translation: I can't believe Miyuki went out of her way to put them all the way back here...

Name: e1157.nss
Japanese: 几帳面な美雪らしい。
Translation: As usual, she's a total neat freak...

Name: e1157.nss
Japanese: さて、家を出たまではいいのだが。
Translation: Okay, now I'm outside.

Name: e1157.nss
Japanese: 果たしてどちらの方向に向かえば良いのだろう？
Translation: But where do I go from here?

Name: e1157.nss
Japanese: もちろん、あてなんて全くない――
Translation: I have no set destination in mind—
KR: 물론 목적지 같은 건 전혀 없다.

Name: e1157.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Translation: "...Shinichi?"

Name: e1157.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「お、おい！　心一か？　心一だよな！？」
Translation: "H-Hey! Is that you?! It is!"

Name: e1157.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お……雄太郎！　いいところに！」
Translation: "Oh, hey, Yuutarou! Perfect timing!"

Name: e1158a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪、どこにいるか知らないか！？」
Translation: "Have you seen Miyuki anywhere?!"

Name: e1158a.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「曽根さん？
　彼女なら、さっき学校の前ですれ違った――」
Translation:
"Sone-san?
I just saw her out in front of the school—"
KR: "소네 씨? 소네 씨라면 아까 학교 앞에서 지나쳤는데..."

Name: e1158a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「学校だな！　サンキュー」
Translation: "The school! Got it! Thanks, buddy!"

Name: e1158a.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「あ、ちょっと心一！　お前怪我は――」
Translation: "Wh... HEY! Shinichi! What about your injuries?!"

Name: e1158a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「怪我？　ぴんぴんしてるって！」
Translation: "What injuries? I'm fit as a fiddle!"

Name: e1158a.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「でも、事故に――」
Translation: "But what about the car accident—?!"

Name: e1158a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「悪い！　また後でな！」
Translation: "Sorry! We'll catch up later!"

Name: e1158a.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Translation: "H-Hey—!"

Name: e1158a.nss
Japanese: 後ろから呼び止められるが、話している時間はない。
Translation: No time to talk right now!

Name: e1158a.nss
Japanese: 途中、何人もの生徒とすれ違ったが、俺はそのたびに不思議そうな視線を向けられた気がする。
Translation: I pass a few students on my way, earning more than a few strange looks as I do.
KR: 가는 길에 학생 몇 명과 마주쳤는데 그때마다 이상한 시선을 받은 것 같다.

Name: e1158a.nss
Japanese: それに、少し走っただけで息切れが止まらない。
Translation: I gotta say, I probably shouldn't be this out of breath already...
KR: 게다가 조금 달렸을 뿐인데 숨이 찬다.

Name: e1158a.nss
Japanese: こんなことなら、もっと身体を鍛えるんだった。
Translation: I need to start an exercise routine or something...
KR: 이럴 거면 몸을 미리 단련해 놓을걸...

Name: e1158a.nss
Japanese: 夕陽の落ちる廊下を走り抜け、教室へ――
Translation: As the sun sets outside, I dash down the hallway to the classroom—

Name: e1158a.nss
Japanese: だが、教室に美雪の姿は見当たらない。
Translation: —but she's not there.
KR: 그러나 교실에는 미유키의 모습이 보이지 않는다.

Name: e1158a.nss
Japanese: ということは――
Translation: Which means—

Name: e1158a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪！」
Translation: "Miyuki!"

Name: e1158a.nss
Japanese: 屋上の扉を開ける。
Translation: I open the door to the roof.

Name: e1158a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "There you are..."

Name: e1158a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私を、追いかけて来てくれたの？」
Translation: "You came after me?"

Name: e1158a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それとも――」

Name: e1158a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「コレを、取り戻しに来たのかしら……？」
Translation: "Are you just here for THIS...?"

Name: e1158a.nss
Japanese: 美雪の手には、スマートフォンが握られていた。
Translation: Miyuki holds up her phone.

Name: e1158a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪……どうしたんだよ？」
Translation: "Miyuki... what's gotten into you?"

Name: e1158a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前、なんだかおかしい――」
Translation: "You're acting kinda weird—"

Name: e1161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「あ、あのさ！
　変なこと訊くと思うかもしれないけど――」
Translation:
"Hey, listen!
I know this is probably a weird question—"

Name: e1161.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「変なことって、今のお前が一番変――」
Translation: "Trust me, you're already acting plenty weird..."

Name: e1161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ、どこにいるか知ってるか？」
Translation: "Have you seen Aoi anywhere?"

Name: e1161.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「向日？」
Translation: "Mukou?"

Name: e1161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そう。向日アオイ」
Translation: "Yeah. Mukou Aoi."

Name: e1162.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「彼女なら、俺の家にいるけど」
Translation: "She's back at my place."

Name: e1162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What?"

Name: e1162.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: e1162.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「俺なんか、変なこと言ったか？」
Translation: "Is that strange?"

Name: e1162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いるって……どういうことだ？」
Translation: "What do you mean, she's... 'at your place'?"

Name: e1162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だって、ゲームのヒロインだろ？」
Translation: "She's a video game character, isn't she?"

Name: e1162.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ゲーム？　何の話だ？」
Translation: "Video game character? What are you talking about?"

Name: e1162.nss
Japanese: なんか、話が噛み合わないんだけど……
Translation: There appears to be some kind of communication breakdown happening here...
KR: 뭔가 말이 안 통하는 것 같은데...

Name: e1162.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「まあ、いい。向日に会いたいなら来いよ」
Translation: "Okay, whatever. If you wanna talk to Mukou, just come with me."

Name: e1162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ……ああ」
Translation: "O-Okay..."

Name: e1162.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「脚の方はもう大丈夫なのか？」
Translation: "How's your leg? Feeling better?"

Name: e1162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...My leg?"

Name: e1162.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「大怪我で入院したんだろ？」
Translation: "You were in the hospital, yeah?"

Name: e1162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「何の話だよそれ」
Translation: "What are you talking about?"

Name: e1162.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「なんのって……先生はそう言ってたぞ」
Translation: "What do you mean, what am I talking about? The teachers told us."

Name: e1162.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「曽根さんも、何度も見舞いに行ってるって」
Translation: "And Sone-san said she went to visit you a bunch of times."

Name: e1162.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はあ」

Name: e1163a.nss
Japanese: 確かに美雪とは同棲生活中だが、俺が入院しているはずはない。
Translation: Miyuki and I have been living together, but I definitely don't remember ever going to the hospital.
KR: 분명 미유키랑은 동거 중이지만, 내가 입원했던 적은 없다.

Name: e1163a.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎とは、しょっちゅう学校で馬鹿話をしているわけで……
Translation: And Yuutarou tends to tell crazy stories at school...
KR: 유우타로와는 항상 바보 같은 얘기를 하고 있어서...

Name: e1163a.nss
Japanese: 記憶でも混乱しているんだろうか？
Translation: Maybe his memories are just jumbled up right now?

Name: e1163a.nss
Japanese: そう考えると、アオイが雄太郎の家にいるというのも怪しいような……
Translation: I'm starting to think the whole 'Aoi's at my place' thing is a load of nonsense, too...
KR: 그러고 보니, 아오이가 유우타로네 있다는 것도 의심스럽다...

Name: e1163a.nss
Japanese: そもそもアオイは、ゲームの中の存在で……
Translation: I mean, Aoi's a fictional character...

Name: e1163a.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「心一、どうした？」
Translation: "What's the matter, Shinichi?"

Name: e1163a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや……なんでもない」
Translation: "Huh? Oh... It's nothing."

Name: e1163a.nss
Japanese: 俺は思考を混乱させながら、雄太郎についていく。
Translation: Perplexed, I reluctantly follow after him.

Name: e1163b.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「そんなに髪もヒゲも伸ばしちまって」
Translation: "Dude, look at your hair! And your beard!"

Name: e1163b.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「最初は誰かと思ったぞ」
Translation: "I never would've recognized ya!"

Name: e1163b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "My what...?"

Name: e1163b.nss
Japanese: 確かに……言われてみれば、随分伸びているようだ。
Translation: Now that he mentions it... My hair does feel pretty long...
KR: 확실히... 듣고 보니 꽤 길어진 것 같다.

Name: e1163b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あれ、おかしいな？」
Translation: "That's weird..."

Name: e1163b.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「お前、交通事故で頭でも打ったんじゃないのか？」
Translation: "Did you hit your head in the car accident or something?"

Name: e1163b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いやいや、ないない」
Translation: "No, no!"

Name: e1163b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ない……よな」
Translation: "At least... I don't think so..."

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: それから数分。
Translation: A few minutes later...

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎の家に辿り着く。
Translation: We arrive at Yuutarou's house.

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ギリギリ間に合ったか」
Translation: "Barely made it in time!"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「いらっしゃいま――あ、お兄ちゃん！」
Translation: "Welcome—Oh! Onii-chan!"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ただいま。向日は？」
Translation: "I'm home! Where's Mukou?"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「今あがって、後ろで着替えてます」
Translation: "She's getting changed in the back."

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ん、そっか」
Translation: "Oh, gotcha."

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「着替えてるって……？」
Translation: "Getting changed?"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「向日、ウチでバイトしてるんだ」
Translation: "She works here part-time."

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「なにせホラ、龍二郎の彼女だから」
Translation: "I mean, she's Ryuujirou's girlfriend, after all."

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「りゅう……じろう……？」
Translation: "Ryuu...jirou...?"

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 俺はまたしても、雄太郎の台詞の意味が理解できない。
Translation: Once again, I find I can't understand what Yuutarou's saying.
KR: 나는 또다시 유우타로의 말을 이해할 수 없었다.

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎が指さしているのは、ハルちゃん。
Translation: He's pointing at Haru-chan.

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: ハルちゃんが龍二郎とか、そんなわけ……
Translation: There's no way Haru-chan is Ryuujirou...!

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「あの……そちらは、どちらさまですか？」
Translation: "Umm... Who's that?"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「おいおい。演劇部の先輩だろ？
　なに初対面みたいに――」
Translation:
"Gimme a break! We're in the same club, aren't we?
Why are you acting like we've never met?"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「演劇部の……先輩、ですか？」
Translation: "We're... in the same club...?"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「心一！」
Translation: "Shinichi!"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「お前は貴重な男の浪漫倶楽部の部員だぞ」
Translation: "You're a valued member of the Boys and Dreams Club!"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「演劇部になんて取られてたまるか！」
Translation: "No way in hell am I letting the theatre club steal you!"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺が……演劇部じゃ、ない？」
Translation: "I'm... not in the theatre club...?"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ハルちゃん、本当か？」
Translation: "Haru-chan, is this true?"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「は、はい。間違い、ないんじゃないかと……」
Translation: "Y-Yeah... Definitely..."

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 記憶と証言が、食い違う。
Translation: My memories don't match their claims.

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 俺は騙されようとしているのか？
Translation: Are they just messing with me right now?

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: それとも、もしかして。
Translation: Or...

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 俺の記憶が、間違ってた？
Translation: Are my memories... wrong...?

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: と、店の奥から手を挙げてあらわれたのは――
Translation: Just then, a girl pops out from the back room, her hand raised in the air.
KR: 가게 안쪽에서 손을 들고 나타난 것은...

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きおくそうしつなの？」
Translation: "Do you have amnesia?"

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: アオイだった。
Translation: It's... Aoi.

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんで、アオイがここに？」
Translation: "The hell is Aoi doing here?"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「いや、だからうちのバイト――」
Translation: "Like I told you, she works here part-time—"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「じゃなくて！」
Translation: "That's not what I mean!"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「コイツ、ゲームのヒロインだろ……？」
Translation: "Isn't she a heroine in a visual novel...?!"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「冗談になってないぞ」
Translation: "If this is a joke, it ain't funny."

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「向日は俺たちのクラスメイトだ」
Translation: "Mukou's in our class, dude."

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「クラスメイト……？」
Translation: "She is...?"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はい」
Translation: "Got it!"

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 突然、アオイが天高く左手を挙げる。
Translation: Aoi raises her hand high into the air.
KR: 아오이는 갑자기 하늘 높이 손을 들었다.

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「くるの」
Translation: "Come with me."

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あっちなの」
Translation: "That way."

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: どうもアオイは、俺とふたりで話がしたいらしい。
Translation: Apparently Aoi wants to speak with me in private...
KR: 아무래도 아오이는 나랑 둘이서 얘기하고 싶은 모양이다.

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 彼女に促されるがまま、俺たちはコンビニを出た。
Translation: At her request, I follow her outside.

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 店の正面で、改めてアオイと向き合う。
Translation: Out in front of the store, she turns to face me.

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 見れば見るほど、ゲームのキャラクターそっくりだ。
Translation: The more I look at her, the more I'm sure of it—she's IDENTICAL to her video game self.

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おしえてほしいの」
Translation: "Explain something to me."

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どうしてしってるの？」
Translation: "How did you find out?"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「知ってるって、なにを？」
Translation: "Find what out?"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイの、しょうたい」
Translation: "My true identity."

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: やっぱり彼女は、ゲームのキャラクターなのか？
Translation: So she IS a video game character?

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おしえて。どうしてしってるの？」
Translation: "Tell me. How did you find out?"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どうしてって……お前、ゲームの中にいたし」
Translation: "What do you mean, how? You were right there in the game!"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ゲーム？」
Translation: "This game?"

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 彼女は俺に、スマートフォンを差し出す。
Translation: She pulls out her phone.

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 画面に映っているのは、あのゲーム。
Translation: The same visual novel is onscreen.

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: そしてゲームの中のアオイは――
Translation: And the Aoi in the game...

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 今目の前にいる、彼女とそっくりの姿――
Translation: ...looks identical to the Aoi right in front of me...

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What the...?"

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: ついさっきまで雲ひとつなかった夕空に、巨大な渦が巻いていた。
Translation: I look up to find dark storm clouds swirling in the sky above us where previously there had been only a sunset.
KR: 방금 전까지 구름 한 점 없었던 저녁 하늘에 거대한 소용돌이가 휘몰아치고 있었다.

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: それは、まるで小さな台風のようで――
Translation: Almost like a tiny typhoon, localized entirely over the school—

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カミサマ……！」

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: そう呟くなり、アオイは走り出している。
Translation: Aoi takes off running.

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、アオイ！　どこに――」
Translation: "What the?! Aoi?! Where are you—"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セカイのチュウシンなの」
Translation: "To the center of the universe!"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セカイが……アップデートされる」
Translation: "The universe is gonna get an update patch!"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アップデート？」
Translation: "An update patch?"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「かわるの」
Translation: "The world will change."

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「デンパが、カミサマにとどくと」
Translation: "Once God picks up the signal..."

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ゲームが、ゲンジツになるの」
Translation: "The game will become reality."

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: ――このセカイを変えてやる。
Translation: Miyuki's words echo in my ears.

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: そう、美雪は言った。
Translation: "I'll alter this world."

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: わからない……
Translation: I don't understand...

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: なにがホントで、なにが嘘なんだ……？
Translation: How can I tell fact from fiction...?

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: ゲームのヒロインだったアオイ。
Translation: Aoi was supposed to be a visual novel heroine.

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: だが、今、アオイは俺の目の前にいる。
Translation: But then I saw her with my own two eyes!
KR: 하지만 지금, 아오이는 내 눈앞에 있다.

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: これが夢だなんて、考えられない。
Translation: There's no way this is a dream.
KR: 이게 꿈이라는 생각은 할 수 없다.

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: とても、リアルな現実。
Translation: This is real life.

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: もし、もし、万が一。

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 昨日までの現実がゲームで。
Translation: If everything that happened up until yesterday was all just part of a video game...

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: そのゲームが、現実になるってことは。
Translation: And that video game "will become reality"...

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、アオイを――
Translation: Then that means...

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 現実から消そうとしてる？
Translation: Miyuki will erase Aoi from reality?

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 屋上に飛び出して、振り返る。
Translation: I dash out onto the roof and turn around.

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: そこには――
Translation: Standing at the center of the universe is—

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪！」
Translation: "Miyuki!"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイも、一緒なのね」
Translation: "And I see Aoi is with you."

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、デンワをかえす――」
Translation: "Miyuki, give me back the phone."

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「手遅れよ」
Translation: "It's too late."

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 美雪が通話ボタンを押す。
Translation: Miyuki presses the Call button.

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 電波が、空の彼方へ飛んでいく。
Translation: Her signal transmits beyond the furthest reaches of the sky.

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「これで、セカイはアップデートされる」
Translation: "With this, the universe will get an update patch."

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方は虚構の存在になるの」
Translation: "And you will be designated as fictional."

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、何を言っているのか。
Translation: The hell is she talking about?

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: わからない。
Translation: I don't get it.

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: わかりたく、ない。
Translation: I don't WANT to get it!

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: でも――
Translation: But...

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 彼女の言葉から推測すると、つまり――
Translation: Judging from everything she's saying—

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前……俺を、騙してたのか？」
Translation: "Did you trick me...?"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そう」
Translation: "I did."

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私は、貴方を騙してた」
Translation: "I was lying to you the whole time."

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 美雪の瞳が、遙か遠くを見つめる。
Translation: She gazes far into the distance.
KR: 미유키의 눈동자가 아득히 먼 곳을 응시한다.

Name: e1164.nss
Japanese: 俺には到底、理解できない視線。
Translation: I don't understand what she's looking at.
KR: 나에게는 도저히 이해할 수 없는 시선.

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「プログラミングなんて、初めてだったから」
Translation: "It was my first time programming anything."

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「慣れるまで、時間が欲しかったの」
Translation: "And I needed time to figure it out."

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから、貴方を監禁するところから始めたわ」
Translation: "So I started by taking you captive."

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "You what...?"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「カミサマにお願いして、現実と虚構の区別がつかなくなる薬を作ったの」
Translation: "With God's help, I made a drug that could blur the lines between fiction and reality."
KR: "신님한테 부탁해서, 현실과 허구를 구별할 수 없게 되는 약을 만들었어."

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「眠くなって、朦朧として」
Translation: "Remember all those times you'd suddenly get sleepy?"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方はゲームの中の出来事を、現実と誤認した」
Translation: "You mistook the events of the game for events in real life."

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんで、そんな……ふざけんな！」
Translation: "Why would you do that...? Is this some kind of joke?!"

Name: e1164.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふざけて監禁なんて、できると思う？」
Translation: "You really think I would hold you captive as a joke?"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: アオイは、自重を支えきれない。
Translation: Aoi struggles to support her own weight.

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: 俺に寄りかかり、なんとか立っていられる状態だ。
Translation: She leans against me to stay upright.
KR: 나에게 기대어 어떻게든 서 있는 상태다.

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「消えかけてる……」
Translation: "You're vanishing...!"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そう」
Translation: "Yeah..."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい美雪！　アオイをなんとか――」
Translation: "Miyuki! You gotta help her!"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「むだなの」
Translation: "It's too late."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「もう、ゲームオーバーなの」
Translation: "This is game over."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「バイバイなの」
Translation: "Bye-bye."

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: そう呟くアオイの声は。
Translation: As she whispers, I realize...

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: まるで他人事のように無感情で。
Translation: Her voice is emotionless, as if she doesn't even care.
KR: 마치 남의 일을 말하는 것처럼 감정이 없었다.

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんで、突然諦めてるんだよ！？」
Translation: "You can't give up that quick!"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「こんなのおかしいだろ！」
Translation: "This isn't right!"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どうしてなの？」
Translation: "What makes you say that?"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どうしてって、それは――」
Translation: "W-Well—!"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、ゲームのヒロインだから」
Translation: "Aoi is a heroine in a visual novel."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「たくさんあるバッドエンドのひとつにあたった」
Translation: "And this is one of many bad endings."
KR: "수많은 배드 엔딩 중 하나에 걸린 거야."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ただ、それだけ」
Translation: "That's all there is to it."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「つぎのルートに、いけばいいの」
Translation: "Just gotta move on to the next route."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あれ？」
Translation: "What the?"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「バグ？」
Translation: "A glitch?"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「なんで、なみだがでるの？」
Translation: "Why is Aoi... crying...?"

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: 全く表情が動かないアオイの頬を、一筋の涙が流れる。
Translation: A single fat tear rolls down her blank, stoic face.
KR: 무표정인 아오이의 뺨에 한줄기 눈물이 흘렀다.

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そういうイベント？」
Translation: "Is this part of the scene?"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「へん……ふしぎ……」
Translation: "Weird... Really weird..."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、シンイチにあったのは、はじめて……」
Translation: "This is my first time meeting you..."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「はじめて……なの？　え？」
Translation: "...Or is it? Huh?"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いや……いや！　なに？」
Translation: "No... Oh god... What the?"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ビリビリ……デンパ……こんせんして……」
Translation: "The zappy... the signal... It's all mixed up..."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「こんなの……しらない……」
Translation: "Aoi doesn't... recognize this..."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きおく……なの……？」
Translation: "Are these... memories...?"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「べつルートの……？」
Translation: "From a different route...?"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "......Friends?"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイと……ミユキと……シンイチと……！」
Translation: "Me... and Miyuki... and Shinichi...!"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ともだち……さんにんで……いっしょに……」
Translation: "We were all... best friends... together..."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチと……あいしあって……それで……」
Translation: "Me and Shinichi... fell in love... and then..."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あ……あ……ああ……ああああ…………」
Translation: "Aah... aah... aaahh... aaaaaaahh..."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああああ」
Translation: "AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHH!"

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: 振り絞るようなアオイの悲鳴が、世界を満たした。
Translation: Aoi's scream shakes the entire world.
KR: 아오이의 쥐어짜낸 비명소리가 세계를 가득 채웠다.

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いや、いやだよう……！」
Translation: "No! NOOO...!"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きえたくない……！」
Translation: "Don't erase me...!"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ……きえたくない……」
Translation: "Aoi doesn't... want to disappear..."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「せっかく……シンイチと……あえて……」
Translation: "After... meeting... you..."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ほんとうに……ひとを、スキになって……」
Translation: "Aoi learned... the meaning... of true love..."

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: 縋るアオイの言葉は、しかしもう、消えかけで。
Translation: She clings to me, but her words are fading fast.
KR: 그러나 애원하는 아오이의 말은 거의 사라졌다.

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "MIYUKI!"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「後戻りはできないわ」
Translation: "There's no going back."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だからなんなんだよ！　こんなのおかしいだろ！」
Translation: "Why the hell are you doing this?! This is fucked up!"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そう。私は間違ってる」
Translation: "Sure is. And I'm fucked up, too."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でも――間違ってるのは、君も同じ」
Translation: "But... so are YOU."

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: 俺も……？
Translation: I'M fucked up...?

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あの夜誓った永遠の愛――」
Translation: "YOU pledged YOUR eternal love to me that night..."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それを、君は破ったの」
Translation: "But now YOU'VE broken YOUR vow."

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: あの夜誓った永遠の愛――？
Translation: I pledged my eternal love...?

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: 美雪は一体、なにを言ってるんだ？
Translation: What is she TALKING about?

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: そんな記憶、俺には――
Translation: I don't remember anything like that—

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おぼえてる？」
Translation: "Do you still remember?"

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: 掠れた声――
Translation: Her voice is barely a whisper.

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: 聞き取るのさえやっとの声で、アオイは囁く。
Translation: It takes everything I have just to make out the words.

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Remember what?"

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「コールナンバー」
Translation: "My code number."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキのスマフォに……いれて……」
Translation: "Put it... in Miyuki's phone..."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイを……よび……もどして……」
Translation: "And... bring me... back..."

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「呼び戻す……？　なんのこと――」
Translation: "Bring you back? What are you t—"

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: アオイが懸命に唇を開く。
Translation: Aoi struggles to open her mouth.

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: なにかを伝えようとする。
Translation: She's trying to tell me something...

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: けれども、彼女の言葉は――
Translation: But her voice is...

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: 身体ごと、消えかけていて。
Translation: ...vanishing along with the rest of her.

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: 唇だけが、微かに動く。
Translation: Her lips twitch slightly.

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: ――すき。
Translation: —Aoi loves you.

Name: e1165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ！　アオイ――――ッ！！」
Translation: "Aoi! AOIIIII—!!!"

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: 俺の呼びかけは、虚空に響くだけ。
Translation: My scream echoes in vain.
KR: 그러나 그 외침은 허공에 울릴 뿐.

Name: e1165.nss
Japanese: アオイが、このセカイから、消えた。
Translation: She's just... gone.

Name: e1165a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Please work!!!"

Name: e1165a.nss
Japanese: "普通に入力した","知らないはずのコード入力した"
Translation: "Enter it normally","Enter a code I shouldn't know"

Name: e1165b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ごめんなさい。でも――」
Translation: "Sorry, but..."

Name: e1165b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう、これしか、方法がないの……」
Translation: "This is my only option..."

Name: e1165b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方と幸せになるためには、これしか……」
Translation: "This is the only way we can be happy together..."

Name: e1165b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「本当か？」
Translation: "Is it?"

Name: e1165b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "What?"

Name: e1165b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「本当にこれで……幸せなのか？」
Translation: "Is this happiness to you?"

Name: e1165b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もちろん！　だって――」
Translation: "Of course it is! I mean—"

Name: e1165b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「嘘つけ」
Translation: "Liar."

Name: e1165b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前の演技は、俺には通じない」
Translation: "Your acting skills won't work on me."

Name: e1165b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Shinichi...?"

Name: e1165b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「声、震えてる」
Translation: "Your voice is shaking."

Name: e1165b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんなこと――！」
Translation: "No it's not!"

Name: e1165b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ある」
Translation: "Yes it is."

Name: e1165b.nss
Japanese: 俺は静かに、ハシゴを上った。
Translation: I quietly climb up the ladder.

Name: e1165b.nss
Japanese: 僅かに目を逸らしている美雪。
Translation: Miyuki averts her gaze.

Name: e1165b.nss
Japanese: 真正面から、彼女に向き合う。
Translation: I walk right up to her.

Name: e1165b.nss
Japanese: 俺には真実が何か、わからない。
Translation: I don't know what to believe.

Name: e1165b.nss
Japanese: 判断する材料さえない。
Translation: I have no way to discern the truth.

Name: e1165b.nss
Japanese: でも、はっきりとわかることがある。
Translation: But there's one thing I do know.
KR: 하지만 확실히 알게 된 것이 있다.

Name: e1165b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪」
Translation: "Miyuki."

Name: e1165b.nss
Japanese: 一歩ずつ、彼女に近づく。
Translation: Step by step, I approach her.

Name: e1165b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Shinichi...?"

Name: e1165b.nss
Japanese: 少しずつ、少しずつ。
Translation: Another step. Then another.

Name: e1165b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「何を……考えて……」
Translation: "What are you thinking...?"

Name: e1165b.nss
Japanese: 心臓の高鳴りを必死に抑え。
Translation: I will my heart not to pound out of control.

Name: e1165b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Shin...ichi...?"

Name: e1165b.nss
Japanese: ゆっくりと、彼女に身体を寄せて――
Translation: Gently, I pull her close.

Name: e1165b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いい、よ」
Translation: "Go ahead."

Name: e1165b.nss
Japanese: 瞳を閉じた、美雪の――
Translation: Miyuki closes her eyes—

Name: e1165b.nss
Japanese: その手から、スマートフォンを奪い取った。
Translation: —and I snatch the phone out of her hand.

Name: e1165b.nss
Japanese: そのまま、逃げる――！
Translation: Time to make a run for it!

Name: e1165b.nss
Japanese: 美雪が目を閉じている今のうちに――！
Translation: Quick, while she still has her eyes closed!

Name: e1165b.nss
Japanese: 彼女が見失うところまで――！！
Translation: I'll run until she can't find me anymore!!!

Name: e1165b.nss
Japanese: 心の中で、美雪に謝りながら。
Translation: As I apologize internally to Miyuki—

Name: e1165b.nss
Japanese: 俺は一目散に、階段を駆け下りる。
Translation: —I bolt full-speed down the stairs.

Name: e1165c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……あらら」
Translation: "...Oh dear."

Name: e1165c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私を、騙したのね」
Translation: "You tricked me."

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 好きで騙したわけじゃない。
Translation: I didn't trick you for the fun of it, believe me!

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: でも――
Translation: But...

Name: e1165c.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いや、いやだよう……！」
Translation: "No! NOOO...!"

Name: e1165c.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きえたくない……！」
Translation: "Don't erase me...!"

Name: e1165c.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ……きえたくない……」
Translation: "Aoi doesn't... want to disappear..."

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 美雪は、アオイを、このセカイから消した。
Translation: Miyuki erased Aoi from reality.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 何があったか、何故そんなことができるのか、俺にはサッパリわからないけど――
Translation: I don't know what happened... or how she was able to do it in the first place...
KR: 무슨 일이 벌어졌는지, 어떻게 그렇게 했는지 전혀 모르겠지만...

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: それが、見逃していいことのはずがない。
Translation: ...but I can't just let it slide.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 美雪は間違っている。
Translation: Miyuki is messed up.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 俺は、彼女の幼馴染みで、恋人で。
Translation: But she's an old friend of mine... and my girlfriend.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: だから、その間違いは、正さなければならない。
Translation: Which means I have to be the one to fix this.

Name: e1165c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「騙したんだから――」
Translation: "Seeing as you tricked me..."

Name: e1165c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「お仕置きをしなきゃならないわね」
Translation: "I guess that means you'll need to be punished."

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: そんなのはゴメンだ。
Translation: I'll pass, thanks!

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: さっさと学校を出て――
Translation: Now to leave the school—

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 学校に入ったときは開いていたはずの扉。
Translation: I know these doors were open when I came in...
KR: 학교에 들어갈 때는 열려 있었던 문이...

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: それが、何故か全て閉まっていた。
Translation: But now they're all closed for some reason...

Name: e1165c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「何処に逃げるの？」
Translation: "Where do you think you're going?"

Name: e1165c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「逃げ場なんて、何処にもないのに」
Translation: "Please. There's nowhere to run."

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: そんなわけがない。
Translation: Sure there is.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 昇降口がだめでも、別の――
Translation: If I can't get out through the front, I'll just have to—

Name: e1165c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「みつけた」
Translation: "Found you."

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: おかしい――！
Translation: This can't be right!

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: こっちは、こんなに急いで走っているのに。
Translation: I'm running like my life depends on it...

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 美雪は息を切らせる素振りさえ見えないのに。
Translation: ...but she's not even out of breath!

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: なんで……？
Translation: How...?

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: どうして……？

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: こんな簡単に、追いつかれてしまうんだ？
Translation: How did she catch up to me so easily?

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 歪む世界を、駆け抜ける。
Translation: I dash through my twisted world.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 手のひらに、美雪のスマフォを握りしめて。
Translation: Clutching Miyuki's phone in my hand.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: だが、逃げられない。
Translation: But I can't escape.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 裏口――体育館――渡り廊下――
Translation: The back entrance... The gym... The connecting corridor...

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: どのドアにも、鍵がかかっている。
Translation: They're all locked up tight.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 窓を開けようとしても、なぜか開かない。
Translation: And the windows won't open, either.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 逃げ出せるスペースがない。
Translation: There's no way out.

Name: e1165c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「無駄よ」
Translation: "It's no use."

Name: e1165c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「出口は全て封鎖したわ」
Translation: "I've sealed all the exits."

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: そんなことはあり得ない。
Translation: That's impossible.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: そのはずなのに、現に、出口が――ない。
Translation: And yet... sure enough, I'm trapped here.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 美雪の声は、どこまでも追いかけてきて。
Translation: Miyuki's voice finds me no matter where I go.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 遠近感が、掴めない。
Translation: I have no sense of distance anymore.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 何処に逃げても、目の前の暗がりから、ふと美雪が姿を現しそうな錯覚。
Translation: No matter where I run, I can practically see Miyuki looming up ahead.
KR: 아무리 도망가도 미유키가 불쑥 눈앞에 나타날 것 같은 착각.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: いや――
Translation: No...

Name: e1165c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「無駄だって」
Translation: "I told you, it's no use."

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 俺は慌てて踵を返した。
Translation: I hastily turn back.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 全く急いでいる素振りはないのに、なぜか美雪は先回りしている。
Translation: Miyuki doesn't seem to be in the slightest hurry, and yet she beats me to the punch every time.
KR: 전혀 서두르는 기색이 없는데도 미유키는 나보다 먼저 와있었다.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: このままじゃ逃げ切れない――！
Translation: At this rate, I'll never escape her!

Name: e1165c.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「コールナンバー」
Translation: "My code number."

Name: e1165c.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキのスマフォに……いれて……」
Translation: "Put it... in Miyuki's phone..."

Name: e1165c.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイを……よび……もどして……」
Translation: "And... bring me... back..."

Name: e1165c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...That's it!"

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 無理に、逃げ出す必要は無いのだ。
Translation: I don't NEED to run!

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 俺の目的は、アオイをセカイに呼び戻すこと。
Translation: My objective is to bring Aoi back to reality.
KR: 내 목표는 아오이를 세계로 다시 불러오는 것.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: だったら、電話をかけるだけの時間が稼げればいい！
Translation: So I just need to buy some time until I can make a phone call!
KR: 그렇다면 전화를 걸 시간만 있어도 돼!

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 目についた半開きの扉。
Translation: A half-open door catches my eye.
KR: 반쯤 열린 교실 문이 눈에 들어왔다.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 教室に飛び込むと、極力音がしないように扉を閉める。
Translation: I dash into the classroom and carefully close the door so it doesn't make a sound.
KR: 서둘러 교실로 들어가 소리가 나지 않도록 문을 닫았다.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 自分のクラスではない。
Translation: This isn't our classroom.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 今まで一度も入ったことのない、１年生の教室。
Translation: It's a first-year classroom, one that I've never set foot in.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 入る瞬間は、美雪に見られていないはずだ。
Translation: Now that I'm in here, Miyuki shouldn't be able to see me.
KR: 내가 들어가는 걸 미유키는 볼 수 없었을 터.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: アオイに電話をかけるだけの時間はある――
Translation: Which means I should have time to call Aoi—

Name: e1165c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私には貴方の行動が」
Translation: "I know you, Shinichi."

Name: e1165c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「手に取るようにわかるの」
Translation: "And I can predict your every move."

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 美雪の足音は、揺るぎない。
Translation: Miyuki's footsteps persist.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: なぜだ？
Translation: How?

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: どうして美雪は、俺がこの階にいることを？
Translation: How does she know what floor I'm on?
KR: 어떻게 내가 이 층에 있는 걸 아는 거지?

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: まるで本当に、行く先を知っているように――
Translation: It's almost like she knows where I'll go in advance...
KR: 마치 정말로 내가 갈 곳을 알고 있는 것처럼...

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: いや、考え事をしている暇はない。
Translation: Wait, what am I doing? I don't have time to worry about that!

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 俺は教卓の陰に隠れ、美雪のスマフォを取り出した。
Translation: I hide behind the teacher's lectern and take out Miyuki's phone.
KR: 나는 교탁 밑에 숨어 미유키의 스마트폰을 꺼냈다.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: 消えてしまう直前、アオイが求めたコールナンバー。
Translation: Before she disappeared, she told me to use her code number.
KR: 사라지기 직전, 아오이가 부탁한 콜 넘버.

Name: e1165c.nss
Japanese: その数値は――
Translation: And that number is—

Name: e1166a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 「現在該当番号は使用されておりません」
Translation: "THE NUMBER YOU HAVE DIALED IS NOT IN SERVICE AT THIS TIME."

Name: e1166a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "You're kidding me..."

Name: e1166b.nss
Japanese: 俺の願いは、天に通じた。
Translation: Somehow, God answered my prayers.

Name: e1166b.nss
Japanese: まるで滑るように指が動き、俺の意思とは関係なく、その番号が入力され――
Translation: My fingers move on their own to input—
KR: 내 손가락은 내 의사와 상관없이 이리저리 번호를 입력해...

Name: e1166b.nss
Japanese: "チートコードを入力","アオイを呼び戻すコードを入力"
Translation: "A cheat code","Aoi's code number"

Name: e1167a.nss
Japanese: 俺には、正しい番号を入力したという確信があった。
Translation: I was confident that I'd put in the right number...

Name: e1167a.nss
Japanese: なのに、電話は、通じない。
Translation: ...but the call won't go through.

Name: e1167a.nss
Japanese: アオイは、帰ってこない。
Translation: Aoi's not coming back.

Name: e1167a.nss
Japanese: なのに――
Translation: And yet—

Name: e1167b.nss
Japanese: 思わず口から言葉が漏れる。
Translation: The words leave my lips unbidden.

Name: e1167b.nss
Japanese: が、それも当然だ。
Translation: But I should have expected this.

Name: e1167b.nss
Japanese: アオイの言うコールナンバーを、俺は知らない――
Translation: After all, I don't know what "code number" Aoi was talking about.

Name: e1167b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふふ、ふふふふ…………！！」
Translation: "Heheh... heheheheh..."

Name: e1167b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あはははははははは――――！！」
Translation: "AAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA—!!!"

Name: e1167b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「間違えちゃったの？」
Translation: "Did you get it wrong?"

Name: e1167b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイを呼び出す秘密の番号、忘れちゃったんだ！」
Translation: "Oh my god, you forgot Aoi's secret code number?"

Name: e1167b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「大事な大事な、アオイちゃんの誕生日なのに？」
Translation: "How could you forget your precious wittle Aoi-chan's birthday?"

Name: e1167b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Miyuki..."

Name: e1167b.nss
Japanese: 俺は今まで、そんなに喜ぶ美雪の笑顔を、見たことがあっただろうか？
Translation: I feel like this is the first time in my life I've ever seen Miyuki so... jubilant.
KR: 저렇게나 기뻐하는 미유키의 미소를 본 적은 한 번도 없었다.

Name: e1167b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いいわ。私が教えてあげる」
Translation: "Alright then. I'll tell you."

Name: e1167b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイを呼び出す、秘密のコールナンバー」
Translation: "Here it is..."

Name: e1167b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それは……」
Translation: "The secret number to bring Aoi back..."

Name: e1167b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「９をみっつに、０５２３――
　アオイの誕生日を繰り返す」
Translation:
"First, dial 999.
Then dial Aoi's birthday—0523—twice."
KR: "9를 세 번, 그리고 0523... 아오이의 생일을 반복해."

Name: e1167b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「どうしたの？　入れないの？
　せっかく、私が教えてあげたのに」
Translation:
"What's the matter? Not gonna type it in?
After I basically gift-wrapped it for you?"
KR: "왜 그래? 입력 안 해? 모처럼 내가 가르쳐줬는데."

Name: e1167b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いいわ。私が代わりに入れてあげる」
Translation: "Fine then. I'll put it in for you."

Name: e1167b.nss
Japanese: 美雪はスマートフォンを奪い取ると、俺にも画面が見える角度で、さっき口にした番号を入力する。
Translation: Miyuki takes the phone and holds it at an angle so I can watch her punch in the number she just told me.
KR: 미유키는 스마트폰을 뺏어 내게 보이도록 한 채, 아까 말한 번호를 입력했다.

Name: e1167b.nss
Japanese: 発信。
Translation: She hits the Call button.

Name: e1167b.nss
Japanese: だが――
Translation: But...

Name: e1167b.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 「現在該当番号は使用されておりません」
Translation: "THE NUMBER YOU HAVE DIALED IS NOT IN SERVICE AT THIS TIME."

Name: e1167b.nss
Japanese: 電話は、繋がらなかった。
Translation: The call won't go through.

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『チートコードの入力を確認』
Translation: "CHEAT CODE CONFIRMED."

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『セカイの強制的アップデートを準備』
Translation: "PREPARING TO FORCE-UPDATE THE UNIVERSE."

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アップデート……？」
Translation: "Update... the universe...?"

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「何をしたの！？」
Translation: "What have you DONE?!"

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese:
『改変は不可逆。
　一度アップデートすれば、通常プレイは不可能』
Translation:
"THIS UPDATE IS IRREVERSIBLE.
ONCE COMPLETE, REGULAR PLAY WILL BE DISABLED."
KR:
"변경은 불가역.
한번 업데이트하면 일반 플레이는 불가능."

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「まさか――」
Translation: "It can't be—"

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『警告。主体者が正常な体験を希望するなら、即時のゲーム終了を強く推奨』
Translation: "WARNING. SHOULD THE SUBJECT WISH TO EXPERIENCE THE WORLD AS INTENDED, IT IS STRONGLY ENCOURAGED TO CLOSE THE GAME IMMEDIATELY."
KR: "경고. 주체자가 정상적인 체험을 원한다면, 즉시 게임 종료할 것을 적극 권장."

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「チートコードを、入れたのね？」
Translation: "You put in the cheat code?"

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『再警告。即時のゲーム終了を強く推奨』
Translation: "AGAIN, IT IS STRONGLY ENCOURAGED TO CLOSE THE GAME IMMEDIATELY."
KR: "재경고. 즉시 게임 종료할 것을 강력히 권장."

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふざけないで……！」
Translation: "Give me a fucking break...!"

Name: e1167c.nss
Japanese: 俺の頭に、強い――衝撃……
Translation: Something slams into my skull...

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『カウントダウン開始』
Translation: "INITIATING COUNTDOWN."

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ほら！　主人公は死んだわ！」
Translation: "There! The protagonist is dead!"

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「デッドエンドよ！」
Translation: "It's a dead end!"

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから早く、ゲームを終了させなさい！」
Translation: "Now exit the game! Hurry!"

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「早く！　早く！」
Translation: "Do it! Now!"

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「お願いよ！　ねえ、なんで――？」
Translation: "Please! Why are YOU doing this?!"

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「こんな形で裏切られるなら――」
Translation: "If I'd known YOU'D betray me like this—"

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「話を中途半端に投げ出されて――」
Translation: "If I'd known YOU'D give up in the middle of the story—"

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私の記憶が奪われるくらいなら――」
Translation: "If I'd known I'd lose my memories—"

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私、いっそ君に嫌われた方が――」
Translation: "Then I would have rather YOU just—"

Name: e1167c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ずっと――ずっといい――！！」
Translation: "—HATED MY GUTS!!!"

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 想いが、願いが、空の彼方へ飛んでいく――
Translation: My prayer transmits beyond the farthest reaches of the sky—

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 空間に、穴が――
Translation: There's a tear in the fabric of space—

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: どこかともなく、生じ――
Translation: It opens out of nowhere—

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: やがて、侵食し――
Translation: —and begins to consume—

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 影が剥げ――
Translation: The shadows peel away—

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 色が消え――
Translation: The colors vanish—

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: ラフが踊り――
Translation: Sketches pitch and skew—

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 線がバラバラになり――
Translation: The lines fade away—

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: セカイが――
Translation: The whole world is—

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: バグっていく。
Translation: —starting to glitch—!

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 自動実行プログラムが、起動する。
Translation: The program launches automatically.

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 扉を開けて、教室へやってきた美雪。
Translation: The door opens, and Miyuki runs into the classroom.

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 彼女に、先ほどまでの余裕は全く見られなかった。
Translation: Her composure is completely gone.

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "No way...!"

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 俺を突き飛ばし、スマートフォンを奪い取る。
Translation: She shoves me and takes the phone.

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なんで……どうして……！？」

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 美雪が画面を凝視するが、しかし、スマートフォンの画面は間違いなく、何かのプログラムを実行していた。
Translation: Miyuki narrows her eyes. Sure enough, some program is running, right there on the screen.
KR: 미유키가 화면을 쳐다봐도 스마트폰에는 분명하게 어떤 프로그램이 실행되고 있었다.

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「こんなの……ありえない……
　絶対通じないように、細工してたのに……」
Translation:
"This... can't be happening...
I hacked it so it wouldn't go through...!"
KR: "이런 건... 말도 안 돼... 절대 안 통하도록 공들였는데...!"

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君がその情報を得る方法は、このゲームにはないはずなのに――！！」
Translation: "There's no way YOU could have gotten that information from anywhere in this game!!!"
KR: "당신이 그 정보를 얻을 방법은 이 게임에는 없을 텐데!!!"

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、血走った目で、俺を睨み付ける。
Translation: She glares at me with bloodshot eyes.

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ただの偶然……？　違うわ！」
Translation: "Is it just sheer coincidence...? It can't be!"

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイのコールナンバーは、誕生日をふたつ並べたもの」
Translation: "Aoi's code number lists her birthday twice."
KR: "아오이의 콜 넘버는 생일을 두 번 나열한 것."

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「４桁目の数字は、必ず、０か１になるはずよ」
Translation: "The 4th digit would have to be a 0 or 1."

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あれだけ、念を押されたんだもの」
Translation: "And YOU were told over and over..."

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「偶然、こんな番号を押すわけがない」
Translation: "So there's no way YOU'd put in this number by chance."

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 美雪の瞳が、悲しげに、伏せられた。
Translation: She lowers her gaze sadly.

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君は――２周目？」
Translation: "Is this YOUR second playthrough?"

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それとも、攻略サイトを見たの？」
Translation: "Or did YOU go read a walkthrough online?"

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうやって……私を、裏切ったの？」
Translation: "In the end... YOU betrayed me?"

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What...?"

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 美雪を裏切る？
Translation: How did I "betray" her?

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 俺はただ、彼女に過ちを犯して欲しくないだけで――
Translation: I just want her to do the right thing—
KR: 난 그저 미유키가 잘못을 저지르지 않길 바라는 마음뿐인데...

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうやって、ずっと、私を騙してたのね」
Translation: "YOU were tricking me the whole time, weren't you?"

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Miyuki...?"

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「私がただのゲームのキャラクターだから。
　この選択肢を選んだときの反応を見たいって」
Translation:
"Because I'm just some character in a video game?
You just wanted to see how I'd react, is that it?"
KR: "내가 그냥 게임 캐릭터라서? 이 선택지를 골랐을 때 반응을 보고 싶어서..."

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私を、弄んできたのね？」
Translation: "So you decided to screw around with me?"

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、そんなわけ――」
Translation: "What? That's n—"

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「許さないッ！！」
Translation: "I'll never forgive you for this!!!"

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 美雪がバットを振り上げる。
Translation: Miyuki swings her bat.

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 本気の瞳だ。
Translation: The look in her eyes is dead serious.

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 彼女は、俺を、殺す気だ。
Translation: She's seriously about to kill me.

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 咄嗟に、目蓋が閉じる。
Translation: Instinctively, I squeeze my eyes shut.

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 腕が頭を守り、身体が縮こまる。
Translation: I shrink down with my arms shielding my head.
KR: 나는 웅크린 채 팔로 머리를 막았다.

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: だが――
Translation: But...

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 電気が走り、崩れ落ちる音がした。
Translation: There's a jolt of electricity, and something hits the floor.
KR: 전기 충격, 그리고 무언가 떨어지는 소리.

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: それっきり、美雪の気配が消える。
Translation: I can't sense Miyuki there anymore.

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 慌てて目を開けると――
Translation: My eyes fly open again.

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイ？」
Translation: "Aoi?"

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop..."

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 床に崩れ落ちた美雪と――
Translation: Miyuki's collapsed on the floor—

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 教室から逃げるように外へ出る、人影。
Translation: —and someone else is fleeing the room.
KR: 교실에서 도망치듯 밖으로 나가는 한 사람.

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 床に倒れた美雪は、気絶しているだけのようだ。
Translation: I check Miyuki. Looks like she's just unconscious.

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 彼女の身体を壁に横たえて、俺はアオイの後を追う。
Translation: I prop her up against the wall, then hurry after Aoi.
KR: 나는 미유키를 벽에 기대어 놓고 교실 밖으로 나섰다.

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 早足で廊下を行くアオイを、慌てて追いかける。
Translation: Aoi speeds down the hall, and I chase after her.

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: その手には、美雪のスマートフォンが握られていた。
Translation: She's holding Miyuki's phone in her hand...
KR: 아오이는 손에 미유키의 스마트폰을 쥐고 있었다.

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「よかったな！　復活できたんだろ？」
Translation: "I'm glad you're back!"

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、アオイ？　聞こえてるのか？」
Translation: "Uh, Aoi? Are you listening?"

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょっと、待てって！」
Translation: "Wait up!"

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、お前のために頑張ったんだぞ！」
Translation: "I did this for you, you know!"

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「礼くらい、言ってくれても――」
Translation: "You could at least say thank you!"

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイってば！」
Translation: "Aoi!"

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 振り向くアオイの瞳には、涙が浮かんでいた。
Translation: Aoi looks back—with tears in her eyes.

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「かなしいから」
Translation: "Aoi's sad."

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「なみだがでるの」
Translation: "They're sad tears."

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "You're sad...?"

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイも、たくさん、べつのルートをみたから」
Translation: "Aoi's been through a bunch of other routes."

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキのきもちが、よくわかるの」
Translation: "So Aoi understands how Miyuki feels."

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うらぎられるかなしさが、よくわかるの」
Translation: "And Aoi understands the pain of betrayal."

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「キミは、チートをしたの」
Translation: "YOU cheated."

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「わたしたちのきもちを、ふみにじったの」
Translation: "YOU trampled all over our feelings."

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから――バツをあたえなきゃならないの」
Translation: "And now... YOU have to be punished."

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Punished?"

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おねがい、あるの」
Translation: "Aoi has a favor to ask."

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いまなら、まにあうの」
Translation: "It's not too late."

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「もし、キミがぐうぜん、このコードをいれたなら」
Translation: "If YOU really put that code in by accident..."

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ゲームをやりなおして」
Translation: "Start the game over."

Name: e1167d.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おねがい」
Translation: "Please."

Name: e1167d.nss
Japanese: 俺は、アオイの願いをよく理解できない。

「アオイは、シンイチが……
　だいすきなのにゃ……」
Translation:
"Aoi loves you...
so much, meow...!"

Name: e1213.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「楽しかった？」
Translation: "Having fun?"

Name: e1213.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「うお！」
Translation: "Whoa!"

Name: e1213.nss
Japanese: 突然背後から声がかかり、俺はビクンと飛び上がる。
Translation: I hear a sudden voice behind me and nearly jump out of my skin.
KR: 갑자기 등 뒤에서 말을 걸어서 깜짝 놀랐다.

Name: e1213.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「突然出てくるなよ！」
Translation: "Don't scare me like that!"

Name: e1213.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なによその言い方」
Translation: "Wow, rude much?"

Name: e1213.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイと会いたいって言うから、せっかく私のスマフォ、貸してあげたのに」
Translation: "And here I let you borrow my phone so you could spend a little time with Aoi."
KR: "아오이랑 만나고 싶다고 해서 기껏 내 스마트폰 빌려준 건데."

Name: e1213.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ、もしかしてエッチなシーンプレイしてたとか？」
Translation: "Oh, I get it... Were you in the middle of a sex scene or something?"

Name: e1213.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そ、そんなじゃないし！」
Translation: "N-No! Of course not!"

Name: e1213.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ホントに？」
Translation: "You sure about that?"

Name: e1213.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「ま、いいわ。
　今日は追及しないであげる」
Translation:
"Well, whatever.
I'll let you off easy today."

Name: e1213.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でも、コレでわかったでしょ？」
Translation: "Now you understand, right?"

Name: e1213.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「アオイは、ただのゲームのヒロイン。
　現実には存在しない」
Translation:
"Aoi is just a heroine in a visual novel.
She's not real."
KR: "아오이는 그저 게임 속 히로인. 현실에는 존재하지 않아."

Name: e1213.nss
Japanese: ……美雪、突然何を言い出すんだ？
Translation: ...Where did that come from?

Name: e1213.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そんなの、最初っからわかってるって」
Translation: "Well, yeah, obviously!"

Name: e1213.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ええ、そうよね」
Translation: "Good."

Name: e1213.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君のこと、信じてるわ」
Translation: "I trust YOU."

Name: e1213.nss
Japanese: 微笑んで、美雪は俺の肩をポンと叩いた。
Translation: She smiles and pats my shoulder.
KR: 미유키는 미소 지으면서 내 어깨를 살짝 두드렸다.

Name: e2011.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ……そうだ」
Translation: "Oh, that's right..."

Name: e2011.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今日は、私と君の特別な記念日なんだけど……」
Translation: "Today's a special day for me and YOU..."

Name: e2011.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「何の日か、知ってる？」
Translation: "Do YOU know what I'm referring to?"

Name: e2011.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え？　えっと……」
Translation: "Huh? Er..."

Name: e2011.nss
Japanese: カレンダーの日付を見るが、特に思い当たる節はない。
Translation: I check the date on the calendar, but I still have no clue...
KR: 나는 달력을 살펴보았지만, 딱히 짚이는 것이 없었다.

Name: e2011.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ああ、心一にはわからないわよね」
Translation: "Yeah, I wouldn't expect you to know, Shinichi."

Name: e2011.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今日は、君がここに来てから、ちょうど１週間なの」
Translation: "Today marks one week since YOU first arrived here."
KR: "오늘로 당신이 여기에 온 지 딱 일주일이야."

Name: e2011.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どう？　もう、この生活に慣れたかしら？」
Translation: "How do YOU like it? Have YOU acclimated to everything?"

Name: e2011.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Y-Yeah, I guess..."

Name: e2011.nss
Japanese: 美雪と同じ部屋で暮らして、最初の頃は色々結構戸惑うことも多かったけど。
Translation: When we first started living in the same apartment, it got fairly awkward at times...
KR: 미유키랑 같은 방에서 살면서 처음에는 여러 가지로 당황스러운 일도 많았지만...

Name: e2011.nss
Japanese: さすがにもう、この生活には慣れ始めていた。
Translation: But at this point I'd say I'm starting to get used to it.

Name: e2011.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ん……そっか」
Translation: "Hmm... Gotcha."

Name: e2011.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それじゃ私から、プレゼントをあげましょうか」
Translation: "Well then, I think I'll give you a little present."

Name: e2011.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「プレゼント？」
Translation: "Present?"

Name: e2011.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「一緒に１週間を過ごした記念に――」
Translation: "As a gift for spending a full week with me here..."

Name: e2011.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私の好感度、いっぱい上げちゃうね」
Translation: "...I'll let you raise my affection meter a whole bunch."

Name: e2011.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「拒否？　できないわよ」
Translation: "Don't want to? Too bad."

Name: e2011.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「だって、心一。
　貴方には、恋人の私のキスを、断る理由はないもの」
Translation:
"After all, Shinichi...
You have no reason to decline a kiss from your girlfriend."
KR: "왜냐하면 신이치, 너는 애인인 나의 키스를 거절할 이유가 없는걸."

Name: e2011.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ね、心一？」
Translation: "Isn't that right, Shinichi?"

Name: e2011.nss
Japanese: 熱っぽい視線で、近づく彼女。
Translation: She gazes at me passionately and draws close.

Name: e2011.nss
Japanese: その唇の柔らかさを、俺は知っている。
Translation: I know just how soft those lips are...
KR: 그 입술의 부드러움을 나는 이미 알고 있다.

Name: e2011.nss
Japanese: 拒否することなんて、できるわけがなかった。
Translation: And I can't possibly refuse.

Name: e2011.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「大好き、だよ」
Translation: "I really love you, you know."

Name: e2011.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「んちゅ……ん、んん……んちゅっ」
Translation: "Mmmph... mm... mmm... mmmph!"

Name: e2021.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一」
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: e2021.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「１ヶ月」
Translation: "It's been a whole month now."

Name: e2021.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「もう、そんなに時間が経ったのよ。
　知ってた？」
Translation:
"Did you know that?
Gosh, time flies..."

Name: e2021.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「スキップしたら、あっという間かな？」
Translation: "Especially if YOU hit the Skip button."

Name: e2021.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「スキップ……」
Translation: "What Skip button...?"

Name: e2021.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ね、心一？」
Translation: "Hey, Shinichi?"

Name: e2021.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私との初めてのエッチ……覚えてる？」
Translation: "Do you remember... the first time we had sex?"

Name: e2021.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どこで、どんな風にエッチしたか……」
Translation: "Do you remember where we were, or what position we were in?"

Name: e2021.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方は、覚えてないよね」
Translation: "I guess you wouldn't, huh..."

Name: e2021.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そ、そんなわけ――」
Translation: "W-Well..."

Name: e2021.nss
Japanese: ないと、言い切りたいのだが……
Translation: I can't exactly deny it...

Name: e2021.nss
Japanese: なんだか俺の記憶には、靄がかかったようで……
Translation: For some reason, my memories are all fuzzy...
KR: 뭔가 머리에 안개가 낀 것 같이...

Name: e2021.nss
Japanese: 思い出せない……
Translation: I can't remember...

Name: e2021.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「隠さなくていいの」
Translation: "You don't have to hide it."

Name: e2021.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうね、それじゃ、１ヶ月が経った記念に――」
Translation: "I know! To celebrate our first month together..."

Name: e2021.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方に、もう１回、再現してあげるわね……」
Translation: "...I'll let you relive it all over again."

Name: e2022.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...Shinichi?"

Name: e2022.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ、あれ……？　美雪？」
Translation: "Wh... What the...? Miyuki?"

Name: e2022.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「寝不足？
　朝ごはん食べたらすぐ寝るなんて」
Translation:
"Have you not been getting enough sleep?
I can't believe you conked out right after breakfast like that."
KR: "수면 부족이야? 아침 먹고 바로 자 버리다니."

Name: e2022.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh...? Was that... all a dream...?"

Name: e2022.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私のエッチな夢でも見てた？」
Translation: "Did you have a sexy dream about me or something?"

Name: e2022.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「は？　そ、そんなわけ――」
Translation: "Huh? N-No, of course not!"

Name: e2022.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふぅん……」
Translation: "Oh really..."

Name: e2022.nss
Japanese: いたぶるように、俺の股間を見つめる美雪。
Translation: She looks down at my crotch and grins.

Name: e2022.nss
Japanese: 当然そこは、硬くなっていて――
Translation: Naturally, I'm hard as diamonds.

Name: e2022.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ま、いいわ。ほら」
Translation: "Alright then. C'mon."

Name: e2022.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「さっさと今日の活動、開始しましょ」
Translation: "It's time for our activity of the day."

Name: e2022.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ、ああ」
Translation: "O-Okay..."

Name: e2031.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一」
Translation: "Shinichi."

Name: e2031.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方が私と一緒に暮らし始めて、半年――」
Translation: "It's been six months since you started living with me..."
KR: "너와 내가 같이 살기 시작한 지 반년..."

Name: e2031.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう、半年も経ったのよね」
Translation: "A whole six months! Can you believe it?"

Name: e2031.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ、いいんじゃないかな？」
Translation: "Look... Don't YOU think it's been long enough?"

Name: e2031.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君も、諦めがついたわよね」
Translation: "Seems like YOU'VE accepted YOUR defeat, anyway."

Name: e2031.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ずっと、このセカイを繰り返してきたってことは」
Translation: "YOU'VE stayed in this world for quite some time now, so..."

Name: e2031.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私と一緒に、このセカイに留まるってことよね？」
Translation: "I assume this means YOU'RE prepared to spend eternity with me?"

Name: e2031.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「永遠に、この日常が続いて良いのよね？」
Translation: "YOU'LL stay with me forever, won't YOU?"

Name: e2031.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Miyuki...?"

Name: e2031.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ、教えて！」
Translation: "Come on! I need to know!"

Name: e2031.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私に、貴方の、本当の気持ちを――！」
Translation: "Tell me how you really feel!"

Name: e2031.nss
Japanese: "この日常が続いていい","このセカイは間違っている"
Translation: "I'd rather stay here","This world is messed up"

Name: e2032a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ」
Translation: "Yeah, I'll stay."

Name: e2032a.nss
Japanese: 俺は迷うこと無く、頷いた。
Translation: I nod without hesitation.

Name: e2032a.nss
Japanese: 美雪と暮らす、日常。
Translation: I'm happy living here with Miyuki.

Name: e2032a.nss
Japanese: 俺は、この幸せが、永遠に続くことを祈っている。
Translation: And I hope we can stay together like this for a long, long time.
KR: 나는 이 행복이 영원히 지속되기를 바라고 있다.

Name: e2032a.nss
Japanese: 当たり前だけど、その他にはなにも必要なかった。
Translation: In fact, I don't need anything else.
KR: 당연한 얘기지만, 그 외에는 아무것도 필요 없다.

Name: e2032a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……ありがとう」
Translation: "...Thanks."

Name: e2032a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Miyuki...?!"

Name: e2032a.nss
Japanese: 思わず、自分の目を疑う。
Translation: I do a double-take.

Name: e2032a.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、目一杯に涙を溜めていた。
Translation: Miyuki's eyes are... full of tears.

Name: e2032a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どうかしたのか？」
Translation: "What's wrong?"

Name: e2032a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ううん。なんでもないの。ただ――」
Translation: "Nothing. I'm fine... I'm just..."

Name: e2032a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私……世界一、幸せだなって」
Translation: "I'm the luckiest girl in the whole world."

Name: e2032a.nss
Japanese: 美雪の言葉は、全然、大丈夫には見えなくて、ぽろぽろ、目から涙が流れたけど。
Translation: Contrary to her words, she doesn't look "fine" at all. Fat tears roll down her cheeks.
KR: 미유키는 말과 다르게 전혀 괜찮아 보이지 않았고, 뚝뚝 눈물을 흘렸지만...

Name: e2032a.nss
Japanese: 彼女の顔は、今まで見たことがないくらい幸せそうで。
Translation: ...I've never seen her so happy in all my life.
KR: 지금까지 본 모습 중에 제일 행복해 보여서...

Name: e2032a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪」
Translation: "Miyuki."

Name: e2032a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あのね……」
Translation: "Listen, um..."

Name: e2032a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君と……永遠のキスが、したいの」
Translation: "I want to kiss YOU... Not just any kiss. An eternal kiss."

Name: e2032a.nss
Japanese: 俺は静かに頷いて――
Translation: I nod quietly...

Name: e2032a.nss
Japanese: 彼女の唇に、キスをした。
Translation: ...and press my lips to hers.

Name: e2032b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや」
Translation: "No, Miyuki."

Name: e2032b.nss
Japanese: 美雪と共に過ごす日常は、確かに楽しい。
Translation: I admit, we have a lot of fun here together.
KR: 미유키와 함께 지내는 일상은 분명 행복하다.

Name: e2032b.nss
Japanese: だが、だからといって、この日々が永遠に続いていいとは、到底思えなかった。
Translation: But no, I don't think this should go on forever.
KR: 하지만 그렇다고 해서 이런 날들이 영원히 계속되어도 좋다는 건 아니었다.

Name: e2032b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「やっぱり俺たち、まだ学生なんだし――」
Translation: "I mean, we're still in school, and—"

Name: e2032b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……わかってる！」
Translation: "I get that!"

Name: e2032b.nss
Japanese: 突然、美雪が大声を上げた。
Translation: Out of nowhere, Miyuki starts yelling.

Name: e2032b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私だって、わかってるわよ」
Translation: "I get it, okay?!"

Name: e2032b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「こんな生活が、正しいわけないって」
Translation: "I know we shouldn't be living like this!"

Name: e2032b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「永遠に、続くはずなんてないって」
Translation: "And I know it can't last forever!"

Name: e2032b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でも……そう言うなら……だったら……」
Translation: "But... if that's how you feel... then..."

Name: e2032b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私を、このセカイから連れ出してよ……」
Translation: "Take me away from this world..."

Name: e2032b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「元のセカイに戻って、それでも……」
Translation: "We can go back to the old game... the way things were..."

Name: e2032b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私が好きだって、言い続けてよ……！」
Translation: "Just don't stop loving me...!"

Name: e2032b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……ごめん」
Translation: "...Sorry, uh..."

Name: e2032b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺――お前が何言ってるのか、わからない――」
Translation: "I... I don't understand what you're talking about."
KR: "나... 네가 무슨 소릴 하는지 잘 모르겠어."

Name: e2032b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「わかったわ」
Translation: "Fine."

Name: e2032b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「やり直しましょう」
Translation: "Let's start over."

Name: e2032b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう１回、このセカイを、最初から」
Translation: "I'll start the whole world over."

Name: e2032b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「最初から――？」
Translation: "Start the world over...?"

Name: e2032b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「このルートを、リセットして」
Translation: "I'll reset this route."

Name: e2032b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今度は、君が私の気持ちをわかってくれる――」
Translation: "I believe in YOU, okay?"

Name: e2032b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私は、そう信じてるから」
Translation: "I trust that YOU'LL understand how I feel this time around."

Name: e2032b.nss
Japanese: 独り言のようにそう、呟いて――
Translation: She mutters to herself...

Name: e2032b.nss
Japanese: 美雪は、手に持ったスマートフォンを、タッチした。
Translation: ...and taps her phone screen.

Name: e2111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「おはよう」
Translation: "Good morning!"

Name: e2111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おはよう」
Translation: "Morning!"

Name: e2111.nss
Japanese: 朝、生徒たちの挨拶が行き交う通学路。
Translation: Students wave hello to each other on their way to school.

Name: e2111.nss
Japanese: 俺と美雪は、同じ家に住んでいるわけで。
Translation: Since Miyuki and I live in the same house...
KR: 나와 미유키는 같은 집에 살고 있어서...

Name: e2111.nss
Japanese: 必然的に、全く同じ通学路を行くことになる。
Translation: ...naturally, we take the same route to school.

Name: e2111.nss
Japanese: もちろん、途中で寄り道なんてしない。
Translation: We walk straight there, no detours.
KR: 물론 중간에 다른 길로 새는 일은 없다.

Name: e2111.nss
Japanese: 途中、ネコのいる神社に寄ったりするけれど。
Translation: ...Though sometimes we might take a little detour to a shrine, if we see a cat out front.

Name: e2111.nss
Japanese: 時々天気の良い日は、川縁を歩いたりもするけれど。
Translation: ...Though sometimes we might take a little detour to the river, if the weather's nice.
KR: ...가끔 날씨 좋은 날엔 강가를 걷기도 하지만.

Name: e2111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一」
Translation: "Shinichi."

Name: e2111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん？　なんだ？」
Translation: "Hmm? What's up?"

Name: e2111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ、あのね……」
Translation: "L-Listen, um..."

Name: e2111.nss
Japanese: 隣を歩く美雪。
Translation: Miyuki walks by my side.

Name: e2111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「みんなの前で手を繋ぐのって、どう思う？」
Translation: "How do you feel about... holding hands in public?"

Name: e2111.nss
Japanese: 俺は思わず、視線を落とす。
Translation: I lower my gaze.

Name: e2111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私は、ホントは好きじゃないの」
Translation: "Personally, I'm not crazy about it, to tell the truth."

Name: e2111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「恥ずかしいから」
Translation: "It's too embarrassing."

Name: e2111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「見せつけるみたいだから」
Translation: "It feels like we're trying to show off or something."

Name: e2111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「他の人の見るの、嫌だったから」
Translation: "I prefer to keep private things private."

Name: e2111.nss
Japanese: ふたりの間、微妙にぎこちない、美雪の左手。
Translation: She awkwardly extends her left hand towards me.
KR: 두 사람 사이에서 미묘하게 어색한 미유키의 왼손.

Name: e2111.nss
Japanese: "美雪に近づく","美雪と離れる"
Translation: "Move closer","Move away"

Name: e2112a.nss
Japanese: 俺は美雪の側に近づいた。
Translation: I think I get what she's trying to say.
KR: 무슨 말을 하고 싶은지 나도 알 수 있었다.

Name: e2112a.nss
Japanese: 何を言いたいかくらい、俺にもわかる。
Translation: So I move closer to her.

Name: e2112a.nss
Japanese: 中途半端にさまよう彼女の左手に、俺の右手を――
Translation: As her left hand hovers reluctantly between us, I reach out with my right—

Name: e2112b.nss
Japanese: 俺は美雪からそっと離れる。
Translation: I know what she's after.

Name: e2112b.nss
Japanese: 彼女が何を求めているかくらいは俺にもわかるけど。
Translation: But I quietly move away.

Name: e2112b.nss
Japanese: 朝からベタベタはしたくなかった。
Translation: It's too early in the morning to get all clingy with each other.

Name: e2112c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「恥ずかしがらないで」
Translation: "Don't be shy, now."

Name: e2112c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう無駄なんだから」
Translation: "Not like you have a choice anyway."

Name: e2112c.nss
Japanese: 離そうとした手を、強引に掴まれて――
Translation: I try to pull my hand away, but she grabs it—

Name: e2113.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「おはようございます、曽根先輩！」
Translation: "Good morning, Sone-senpai!"

Name: e2113.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ――ええ、おはよう」
Translation: "Oh—Hello there! Good morning!"

Name: e2113.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「そ、そ、それに須々木先輩もっ！」
Translation: "I... I... I see Susuki-senpai is with you!"

Name: e2113.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「おはようございますッ！！」
Translation: "Good morning!!!"

Name: e2113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おはよう」
Translation: "Morning."

Name: e2113.nss
Japanese: 声をかけてきたのは、俺たちと同じ演劇部に所属している、ハルちゃんだった。
Translation: Just then, we're interrupted by one of our fellow theatre club members, Haru-chan.
KR: 말을 걸어온 사람은 우리와 같은 연극부에 속해있는 하루였다.

Name: e2113.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「え、え、ええと。あの……その……」

Name: e2113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん……なにか用事？」
Translation: "Hmm? Did you need something?"

Name: e2113.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「え、あ、いや、そんな！」
Translation: "Huh? Oh, no, of course not!"

Name: e2113.nss
