Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese:
「用事なんて、特にない、のに――
　挨拶なんてしちゃって、すみませんでしたっ！！」
Translation:
"I don't need anything! Not really!
SORRY FOR SAYING HI!!!"
KR: "볼일 같은 건 딱히 없는데... 인사 같은 걸 해버려서 죄송합니다!!"

Name: e2113.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「さようならっ！！」
Translation: "GOODBYE FOREVER!!!"

Name: e2113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょ、ちょっと」
Translation: "H-Hold it!"

Name: e2113.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「あうっ！」
Translation: "Aaah!"

Name: e2113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なにもないところで転んだ」
Translation: "Did you just trip over thin air?"

Name: e2113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「相変わらずの、ドジっ娘だな」
Translation: "Man, you're always such a klutz."

Name: e2113.nss
Japanese: 美雪は、真一文字に口を結びながらハルちゃんを睨む。
Translation: Miyuki purses her lips and glares at Haru-chan.
KR: 미유키는 입을 꾹 다물고 하루를 노려보았다.

Name: e2113.nss
Japanese: 一歩、俺の方に近づいたかと思うと――
Translation: Then she takes a step toward me—

Name: e2113.nss
Japanese: 俺の手を、しっかり握った。
Translation: —and firmly grabs my hand.

Name: e2113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いだっ、いだだだだ……！」
Translation: "Ow! Owowow!"

Name: e2113.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「行きましょう！」
Translation: "Let's go!"

Name: e2113.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh? But—"

Name: e2113.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いいから、このまま！」
Translation: "Let's just go!"

Name: e2113.nss
Japanese: ちょっと痛いくらいにギュッと片手を握られながら、俺たちは校門へと向かう。
Translation: And so, with my hand in Miyuki's vicegrip, we continue on our way to the school gates.
KR: 약간 아프게 한 손을 잡힌 채 우리는 교문을 향했다.

Name: e2114.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう５回以上やってるんだから、いい加減慣れてよ」
Translation: "We've done this, like, at least five times by now, so just get used to it, would you?"

Name: e2114.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...Okay?"

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おはよう」
Translation: "Morning!"

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「あ、リア充だ」
Translation: "Oh, it's a normie."

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……やめろよ、それ」
Translation: "...Please stop."

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「あ、リア充だ」
Translation: "Oh, it's a normie."

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから、やめろって！」
Translation: "Seriously, cut it out!"

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「あ、リア充だ」
Translation: "Oh, it's a normie."

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……おいコラ」
Translation: "Dude! Knock it off!"

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「あ、リア充だ」
Translation: "Oh, it's a normie."

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ここに美雪の寝起き写真があるんだが――」
Translation: "Wanna see some pics of Miyuki waking up in the morning?"

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「すいませんでしたッ！
　心一部員ッ！　マジすいませんでしたッ！」
Translation:
"I'm sorry!!!
Private Shinichi! I'm hecka sorry, dude!"

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「よろしい」
Translation: "Good."

Name: e2121.nss
Japanese: なんかちょっとバグっぽくって怖かったし。
Translation: That was scary... I thought he was glitching out for a second there...
KR: 뭔가 버그 걸린 것 같아서 무서운데...

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「で、曽根さんの寝起き写真は？」
Translation: "So, where are those pics of Sone-san?"

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ない」
Translation: "Don't got any."

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ない？」
Translation: "You don't?"

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「怖くて撮れるか」
Translation: "She'd kill me if I tried!"

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「リア充が俺を騙したッ！！」
Translation: "Deceived! By a normie!!!"

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だからリア充言うな」
Translation: "Seriously, quit calling me that!"

Name: e2121.nss
Japanese: まあ、ホントは撮ったことがあるんだけど。
Translation: I actually do have some, though.

Name: e2121.nss
Japanese: もちろん美雪にバレて、結果どうなったかというと――
Translation: But Miyuki caught me in the act, and as for my punishment—

Name: e2121.nss
Japanese: 俺の寝顔写真を撮られてしまった。
Translation: —she took pics of me sleeping.

Name: e2121.nss
Japanese: 俺のコスプレ写真（強制）を撮られてしまった。
Translation: —she took pics of me in cosplay (against my will).

Name: e2121.nss
Japanese: 俺のおねしょ写真（捏造）を撮られてしまった。
Translation: —she took pics of me "wetting the bed" (i.e. she poured water on my sheets).
KR: 내 이불 지도 사진(조작)을 찍히고 말았다.

Name: e2121.nss
Japanese: もしその寝顔写真を公開するようなことがあれば、その代わりこちらの痴態も晒されてしまうわけだ。
Translation: Then she told me if I ever shared the photos I took, she'd do the same with hers...
KR: 만약에 미유키의 사진을 공개한다면 그 대신 내 치태도 드러나게 되는 셈이다.

Name: e2121.nss
Japanese: ……そんな危ない橋を渡るわけには行かない。
Translation: ...and I'm not sure I want to cross that bridge. Ever.

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「だがお前、最近やけに怪しいぞ！」
Translation: "You're acting real strange today, my guy!"

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「なんだか知らんが、曽根さんと仲良すぎだろ！」
Translation: "I don't know what's going on with you and Sone-san, but you're waaay too buddy-buddy!"

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そ……そういうお前はどうなんだよ？」
Translation: "Well, uh... What about you, huh?"

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「どうなんだよって、なにが？」
Translation: "What do you mean, what about me?"

Name: e2121.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから、えっと――」
Translation: "Well..."

Name: e2121.nss
Japanese: "ハルのことを訊く","アオイのことを訊く"
Translation: "Ask about Haru","Ask about Aoi"

Name: e2122a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ハルちゃんのことだよ」
Translation: "I'm talking about Haru-chan, obviously."

Name: e2122a.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「あ……アイツがどうしたっていうんだ？」
Translation: "Huh...? What do you mean?"

Name: e2122a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「告白されたんだろ？」
Translation: "I mean, she confessed her love to you, didn't she?"

Name: e2122a.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「だから、アレは俺の勘違いだったんだって！」
Translation: "That was all just a misunderstanding on my part!"

Name: e2122a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「本当に？」
Translation: "You sure?"

Name: e2122a.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「ってかさ、兄妹だぞ兄妹！
　普通にありえないし！」
Translation:
"I mean, we're brother and sister, dude!
There's no way!"
KR: "그보다, 형제라고 형제! 당연히 말도 안 되지!"

Name: e2122a.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「それにアイツが俺に近づいた理由は――」
Translation: "The only reason she got close to me was..."

Name: e2122a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「理由は？」

Name: e2122a.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「理由は……」
Translation: "Well..."

Name: e2122a.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ああっ、もう知らん！」
Translation: "Aaargh! Forget it!"

Name: e2122a.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「リア充爆発しろ！」
Translation: "Death to normies!"

Name: e2122a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「は？　なんでそこでキレるんだよ？」
Translation: "Huh? What're you so pissy about?"

Name: e2122a.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ふん！」
Translation: "Hmph!"

Name: e2122a.nss
Japanese: 俺の問いかけには答えず、雄太郎はさっさと自分の席へと戻ってしまった。
Translation: Yuutarou storms off to his desk without answering my question...
KR: 유우타로는 내 질문에 대답도 하지 않고 자기 자리로 돌아가 버렸다.

Name: e2122b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイのことだよ」
Translation: "I'm talking about Aoi, obviously."

Name: e2122b.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「……は？　おい、ふざけんな！」
Translation: "...What? Gimme a break!"

Name: e2122b.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「確かに『君と彼女と彼女の恋。』の報われないサブヒロイン、向日は可愛い！」
Translation: "I mean, sure, she's a super-cute routeless side character in [YOU and ME and HER]!"
KR: "분명 '당신과 그녀와 그녀의 사랑'에서 선택받지 못하는 서브 히로인, 무코우는 귀여워!"

Name: e2122b.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「メチャクチャ可愛い！」
Translation: "Like, CRAZY cute!"

Name: e2122b.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「同人誌とか！　フィギュアとか！　おっぱいマウスパッドとか！　抱き枕カバーとか！　パチモノのオナホとか！」
Translation: "I'm talking doujins, figurines, boobie mousepads, pillow covers, knockoff pocket pussies..."
KR: "동인지라던가! 피규어라던가! 가슴 마우스패드라던가! 다키마쿠라라던가! 가짜 x나홀이라던가!"

Name: e2122b.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「そういうものを、つい買いたく……」
Translation: "If I had the money, I..."

Name: e2122b.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「……か、買ってないぞ！　俺は買ってない！
　そんなもの、買うわけないだろう！」
Translation:
"I... wouldn't buy any of it, obviously!
No sir! Of course not!"
KR: "...그래도 사지 않았다고! 나는 안 샀어! 그런 걸 살 리가 없잖아!"

Name: e2122b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、信じてるよ」
Translation: "Right. Of course not."

Name: e2122b.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「憐れみの目で、俺を見るなっ！！」
Translation: "Don't look at me like that!!!"

Name: e2122b.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「リア充だからって、バカにして！　不愉快だ！」
Translation: "Just because you're a normie, you think you can judge me?! Think again!"

Name: e2122b.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「俺は帰らせてもらうッ！」
Translation: "I'll be taking my leave of you!"

Name: e2122b.nss
Japanese: 鼻息も荒く、雄太郎は自分の席へと戻ってしまう。
Translation: Yuutarou storms off in a huff back to his desk.

Name: e2122c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「怒らせちゃった？」
Translation: "Did you piss him off?"

Name: e2122c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「みたいだな」
Translation: "Apparently."

Name: e2122d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「何度見ても飽きないわね」
Translation: "I'll never get tired of this."

Name: e2122d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうか？」
Translation: "Oh yeah?"

Name: e2123.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「謝りに行ったら？」
Translation: "Why not go apologize?"

Name: e2123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「別に、じゃれてるだけだし」
Translation: "We were just screwing around."

Name: e2123.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふうん……男の友情ね」
Translation: "Hmm... I'll never understand guy friendships."

Name: e2123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「んじゃ、女の友情はどうなんだ？」
Translation: "Well, what are girl friendships like?"

Name: e2123.nss
Japanese: 俺の問いかけに、美雪は少し考え込んだ。
Translation: Miyuki pauses to think for a moment.

Name: e2123.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ゲームみたいなものかな」
Translation: "Kind of like a video game, I guess."

Name: e2123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ゲーム？」
Translation: "How so?"

Name: e2123.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「誰も本気になんてしないってこと」
Translation: "Nobody takes it too seriously."

Name: e2123.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「永久機関みたいなものかな」
Translation: "Kind of like a perpetual motion machine, I guess."

Name: e2123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「永久機関？」
Translation: "How so?"

Name: e2123.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「机上の空論」
Translation: "It's not real."

Name: e2123.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「世界記録みたいなものかな」
Translation: "Kind of like a world record, I guess."

Name: e2123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「世界記録？」
Translation: "How so?"

Name: e2123.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どれだけ輝いて見えても、いつか破られるためにある」
Translation: "No matter how impressive it looks on the outside, it exists to be broken."
KR: "아무리 빛나 보여도 언젠가 깨지기 위해 있는 것."

Name: e2123.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……そんなもんか」
Translation: "...Jeez, really?"

Name: e2123.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんなものよ」
Translation: "Really really."

Name: e2123.nss
Japanese: 呟く美雪の笑顔は、どこか超然としている。
Translation: Miyuki seems a little smug somehow.
KR: 그렇게 중얼거리는 미유키는 왠지 초연해 보였다.

Name: e2123.nss
Japanese: 彼女にとってこのクラスは、やはり演技をする舞台にしか過ぎないのかもしれない。
Translation: I guess she only sees school as a place to practice her acting skills.
KR: 미유키에게 있어 이 반은 역시 연기하는 무대일 뿐일지도 모른다.

Name: e2123.nss
Japanese: 俺が側にいてやらなきゃな、と改めて思った。
Translation: Once again, I'm reminded of how much she needs me around...
KR: 내가 곁에 있어줘야 한다고 다시금 생각했다.

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はむ、はむ、はむ……ん……」
Translation: "Nom, nom, nom... mmm..."

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……どうかな？」
Translation: "...How is it?"

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「カンペキ」
Translation: "Perfect."

Name: e2131.nss
Japanese: 美雪の弁当は、いつものように文句の付け所がない。
Translation: As usual, I have no complaints with the lunch she's made.
KR: 미유키의 도시락은 언제나 그렇듯 흠잡을 데가 없다.

Name: e2131.nss
Japanese: 食べているだけで、思わず頬が緩んでしまう。
Translation: The taste alone is enough to make me smile...

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ホント、美雪のつくる生姜焼きは美味いよな」
Translation: "Man, your ginger‐fried pork is delicious."

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ホント、美雪のつくるシュウマイは美味いよな」
Translation: "Man, your Shaomai dumplings are delicious."

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ホント、美雪のつくる炊き込みごはんは美味いよな」
Translation: "Man, your takikomi rice is delicious."

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「一番の得意料理だもの」
Translation: "Well, it IS my specialty dish, after all."

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「いや、俺の好物が得意料理なんて……
　運命というかなんというか」
Translation:
"I can't believe my favorite food just happens to be your specialty...
It must be fate or something."
KR: "내가 제일 좋아하는 음식이 특기라니... 이건 운명 아닐까?"

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一の好物だから、得意になったの」
Translation: "No, I perfected it BECAUSE it's your favorite."
KR: "신이치가 제일 좋아하는 거라 잘하게 된 거야."

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうなのか……？」
Translation: "Really...?"

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そう、運命は自分で引き寄せるの」
Translation: "Really really. I am the master of my own fate."

Name: e2131.nss
Japanese: さすが美雪、努力家である。
Translation: Dang... I guess Miyuki can do anything she puts her mind to...

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でも、よく俺の好物知ってるよな？」
Translation: "Still, I'm impressed you knew it was my favorite."

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「長いんだもの。普通、わかるでしょ」
Translation: "After all these years we've known each other? Of course I'd find out sooner or later!"

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ。まさか、私の好きなもの知らないとか？」
Translation: "Wait... Are you saying you don't know what mine is?"

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「と、当然知ってるに決まってるだろ！」
Translation: "O-Of course I know! Obviously!"

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「じゃあ、教えてくれる？
　私の好きな食べ物は？」
Translation:
"Okay then, let's hear it.
What's my favorite food?"

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪の好きな食べものは、だな……」
Translation: "Your favorite food... is..."

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私の好きな、食べ物は……？」

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「――甘いもの！」
Translation: "...Sweets!"

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……広すぎるわよ」
Translation: "...You have to be more specific!"

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ごめん」
Translation: "Sorry..."

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でも……甘いものだと、何が好きなんだ？」
Translation: "What IS your favorite dessert, anyway?"

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うーん、そうね……」
Translation: "Hmm... Let's see..."

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「やっぱりショートケーキかな」
Translation: "Shortcake, I guess?"

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「りんご飴……すきなの」
Translation: "Candy apples! I love them."

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「一度、バケツいっぱいのプリンが食べたいかな」
Translation: "Well, it's always been my dream to eat a whole bucket full of pudding..."
KR: "한 번쯤은 양동이 크기의 푸딩을 먹어보고 싶을지도."

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「結構子供っぽいんだな」
Translation: "That's such a kid answer."

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「余計なお世話」
Translation: "Mind your own business."

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「んじゃ、嫌いなものは？」
Translation: "Okay then, what foods do you hate?"

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「子供じゃないんだし。
　食べられないものなんてないです」
Translation:
"I'm not a CHILD.
I can eat just about anything."
KR: "어린애도 아니고. 못 먹는 것 같은 건 없답니다."

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「食べられなくはないけど、食べたくないものとか。
　普通あるだろ？」
Translation: "Sure, you CAN eat it, but surely there's gotta be at least one thing you'd rather not eat if you can avoid it."
KR: "그래도 먹고 싶지 않은 건 있을 거 아냐."

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Well..."

Name: e2131.nss
Japanese: 美雪はしばらく考え込んでから、仏頂面で口を開く。
Translation: Miyuki pauses to think for a while, then looks up at me.
KR: 미유키는 잠시 고민하다 무뚝뚝한 얼굴로 입을 열었다.

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「豚の角煮。脂身がダメ」
Translation: "Braised pork belly. It's too fatty."

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「イクラ。あの感触が嫌」
Translation: "Salmon roe. The texture is super gross."

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「グレープフルーツ。あの独特の風味が耐えられない」
Translation: "Grapefruit. I just can't stand the flavor."
KR: "자몽. 그 독특한 풍미를 견딜 수가 없어."

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ほうほう、なるほど」
Translation: "Ah, I see."

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……なんで嬉しそうな顔してるのよ」
Translation: "...What are you grinning about?!"

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「あなただって、苦手な物くらいあるでしょ？
　コレとか」
Translation:
"You have food aversions too, you know!
Like THIS, for example!"

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ゲ、それは……！」

Name: e2131.nss
Japanese: 美雪が取り出したのは、ヤバリーストマトだ。
Translation: She holds up a can of Yabaley's tomato juice.

Name: e2131.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「お茶とどっちがいい？」
Translation: "Which would you rather drink, this or tea?"

Name: e2131.nss
Japanese: "ヤバリーストマト","お茶"
Translation: "Yabaley's tomato juice","Tea"

Name: e2132a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「トマトで」
Translation: "I'll take the tomato juice."

Name: e2132a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「嫌いじゃないの？」
Translation: "I thought you hated it!"

Name: e2132a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「飲めないほどじゃない。
　身体にも良さそうだし」
Translation:
"I can still drink it, though.
And it's probably good for you."
KR: "못 마실 정도는 아냐. 몸에도 좋을 것 같으니까."

Name: e2132a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふぅん。身体のため、ねえ……」
Translation: "I see... Trying to be healthy, are we?"

Name: e2132a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「んく……んく……んく……」
Translation: "Ggllpp... ggllpp... ggllpp..."

Name: e2132a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ぷはぁっ！」
Translation: "Whew!"

Name: e2132a.nss
Japanese: 俺は思わず、顔をしかめてしまう。
Translation: I grimace at the taste.

Name: e2132b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お茶で」
Translation: "Tea, definitely."

Name: e2132b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「そうよね。
　貴方、ヤバリーストマト、嫌いだったんだから」
Translation:
"Thought so.
I know you can't stand tomato juice."

Name: e2132b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ま、飲めないほどじゃないけどな」
Translation: "Eh, I could still drink it, though."

Name: e2132b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「んく……んく……んく……」
Translation: "Ggllpp... ggllpp... ggllpp..."

Name: e2132b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ああ……この味よね」
Translation: "Yep... It sure tastes like tomato, alright..."

Name: e2132b.nss
Japanese: 美雪の顔が、少し辛そうに歪む。
Translation: Miyuki grimaces in disgust.

Name: e2132c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……なんて、訊くまでもないか」
Translation: "...Just kidding. I hardly need to ask."

Name: e2132c.nss
Japanese: その通り。
Translation: True.

Name: e2132c.nss
Japanese: 健康に不安があるわけでもない。
Translation: Not like I'm really that concerned about my diet.
KR: 딱히 건강에 이상이 있는 것도 아니다.

Name: e2132c.nss
Japanese: 自らマズい飲み物を飲む必要はなかった。
Translation: No sense in going out of my way to drink something that tastes like crap.
KR: 굳이 맛없는 음료수를 마실 필요는 없었다.

Name: e2133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「やっぱり、美味しくないわよね」
Translation: "Nasty, isn't it?"

Name: e2133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「否定はしない」
Translation: "You're not wrong..."

Name: e2133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ってか、なんでわざわざ買ってきたんだ？」
Translation: "I mean, why'd you even buy it in the first place?"

Name: e2133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「製造中止で、在庫処分だって」
Translation: "It was on sale. It's being discontinued, you know."

Name: e2133.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「飲む人がいないから」
Translation: "Because nobody ever drinks it."

Name: e2133.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「確かに、な」
Translation: "Yeah, I can imagine."

Name: e2133.nss
Japanese: ヤバリーストマトが好きだという人間は、少なくとも俺の知り合いには存在していなかった。
Translation: I don't know ANYONE who likes the stuff.
KR: 적어도 내가 알고 있는 사람 중에 야바토마를 좋아하는 사람은 없다.

Name: e2141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪、俺は、ずっと前から君が――」
Translation: "Miyuki... The truth is... I've always loved you!"

Name: e2141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うん。私も――」
Translation: "I know... And I love you too..."

Name: e2141.nss
Japanese: 舞台はいよいよクライマックス。
Translation:
Onstage, Miyuki and I stand face-to-face.
Here we are at the climactic final scene.

Name: e2141.nss
Japanese: 定期公演に向けて、舞台の稽古を続ける俺と美雪。
Translation: We're both putting our all into these rehearsals.
KR: 나와 미유키는 정기공연을 위해 무대 위에서 연습하고 있었다.

Name: e2141.nss
Japanese: ふたりは、ステージの上で向かい合う。
Translation: This is an original script penned by Miyuki herself.

Name: e2141.nss
Japanese: 『シュラババ！』
Translation: It's titled "Pandemonium!"

Name: e2141.nss
Japanese: 『シュラババ！！』
Translation: It's titled "Pandemonium!!"

Name: e2141.nss
Japanese: 『シュラババ！！！』
Translation: It's titled "Pandemonium!!!"

Name: e2141.nss
Japanese: 美雪が書いた、オリジナルの脚本だ。

Name: e2141.nss
Japanese: ストーリーは単純明快な三角関係ものだった。
Translation: It's a fairly straightforward love triangle story.

Name: e2141.nss
Japanese: 幼馴染みと微妙な距離を取る俺の前に突然現れた、女子転校生Ａ。
Translation: The lives of a high school student and his estranged childhood friend are turned upside down when Female Transfer Student A turns up.
KR: 소꿉친구와 미묘한 거리를 두는 내 앞에 갑자기 나타난 여자 전학생A.

Name: e2141.nss
Japanese: 彼女は奇妙な言動と、偽りの出自で同情を引き、主役である「慎一」の心を射止めることに成功する。
Translation: Her eccentric behavior and fake persona win sympathy—and affection—from the protagonist, Shinichirou.
KR: 그녀는 기묘한 언행과 거짓 출신으로 동정을 이끌어 주역인 '신이치1'의 마음을 사로잡는 데 성공한다.

Name: e2141.nss
Japanese: 彼女は奇妙な言動と、偽りの出自で同情を引き、主役である「真一」の心を射止めることに成功する。
Translation: Her eccentric behavior and fake persona win sympathy—and affection—from the protagonist, Shinji.
KR: 그녀는 기묘한 언행과 거짓 출신으로 동정을 이끌어 주역인 '신이치2'의 마음을 사로잡는 데 성공한다.

Name: e2141.nss
Japanese: 彼女は奇妙な言動と、偽りの出自で同情を引き、主役である「眞一」の心を射止めることに成功する。
Translation: Her eccentric behavior and fake persona win sympathy—and affection—from the protagonist, Shinnosuke.
KR: 그녀는 기묘한 언행과 거짓 출신으로 동정을 이끌어 주역인 '신이치3'의 마음을 사로잡는 데 성공한다.

Name: e2141.nss
Japanese: だが話が進むにつれて、転校生Ａの話は全て嘘で、彼女は男性を手玉に取る悪女と言うことが判明。
Translation: As the story progresses, however, Female Transfer Student A's lies are exposed, and she's revealed to be a villain who misleads men.
KR: 하지만 이야기가 진행되면서 전학생A의 이야기는 전부 거짓말이고, 그녀는 남자를 가지고 노는 악녀로 판명 났다.

Name: e2141.nss
Japanese: 最後まで主人公を陰から支え続けた幼馴染みと、見事に結ばれる――というストーリーだ。
Translation: The story concludes with the protagonist falling in love with his supportive childhood friend.
KR: 결국 마지막까지 주인공을 뒤에서 지탱해 준 소꿉친구와 이어지는 멋진 스토리다.

Name: e2141.nss
Japanese: 俺と美雪は、ステージ上で至近距離から見つめ合い――
Translation: Onstage, Miyuki and I gaze into each other's eyes, inches apart.
KR: 나와 미유키는 바로 앞에서 서로 바라보고 있었다.

Name: e2141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「キス、して」
Translation: "Kiss me."

Name: e2141.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え？　そんな台詞――」
Translation: "What? That's not in the script—"

Name: e2141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「台詞じゃないわ」
Translation: "You're right. It isn't."

Name: e2141.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私からの、お願い」
Translation: "I'm asking you."

Name: e2141.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、俺にだけ聞こえる声で囁いた。
Translation: Miyuki whispers so that only I can hear.

Name: e2141.nss
Japanese: "キスする","キスしない"
Translation: "Kiss her","Don't kiss her"

Name: e2142a.nss
Japanese: 俺は促されるがまま、彼女に唇を重ねた――
Translation: Per her request, I press my lips to hers—
KR: 나는 미유키의 부탁대로 입술을 가져다 댔다.

Name: e2142b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「本番までとっておくって、約束だろ？」
Translation: "Didn't we agree to save it for the debut performance?"

Name: e2142b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ホントにキス、してくれる？」
Translation: "Do you promise you'll kiss me then?"

Name: e2142b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「その時に、なったらな」
Translation: "When the time comes, sure."

Name: e2142b.nss
Japanese: 上目遣いの彼女に、俺はしっかり頷いた。
Translation: She looks up at me, and I nod.
KR: 올려다보는 미유키를 향해 나는 고개를 끄덕였다.

Name: e2151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「お待たせ！」
Translation: "Sorry I took so long!"

Name: e2151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お……アイス？」
Translation: "Oh, hey... Got some ice cream?"

Name: e2151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そう。シンイチには、コレね」
Translation: "Yep! Here's yours."

Name: e2151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おう」
Translation: "Awesome, thanks."

Name: e2151.nss
Japanese: 美雪に手渡されたのは、バニラモナカ。
Translation: She hands me a vanilla ice cream sandwich.
KR: 미유키는 내게 바닐라 와플 아이스크림을 건넸다.

Name: e2151.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺の好み、良く知ってるな？　お前は？」
Translation: "Sweet! That's my favorite! ...What'd you get?"

Name: e2151.nss
Japanese: 美雪が袋から取り出したのは、月見大福。
Translation: Miyuki pulls out mochi ice cream for herself.

Name: e2151.nss
Japanese: 美雪が袋から取り出したのは、スイカ棒。
Translation: Miyuki pulls out a watermelon popsicle for herself.

Name: e2151.nss
Japanese: 美雪が袋から取り出したのは、チョコバー。
Translation: Miyuki pulls out a fudge pop for herself.

Name: e2151.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「好きなの。コレ」
Translation: "I like to get these usually."

Name: e2151.nss
Japanese: "太らないのか？","食べっこしようか？"
Translation: "You sure you won't get fat?","Wanna go halfsies?"

Name: e2152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「太らないのか？」
Translation: "You sure you won't get fat?"

Name: e2152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私、いくら食べても体重変わらないから」
Translation: "I can eat as much as I want. I have a high metabolism."

Name: e2152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……そうだったっけ？」
Translation: "...You do? Since when?"

Name: e2152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうなったの」
Translation: "Since recently."

Name: e2152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうなった？」
Translation: "How'd that happen?"

Name: e2152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「裏技使ってね」
Translation: "Oh, I figured out how to cheat the system."

Name: e2152a.nss
Japanese: なにかダイエット方法でも体得したのだろうか……？
Translation: What kind of weird diet is she on now...?

Name: e2152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ってかおまえ、体重何キロ？」
Translation: "How much do you weigh these days, anyhow?"

Name: e2152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……秘密に決まってるでしょ？」
Translation: "As if I'm going to tell you!"

Name: e2152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ですよねー」
Translation: "Figures..."

Name: e2152a.nss
Japanese: 乙女の体重は秘密の花園なのである。たぶん。
Translation: A lady's weight is a secret too powerful for any man to know... Probably...
KR: 여성의 몸무게는 비밀의 화원인 것이다. 아마도...

Name: e2152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「本当に、知りたいの？」
Translation: "You REALLY want to know?"

Name: e2152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いえ、結構です……」
Translation: "N-Nah, I'm good."

Name: e2152a.nss
Japanese: 視線の暴力に屈してしまった。
Translation: I cave under the intensity of her glare.

Name: e2152a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あー、なんだか運動がしたい気分だわ！」
Translation: "Good question! Maybe I should burn some CALORIES!"

Name: e2152a.nss
Japanese: 突然素振りを始める美雪。
Translation: Miyuki suddenly starts to practice her baseball swing—in my direction—!!!

Name: e2152a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そんなの必要ないくらいスリムかと！」
Translation: "N-Nonsense! Honestly, you're so slim, I hardly see the need!"

Name: e2152a.nss
Japanese: 一瞬、命の危険を感じてしまった。
Translation: For a second I thought she was gonna smash my face in...

Name: e2152b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「食べっこしようか？」
Translation: "Wanna go halfsies?"

Name: e2152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「食べっこ？」
Translation: "How would that work?"

Name: e2152b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「一口ずつ」
Translation: "We trade off taking a bite of each."

Name: e2152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「一口ずつ……」
Translation: "Interesting..."

Name: e2152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「う、うん。私もバニラモナカ、好きだし……」
Translation: "O-Okay. I DO like ice cream sandwiches..."

Name: e2152b.nss
Japanese: 俺たちはお互いに、食べかけのアイスを交換する。
Translation: And so we take turns taking bites out of each other's ice cream as well as our own.
KR: 우리는 서로 먹다 만 아이스크림을 교환했다.

Name: e2152b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はむ……ん、うん。美味い」
Translation: "Nom... mmm. Delicious."

Name: e2152b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そっちはどうだ？」
Translation: "What about you?"

Name: e2152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「幸せ」
Translation: "I'm happy."

Name: e2152b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「幸せ？」
Translation: "Happy?"

Name: e2152b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うん。幸せ」
Translation: "Yeah. Really happy."

Name: e2153.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でも――ふたりきりの帰り道って、いいわよね」
Translation: "You know... it's really nice, walking home just the two of us."

Name: e2153.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ここに邪魔者がいたらと思うと、ゾッとしない？」
Translation: "Can you imagine if someone tried to interrupt this? Wouldn't that just piss you off?"
KR: "여기에 방해꾼이 있다고 생각하면 소름 돋지 않아?"

Name: e2153.nss
Japanese: "ゾッとする","そうは思わない"
Translation: "Definitely","Not really"

Name: e2154a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「確かに、ゾッとするな」
Translation: "Yeah, I'd be pissed."

Name: e2154a.nss
Japanese: ふたりの時間は、誰にも邪魔されたくない。
Translation: Our time together is special.
KR: 우리 두 사람의 시간은 누구에게도 방해받고 싶지 않다.

Name: e2154a.nss
Japanese: それが、今の俺の気持ちだった。
Translation: I don't want anyone else infringing on it.

Name: e2154b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「別に、友達がいてもいいと思うけどな」
Translation: "If it was a friend or something, nah, not really."

Name: e2154b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私は嫌」
Translation: "Well, I wouldn't like it."

Name: e2154b.nss
Japanese: 美雪ははっきりと言った。
Translation: Miyuki declares flatly.

Name: e2154b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふたりきりがいい」
Translation: "I prefer it when it's just us."

Name: e2154b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふたりの時間は、誰にも邪魔させないの」
Translation: "And I won't let anyone else ruin that."
KR: "우리 둘의 시간은 누구도 방해 못 해."

Name: e2155.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もっとも……」
Translation: "That said..."

Name: e2155.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう、友達なんて誰もいないけど」
Translation: "We don't HAVE any other friends anymore."

Name: e2161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「相変わらずネコだらけの店だな」
Translation: "Whoever owns this place must REALLY love cats."

Name: e2161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、美雪。顔」
Translation: "Uh, Miyuki? Your face?"

Name: e2161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Huh? Oh!"

Name: e2161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前、ホントにここに来ると別人だよな？」
Translation: "You know, every time we set foot in here, it's like you transform into this totally different person..."

Name: e2161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……別に良いじゃない」

Name: e2161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「この前も、買い物したんだろ？」
Translation: "Didn't you buy something in here just the other day, too?"

Name: e2161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちょっと、ネコの癒やし系ＤＶＤを……」
Translation: "Oh, just a cat video compilation DVD..."

Name: e2161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちょっと、ネコの鳴き声ＣＤを……」
Translation: "Oh, just a cat ASMR CD..."

Name: e2161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちょっと、ネコ語の翻訳おもちゃを……」
Translation: "Oh, just a cat-to-human translator toy..."

Name: e2161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Right..."

Name: e2161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前、そんなにネコが好きだっけ？」
Translation: "Have you always been this much of a cat fanatic?"

Name: e2161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そもそも、どこがそんなにいいんだ？」
Translation: "What's so great about cats, anyway?"

Name: e2161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「肉球、可愛いじゃない」
Translation: "Their little toe beans! They're cute!"

Name: e2161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺、触ったことないや」
Translation: "Gotta admit, I haven't touched a cat's paw before."

Name: e2161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私も」
Translation: "Me either."

Name: e2161.nss
Japanese: ないのかよ。
Translation: Then why bring it up?!?

Name: e2161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なんて言うのかな、気品があるじゃない？」
Translation: "I don't know how to explain it... They're just... elegant, you know?"

Name: e2161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……まあ、確かに」
Translation: "...Yeah, I can see that."

Name: e2161.nss
Japanese: 孤高な感じは、美雪に良く似合っている。
Translation: Cats have this aloof, independent vibe that suits Miyuki to a T.

Name: e2161.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「鳴き声。あの声聞いたら、もう一発でアウト」
Translation: "Their little meows! I melt like butter whenever I hear it!"

Name: e2161.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "I see..."

Name: e2161.nss
Japanese: そういうもんか。
Translation: Interesting...

Name: e2161.nss
Japanese: まあ、わざわざ美雪へのプレゼントを買いに来たのだ。
Translation: Well, we're here to get Miyuki a gift.
KR: 뭐, 일부러 미유키 선물을 사러 온 거니까.

Name: e2161.nss
Japanese: 彼女が喜んでくれる分には、なにも問題ないだろう。
Translation: I'm sure she'll be ecstatic no matter what I pick.
KR: 미유키가 기뻐하는 것에는 아무런 문제가 없다.

Name: e2161.nss
Japanese: 問題はなにをプレゼントするかだが……
Translation: But... what do I pick...?

Name: e2161.nss
Japanese: "着ぐるみ","フォトフレーム"
Translation: "A kitty onesie","A photo frame"

Name: e2162a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「この着ぐるみとか――」
Translation: "How about this kitty onesie?"

Name: e2162a.nss
Japanese: 美雪は鬼の形相で、俺の手から着ぐるみを奪い取る。
Translation: Miyuki glares at me and snatches the onesie from my hands.
KR: 미유키는 무서운 얼굴을 하고 내 손에서 인형 옷을 뺐었다.

Name: e2162a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私がこんなのを来て、似合うと思う？」
Translation: "You think I could actually pull something like this off?"
KR: "내가 이런 거 입으면 어울릴 것 같아?"

Name: e2162a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Well, I mean..."

Name: e2162a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「意外と似合うんじゃないかなって」
Translation: "...You never know, right?"

Name: e2162a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あり得ないわ！」
Translation: "Fat chance!"

Name: e2162a.nss
Japanese: 一方的にそう言って、美雪は着ぐるみを棚に戻す。
Translation: Miyuki puts the onesie back on the shelf.
KR: 미유키는 일방적으로 말하고서 인형 옷을 선반에 되돌려놓았다.

Name: e2162a.nss
Japanese: そんなに怒んなくても……
Translation: Sheesh... Who pissed in her cereal?

Name: e2162b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「このフォトフレームとか、どうだ？」
Translation: "How about this photo frame?"

Name: e2162b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ん……そうね、写真は好き」
Translation: "Hmm... Sure, why not? I like photos."

Name: e2162b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「写真の中の私は永遠だから」
Translation: "Photos are eternal, after all."

Name: e2162b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「自分がどれだけ変わったのか確認できるから」
Translation: "They're an easy way to see how much you've changed."

Name: e2162b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「幸せなときの気持ちを思い出せるから」
Translation: "They help you remember the good times."

Name: e2162b.nss
Japanese: ……ふーん、そんなもんか。
Translation: Huh... I never thought about it like that.

Name: e2162b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一にしては、良い提案かもね」
Translation: "Not a bad suggestion. For you, at least."

Name: e2162b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「プリントしたら、消えるのよね。
　引き継げるのは、データだけ」
Translation:
"If I have it printed, it'll disappear.
The only thing that carries over is my data."

Name: e2162b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん？　なにか言ったか？」
Translation: "Hm? Did you say something?"

Name: e2162b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ううん、なんでもない！」
Translation: "Nope! Nothing at all!"

Name: e2162c.nss
Japanese: 手頃なのは、フォトフレームくらい……か。
Translation: I guess I could get her a photo frame...

Name: e2163.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ……これ、可愛い」
Translation: "Ooh! This is so cute!"

Name: e2163.nss
Japanese: 美雪が指さすのは、猫のヘアピン。
Translation: Miyuki points to a cat-shaped hairpin on display near the window.

Name: e2163a.nss
Japanese: ワンオフらしく、表情が微妙に異なったものが２匹、窓際にぽつんと置いてあった。
Translation: Apparently it's a one-of-a-kind handmade item. Next to it is a second, slightly different pin in the same style.
KR: 직접 만든 것인지, 표정이 미묘하게 다른 고양이 두 마리가 창가에 진열되어 있었다.

Name: e2163b.nss
Japanese: 窓際にぽつんとひとつ、置いてあった。
Translation: It's just sitting there, all by its lonesome...
KR: 창가에 덩그러니 딱 하나만 놓여 있었다.

Name: e2163c.nss
Japanese: 恋でもしたかのように、そのヘアピンをうっとりとした瞳で見つめている美雪。
Translation: Miyuki gazes at it, completely besotted.
KR: 사랑에 빠진 것처럼 헤어핀을 바라보는 미유키.

Name: e2163c.nss
Japanese: 決して洗練されてはいないが、手作りの質感がよく出ていて、表情に非常に味がある。
Translation: I can see why, too. It's definitely got that classic handmade look to it, and the artist really nailed its expression.
KR: 세련되진 않았지만, 손수 만든 느낌이 살아있었다.

Name: e2163c.nss
Translation: "How much is it?","There's two?"

Name: e2164a.nss
Japanese: 値段は……ま、こんなもんか。
Translation: The price is... about what I was expecting, yeah.
KR: 가격은... 뭐, 이 정도면 괜찮은 것 같네.

Name: e2164a.nss
Japanese: 美雪も気に入ってるみたいだし――
Translation: Oh well. Miyuki really seems to like it, so—

Name: e2164a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「プレゼントしよっか？」
Translation: "Want me to buy it for you?"

Name: e2164a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Huh? But..."

Name: e2164a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「気にいったんだろ？」
Translation: "You want it, don't you?"

Name: e2164a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私には似合わない――」
Translation: "It wouldn't look good on me—"

Name: e2164a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「似合うよ、きっと」
Translation: "Sure it will."

Name: e2164a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうかな……？」
Translation: "You think so...?"

Name: e2164b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Wait, there's two?"

Name: e2164b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふたつあったら、悪い？」
Translation: "Yeah? So what if there's two of them?"

Name: e2164b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え……？　いや、そういうわけじゃなくて」
Translation: "Huh...? No, I mean, it's fine, but..."

Name: e2164b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それじゃ、どういうわけ？」
Translation: "But what?"

Name: e2164b.nss
Japanese: 返答に窮してしまう。
Translation: I have no answer.

Name: e2164b.nss
Japanese: なぜあんなことを口走ったのか、その理由が自分でもよくわからない。
Translation: Even I'm not sure why I care how many there are...
KR: 왜 그런 말을 했는지 나도 잘 모르겠다.

Name: e2164b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ええと……それは……」
Translation: "Uhh... well..."

Name: e2164b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それは？」
Translation: "Well, what?"

Name: e2164b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ほら、微妙に見かけが違うだろ？」
Translation: "Well... They're not exactly the same, see?"

Name: e2165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どっちが好き？」
Translation: "Which one do you like better?"

Name: e2165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「こっち」
Translation: "This one."

Name: e2165.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そっちのは、絶対嫌」
Translation: "That one sucks."

Name: e2165.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん……そっか」
Translation: "Oh... Okay."

Name: e2165.nss
Japanese: 俺には違いがよくわからないが、あれだけ断固として言うからには、きっとなにか理由があるのだろう。
Translation: I don't see what makes that one so much worse, but clearly she must have a reason to feel so strongly about it.
KR: 나는 차이를 잘 모르겠지만, 저렇게까지 단호하게 얘기하는 데에는 뭔가 이유가 있는 거겠지.

Name: e2165a.nss
Japanese: 早速、それを持ってレジへ向かう。
Translation: I grab it and hurry over to the register.

Name: e2165a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「いつも、どうもありがとう。
　日頃の感謝の気持ち」
Translation:
"Here's a token of my gratitude...
for everything you do for me each day."

Name: e2165a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「えへへ……」
Translation: "Hehehe..."

Name: e2166.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「記念すべき、心一からの１０個目のプレゼント」
Translation: "We should celebrate. This is the 10th present you've given to me."

Name: e2166.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え……そんなにあげたっけ？」
Translation: "Wait... Really? That many?"

Name: e2166.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私はちゃんと、日記に記録してるの」
Translation: "Yes, really. I've been keeping track in my diary."

Name: e2166.nss
Japanese: ああ、美雪にはそういう細かい所があるんだよな。
Translation: Figures. She sure loves to note down every little detail...
KR: 그래, 미유키는 그런 꼼꼼한 면이 있었지...

Name: e2167.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「大切にとっておくね」
Translation: "I'll treasure it."

Name: e2167.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「つけないのか？」
Translation: "Aren't you gonna wear it?"

Name: e2167.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私にはあんまり似合わないし、それに――」
Translation: "No, it wouldn't really suit me. Besides..."

Name: e2167.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「私にプレゼントしてくれた――
　そのことが、嬉しいの」
Translation: "I'm just happy you thought to get me something at all."

Name: e2167.nss
Japanese: 美雪の笑顔は、見とれてしまうくらい可愛かった。
Translation: Her smile is bewitchingly cute...
KR: 미유키의 미소는 넋을 잃을 정도로 귀여웠다.

Name: e2171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「つきあわせちゃって、ゴメンね」
Translation: "Sorry for dragging you along with me."

Name: e2171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん……いいよ」
Translation: "Nah, it's fine."

Name: e2171.nss
Japanese: 買い物を終え、俺たちは書店の前で再会した。
Translation: With our shopping done, we meet up outside the bookstore.
KR: 쇼핑을 마치고 우리는 서점 앞에서 재회했다.

Name: e2171.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺もちょうど、本が欲しかったところだし」
Translation: "I wanted to buy a book myself, anyway."

Name: e2171.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なにを買ったの？」
Translation: "What did you get?"

Name: e2171.nss
Japanese: 訊ねられて、紙袋から俺が取り出したのは――
Translation: I reach into my shopping bag and pull out—
KR: 그 말을 듣고 내가 봉투에서 꺼낸 것은...

Name: e2171.nss
Japanese: "はじめての料理","猫の飼い方"
Translation: "Cooking 101","Cat Owner's Manual"

Name: e2172a.nss
Japanese: 『はじめての料理』
Translation: "Cooking 101."

Name: e2172a.nss
Japanese: 美雪の表情が、微かに曇る。
Translation: Miyuki's expression darkens slightly.

Name: e2172a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私の料理、美味しくない？」
Translation: "You don't like my cooking?"

Name: e2172a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ、そういうんじゃないって！」
Translation: "Oh, no, that's not it at all!"

Name: e2172a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いつも、作ってもらってばっかりだからさ」
Translation: "I just feel bad, having you cook for me all the time."

Name: e2172a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いいのよ！　台所は私の聖域なんだし」
Translation: "It's fine! The kitchen is like my sanctuary, anyway."

Name: e2172a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "But—"

Name: e2172a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「台所には、入っちゃ駄目！」
Translation: "You stay out of there, mister!"

Name: e2172a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一は、私の作るごはん、食べてればいいの」
Translation: "Just eat my cooking and be happy!"
KR: "신이치는 내가 만들어주는 밥을 먹고 있으면 돼!"

Name: e2172a.nss
Japanese: 断固とした反対の声が、なんだか引っかかる。
Translation: Something about her hard objection gives me pause.
KR: 너무 단호한 말투에 뭔가 마음에 걸렸다.

Name: e2172a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪さ、料理のことになると意地になるよな」
Translation: "You know, you always get so stubborn when it comes to cooking."

Name: e2172a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Huh? I do?"

Name: e2172a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そんな、こだわる理由でもあるのか？」
Translation: "Is there a reason you can't compromise with me on this?"

Name: e2172a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうじゃないけど……」
Translation: "Well, no, but..."

Name: e2172a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「美雪みたいなのは無理かもしれないけど。
　いつものお返し、したいんだ」
Translation:
"I'll probably never cook as well as you do, but...
I still want to do this for you."
KR: "미유키 정도는 못하겠지만... 평소의 답례를 하고 싶어."

Name: e2172a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だから、な？」
Translation: "Please?"

Name: e2172a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……わ、わかったわよ」
Translation: "...F-Fine then! Sheesh!"

Name: e2172a.nss
Japanese: 美雪は不承不承、頷いてくれるのだった。
Translation: Miyuki reluctantly relents.

Name: e2172b.nss
Japanese: 『猫の飼い方』
Translation: "Cat Owner's Manual."

Name: e2172b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「――どうしてこんな本を？」
Translation: "...Why would you buy that?"

Name: e2172b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪、猫が好きだろ？」
Translation: "Well, you like cats, don't you?"

Name: e2172b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あのマンションはペット禁止」
Translation: "But our apartment doesn't allow pets."

Name: e2172b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それに私が猫アレルギーなの、知ってるでしょ？」
Translation: "Besides, you know I'm allergic."
KR: "게다가 나 고양이 알레르기 있어, 너도 알잖아?"

Name: e2172b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ……そっか」
Translation: "Oh... Right."

Name: e2172b.nss
Japanese: うーん、この本を買ってきて、失敗だったかな……？
Translation: Maybe I shouldn't have bought this...
KR: 음... 이 책은 고르지 말걸 그랬나...

Name: e2172c.nss
Japanese: 『はじめての料理』
Translation: "Cooking 101."

Name: e2172c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「また、その本？」
Translation: "Again?"

Name: e2172c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: e2172c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「この間、買ってきたじゃない」
Translation: "You just bought that book the other day!"

Name: e2172c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうだっけ？　あはははは……」
Translation: "I did? Hahahahaha..."

Name: e2172d.nss
Japanese: 『はじめての料理』
Translation: "Cooking 101."

Name: e2172d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...That's the third time."

Name: e2172d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What?"

Name: e2172d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「まだ、その本が欲しいの？」
Translation: "How many times are you going to buy that stupid book?"

Name: e2172d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、なんだかこう見てるとすごく欲しくなって……」
Translation: "I dunno... Every time I see it, I just gotta have it for some reason..."

Name: e2172e.nss
Japanese: 『はじめての料理』
Translation: "Cooking 101."

Name: e2172e.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……あのさ」
Translation: "...Oh, for crying out loud..."

Name: e2172e.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Hmm?"

Name: e2172e.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「４冊も揃えてどうするの？」
Translation: "What are you even going to do with four copies of the same cookbook?"

Name: e2172e.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もしかして、ボケちゃった？」
Translation: "Are you just messing with me?"

Name: e2172e.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そういうわけじゃないけど……」

Name: e2172f.nss
Japanese: 『はじめての料理』
Translation: "Cooking 101."

Name: e2172f.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……はいはい、５冊目５冊目」
Translation: "...Ha ha, very funny. Fifth time's the charm, huh?"

Name: e2172f.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いい加減、わざとやってるでしょ？」
Translation: "Look, will you quit screwing around already?"

Name: e2172f.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「わざとって何だよ……」
Translation: "I'm not screwing around..."

Name: e2172g.nss
Japanese: 『はじめての料理』
Translation: "Cooking 101."

Name: e2172g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あのさ」
Translation: "Listen..."

Name: e2172g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「たまには、エッチな本でも買ったら？」
Translation: "Why not mix things up and buy a porno magazine or something?"

Name: e2172g.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「は！？　無茶言うなよ！」
Translation: "What?! Don't be ridiculous!"

Name: e2172h.nss
Japanese: 『はじめての料理』
Translation: "Cooking 101."

Name: e2172h.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「これで７冊目……」
Translation: "That's your seventh copy..."

Name: e2172h.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「日替わりで使っても、１週間は保つわね」
Translation: "Now you'll have one for every day of the week."

Name: e2172h.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「意味がわかんないし」
Translation: "Why would I do that? That makes no sense..."

Name: e2172i.nss
Japanese: 『はじめての料理』
Translation: "Cooking 101."

Name: e2172i.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あー、もう」
Translation: "Argh! Forget it!"

Name: e2172i.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「これ以上、数なんてかぞえないからね！」
Translation: "I'm done playing this game with you!"

Name: e2172i.nss
Japanese: 美雪は何を言ってるんだ？
Translation: What is she talking about?

Name: e2173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「で、美雪はなに買ったんだ？」
Translation: "So, what did you get?"

Name: e2173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私？　えっと、別に大した本じゃなくて――」
Translation: "Me? Oh, nothing special..."

Name: e2173.nss
Japanese: 紙袋から取り出したのは、手品の種本だった。
Translation: She pulls out "Magic Tricks 101."

Name: e2173.nss
Japanese: 紙袋から取り出したのは、黒魔術の指南書だった。
Translation: She pulls out "The Witch's Guide to Black Magic."

Name: e2173.nss
Japanese: 紙袋から取り出したのは、世界遺産の写真集だった。
Translation: She pulls out "The World Heritage Photobook."

Name: e2173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「最近、集めてるのよ。はは……」
Translation: "Just another one for the collection! Haha..."

Name: e2173.nss
Japanese: なんか、怪しい。
Translation: Seems a little weird, but okay...

Name: e2173.nss
Japanese: 美雪がそんなものに興味を持っている様子は、全く見受けられなかった。
Translation: I had no idea she was into that stuff.
KR: 미유키가 저런 물건에 흥미 있는 모습은 전혀 보이지 않았다.

Name: e2173.nss
Japanese: なにか隠し事があるような……
Translation: Almost feels like she's hiding something from me...

Name: e2173.nss
Japanese: よく見れば、紙袋は到底１冊分の厚さでは収まらない。
Translation: That said, I can tell from the size of the bag she's holding that she definitely bought at least one other book...
KR: 자세히 보니 종이봉투에 여전히 뭔가가 들어있었다.

Name: e2173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そっちのは？」
Translation: "What about that one?"

Name: e2173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ、うん。コレ？」
Translation: "Oh, right. This?"

Name: e2173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「プログラミングの本だけど」
Translation: "Programming For Dummies."

Name: e2173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ゲームでも創るのか？」
Translation: "Making a video game or something?"

Name: e2173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「まあ、そんなところかな！」
Translation: "Yeah, something like that!"

Name: e2173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「で、その真ん中は？」
Translation: "So, what's that in the middle there?"

Name: e2173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ない！」
Translation: "Nothing!"

Name: e2173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なにも挟まってなんて、ない！」
Translation: "There's nothing hidden in there!"

Name: e2173.nss
Japanese: 間に挟んで買う本と言えば。
Translation: Hmm... Now what sort of book would she want to hide from the store clerk?

Name: e2173.nss
Japanese: 店員さんに見せたくない本と言えば。
KR: 남들에게 보여주고 싶지 않은 책이라고 하면...

Name: e2173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あー。そういや、クラスで言ってたな」
Translation: "Oh, that reminds me. You mentioned something in class the other day..."

Name: e2173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「確か今月の何とかって雑誌、エッチの特集号とか――」
Translation: "Something about this month's issue of some magazine featuring a sexy photo collection—"
KR: "분명 이번 달 어쩌구 잡지. 섹시 특집 편이었나..."

Name: e2173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ないッ！」
Translation: "No!"

Name: e2173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私がそんな本、買うはず――！！」
Translation: "I'd never buy something like that!!!"

Name: e2173.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「うんわかるわかる。美雪が、買うはず、ないよな」
Translation: "Of course not! You'd never buy anything like that."
KR: "그럼 그럼. 미유키가 그런 책을 살 리가 없지."

Name: e2173.nss
Japanese: 顔を真っ赤にして、なにも言えなくなってしまう美雪。
Translation: Miyuki's face flushes bright red, and she falls silent.
KR: 얼굴이 새빨개진 채 아무 말도 하지 못하는 미유키.

Name: e2173.nss
Japanese: 武士の情けで、これ以上の追及はやめることにしよう。
Translation: I'm a merciful man, so I'll let her off the hook.

Name: e2173.nss
Japanese: と思ったら、美雪はそっぽを向いたまま、ギリギリ聞こえるか聞こえないかくらいの小さな声で言った。
Translation: Just then, Miyuki turns away and mutters under her breath just loud enough for me to hear...
KR: 그렇게 생각하던 찰나, 미유키는 다른 쪽을 보고서 들릴 듯 말 듯한 목소리로 말했다.

Name: e2173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「次は、絶対――」
Translation: "Next time, I swear..."

Name: e2173.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「気を失うくらい、気持ち良くしてあげるんだから」
Translation: "I'm gonna fuck your brains out."

Name: e2173.nss
Japanese: あー、こわいコワイ。
Translation: Oh, no... Anything but that...

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: 美雪が打ったボールは、緩やかな放物線を描いて「２塁打」に当たる。
Translation: Miyuki's ball flies up, tracing a lazy arc in the air, and smacks into the "Double" target.
KR: 미유키가 친 공은 완만한 포물선을 그리며 '2루타'에 맞았다.

Name: e2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ああ……惜しい！」
Translation: "Aargh... So close!"

Name: e2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はは、残念だったな」
Translation: "Haha! Sucks for you."

Name: e2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……なによ、余裕綽々ね」
Translation: "Well, SOMEBODY sure sounds confident..."

Name: e2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私に勝てる自信、あるの？」
Translation: "You think you can beat me?"

Name: e2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「さあ、やってみるか？」
Translation: "Maybe. Guess we'll find out, won't we?"

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: 俺は、立てかけていたバットを手に取る。
Translation: I grab the bat resting against the wall.

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: ふたりで貸し切りの、バッティングセンター。
Translation: Tonight we rented out the batting cages just for ourselves.

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: 今夜は余興で、ホームラン競争が始まった。
Translation: Our home run competition is officially underway.
KR: 오늘 밤의 여흥은 홈런 먼저 치기.

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: 負けた方が勝った方の言うことをなんでも聞くという、勝利特典付きであるのだが……
Translation: The prize: The loser has to do anything the winner says.
KR: 진 사람은 이긴 사람의 말을 뭐든 들어준다는 특전이 걸려 있는데...

Name: e2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それじゃ私も、全力で相手してあげる」
Translation: "Alright then. I'll give you everything I've got."

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: 美雪はグローブを手にはめると、てくてくとピッチングマシーンの隣に歩いた。
Translation: Miyuki puts on a pitcher's glove, then walks up next to the pitching machine.
KR: 미유키는 글러브를 손에 끼더니 터벅터벅 배팅머신 옆으로 걸어갔다.

Name: e2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「勝負よ！」
Translation: "You're on!"

Name: e2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「待て、お前が投げるのか？」
Translation: "Wait... YOU'RE gonna pitch to me?"

Name: e2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私が、打つだけしか出来ないと思った！？」
Translation: "What, you think I don't know how to throw the ball?!"

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: いや、美雪は万能の天才的なアレなので、ピッチャーをやればそこそこ出来るのは想像できる。
Translation: Miyuki definitely has the talent to pull off anything she puts her mind to, and that includes pitching.
KR: 미유키는 만능 캐릭터라 투수도 할 수 있다는 게 쉽게 상상이 된다.

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: が、ここはそもそもバッティングセンターだし、美雪は今制服姿で――
Translation: But these cages are meant for BATTING, and besides, she's still in her school unif—
KR: 하지만 여기는 야구연습장이고, 미유키는 지금 교복차림인데...

Name: e2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「うおっ！！」
Translation: "Whoa!!!"

Name: e2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ストラーイク！」
Translation: "Steeerike one!"

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: 美雪の剛速球に、手も足も出なかった。
Translation: What was I supposed to do with that fastball?

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: マサカリ投法だった。
Translation: That was a masakari pitch!

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: トルネード投法だった。
Translation: That was a tornado pitch!

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: サブマリン投法だった。
Translation: That was a submarine pitch!

Name: e2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ホントかよ……」
Translation: "Gimme a break...!"

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: バッティングフォーム同様、見る者を魅了するフォーム。
Translation: As with her swing, her pitching form is effortlessly breathtaking.
KR: 스윙 폼 만큼이나 보는 사람을 매료시키는 투구 폼.

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: さすがにピッチングマシーンの最高速よりは劣るが、球の伸びが半端じゃない。
Translation: Naturally, her speed can't compete with the pitching machine, but she's still quite impressive.
KR: 배팅머신 정도는 아니지만, 공 속도가 장난이 아니다.

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: 正直、普通にホームランを打つよりも難しいかも――
Translation: Honestly, this might actually make it HARDER to hit a home run...
KR: 솔직히 그냥 홈런을 치는 것보다 어려울지도...

Name: e2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あと２球！」
Translation: "Two more tries!"

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: 俺は慌てて、腰を落とした。
Translation: I hastily get into my batting stance.

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: ボールが顔面すれすれを飛んでいく。
Translation: The ball grazes past my cheek.

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: ほんのわずかでも反応が遅れたら、顔面に当たってもおかしくなかった。
Translation: If I'd been even a split-second slower, it could have struck me right in the face...
KR: 조금이라도 반응이 늦었다면 안면에 강타했을 것이다.

Name: e2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ごめんなさい。抜けちゃったわ」
Translation: "Sorry... My hand slipped."

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: 表面上こそ謝ってはいるものの、わざと顔面近くを狙って投げたのは自明で――
Translation: Despite her nominal apology, it's obvious she aimed near my head on purpose.
KR: 표면상 사과하고 있지만, 일부러 얼굴 쪽을 노리고 던진 건 자명하다.

Name: e2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どうしたの？　腰、引けてるけど」
Translation: "What's wrong? Your legs are shaking."

Name: e2181.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...Damn it!"

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: 内角攻めで恐怖心を抱かせておいてから、外角いっぱいギリギリを攻める。
Translation: First she goes for an inside pitch to freak me out, then an outside pitch I can barely reach.
KR: 몸쪽 공격으로 공포심을 갖게 한 뒤, 바깥쪽 아슬아슬한 곳을 노린다.

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: バットに当てるのが精一杯。
Translation: It takes everything I've got just to hit it.

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: 美雪のピッチングには、少しの妥協もなかった。
Translation: She wasn't kidding... She really is giving me all she's got!

Name: e2181.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ラスト１球！」
Translation: "Last ball!"

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: 美雪は制服姿で振りかぶる。
Translation: She winds up.

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: もう、俺には後がない。
Translation: I'm done for.

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: 美雪のことだ、一気に決着をつけに来るだろう。
Translation: This is Miyuki we're talking about. She'll want to finish this once and for all.
KR: 내가 아는 미유키라면 바로 결판내려 하겠지.

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: 絶体絶命の危機。
Translation: I'm at the end of my rope...

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: だが、追い詰められたからこそ、俺にはわかる。
Translation: But that's when I realize.
KR: 하지만 내몰렸기에 오히려 알 수 있다.

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: 彼女と過ごした日々が、最後のボールを教えてくれた。
Translation: All the time we've spent together has given me the clues I need to predict this last pitch.
KR: 미유키와 보낸 날들이 마지막 공을 알려주었다.

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: 完璧主義者の彼女が最後に選ぶのは、きっと――
Translation: She's a perfectionist, and so for her final throw, she'll choose her signature pitch...

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: カーブだ。
Translation: ...a curveball!

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: シュートだ。
Translation: ...a screwball!

Name: e2181.nss
Japanese: フォークだ。
Translation: ...a forkball!

Name: e2181a.nss
Japanese: 読み通り。
Translation: Sure enough.

Name: e2181a.nss
Japanese: 打ち返された白球が、月夜の空に放物線を描く。
Translation: The baseball collides with my bat and flies up, glowing pale white as it carves an arc through the night sky.

Name: e2181a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「よっしゃ！」
Translation: "Hell yeah!"

Name: e2181a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ホームラン……？」
Translation: "Home run...?"

Name: e2181a.nss
Japanese: 木枠の真ん中に命中した。
Translation: It smacks the target dead center.

Name: e2181a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なんで最後の球、わかったのよ？」
Translation: "How did you know what I was planning for the last ball?"

Name: e2181a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あれ、昔俺が教えた球だろ？」
Translation: "I taught you that pitch way back when, remember?"
KR: "그거 옛날에 내가 가르쳐 준 공 맞지?"

Name: e2181a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪が本気で三振を取りに来るなら、アレだと思った」
Translation: "I figured you'd go that route to make me strike out."
KR: "네가 진심으로 삼진을 잡을 거라면 그거일 줄 알았어."

Name: e2181a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「覚えてたんだ」
Translation: "You remembered..."

Name: e2181a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……まあ、いいわ」
Translation: "...Well, alright."

Name: e2181a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「負けは負けなんだし。
　貴方の願い事、なんでも聞いてあげる」
Translation:
"You won, fair and square.
I'll do whatever you ask."
KR: "진 건 진 거니까. 네 소원, 뭐든 들어줄게."

Name: e2181a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私に、なにして欲しい？」
Translation: "So what do you want from me?"

Name: e2181a.nss
Japanese: なんでも……か。
Translation: Whatever I ask, hm?

Name: e2181a.nss
Japanese: 今回は結構気合いを入れて勝負をしたことだし。
Translation: Well, it WAS a narrow victory...
KR: 제대로 된 승부였으니까 적당한 대가를 받아도 괜찮겠지...?

Name: e2181a.nss
Japanese: それなりの見返りを求めてもいいはずだよな……？
Translation: Surely I can get away with asking for something a little ballsy...

Name: e2181a.nss
Japanese: となれば、俺の求める願い事はひとつ。
Translation: And in that case, only one thing comes to mind...
KR: 그렇다면 내가 바라는 소원은 단 하나...

Name: e2181a.nss
Japanese: "美雪が欲しい","アオイが欲しい"
Translation: "I want Miyuki","I want Aoi"

Name: e2181b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「じゃあ早速、言うこと聞いてもらおうかしら」
Translation: "Now then, it's time for your orders."

Name: e2181b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「で、何をするんだ？」
Translation: "Okay... What do you want me to do?"

Name: e2181b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうね……私が心一に望むこと。それは――」
Translation: "Good question... What do I want from you...? Let's see..."

Name: e2181b.nss
Japanese: 美雪は突然、俺の側に顔を寄せて――
Translation: Suddenly, she leans in—

Name: e2181b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「一緒にエッチ、しよ？」
Translation: "Why don't we have sex?"

Name: e2181b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょ、ちょっと待った！　ここで――？」
Translation: "Wh-Whoa there! Hold on a minute! Here?!?"

Name: e2181b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「したいの？」
Translation: "You wanna?"

Name: e2181b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、でも――」
Translation: "W-We can't!"

Name: e2181b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「しちゃおっか？」
Translation: "Why not? Let's do it."

Name: e2181b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょっ！」
Translation: "Wait!"

Name: e2181b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「冗談」
Translation: "Just kidding."

Name: e2181b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でも……もう、普通のは飽きちゃったかな」
Translation: "Still... I kinda wanna spice things up a bit."

Name: e2181b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一は、どんなのがしたい？」
Translation: "Any kinks you wanna try?"

Name: e2181b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そ、それは――」
Translation: "W-Well..."

Name: e2181b.nss
Japanese: "コスプレで","学校で"
Translation: "Do it in cosplay","Do it at school"

Name: e2181c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?!"

Name: e2181c.nss
Japanese: 俺のバットは、大きく空を切る。
Translation: My bat cuts through empty air.

Name: e2181c.nss
Japanese: 読みは当たっていたのだが、思った以上の変化だった。
Translation: I guessed correctly, and yet still she exceeded my every expectation...

Name: e2181c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「腕、上げたな」
Translation: "You've gotten good..."

Name: e2181c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私が何度、練習したと思ってるの？」
Translation: "Do you have any idea how much practice I've put in?"

Name: e2181c.nss
Japanese: さすがにそれは、想像がつかないな……
Translation: Good point... I can't begin to imagine...

Name: e2181d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?!"

Name: e2181d.nss
Japanese: 俺のバットは、大きく空を切る。
Translation: My bat cuts through empty air.

Name: e2181d.nss
Japanese: 読みが外れてしまった……
Translation: Looks like I guessed wrong...

Name: e2181d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今のは……ナックル！？」
Translation: "Was that... a knuckleball?!"

Name: e2181d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「同じ球投げるのにも、飽きてきちゃったの」
Translation: "I got tired of throwing the same old pitches over and over."

Name: e2181d.nss
Japanese: さすがは美雪、向上心の塊だ。
Translation: Ambitious as always, my Miyuki...

Name: e2181e.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?!"

Name: e2181e.nss
Japanese: 思わず大きな声を上げてしまった。
Translation: I yelp in surprise.

Name: e2181e.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ボールが、跳ねた！？」
Translation: "Did the ball just jump?!"

Name: e2181e.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ライズボールっていうの」
Translation: "It's called a riseball."

Name: e2181e.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ソフトボールを応用してみたんだけど、どう？」
Translation: "Thought I'd try some softball moves. What did you think?"

Name: e2181e.nss
Japanese: 応用って……野球で、そんなことができるのか？
Translation: You can DO that...?
KR: 응용이라니... 야구에서 그런 일이 가능한 건가?

Name: e2181e.nss
Japanese: さすがは美雪としか言いようがない……
Translation: Miyuki never fails to impress me...
KR: 역시 미유키라는 말 밖에 할 수가 없었다.

Name: e2181f.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?!"

Name: e2181f.nss
Japanese: 自分の目を、疑うしかない。
Translation: I blink.

Name: e2181f.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ボールが消えた！？」
Translation: "Did the ball just disappear?!"

Name: e2181f.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「消える魔球」
Translation: "It's a vanishing demonball."

Name: e2181f.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「すごいでしょ」
Translation: "Pretty cool, huh?"

Name: e2181f.nss
Japanese: いやいや、確かにすごいんだけど。
Translation: Okay, now you're just pushing it...

Name: e2181f.nss
Japanese: いくら美雪でもやり過ぎなんじゃないだろうか……
Translation: Admittedly, it IS pretty cool, though...
KR: 아무리 미유키라도 너무 지나친 게 아닐까...

Name: e2182a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪が欲しい」
Translation: "I want you, Miyuki."

Name: e2182a.nss
Japanese: 頭の先まで赤くして、美雪の身体がよろけた。
Translation: Her entire face flushes red, and she staggers.

Name: e2182a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お、おい、美雪？　大丈夫か？」
Translation: "Wh-Whoa there... You okay?"

Name: e2182a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ご……ごめんなさい。びっくりしちゃって」
Translation: "S-Sorry... You just kinda caught me off-guard, that's all."

Name: e2182a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「うん、そうだよな。やっぱりナシ――」
Translation: "Oh... Sorry about that. I take it back—"

Name: e2182a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ち、違うの！」
Translation: "N-No!"

Name: e2182a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私も……ちょっとだけ、考えてたから」
Translation: "I... I was maybe thinking the same thing, so..."

Name: e2182a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そ、そっか」

Name: e2182a.nss
Japanese: 蚊の鳴くような声で告白されて、俺は思わず一息。
Translation: Her barely audible admission makes me inhale sharply.
KR: 들릴 듯 말 듯한 미유키의 목소리를 듣고 나도 모르게 한숨이 나왔다.

Name: e2182a.nss
Japanese: 美雪だって緊張しただろうけど、俺だってそれを切り出すには、それなりに緊張したのだ。
Translation: I know she must be nervous, but trust me, I'm just as nervous myself.
KR: 미유키도 긴장했겠지만, 나도 말을 꺼내려다 보니 나름 긴장해 있었다.

Name: e2182a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪」
Translation: "Miyuki..."

Name: e2182a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Shinichi...?"

Name: e2182a.nss
Japanese: 俺は静かに美雪との距離を詰め――
Translation: I move in close—

Name: e2182a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だ、だめ！　ここじゃ、だめ！」
Translation: "W-We can't! Not here!"

Name: e2182a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私、心の準備ができてないし、汗臭いし、それに――」
Translation: "I need time to prepare myself emotionally... and besides, I'm all sweaty, and—"
KR: "나 마음의 준비가 아직이고, 땀 냄새 나고, 게다가..."

Name: e2182a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「店員さんもいるし」
Translation: "—and the owner's right there!"

Name: e2182a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そ、そうだよな！」
Translation: "O-Oh yeah... Right..."

Name: e2182a.nss
Japanese: 美雪が可愛すぎて理性を失いかけてしまったが、流石にここでこのままっていうのはないよな。
Translation: She's so cute, I nearly lost control... but she has a point. We really can't do this here.
KR: 미유키가 너무 귀여워서 이성을 잃어버릴 뻔했지만, 역시 여기서는 무리겠지.

Name: e2182a.nss
Japanese: うん。
Translation: ...Ah well.

Name: e2182b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アオイが欲しい」
Translation: "I want Aoi."

Name: e2182b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「アオイって……あの、ゲームの？」
Translation: "Aoi? You mean the girl from the visual novel?"

Name: e2182b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうなんだ」
Translation: "Yeah, her."

Name: e2182b.nss
Japanese: 確認するまでもない。
Translation: Obviously.

Name: e2182b.nss
Japanese: アオイというのは、「君と彼女と彼女の恋。」に出てくるゲームのヒロインのうちのひとりだ。
Translation: Aoi is a heroine in a game called [YOU and ME and HER].
KR: 아오이는 '당신과 그녀와 그녀의 사랑'에 나오는 게임 히로인 중 한명이다.

Name: e2182b.nss
Japanese: 彼女が欲しいと言うことは、即ち――
Translation: And when I say I want her, what I mean is—

Name: e2182b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「実は、アオイの抱き枕が欲しくて――」
Translation: "There's this hug pillow I've been wanting to buy—"

Name: e2182b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "You're kidding..."

Name: e2182b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一って……ああいうのがいいの？」
Translation: "Shinichi... You actually like those things?"

Name: e2182b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「しかも、抱き枕とか……」
Translation: "A hug pillow? Really?"

Name: e2182b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「せめて、クッションまでなら許せたのに……」
Translation: "Maybe I'd let you get away with a little cushion, but..."

Name: e2182b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「せめて、ベッドシーツまでなら許せたのに……」
Translation: "Maybe I'd let you get away with a bedsheet set, but..."

Name: e2182b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「せめて、等身大ＰＯＰまでなら許せたのに……」
Translation: "Maybe I'd let you get away with a life-size cardboard cutout, but..."

Name: e2182b.nss
Japanese: 美雪はかなりショックを受けている様子だ。
Translation: She looks pretty scandalized...

Name: e2182b.nss
Japanese: 俺だって、恥ずかしいのを我慢して言ったのに……
Translation: Do you have any idea how embarrassing it was to ask...?!

Name: e2182b.nss
Japanese: そんな目つきで見なくても、いいじゃないか。
Translation: C'mon... Don't look at me like that...!

Name: e2182c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「コスプレとか……どうかな？」
Translation: "How about... doing it in cosplay?"

Name: e2182c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一って……そういうの、好きだっけ？」
Translation: "Wow, Shinichi... I didn't know you were into that."

Name: e2182c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、美雪がちょっと変わったのって言うから――」
Translation: "I mean, not super... But since you said you wanted to spice things up..."

Name: e2182c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ、うん。批難してるつもりじゃないの」
Translation: "Yeah, I know. Sorry, I wasn't trying to be judgey."

Name: e2182c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「別にオタクっぽい趣味でも嫌いになったりしないし」
Translation: "Besides, I don't have anything against geeky stuff, anyway."
KR: "딱히 오타쿠 같은 취미가 있어도 싫지 않고."

Name: e2182c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "For real?"

Name: e2182c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「極端なのはさすがに嫌かな」
Translation: "I mean, within reason, obviously."

Name: e2182c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「クッションまでなら許してあげるつもり」
Translation: "I'm cool with, like, cushions and stuff."

Name: e2182c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ベッドシーツまでなら許してあげるつもり」
Translation: "I'm cool with, like, bedsheets and stuff."

Name: e2182c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「等身大ＰＯＰまでなら許してあげるつもり」
Translation: "I'm cool with, like, life-size cardboard cutouts and stuff."

Name: e2182c.nss
Japanese: それは寛容な……
Translation: How generous of her.

Name: e2182c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でも、心一？」
Translation: "But you know, Shinichi..."

Name: e2182c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私がいれば、ゲームなんて要らないんじゃない？」
Translation: "As long as you have me, you don't really need those dating sims."
KR: "내가 있으니까 게임 같은 건 필요 없지 않아?"

Name: e2182c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……当たり前だろ？」
Translation: "...Well, obviously!"

Name: e2182c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺は、美雪がコスプレするから、嬉しいんだし」
Translation: "I'm only interested in cosplay if you're the one wearing it."

Name: e2182c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うん。それじゃ、私が相手してあげる」
Translation: "Okay then. I'm willing to give it a try."

Name: e2182c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「メイドさんの格好で、ね」
Translation: "I'll be your little maid."

Name: e2182d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「学校……とか、どうだ？」
Translation: "How about... doing it at school?"

Name: e2182d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「実は、私もそれ、考えてたんだ」
Translation: "To tell the truth, I've been thinking about it myself."

Name: e2182d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ……そっか」
Translation: "Oh... Cool."

Name: e2182d.nss
Japanese: ふたりの気持ちが通じていた。
Translation: Looks like we're on the same page.

Name: e2182d.nss
Japanese: しかも、エッチなことで。
Translation: Guess that means we're... sexually compatible...

Name: e2182d.nss
Japanese: こういうのは、つい照れてしまう。
Translation: The thought makes me a little bashful.

Name: e2182d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あの、さ。教室の机、空いてるじゃない」
Translation: "So... You know that empty desk in the classroom?"

Name: e2182d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「あれ、今度屋上にしまうように言われてるの。
　貴方に協力してもらってね」
Translation:
"They told me to move it up to the roof.
And I was thinking you could help me."
KR: "그거 이번에 옥상으로 치우라고 해서. 네 도움도 받아서 말이야."

Name: e2182d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「その時……どうかな？」
Translation: "What if... we do it then?"

Name: e2182d.nss
Japanese: 確かに、あそこなら誰も来ない……か。
Translation: The roof would certainly offer us a fair bit of privacy...

Name: e2183a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「で……でもね！」

Name: e2183a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あの……えっと……」

Name: e2183a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ひとつ、教室の机、空いたじゃない？」
Translation: "You know that empty desk in the classroom?"

Name: e2183a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ……あれか」
Translation: "Yeah?"

Name: e2183a.nss
Japanese: 確か今、誰も座っていない席がクラスにあったはず……
Translation: I DO seem to recall there's one desk that nobody's using...
KR: 분명 아무도 앉지 않는 자리가 있었는데...

Name: e2183a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「あれ、今度屋上にしまうように言われてるの。
　貴方に協力してもらってね」
Translation:
"They told me to move it up to the roof.
And I was thinking you could help me."
KR: "그거 이번에 옥상으로 치우라고 해서. 네 도움도 받아서 말이야."

Name: e2183a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もし、その時で良かったら……」
Translation: "So if you wanted to do it then..."

Name: e2183a.nss
Japanese: 顔を赤く染め、俯きながらやっと言う美雪。
Translation: Miyuki mumbles, looking at the ground, her face red.
KR: 얼굴이 빨개져서 고개를 숙이고 겨우 말을 꺼내는 미유키.

Name: e2183a.nss
Japanese: そんな風に言われたら、断ることなんて不可能だ。
Translation: At this point, I can't possibly say no.
KR: 그런 식으로 말하면 거절하는 건 이제 불가능하다.

Name: e2183a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから……えっと……」
Translation: "So yeah... um..."

Name: e2183b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「気持ちは、嬉しいの。でも……」
Translation: "I mean, I'm flattered, but..."

Name: e2183b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「やっぱり、もう少し貴方が信じられるようになるまで、待たせて欲しいの」
Translation: "I just... I need a little more time before I can trust you."
KR: "역시... 좀 더 너를 믿을 수 있게 될 때까지 기다려줬으면 해."

Name: e2184a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それまでは、コレで我慢して」
Translation: "Until then, here's something to tide you over."

Name: e2184a.nss
Japanese: 美雪は俺に近づいて――
Translation: She moves in close—

Name: e2184a.nss
Japanese: そっと、唇を重ねた。
Translation: —and gently kisses me.

Name: e2184b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私を裏切るなんて、できなくしてあげる」
Translation: "I'll make sure you can never betray me."

Name: e2184b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Betray you...?"

Name: e2184b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう少ししたら、ね」
Translation: "Just give me a little more time..."

Name: e2185a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんなに、生身の人間が嫌いなら――」
Translation: "If you insist you hate real girls that much..."

Name: e2185a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「実力で改心させるしかないわね」
Translation: "...then I'll just have to rehabilitate you."

Name: e2185a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「かいしん……？」
Translation: "Rehabilitate me how...?"

Name: e2185a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方の願い、この私が叶えてあげようじゃないの！」
Translation: "I'll make your wildest dreams come true!"

Name: e2185a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ほ……本当か？」
Translation: "R-Really...?"

Name: e2185a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ええ、もちろんよ」
Translation: "Of course."

Name: e2185a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君が望む、最高の形でね」
Translation: "I'll give you everything you could ever want and more."

Name: e2185a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「楽しみに待ってなさい……」
Translation: "Just you wait and see..."

Name: e2185a.nss
Japanese: 美雪の表情に浮かぶ笑みは、なんだかとても不吉なものに見えたのだが、気のせいだろうか……？
Translation: Is it just my imagination playing tricks on me, or... do I sense something wicked hiding behind her smile...?
KR: 미유키의 미소가 왠지 불길해 보였는데 기분 탓인가...?

Name: e2185b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「心一、お願い！
　今なら引き返せるわ」
Translation:
"Shinichi, please!
It's not too late to turn back!"

Name: e2185b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「おかしな考えはやめて、普通の人間を好きになって」
Translation: "Let go of your weird obsession and just fall in love with a normal human being!"
KR: "이상한 생각 말고 평범한 인간을 좋아해 줘!"

Name: e2185b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「普通の人間って、そんな大げさな……」
Translation: "C'mon, don't be ridiculous..."

Name: e2185b.nss
Japanese: 彼女の表情を見て、ハッとする。
Translation: When I look at her, it hits me.

Name: e2185b.nss
Japanese: 冗談ではない。
Translation: She's not joking.

Name: e2185b.nss
Japanese: 美雪の瞳にはなぜか、うっすら涙まで浮かんでいた。
Translation: Her eyes are swimming with tears.

Name: e2185b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……私、そんなに魅力、ないかな？」
Translation: "...Am I really that repulsive to you?"

Name: e2185b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「こんなに……心一が、好きなのに……」
Translation: "I love you so much... So, so much..."

Name: e2185b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一は、私よりゲームのキャラクターが好きなの？」
Translation: "Would you really choose a 2D character over me?"

Name: e2185b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、そうじゃなくてなんていうか、その……」
Translation: "No, that's not it... I just... er..."

Name: e2185b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それとこれとは……別って言うか……」
Translation: "It's just different, I guess... I don't know how to explain it..."

Name: e2185b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そんなの……わかんないよ」
Translation: "I just... I just don't get it."

Name: e2185b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「えっと――そうだ、ほら！」
Translation: "Let's see... Oh, I know!"

Name: e2185b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お腹いっぱい食べた後でも、甘いものなら――」
Translation: "It's like when you finish eating dinner, but here comes dessert—"

Name: e2185b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なにが別腹よっ！！」
Translation: "I'm not your fucking dessert!!!"

Name: e2185b.nss
Japanese: 怒らせてしまった。
Translation: Oops.

Name: e2185b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう知らない！　私、帰る！」
Translation: "Forget it! I'm going home!"

Name: e2185b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょっと、美雪！？」
Translation: "Wait! Miyuki!"

Name: e2185b.nss
Japanese: 俺の呼びかけに反応することもなく、帰って行く美雪。
Translation: But she ignores me and leaves.
KR: 내가 불러도 반응하지 않고 돌아가는 미유키.

Name: e2185b.nss
Japanese: これじゃ、俺の願いは叶えてもらえそうにないな……
Translation: Guess I won't be getting what I want...

Name: e2191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふんふん……ふふふ……」
Translation: "Hmhmhm... Hehehe..."

Name: e2191.nss
Japanese: なんか美雪、上機嫌だな……
Translation: Miyuki seems to be in an awfully good mood...

Name: e2191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なにかあったのか？」
Translation: "Something cool happen?"

Name: e2191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふふ、実は懸賞でね――」
Translation: "Hehe... Well, you see... I entered into a raffle the other day, and..."

Name: e2191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「欲しかった旅行券、当たっちゃったの」
Translation: "I won two tickets to go on a trip!"

Name: e2191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「旅行券？」
Translation: "What sort of trip?"

Name: e2191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ね、心一？　今度一緒に温泉に――」
Translation: "A trip to the hot springs! Wanna come with—"

Name: e2191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「欲しかったウォーターオーブン、当たっちゃったの」
Translation: "I won that water oven I've been wanting!"

Name: e2191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ウォーターオーブン？」
Translation: "What's a water oven?"

Name: e2191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「火じゃなくて、水蒸気で加熱調理するから――」
Translation: "It's an oven that uses steam instead of fire to cook—"

Name: e2191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「欲しかった試写会のチケット、当たっちゃったの」
Translation: "I won tickets to an advance movie screening!"

Name: e2191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「試写会？」
Translation: "Oh yeah?"

Name: e2191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「舞台挨拶があって、私の好きな役者さんが――」
Translation: "There's a meet-and-greet afterwards, and my favorite actor is—"

Name: e2191.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Wait..."

Name: e2191.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ん？　なにか……」
Translation: "Hmm? Is something wrong...?"

Name: e2191a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...What's with the box?"

Name: e2191a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「箱だな」
Translation: "No idea..."

Name: e2191a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「中身は――」
Translation: "I wonder what's inside..."

Name: e2191a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「行きましょ。触らぬ神に祟りなし」
Translation: "Let's just leave it. Curiosity killed the cat, you know."

Name: e2191a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「誰が道ばたに神様なんて捨てるんだよ」
Translation: "Gimme a break. I really doubt there's anything that dangerous in here."

Name: e2191a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いいから、一緒に帰るの」
Translation: "Seriously, let's just go!"

Name: e2191a.nss
Japanese: "そのまま帰る","段ボールを開ける"
Translation: "Leave","Open the box"

Name: e2191b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...No, hold on."

Name: e2191b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ここに今、猫がいたような気がして」
Translation: "Was there a cat here just now...?"

Name: e2191b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "A cat? Here?"

Name: e2191b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうそう。黒いヤツ」
Translation: "Yeah, a little black one."

Name: e2191b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「気のせいでしょ」
Translation: "You must be imagining things."

Name: e2191b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、でもなんかいた気が――」
Translation: "No, I'm pretty sure—"

Name: e2191b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ。そういえば、さ！」
Translation: "Oh, that reminds me!"

Name: e2192a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「わかったよ。行こう」
Translation: "Alright. Let's go."

Name: e2192a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それでよろしい」
Translation: "Good."

Name: e2192b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でもさ、やっぱり気になるだろ」
Translation: "Still, it's worth a peek, don't you think?"

Name: e2192b.nss
Japanese: 俺は段ボールに一歩近づき、手を――
Translation: I take a step towards the box and reach out—

Name: e2192b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「ちょっと、やめなさいって！
　中にはなにもいないから！」
Translation:
"Hey! Stop that!
There's nothing in there!"

Name: e2192b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんでわかるんだよ？」
Translation: "How do you know?"

Name: e2192b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いいから！」
Translation: "I just do, okay?!"

Name: e2192b.nss
Japanese: ものすごい剣幕で睨み付けられる。
Translation: She glares at me viciously.

Name: e2192b.nss
Japanese: ――なんでそんな、この段ボールにこだわるんだ？
Translation: ...Why does she care so much about this box?

Name: e2192b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方、私とその段ボール、どっちが大事なの？」
Translation: "Which is more important, me or the box?"
KR: "나랑 그 상자 중에 뭐가 더 중요해?"

Name: e2192b.nss
Japanese: "美雪","段ボール"
Translation: "Miyuki","The box"

Name: e2193a.nss
Japanese: そんなもの、比べるまでもない。
Translation: Miyuki, no contest.

Name: e2193a.nss
Japanese: なぜ美雪がそこまで中身を見ないことにこだわるのかはわからないが――
Translation: I'm not sure why she's so adamant about me not looking inside this box, but...
