Name: e2244.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「確か、自分で握るとなかなか上手くいかないって」
Translation: "You said you haven't quite got the hang of making it at home, right?"

Name: e2244.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ピザでいいよな？」
Translation: "Guess I'll order pizza, then?"

Name: e2244.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「確か、家のオーブンだとなかなか上手くいかないって」
Translation: "You said you haven't quite got the hang of making it at home, right?"

Name: e2244.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「中華でいいよな？」
Translation: "Guess I'll order Chinese, then?"

Name: e2244.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「確か、家のコンロだとなかなか上手くいかないって」
Translation: "You said you haven't quite got the hang of making it at home, right?"

Name: e2244.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……覚えててくれたんだ」
Translation: "Aww, you remembered...!"

Name: e2244.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そっちの方が、嬉しいかも」
Translation: "That's an even better gift than the takeout!"

Name: e2244.nss
Japanese: ニッコリと、美雪が笑う。
Translation: Miyuki beams.

Name: e2244.nss
Japanese: その彼女の笑顔が見られただけで、出前を選ぶ価値があるってものだ。
Translation: That smile makes ordering takeout totally worth it...
KR: 그 미소를 보는 것만으로도 배달음식을 선택한 가치가 있었다.

Name: e2244.nss
Japanese: なんだかくすぐったい気分で、俺は電話番号をダイヤルし始めるのだった。
Translation: Feeling pleased with myself, I call up the restaurant...
KR: 왠지 낯간지러운 기분으로 나는 전화번호를 누르기 시작했다.

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「夜、遅くなっちゃったわね」
Translation: "It's gotten pretty late, huh?"

Name: e2251.nss
Japanese: 演劇の本番が近くなり、稽古にも熱が入る。
Translation: As opening night draws near, our rehearsals are really heating up.
KR: 연극 날이 다가오면서 연습에도 열을 올렸다.

Name: e2251.nss
Japanese: 必然的に、俺たちの帰りが遅くなる日も増えていた。
Translation: As a result, we've been staying later and later.
KR: 필연적으로 우리가 늦게 귀가하는 날도 늘어나고 있었다.

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「ハルちゃんたちも頑張ってくれてるし。
　私たちも気合い入れないと――！」
Translation:
"Haru-chan and the others are really working their butts off.
We can't let them steal the show!"
KR: "하루짱도 열심히 해주고 있고. 우리도 기합 넣어야지!"

Name: e2251.nss
Japanese: 力を入れた途端、美雪のお腹が音を立てた。
Translation: Just then, her stomach growls.
KR: 기합을 넣은 순간 미유키의 배에서 소리가 났다.

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……ま、アレだけ運動したんだしな」
Translation: "...Well, we did work up an appetite tonight."

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「そ、そうなの！
　大きな声で発声すると、どうしてもお腹が――」
Translation:
"Y-Yeah!
Using your diaphragm really burns a lot of fuel—"
KR: "그, 그렇다니까! 큰 목소리로 발성하면 아무래도 배가..."

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Aack...!"

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「なんか、軽く腹に入れてくか」
Translation: "Let's grab a little something to eat."

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "O-Okay..."

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「いらっしゃいま――」
Translation: "Welcome—"

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Oh crap..."

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「曙くん……」
Translation: "Hi, Akebono-kun..."

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「犯罪だああああああああああ――――っ！！！」

Name: e2251.nss
Japanese: と、雄太郎は突如として防犯ベルを押しにかかる。
Translation: Yuutarou suddenly reaches for the panic button under the counter.

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょ！　押すなコラだめだって！」
Translation: "Stop! Don't you press that!"

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「うるさいッ！！　離せ！！」
Translation: "Silence!!! Unhand me, thief!!!"

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「リア充は、重大な犯罪行為であるッ！！」
Translation: "The act of being a normie is a grave offense!!!"

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「俺も幼馴染みの美人彼女と夜道をふたりきりで手繋ぎ男の浪漫したい！　したい！」
Translation: "You think I don't want to walk hand in hand at night with my hot girlfriend who I've known all my life?! That's any guy's quintessential dream material!"
KR: "나도 소꿉친구인 미인 여자친구와 밤길을 단둘이서 손잡고 남자의 낭만을 하고 싶어! 하고 싶어!"

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「別に手は繋いでないし！　なあ、美雪？」
Translation: "We're not even holding hands! Right, Miyuki?"
KR: "딱히 손잡고 온 건 아닌데. 그치, 미유키?"

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……繋ぎたくないの？」
Translation: "...We could, though, if you wanted..."

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「繋ぎたいです！」
Translation: "Pick me! I want to!"

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「曙くんには訊いてません」
Translation: "I'm not asking you!"

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ああっ！　美少女に叱られるのもまた浪漫！」
Translation: "Ah...! Enduring a beautiful girl's wrath—another dream of mine!"

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前最近趣味がねじ曲がってきてないか」
Translation: "Your 'dreams' are getting a little freaky lately..."

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「話を逸らさないでもらえる？」
Translation: "Can we not derail the conversation, please?"

Name: e2251.nss
Japanese: 美雪は強引に話題を元に戻す。
Translation: Miyuki interrupts our little tangent.

Name: e2251.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ほら、心一」
Translation: "Come on, Shinichi."

Name: e2251.nss
Japanese: "手を繋ぎたい","手を繋ぎたくない"
Translation: "Hold hands","Don't hold hands"

Name: e2252a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや……繋ぎたいけど」
Translation: "I mean, I DO want to, but..."

Name: e2252a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「じゃ、さ」
Translation: "Well then..."

Name: e2252a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...Let's do it."

Name: e2252a.nss
Japanese: すっ――と差し出される、白い手。
Translation: She smoothly offers her pale hand to me.

Name: e2252a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「えっと――」
Translation: "Uhhh..."

Name: e2252a.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ふぐぐぐぐぐぐぐぐぐぐぐ…………！！」
Translation: "Hnnngggggghhhhh...!!!"

Name: e2252a.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「こ、このまま俺が巻き添えになってもいい！
　それでも構わんから――」
Translation:
"At this point, I don't care if I go to prison!
Arrest me! See if I care! But first—"

Name: e2252a.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「爆発しろッッッッ！！！！」
Translation: "DIIIIIIIIIIE!!!"

Name: e2252a.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「爆発、して――」
Translation: "Just... die..."

Name: e2252a.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「爆発、お願いします、お願い……
　ひぐっ、うっ、うう……」
Translation:
"Please die... Please...
Hnng... nnn... waahh...!"

Name: e2252a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……とりあえず、今はやめよっか」
Translation: "...Let's hold hands some other time."

Name: e2252a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そ、そうね……」
Translation: "Y-Yeah..."

Name: e2252b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、流石にそれは……」
Translation: "I really don't think we should..."

Name: e2252b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そっか……恥ずかしいわよね」
Translation: "Oh, I see... Too embarrassing, huh?"

Name: e2252b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「恥ずかしいっていうか……」
Translation: "It's not that, exactly, just..."

Name: e2252b.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
「爆発だ……爆発しろ……
　ふんっ！　ふんっ！　ふんぐぅっ！！」
Translation:
"Die... DIE...
Hmph! Hmph! HMMPH!!!"

Name: e2252b.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎があんな目つきで睨み付けている前で、手を繋ぐ勇気なんて出るはずがなかった。
Translation: No way I'd have the balls to take her hand while Yuutarou's glaring daggers at me like that...
KR: 유우타로가 저런 눈으로 노려보고 있는데 손을 잡을 용기는 생기지 않았다.

Name: e2252c.nss
Japanese: 出し抜けに、指と指が絡んだ。
Translation: Out of nowhere, her fingers slip between mine.

Name: e2252c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...Okay?"

Name: e2252c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ……うん」
Translation: "Uhh... sure..."

Name: e2252c.nss
Japanese: 温かな感触に、抵抗しようという気力はすっかり消えた。
Translation: Her warmth melts away all my hesitation.
KR: 따뜻한 감촉에 저항하려는 마음이 완전히 사라졌다.

Name: e2252c.nss
Japanese: ただ、彼女と繋がっているという安心感が、俺の身体を満たした。
Translation: This tiny, tenuous connection fills me with a deep sense of security.
KR: 그저 미유키와 연결되어 있다는 안도감이 내 몸을 가득 채웠다.

Name: e2252c.nss
Japanese: の。
Translation: ...But then there's this guy.

Name: e2252c.nss
Japanese: だが。

Name: e2252c.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ひぐっ、うっ、う……」
Translation: "Hnng... nnn... nnn..."

Name: e2252c.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「うううううううううう…………っ！！」
Translation: "Waaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhh...!!!"

Name: e2252c.nss
Japanese: 目の前で、雄太郎が震えていた。
Translation: Yuutarou trembles.

Name: e2252c.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「爆発など……しなくていい！」
Translation: "I take it back! You don't have to die!"

Name: e2252c.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ただ、幸せになればいい！」
Translation: "I just want you to be happy!"

Name: e2252c.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「征け！　征くのだ戦友よ！」
Translation: "Fight on, comrade! Fight on!"

Name: e2252c.nss
Japanese: ……俺はどこに行けばいいのだろうか？
Translation: ...What am I supposed to be "fighting," exactly...?

Name: e2253.nss
Japanese: そんな感じで、店内を物色。
Translation: We continue to browse around the store.

Name: e2253.nss
Japanese: 結局ファーストフードをいくつか買うことにする。
Translation: Eventually, we decide to buy some hot snacks off the grill.
KR: 결국 패스트푸드 몇 개를 사기로 했다.

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「チキチキチキンとカラカラカラアゲ、フラフラポテトでお会計は――」
Translation: "One order of Crispy Chicken Tenders, one Hot N' Spicy Wings, and one Tater Wedgies brings your total to—"
KR: "치키치키 치킨과 가라가라 가라아게, 바삭바삭 감자튀김으로 계산은..."

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「これで」
Translation: "Here you go."

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「はい、４４１円ちょうどお預かりします」
Translation: "Perfect! 441 yen exactly."

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「消費税まで……計算速すぎだろ」
Translation: "You even got the sales tax right?! How did you calculate all that?!"

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「簡単でしょ？」
Translation: "It's not rocket science!"

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「普通に暗算すればすぐ出るじゃない。
　４２０×１．０５」
Translation:
"Just do mental math!
420 times 1.05."

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「無理です」
Translation: "I can't do all that in my head!"

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「普通暗記しない？
　４２０円の時は４４１円」
Translation:
"Just memorize it!
420 yen always equals 441 yen with tax."

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、覚えないし」
Translation: "I can't memorize all that!"

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「４２０の一の位を消して、半分にすると２１。
　元々の数に足すと４４１でしょ？」
Translation: "First you divide by 10, so you drop the 0. Then divide by 2 to get 21. Then add that to your original number to get 441. Easy!"
KR: "420에서 일의 자리를 지우고 반으로 나누면 21. 원래 수에 더하면 441이지?"

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「結構複雑だろ」
Translation: "That's WAY too complicated!"

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「慣れよ、慣れ」
Translation: "It just takes a little practice, that's all."

Name: e2253.nss
Japanese: まあ、美雪らしいと言えば美雪らしいのだけれど。
Translation: Classic Miyuki.

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ほら、心一」
Translation: "Here you go, Shinichi."

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お、おう。サンキュー」
Translation: "Oh, right. Thanks, man."

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「……頑張って、くるんだぞ！」
Translation: "...Break a leg out there!"

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「頑張る？」
Translation: "Doing what...?"

Name: e2253.nss
Japanese: なんかよくわからないけど、袋を手渡す雄太郎が男泣きに泣いていた。
Translation: For some reason, Yuutarou sheds manly tears as he hands us our purchase.
KR: 잘 모르겠지만, 봉지를 건네는 유우타로가 서럽게 울고 있었다.

Name: e2253.nss
Japanese: ……なんで？
Translation: What's going on with him...?

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一、チキンもらえる？」
Translation: "Shinichi, can I have some chicken?"

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おう」
Translation: "Sure."

Name: e2253.nss
Japanese: 店の前で食べることにして、俺は袋を開け――
Translation: As we stand outside the store, I open the bag—
KR: 우리는 가게 앞에서 먹기로 하고 봉지를 열...

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ん？　どうかした？」
Translation: "Hmm? What's wrong?"

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「悪いコレ食って待っててくれ！」
Translation: "Sorry, uh... Here, you take this! Help yourself! I'll be right back!"

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「い、いいけど」
Translation: "O-Okay...?"

Name: e2253.nss
Japanese: 俺はチキチキチキンを美雪に預け、店内に逆戻り。
Translation: I hand Miyuki the Crispy Chicken Tenders and head back inside.
KR: 나는 치키치키 치킨을 미유키에게 맡기고 가게 안으로 되돌아갔다.

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おいコラ！」
Translation: "HEY!"

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「なんだ、心一？」
Translation: "What's up, Shinichi?"

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「これは一体何だ！？」
Translation: "The hell is this?!"

Name: e2253.nss
Japanese: と、俺はレジ袋の底に何故か入っていたコンドームを、カウンターの上に叩き付けた。
Translation: I pull out the box of condoms that MYSTERIOUSLY found its way into our bag!
KR: 나는 비닐봉지 바닥에 들어있던 콘돔을 카운터에 내동댕이쳤다.

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「俺の心遣いだよ……」
Translation: "Just trying to help you out..."

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いらねーよ！」
Translation: "I don't need it!"

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「避妊は必要だッ！」
Translation: "Dude! ALWAYS USE PROTECTION!!!"

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうじゃなくてッ！」
Translation: "That's not my point and you know it!"

Name: e2253.nss
Japanese: しかも入れてきたのが美雪の好きなイチゴの香り付きってのがなんか腹が立つ。
Translation: Even worse, he somehow managed to pick the strawberry-scented kind Miyuki likes! Argh!
KR: 게다가 넣은 게 미유키가 좋아하는 딸기향이라는 것이 왠지 더 열받는다.

Name: e2253.nss
Japanese: しかも入れてきたのが美雪の好きなアップルの香り付きってのがなんか腹が立つ。
Translation: Even worse, he somehow managed to pick the apple-scented kind Miyuki likes! Argh!
KR: 게다가 넣은 게 미유키가 좋아하는 사과향이라는 것이 왠지 더 열받는다.

Name: e2253.nss
Japanese: しかも入れてきたのが美雪の好きなチョコレートの香り付きってのがなんか腹が立つ。
Translation: Even worse, he somehow managed to pick the chocolate-scented kind Miyuki likes! Argh!
KR: 게다가 넣은 게 미유키가 좋아하는 초코향이라는 것이 왠지 더 열받는다.

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「お、俺はッ！　俺は――」
Translation: "L-Listen, I... I..."

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「ひとりの人間として、かけがえのない親友として、男の浪漫倶楽部の存続よりもお前の幸せを――ッ！！」
Translation: "As my brother in arms... Hell, as a fellow human being... Your happiness is way more important to me than the Boys and Dreams Club!!!"
KR: "한 명의 인간으로서, 둘도 없는 친구로서, 남자의 낭만 클럽 존속보다 네 행복을...!!"

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いいから普通にバイトしてろ普通に」
Translation: "Just do your job and quit with the shenanigans."

Name: e2253.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 「はい」
Translation: "Okay."

Name: e2311.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Miyuki...?"

Name: e2311.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なに？」
Translation: "What?"

Name: e2311.nss
Japanese: 美雪は背後霊のように、俺を後ろから見守っていた。
Translation: She's peering over my shoulder like a helicopter mom.
KR: 미유키는 배후령처럼 날 뒤에서 지켜보고 있었다.

Name: e2311.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「せっかく俺が作るんだから、あっちで休んでろって」
Translation: "Why don't you let me make it and go take a load off somewhere?"
KR: "모처럼 내가 만드는 건데, 저쪽에서 쉬고 있어."

Name: e2311.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そんなに俺が心配か？」
Translation: "Or do you not trust me to handle this?"

Name: e2311.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「当然よ」
Translation: "Not at all."

Name: e2311.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ですよね……」
Translation: "Figures..."

Name: e2311.nss
Japanese: "美雪を追い出さない","美雪を追い出す"
Translation: "Let her stay","Kick her out"

Name: e2312a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はぁ……わかったよ」
Translation: "Haah... Fine."

Name: e2312a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺も色々不安だから、後ろで見ててくれるか？」
Translation: "I'm not all that confident myself, so keep an eye on me, will you?"

Name: e2312b.nss
Japanese: 美雪の心配は当然だ。
Translation: Not that I blame her for worrying, of course.

Name: e2312b.nss
Japanese: が、だからといってここで彼女を追い出さなかったら、料理を作ってやる意味がない。
Translation: But if I don't get her out of here, then ultimately this is hardly any different from having her make it herself.
KR: 하지만, 그렇다고 여기서 미유키를 쫓아내지 않으면 요리해주는 의미가 없다.

Name: e2312b.nss
Japanese: ここは心を鬼にして――
Translation: This is for her own good.

Name: e2312b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「心配なのはわかるけどさ。
　俺を信じて、任せてくれよ。な？」
Translation:
"I know you're worried, but just trust me on this, okay?
Let me handle it. Can you do that?"

Name: e2313a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...Yeah, okay."

Name: e2313a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いいわ。ここは貴方を信じましょう」
Translation: "Fine. I'll trust you."

Name: e2313a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、ありがとう」
Translation: "Great. Thanks."

Name: e2313a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちなみに、メニューはなに？」
Translation: "So, what's on the menu?"

Name: e2313a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お好み焼き」
Translation: "Okonomiyaki."

Name: e2313a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「餃子」
Translation: "Gyoza."

Name: e2313a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ハンバーグ」
Translation: "Hamburg steak."

Name: e2313a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それって確か……まだちっちゃい頃、心一が私に作ってくれた料理よね」
Translation: "I remember you made that for me once before, back when we were kids."
KR: "그건 분명... 아직 어린 시절 신이치가 나한테 해준 요리잖아."

Name: e2313a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いや、アレは料理って言うよりもむしろ――」
Translation: "At least, you TRIED to make it, anyway..."

Name: e2313a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「うるさい！
　あの時の俺とはひと味違うってことを、教えてやる！」
Translation:
"Shut up! I'll show you!
I'm not a little kid anymore!"
KR: "시끄러워! 그때의 나와는 다르다는 걸 보여줄 테니까!"

Name: e2313a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「はいはい、期待してるわよ」
Translation: "Of course, dear. Looking forward to it."

Name: e2313a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ん――んんっ！　美味しい！」
Translation: "Mm-mmm! Delicious!"

Name: e2313a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「心一、これ本当に美味しいわよ。
　隠し味、入れたでしょ」
Translation:
"Shinichi, this is honestly incredible!
What's your secret ingredient?"

Name: e2313a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え……いや、別に」
Translation: "Huh? There wasn't one."

Name: e2313a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「嘘。私にはわかるんだから」
Translation: "Liar. You can't hide it from me."

Name: e2313a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方が入れたのはね……『愛情』よ」
Translation: "One bite and I can tell... It's made with your love."

Name: e2313a.nss
Japanese: 真顔で正面から言われると、すごく気恥ずかしい。
Translation: I don't know how she can say that with a straight face...
KR: 진지한 얼굴로 정면에서 들으니 굉장히 부끄럽다.

Name: e2313a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ、顔真っ赤よ。恥ずかしくなっちゃった？」
Translation: "Ooh, you're blushing! Did I embarrass you?"

Name: e2313a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そ、そんなわけないだろ！」
Translation: "N-No!"

Name: e2313a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょっと待ってろよ」
Translation: "Be right back!"

Name: e2313a.nss
Japanese: からかいの笑みを浮かべる美雪から離れるように、キッチンへ。
Translation: Miyuki shoots me a teasing grin as I head into the kitchen.
KR: 놀리는듯한 미소를 짓는 미유키에게서 도망치듯 부엌으로 향했다.

Name: e2313a.nss
Japanese: 冷蔵庫からパックのイチゴを取り出した。
Translation: I open the fridge and pull out a carton of strawberries.

Name: e2313a.nss
Japanese: 美雪の大好物のデザートを、サクッとつくってしまおう。
Translation: As payback, I'm going to make her favorite dessert!
KR: 미유키가 제일 좋아하는 디저트를 샤샥 만들어버리자!

Name: e2313a.nss
Japanese: ミルクをかけて――
Translation: Crush up the strawberries...

Name: e2313a.nss
Japanese: イチゴをつぶして――
Translation: Then pour some cream over them...

Name: e2313a.nss
Japanese: 後は砂糖を――砂糖――
Translation: And lastly, add some sugar—

Name: e2313a.nss
Japanese: 砂糖が切れてしまったようだ。
Translation: Looks like the sugar bowl is empty.

Name: e2313a.nss
Japanese: ええと、確か調味料は――
Translation: Where does she keep it again...?

Name: e2313a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Down here...?"

Name: e2313a.nss
Japanese: 足元の棚を開ける。
Translation: I open a cupboard by my feet.

Name: e2313a.nss
Japanese: 中には、「砂糖」と赤文字で印刷された大袋と、なにも印刷されていない小袋がひとつずつ。
Translation: Inside is a large paper bag marked "SUGAR" in red letters... as well as a smaller, unlabeled paper bag.
KR: 안에는 설탕이라고 빨갛게 적힌 큰 봉지와 아무것도 쓰여있지 않은 작은 봉지가 하나씩 있었다.

Name: e2313a.nss
Japanese: 俺は、二つの袋を目の前にして――
Translation: I reach out and grab—

Name: e2313a.nss
Japanese: "大袋を使う","小袋を使う"
Translation: "The big bag","The small bag"

Name: e2313b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「任せたいのは山々なんだけど」
Translation: "Don't get me wrong, I do WANT to trust you..."

Name: e2313b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「このセカイじゃ、まだちょっと不安が残るのよね」
Translation: "But there's still some doubt left in this world."

Name: e2313b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「この世界って……？」
Translation: "In the world? What?"

Name: e2313b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ううん。心一と一緒に、料理したいってこと」
Translation: "It's nothing. What I'm saying is, I want to cook with you."

Name: e2313b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...Please?"

Name: e2313b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Nrgh..."

Name: e2313b.nss
Japanese: そんな風に訊かれて、断れるわけがない。
Translation: I can't possibly deny her...

Name: e2313b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「わかったよ。
　それじゃ、一緒に作ろう」
Translation:
"Okay, fine.
Let's make it together, then."

Name: e2313b.nss
Japanese: かくして俺は美雪と一緒に、ラブラブ調理をすることになるのだった……
Translation: And so Miyuki and I spent a lovey-dovey evening cooking in the kitchen together...
KR: 이렇게 해서 나는 미유키와 함께 러브러브 요리를 하게 되었다.

Name: e2313b.nss
Japanese: 予定とは違うが、美雪も楽しんでくれたみたいだし、結果オーライってヤツだ。
Translation: It wasn't what I'd planned, but Miyuki seems happy, so I guess it's a wash.
KR: 예정과 다르지만, 미유키도 즐긴 것 같고, 결국 다 잘됐다는 얘기다.

Name: e2313c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「寂しいこと言わないで」
Translation: "Don't be a jerk."

Name: e2313c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「やっぱり、一緒につくろ？」
Translation: "Come on, let's make it together."

Name: e2313c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え？　でも、それじゃ意味が――」
Translation: "What? But that would defeat the purpose of—"

Name: e2313c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いいからいいから」
Translation: "Oh, who cares!"

Name: e2313c.nss
Japanese: かくして俺は美雪と一緒に、ラブラブ調理をすることになるのだった……
Translation: And so Miyuki and I spent a lovey-dovey evening cooking in the kitchen together...
KR: 이렇게 해서 나는 미유키와 함께 러브러브 요리를 하게 되었다.

Name: e2313c.nss
Japanese: 予定とは違うが、美雪も楽しんでくれたみたいだし、結果オーライってヤツだ。
Translation: It wasn't what I'd planned, but Miyuki seems happy, so I guess it's a wash.
KR: 예정과 다르지만, 미유키도 즐긴 것 같고, 결국 다 잘됐다는 얘기다.

Name: e2314a.nss
Japanese: ……いや、迷う必要ないだろ。
Translation: ...Why am I even debating this?

Name: e2314a.nss
Japanese: 砂糖を探しているんだから、大袋を使うに決まってる。
Translation: If I'm looking for sugar, then obviously I ought to take the one that's clearly labeled "sugar"...
KR: 설탕을 찾고 있으니까 큰 봉투를 쓰는 게 당연하지.

Name: e2314b.nss
Japanese: 小袋に、手を伸ばした。
Translation: I pick up the small paper bag.

Name: e2314b.nss
Japanese: 何となくだけど、この袋の中身を使わなきゃならない。
Translation: Whatever it is, something inside me is telling me I need to use it.
KR: 왠지 모르지만, 이 봉지를 써야만 할 것 같은...

Name: e2314b.nss
Japanese: そんな気がした。
Translation: Some sort of inner instinct...

Name: e2315.nss
Japanese: 中身を瓶に補充して――と。
Translation: Once I refill the sugar bowl with its contents...

Name: e2315.nss
Japanese: スプーンで、白い粉をたっぷりかける。
Translation: I scoop up a fat spoonful and sprinkle it all over the strawberries.

Name: e2315.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "There, all done!"

Name: e2315.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一？　まだなの？」
Translation: "Shinichi? How much longer?"

Name: e2315.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私もう、食べ終わっちゃうわよ！」
Translation: "I'm almost done eating!"

Name: e2315.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はいはい、今行く！」
Translation: "I know, I know... Coming!"

Name: e2315.nss
Japanese: 俺は出来上がったイチゴミルクを手に、美雪の側へ――
Translation: I grab the bowl of strawberries and cream and carry it back to her.
KR: 나는 완성된 딸기 우유를 손에 들고 미유키 곁으로 갔다.

Name: e2315.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「遅れてゴメン。はい、デザート」
Translation: "Sorry I took so long. Here's your dessert."

Name: e2315.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ……わざわざ、用意してくれたの？」
Translation: "Oh, wow! Did you make this just for me?"

Name: e2315.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「コレ、好きだろ？」
Translation: "It's your favorite, right?"

Name: e2315.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「大好き」
Translation: "Yes! I love it!"

Name: e2315.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一……今日は、ありがとうね」
Translation: "Shinichi... Thank you for everything you've done today."

Name: e2315.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どういたしまして」
Translation: "You're very welcome."

Name: e2315.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「じゃあ早速――いただきます」
Translation: "Now then... Time to dig in."

Name: e2315.nss
Japanese: よっぽど好きなのだろう。
Translation: She must really like that stuff.

Name: e2315.nss
Japanese: まだメインを食べきっていないのに、デザートのイチゴミルクをスプーンですくって――
Translation: She hasn't even finished her main course, and she's already moved on to dessert.
KR: 아직 메인 요리를 다 먹지도 않았는데 딸기우유를 숟가락으로 떠서...

Name: e2315.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Nom... mm-mmm..."

Name: e2316a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……うん、美味しい」
Translation: "...It's so good!"

Name: e2316a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だろ？」
Translation: "Yeah?"

Name: e2316a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「やっぱりこれも……」
Translation: "You know what I think?"

Name: e2316a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「愛が、籠もってるから、かな？」
Translation: "I think this was made with your love, too."

Name: e2316a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "......Just kidding."

Name: e2316a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "R-Right!"

Name: e2316a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「つまりは、多分、そういうことだ！」
Translation: "No, yeah, totally... probably!"

Name: e2316a.nss
Japanese: 気恥ずかしさを吹き飛ばすように、俺は大声で頷いた。
Translation: Desperate to hide my embarrassment, I nod a little too enthusiastically.
KR: 부끄러움을 감추는 것처럼 나는 큰 소리로 고개를 끄덕였다.

Name: e2316b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うん、美味しい……」
Translation: "It's so good..."

Name: e2316b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「美味しいんだけど……ちょっと、甘みが足りない？」
Translation: "Not great, but good... Could use a bit more sugar, maybe?"

Name: e2316b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ……そうか？」
Translation: "Oh, really?"

Name: e2316b.nss
Japanese: やっぱりあの小袋は失敗だったか？
Translation: Guess I made the wrong call, using that small paper bag.

Name: e2316b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「隠し味でなんとかしようと思ったんだけど」
Translation: "I was hoping the secret ingredient would make up for it."

Name: e2316b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「隠し味って……
　もしかして、心一の愛情？」
Translation:
"Secret ingredient?
What, your love or something?"

Name: e2316b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そ、そういうんじゃないけどさ！」
Translation: "N-No!"

Name: e2316b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あはは、顔、真っ赤になっちゃった」
Translation: "Hahaha! Your face is sooo red!"

Name: e2316b.nss
Japanese: う……うるさい。
Translation: Ugh, shut up!

Name: e2316b.nss
Japanese: 美雪もよく、そんな恥ずかしいセリフを言えるもんだ。
Translation: How can you even say that cheesy crap with a straight face?!
KR: 미유키는 저런 부끄러운 대사를 잘도 하네.

Name: e2316b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一、ありがとうね」
Translation: "Thank you, Shinichi."

Name: e2316b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どういたしまして」
Translation: "No problem."

Name: e2316b.nss
Japanese: なんとか及第点の味にはなっているらしい。
Translation: Looks like my dessert scrapes by with passing marks.
KR: 어떻게든 합격할만한 맛은 나는 것 같다.

Name: e2316b.nss
Japanese: ホッと胸を撫で下ろしながら、俺はようやく自分の食事を食べるべく、箸に手を伸ばし――
Translation: Relieved, I take a seat at the table and reach for my chopsticks.
KR: 가슴을 쓸어내리며 나는 이제야 내 식사를 하기 위해 젓가락에 손을 뻗었다.

Name: e2316b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「――じゃあ、俺も食べよっかな」
Translation: "Well then, that's that!"

Name: e2316b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いただきま――」
Translation: "Time to get back to my..."

Name: e2316b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...Miyuki?"

Name: e2316b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪、聞こえてるか？」
Translation: "Miyuki? Earth to Miyuki?"

Name: e2316b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「え？　う、ううん……なんかちょっと……
　今日は、疲れちゃったかな……」
Translation:
"Huh? Oh, sorry... I'm just...
feeling kinda tired today..."

Name: e2316b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だったらソファにでも横になって――」
Translation: "Yeah? Maybe you should lie down on the sofa—"

Name: e2316b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Miyuki...?"

Name: e2316b.nss
Japanese: 話の途中だというのに、彼女はソファに背を預け、安らかに寝息を立て始めている。
Translation: Before I can even finish my sentence, Miyuki leans back against the sofa and begins to snore quietly.
KR: 이야기 도중인데 미유키는 소파에 등을 기대고 편안하게 숨소리를 내기 시작했다.

Name: e2316b.nss
Japanese: 珍しいこともあるもんだと思いながら、俺は彼女にそっと毛布を掛けた。
Translation: Maybe she's just had a really long day today... I gently lay a blanket over her.
KR: 신기한 일도 있구나... 그런 생각을 하며 나는 살며시 담요를 덮어주었다.

Name: e2317.nss
Japanese: 自分で言っていたとおり、疲れていたのだろう。
Translation: Moments later, Miyuki falls into a deep sleep.

Name: e2317.nss
Japanese: 美雪はそのまま、深い眠りについた。
Translation: She must have been even more exhausted than she let on.

Name: e2317.nss
Japanese: 夜が来ても、一向に目を覚ます気配はない。
Translation: Night falls and she's still out like a light.
KR: 밤이 돼도 전혀 깨어날 기미가 보이지 않는다.

Name: e2317.nss
Japanese: 恐らく今日なら、何をしても美雪にバレるようなことはないはずだ。
Translation: Somehow, I get the feeling I could probably get away with just about anything tonight.
KR: 아마 오늘이라면 뭘 해도 미유키에게 들킬 일은 없을 것이다.

Name: e2317.nss
Japanese: "そのまま眠る","スマフォを手に取る"
Translation: "Go to bed","Take her phone"

Name: e2318a.nss
Japanese: とはいうが、正直なところ、美雪が起きていなければ、やるべきことなんてありはしない。
Translation: That said, with Miyuki passed out, there's nothing much for me to do.
KR: 그렇다고는 해도, 솔직히 미유키가 일어나지 않는다면 할 일이 있을 리 없다.

Name: e2318a.nss
Japanese: 一晩寝れば、美雪もきっと元気を取り戻すだろう。
Translation: After a good night's sleep, I'm sure she'll be right as rain tomorrow.
KR: 하룻밤 자면 미유키도 분명 기운을 되찾을 것이다.

Name: e2318a.nss
Japanese: 少し時間は早いが、俺は美雪に倣うよう、ソファベッドに毛布を掛けて横たわった。
Translation: Though the night is still young, I decide to curl up next to her on the sofa bed.
KR: 조금 빠르지만 나는 미유키를 따라 소파에 담요를 덮고 누웠다.

Name: e2318b.nss
Japanese: 俺は、美雪のスマフォを手に取った。
Translation: I take Miyuki's phone.

Name: e2318b.nss
Japanese: 画面をタッチすると、メニュー画面が表示される。
Translation: I tap the screen and the menu pops up.

Name: e2318b.nss
Japanese: "写真を開く","電話帳を開く"
Translation: "Go through her photos","Go through her address book"

Name: e2319a.nss
Japanese: 何となく、電話帳を開こうとすると――
Translation: Right as I decide to open her address book—

Name: e2319a.nss
Japanese: 画面が現れた。
Translation: The screen changes.

Name: e2319a.nss
Japanese: 指紋認証。
Translation: The fingerprint lock.

Name: e2319a.nss
Japanese: 「秘密の質問でロックを解除する」というボタンも設置されてはいるが、そこまでして覗きたいとは思わない。
Translation: I see there's an "Unlock via security questions" option, but I'm really not that desperate to snoop...
KR: 비밀 질문으로 잠금을 해제한다는 버튼도 있었지만, 그렇게까지 들여다보고 싶지는 않았다.

Name: e2319a.nss
Japanese: "秘密の質問でロックを解除する","そのまま眠る"
Translation: "Unlock via security questions","Go to bed"

Name: e2319c.nss
Japanese: 美雪がなにを書いているのか、よくわからない。
Translation: I don't understand a lot of what she's written here.
KR: 미유키가 뭘 쓰고 있는지 잘 모르겠다.

Name: e2319c.nss
Japanese: だが、見てはならないようなものを見てしまったような、奇妙な感覚に襲われた。
Translation: But I do get the distinct feeling that I shouldn't have looked at it.
KR: 하지만 봐서는 안 될 것을 본 듯한 묘한 감각이 엄습했다.

Name: e2319c.nss
Japanese: これは見なかったことにして、今日は寝ることにしよう。
Translation: So I decide to forget about it and just go to bed.
KR: 이건 못 본 걸로 하고 이만 자자.

Name: e2319d.nss
Japanese: 電話帳はロックされておらず、そのまま中身を見ることができるのだが……
Translation: The address book isn't locked, so I can easily peruse its contents.
KR: 전화번호부는 잠겨있지 않고, 그냥 내용을 볼 수 있는데...

Name: e2319d.nss
Japanese: アドレス帳に登録されているのは「カミサマ」だけ。
Translation: But there's only one entry—"God".

Name: e2319d.nss
Japanese: 他の名前が追記されているようなこともない。
Translation: No other names.

Name: e2319d.nss
Japanese: よって、特に用事はない。
Translation: As such, I have no real objective here.
KR: 따라서 딱히 별 볼 일 없다.

Name: e2319d.nss
Japanese: "そのまま眠る","カミサマに発信する"
Translation: "Go to bed","Call God"

Name: e2320a.nss
Japanese: 「コスプレさせて……

Name: e2320a.nss
Japanese: 思わない、の、だが。
Translation: I'm not that desperate... and yet...

Name: e2320a.nss
Japanese: なんだかこう、身体が勝手に動くというか。
Translation: For some reason, my body seems to have a will of its own...

Name: e2320a.nss
Japanese: 俺の指先は、画面をタッチしていて――
Translation: I tap the screen.

Name: e2320a.nss
Japanese:
――これから１０の質問をします。
　――正しい答えを選んで下さい。
Translation: —Please answer the following 10 multiple choice questions.
KR: 앞으로 10가지 질문을 하겠습니다. 올바른 답을 고르시오.

Name: e2320a.nss
Japanese:
――注意：
　――３度間違うと翌日まで電話帳がロックされます
Translation: —Warning: 3 failed attempts will result in an automatic lockout for 24 hours.

Name: e2320a.nss
Japanese: 失敗は、２回までか。
Translation: ...Sounds like I can only mess up twice.

Name: e2320a.nss
Japanese: 俺は注意書を熟読して、秘密の質問に挑戦する。
Translation: After carefully reading the instructions, I move on to tackle the questions.
KR: 나는 주의사항을 숙지하고 비밀 질문에 도전했다.

Name: e2320b.nss
Japanese: 俺は大人しく、そのまま眠ることにした……
Translation: I decide to just go to bed like a good boy...

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私がスマフォを捨てた理由は？
Translation: Q. Why did I get rid of my old phone?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "古いから","趣味に合わないから","いやな思い出が染みついているから"
Translation: "Too outdated","Too tacky-looking","Too many bad memories associated with it"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私たちが同棲してから、何週間って言った？
Translation: Q. How many weeks has it been since we started living together?
KR: Q. 우리가 동거한 지 몇 주라고 했지?

Name: e2321.nss
Translation: "1 week","2 weeks","3 weeks"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私が人前で手を繋ぎたくない理由は？
Translation: Q. Why don't I like to hold hands in public?
KR: Q. 내가 사람들 앞에서 손을 잡지 않는 이유는?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "恥ずかしいから","見せつけているようだから","他人のそれを見たくなかったから"
Translation: "Too embarrassing","Feels like showing off","Prefer to keep private things private"
KR: "부끄러우니까","과시하는 것 같으니까","다른 사람이 그러는 걸 보고 싶지 않으니까"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私は女の友情をどう思っている？
Translation: Q. How do I view friendship between women?
KR: Q. 나는 여자의 우정을 어떻게 생각할까?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "ゲームみたいなもの","永久機関みたいなもの","世界記録みたいなもの"
Translation: "Like a video game","Like a perpetual motion machine","Like a world record"
KR: "게임 같은 것","영구기관 같은 것","세계 기록 같은 것"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．次の中で私が好きなのは？
Translation: Q. Which of these do I like the most?
KR: Q. 다음 중 내가 좋아하는 것은?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "ショートケーキ","りんご飴","プリン"
Translation: "Shortcake","Candy apples","Pudding"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．次の中で私が嫌いなのは？
Translation: Q. Which of these do I hate the most?
KR: Q. 다음 중 내가 싫어하는 것은?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "豚の角煮","イクラ","グレープフルーツ"
Translation: "Braised pork belly","Salmon roe","Grapefruit"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私が書いた脚本の名前は？
Translation: Q. What is the title of the play I wrote?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "シュラババ！","シュラババ！！","シュラババ！！！"
Translation: "Pandemonium!","Pandemonium!!","Pandemonium!!!"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．次の中で私が好きなアイスは？
Translation: Q. Which of these is my favorite ice cream?
KR: Q. 다음 중 내가 좋아하는 아이스크림은?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "月見大福","スイカ棒","チョコバー"
Translation: "Mochi ice cream","Watermelon popsicle","Fudge pop"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私は体重を訊ねられたらどう対応する？
Translation: Q. How do I react when someone asks me about my weight?
KR: Q. 나는 몸무게를 물어보면 어떻게 대응할까?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "秘密厳守","視線で脅す","危うくバットで殴りかけた"
Translation: "Refuse to tell","Glare at them","Swing my bat at them"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私が猫を好きな理由は？
Translation: Q. Why do I like cats?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "肉球が可愛い","気品がある","鳴き声が素晴らしい"
Translation: "Their toe beans are cute","They're elegant","Their little meows"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私が写真を好きな理由は？
Translation: Q. Why do I like photos?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "写真は永遠だから","自分がどれだけ変わったのか確認できるから","幸せな気持ちを思い出せるから"
Translation: "Photos are eternal","You can see how much you've changed","They remind you of the good times"
KR: "사진은 영원하니까","자신이 얼마나 변했는지 확인할 수 있으니까","행복한 기분을 떠올릴 수 있으니까"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私が最近集めている本は？
Translation: Q. What book did I add to my secret collection recently?
KR: Q. 내가 요즘 모으고 있는 책은?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "手品の種本","黒魔術の指南書","世界遺産の写真集"
Translation: "Magic Tricks 101","The Witch's Guide to Black Magic","The World Heritage Photobook"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私の決め球は？
Translation: Q. What's my signature pitch?
KR: Q. 내가 자신 있어 하는 투구는?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "カーブ","シュート","フォーク"
Translation: "Curveball","Screwball","Forkball"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．シュレディンガーに猫が選ばれた理由を、私はどう推測している？
Translation: Q. What's my theory behind why Schrodinger chose a cat for his thought experiment?
KR: Q. 슈뢰딩거에게 고양이가 선택된 이유를 나는 어떻게 추측하고 있지?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "シュレディンガーは猫アレルギーだった","シュレディンガーは猫を殺したかった","猫には不思議な力が宿っていた"
Translation: "Because he was allergic to them","Because he wanted to kill one","Because they have mysterious powers"
KR: "슈뢰딩거는 고양이 알레르기가 있었다","슈뢰딩거는 고양이를 죽이고 싶었다","고양이에게는 이상한 힘이 깃들어 있었다"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私の密かな不得意科目は？
Translation: Q. What's the one school subject I'm actually bad at?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "生物","物理","化学"
Translation: "Biology","Physics","Chemistry"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私の嫌いなスポーツは？
Translation: Q. What sport do I hate the most?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "バレーボール","マラソン","テニス"
Translation: "Volleyball","Track","Tennis"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私がこの街を好きな理由は？
Translation: Q. Why do I love this town?
KR: Q. 내가 이 마을을 좋아하는 이유는?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "心一がいるから","余計なものがなく完結しているから","生まれ育った街だから"
Translation: "Because Shinichi's here","The view from the roof completes me","Because it's where I was born and raised"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私が頼みたいと思っている出前は？
Translation: Q. When we order takeout, what do I prefer?
KR: Q. 내가 부탁하고 싶은 배달 음식은?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "寿司","ピザ","中華"
Translation: "Sushi","Pizza","Chinese"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私の消費税の計算方法は？
Translation: Q. How do I calculate sales tax?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "暗算","暗記","１０で割ったものを半分にする"
Translation: "Mental math","Memorization","Divide by 10, then divide that number by 2"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．以前私のために心一がつくってくれた料理は？
Translation: Q. What did Shinichi cook for me back when we were kids?
KR: Q. 예전에 신이치가 날 위해 해준 요리는?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "お好み焼き","餃子","ハンバーグ"
Translation: "Okonomiyaki","Gyoza","Hamburg steak"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．ふたりが通学時寄り道をする場所は？
Translation: Q. What detour do we usually make on the way to school?
KR: Q. 두 사람이 통학할 때 들르는 장소는?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "寄り道しない","ネコのいる神社","川縁"
Translation: "No detours","Shrines with cats out front","The river"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私が撮った心一の脅迫写真に映るのは？
Translation: Q. What sort of blackmail photo did I take of Shinichi?
KR: Q. 내가 신이치 협박할 때 쓰는 사진은?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "寝顔","コスプレ姿","おねしょ写真"
Translation: "Sleeping","Cosplay","Wetting the bed"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私の得意料理は？
Translation: Q. What's my specialty dish?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "生姜焼き","シュウマイ","炊き込みごはん"
Translation: "Ginger‐fried pork","Shaomai dumplings","Takikomi rice"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私の書いた脚本の主人公の名前は？
Translation: Q. What's the name of the protagonist in the play I wrote?
KR: Q. 내가 쓴 각본의 주인공 이름은?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "慎一","真一","眞一"
Translation: "Shinichirou","Shinji","Shinnosuke"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私が「ねこまんま」でした買い物は？
Translation: Q. What did I recently buy at Catnip?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "ネコの癒やし系ＤＶＤ","ネコの鳴き声ＣＤ","ネコの翻訳おもちゃ"
Translation: "Cat video compilation DVD","Cat ASMR CD","Cat-to-human translator toy"
KR: "고양이 치유물 DVD","고양이 울음소리 CD","고양이 말 번역 장난감"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私の得意なピッチングフォームは？
Translation: Q. What's my best pitching form?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "マサカリ投法","トルネード投法","サブマリン投法"
Translation: "Masakari pitch","Tornado pitch","Submarine pitch"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私が許す関連グッズの限度は？
Translation: Q. What's my limit on geeky video game merch?
KR: Q. 내가 허락하는 관련 굿즈의 한도는?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "クッション","ベッドシーツ","等身大ＰＯＰ"
Translation: "Cushions","Bedsheets","Life-size cardboard cutouts"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．次のうち私が欲しかったのは？
Translation: Q. Which one of these have I been wanting for a while?
KR: Q. 다음 중 내가 갖고 싶었던 것은?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "旅行券","ウォーターオーブン","試写会のチケット"
Translation: "Tickets for a hot springs trip","A water oven","Tickets to an advance movie screening"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私が幼稚園の頃なりたかったのは？
Translation: Q. Back when I was in kindergarten, what did I want to be when I grew up?
KR: Q. 내가 유치원 때 되고 싶었던 것은?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "ロボットの操縦士","魔法少女","大統領"
Translation: "Mecha pilot","Magical girl","President"

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: Ｑ．私が好きな香りは？
Translation: Q. What's my favorite fragrance?

Name: e2321.nss
Japanese: "イチゴ","アップル","チョコレート"
Translation: "Strawberry","Apple","Chocolate"

Name: e2321.nss
e2321.nss
e2322a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「よしっ！」
Translation: "Nailed it!"

Name: e2322a.nss
Japanese: 美雪の設定した質問に、俺は全て正解する。
Translation: Somehow I've managed to answer every one of Miyuki's security questions.

Name: e2322a.nss
Japanese: これで彼女の電話帳を覗くことが出来るわけだ。
Translation: Now I can check out her address book.
KR: 이제 미유키의 전화번호부를 들여다볼 수 있게 됐다.

Name: e2322a.nss
Japanese: 俺がそっと、アドレス帳の中身を確認すると――
Translation: I open the app to find—

Name: e2322a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「カミサマだけ、か」
Translation: "...Just God, huh?"

Name: e2322a.nss
Japanese: 登録されているのは、それだけだった。
Translation: Just the one entry.

Name: e2322a.nss
Japanese: 家族や友人の電話番号は、きっともう１台の携帯電話に登録されているということだろう。
Translation: All her friends and family members must be on some other phone, then.
KR: 가족이나 친구 번호는 분명 다른 핸드폰에 등록되어 있겠지.

Name: e2322a.nss
Japanese: 触らぬ神に祟り無し。
Translation: Curiosity killed the cat...

Name: e2322a.nss
Japanese: 電話帳の中身を確認したからといって、それ以上の用事があるわけではない。
Translation: Now that I've seen her address book, well... there's not much else for me to do, really.
KR: 전화번호부를 확인한다고 해서 더 이상 볼 일이 있는 것도 아니다.

Name: e2322a.nss
Japanese: "そのまま眠る","「カミサマ」にダイヤルする"
Translation: "Go to bed","Call God"

Name: e2322b.nss
Japanese: う……失敗。
Translation: Ugh... I screwed up...

Name: e2322b.nss
Japanese: 俺は気を取り直して、もう一度秘密の質問に挑戦する。
Translation: I take a deep breath, then get ready to try again.
KR: 나는 정신을 가다듬고 다시 한번 비밀 질문에 도전했다.

Name: e2322c.nss
Japanese: また失敗……
Translation: I screwed up again...

Name: e2322c.nss
Japanese: 選択肢を間違えたら、またこれにチャレンジできるのは明日になってからだ。
Translation: If I mess up a third time, I won't get another shot at this until tomorrow at the soonest.
KR: 선택지를 틀리면 내일이 되어야 도전할 수 있다.

Name: e2322c.nss
Japanese: この千載一遇のチャンス――逃すわけにはいかない。
Translation: This is the chance of a lifetime, and I can't let it pass me by.
KR: 이런 천재일우의 기회를 놓칠 수는 없다.

Name: e2322c.nss
Japanese: 俺は意識を集中させて、画面に向かう。
Translation: I focus my full attention on the phone screen.

Name: e2322d.nss
Japanese: だめだった……
Translation: No dice...

Name: e2322d.nss
Japanese: ロックがかかった画面に、深い溜息をつく。
Translation: The screen locks, and I sigh heavily.
KR: 나는 잠금이 걸린 화면을 보고 한숨 쉬었다.

Name: e2322d.nss
Japanese: 俺、意外と美雪のことを知らなかったんだな……
Translation: Guess I don't know Miyuki as well as I thought I did...

Name: e2322d.nss
Japanese: 隣で寝息を立てたままの美雪の顔を、俺は静かに見た。
Translation: Quietly, I glance over at her. Beside me, her peaceful slumber continues uninterrupted.
KR: 옆에서 숨소리를 내고 있는 미유키를 조용히 바라보았다.

Name: e2322d.nss
Japanese: 彼女がもしゲームのヒロインなら、きっとネットを探せば正しい選択肢が掲載されてるんだろうけど。
Translation: If only she were a romance option in a video game... Then I could just hop online and look up a walkthrough...
KR: 미유키가 만약 게임 속 히로인이라면 인터넷에 올바른 선택지가 나와 있을 텐데...

Name: e2322d.nss
Japanese: ここは現実。
Translation: But this is reality.

Name: e2322d.nss
Japanese: 日頃の美雪の言動に、しっかり目を配らなければ、正しい選択肢なんて選べやしない。
Translation: I'm not gonna learn the answers to these questions unless I start paying more attention to what she says.
KR: 평소에 미유키의 언행을 제대로 살피지 않으면 올바른 선택지를 고를 수 없다.

Name: e2322d.nss
Japanese: 俺は彼女の事を、まだ全然知らないのだ。
Translation: There's still so much I don't know about her...
KR: 나는 미유키에 대해 아직 전혀 모르고 있다.

Name: e2322d.nss
Japanese: なんだか、自己嫌悪に陥ってしまう。
Translation: Here comes the self-loathing...

Name: e2322d.nss
Japanese: とにかく今日は、このまま眠ってしまうことにしよう。
Translation: That's it. I'm going to bed.

Name: e2323a.nss
Japanese: 俺はそのまま、眠ることにする。
Translation: And so I decide to just go to bed.

Name: e2323b.nss
Japanese: ないのだが、やっぱり気になるよな。
Translation: And yet... I keep wondering.

Name: e2323b.nss
Japanese: 「カミサマ」って、一体誰なんだ？
Translation: Who is this "God," exactly?

Name: e2323b.nss
Japanese: 好奇心に駆られて、俺は電話帳をタッチする――
Translation: Driven by my curiosity, I tap the screen—

Name: e2323b.nss
Translation: ......Wait, what the?

Name: e2323b.nss
Japanese: この着信音って――
Translation: That ringtone—

Name: e2323b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もしもし？」
Translation: "Hello?"

Name: e2323b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もし……もし」
Translation: "Uh... hello...?"

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふふっ」
Translation: "Hehe..."

Name: e2324a.nss
Japanese: 発信した先は、神様ではなく――
Translation: Turns out I didn't call God.

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふふふふふ――」
Translation: "Heheheheheh..."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あはっ、あははははははははは……」
Translation: "Haha... AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA...!"

Name: e2324a.nss
Japanese: 一片の曇りもない笑みを浮かべる、美雪だった。
Translation: I called Miyuki.

Name: e2324a.nss
Japanese: 彼女はスマフォの他に、普通の携帯を持っている。
Translation: She's holding a second phone—a regular clamshell phone—and grinning from ear to ear.
KR: 미유키는 스마트폰 외에도 그냥 핸드폰도 가지고 있다.

Name: e2324a.nss
Japanese: 聞き覚えのある着信音は、辺りにずっと鳴り響いたまま。
Translation: And the phone continues to ring.
KR: 귀에 익은 벨소리가 주변에 계속 울려 퍼졌다.

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「１回目」
Translation: "First try."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「最初のチャレンジで、全部正解できるなんて――」
Translation: "YOU got them all right on YOUR very first try!"

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君の愛、画面越しに、感じちゃう」
Translation: "I can feel YOUR love for me all the way from the other side of the screen..."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「２回目」
Translation: "Second try."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「２回目のチャレンジで、全部正解できるなんて――」
Translation: "YOU got them all right on only YOUR second try!"

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君は私の事、とっても想ってくれているのね」
Translation: "YOU must really care about me."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「３回目」
Translation: "Third try."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「３回目のチャレンジで、全部正解したなんて――」
Translation: "YOU got them all right on YOUR third try!"

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「３度目の正直……ってやつ、かな？」
Translation: "Third time's the charm, I guess?"

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「４回目」
Translation: "Fourth try."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「４回目のチャレンジで、全部正解したのね」
Translation: "YOU got them all right on YOUR fourth try."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「４なんて、不吉な数字だと思わない？」
Translation: "They say four's an unlucky number, YOU know."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「５回目」
Translation: "Fifth try."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「５回目のチャレンジで、全部正解したのね」
Translation: "YOU got them all right on YOUR fifth try."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「答えられないかと思って、心配しちゃった」
Translation: "I was starting to worry YOU'D never get them all right!"

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「６回目」
Translation: "Sixth try."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「６回目のチャレンジで、やっと正解したのね」
Translation: "It took YOU six tries, but YOU finally got them all right."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう、いつまでやきもきさせるのよ？」
Translation: "Sheesh! Took YOU long enough!"

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「７回目」
Translation: "Seventh try."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「７回目のチャレンジで、なんとか正解したのね」
Translation: "It took YOU seven whole tries, but somehow YOU finally managed to get them all right."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ラッキーセブン、なのかな？」
Translation: "Lucky number seven, I guess?"

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「８回目」
Translation: "Eighth try."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「８回もやり直して、ようやく正解？」
Translation: "Seriously... It took YOU eight whole tries to get them right?"

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ホントに鈍いんだから、もう……！」
Translation: "God, YOU'RE so dense!"

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「９回目」
Translation: "Ninth try."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「９回目のチャレンジで、やっと正解したのね」
Translation: "It took YOU nine tries, but YOU finally got them all right."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「苦しかった、よね？」
Translation: "YOU really struggled, huh?"

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「１０回以上」
Translation: "Double digits, eh?"

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「１０回以上チャレンジして、やっとクリアしたんだ」
Translation: "It took YOU more than nine tries, but YOU finally succeeded."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「そこまで私を知りたいと思ってくれるなんて。
　私、感激しちゃうわ……」
Translation: "But YOU know... I'm honestly touched that YOU would go to all that effort to learn more about me."
KR: "그렇게까지 날 알고 싶어 하다니... 나 감격스러워."

Name: e2324a.nss
Japanese: 美雪の表情は、どこか不気味なほど、満たされていて。
Translation: Her expression is so bright and cheerful, it's... actually kind of eerie.
KR: 미유키의 표정은 어딘가 섬뜩할 정도로 만족해 있었다.

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「攻略サイトが無駄だってこと、君は知ってる？」
Translation: "YOU realize no online walkthrough could have helped YOU, right?"
KR: "공략 사이트가 헛수고라는 걸 당신은 알고 있어?"

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「さっき君は、三択に答えたわよね」
Translation: "It's simple. YOU know those multiple choice questions?"

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あの性格は、ランダムに創られたものなの」
Translation: "The answers were all completely randomized."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「この私は、３の３０乗――」
Translation: "Three possible answers for each of 30 different questions."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "My personality is one of 205,891,132,094,649 possible variations..."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「たったひとり、君だけに選ばれた性格なの」
Translation: "One selected specifically for YOU."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方は、その特別な私を、理解してくれた」
Translation: "And YOU went out of YOUR way to learn about me."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ありがとう」
Translation: "Thank you."

Name: e2324a.nss
Japanese: なんで……美雪は俺に礼を言うんだ？
Translation: What? Why is she thanking me?
KR: 어째서... 미유키는 내게 고맙다고 하는 거지?

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君が、眠ったふりの私に騙されて――」
Translation: "I pretended to be asleep, and YOU totally fell for it..."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私のことを理解してくれたから――」
Translation: "But YOU worked hard to understand me..."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「嬉しくて、たまらないから――」
Translation: "Honestly, I'm the happiest girl alive."

Name: e2324a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「本当の事、教えるね」
Translation: "So I'll tell you the truth."

Name: e2324a.nss
Japanese: 本当の……こと？
Translation: The... truth...?

Name: e2324b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「また、カミサマに電話しようとしたの？」
Translation: "Were you trying to call God again?"

Name: e2324b.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え……ええと……」
Translation: "Uh... well..."

Name: e2324b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あのね、心一？　言ったでしょう？」
Translation: "Listen here, Shinichi. Didn't I tell you?"

Name: e2324b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「このセカイで、カミサマに電話をかける方法はないの」
Translation: "In this world, there is no way to contact God."
KR: "이 세계에서 신님에게 전화할 수 있는 방법은 없어."

Name: e2324b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから、諦めて」
Translation: "So you need to just let it go."

Name: e2324b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私と一緒に、ずっと、ずっと、暮らしましょう」
Translation: "You're going to live here with me. Forever and ever and ever..."

Name: e2324b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「永遠に……ね？」
Translation: "For all eternity... got it?"

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おい、そろそろ始まるぞ！」
Translation: "Come on! Show's about to start!"

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「ちょっとまつの！
　もうすこしで、おりょうりできるから」
Translation: "Not yet! Dinner's almost ready!"

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そんなのいい――ほら、始まった！」
Translation: "Forget about that—see? It's starting!"

Name: e2324c.nss
Japanese: ＣＭが明けて、俺はテレビに見入る。
Translation: The commercial ends, and I turn my full attention to the TV.

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ、どうして！？」
Translation: "Why?! Answer me!"

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君は――私を裏切るの！？」
Translation: "Why... Why would you betray me like this?!"

Name: e2324c.nss
Japanese: 曽根美雪は、学校を中退して芸能界デビュー。
Translation: Sone Miyuki dropped out of high school to make her debut in the entertainment industry.
KR: 소네 미유키는 학교를 그만두고 연예계에 데뷔했다.

Name: e2324c.nss
Japanese: たちまち人気が急上昇、今や画面に出ない日がないほどの売れっ子女優になっている。
Translation: These days, her popularity is skyrocketing; scarcely a day goes by when I don't see her onscreen somewhere.
KR: 금세 인기가 급상승, 이제는 화면에 나오지 않는 날이 없을 정도로 잘 나가는 여배우가 되어 있었다.

Name: e2324c.nss
Japanese: その人気は凄まじく、半ばアイドル扱いだ。
Translation: She's so famous, she's practically worshipped.
KR: 그 인기가 대단해서 거의 아이돌 취급이다.

Name: e2324c.nss
Japanese: 以前から才能はあると思っていたけれど、まさかここまでだなんて……
Translation: I always knew she had talent, but I never imagined this...
KR: 예전부터 재능은 있다고 생각했지만, 설마 이 정도일 줄이야...

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「裏切るなら……」
Translation: "If you're going to betray me..."

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私も……貴方を、ユルサナイ……」
Translation: "Then I'll just have to get even."

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「地の果てまでも、追い詰めてやる……」
Translation: "You can run, but you can't hide. I'll chase you to the ends of the earth..."

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「怖っ！」
Translation: "Yikes! Creepy!"

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる？　またなの？」
Translation: "Boop boop? No luck yet?"

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、レンアイドラマ、でないの」
Translation: "Miyuki never gets any romantic drama roles."

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「へん」
Translation: "It's weird."

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……そういえば、そうだな」
Translation: "Now that you mention it, you're right..."

Name: e2324c.nss
Japanese: 美雪が出ているドラマはなんとなくチェックしているのだが、恋愛展開は確かに見た記憶がない。
Translation: We've been keeping up with most of the shows she's in, but I can't recall her ever playing a romantic lead in anything...
KR: 미유키가 나오는 드라마는 대충 체크하고 있지만, 확실히 연애 전개는 본 기억이 없다...

Name: e2324c.nss
Japanese: そういえば、人気の割に男性関係も全く騒ぎ立てられないようだし――
Translation: Come to think of it, I haven't heard any rumors about her love life, either... It's a little strange, considering how famous she is...
KR: 생각해보니 인기에 비해 남자 관계도 시끄럽지 않은 것 같고...

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「クラスにいた頃と、全然変わらないな」
Translation: "She hasn't changed a bit since we were in school, huh?"

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ、レンアイ、できないの」
Translation: "Miyuki can't date anyone."

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「確かに」
Translation: "Yeah, no kidding."

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「アイドルは、大変だな……」
Translation: "Must be hard, being a celebrity..."

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん……ああ」
Translation: "Hmm? Oh! Good call, Eru."

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「冷めないうちに、いただこう」
Translation: "Let's dig in before the food gets cold."

Name: e2324c.nss
Japanese: 俺はテレビに背を向ける。
Translation: I turn away from the TV.

Name: e2324c.nss
Japanese: 目の前に並んでいるのは……アオイ手製の、夕飯だ。
Translation: On the table, Aoi's home-cooked dinner is waiting for me.
KR: 눈앞에 늘어선 것은... 아오이가 손수 만든 저녁밥이다.

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる……どうぞ！」
Translation: "Boop boop... Eat up!"

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ギューニクの、ヤバトマにこみなの！」
Translation: "It's beef simmered in Yabaley's!"

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、美味そうだ」
Translation: "Wow... Looks great!"

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「めしあがれなの」
Translation: "Bon appetit."

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いただきます！」
Translation: "Don't mind if I do!"

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「はむ、はむはむ、ん……んん……」
Translation: "Nom, nom, nom... mmm..."

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どう……なの？」
Translation: "Well? How is it?"

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「うん！」
Translation: "It's great!"

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今まで食った中で、一番美味い！」
Translation: "Your best yet!"

Name: e2324c.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ありがとうなの！」
Translation: "Thank you!"

Name: e2324c.nss
Japanese: 俺はヤバトマの旨味を口いっぱいに頬張りながら――
Translation: The savory taste of Yabaley's dances on my tongue...
KR: 나는 야마토마의 맛을 입안 가득 음미하면서...

Name: e2324c.nss
Japanese: アオイと結ばれた自分の運命に、感謝した。
Translation: ...and I silently thank God for bringing me and Aoi together.

Name: e2324d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ぁあっ、惜しい……」
Translation: "Argh, so close..."

Name: e2324d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あと少し、だな」
Translation: "You almost had it."

Name: e2324d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「まだまだ！　今度こそ――！」
Translation: "I'll get it next time! I'm not giving up just yet!"

Name: e2324d.nss
Japanese: 貸し切り状態のバッティングセンター。
Translation: Today we rented out the batting cages just for ourselves.

Name: e2324d.nss
Japanese: 先日、バッティングセンターで、見かけた彼女は、見とれるほど美しく――
Translation: The other day, when I caught a glimpse of her here at the batting cages, her form was bewitchingly beautiful...
KR: 얼마 전 야구연습장에서 본 미유키는 시선이 빼앗길 정도로 아름다워서...

Name: e2324d.nss
Japanese: 懐かしい。
Translation: It really takes me back.

Name: e2324d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「やった！　入った！」
Translation: "YES! I got it!"

Name: e2324d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「おめでとう」
Translation: "Congrats!"

Name: e2324d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うん。応援、ありがとう！」
Translation: "Thanks for believing in me!"

Name: e2324d.nss
Japanese: その言葉に、飾る素振りは見受けられない。
Translation: I can tell she really means it, too.
KR: 그 말에 꾸미는 내색은 찾아볼 수 없었다.

Name: e2324d.nss
Japanese: まるで、小学生の頃の彼女に戻ったような……
Translation: Almost like she's gone back to her old self from when we were kids...
KR: 마치 초등학교 시절 미유키로 돌아간 것 같은...

Name: e2324d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それで……さっきから、不思議だったんですけど」
Translation: "Anyway... I've been wondering something for a while now..."

Name: e2324d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「前に会ったことって、ありましたっけ？」
Translation: "Have we met before?"

Name: e2324d.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「先輩」
Translation: "Senpai!"

Name: e2324d.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「もう、冷えますよ」
Translation: "It's getting chilly out here."

Name: e2324d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ……そうだな」
Translation: "Oh... Yeah..."

Name: e2324d.nss
Japanese: そう言いながらも、俺は、動けない。
Translation: I can't summon the energy to move.

Name: e2324d.nss
Japanese: 黒い渦が、天を覆い尽くしたあの日から、ずっと――
Translation: I keep thinking back to the day those dark clouds swirled overhead...
KR: 검은 소용돌이가 하늘을 뒤덮은 그날부터 계속...

Name: e2324d.nss
Japanese: アオイの言っていた「カミサマ」が何だったのか、もう今となってはわからない。
Translation: Even now, I still don't know just who or what Aoi's "God" really is.
KR: 아오이가 말했던 '신님'이 무엇이었는지 이제는 알 방법이 없다.

Name: e2324d.nss
Japanese: わかるのは、「カミサマ」の復活が防がれ、セカイ滅亡の危機が救われたこと――
Translation: All I know is that we stopped it from reviving and thus saved the world from imminent destruction.
KR: 아는 것은 '신님'의 부활이 막히고 세계 멸망의 위기가 사라졌다는 것.

Name: e2324d.nss
Japanese: それと共に、このセカイからアオイの存在が消えてしまったこと――
Translation: But Aoi's entire existence was completely erased along with it.
KR: 그와 동시에 이 세계에서 아오이의 존재가 사라져 버린 것.

Name: e2324d.nss
Japanese: そしてそれと道連れに、美雪の記憶も――
Translation: And that, in turn, wiped Miyuki's memories.

Name: e2324d.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「はくしょん！」
Translation: "AAACHOO!"

Name: e2324d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ……悪い」
Translation: "Oh... My bad."

Name: e2324d.nss
Japanese: 待ってくれているハルちゃんまで、冷えてしまう。
Translation: I can't make Haru-chan wait out here in the cold.

Name: e2324d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「じゃ、一緒に――」
Translation: "Alright, let's go."

Name: e2324d.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「先輩」
Translation: "Senpai!"

Name: e2324d.nss
Japanese: 不意に、身体が密着する。
Translation: Suddenly, her body presses against mine.

Name: e2324d.nss
Japanese: ハルちゃんの――柔らかな、身体の感触。
Translation: Her soft, curvy body...

Name: e2324d.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「先輩が温めて下さい」
Translation: "I'll warm you up, okay?"

Name: e2324d.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ハルちゃん……」
Translation: "Haru-chan...?"

Name: e2324d.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「私が女の子になったのも、カミサマの思し召し」
Translation: "God must have turned me into a girl for a reason."

Name: e2324d.nss
Speaker: Akebono Ryuujirou
Japanese: 「運命……だと、思いますよ？」
Translation: "I think... it must be fate."

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: バイト中、滅多に鳴らない電話が音を立てた。
Translation: I'm standing around at work when all of a sudden, I get a rare incoming call on my cell phone.

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ、すいません！」
Translation: "Ack! Sorry, gotta take this!"

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: 俺は店長に頭を下げて店を出る。
Translation: I apologize to my boss and duck out of the store.
KR: 나는 점장에게 고개를 숙이고 가게를 나섰다.

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: どうせ客なんていない。
Translation: Not like we have any customers, anyway.

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: 俺ひとりいなくたって、どうってことない。
Translation: They hardly need me in there.

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もしもし？」
Translation: "Hello?"

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『心一！　久しぶり！』
Translation: "Shinichi! Long time no talk, man!"

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、久しぶり。元気でやってるか？」
Translation: "Yeah, for real. How are you doing?"

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『おう！　充実のサークルライフに忙殺されそうだ！』
Translation: "Oh, I'm great! Leading a busy and fulfilling college life!"
KR: "그럼! 충실한 동아리 생활로 바빠질 것 같다!"

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「はぁ……万年大学生め。
　留年もほどほどにしろよ」
Translation:
"Jesus, dude. You STILL haven't graduated?
How many times are you going to fail the same classes?"

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『わかってるって。お前もニート生活――』
Translation: "Yeah, yeah, I'm working on it! At least I'm not a total mooch, unlike you—"

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ニートじゃない。フリーターだ！」
Translation: "I'm not a mooch! I have a job! Technically!"

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「で、用事って何だ？」
Translation: "So, what's up?"

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『おう、同窓会を開こうと思ってな』
Translation: "Oh, right. So I was thinking of organizing a class reunion!"

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Oh god..."

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
『もうあれから１０年だろ？
　そろそろ頃合いだ！』
Translation:
"I mean, it's been 10 years, hasn't it?
It's about time, I'd say!"

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん、そっか。もうそんなに経つんだな」
Translation: "Huh... I guess you're right. Man, time flies."

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: 目を閉じれば――
Translation: Anytime I close my eyes...

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: 学校で繰り広げられた、奇妙な三角関係が蘇る。
Translation: The memory of our weird little friendship triad springs to mind like it was only yesterday.

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: もしあの関係がなければ、今頃俺は、家で寂しくヒキコモリでもしていたかもしれない。
Translation: If it hadn't been for the two of them, I'd probably be a total shut-in right about now.
KR: 만약 그 관계가 없었다면 지금쯤 집에서 쓸쓸하게 히키코모리라도 됐을지도 모른다.

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: でも、あの関係が生まれたおかげで、俺は今――
Translation: But at the same time, that same friendship made me—
KR: 하지만 그 관계가 있었던 덕분에 지금은...

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『おい、聞いてるか？』
Translation: "Hey! You still there?"

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「わ、悪い。なんだって？」
Translation: "S-Sorry. What was that?"

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese:
『向日の電話番号だよ！
　お前、聞いたとか言ってたよな？』
Translation:
"Mukou's phone number!
You said you've got it, right?"

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ……ああ」
Translation: "Well, yeah..."

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でも、繋がらないぞ」
Translation:
"I'll give it to you if you want, but...
Good luck getting your call to go through."

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: あの秋が終わると同時――
Translation: That year, when autumn gave way to winter...

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: アオイは、俺たちの前から姿を消した。
Translation: Aoi ghosted us completely.

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: 家庭の事情で、転校を余儀なくされたらしい。
Translation: Supposedly she was forced to transfer schools due to family circumstances.
KR: 집안 사정으로 전학을 가게 된 것 같다.

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: ……あくまでも、推測でしかないけれど。
Translation: There's no proof, though.

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『やっぱりそうか……』
Translation: "No service, huh?"

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『曽根さんも、同じこと言ってたよ』
Translation: "Sone-san told me the same thing."

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪は？　アイツは来るのか？」
Translation: "Miyuki? Is she coming to this reunion of yours?"

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『断られたよ』
Translation: "Nah, she turned me down."

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『医学の道一筋、って感じ』
Translation: "Said she needs to focus on med school."

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『あーあ。まだ、彼氏とかいないんだろうなあ……』
Translation: "What a shame... I bet she's still single..."

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: 学園時代、演劇への未練を断ち切った美雪は、そのまま都内の一流大学医学部へ。
Translation: During our last year of school together, Miyuki gave up on theatre and enrolled into the region's top medical school.
KR: 학창 시절, 연극에 대한 미련을 끊은 미유키는 그대로 일류대학 의대에 들어갔다.

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: 未知の病理を解明し、人類に貢献する――
Translation: While she claimed she was doing it with the hopes of finding a cure for mystery diseases...

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: なんて息巻いているものの、彼女の研究動機は猫アレルギー克服なんて我欲に満ちているらしい。
Translation: ...I know her real motivation was actually to find a cure for her cat allergies.
KR: ...라니 엄청난 위업 같지만, 연구 동기가 본인의 고양이 알레르기 극복이라니 사리사욕으로 가득한 것 같다.

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: 男がいるような浮いた噂はとんと流れてこないし……
Translation: I haven't heard any rumors about her seeing anyone.
KR: 남자가 있다는 소문은 일절 없기도 하고...

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: まあ、彼女らしいと言えば彼女らしいか。
Translation: But that's Miyuki for you.

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『俺たちも、そろそろなんとかしないとな』
Translation: "We should probably try to work on our love lives, too."

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What do you mean?"

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「まだ言ってなかったっけ？」
Translation: "Wait... Did I not tell you?"

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『え？　その反応は……』
Translation: "Huh? Wait... You're joking..."

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: 視線が、自然と店内へ向く。
Translation: My gaze shifts beyond the store display window to the interior.
KR: 내 시선은 자연스럽게 가게 안을 향했다.

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: 客がいないのに、いつもふたりシフトの雑貨店。
Translation: We never do have any customers, but we always work the same shifts together...
KR: 손님이 없는데 항상 두 사람이 서는 잡화점.

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: 美雪とアオイ、奇妙な三角関係があったおかげで――
Translation: Yes, if it weren't for the friendship I shared with Miyuki and Aoi...
KR: 미유키와 아오이, 기묘한 삼각관계가 있던 덕분에...

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: 俺はねこまんまの店長と、出会うことができたのだ。
Translation: ...I never would have met the owner of Catnip.
KR: 나는 냥이간식의 점장을 만날 수 있었던 것이다.

Name: e2324e.nss
Speaker: Akebono Yuutarou
Japanese: 『爆発しろッ！！』

Name: e2324e.nss
Japanese: 雄太郎の祝福の声が、夕陽の街に谺した……
Translation: Yuutarou's blessing echoes across the twilit city...
KR: 유우타로의 축복하는 목소리가 거리에 울려 퍼졌다...

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: ２０年ぶりに、地元に戻る。
Translation: It's been 20 years since I last set foot in my hometown.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: この街は、あの日と何も変わらない。
Translation: And this place hasn't changed a bit since then.
KR: 이 마을은 그날과 변한 게 아무것도 없다.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: まるで時が止まってしまったかのようだ。
Translation: Almost like time itself stopped just for me.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 俺の足は、自然と速くなる。
Translation: My pace quickens.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 長年、閉鎖空間に閉じ込められていた。
Translation: I've been a hermit for many, many years.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 他人の視線には、慣れない。
Translation: I'm not used to other people looking at me.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 自分がずっと見られているような錯覚。
Translation: Feels like they're staring.
KR: 누가 자꾸 보고 있는 것 같은 착각.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: いいや……もしかしたら、事実なのかもしれない。
Translation: Then again... Maybe they actually are.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: きっとこの街で、俺は鼻つまみ者なのだ。
Translation: I wager I'm not welcome in this town.
KR: 분명 이 마을에서 나는 미움받는 사람이다.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: コンビニに入ろうとして――足が止まる。
Translation: For a moment I contemplate going into the corner store—but then I stop short.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: カウンターで、仲睦まじくレジを打っているふたり。
Translation: At the counter stands the happy couple, working the registers.
KR: 화목하게 카운터를 보고 있는 두 사람.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: そのうちひとりは、随分年を重ねてはいるものの……
Translation: One of them looks to have aged quite a bit...
KR: 그 중 한 사람은 꽤 나이 든 것 같은데...

Name: e2324f.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……自販機、あったよな」
Translation: "...There was a vending machine around here, wasn't there?"

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 今日は休日。
Translation: It's the weekend.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 部活のために校門は開いているが、人は少ない。
Translation: The campus is open for club activities, but thankfully there aren't many people around.
KR: 동아리를 위해 교문은 열려있지만, 사람은 거의 없다.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: こそこそせずに、校舎に入ることができた。
Translation: No sneaky business necessary; I just walk right in.
KR: 숨지 않아도 학교에 들어갈 수 있었다.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 鍵を壊すことも当然考えていたのだが、当時のものがまだ使われていた。
Translation: I'd figured I'd need to break the lock, but as it turns out, they're still using the same one from back then.
KR: 자물쇠를 부수는 것도 당연히 생각하고 있었는데, 그 당시에 있던 것이 아직도 사용되고 있었다.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 俺はそっと、錆び付いたドアを開ける。
Translation: Carefully, I pull open the rusty old door.

Name: e2324f.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「るる……シンイチ？」
Translation: "Boop boop...? Shinichi?"

Name: e2324f.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ちょっと、遅いわよ！」
Translation: "You jerk! You're late!"

Name: e2324f.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ、ごめん。待たせたな」
Translation: "I know. Sorry for the wait."

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: ポケットから、買ってきた缶チューハイを取り出す。
Translation: I pull the can of shochu highball from my pocket.

Name: e2324f.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「お酒？」
Translation: "Is that alcohol?"

Name: e2324f.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ガッコウでのむの？」
Translation: "Are you drinking at school?"

Name: e2324f.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「フリョーなの！」
Translation: "You delinquent!"

Name: e2324f.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「今日くらい、いいだろ」
Translation: "It can't hurt, just once."

Name: e2324f.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……ま、来てくれたんだしね」
Translation: "...At least you showed up, I guess."

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 夕陽が差す屋根に上る。
Translation: As the sun sets, I climb up to the top of the roof.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: その空は、赤く、赤く――
Translation: The sky is a brilliant crimson.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 記憶と変わることなく――
Translation: Just the way I remember it.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 記憶と――変わらず――
Translation: The way... I remember it...

Name: e2324f.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「思い出すわね。あの日のこと」
Translation: "Really takes you back to that fateful day, huh?"

Name: e2324f.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイたちが、バイバイしたひのこと」
Translation: "The day we said bye-bye."

Name: e2324f.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...Yeah."

Name: e2324f.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私を選ぶの？」
Translation: "Will you choose me?"

Name: e2324f.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイをえらぶの？」
Translation: "Or choose me?"

Name: e2324f.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私たちは、そう迫って」
Translation: "We demanded an answer."

Name: e2324f.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチは、えらべなかった」
Translation: "But you wouldn't give it."

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: そして、悲劇が起きたのだ。
Translation: And then tragedy struck.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 気付けばそこには、憎しみあうふたりの死体が転がって。
Translation: The next thing I knew, they both lay dead, victims of their mutual resentment.
KR: 정신을 차려보니 거기에는 서로 미워하는 두 사람의 시체가 널려있었다.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: しかし、俺は屋上に行けばいつでも、ふたりに会えた。
Translation: And yet, anytime I went up to the roof, there they were.
KR: 하지만 나는 옥상에 가면 언제든지 두 사람과 만날 수 있었다.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 死んだ人が生きているはずがない。
Translation: I knew they were dead.
KR: 죽은 사람이 살아 돌아올 리 없었다.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: それは、わかっていた。
Translation: I knew that.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: でも、俺は、彼女たちから離れられなかった。
Translation: But I couldn't let them go.
KR: 하지만 나는 그 녀석들을 떠나보내지 못했다.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: ずっとずっと、３人でいようとした。
Translation: I wanted to stay together, just the three of us.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 気が狂うくらいに、幸せだった。
Translation: I was so happy, I was starting to lose it.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: ……そう。
Translation: ...And then I did lose it.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 俺の心は、現実と齟齬を起こしていたのだ。
Translation: My mind was at total odds with reality.
KR: 내 마음은 현실과 어긋나 있었던 것이다.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 現実を認められないまま、屋上に鍵をかけ、誰も入れず、立てこもり。
Translation: Unable to break free of my delusion, I locked myself up here—
KR: 현실을 받아들이지 못한 채 옥상을 잠그고 아무도 들어가지 못하게 농성.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 強制的に、精神病棟へと入れられた。
Translation: —until they broke the door down and took me to the psych ward.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: ……あれから、２０年。
Translation: ...And then 20 years passed.

Name: e2324f.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「んく――んく、ん――」
Translation: "Ggllpp... ggllpp... mmm..."

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: チューハイを飲み干す。
Translation: I chug my drink.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 俺はひとり、無人の屋上に立ち尽くす。
Translation: Then I stand there, alone on the empty roof.
KR: 나는 혼자 옥상 위에 서 있다.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 最初から、誰もいやしない。
Translation: They were never here.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 美雪も、アオイも――とっくの昔に、いない。
Translation: They left this world a long, long time ago.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: その現実を、ようやく受け入れることができた今。
Translation: And now I can finally accept that.
KR: 그 현실을 겨우 받아들이게 된 지금.

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: 俺が取るべき行動は、ひとつ――
Translation: So there's only one thing left to do.
KR: 내가 취해야 할 행동은 단 하나.

Name: e2324f.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「待たせたな」
Translation: "Okay... I'm ready."

Name: e2324f.nss
Japanese: ふたりに会いに行くことだけだ。
Translation: Time to go see them.

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「エンディング……？」
Translation: "Are these all... different endings...?"

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そう。でも、ゲームじゃないの」
Translation: "Yep. But they're not from some video game."

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私を選ばずに、このセカイが進んだときの結末」
Translation: "These are just a few of the different endings you'll achieve in this world..."
KR: "나를 선택하지 않고 이 세계가 진행됐을 때 결말."

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「その、一例なの」
Translation: "...if you don't choose me."

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ね、気付いたかな？」
Translation: "Have you noticed anything?"

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方が私を選ばなかったルートで、私がどんな結末を迎えるか」
Translation: "...About, say, what happens to me in every route where you don't end up with me?"
KR: "...네가 나를 선택하지 않은 루트에서 내가 어떤 결말을 맞이할지."

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「どんなって……」
Translation: "What do you mean?"

Name: e2324g.nss
Japanese: 芸能人として成功したり、勉強に励んだり――
Translation: She got famous, or threw herself into her studies...

Name: e2324g.nss
Japanese: 悲しい結末もあったけど、それだけじゃないはず……
Translation: Sure, some of the endings were sad, but not all of them.
KR: 슬픈 결말도 있었지만, 그것만은 아닐 거야.

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「確かに、全てが悪いわけじゃない」
Translation: "Admittedly, not all of them are bad, per se."

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「でも……ねえ、わかるでしょう？」
Translation: "But... come on. You've realized it, right?"

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私が、本気で、心から笑えるエンディングは」
Translation: "All these endings have one thing in common."

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ひとつもないの」
Translation: "And that's that I'm never truly happy."

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私、全部のルートを試したわ」
Translation: "I've tried every last one."

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方と結ばれなかった私が、どんな結末を迎えるか」
Translation: "Just to see what would happen if you didn't choose me."
KR: "너와 맺어지지 못한 내가 어떤 결말을 맞이하는지."

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「選択肢を試して――試して――試して――」
Translation: "I kept testing choice after choice after choice after choice..."

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki

Translation: "I rewrote branch after branch after branch..."
KR: "몇 번이고 몇 번이고 몇 번이고 분기를 다시 지나..."

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そしてやっと、気付いたの」
Translation: "Then it finally hit me."

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私は、貴方以外の男と結ばれることはない」
Translation: "I can never end up with anyone but you."
KR: "나는 너 이외에 남자와 맺어질 수 없어."

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「老人になるまで、ひとりで過ごす」
Translation: "I'll be alone until the day I die."

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「一見幸せに見えても――」
Translation: "No matter how happy I seem on the outside..."

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「本当は、満たされていないの」
Translation: "The truth is, I'll always be incomplete."

Name: e2324g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki

Translation: "The only time I can achieve true happiness is when I'm with you."
KR: "내가 진정한 행복을 얻게 되는 건 너와 맺어졌을 때뿐."

Name: e2324g.nss

Name: e2324g.nss

Name: e2324h.nss

Name: e2324h.nss
Japanese: セカイは創りかえられた。

Name: e2324h.nss

Name: e2324h.nss

Translation: To suit my own convenience and no one else's...

Name: e2324h.nss
Japanese: だから、美雪は幸せになれない？

Name: e2324h.nss
Japanese: 俺のせいで……？

Name: e2324h.nss

Name: e2324h.nss

Name: e2324h.nss

Name: e2324h.nss

Translation: "I have no regrets. After all—"

Name: e2324h.nss

Translation: "Every last moment I spent with you was the happiest moment of my life."

Name: e2324h.nss

Name: e2324h.nss

Name: e2324h.nss

Name: e2324h.nss

Translation: "When you first agreed to stay in this world, was it because you cared about me?"
KR: "전에 이 세계에 있어준 건 나를 생각해줬기 때문이 아니라..."

Name: e3415c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「分岐上の結末を、見るためだったの？」
Translation: "Or was it just so you could see the end of this route?"

Name: e3415c.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、なにを言っているのか、俺にはわからない。
Translation: I have no idea what she's talking about.

Name: e3415d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「無駄だって！」
Translation: "You're wasting your time!"

Name: e3415d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方は、絶対に戻ってくるの……」
Translation: "You'll always return to me..."

Name: e3415d.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「この前みたいに……必ず……！」
Translation: "Just like last time... without fail!"

Name: e3415d.nss
Japanese: 美雪の懇願に、恐ろしささえ感じながら――
Translation: Her desperation is starting to scare me a little.

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: 俺は、あの部屋を抜け出した。
Translation: I slip out of the apartment.

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: 足元で、小さな黒猫が鳴く。
Translation: At my feet sits a little black kitten, meowing.
KR: 발밑에는 작고 검은 고양이가 울고 있었다.

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: 名前も知らないその子猫。
Translation: I don't even know its name.

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: "だが俺は、名前を知っている"
Translation: "But I do."

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: "エルだ"
Translation: "His name is Eru."

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: 子猫を抱いて夜の街を歩き出す。
Translation: With the kitten in my arms, I wander aimlessly through the dark city.

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: 理由もなく、目的地もなく。
Translation: No destination in mind.

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: ただ、その猫の鳴き声に――
Translation: But the kitten's meows guide me.

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: 夜の風に震える、ヒゲの動きに導かれるように。
Translation: Its whiskers twitch in the cool night breeze.

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: "彼女を見つけたあの日のように"
Translation: "Just like the night we found her."

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: "エルは電波ネコだ"
Translation: "Eru is a transceiver cat."

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: "だから、導いてくれる先にはきっと――"
Translation: "So I'm pretty sure I know where he's taking me."

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: ただ、写真を撮るだけのつもりだった。
Translation: I was just going to take some pictures.

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: なのにどうして、こんなところにいるんだろう？
Translation: So why am I here?
KR: 그런데 어째서 이런 곳에 있는 거지?

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: どうしても、こうしなければならない。
Translation: Where am I going?
KR: 무슨 일이 있어도 이렇게 해야만 한다.

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: そんな気に、させられるのだ。
Translation: Something inside me tells me I have to do this.

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: "普段なら取らないような行動"
Translation: "Actions you'd ordinarily never take."

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: "セカイの整合性を離れた行動"
Translation: "Actions that don't make sense in context."

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: "俺は、逸脱しなければならない"
Translation: "I have to break the cycle."

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: "主人公に、行動させなければならない"
Translation: "I have to control the protagonist."

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: "正しい結末を導くために"
Translation: "Guide him to the true ending."

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: "彼女を、本当の意味で救うために"
Translation: "It's the only way to truly save her."

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: 毎日は、道じゃなく、階段のように過ぎていく。
Translation: Life is not a highway. Life is a staircase.

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: 一度疑問に思ったらその途端、毎日が辛くなる。
Translation: You just gotta keep climbing.
KR: 한 번 의문은 품으면, 다리를 들어 올리는 게 힘들어진다.

Name: e3421.nss
