Japanese: だから、一歩、一歩、なにも考えずに、上る。
Translation: Otherwise, if you start to overthink it, you'll have trouble taking the next step.
KR: 그러니까 한 발, 한 발, 아무 생각하지 않고 오른다.

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: 階段だから、別れ道はなく。
Translation: There are no branching paths.

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: 「あの時ああしておけば」なんて後悔は無意味で。
Translation: No point in regretting the actions you didn't take.

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: 「人生は選択の連続だ」なんていうのは、失敗してから振り返って思う、後悔の絞りかすみたいなものだ。
Translation: They say life is a series of choices, but that's nonsense cooked up by the old and bitter.
KR: '인생은 선택의 연속이다' 라는 말은 실패하고 나서야 생각나는, 후회의 찌꺼기 같은 것이다.

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: 過去の少し先にある、当たり前の明日へ。
Translation: Yesterday leads to today, and today leads to tomorrow.
KR: 과거의 조금 앞에 있는 당연한 내일로.

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: 一歩、一歩、進んでいく。
Translation: One step at a time.

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: ずっと、ずっと……
Translation: Forever and ever and ever...

Name: e3421.nss
Japanese: そんな風に、思っていた。
Translation: Or so I thought.

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: 夜、無人の屋上。
Translation: The school roof is quiet and dark and empty.

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: 見たことのない光景だった。
Translation: I've never been up here at night before...

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: 手元から、エルが飛び出す。
Translation: Eru jumps from my arms.

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: クルリと身を翻して向かうのは――
Translation: He turns around...
KR: 빙글 하고 몸을 돌려 향하는 곳은...

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: 屋上のさらに上、階段の屋根に繋がるハシゴだ。
Translation: ...and heads to the ladder leading to the roof over the stairs.
KR: 옥상보다 한 층 위, 꼭대기로 이어지는 사다리였다.

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "You want me to go up there?"

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: 見送るエルに、頷いて――
Translation: I nod to the kitten...

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: 俺はハシゴに、手をかける。
Translation: And then I put my hand on the rung.

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: 一段――
Translation: Step...

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: また、一段――
Translation: ...by step...

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: ゆっくりと、上がっていく。
Translation: I slowly climb to the top.

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: 星空。
Translation: The sky is a sea of stars.

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: 満天の星から降り注ぐ、光、光、光。
Translation: Light shines down from the heavens.

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: 街中から照らしつける、光、光、光。
Translation: Light twinkles up from the city below.

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: まるで、セカイの中心に立っているかのようで――
Translation: It almost feels like I'm standing at the center of the universe.
KR: 마치 세계의 중심에 서 있는 것 같았다.

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: 美雪のスマートフォンに、着信がある。
Translation: Someone is calling Miyuki's phone.

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: 発信者は――カミサマ。
Translation: I check the screen. It's God.

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: "だが俺は、驚かなかった"
Translation: "But this doesn't surprise me."

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: "なぜならここは、セカイの中心"
Translation: "After all, this is the center of the universe."

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: "電波状態は、抜群で"
Translation: "Where radio wave reception is at its peak."

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: "俺は電波ネコに導かれ、やってきたのだ"
Translation: "And the transceiver cat brought us here."

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もしもし」
Translation: "Hello?"

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「もしもし？　聞こえますか？」
Translation: "Hello? Can you hear me?"

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『肯定』
Translation: "AFFIRMATIVE."

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『交信確認』
Translation: "CONNECTION ESTABLISHED."

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: 足元で、猫が自慢げに鳴いた。
Translation: At my feet, the cat meows proudly.

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: 俺が今ここにいるのは、俺の選択の結果ではない。
Translation: My choices didn't lead me here...
KR: 내가 여기에 있는 것은 내 선택의 결과가 아니다.

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: かといって、絶対的な運命が導いたわけでもない。
Translation: But fate didn't lead me here, either.
KR: 그렇다고 절대적인 운명에 이끌려 온 것도 아니다.

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: "なぜなら、心一を導いたのは"
Translation: "You want to know what led you here?"

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: "セカイの外の『俺』だからだ"
Translation: "It was me. The player on the other side of the screen."

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: "選択肢を選ぶ『俺』だからだ"
Translation: "The one who gets to pick your choices."

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『セカイを、ロールバックする』
Translation: "WE INFER [YOUR] INTENTION..."

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『それが主体者の希望と推測』
Translation: "...IS TO ROLL BACK THE UNIVERSE."

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: 神様はそう、受話器の向こうから断言した。
Translation: God declares to me from the other end of the line.
KR: 신님은 그렇게 수화기 너머로 단정 지어 말했다.

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『有資格者は、美雪とアオイのみ』
Translation: "ONLY MIYUKI AND AOI HAVE INITIATION PERMISSIONS."

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『しかし、そのセカイは、改変済』
Translation: "BUT THIS UNIVERSE HAS ALREADY BEEN ALTERED."

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『アオイの存在は、ほぼ消失』
Translation: "AOI'S EXISTENCE HAS BEEN ALMOST COMPLETELY ERASED."

Name: e3422.nss
Translation: "ALMOST completely?"

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『肯定』
Translation: "AFFIRMATIVE."

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『意識の断片が電波として残留している状態』
Translation: "A FRAGMENT OF HER CONSCIOUSNESS LIVES ON IN THE FORM OF ELECTROMAGNETIC WAVES."

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『コールナンバーにより、再度の顕現が可能』
Translation: "SHE CAN BE RESTORED USING HER CODE NUMBER."

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: "確か美雪も、そんなことを言っていた"
Translation: "I remember Miyuki said the same thing."

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: "でも、コールナンバーは……"
Translation: "But that code number is gone."

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: "美雪に先回りされて、改変された"
Translation: "Miyuki changed it."

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『予備の番号が準備済』
Translation: "WE HAVE PREPARED A BACKUP NUMBER."

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: "でも、どうやってその番号を知る？"
Translation: "Okay, but how can we find it?"
KR: "하지만 어떻게 그 번호를 알 수 있지?"

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: "この会話も、バックログに記録されている"
Translation: "This whole conversation is being recorded in the backlog."

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: "もし、それをカミサマが伝えたら"
Translation: "If you tell it to us..."

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: "美雪から即座に、番号を改変されてしまう……"
Translation: "Miyuki will find out and change it."

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『否定』
Translation: "FALSE."

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『セカイの内側の数字は、美雪に可知』
Translation: "MIYUKI IS AWARE OF ALL NUMBERS THAT EXIST WITHIN THIS UNIVERSE."

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『しかし』
Translation: "HOWEVER..."

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『外側の数字は不可知』
Translation: "SHE CANNOT DETERMINE NUMBERS BEYOND THAT LIMIT."

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『主体者の世界に、美雪は干渉不可能』
Translation: "SHE CANNOT SEE INTO THE SUBJECT'S UNIVERSE."

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: "主体者の世界？"
Translation: "The subject's universe?"

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『肯定。即ち――現実』
Translation: "AFFIRMATIVE. IN OTHER WORDS—REALITY."

Name: e3422.nss
Translation: "Reality...?"

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: "つまり、俺のいる世界？"
Translation: "You mean, MY universe?"

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『現実に存在する８桁のキーコード』
Translation: "THERE EXISTS IN [YOUR] UNIVERSE AN EIGHT-DIGIT KEY CODE."

Name: e3422.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『発見済？』
Translation: "HAVE [YOU] LOCATED IT?"

Name: e3422.nss
Japanese: "発見している","発見していない"
Translation: "Yes","No"

Name: e3423a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『手帳と筆記用具が必要』
Translation: "PREPARE A METHOD OF NOTE-TAKING."

Name: e3423a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『テキストエディタ起動でも可。電卓も可』
Translation: "A PEN AND PAPER, A TEXT EDITING PROGRAM, ANYTHING SHALL SUFFICE."

Name: e3423a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『準備完了？』
Translation: "ARE [YOU] READY?"

Name: e3423a.nss
Japanese: 何を言っているか、わからないが――
Translation: I mean, I don't know what's going on, but I guess?

Name: e3423a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『カミサマの電話番号を記憶』
Translation: "RECORD GOD'S PHONE NUMBER."

Name: e3423a.nss
Japanese: 俺は通話しながら、電話帳を調べる。
Translation: I launch the address book app.

Name: e3423a.nss
Japanese: 神様の電話番号は――
Translation: God's phone number is...

Name: e3423a.nss
Japanese: 999<VALUE name=#god_number>。
Translation: 999<VALUE name=#god_number>.

Name: e3423a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『電話番号から、主体者が発見したキーコードを減算』
Translation: "TAKE THIS NUMBER AND SUBTRACT THE SUBJECT'S EIGHT-DIGIT NUMBER FROM IT."

Name: e3423a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『最後に、美雪が用意した変数を、加算』
Translation: "LASTLY, ADD MIYUKI'S VARIABLE TO IT."

Name: e3423a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「変数？」
Translation: "Miyuki has a variable?"

Name: e3423a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『肯定』
Translation: "AFFIRMATIVE."

Name: e3423a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『アオイの復活を阻止する、最後の障害』
Translation: "IT IS THE FINAL BARRIER TO AOI'S RESTORATION."

Name: e3423a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『美雪が、最も、思い入れを持つ数字』
Translation: "AND IT IS THE NUMBER MIYUKI FAVORS MOST."

Name: e3423a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「思い入れを――」
Translation: "What do you mean, she favors it?"

Name: e3423a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『加算したものが、運命の番号』
Translation: "ADD HER VARIABLE AND THE RESULTING NUMBER IS THE ONE [YOU] DESIRE."

Name: e3423a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『アオイを呼び出すコールナンバー』
Translation: "IT IS THE CODE NUMBER THAT SHALL RESTORE AOI."

Name: e3423a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『入力、可能？』
Translation: "REQUESTING INPUT."

Name: e3423a.nss
Japanese: "入力できる","入力しない","美雪の変数がわからない"
Translation: "Put it in","Don't put it in","I don't know Miyuki's variable"

Name: e3423b.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『パッケージの箱』
Translation: "THE GAME BOX."

Name: e3423b.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『チラシ』
Translation: "THE PACKAGE INSERT."

Name: e3423b.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『予約特典』
Translation: "THE PREORDER BONUS."

Name: e3423b.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『その他、何でも可』
Translation: "ANYTHING WITHIN THAT SCOPE."

Name: e3423b.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『キーコードを、捜索』
Translation: "SEARCH FOR THE KEY CODE."

Name: e3423b.nss
Japanese: "見つけた","諦める"
Translation: "Found it","I give up"

Name: e3423c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『理解』
Translation: "UNDERSTOOD."

Name: e3423c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『強要は不可能』
Translation: "WE CANNOT FORCE [YOU]."

Name: e3424a.nss
Japanese: 俺の指が、ダイヤル画面をさまよう。
Translation: My fingers wander over the screen.

Name: e3424a.nss
Japanese: 脳裏に突如として浮かび上がる、俺の知らない番号。
Translation: A number I've never encountered in my life mysteriously floats to the forefront of my mind...
KR: 뇌리에 갑자기 떠오르는, 내가 모르는 번호...

Name: e3424a.nss
Japanese: それは――

Name: e3424a.nss
Japanese: "チートコード使用","成功","失敗"
Translation: "Use cheat code","Success","Failure"

Name: e3424b.nss
Japanese: そのまま、指先が動かなくなる。
Translation: My fingers stop short.

Name: e3424b.nss
Japanese: 俺には、カミサマの言葉が理解できない。
Translation: I can't understand what God is asking.
KR: 나는 신님의 말을 이해할 수 없었다.

Name: e3424b.nss
Japanese: 脳裏には、どんな番号も浮かばなかった。
Translation: Whatever number it is that I need, I can't think of it.

Name: e3424b.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『アオイの復帰を断念？』
Translation: "WILL [YOU] ABANDON [YOUR] INTENTION OF RESTORING AOI?"

Name: e3424b.nss
Speaker: God
Translation: "...UNDERSTOOD."

Name: e3424b.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『強要は不可能』
Translation: "WE CANNOT FORCE [YOU]."

Name: e3424c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『しかし、現在地はセカイの中心』
Translation: "STILL, [YOU] ARE AT THE CENTER OF THE UNIVERSE."

Name: e3424c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『希望を確認すれば、何度でも、電波を受信可能』
Translation: "SHOULD [YOU] REAFFIRM YOUR INTENTION, [YOU] MAY TRANSMIT [YOUR] SIGNAL AT ANY TIME."
KR: "희망을 확인하면 몇 번이라도 전파 수신 가능."

Name: e3424c.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『もし……主体者が、希望するなら』
Translation: "...SHOULD THE SUBJECT SO DESIRE."

Name: e3424c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……切れた、な」
Translation: "...Guess they hung up."

Name: e3424c.nss
Japanese: 俺はダランと肩を垂らし、ぼんやりと空を見上げる。
Translation: Slumping my shoulders, I stare up hopelessly at the night sky.
KR: 나는 힘없이 어깨를 떨구고 멍하니 하늘을 바라보았다.

Name: e3424c.nss
Japanese: 月の光が静かに俺を迎えてくれる。
Translation: The moon quietly shines down on me.

Name: e3424c.nss
Japanese: なんだかよくわからない電話だった。
Translation: That phone call made no sense.

Name: e3424c.nss
Japanese: というか、なんだかよくわからない行動だった。
Translation: Hell, I'M not making any sense. What am I even doing?

Name: e3424c.nss
Japanese: でも、俺はどうしてもこうしなきゃならない気が――
Translation: And yet, something inside my head is telling me I have to—
KR: 하지만 이렇게 해야만 할 것 같은 기분이 들어서...

Name: e3424c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Shinichi—!!!"

Name: e3424c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「はぁッ――はぁッ――はぁッ――！」
Translation: "Haah, haah, haah...!"

Name: e3424c.nss
Japanese: 美雪は俺の名前を呼んだかと思うと、息を切らして屋根上へのハシゴを上り始め――
Translation: Gasping for breath, Miyuki scrambles up the ladder—
KR: 미유키는 내 이름을 부르더니 숨을 헐떡이며 사다리를 오르기 시작했다.

Name: e3424c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一ッ！！」
Translation: "Shinichi!!!"

Name: e3424c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「うおっ！！」
Translation: "Whoa!!!"

Name: e3424c.nss
Japanese: 凄まじい勢いで抱きつかれ、俺は屋上で押し倒されそうになる。
Translation: She rushes into my arms so fast, she nearly knocks me to the ground.
KR: 엄청난 기세로 달려들어서 자칫 옥상에서 떨어질 뻔했다.

Name: e3424c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょ！　バカ！　あぶな――」
Translation: "Careful! Cool it, dummy!"

Name: e3424c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ありがとう……ッ！」
Translation: "Thank you...!"

Name: e3424c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ありがとう、ありがとうありがとう…………！！」
Translation: "Thank you, thank you, thank you...!!!"

Name: e3424c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ここに、いてくれて！」
Translation: "Thank you for staying!"

Name: e3424c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私と一緒の、このセカイに……残ってくれて……」
Translation: "For staying here... in this world with me..."

Name: e3424c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ありがとう……本当に……ありがとう……」
Translation: "Thank you... Thank you so much...!"

Name: e3424c.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「お、おいちょっと。
　泣かなくても――んむっ！！」
Translation:
"Wh-Whoa there, hey now!
Don't cry—Mmmph?!"

Name: e3424c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ん――んちゅっ、ん――んん――」
Translation: "Mmm—mmmph—mm—mmmm—!"

Name: e3424c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「大好き――私――君のことが――
　んんっ、んちゅ――ん――ん――」
Translation:
"I love YOU—I really do—!
Mmmm—mmph—mm—mmm—!"

Name: e3424c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「本当に――大好き――なんだよ――」
Translation: "I love YOU—so, so much—!"

Name: e3424c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから――お願い――離さないで――」
Translation: "So please—I'm begging YOU—don't leave me—!"

Name: e3424c.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私と一緒に――ずっと――ずっと――んちゅっ」
Translation: "Stay with me—forever and ever—Mmmph!"

Name: e3424c.nss
Japanese: 星空の下で、美雪は俺にキスをした。
Translation: She kisses me passionately beneath the starry sky.

Name: e3424c.nss
Japanese: 長い――とても長いキスで。
Translation: It lasts for what feels like an eternity...

Name: e3424c.nss
Japanese: ふたりの時間は、永遠に続くんじゃないかと思った。
Translation: An eternity between the two of us.

Name: e3424d.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、最も、思い入れを持つ数字。
Translation: The number Miyuki favors the most.

Name: e3424d.nss
Japanese: 一体、それは何だ？
Translation: What could it possibly be?

Name: e3424d.nss
Japanese: 俺は必死に記憶を辿る。
Translation: I desperately retrace my memories.

Name: e3424d.nss
Japanese: だが……記憶は、曖昧で……
Translation: ...Not that I have much to speak of...

Name: e3424d.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『心配不要』
Translation: "NO CAUSE FOR CONCERN."

Name: e3424d.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『美雪は、回数を記録』
Translation: "MIYUKI HAS RECORDED THIS NUMBER."

Name: e3424d.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『スマートフォンの、写真フォルダを閲覧』
Translation: "VIEW THE CONTENTS OF THE PHOTOS FOLDER ON HER SMARTPHONE."

Name: e3424d.nss
Japanese: 俺は促されるまま、スマフォの写真フォルダを開く。
Translation: As requested, I launch the Photos app.
KR: 나는 그 말에 따라 스마트폰 사진 폴더를 열었다.

Name: e3424e.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『確認完了？』
Translation: "HAVE [YOU] CONFIRMED IT?"

Name: e3424e.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『アオイのコールナンバー』
Translation: "HAVE [YOU] DETERMINED AOI'S CODE NUMBER?"

Name: e3424e.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『入力可能？』
Translation: "REQUESTING INPUT."

Name: e3424e.nss
Japanese: "入力できる","入力しない","もう一度説明を聞く"
Translation: "Put it in","Don't put it in","Review the instructions"
KR: "입력할 수 있다","입력하지 않는다","다시 한 번 설명을 듣는다"

Name: e3424f.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うん」
Translation: "Yep."

Name: e3424f.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「何回も――ここでキスしていいんだよ」
Translation: "We can kiss up here as many times as you want."

Name: e3424f.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ずっと……ずっと、永遠に……」
Translation: "Forever and ever... for all eternity..."

Name: e3424g.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ……あのさ、コレ」
Translation: "Hey, uh..."

Name: e3424g.nss
Japanese: 俺は、美雪のスマートフォンをポケットから取り出す。
Translation: I pull her phone from my pocket.

Name: e3424g.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「持ち出しちゃって、ゴメン。
　俺、自分でもなんだかよくわからないんだけど――」
Translation:
"Sorry for running off with this.
I'm honestly not sure what I was thinking."
KR: "가져가서 미안해. 나도 왜 그랬는지 잘 모르겠는데..."

Name: e3424g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いいの」
Translation: "That's okay."

Name: e3424g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「君がここに残ってくれたこと。
　それだけで、充分だから」
Translation:
"I'm just happy YOU decided to stay.
That's all I need."

Name: e3424g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「い、い、の」
Translation: "I. Said. It's. Fine."

Name: e3424g.nss
Japanese: 美雪の言葉は、有無を言わせない。
Translation: Sounds like I don't get a say in the matter.

Name: e3424g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「さ、私たちの家に帰りま――」
Translation: "Now then, let's go ho—"

Name: e3424g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「くしゅん！」
Translation: "ACHOO!"

Name: e3424g.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん？　アレルギーか？」
Translation: "Hmm? Is that your allergies acting up again?"

Name: e3424g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「違うわ。きっと、湯冷めしたのよ」
Translation: "No, it's probably because my hair's still wet."

Name: e3424g.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「でも、さっきまで猫が――あれ？」
Translation: "But I could've sworn there was a cat here... What the?"

Name: e3424g.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いなくなってる？」
Translation: "It's gone...?"

Name: e3424g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「寝ぼけてたんじゃない」
Translation: "Is your brain still asleep or what?"

Name: e3424g.nss
Japanese: ……なんだか納得がいかないが、確かにあの子猫が、自力でここから降りられるとは思えない。
Translation: I'm not entirely convinced, but... then again, it's not like the kitten could have left the roof on its own.
KR: ...왠지 납득이 가지 않지만, 분명 그런 새끼 고양이가 스스로 여기서 내려갈 수 있을 리가 없다.

Name: e3424g.nss
Japanese: 思い返してみれば、確かに普通の猫には見えなかった。
Translation: Thinking back, it definitely didn't seem like a normal cat, either.

Name: e3424g.nss
Japanese: まるで最初から、この世に存在しないような……
Translation: Almost... otherworldly...
KR: 마치 처음부터, 이 세상에 존재하지 않은 것처럼...

Name: e3424g.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「……なんか、変な日だな」
Translation: "...Man, today's been a weird day."

Name: e3424g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「きっと疲れたのよ」
Translation: "You must be tired."

Name: e3424g.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「さ、今日はもう家に帰って寝ましょう」
Translation: "Now, let's go home and get some sleep."

Name: e3424g.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「そうするか……」
Translation: "Yeah, I guess so..."

Name: e3424g.nss
Japanese: 俺は美雪に促されるがまま、夜の世界の中心を、後にすることにしたのだった……
Translation: And so, at Miyuki's urging, we leave the center of the universe...
KR: 나는 미유키의 권유에 따라 세계의 중심을 두고 떠나갔다.

Name: e3424h.nss
Japanese: 突然――何の前触れもなく、電話が切れた。
Translation: All of a sudden, the call cuts off.
KR: 갑자기 아무런 예고도 없이 전화가 끊어졌다.

Name: e3424h.nss
Japanese: 電池切れ……？
Translation: Did the battery die or something...?

Name: e3424h.nss
Japanese: 懸命に追いかけてきたのだろう。
Translation: Miyuki must have run all the way here.

Name: e3424h.nss
Japanese: 美雪は額に汗を掻きながら、俺へと駆け寄ると――
Translation: She's dripping sweat.
KR: 미유키는 이마에 땀을 흘리며 나에게로 달려와...

Name: e3424h.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一ッ！！」
Translation: "Shinichi!!!"

Name: e3424h.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「うおっ！！」
Translation: "Whoa!!!"

Name: e3424h.nss
Japanese: 凄まじい勢いで抱きつかれ、俺は屋上で押し倒されそうになる。
Translation: She rushes into my arms so fast, she nearly knocks me to the ground.
KR: 엄청난 기세로 달려들어서 자칫 옥상에서 떨어질 뻔했다.

Name: e3424h.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょ！　バカ！　あぶな――」
Translation: "Careful! Cool it, dummy!"

Name: e3424h.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「間に合った……」
Translation: "Thank god I made it..."

Name: e3424h.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もう……いなくなったかと思った……」
Translation: "I thought you might be gone by now..."

Name: e3424h.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese:
「お、おいちょっと。
　泣かなくても――んむっ！！」
Translation:
"Wh-Whoa there, hey now!
Don't cry—Mmmph?!"

Name: e3424h.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ん――んちゅっ、ん――んん――」
Translation: "Mmm—mmmph—mm—mmmm—!"

Name: e3424h.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「大好き――私――君のことが――
　んんっ、んちゅ――ん――ん――」
Translation:
"I love YOU—I really do—!
Mmmm—mmph—mm—mmm—!"

Name: e3424h.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「本当に――大好き――なんだよ――」
Translation: "I love YOU—so, so much—!"

Name: e3424h.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから――お願い――離さないで――」
Translation: "So please—I'm begging YOU—don't leave me—!"

Name: e3424h.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私と一緒に――ずっと――ずっと――んちゅっ」
Translation: "Stay with me—forever and ever—Mmmph!"

Name: e3424h.nss
Japanese: 星空の下で、美雪は俺にキスをした。
Translation: She kisses me passionately beneath the starry sky.

Name: e3424h.nss
Japanese: 長い――とても長いキスで。
Translation: It lasts for what feels like an eternity...

Name: e3424h.nss
Japanese: 俺は、どうしてひとりでこの屋上にやってきたのか、わからなくなってしまった。
Translation: ...and before long, I can't remember why I bothered coming up here in the first place.
KR: 나는 어째서 혼자 이 옥상에 왔는지 알 수 없게 되어버렸다.

Name: e3425.nss
Speaker: God
Translation: "ERROR."

Name: e3425.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『誤答？　再度の計算法説明も可能』
Translation: "RETRY OR REVIEW THE CALCULATION PROCEDURE."

Name: e3425.nss
Japanese: 美雪がいつ、やってくるかわからない。
Translation: There's no telling when Miyuki will show up.

Name: e3425.nss
Japanese: 急がなければ……
Translation: I need to hurry.

Name: e3425.nss
Japanese: "再入力する","説明を聞き直す","入力できない"
Translation: "Try another number","Review the instructions","Give up"

Name: e3431.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『……異変を確認』
Translation: "...ABNORMAL RESPONSE DETECTED."

Name: e3431.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese:
『入力番号はチートコード。
　全ＣＧ、全セックスシーンの解放が可能』
Translation:
"THE NUMBER YOU HAVE ENTERED IS A CHEAT CODE.
IT WILL UNLOCK ALL CGS AND ALL SEX SCENES."
KR: "입력 번호는 치트 코드. 모든 CG, 모든 x스신 해방 가능."

Name: e3431.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『代償として、物語は破棄される』
Translation: "IN EXCHANGE, THE MAIN STORYLINE WILL BE DISCARDED."

Name: e3431.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese:
『改変は不可逆。
　一度アップデートすれば、通常プレイは不可能』
Translation:
"THIS UPDATE IS IRREVERSIBLE.
ONCE COMPLETE, REGULAR PLAY WILL BE DISABLED."
KR:
"변경은 불가역.
한번 업데이트하면 일반 플레이는 불가능."

Name: e3431.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『警告。主体者が正常な体験を希望するなら、発信の中止を強く推奨』
Translation: "WARNING. SHOULD THE SUBJECT WISH TO EXPERIENCE THE WORLD AS INTENDED, IT IS STRONGLY ENCOURAGED TO CLOSE THE GAME IMMEDIATELY."
KR: "경고. 주체자가 정상적인 체험을 원한다면, 즉시 게임 종료할 것을 적극 권장."

Name: e3431.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『それでもなお、コンプリートを希望？』
Translation: "DO [YOU] STILL WISH TO PROCEED?"

Name: e3431.nss
Japanese: "チートコードで発信する","発信を中止する"
Translation: "Transmit the cheat code","Cancel transmission"

Name: e3432a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『再確認』
Translation: "RECONFIRMING."

Name: e3432a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『コンプリートを希望？』
Translation: "DO [YOU] TRULY WISH TO COMPLETE THE GAME?"

Name: e3432a.nss
Japanese: "コンプリートを希望する","コンプリートを希望しない"
Translation: "Complete the game","Never mind"

Name: e3432b.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『好判断』
Translation: "GOOD CHOICE."

Name: e3432b.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『異なる番号を再入力？』
Translation: "INPUT A DIFFERENT NUMBER?"

Name: e3432b.nss
Japanese: "再入力する","説明を聞き直す","入力できない"
Translation: "Try another number","Review the instructions","Give up"

Name: e3433a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『了解』
Translation: "UNDERSTOOD."

Name: e3433a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『アオイの感情を調査できないのは、不満』
Translation: "IT IS REGRETTABLE THAT WE CANNOT ANALYZE AOI'S EMOTIONAL ERRORS."
KR: "아오이의 감정을 조사 못 한 것은 불만."

Name: e3433a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『しかし、強制は不可能』
Translation: "BUT WE CANNOT FORCE [YOU]."

Name: e3433a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『主体者の選択は不可侵』
Translation: "THE SUBJECT'S CHOICE IS ABSOLUTE."

Name: e3433a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『――発信を』
Translation: "...BEGIN TRANSMISSION."

Name: e3433a.nss
Japanese: 神様が、受話器から告げるように――
Translation: With God's confirmation—

Name: e3433a.nss
Japanese: 俺は静かに、発信ボタンを押した。
Translation: —I press the Call button.

Name: e3433a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『強制アップデート開始』
Translation: "INITIATING FORCE UPDATE."

Name: e3433a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『１０』<Waittime=1000>
Translation: "TEN." <Waittime=1000>

Name: e3433a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『９』<Waittime=1000>
Translation: "NINE." <Waittime=1000>

Name: e3433a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『８』<Waittime=1000>
Translation: "EIGHT." <Waittime=1000>

Name: e3433a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『７』<Waittime=1000>
Translation: "SEVEN." <Waittime=1000>

Name: e3433a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『６』<Waittime=1000>
Translation: "SIX." <Waittime=1000>

Name: e3433a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『５』<Waittime=1000>
Translation: "FIVE." <Waittime=1000>

Name: e3433a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『４』<Waittime=1000>
Translation: "FOUR." <Waittime=1000>

Name: e3433a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『３』<Waittime=1000>
Translation: "THREE." <Waittime=1000>

Name: e3433a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『２』<Waittime=1000>
Translation: "TWO." <Waittime=1000>

Name: e3433a.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『１』<Waittime=1000>
Translation: "ONE." <Waittime=1000>

Name: e3433a.nss
Speaker: God
Translation: "ZERO."

Name: e3441.nss
Japanese: なんだか……不思議な夜だった。
Translation: Man... what a weird night it's been.

Name: e3441.nss
Japanese: 猫に連れられて行った屋上。
Translation: First a cat brings me up to the roof.

Name: e3441.nss
Japanese: 突然鳴り出した、美雪の電話。
Translation: Then Miyuki's phone starts ringing.

Name: e3441.nss
Japanese: 受話器の向こうから呼びかける声は、明らかに電波で、俺は全く内容を理解できない。
Translation: Then some crazy person on the other end of the line babbles some nonsense at me.
KR: 수화기 너머에서 부르는 목소리는 분명 4차원이고 나는 내용을 전혀 이해할 수 없었다.

Name: e3441.nss
Japanese: むしろ、アレが夢だと言われた方が……
Translation: I wouldn't be surprised if I dreamed the whole thing...

Name: e3441.nss
Japanese: いや……むしろこれが夢で……
Translation: No... It's almost like THIS is the dream...

Name: e3441.nss
Japanese: 夢が……現実……だったり……とか……
Translation: ...and my dreams... are reality... or something...

Name: e3441.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ、聞こえる？」
Translation: "Hey, can YOU hear me?"

Name: e3441.nss
Japanese: 隣で眠る美雪から、囁き声が聞こえる……
Translation: I can hear Miyuki whispering beside me in bed...
KR: 옆에서 자는 미유키의 속삭이는 소리가 들린다...

Name: e3441.nss
Japanese: これも、夢……か……？
Translation: Is this a dream, too...?

Name: e3441.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「気持ちは伝わったわ」
Translation: "I understand now how YOU feel."

Name: e3441.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君は、この世界に留まることを選んだ」
Translation: "YOU'VE chosen to stay here in this world."

Name: e3441.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私と一緒に、ずっと、この世界にいることを選んだ」
Translation: "To stay here in this world with me... forever."
KR: "나와 함께 계속, 이 세계에 있는 것을 선택했어."

Name: e3441.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「だから……このまま、終わりにしましょう」
Translation: "So... let's let things end here."

Name: e3441.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「エンディングのないまま、ゲームをやめて……」
Translation: "No final resolution to the route. Just quit the game..."

Name: e3441.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「幸せな、ふたりだけの世界を、永遠に……」
Translation: "And let our happy little world continue on for all eternity..."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『主体者は――』
Translation: "THE SUBJECT UTILIZED—"

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『ソフマップの特典を使用』
Translation: "—THE SOFMAP EXCLUSIVE BONUS."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『ウェディングシチュエーションへの嗜好を確認』
Translation: "WEDDING FETISH CONFIRMED."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『メディオ！の特典を使用』
Translation: "—THE MEDIO! EXCLUSIVE BONUS."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『とらのあなの特典を使用』
Translation: "—THE TORANOANA EXCLUSIVE BONUS."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『お風呂シチュエーションへの嗜好を確認』
Translation: "BATHTIME FETISH CONFIRMED."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『アニメイトの特典を使用』
Translation: "—THE ANIMATE EXCLUSIVE BONUS."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『Ｔｗｉｔｔｅｒを使用』
Translation: "—TWITTER."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『サウンドトラックを使用』
Translation: "—THE OFFICIAL SOUNDTRACK."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『小説を使用』
Translation: "—THE SPINOFF NOVEL."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『コミックを使用』
Translation: "—THE SPINOFF MANGA."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『ゲームのケースを使用』
Translation: "—THE JAPANESE PHYSICAL GAME CASE."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『チラシを使用』
Translation: "—THE JAPANESE PACKAGE INSERT."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『トレーダーの特典を使用』
Translation: "—THE TRADER EXCLUSIVE BONUS."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『水着シチュエーションへの嗜好を確認』
Translation: "SWIMSUIT FETISH CONFIRMED."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『げっちゅ屋の特典を使用』
Translation: "—THE GETCHU EXCLUSIVE BONUS."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『水着シチュエーションへの嗜好を確認』
Translation: "SWIMSUIT FETISH CONFIRMED."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『グッドウィルの特典を使用』
Translation: "—THE GOODWILL EXCLUSIVE BONUS."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『Ａｍａｚｏｎの特典を使用』
Translation: "—THE AMAZON EXCLUSIVE BONUS."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『メロンブックスの特典を使用』
Translation: "—THE MELONBOOKS EXCLUSIVE BONUS."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『お風呂シチュエーションへの嗜好を確認』
Translation: "BATHTIME FETISH CONFIRMED."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『シーガルの特典を使用』
Translation: "—THE SEAGULL EXCLUSIVE BONUS."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『宝島の特典を使用』
Translation: "—THE TAKARAJIMA EXCLUSIVE BONUS."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『コムロードの特典を使用』
Translation: "—THE COMROAD EXCLUSIVE BONUS."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『ムービーを使用』
Translation: "—THE JAPANESE TRAILER."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『Ｗｅｂサイトの隠しコードを使用』
Translation: "—THE HIDDEN CODE ON THE OFFICIAL JAPANESE WEBSITE."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『ニトロプラスストアの特典を使用』
Translation: "—THE NITROPLUS STORE EXCLUSIVE BONUS."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『ウェディングシチュエーションへの嗜好を確認』
Translation: "WEDDING FETISH CONFIRMED."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『ニトロプラスカードマスターズを使用』
Translation: "—THE NITROPLUS CARD MASTERS BOARD GAME."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『コミケグッズを使用』
Translation: "—THE EXCLUSIVE COMIKET MERCHANDISE."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『ビジュアルファンブックを使用』
Translation: "—THE VISUAL FANBOOK."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『ラムタラの特典を使用』
Translation: "—THE LAMMTARRA EXCLUSIVE BONUS."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『ジョイまっくすのカードを使用』
Translation: "—A CARD FROM JOY MAX."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『日頃のジョイへのご愛顧に感謝』
Translation: "THANK YOU FOR BEING PART OF OUR JOY."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『カウントダウンボイスを使用』
Translation: "—A COUNTDOWN VOICE CLIP."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『ジョイまっくすの名刺を使用』
Translation: "—A BUSINESS CARD FROM JOY MAX."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『日頃のジョイへのご愛顧に感謝』
Translation: "THANK YOU FOR BEING PART OF OUR JOY."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『ポストカードを使用』
Translation: "—A POSTCARD."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『テックジャイアンを使用』
Translation: "—AN ISSUE OF TECH GIAN."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『ダイイングメッセージを使用』
Translation: "—[DYING MESSAGE]."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『自動復帰プログラム、準備完了』
Translation: "AUTOMATIC RESTORATION PROGRAM INITIALIZED SUCCESSFULLY."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『再度の交信・記憶同期により、バグの原因究明が可能になると推測』
Translation: "WE SURMISE WE CAN INVESTIGATE THE BUGS UPON FURTHER CORRESPONDENCE AND SUBSEQUENT MEMORY SYNC."
KR: "재교신, 기억 동기에 의해 버그의 원인 규명이 가능할 것으로 추측."

Name: e3511.nss
Speaker: God
Japanese: 『プログラム起動を希望』
Translation: "PLEASE LAUNCH THE PROGRAM."

Name: e3511.nss
Japanese: その声に、促されるように――
Translation: At God's request—

Name: e3511.nss
Japanese: 俺は、発信ボタンに、指を触れた。
Translation: —I tap the Call button.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 想いが、願いが、空の彼方へ飛んでいく。
Translation: My desperate wish transmits far beyond the furthest reaches of the sky.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 空間に、穴が――
Translation: There's a tear in the fabric of space—

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: どこかともなく、生じ――
Translation: It opens out of nowhere—

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: やがて、侵食し――
Translation: —and begins to invade—

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 裏側から――
Translation: A faint signal—

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 微かな電波が――
Translation: —reaches out from beyond—

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 線が集まり――
Translation: The lines gather—

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: ラフが形作られ――
Translation: Sketches unfold—

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 色がつき――
Translation: The colors blossom—

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: セカイの――
Translation: The whole world—

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 真ん中で――
Translation: The center of the universe—

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: バグが、生まれる。
Translation: —has a new glitch.

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 声がする。
Translation: I hear a voice.

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop..."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "それは、とても懐かしい、声"
Translation: "A very familiar voice."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……るる……」
Translation: "Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop... boop boop..."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 目の前に。
Translation: She appears.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 現実の姿で。
Translation: Right in front of my eyes.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 彼女がいた。
Translation: And she's real.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: ……彼女？
Translation: ...Do I know her?

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 焦点の合わない瞳で、こちらを見つめている彼女。
Translation: She looks at me, eyes unfocused.
KR: 초점이 맞지 않는 눈으로 이쪽을 바라보고 있다.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: その表情に、色は見えず――
Translation: Her expression is colorless—

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "アオイは、本当に――"

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "俺を、憶えているのだろうか？"
Translation: "Does she even remember me?"

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "その疑問は――"
Translation: "But just then—"

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「……とどいた」
Translation: "...Aoi made it..."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ……の……ところに……」
Translation: "Made it... back... to Shinichi..."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ちゃんと……ちゃんと……」
Translation: "Aoi... actually did it..."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とど、いた……」
Translation: "Thank... God..."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 彼女の瞳から、零れる涙。
Translation: Tears fall from her eyes.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: ゆっくり側に近づいて、その指先が、俺に触れる。
Translation: She slowly walks up to me... reaches out... and touches me.
KR: 천천히 옆으로 다가와 그 손끝이 나에게 닿았다.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 全身に、びりっと、電気が走る。
Translation: A spark of electricity shoots through my body.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: なぜか、俺の唇が、彼女の名前を覚えている。
Translation: Why do I know her name?
KR: 어째서 내 입술이 그 이름을 기억하고 있는 거지?

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: なぜか、俺の瞳から、涙がこぼれ落ちる。
Translation: And why am I crying?

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: この涙は、一体――？
Translation: Why the hell am I crying...?

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、しってるの」
Translation: "Aoi knows..."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それは……うれしなみだ、なの」
Translation: "Those are happy tears."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 混線する。
Translation: I'm so confused.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: あるはずのない、記憶が、流れ込んでくる。
Translation:
All these memories are flooding back...
Memories I never used to have...

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "彼女の髪に見えるのは、ヘアピン"
Translation: "She's wearing a hairpin."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "彼女に贈った、プレゼント"
Translation: "It's the same one I gave her."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "間違いない"
Translation: "There's no mistaking it."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "彼女は、あの――"
Translation: "It's really her..."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "俺と結ばれた、アオイだ"
Translation: "The same Aoi I made love to on the roof that night."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一ッ！！」
Translation: "Shinichi!!!"

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "大きな音が、屋上に響く。"
Translation: "A loud BANG echoes across the roof."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "美雪は、アオイの姿を見つけ、絶句"
Translation: "Miyuki takes one look at Aoi and gapes."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "そのまま、動けない"
Translation: "She stands rooted to the spot."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "そんな友達へ、アオイは静かに声をかけた"
Translation: "Then Aoi calls out to her old friend."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ」
Translation: "Miyuki!"

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ただいまなの」
Translation: "Aoi's home."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "一拍の間"
Translation: "There's a pause."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……おかえり」
Translation: "...Welcome back."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "美雪は、やっと、絞り出すように言った"
Translation: "The words leave her lips in a small, strangled voice."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "無言のまま、向き合うふたり"
Translation: "They stare at each other in silence."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "物音はひとつもない"
Translation: "No one makes a sound."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "ただ、時間だけが、流れていく"
Translation: "Time passes."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ」
Translation: "Miyuki..."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「もとのセカイに、もどるの」
Translation: "Let's change the world back. Back to normal."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "No."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私、この記憶、なくせない」
Translation: "I refuse to let go of my memories."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だめなの」
Translation: "This is wrong."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このせかいは、まちがい」
Translation: "Everything about this world is wrong."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……あなたが言うの？」
Translation: "...As if you're one to talk."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私に、あの呪いをかけた、貴方が！？」
Translation: "You're the one who put this curse on me, remember?!"

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ふざけないでッ！！」
Translation: "Don't make me laugh!"

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ほんきなの」
Translation: "This isn't a joke."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "今にも掴みかからんばかりの美雪"
Translation: "Miyuki looks ready to fight."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "だが、アオイは逃げなかった"
Translation: "But Aoi isn't backing down."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、まちがったの」
Translation: "Aoi made a mistake."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それで、ミユキをくるしめたの」
Translation: "And that mistake hurt you."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だからもう――くるしんで、ほしくない」
Translation: "But Aoi doesn't want you to suffer anymore."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私が苦しんでる！？　冗談じゃない！」
Translation: "I'm suffering, am I?! Give me a break!"

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私は、心一と一緒で、幸せ――」
Translation: "I'm HAPPY here, just me and Shinichi—"

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うそなの」
Translation: "Liar."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキだって、しってるの」
Translation: "You know the truth."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このセカイが、まちがいだって」
Translation: "The world shouldn't be like this."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そのキオクが、あしかせになってるって」
Translation: "And those memories are chaining you down."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "美雪は沈黙して答えない"
Translation: "Miyuki falls silent."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ゼッコウされても、しかたないの」
Translation: "If you want to cut ties with me, fine."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でもミユキは、アオイのシンユウだって、おもってるの」
Translation: "But to me, you're my best friend."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから、いうの」
Translation: "That's why Aoi has to say this."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ」
Translation: "Miyuki..."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「もとのセカイにもどるの」
Translation: "We need to change the world back."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイがカイヘンするまえの、もとのセカイに」
Translation: "Back to the way it was before Aoi ever patched it."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それが、ミユキのためなの」
Translation: "It's for your own good."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "静かな、静かな、宣告に――"
Translation: "She speaks in a quiet voice."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "美雪はただ、沈黙するだけだった"
Translation: "Miyuki doesn't respond."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイには、わかるの」
Translation: "Aoi gets it."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイも、まえは、ゲームのデータをもってたから」
Translation: "Aoi used to have access to the game data, too."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「もとのセカイにもどれば、セーブもロードもきかないの」
Translation: "And Aoi knows, once we go back to the original world, we can't save or load anymore."
KR: "원래 세계로 돌아가면 세이브도 로드도 안 돼."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いちどきりのこいなの」
Translation: "We only get one shot at love."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「しっぱいしたら、おわりなの」
Translation: "One mistake and it's all over."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それが、ミユキは、こわいの」
Translation: "And you're afraid of that."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキは、こわがってるの」
Translation: "You're afraid, Miyuki."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "美雪が、涙で、振り向いた"
Translation: "Miyuki looks back, eyes full of tears."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Yeah, and?!"

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「怖いわよ。怖いに、決まってるでしょ！！」
Translation: "Of course I'm scared! Why wouldn't I be?!"

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私は、信じたい！」
Translation: "Obviously I want to believe!"

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君が、私を、好きになってくれるって！」
Translation: "I want to believe that YOU'LL fall in love with me!"

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そう……信じたいの！　信じられるはずなの！」
Translation: "Surely I can believe in that much, at least!"
KR: "그래... 믿고 싶어! 믿을 수 있을 거야!"

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「信じたら……
　このセカイの、君との記憶をなくしても、いい」
Translation:
"And if I do believe it...
then it doesn't matter if I lose the memories we shared here."
KR: "믿으면... 이 세계의 당신과의 기억을 없애도 좋아."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「元のセカイに……
　戻れる、はずなんだよ……でも……」
Translation: "So... it's not like we CAN'T go back... but..."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "美雪は、戻れないでいる"
Translation: "Miyuki can't let go."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "その理由は、きっと――"
Translation: "And it's probably because..."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "俺が、美雪を裏切ったから"
Translation: "I betrayed her."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "一度誓った永遠の愛に"
Translation: "I vowed my eternal love to her."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "背く選択肢を、選んだから"
Translation: "And then I made choices that ran contrary to that vow."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ……お願い」
Translation: "Please... just tell me..."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君の、本当の気持ちを、聞かせて」
Translation: "Tell me how YOU really feel."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "美雪が、俺に迫る"
Translation: "Miyuki rounds on me."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "彼女をここまで追い詰めたのは、自分"
Translation: "I'm the one who drove her to the breaking point."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "アオイに頼んでセカイを変えた――"
Translation: "I asked Aoi to change the world for my own sake."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "俺には、責任がある"
Translation: "So the fault lies with me."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "それはわかっている"
Translation: "I know that."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だいじょうぶなの」
Translation: "It's okay."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: アオイは、強張った笑みを浮かべて、言った。
Translation: Aoi smiles stiffly.

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、もう、きえるの」
Translation: "Aoi is going to disappear anyway."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "今、呼び戻されたばかりなのに――"
Translation: "Wait... But I only just brought her back!"

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "アオイが、消える？"
Translation: "Now she's going to disappear again?"

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイはカミサマのアバター」
Translation: "Aoi is an avatar of God."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セカイをロールバックするには」
Translation: "In order to roll back the universe..."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カミサマとツウシンして、キオクを、ドウキするの」
Translation: "Aoi has to transmit to God and sync my memories."

Name: e3512.nss
Translation: "Sync...?"

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "嫌な予感がする"
Translation: "I don't like the sound of that."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "彼女の恋愛感情が、バグ"
Translation: "Her love towards me is a glitch."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "だから、その理由を知りたい"
Translation: "And it ought to be investigated."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "そう、カミサマは言っていた。でも――"
Translation: "That's what God was saying, at least... but..."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "彼女の感情は、同期を逃れたから生まれた"
Translation: "Her feelings came about as a result of remaining unsynced."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "もし、世界を変えるため――"
Translation: "If we really do reset the world..."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "アオイが、カミサマと記憶を同期したら？"
Translation: "What will happen when Aoi syncs her memories with God?"

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そうなの」
Translation: "It's exactly what you think."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「キオクをドウキすると、バグ、きえるの」
Translation: "When my memories are synced, the bugs will disappear."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイのこのカンジョウは」
Translation: "And my feelings..."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ヒロインの、たくさんのキオクのひとつになって」
Translation: "They'll merge with all the other heroines' memories..."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うもれるの」
Translation: "...and be lost."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "そんなの――"
Translation: "No—"

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いいの」
Translation: "It's okay."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、きえるために、このセカイにもどったの」
Translation: "Aoi came back to this world prepared to disappear again."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ほおをながれるこのなみだも、すぐに、かわくの」
Translation: "These tears on my cheeks will dry up."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それが、バツなの」
Translation: "That's my punishment."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンユウの、ミユキを、きずつけた、バツ」
Translation: "It's what I get for hurting my best friend Miyuki."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "アオイの瞳から涙は止まらない"
Translation: "The tears keep flowing down her cheeks."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "嬉しい涙なわけが、ない"
Translation: "No way in hell these are happy tears."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "彼女の感情が、バグ？"
Translation: "Her emotions are a glitch?"

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "感情を消すのが、正しいこと？"
Translation: "And erasing them is supposedly the correct thing to do?"

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "そんなわけが――"
Translation: "That can't be right!"

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おねがい、して、いい？」
Translation: "Will you... do me a favor?"

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「もし、アオイがこのセカイからきえても」
Translation: "Even if Aoi disappears from this world..."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「もし、このセカイがニセモノで、ただのゲームでも」
Translation: "Even if this world is fake, or just a game..."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「もし、ベツのセカイにうまれかわって、ちがうヒロインになっても」
Translation: "Even if Aoi's reborn in a different world as a different girl..."
KR: "만약 다른 세계에서 다시 태어나 다른 히로인이 되어도..."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「キミと、アオイは、むすばれた」
Translation: "It doesn't change the fact that we were together."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そのジジツがのこれば、それでいいの」
Translation: "As long as that fact remains, that's all Aoi needs."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それだけは、リアルなの」
Translation: "That's all it takes to make it real."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それだけで、アオイは、むくわれるの」
Translation: "And that's enough reward for me."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから――」

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイを……スキって、いって」
Translation: "Just... tell me you love me..."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "アオイが、俺に懇願する"
Translation: "Aoi begs me desperately."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "彼女はこのセカイを元に戻す"
Translation: "She's going to set the world right again."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "親友の美雪を、救うために"
Translation: "All to save her best friend Miyuki."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "だからアオイは、消えなければならない"
Translation: "And in so doing, Aoi has to disappear."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "そんな彼女の最後の願い"
Translation: "This is her final request."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "それはきっと、叶うべきで――"
Translation: "And I ought to grant it—"

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "美雪と――"
Translation: "Miyuki..."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "アオイ――"
Translation: "...and Aoi..."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "ふたりが、ただ、こちらを見つめる"
Translation: "...are both looking at me wordlessly."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: ……さあ。
Translation: ...Welp.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: なすべきことは、わかっているだろう？
Translation: Looks like YOU know what YOU have to do.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "わかっている"
Translation: "Yeah."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 全ての元凶は、君だ。
Translation: YOU'RE the root of all this.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "知っている"
Translation: "I know."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 美雪と結ばれるために、セカイを変えた。
Translation: YOU changed the world in order to be with Miyuki.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "そうだ"
Translation: "Yeah."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: アオイと結ばれるために、美雪を裏切った。
Translation: And YOU betrayed Miyuki in order to be with Aoi.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "その通りだ"
Translation: "Yeah, I did."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: これ以上、彼女たちは裏切れない。
Translation: YOU can't betray them again.
KR: 더 이상 두 사람을 배신할 수 없다.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "わかってる"
Translation: "I know."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 本当に、わかっているのか？
Translation: Do YOU? Are YOU sure?

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 君には、俺の声が聞こえるだろう？
Translation: YOU can hear me, right?

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: ずっと一緒に過ごしてきた、主人公の俺の、心の声が。
Translation: It's me, the protagonist—the one who's been by YOUR side through it all.
KR: 계속 함께 지내온 주인공인 나의 마음의 목소리가.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "主人公の――声？"
Translation: "Is that you, Shinichi?"

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: ああ、そうだ。
Translation: Yeah.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 俺もただ、操られっぱなしなわけじゃない。
Translation: I'm not just a puppet, YOU know.
KR: 나도 그저 조종당하기만 한 건 아니야.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 混線した電波が、記憶を垣間見せてくれた。
Translation: All the crossed wires from the transmission have let me see some of the old memories.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: カミサマが、主人公の俺に教えてくれたんだ。
Translation: And God spoke to me.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 今まで君が、何をしてきたか。
Translation: They told me everything YOU'VE done.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: どうして君は、ここまで、最後の選択肢に悩むのか。
Translation: And why YOU'RE hesitating to make this final choice.
KR: 어째서 당신은 마지막까지 선택지를 고민하는 거지.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: セーブなんて、できない。
Translation: YOU can't save.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: やり直しなんて、きかない。
Translation: YOU can't try again.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: それは、美雪やアオイに対する裏切りだ。
Translation: After all, that would be tantamount to betraying them.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 君は、この選択肢を、一度しか選べない。
Translation: So YOU can only make this choice once.
KR: 당신은 이 선택지를 한 번밖에 선택할 수 없어.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 美雪と、アオイ、どちらかの結末しか見られない。
Translation: YOU can only reach one ending, with either Miyuki or Aoi.
KR: 미유키와 아오이. 둘 중 하나의 결말밖에 볼 수 없어.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: そういう風に、スクリプトが組んである。
Translation: That's how this game is scripted.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: そういう風に、このセカイはできている。
Translation: That's how this world is coded.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: セーブデータを退避させる？
Translation: YOU could always make backup copies of your save data.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: ゲームを再インストールする？
Translation: Or reinstall the game.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: どんな手を使ってでも、両方のエンディングを見る？
Translation: YOU could use any number of methods to see both endings.
KR: 무슨 수를 써서도 양쪽 엔딩을 볼 거야?

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: いいだろう。
Translation: Go ahead.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: それは君の自由だ。
Translation: YOU'RE free to do as YOU wish.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: ただの主人公の俺には、止めることができない。
Translation: I'm just the protagonist. I can't stop YOU.
KR: 그저 주인공인 나는 막을 수 없어.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: カミサマだって、阻止できやしないだろう。
Translation: Not even God can stop YOU, I imagine.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: でも、これだけは言っておく。
Translation: But let me just say this.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: それは、美雪に対する裏切りだ。
Translation: If YOU do that, YOU'RE betraying Miyuki.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: それは、アオイに対する冒涜だ。
Translation: If YOU do that, YOU'RE desecrating Aoi.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 君が、本当に彼女たちを想うなら――
Translation: If YOU truly care for them—

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 君が、正しい結末を迎えるなら――
Translation: If YOU want to see them live happily ever after—

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 選択肢を選べるのは、一度きりだ。
Translation: Then YOU can only make this choice once.
KR: 선택지를 고를 수 있는 것은 한 번뿐이다.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "一度きり――"
Translation: "Once."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "その言葉を、心の中で繰り返して"
Translation: "The word reverberates in my chest."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "指が、少しずつ、汗ばむ"
Translation: "My hands start to sweat."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "瞬きが、多くなってしまう"
Translation: "I keep blinking nervously."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "自分の呼吸が、うるさいくらいに聞こえる"
Translation: "I'm breathing loudly... too loudly."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「お願い――」
Translation: "Please..."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "美雪が俺に詰め寄る"
Translation: "Miyuki moves in closer."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "彼女の愛を縛ったのは、自分"
Translation: "I'm the one who bound her fate to mine."

Name: e3512.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「おねがいなの……」
Translation: "Please..."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "アオイが俺に縋り来る"
Translation: "Aoi clings to me."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: "彼女に愛を教えたのは、自分"
Translation: "I'm the one who taught her how to love."

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: さあ、選ぶんだ。
Translation: Now YOU must choose.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 君と彼女と彼女の恋。
Translation: This love story is between YOU and HER and HER.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: その結末を導く、最後の選択。
Translation: And this is YOUR final choice.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 一度きりの、選択。
Translation: YOU'LL only get one chance to make it.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 君が、選ぶのは――
Translation: Who will YOU choose?

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 君が愛を、告げるのは――
Translation: Who do YOU love?

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: ★注意★
Translation: ★WARNING★

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: これからデバッグ用の動きの説明を行います。
Translation: The following is the debug guide.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 決して本番用の演出やテキストではないので気をつけて下さい。
Translation: Please note, the text or effects found here are not intended for the finished product.
KR: 결코 실전용 연줄이나 텍스트가 아니니 주의하십시오.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 美雪（画面右方向）にマウスをよせるとこう動きます。
Translation: Move your cursor near Miyuki (right side of the screen) and the screen shifts like so.
KR: 미유키(화면 오른쪽)에 마우스를 대면 이렇게 움직입니다.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 美雪を選択しました。
Translation: You have chosen Miyuki.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: アオイ（画面左方向）にマウスをよせるとこう動きます。
Translation: Move your cursor near Aoi (left side of the screen) and the screen shifts like so.
KR: 아오이(화면 왼쪽)에 마우스를 대면 이렇게 움직입니다.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: アオイを選択しました。
Translation: You have chosen Aoi.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 中心点に戻りました。
Translation: You have returned to the middle.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 原則としてどちらも選んでいない状態は無いと思います。
Translation: There is no option to choose neither.
KR: 원칙적으로 어느 쪽도 선택하지 않는 경우는 없다고 생각합니다.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: マウス操作でリアルタイムに画面が動いてくれるとよいですが、そこは篠原さんの調整にお任せします。
Translation: Hopefully the screen will move in real time with the cursor, but we'll leave that to Shinohara-san.
KR: 마우스 조작에 따라 실시간으로 화면이 움직여주면 좋겠지만, 그건 시노하라 씨의 조정에 맡기겠습니다.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 以上、説明を終了します。
Translation: This concludes the debug guide.

Name: e3512.nss
Japanese: 選択をどうぞ・・・
Translation: Now make your choice...

Name: e3521a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「本当に……」
Translation: "Are you sure..."

Name: e3521a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私で、いいの……？」
Translation: "...I'm the one you want?"

Name: e3521a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「こんな、私を……愛してくれるの？」
Translation: "Can you still love me... after everything I did?"

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "愛している"
Translation: "I can, and I do."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "信じてくれるか？"
Translation: "Will you trust me?"

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "証明できるものはないけど"
Translation: "I know I can't prove it..."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "ふたりを結ぶのは選択肢だけだけど"
Translation: "I know all we have are these choices..."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "ただのクリックだけど"
Translation: "Just the click of a mouse..."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "その向こうにある、俺の気持ちを"
Translation: "But my feelings behind the screen are the real deal."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "信じてくれるか？"
Translation: "Will you believe me?"

Name: e3521a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「信じる」
Translation: "I will."

Name: e3521a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「貴方が、この選択肢を選んでくれた」
Translation: "YOU chose me."

Name: e3521a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私との物語の結末を知りたいって、願ってくれた」
Translation: "So clearly YOU wanted to see how my story ends."

Name: e3521a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それが……愛の証明、だよ」
Translation: "To me... that's all the proof I need."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "元の世界に戻っても、俺たちは結ばれる"
Translation: "Even after the world resets, we'll still be together."
KR: "원래 세계로 돌아가도 우리는 맺어질 수 있어"

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "そうだよな？"
Translation: "Won't we?"

Name: e3521a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うん」
Translation: "Yeah."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "一緒に、戻ろう"
Translation: "Let's go back."

Name: e3521a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うん、だって――私は、知ってるから」
Translation: "Yeah... Besides, I know full well..."

Name: e3521a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「君が私を愛してくれてるって」
Translation: "...just how much YOU love me."

Name: e3521a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「永遠の愛が、そこにはあるって」
Translation: "And I know our love is eternal."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "……そうだ"
Translation: "...Yeah."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "それが、運命なのだ"
Translation: "It's fate."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "それじゃあ――美雪"
Translation: "...Let's go, Miyuki."

Name: e3521a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うん」
Translation: "Okay."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "俺たちは、振り返る"
Translation: "We turn back..."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "そこにもう彼女はいない"
Translation: "...but she's already gone."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "彼女が誰だったか"
Translation: "Who was she?"

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "それすらも、わからないことになる"
Translation: "Now we'll never know."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "言いようのない寂しさが襲う"
Translation: "I'm overcome with an indescribable sense of loss."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "すぐに、寂しかったことさえ忘れるだろう"
Translation: "But it'll probably fade soon."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "でも、これが、俺の選んだ結末"
Translation: "Still, this is the path I chose."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "ふさわしい罰なのだ"
Translation: "It's my just desserts."

Name: e3521a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「正しいことを、しましょう」
Translation: "Let's make this right."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "地面に落ちたスマートフォン"
Translation: "Her phone lies forgotten on the ground."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "美雪は画面を確認する"
Translation: "She checks the screen."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "セカイをロールバックするために"
Translation: "Then she taps the Call button..."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "発信ボタンに手をかける"
Translation: "...and starts the rollback."

Name: e3521a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ねえ、お願い」
Translation: "Would you do me a favor?"

Name: e3521a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今度はちゃんと――私にキスしてね」
Translation: "Will you kiss me? Like, actually kiss me this time?"

Name: e3521a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あの時……すごく、すごく恥ずかしかったんだから」
Translation: "Last time around... God, that was so mortifying..."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "わかってる"
Translation: "Yeah, I know."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "今度はきっと、キスできる"
Translation: "This time I'm sure I can make it happen."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "ふたりは、永遠の愛を誓ったのだから"
Translation: "After all, we've pledged our eternal love to each other."

Name: e3521a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...Right."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "胸いっぱいの希望と"
Translation: "With our hearts full of hope..."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "溢れ出るほどの愛と"
Translation: "...and overflowing love..."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "消えかけた寂しさを、胸に――"
Translation: "...and the last lingering traces of remorse..."

Name: e3521a.nss
Japanese: "俺たちは、発信した"
Translation: "...we send the signal."

Name: e3521b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチ……」
Translation: "Shinichi..."

Name: e3521b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ありがとう……なの……」
Translation: "Thank you..."

Name: e3521b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese:
「これでもう、アオイ……
　おもいのこすことは、なにも……」
Translation:
"Now Aoi has...
no regrets..."

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "ないわけが、ない"
Translation: "Don't pretend you don't have any."

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "たくさん、やりたいことがあった"
Translation: "There's so much we still haven't done!"

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "たくさん、愛し合いたかった"
Translation: "I wanted to spend more time with you..."

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "はっきり約束だってしたのに"
Translation: "We promised, didn't we?"

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "まだ、デートだって、してない――"
Translation: "And we still haven't gone on any dates—!"

Name: e3521b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「すればいいじゃない」
Translation: "YOU'LL get another chance."

Name: e3521b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「よく考えなさい」
Translation: "Use YOUR brain."

Name: e3521b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あなたたちは、これからだって、いつでも、一緒にいられるはずよ」
Translation: "YOU two can see each other as much as YOU want from now on."
KR: "너희는 이제부터 언제든 함께 있을 수 있어."

Name: e3521b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……私とは、違って」
Translation: "...Unlike me."

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "それはどういう……"
Translation: "What do you mean...?"

Name: e3521b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「バカ！」
Translation: "Shut up, nimrod!"

Name: e3521b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それを恋敵に教えられるほど、お人好しじゃないわ！」
Translation: "If YOU think I'm nice enough to help my own romantic rival, think again!"
KR: "그걸 라이벌한테 가르쳐줄 정도로 착한 사람 아니거든!"

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "美雪はそう言って、背を向けた"
Translation: "Miyuki turns away."

Name: e3521b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキ！」
Translation: "Miyuki!"

Name: e3521b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...What do you want?"

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "声は震えている"
Translation: "Her voice shakes."

Name: e3521b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイと、ミユキは、シンユウ、だよね？」
Translation: "We'll always be best friends... won't we?"

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "彼女は背中を向けたまま――"
Translation: "She keeps her back turned as she speaks."

Name: e3521b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「親友だから、幸せを、祈ってあげてるんでしょ！」
Translation: "Why else would I want you to be happy?!"

Name: e3521b.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「勝手に幸せに暮らしなさい！！」
Translation: "Now go enjoy your stupid happily ever after!!!"

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "そう言って、美雪は屋上から消えた"
Translation: "With that, Miyuki walks off."

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "どんな言葉も、言葉にならない"
Translation: "I have no words."

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "美雪の想いに、報えない俺が――"
Translation: "I couldn't reciprocate her feelings for me..."

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "彼女から、エールをもらったのだ"
Translation: "...and yet here she is, rooting for me anyway."

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "俺は、脳味噌を振り絞り、考える"
Translation: "Desperately, I rack my brain."

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "美雪は、いい加減な嘘をつかない"
Translation: "I know Miyuki wouldn't lie to me about something like that."

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "なにか方法があるはずだ"
Translation: "Which means there's got to be a way..."

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "俺とアオイが、一緒にいる方法が"
Translation: "A way for me and Aoi to be together."

Name: e3521b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そろそろ、じかんなの」
Translation: "It's almost time."

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "待ってくれ！　もう少しだけ――"
Translation: "Wait! Just give me a second!"

Name: e3521b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だめなの。もう、デンチがきれそうなの」
Translation: "No can do. My battery's about to die."
KR: "안 돼. 이제 전지가 떨어질 것 같은 거야."

Name: e3521b.nss
Translation: "No!"

Name: e3521b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「これで、さいご」
Translation: "This is the end."

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "そうじゃない――"
Translation: "No it's not!"

Name: e3521b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「くるしいけど……かなしいけど……」
Translation: "It hurts... It breaks my heart... but..."

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "こんな、別れ方――"
Translation: "This can't be goodbye!"

Name: e3521b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「しあわせ、だったの」
Translation: "Every moment Aoi spent with YOU was pure joy."

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "幸せなはずが、ない！！"
Translation: "It can't end like this!!!"

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "俺の叫びが、セカイに響いて――"
Translation: "My scream echoes across the world—"

Name: e3521b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「バイバイなの」
Translation: "Bye-bye."

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "アオイが、発信ボタンを押す"
Translation: "Aoi presses the Call button."

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "俺は咄嗟に、手を伸ばす"
Translation: "In a flash, I reach out—"

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "指先が――"
Translation: "—and my fingers—"

Name: e3521b.nss
Japanese: "重なる"
Translation: "—brush hers—"

Name: e3522a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どこに、行ってたの……？」
Translation: "Where did you go...?"

Name: e3522a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「もしかして……」
Translation: "Do you..."

Name: e3522a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私を選んだこと、後悔してる？」
Translation: "Do you regret choosing me?"

Name: e3522a.nss
Japanese: "そんなことは、ない"
Translation: "Of course not."

Name: e3522a.nss
Japanese: "あれだけ悩んで、選んだんだ"
Translation: "It wasn't a choice I made lightly."

Name: e3522a.nss
Japanese: "俺の気持ちは、変わらない"
Translation: "And my feelings will never change."

Name: e3522b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どこに、いってたの……？」
Translation: "Where did you go...?"

Name: e3522b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「もしかして……」
Translation: "Do you..."

Name: e3522b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「コウカイ、してるの？」
Translation: "Do you regret choosing me?"

Name: e3522b.nss
Japanese: "そんなことは、ない"
Translation: "Of course not."

Name: e3522b.nss
Japanese: "あれだけ悩んで、選んだんだ"
Translation: "It wasn't a choice I made lightly."

Name: e3522b.nss
Japanese: "俺の気持ちは、変わらない"
Translation: "And my feelings will never change."

Name: f0112.nss
Translation: Hmmm...

Name: f0112.nss
Japanese: 冒頭シーンをやり直してみたが、特に変化はないようだ。
Translation: I replayed the opening scenes, but nothing's changed...
KR: 시작 장면을 다시 봐도 별다른 차이점은 없는 것 같다.

Name: f0112.nss
Japanese: 『君と彼女と彼女の恋。』を、これで見事に完全攻略したというわけだ。
Translation: Looks like I've played [YOU and ME and HER] to 100% completion.
KR: 이로써 '당신과 그녀와 그녀의 사랑'을 보기 좋게 공략했단 소리다.

Name: f0112.nss
Japanese: まあ、どのキャラクターにも特に愛着は湧かなかったし、こんなものだろう。
Translation: Meh... Oh well. Not like I was particularly attached to any of the characters.
KR: 뭐, 특별히 애착이 가는 캐릭터가 있는 것도 아니고...

Name: f0112.nss
Japanese: 俺は全てのＣＧとＨシーンが埋まっているのを確認するために、早速タイトル画面に戻るのだった……
Translation: Better go back to the title screen to make sure I've collected all the CGs and sex scenes...
KR: 나는 CG를 모두 모았는지 확인하기 위해 메인 화면으로 돌아갔다...

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: 俺が、電話の通話履歴を確認しようとすると――
Translation: Before I can check the call history—

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Shinichi...?"

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あ……美雪」
Translation: "Oh... Hey, Miyuki."

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どうして、ここに……？」
Translation: "What are you doing here...?"

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、待ってたって言うか――」
Translation: "Oh, just waiting, I guess—"

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「待ってた――！？」
Translation: "Waiting?!"

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ああ。雄た――」
Translation: "Yeah, for Yuu—"

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「じゃあ心一が、呼び出してくれたんだ……」
Translation: "So you're the one who invited me up here!"

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「え、ええと――」
Translation: "Uhhhh..."

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一！　あの！」
Translation: "Shinichi! Listen!"

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私も――同じ、気持ちなの」
Translation: "I... I feel the same way."

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「本当は、ずっと――」
Translation: "The truth is, I..."

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ずっと、待ってたの」
Translation: "I've been waiting all this time..."

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: 幼馴染みで、あんなに仲の良かった俺と美雪。
Translation: Miyuki and I go way back. As kids, we were really close.
KR: 어릴 적엔 미유키랑 사이가 그렇게 좋았는데.

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: ふたりはいつから、疎遠になったのだろう。
Translation: So when did we start to drift apart?

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: 俺はいつから、彼女を避けるようになったのだろう。
Translation: When did I start keeping my distance?
KR: 나는 언제부터 거리를 두기 시작한 걸까.

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一が、ここに、呼んでくれたから」
Translation: "Thank you for calling me up here."

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「嬉しかった」
Translation: "I'm so happy..."

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Uh, Miyuki...?"

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私も――心一が、好きだよ」
Translation: "Shinichi... I'm in love with you, too."

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: 美雪の唇が、近づく。
Translation: Her lips draw near.

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: 夕陽に眩しい、彼女の表情。
Translation: The red rays of the sunset light up her face.

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: 俺は、まるで吸い込まれるように。
Translation: And I find myself pulled in.

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: 視線が、全く離せない――
Translation: I can't tear my eyes away—

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: そのまま――
Translation: And then—

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: そのまま？
Translation: ...And then?

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ちょ、ちょっと待ってくれ！」
Translation: "W-Wait! Hold on a minute!"

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: ――屋上でキスすると、ふたりは永遠に結ばれる。
Translation: —If two people share a kiss on the roof, they'll spend the rest of their lives together.
KR: 옥상에서 키스하면 두 사람은 영원히 맺어진다.

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: その伝説を信じ、告白のために屋上へと呼び出す生徒は今も多い。
Translation: At our school, this legend is so popular, students invite each other up here all the time to confess their love.
KR: 그 전설을 믿고 고백하기 위해 옥상에 오는 학생은 지금도 많다.

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: きっと、雄太郎もその伝説を信じたひとりで。
Translation: And Yuutarou must be a believer, too.
KR: 분명 유우타로도 그 전설을 믿는 사람 중 한 명.

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: だから、美雪を呼び出したのだろう。
Translation: That would explain why he summoned Miyuki up here.

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お前、勘違いしてるぞ」
Translation: "Look... You've got the wrong idea."

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「呼び出したのは、俺じゃない」
Translation: "I'm not the one who invited you up here."

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「雄太郎だ」
Translation: "It was Yuutarou."

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "What...?"

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: 美雪は一瞬、素が出るが――
Translation: For a moment, her facade slips—

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: すぐに、我を取り戻す。
Translation: —but then she catches herself.

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ……うん。そうなんだ」
Translation: "Oh... Right. Of course."

Name: f1111.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「そうよね、そうだと思った。ごめんなさい」
Translation: "Yeah, I figured as much. I'm sorry."

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: 彼女は学園のアイドル。
Translation: Miyuki is the queen bee of the school.

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: 対する俺はモブ中のモブ。
Translation: And I'm the ultimate nobody.

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: 釣り合うはずがない。
Translation: She's a million miles out of my league.

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: だから、俺たちが近づけるはずがない。
Translation: We belong to different worlds.

Name: f1111.nss
Japanese: 友達にだって、なる資格はないのだ。
Translation: I'm not even worthy of breathing her air.

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「それじゃ、心一はここでなにを――」
Translation: "In that case, what exactly were you doing up here?"

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「いや、実はちょうどそこでスマフォを――」
Translation: "Well, actually, I was just messing around with this phone I—"

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「あれ？」
Translation: "...Wait, what the?"

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どうしたの？」
Translation: "What's the matter?"

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: さっきまで握っていたはずのスマートフォン。
Translation: I know I just had it...

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: それが、いつの間にか消えていた。
Translation: Where did it go?

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「落とした……？」
Translation: "Did I drop it...?"

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: ぐるりと辺りを見回す。
Translation: I scan the roof.

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ないわね」
Translation: "I don't see it."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「だよな」
Translation: "Yeahhh..."

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 屋上の隅には錆びた机があるが、それ以外に視界を遮るようなものはなにもない。
Translation: The roof is completely empty, save for a pile of rusty desks in one corner.
KR: 옥상 한구석에 녹슨 책상이 있지만, 그 외에 시야를 가릴 만한 것은 아무것도 없다.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: どこかに落としたらすぐに見つかるはず――
Translation: If I'd dropped it, it should be extremely easy to find—

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「ん？」{WaitAddText();}
Translation: "Hmm?" {WaitAddText();}

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Hmm?"

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Huh?"

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 俺と美雪の声がハモる。
Translation: Miyuki and I look up in unison.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: ポケットに手を伸ばし、携帯を取り出すと――
Translation: I reach into my pocket and pull out my cell phone.

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「メール？」
Translation: "An email?"

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 件名なし、本文なしのメールだった。
Translation: No subject line, no body text...

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 奇妙なことに、差出人の名前すらない。
Translation: ...and no sender, strangely enough.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: スパムメールかと思ったが、画像が１枚添付してある。
Translation: At first it seems like just a spam message, but then I notice a photo attached.
KR: 스팸메일인 줄 알았는데, 사진이 한 장 첨부되어 있었다.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 試しに開いてみると――
Translation: Curiously, I open it—

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "What the..."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺たちが映ってる……？」

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……みたいね」
Translation: "...Sure looks like us."

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 美雪もまた、自分の携帯の画面を覗き込んで呟いた。
Translation: Miyuki peers down at her phone, too.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: どうやら、同じメールが届いたらしい。
Translation: Evidently she got the same email I did.

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「左のは、誰だ？」
Translation: "Who's that on the left there?"

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「わかんないけど……」
Translation: "No idea..."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「楽しそう」
Translation: "We seem happy, though."

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 写真の俺たちは、まるで親友のようで――
Translation: In the photo, we look like we're the best of friends...
KR: 사진 속 우리들은 마치 친구 같아서...

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 見ているだけで、なんだか、とても――
Translation: The more I look at it, the more I feel so...

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Miyuki?"

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「う……ううん。
　なんでもない、なんでもないけど……」
Translation:
"Huh? ...Oh, it's nothing.
Really, it's nothing..."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なんだか……すごく、すごく……」
Translation: "For some reason, it's just... really..."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「懐かしい感じがして」
Translation: "...nostalgic, I guess."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「前は、心一と、一緒に……こんな感じで……」
Translation: "It reminds me of... how we used to be, you and I..."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「自然に、笑えたなって、そう思ったら……！」
Translation: "Then I think about how happy we were, and...!"

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪」
Translation: "Miyuki."

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 俺はそっと、身体を寄せた。
Translation: I gently pull her close.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 美雪は、耐えきれず、俺に倒れ込んだ。
Translation: She collapses against my chest.
KR: 미유키는 견디지 못하고 나를 향해 쓰러졌다.

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ごめん……ごめんね、心一」
Translation: "I'm sorry... I'm sorry, Shinichi..."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なんでだか……わかんないけど……」
Translation: "I swear, I don't know why I'm crying..."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「悲しくもないのに……急に、涙が……！」
Translation: "I'm not even sad, but... I can't stop myself...!"

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「寂しい涙……じゃないよな」
Translation: "They must not be sad tears, then."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うん」
Translation: "Yeah..."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「心一と一緒にいられて……」
Translation: "I'm happy I got the chance to spend time with you..."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「嬉しい涙……だね」
Translation: "So these must be... happy tears."

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 美雪の肩をそっと抱いて、俺は思う。
Translation: I gingerly put my arms around her.
KR: 미유키의 어깨를 살짝 감싸 안고 나는 생각했다.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: どれだけ優等生のフリをしても。
Translation: No matter how much she acts like the perfect student...

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: どれだけ演技を覚えても。
Translation: No matter what sort of persona she puts on...

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 彼女は変わっていなかった。
Translation: Deep down, she hasn't changed a bit.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 今も、あの頃の彼女のままなのだ。
Translation: She's still the same girl she was back then.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: そう思った途端、迷いが消えた。
Translation: The realization wipes away my last lingering doubts.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 俺も、あの頃のように、彼女の側にいられる。
Translation: And I think to myself...
KR: 나도 그때처럼 미유키의 곁에 있어줄 수 있다.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 素直な気持ちを、素直に伝えられる。
Translation: Maybe we CAN go back to the way we used to be.
KR: 솔직한 마음을 솔직하게 전할 수 있다.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: そう、思った。
Translation: Maybe I ought to tell her how I really feel.

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪」
Translation: "Miyuki..."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「聞いて……くれるかな？」
Translation: "Will you... hear me out?"

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ご、ごめんなさいっ！」
Translation: "I... I'm sorry!"

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「ちょっと、ちょっと待って！
　私、こんな顔で……」
Translation:
"Just... I need a minute!
I need to pull myself together..."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「今、落ち着く、落ち着くから……！」
Translation: "I'm calm... I'm calm...!"

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 流れ落ちる涙を拭い、鼓動の早い心臓を落ち着かせるように胸に手を当て――
Translation: Miyuki wipes away her tears, then puts a hand to her chest like she's willing her racing heartbeat to settle.
KR: 흘러내리는 눈물을 닦고 빠르게 뛰는 심장을 진정시키려 가슴에 손을 얹은 채...

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 美雪は懸命に、平静を取り戻そうとする。
Translation: I can tell she's doing her best to regain her composure.

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "Breathe in... breathe out... Haah... haah..."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「焦んなくていいから」
Translation: "No rush. Take your time."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あは……う、うん。ありがとう」
Translation: "Haha... R-Right! Thanks."

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 舞台でも、こんな緊張している姿は見られない。
Translation: I've never seen her this nervous before—not even on stage.
KR: 무대에서도 이렇게 긴장하는 모습은 본 적이 없다.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: いや――舞台じゃなく、演技じゃないから、か。
Translation: Then again... I guess it's because this isn't a performance.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: これが、本当の彼女。
Translation: This is the real her.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 俺にしか見えない、幼馴染みの美雪の素顔だ。
Translation: The her I was friends with all those years ago. The her only I can see.
KR: 나 밖에 볼 수 없는 소꿉친구 미유키의 본래 모습이다.

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「は……はい」
Translation: "O-Okay."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「準備、できた？」
Translation: "Ready?"

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「……うん、いいよ」
Translation: "...Yeah. Go for it."

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 緊張に震える瞳で、美雪は俺を見つめる。
Translation: She looks at me, her gaze shifting nervously.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 彼女の瞳に映る俺も、きっと、似たような表情だ。
Translation: Then I see my reflection in her eyes and realize I look every bit as nervous as she does.
KR: 그 눈동자에 비치는 내 모습도 비슷한 표정이었다.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 大きく、大きく、息をつく。
Translation: I take a deep, deep breath...

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 踏み出そうか、踏み出すまいか――
Translation: All these years I've kept asking myself, do I go for it?

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 迷い続けていた俺を最後の一押ししたもの。
Translation: And now, finally, something has given me the push I need.
KR: 헤매고 있던 나를 마지막으로 밀어준 것.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: カミサマとか、運命とかに、感謝しながら。
Translation: Thank you, God... or fate, or whatever you are.

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「お願いします！」
Translation: "Sone Miyuki!"

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「俺と、つきあってください！！」
Translation: "Please be my girlfriend!"

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 深々と、頭を下げて――
Translation: I bow my head—

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 下げて、下げて、下げて――
Translation: —and I wait, and wait, and wait—

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: ……返答が、ない？
Translation: —but there's no response.

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "Miyuki...?"

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「あ……あはっ」
Translation: "Ha... haha..."

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 美雪はやっぱり、泣いていた。
Translation: Sure enough, she's crying.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 嬉し涙が、零れてしまっていた。
Translation: Happy tears.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: なんだかやけに、眩しい笑顔だ。
Translation: And in this moment, she looks so perfect.

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なんだか、すごく、回り道しちゃったなって」
Translation: "Feels like this has been a long time coming, huh?"

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ずっと、こんなに、近くにいたのにね」
Translation: "I mean, the answer was right there all this time."
