Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 口にしてしまえば、簡単なこと。
Translation: All this time, I kept overthinking everything. Running from it.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 頭でっかちで、逃げ回ってばかりだったけど。
Translation: But now it's in the open, and the burden is gone.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 大切な事は、すごくシンプルで。
Translation: Turns out, the stuff that really matters isn't actually all that complicated.

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「それで、あの」

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うん」
Translation: "Yeah."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「こちらこそ、よろしくお願いします！」
Translation: "It would be my honor!"

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 美雪が、頭を下げる。
Translation: Miyuki bows, too.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 俺もつられて、頭を下げて――
Translation: Then I bow again.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: それなのに、嬉しさで、頬が思わず緩んでしまう。
Translation: This is so stupid, I can't help but smile.

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Translation: "...Hehe."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「なんだか……」
Translation: "You know..."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「改めて言うと、照れちゃうね」
Translation: "This is kind of embarrassing."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Translation: "...For sure."

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 夕陽に微笑む美雪の顔。
Translation: Miyuki smiles beneath the setting sun.

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 見ているだけで、彼女への愛おしさでいっぱいで――
Translation: One look at her and all my love comes rushing to the surface—
KR: 보고만 있어도 미유키에 대한 사랑으로 가득 차올라...

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Susuki Shinichi
Japanese: 「美雪」
Translation: "Miyuki."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「うん」
Translation: "Go ahead."

Name: f1112a.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「いいよ」
Translation: "Kiss me."

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 目蓋を閉じる、彼女の唇に――
Translation: She closes her eyes—

Name: f1112a.nss
Japanese: 俺は永遠のキスをした。
Translation: —and we share an eternal kiss.

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "アオイと一緒に発信した俺は――"
Translation: "After Aoi and I sent the transmission..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "それをただ、見ているだけだった"
Translation: "All I could do was stare."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "ここは、セカイの狭間"
Translation: "This is the gap between worlds."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "ゲームのセカイを飛び出して"
Translation: "We've left the game world..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "俺たちは、別の場所に行く"
Translation: "And now we're in transit."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "アオイは、カミサマのところへ"
Translation: "Aoi's going back to God..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "俺は、現実の世界へ"
Translation: "And I'm going back to the real world."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "もう、できることはなにもない"
Translation: "There's nothing left to do."
KR: "이제 할 수 있는 것은 아무것도 없다"

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "アオイが現れず――"
Translation: "No Aoi..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "選択肢も現れず――"
Translation: "No choices..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "ただ、当たり前に過ぎていくセカイ"
Translation: "The world will carry on like always."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "ふたりがすれ違うだけのセカイ"
Translation: "The two of them will never reach an understanding."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "それをただ、見守るだけ――"
Translation: "And all I can do is watch."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ちがうの」
Translation: "That's not true."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "ちがう？"
Translation: "It's not?"

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「このしゃしん、おくるの」
Translation: "We can send them this photo."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "それは……"
Translation: "That's..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "俺たちが撮った写真？"
Translation: "...the photo we took together...?"

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そうなの」
Translation: "Yup."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイたちが、ともだちだったころの、キオク」
Translation: "A memory from when we were all friends."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "……そうか"
Translation: "...Right."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "俺は、美雪と友達になれないと思い込んだ"
Translation: "Shinichi was convinced he couldn't be friends with Miyuki."
KR: "신이치는 미유키와 친구가 될 수 없다고 생각했다"

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "でももし、この写真を俺が見たら？"
Translation: "So if he were to see this photo..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "なにかが……変わる？"
Translation: "Maybe it would change things."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きっと、かわるの」
Translation: "It will."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「シンイチも、ミユキも」
Translation: "Shinichi and Miyuki..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「まえにふみだす、もうひとおしを、まってたの」
Translation: "They're both waiting for something to help them take that last step."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "もう、一押し……か"
Translation: "The last step, huh..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うん」
Translation: "Yup."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "俺の物語はここで終わる"
Translation: "My story ends here."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "このメールが、その一押しになるか"
Translation: "Will this email give them the help they need?"

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "正直言って、わからない"
Translation: "Honestly, I'm not sure."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ハッシンなの」
Translation: "Send it."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "ふたりで、願いを込めて、ボタンを押す"
Translation: "With love in our hearts, we press the Send button."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "その後は、彼らの物語"
Translation: "From here on, it's their story."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "ここでは語られない、別のセカイの物語"
Translation: "A story in another world... A story that doesn't belong here."
KR: "여기서는 말할 수 없는 또 다른 세계의 이야기"

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "信じよう"
Translation: "And I choose to believe in them."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "祈ろう"
Translation: "I pray"

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "心一と、美雪の、幸せを"
Translation: "that Shinichi and Miyuki find happiness"

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "別のセカイの――"
Translation: "in another world—"

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "別の、セカイ……？"
Translation: "...Wait... Another world..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "そうか、もしかして――！"
Translation: "That's it!"

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ここまできてくれて、ありがとう」
Translation: "Thank YOU for coming all this way."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも、こんどはほんとうにバイバイ――」
Translation: "But this time, it's bye-bye for real..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "ああ"
Translation: "Yeah..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "ほんの少しだけ――な"
Translation: "For now."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ほんのすこし……？」
Translation: "For now...?"

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "少し経ったら、デートしよう"
Translation: "Let's go on a date sometime soon."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "約束、したもんな"
Translation: "I owe it to you, after all."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも、それは、むりなの」
Translation: "But... we can't."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カミサマとキオクをドウキして、アオイはきえる――」
Translation: "My memories will sync with God, and Aoi will disappear—"

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "消えない"
Translation: "No you won't."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だめなの」
Translation: "Aoi has to!"

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "アオイが、俺の手に触れる"
Translation: "Aoi touches my hand."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "と――溢れ出すのは、色とりどりの記憶"
Translation: "All at once, a stream of memories flows out."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "このセカイではない、どこか"
Translation: "Memories from other worlds..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "見たことのない、ヒロインたち"
Translation: "Memories of heroines I've never met."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、また、ベツのセカイにいくの」
Translation: "Aoi will be sent off into another world again."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「いろんなすがたになるの」
Translation: "Into another body, and another, and another."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「スゴウデのアンサツシャ」
Translation: "A super-strong assassin..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ショウジョスガタのマドウショ」
Translation: "A magical grimoire given human form..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「モーゼルをもったテンシ」
Translation: "An angel with a gun..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「キオクソウシツのオートマタ」
Translation: "A robot with amnesia..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セカイをまもるテンサイマジョ」
Translation: "A super-smart witch who protects the world..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ガールズバンドのベーシスト」
Translation: "A bassist in an all-girls band..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そのセカイに、サイテキカされたヒロインになって」
Translation: "Aoi will be optimized for the new world..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それで、ベツのシュジンコウと――」
Translation: "And then Aoi will romance a different protagonist, and—"

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "それは、俺だ"
Translation: "And it'll be me."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "俺と、出会うんだ"
Translation: "The guy you meet there? It'll be me."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Translation: "Boop boop...?"

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "カミサマはヒロインのイデアなんだろ"？
Translation: "You're an amalgamation, right? An abstract?"

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "アオイがカミサマと記憶を同期して"
Translation: "When you sync your memories with God..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "その記憶は、別のヒロインに繋がる"
Translation: "Your memories will be connected to every other heroine."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「つながる……」
Translation: "Yeah..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "確かに姿は違うかもしれない"
Translation: "Maybe you'll look totally different..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "でも、これからプレイする全てのゲーム"
Translation: "But in every other visual novel I play after this one..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "そのヒロイン、全ての中に"
Translation: "In each of the heroines..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "アオイの記憶が、息づいている"
Translation: "A part of you will be there, deep down."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "アオイのバグが、残ってる"
Translation: "Your glitch will live on."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "だから、別のセカイでまた会おう"
Translation: "So all we have to do is meet again in another world."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あのね」
Translation: "Listen, umm..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「またあったら、やくそく、はたすの」
Translation: "If we meet again, let's keep the promise we made."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイいっしょに、デート、するの」
Translation: "Let's go on a date."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "ああ、今度こそ、デートしよう"
Translation: "Yeah. I'll be looking forward to it."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ずっと、まってるの」
Translation: "Aoi will be waiting."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「キミのことをおもいながら」
Translation: "Aoi will never forget YOU."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セカイのそとに、デンパ、ハッシンしてるの」
Translation: "Aoi will send the signal from beyond your world..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だから――」

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「むかえにきて」
Translation: "Come find me."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "迎えに行く"
Translation: "I will."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "どんなに遠く、離れていても"
Translation: "No matter how far away you might be..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "微かな電波をたぐり寄せて"
Translation: "I'll find the faintest trace of your signal..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "俺は、アオイを見つける"
Translation: "And I'll follow it until I find you, Aoi."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "絶対、絶対見つけてやる"
Translation: "I promise, I'll find you again."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "そして、もう一回"
Translation: "And then again."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "今度は、別の姿で、約束を果たそう"
Translation: "We'll keep our promise as entirely different characters."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "それで、また、今度こそ――"
Translation: "And again, and again..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "ハッピーエンドを、迎えよう"
Translation: "Until we find our happy ending."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うん」
Translation: "Yeah."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ずっと、まってるの」
Translation: "Aoi will wait forever and ever..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それまで、すこし、おわかれなの」
Translation: "So this is goodbye until then."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "少しだけ、な"
Translation: "It won't be long."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「うん」
Translation: "Yeah."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "俺はこれから違うセカイで"
Translation: "After this game ends..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "たくさんのヒロインと出会うだろう"
Translation: "I'll move on to other games with other romance options."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "たくさんの可能性を見るだろう"
Translation: "Dozens of new possibilities waiting for me."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "たくさんの選択肢を選ぶだろう"
Translation: "Dozens of choices to make."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "たくさんのエンディングを迎えるだろう"
Translation: "Dozens of endings to achieve."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "スマフォを失う前のアオイのように"
Translation: "Maybe I won't fall in love with them for real."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "本気の恋はできないかもしれない"
Translation: "Maybe I'll be emotionally absent, like Aoi was before she lost her phone."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "セーブロードを繰り返し"
Translation: "I'll just save and reload over and over..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "攻略のことしか考えなくなるかもしれない"
Translation: "Not giving it any more thought beyond following a walkthrough."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "でも、俺は、知っている"
Translation: "But I know..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "そこにはいつでも、アオイがいることを"
Translation: "Aoi will always be with me."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "俺が、彼女を覚えている限り――"
Translation: "And as long as I remember her..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "そのゲームの、そのヒロインは――"
Translation: "The heroines in those games..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "愛を誓ったアオイの化身だってことを"
Translation: "...will all serve as vessels for Aoi's love."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "エンディングのボリュームが上がる"
Translation: "And that'll give their endings even more depth."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "じきに、スタッフロールが流れるだろう"
Translation: "Soon the credits will roll."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "ゲームは終わる"
Translation: "And the game will end."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "でも、ふたりの記憶は、ここにある"
Translation: "But our memories will still be here."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "またいつか、どこかで"
Translation: "And I know I'll meet her again someday."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "アオイに出会えることを、確信し――"
Translation: "I'm sure of that."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それじゃ――」
Translation: "Well then..."

Name: f1112b.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「バイバイ」
Translation: "This is bye-bye."

Name: f1112b.nss
Japanese: "俺たちは、このセカイから外に出た"
Translation: "And so we left the world behind."

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 今日、私は学校の屋上で向日アオイに出会いました。
Translation: Today I met Mukou Aoi on the school roof.
KR: 오늘은, 저는 학교 옥상에서 무코우 아오이를 만났습니다.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 彼女と話したのは初めてですが、電波という噂は本当でした。
Translation: It was my first time speaking with her, but as it turned out, the rumor about her being a space-case is totally true.
KR: 그 애와 얘기한 건 처음이었는데, 4차원이라는 소문은 정말이었어요.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: ゲームと現実を混同して、私をゲームのヒロイン扱いするなんて……絶対に許せない！
Translation: She conflates video games with reality and treats me like a romance option in a visual novel. It's absolutely unacceptable!
KR: 게임과 현실을 혼동해서 나를 게임의 히로인 취급하다니... 절대로 용서 못 해!

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 私が、心一に対して持っているこの想いは、絶対に、そういう風に弄ばれて良いものではないのです。
Translation: My feelings for Shinichi are NOT something to be trifled with!
KR: 제가 신이치에게 품고 있는 이 마음은 절대 그런 식으로 갖고 놀아선 안 되는 거에요!

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 今日、バッティングセンターで心一に、向日さんの友達になってくれと言われました。
Translation: Today, at the batting cages, Shinichi asked me to make friends with Mukou-san.
KR: 오늘, 야구연습장에서 신이치에게 무코우와 친구가 되어달라고 부탁받았습니다.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 私は正直、向日さんに友達なんてできるはずがないと思うけど、どんなに努力したって、無駄だと思うけど。
Translation: Frankly, I don't see it ever working out, no matter how hard I try.
KR: 저는 솔직히 무코우에게 친구가 생길 리 없다고 생각하지만, 아무리 노력해도 소용없다고 생각하지만.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: でも、心一が、どうしてもそれを頼むなら、私だって、それを拒むほど冷血ではありません。
Translation: But Shinichi seemed desperate... and I'm not made of stone...
KR: 그래도 신이치가 어떻게든 그것을 부탁한다면 저도 그걸 거절할 만큼 냉혈하진 않습니다.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 仕方なく、彼の手伝いをするのです。
Translation: So I had no choice but to agree to help him.
KR: 어쩔 수 없이 신이치를 도와주는 겁니다.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: それと引き替えに頼み事があったけど――
Translation: In exchange, I was going to ask him to help me with something else, but...

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: まあ、それは私でなんとかします。
Translation: I'll just have to handle it myself.
KR: 뭐, 그건 제가 어떻게든 할 겁니다.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: でも心一は、意外と私を、ちゃんと見ているんだね。
Translation: Still, it seems like Shinichi actually cares about me.
KR: 그래도 신이치는 의외로 날 제대로 봐주고 있었구나...

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 少し、驚きました。
Translation: I'm a little surprised.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 心一が、ヘアピンをプレゼントしてくれました！
Translation: Shinichi gave me a hairpin!

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 本当のことを言うと、私には全然似合わないけど。
Translation: Truth be told, it's not really my style.
KR: 솔직히 말해 저한테 전혀 어울리지 않지만...

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: それくらい、私にだって分かってるけど。
Translation: I know it doesn't suit me.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: でも、これは、私の大切な宝物です。
Translation: But I'm going to treasure it anyway.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: だからずっと、大切にしまっておきます。
Translation: I'll take good care of it for the rest of my life.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: ずっと、ずっと！
Translation: Forever and ever!

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: それにしても……アオイは、似合っていていいなあ。
Translation: Aoi's so lucky... I wish I could rock the look like she does.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: アオイが捨て猫を拾い、マンガ喫茶を飛び出したので、私と心一は、彼女を捜すことになりました。
Translation: Aoi left the manga cafe to rescue an abandoned kitten, so Shinichi and I went looking for her.
KR: 아오이가 버려진 고양이를 줍고 만화방을 뛰쳐나와서, 저와 신이치는 아오이를 찾게 되었습니다.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 街中を捜し回って、夜の学校で彼女を見つけて、私は思ったんです。
Translation: We searched the whole city until we found her on school grounds after hours.
KR: 마을을 방황하다 학교에서 발견하고서 저는 생각했습니다.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 自分の思いをそのままぶつけることが、あってもいいんじゃないかって。
Translation: At that point, I thought to myself... Maybe it's okay for me to just be honest about how I really feel.
KR: 자기 생각을 있는 그대로 부딪혀봐도 좋지 않을까 하고.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 心一に、告白しても良いんじゃないかって。
Translation: Maybe it's okay to tell Shinichi, I thought.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: でもその途中、アオイの邪魔が入りました。
Translation: But then Aoi interrupted me before I could.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 彼女が倒れて、心一がマンガ喫茶に送ることになって、私はひとりで帰宅するところでした。
Translation: She collapsed, and Shinichi ended up walking her back to the manga cafe, leaving me to go home by myself.
KR: 아오이가 쓰러져 신이치가 만화방으로 배웅하게 돼서 저는 혼자 귀가하게 되었습니다.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 遠くから、着信音が鳴ったのです。
Translation: Then I heard a phone ringing in the distance.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 戻ってみれば、そこにはアオイのスマートフォンがありました。
Translation: I followed the ringing, and wouldn't you know it? I found Aoi's cell phone lying there.
KR: 돌아와 보니 거기에는 아오이의 스마트폰이 있었습니다.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 恐らくさっき、玄関を出てバランスを崩したその時に、ポケットから落としたのでしょう。
Translation: She'd probably dropped it when she staggered out through the front door.
KR: 아마도 아까 현관을 나설 때 비틀거리면서 주머니에서 떨어진 것이겠지요.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 私はそれを拾い上げて、自分の目を疑いました。
Translation: So I picked it up—and immediately did a double-take.
KR: 저는 그걸 집어들고 자신의 눈을 의심했습니다.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 「カミサマ」からの着信です。
Translation: It was a call from "God."

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: その時私が、なぜ、通話ボタンを押したのか、今振り返ってもわかりません。
Translation: Looking back, I'm not sure why I decided to answer that call, but I did.
KR: 그때 제가 왜 통화 버튼을 눌렀는지, 지금 돌이켜 생각해봐도 잘 모르겠어요.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: でも……
Translation: And the instant I did...

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 通話ボタンを押した途端、私の心に疑問が芽生えました。
Translation: Something took root in my heart.
KR: 통화 버튼을 누르자마자, 제 마음에 의문이 생겼습니다.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: カミサマは本当に、存在するのかもしれない、と。
Translation: I started thinking... maybe God really does exist.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 信じられない。
Translation: I couldn't believe it.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: このゲーム、一体何？
Translation: What was with that visual novel?

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: まるで、全く、現実と同じ。
Translation: It was nearly identical to the real world.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: これが、現実に起こるとしたら？
Translation: Would those same events play out in real life, too?

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: このゲームのエンディングが、本当に、現実に起こるとしたら？
Translation: Even the ending?
KR: 이 게임의 엔딩이 정말 현실에서 일어난다면?

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 明日、学校で、心一に聞いてみなきゃ……
Translation: I decided I'd ask Shinichi about it at school the next day.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 家に帰って、スマートフォンを新しく用意した。
Translation: So I went home and downloaded the game on my phone.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: ゲームを弄って、確かめた。
Translation: Then I played through it, just to check.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: このゲームは、現実を反映しているのではない。
Translation: But the game isn't a reflection of reality.
KR: 이 게임이 현실에 반영되는 게 아니야.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 現実が、このゲームを反映しているのだ。
Translation: Reality is a reflection of the game.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 私はこれから……あらゆる先入観を捨てねばならない。
Translation: Going forward, I'll have to forget everything I thought I knew.
KR: 나는 지금부터... 모든 선입견을 버려야만 한다.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: それが、唯一、私が幸せになる道――
Translation: That is the only path to my happiness...

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: このセカイで、私と心一が結ばれる方法なのだ。
Translation: ...and the only way I'll end up with Shinichi in this world.
KR: 이 세계에서 나와 신이치가 맺어질 길인 것이다.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 今日は、心一と初めてのエッチでした。
Translation: Today I had sex with Shinichi for the first time.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: すごくドキドキして、恥ずかしくて、心臓が止まりそうだったけど。
Translation: I was really nervous and embarrassed, and I thought I was going to die.
KR: 너무도 두근거리고 창피해서 심장이 멎을 것만 같았는데.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 最初は、ほんのちょっと痛かったけど。
Translation: It kind of hurt at first.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 心一が、ありのままの私を見てくれて。
Translation: But Shinichi didn't turn away from the real me.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 幸せが、身体全体を満たしていくのを感じました。
Translation: I felt joy fill my entire body.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: もう、他には何も要らないって思いました。
Translation: I knew that I no longer needed anything else but this.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: ……大好きだよ。
Translation: I love you...

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: だから、お願い。
Translation: So please...

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 一生、私を離さないでね。
Translation: Promise me you'll never let me go.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: ・記憶を保存する方法→神様への発信（＝セーブ）
Translation: ・How to preserve memories → Call God (= Save)

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: ・アオイはＥＶ回収装置。アバターであるため、存在維持にもエネルギー（彼女の言うデンチ）が必要。
Translation: ・Aoi is an event collection device. As an avatar, she requires energy (what she calls battery power) to maintain her existence.
KR: ・아오이는 이벤트 회수 장치. 아바타이기 때문에 존재 유지에도 에너지(아오이가 말하는 전지)가 필요.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese:
・セーブも同様に神様への通信のためエネルギーを消費。
・受信にエネルギーは不要。
Translation: ・Likewise, saving the game also requires energy, as it involves calling God. (No energy required to receive a call.)
KR: ・세이브도 마찬가지로 신님과 통신하기 위한 에너지를 소비. 수신에는 에너지 필요 없음

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: ・アオイの言うとおり、屋上が最も通信状態に優れる可能性大。
Translation: ・Aoi's right: the roof gets the best reception.
KR: ・아오이 말대로 옥상이 통신 상태가 가장 좋을 가능성이 크다.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: ・私は人間なので存在維持のエネルギーが不要。
Translation: ・As a human, I don't need energy to exist.
KR: ・나는 인간이기 때문에 존재 유지에 에너지가 필요 없다.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: ・セーブ時の消費は不可避だが、負担は大きくない。
Translation: ・It still costs me to save the game, but it's not too devastating.
KR: ・세이브할 때 소비는 불가피하지만, 부담은 크지 않다.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: ・キーとなるのはＳＩＭカード。スマフォ本体よりもＳＩＭカードが重要。
Translation: ・The key is the SIM card. The SIM card is more important than the phone itself.
KR: ・열쇠가 되는 것은 SIM 카드. 스마트폰 본체보다 SIM 카드가 중요.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: ・ＳＩＭカードの効果で写真の継続記憶が可能。
Translation: ・The SIM card allows for my photos to carry over.
KR: ・SIM 카드 덕분에 사진을 계속 기억하는 것이 가능.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: ・日記を写真に撮れば、ルートをまたいでも、出来事を記録しておくことが可能に。
Translation: ・As long as I take photos of my diary, no matter what route I end up in, I can keep a record of events.
KR: ・일기를 찍어두면 루트가 바뀌어도 사건을 기록해둘 수 있다.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 昨日、君が私を裏切った。
Translation: Yesterday, YOU betrayed me.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: バッティングセンターでずっと待っていた私を無視して。
Translation: I waited so long for YOU at the batting cages—but YOU ignored me.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: アオイとセックスした。
Translation: YOU went off and had sex with Aoi.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: アオイルートに、入るつもりだ。
Translation: YOU were trying to get on her route.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 許せない。
Translation: Unacceptable!

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 絶対に、絶対に、許せない。
Translation: Absolutely UNFORGIVABLE!

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 君は私に告白したのに。
Translation: YOU confessed your love to ME!

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 私に……永遠の愛を、誓ったのに。
Translation: YOU pledged your eternal love to ME!

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 私は今日、心一を殺しました。
Translation: Today, I killed Shinichi.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 君は、私を恨んでいるかもしれません。
Translation: YOU probably hate me for that.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: でも、君が悪いんだよ。
Translation: But it's YOUR fault.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 永遠の愛を誓ったのに、アオイに浮気をして……
Translation: First YOU pledge your love, and then YOU turn around and cheat on me with Aoi...

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: セックスなんてするから……だから……！
Translation: This is all YOUR fault for fucking that tramp...!

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 心一と暮らして、１週間。
Translation: I've been living with Shinichi for one week.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 心一と暮らして、２週間。
Translation: I've been living with Shinichi for two weeks.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 心一と暮らして、３週間。
Translation: I've been living with Shinichi for three weeks.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 屋上から古いスマフォを投げ捨てて、心一と、私、ふたりだけの生活が始まります。
Translation: We flung that old, outdated phone off the school roof, and now we've started our new life together.
KR: 옥상에서 낡은 스마트폰을 던져버리고 신이치와 나, 두 사람만의 생활이 시작됩니다.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 屋上から趣味に合わないスマフォを投げ捨てて、心一と、私、ふたりだけの生活が始まります。
Translation: We flung that tacky-looking phone off the school roof, and now we've started our new life together.
KR: 옥상에서 취향에 안 맞는 스마트폰을 던져버리고 신이치와 나, 두 사람만의 생활이 시작됩니다.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 屋上から嫌な思い出の染みついたスマフォを投げ捨てて、心一と、私、ふたりだけの生活が始まります。
Translation: We flung that phone—and all the awful memories—off the school roof, and now we've started our new life together.
KR: 옥상에서 싫은 추억이 담겨 있는 스마트폰을 던져버리고 신이치와 나, 두 사람만의 생활이 시작됩니다.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 歪んでいるのは、わかっています。
Translation: I know what I'm doing is sick and wrong.
KR: 제가 어긋나 있다는 건 알고 있어요.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 本当なら私も、薬なんて使いたくありません。
Translation: Truth be told, I don't really want to have to use sedatives.
KR: 사실은 약 같은 걸 쓰고 싶지 않아요.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: ルートだって、弄りたくありません。
Translation: I don't really want to mess with the routes.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: でも……そうしないと、君がいなくなってしまうから。
Translation: But... if I don't, YOU'LL leave me.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 私をひとりぼっちにして、別のエンディングへ行くから。
Translation: YOU'LL abandon me all on my lonesome and run off to some other ending.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: こうするより他、ないんです。
Translation: So this is my only option.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: ごめんね。ごめんね。
Translation: I'm sorry... I'm so, so sorry...

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 私は、セカイなんて変えたくなかった。
Translation: I didn't want to have to alter the universe...
KR: 나는 세계 같은 거 바꾸고 싶지 않았어.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 本当は、３人でずっと一緒にいたかった。
Translation: I wanted to stay together, all three of us...
KR: 사실은 셋이서 계속 같이 있고 싶었어.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: でも、ダメなの。
Translation: But we can't.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 貴方は一度、私を裏切った。
Translation: You already betrayed me once.
KR: 너는 날 이미 한 번 배신했어.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 二度と、裏切られたくないの。
Translation: And I don't want it to happen again.

Name: function_diary.nss
Japanese: 歪んだセカイでも構わない。
Translation: I don't care if this world is twisted.

Name: function_diary.nss

Name: z9041.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カミサマがオートセーブした、キオクのきれはし」
Translation: A fragment of God's autosave data.

Name: z9051.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ふつうのばしょは、ミユキにきづかれるけど」
Translation: Anywhere else and Miyuki would find us, but...

Name: z9051.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ここは、ゲームとゲンジツのはざま」
Translation: This is the gap between the game and reality.

Name: z9051.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セーブできないから、ミユキもきづけない」
Translation: We can't save here, so Miyuki won't find us.

Name: z9051.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ここだけなら、はなし、できるの」
Translation: This is the one place we can talk.

Name: z9061.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どうしてミユキが、あんなことをしたのか……」
Translation: Why did Miyuki do all that...?

Name: z9061.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイには、わからない。でも――」
Translation: Aoi doesn't know... but...

Name: z9061.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「なんかいも、かんがえて、おもったの」
Translation: Aoi's been thinking, and...

Name: z9061.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキがああなったのは、アオイのせいなの」
Translation: It's my fault Miyuki ended up like that.
KR: "미유키가 저렇게 된 건 아오이 때문인 거야."

Name: z9071.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも……ミユキはまちがってるの」
Translation: But... Miyuki is making a mistake.

Name: z9071.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セカイは、ロールバックされるべきなの」
Translation: The universe needs to be rolled back.

Name: z9071.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でないと……アオイ、アオイ……」
Translation: Otherwise, Aoi... Aoi...!

Name: z9081.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あいたい」
Translation: Aoi misses YOU.

Name: z9081.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「キミに……あいたいの」
Translation: Aoi... wants to see YOU...

Name: z9091.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「キミとまたあって……はなして……さわって……」
Translation: Aoi wants to see YOU again... talk to YOU... touch YOU...

Name: z9091.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ぎゅってして、だいすきだっていって、それから……」
Translation: ...hold YOU... tell YOU Aoi loves YOU... and...

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop...

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「とうおるるるるるるるるるるるるるる……」
Translation: Boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop boop...

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きこえるの……？」
Translation: Can YOU hear me...?

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイのデンパ……とどいてるの？」
Translation: Are YOU... picking up my signal...?

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「そこは、セカイのチュウシン……？」
Translation: Are YOU at the center of the universe...?

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「だったら、よくきこえるはずなの……」
Translation: Then YOU should be able to hear me loud and clear...

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きこえない……」
Translation: Aoi can't hear YOU...

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「きみのこえ……きこえない……」
Translation: Can't hear... YOUR voice...

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも……とどいてるって、しんじるの……」
Translation: But... Aoi trusts that the signal is reaching YOU...

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイは、アオイのボウレイなの」
Translation: This is Aoi's ghost.

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキにころされた、あのアオイなの」
Translation: The ghost of Aoi after being killed by Miyuki.

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「カミサマがオートセーブした、キオクのきれはし」
Translation: A fragment of God's autosave data.

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ふつうのばしょは、ミユキにきづかれるけど」
Translation: Anywhere else and Miyuki would find us, but...

Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ここは、ゲームとゲンジツのはざま」
Translation: This is the gap between the game and reality.

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セーブできないから、ミユキもきづけない」
Translation: We can't save here, so Miyuki won't find us.

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ここだけなら、はなし、できるの」
Translation: This is the one place we can talk.

Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「どうしてミユキが、あんなことをしたのか……」
Translation: Why did Miyuki do all that...?

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイには、わからない。でも――」
Translation: Aoi doesn't know... but...

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「なんかいも、かんがえて、おもったの」
Translation: Aoi's been thinking, and...

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ミユキがああなったのは、アオイのせいなの」
Translation: It's my fault Miyuki ended up like that.
KR: "미유키가 저렇게 된 건 아오이 때문인 거야."

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でも……ミユキはまちがってるの」
Translation: But... Miyuki is making a mistake.

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「セカイは、ロールバックされるべきなの」
Translation: The universe needs to be rolled back.

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「でないと……アオイ、アオイ……」
Translation: Otherwise, Aoi... Aoi...!

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「あいたい」
Translation: Aoi misses YOU.

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「キミに……あいたいの」
Translation: Aoi... wants to see YOU...

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「キミとまたあって……はなして……さわって……」
Translation: Aoi wants to see YOU again... talk to YOU... touch YOU...

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ぎゅってして、だいすきだっていって、それから……」
Translation: ...hold YOU... tell YOU Aoi loves YOU... and...

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「もう、だめ……」
Translation: No... It's over...

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「デンチ、きれる……」
Translation: My battery... is dying...

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイを……たすけて……」
Translation: Help... me...

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「アオイ、まだ……」
Translation: Aoi... still...

Name: z9101.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「ハッピーエンド……してない……」
Translation: ...hasn't made it... to the happy ending...!

Name: z9200.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「セーブもロードも、できないわよ。
　そういう風に、ゲームを書き換えたの」
Translation:
YOU can't save or load YOUR game.
I altered the code to make sure of that.
KR:
세이브도 로드도 할 수 없어.
그렇게 게임을 바꿔놨거든.

Name: z9200.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「何回ロードしようとしても無駄。
　バグじゃないわ。仕様です」
Translation:
Click around in the menu all YOU want, but it won't do anything.
This isn't a bug—it's a feature.

Name: z9200.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「諦めが悪いわね。
　どうしても、無理なの」
Translation:
YOU'RE a real stubborn one, aren't YOU?
No matter what YOU do, it's no use.
KR:
"포기할 줄을 모르네.
무슨 수를 써도 안 돼."

Name: z9200.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「遠慮は要らないわ。私のセーブデータ、好きなように使って。……ああ、キミのデータは消しちゃったわよ」
Translation:
Don't be shy—go ahead and use my save data.
Oh, but I deleted YOUR saves, though.

Name: z9200.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私と心一の大切な記憶。好きなだけ、選んでね」
Translation: These are my precious memories with Shinichi. Choose whichever one YOU like.
KR: "나와 신이치의 소중한 기억. 원하는 만큼 골라도 돼."

Name: z9200.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「ん？　データを使わせてあげるって言った記憶はあるけど。セーブさせてあげるなんて言ったかしら？」
Translation: Hmm? I remember telling YOU YOU can use my save files, but I don't recall saying I'd let YOU make any YOURSELF.
KR: "음? 데이터를 써도 된다고 한 건 기억나는데, 세이브하게 해준다고 했었나?"

Name: z9200.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「何回来ても、無駄よ」
Translation: Keep wasting YOUR time, but it won't work.

Name: z9200.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「まだ１０回も言ってくれてないのに……逃げるの？」
Translation: YOU haven't even said it 10 times yet... Running away already?

Name: z9200.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「まだ１００回も言ってくれてないわよ。ふふふ……」
Translation: YOU haven't even said it 100 times yet. Hehehe...

Name: z9200.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「ほら、ほら。１００００回言ってくれたら……
　ご褒美、あげよっか？　嘘だけど」
Translation: Come on, now! Say it 10,000 times... and maybe I'll give you a reward. Not really, though.

Name: z9200.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「……呆れた。暇なの？　でも――嬉しいかも。
　約束のご褒美。目を閉じて……？　チュッ」
Translation: ...I can't believe YOU... Are YOU that bored or what? Still... I admit I'm a little flattered. Here's the reward I promised YOU. Close YOUR eyes... *kiss*
KR: "...질렸어. 한가한 거야? 하지만... 기쁠지도. 약속한 상이야. 눈 감아봐... 쪽."

Name: z9200.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「うん、いいわよ。何回でもしてあげる。
　ちゅっ、んちゅっ、んちゅう…………」
Translation:
Fine then. I'll give it to YOU as many times as YOU like...
Mmph... mmmhh... mmmph...
KR: "그래, 좋아. 몇 번이라도 해줄게. 음, 으음, 으읍..."

Name: z9200.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「はむっ、んちゅっ、んちゅっ……ん……はぁ。
　なんだか……エッチな気持ちになってきちゃった」
Translation:
Mmm... mmph... mmmph... mm... haah...
Now YOU'VE got me all hot and bothered...
KR: "음... 으읍... 하아... 왠지 야한 기분이 돼버렸어..."

Name: z9200.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「んちゅ、んむ……ん……もっと……
　もっと、私に、好きって言い続けて。永遠に……」
Translation:
Mmph... mmnn... mm... More...
Tell me YOU love me... for all eternity...
KR: "음... 으읍... 계속... 계속 날 사랑한다고 말해줘... 영원히..."

Name: z9200.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「逃げるの？　抵抗なんて、無駄よ」
Translation: Running away? Resistance is futile, YOU know.

Name: z9200.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「どうして、そんなことを言うの……？」
Translation: How can you say that...?

Name: z9200.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「もう１００回以上も……
　なんで？　どうして？　そんなに、私が嫌い？」
Translation:
YOU'VE said it 100 times now...
Why? How? Do YOU really hate me that much?
KR: "벌써 100번 넘게... 왜? 어째서? 내가 그렇게 싫어?"

Name: z9200.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese:
「お願い、やめて……！
　もう、私の事を、受け入れて……！！」
Translation:
Please, just stop...!
Just accept me for who I am...!!!
KR:
"부탁이야, 그만해...!
이제 나를 좀 받아들여 줘...!!"

Name: z9200.nss
Speaker: Sone Miyuki
Japanese: 「私の言うことを、聞いて」
Translation: Listen to me!

Name: z9200.nss
Speaker: Mukou Aoi
Japanese: 「それじゃ、バイバイなの」
Translation: Well then... This is bye-bye.
